original: I have pondered my mission to train an apprentice in the shadowy arts of assassination and I'm considering my own [assassin_protege_1.GetFirstName]. [assassin_protege_1.GetSheHeCap] has been illustrating a steely determination in some matters, and I think [assassin_protege_1.GetSheHe]'s more clever than [assassin_protege_1.GetSheHe] lets on... It could be a dangerous path, but under my wing, perhaps [assassin_protege_1.GetSheHe] could excel?
translation: 在经过深思熟虑后，我决定把[assassin_protege_1.GetFirstName]训练成一名阴影中的刺客。[assassin_protege_1.GetSheHeCap]在一些事情上一直表现出钢铁般的决心，我认为[assassin_protege_1.GetSheHe]比[assassin_protege_1.GetSheHe]想的要更聪明……这或许是一条危险的道路，但在我的培养下，也许[assassin_protege_1.GetSheHe]能表现的更加出色。

original: A youngster has been caught red-handed trying to pickpocket me today. My guards are furious with the child, but noting the quiet defiance in [assassin_protege.GetHerHis] eyes, I am reminded of myself. Remembering the mission assigned to me by the Assassins, I wonder if the child is as sly as [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] seems – perhaps this incident could benefit us all?
translation: 今天，一个试图偷我钱的小孩被当场抓住了。当我的卫兵抓到人的时候，我从[assassin_protege.GetHerHis]眼中感受到了不屈的意志。这让我想到阿萨辛派交给我的任务，我不知道这孩子是否像[assassin_protege.GetSheHe]看上去那样灵巧——但或许这孩子将来可以为我所用？

original: I'll speak with [assassin_protege_1.GetTitledFirstName] about [assassin_protege_1.GetHerHis] potential.
translation: 我会和[assassin_protege_1.GetTitledFirstName]谈谈有关[assassin_protege_1.GetHerHis]潜能的事情。

original: You begin training §Y[assassin_protege_1.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 你开始训练§Y[assassin_protege_1.GetTitledFirstName]§!。\n

original: Maybe [assassin_protege_2.GetTitledFirstName] would be better suited for this...
translation: 也许[assassin_protege_2.GetTitledFirstName]更适合这个……

original: You begin training §Y[assassin_protege_2.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 你开始训练§Y[assassin_protege_2.GetTitledFirstName]§!。\n

original: Actually, [assassin_protege_3.GetTitledFirstName] is the best choice.
translation: 事实上，[assassin_protege_3.GetTitledFirstName]是最好的人选。

original: You begin training §Y[assassin_protege_3.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 你开始训练§Y[assassin_protege_3.GetTitledFirstName]§!。\n

original: Let [assassin_protege.GetHerHim] go! I have a special interest in this lost soul.
translation: 放开[assassin_protege.GetHerHim]！我对这迷失的灵魂很感兴趣。

original: You begin training §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 你开始训练§Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§!。\n

original: Take the urchin away – one does not simply steal from the [Root.GetTitle]!
translation: 把这淘气鬼带走！没人能轻易地从[Root.GetTitle]这儿偷东西！

original: You ignore the opportunity to train an apprentice for §Ythe Assassins§!. The child is imprisoned for [assassin_protege.GetHerHis] crimes.\n
translation: 你无视了为§Y阿萨辛§!训练一名学徒的机会。这个孩子因[assassin_protege.GetHerHis]罪行被囚禁。\n

original: I can't be bothered with this right now.
translation: 我现在不能为这事分心。

original: You ignore the opportunity to train an apprentice for the Assassins.\n
translation: 你忽视了一个训练刺客的机会。\n

original: Received Parental Praise
translation: 受到了父母的赞扬

original: Was Shown Mercy
translation: 曾蒙宽恕

original: Bolstered by my tutelage [assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName] is growing into a confident young [assassin_protege.GetBoyGirl]. [assassin_protege.GetSheHeCap] reads everything I throw at [assassin_protege.GetHerHim] and [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] seems eager to learn more about our beliefs... The next step for [assassin_protege.GetHerHim] should be chosen carefully.
translation: 在我的监护下[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]成长为一个自信的年轻[assassin_protege.GetBoyGirl]。[assassin_protege.GetSheHeCap]学习了我教给[assassin_protege.GetHerHim]的一切并且渴望更多的了解我们的信仰……为了[assassin_protege.GetHerHim]，应该谨慎考虑下一步。

original: [assassin_protege.GetSheHeCap] should focus on cultural adaption, for infiltration missions.
translation: [assassin_protege.GetSheHeCap]应当专注于文化适应，为了渗透敌后的任务。

original: You will encourage the scheming skills of §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 你鼓励§Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§!发展密谋能力。\n

original: [assassin_protege.GetSheHeCap] could probably use more practice with the dagger.
translation: [assassin_protege.GetSheHeCap]应该接受更多暗杀技巧的训练。

original: You will encourage the martial skills of §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 你鼓励§Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§!发展军事技能！。\n

original: [assassin_protege.GetSheHeCap] needs to know balance in all [assassin_protege.GetHerHis] areas of expertise.
translation: [assassin_protege.GetSheHeCap]需要均衡地了解一下[assassin_protege.GetHerHis]领域中所有的专业知识。

original: You will strive for a well-balanced training for §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 你会努力为§Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§!准备一个平衡的训练计划。\n

original: The rigorous training I set up for [assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName] continues to yield promising results – in addition to subtly befriending several foreign diplomats at court, [assassin_protege.GetTitledName] has been studying the books fervently, even in candlelit hours. I believe it is time for a test of some sort.
translation: [assassin_protege.GetTitledName]在我的严格训练中不断有着出色的表现——他机灵地与宫中几位外国使节交好，即使在只有微弱烛光的深夜，[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]仍然热情地读着书本。我觉得是时候检验一下水平了。

original: The combat training I set up for [assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName] continues to yield promising results – in addition to having spent rigorous amounts of time in the [Root.GetCapitalHolding] practice grounds, [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] clearly outmatches any opponents [assassin_protege.GetHerHis] own age. I believe a test is in order.
translation: 我为[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]制定的战斗训练取得了可喜的成果——[assassin_protege.GetSheHe]不仅在[Root.GetCapitalHolding]训练场严格按时训练，而且显然超越了[assassin_protege.GetHerHis]同龄人。我认为一次测验可以提上日程了。

original: The rigorous schedule I set up for [assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName] continues to yield promising results – in addition to demonstrating a knack for foreign languages, [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] is proving increasingly proficient in [assassin_protege.GetHerHis] combat training. I believe it is time for a test of some sort.
translation: 我为[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]制定的严格时间表取得了可喜的成果——[assassin_protege.GetSheHe]不仅精通了多国语言，还在[assassin_protege.GetHerHis]实战训练中不断地证明着自己的熟练技巧。我觉得是时候检验一下水平了。

original: I'll have my associates arrange some sort of test.
translation: 我会让我的助理安排一些测试。

original: This outcome will be influenced by the various skills of §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 这个结果将会受到§Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§!的各种技能影响。\n

original: It was a [Root.GetWeatherAdjective] midnight when the hired thugs descended upon [assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]. The reports state that [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] somehow managed to talk [assassin_protege.GetHerHis] way out of it, convincing the attackers that they had the wrong target. [assassin_protege.GetSheHeCap] then sent them on a wild goose-chase around the [Root.GetCapitalHolding], which I am told lasted hours.
translation: [Root.GetWeatherAdjective]的午夜，一伙被雇佣的暴徒突然造访了[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]。据报告说[assassin_protege.GetSheHe]成功通过交谈摆脱了困境，使袭击者相信他们找错了目标。然后[assassin_protege.GetSheHeCap]让他们白费力气地在[Root.GetCapitalHolding]周边搜寻，持续了好几个小时。

original: [assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName] expertly handled the surprise attack I planned out, striking the thugs down with frightening precision. When I explained that the men [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] had beaten, one even killed, had been working on my orders, [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] cocked an eyebrow at me before leaning back in [assassin_protege.GetHerHis] chair, smiling.
translation: [assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]巧妙地化解了我计划的突然袭击，以令人恐惧的精准度打倒匪徒。这些匪徒被[assassin_protege.GetSheHe]击败，其中一人甚至被杀死。当我说明他们是按我的命令行事时，[assassin_protege.GetFirstName]扬起眉毛盯着我然后微笑着倚靠在[assassin_protege.GetHerHis]椅子边。

original: The hired thugs I sent to ambush [assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName] came back bruised and confused tonight. When I confront my apprentice [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] calmly explains that [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] made them see the error of their ways. "One will likely die from the injury", I say. [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] nods slowly, before returning to [assassin_protege.GetHerHis] book.
translation: 当夜我雇去袭击[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]的匪徒回来了，带着满身瘀伤且充满困惑。当我质问我的学徒时，[assassin_protege.GetSheHe]冷静地解释说[assassin_protege.GetSheHe]只是让他们认识到自己行事方式上的缺陷。「那样的伤害可能会置人于死地」我说。[assassin_protege.GetFirstName]轻轻地点了点头，然后又继续去看[assassin_protege.GetHerHis]书。

original: You handled this well, [assassin_protege.GetFirstName].
translation: 你处理得很好，[assassin_protege.GetFirstName]。

original: The Assassins will be pleased to hear of your protege, §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 阿萨辛在得知你招收了新的门徒后将会非常高兴，§Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§!。\n

original: [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] noticed the thugs coming and managed to sneak into a building to hide. [assassin_protege.GetSheHeCap] caused quite a ruckus as [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] stumbled into the bedroom of a local merchant and his wife. The escape from there was hasty, but I suppose I'm not entirely disappointed in [assassin_protege.GetHerHim] surviving the ambush.
translation: [assassin_protege.GetFirstName]意识到暴徒的到来，便设法偷偷躲进一间建筑藏起来。当[assassin_protege.GetSheHe]无意间溜进一个当地商人和他妻子所在的卧室时[assassin_protege.GetSheHeCap]引发了一阵骚动。虽然逃跑得十分狼狈，但是我对[assassin_protege.GetHerHim]能从伏击中幸存并不完全失望。

original: [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] noticed the thugs coming and eagerly drew [assassin_protege.GetHerHis] blade on them. The fight that ensued left both parties wounded, but at least [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] survived the ambush. I'll have to talk to [assassin_protege.GetHerHim] about the optimal points of attack on the human body, however.
translation: [assassin_protege.GetFirstName]注意到匪徒们来了，于是急切的掏出了[assassin_protege.GetHerHis]匕首向他们刺去。随后的搏斗使两方都受伤了，但是至少[assassin_protege.GetSheHe]在伏击中活了下来。不过，我得和[assassin_protege.GetHerHim]好好谈谈关于刺人的最佳部位的问题。

original: It was a [Root.GetWeatherAdjective] midnight when the hired thugs descended upon [assassin_protege.GetFirstName]. [assassin_protege.GetSheHeCap] attempted to fool them by claiming my orders had changed, that the ambush was called off. While I am impressed that [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] saw through the test, [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] did not sell it completely, and instead ended up with running away in panic.
translation: [Root.GetWeatherAdjective]的午夜，一伙被雇佣的暴徒突然造访了[assassin_protege.GetFirstName]。[assassin_protege.GetSheHeCap]试图欺骗他们，说我已经收回了命令，埋伏取消了。尽管[assassin_protege.GetSheHe]看穿了这个考验，这让我印象深刻，不过[assassin_protege.GetSheHe]在骗人方面没有完全成功，最后慌张地逃跑了。

original: [assassin_protege.GetSheHeCap]'s good, but [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] still has a lot to learn.
translation: [assassin_protege.GetSheHeCap]很优秀，但[assassin_protege.GetSheHe]还有很多东西要学习。

original: You believe in [assassin_protege.GetHerHim]. The Assassins will be informed of your apprentice, §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 你对[assassin_protege.GetHerHim]颇有信心。以后阿萨辛一定会流传有关你的学徒§Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§!的传说。\n

original: It was a [Root.GetWeatherAdjective] night when the hired thugs descended upon [assassin_protege.GetFirstName]. [assassin_protege.GetSheHeCap] apparently tried to talk [assassin_protege.GetHerHis] way out of the situation, but the attackers were not so easily charmed... They were not supposed to injure [assassin_protege.GetHerHim] badly, but something must have gone wrong.
translation: [Root.GetWeatherAdjective]的夜晚，一伙被雇佣的暴徒突然造访了[assassin_protege.GetFirstName]。[assassin_protege.GetSheHeCap]显然尝试通过交谈摆脱困境，但袭击者们不会如此轻易被迷惑……他们本不应该对[assassin_protege.GetHerHim]下此毒手，但这剧情实在是出乎意料。

original: Oh, poor [assassin_protege.GetFirstName]. I thought you had potential.
translation: 啊，可怜的[assassin_protege.GetFirstName]，我还以为你很有潜力呢。

original: The life of an Assassin is not an easy one but it would seem §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§! was not ready for it. The Assassins will be informed of your failure.\n
translation: 作为一名刺客的生活并不简单，看来§Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§!还没准备好迎接它。阿萨辛将会知晓我的失败。\n

original: This hurts more than I thought it would.
translation: 这比我想象的还要疼。

original: The life of an Assassin is not an easy one but it would seem §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§! was not ready for it.\nThe Assassins will be informed of your loss.\n
translation: 作为一名刺客的生活并不简单，看来§Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§!还没准备好迎接它。\n阿萨辛将会知晓我的失败。\n

original: The time has come for me to confess my love for the one true god.
translation: 是时候坦诚我对唯一真神的敬爱了。

original: I'll scream it from the top of my lungs!
translation: 我会发出发自肺中的惨叫！

original: I'll join the religion in secret.
translation: 我将秘密加入这个宗教。

original: Over the past few months, my apprentice [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] has deeply impressed both me and my order. The Assassins have informed me that I should be proud to have been the guardian of this faithful young [assassin_protege.GetManWoman].
translation: 在过去的几个月里，我的学徒[assassin_protege.GetFirstName]给我和阿萨辛留下了深刻的印象。阿萨辛告知我，我应该对自己是这样一位优秀的又年轻的[assassin_protege.GetManWoman]的导师而感到骄傲。

original: In spite of [assassin_protege.GetHerHis] injuries, my apprentice [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] has proven [assassin_protege.GetHerselfHimself], both to me and my order. The Assassins have informed me that they are pleased with my training of the faithful young [assassin_protege.GetManWoman].
translation: 尽管[assassin_protege.GetHerHis]负伤了，我的学徒[assassin_protege.GetFirstName]向我和阿萨辛证明了[assassin_protege.GetHerselfHimself]自己。阿萨辛已经告知我，我对年轻而忠实的[assassin_protege.GetManWoman]的训练令他们十分满意。

original: The death of my dear apprentice took me by surprise, but what is worse is the complete silence I have been met with from the Assassins. I can only assume that they are disappointed – all I can do is wait for a new mission.
translation: 我那可怜的徒弟的死使我心神动摇，但更糟糕的是阿萨辛对此事尽表沉默。我觉得他们一定对我非常失望——而我能做的只有等待新的任务。

original: Over the past few months, my apprentice [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] has impressed both me and my order. The Assassins have informed me that as soon as [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] has agreed to convert to our faith, they will share in my pride as guardians of this remarkable young [assassin_protege.GetManWoman].
translation: 在过去的几个月中，我的学徒[assassin_protege.GetFirstName]给我和阿萨辛都留下了深刻的印象。阿萨辛告知我，只要[assassin_protege.GetSheHe]同意信仰我们的教条，他们就会以我之名共同成为小[assassin_protege.GetManWoman]这个了不起的年轻人的监护人。

original: In spite of [assassin_protege.GetHerHis] injuries, my apprentice [assassin_protege.GetFirstName] has proven [assassin_protege.GetHerselfHimself], both to me and my order. The Assassins have informed me that as soon as [assassin_protege.GetSheHe] has agreed to convert to our faith, they will consider my mission to train the young [assassin_protege.GetManWoman] complete.
translation: 尽管[assassin_protege.GetHerHis]身体负伤，我的学徒[assassin_protege.GetFirstName]向我和组织证明了[assassin_protege.GetHerselfHimself]。阿萨辛通知我一旦[assassin_protege.GetSheHe]同意皈依我们的信仰，他们将认定我训练年轻[assassin_protege.GetManWoman]的任务完成。

original: The death of my dear apprentice took me by surprise, but what is worse is the complete silence I have been met with from the Assassins. I can only assume that they are disappointed – all I can do is wait for a new mission.
translation: 我那可怜的徒弟的死使我心神动摇，但更糟糕的是阿萨辛对此事尽表沉默。我觉得他们一定对我非常失望——而我能做的只有等待新的任务。

original: Allah is with us.
translation: 安拉与我们同在。

original: You will complete your mission to train an apprentice.
translation: 你将完成训练一名学徒的任务。

original: Praise Allah!
translation: 赞美安拉！

original: You will complete your mission to train an apprentice.
translation: 你将完成训练一名学徒的任务。

original: I will wait for further instructions.
translation: 我等待进一步的指示。

original: You fail your mission to train an apprentice.\n
translation: 你培养学徒的任务失败了。\n

original: May the shadow hide you, [assassin_protege.GetFirstName].
translation: 愿阴影蒙蔽你，[assassin_protege.GetFirstName]。

original: You will complete your mission to train an apprentice.
translation: 你将完成训练一名学徒的任务。

original: May the shadows protect you, [assassin_protege.GetFirstName].
translation: 愿阴影护佑着你。[assassin_protege.GetFirstName]。

original: You will complete your mission to train an apprentice.
translation: 你将完成训练一名学徒的任务。

original: The Assassins want nothing to do with you right now.
translation: 阿萨辛现在不想和你有任何关系。

original: You fail your mission to train an apprentice.\n
translation: 你培养学徒的任务失败了。\n

original: §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§! will offer [assassin_protege.GetHerselfHimself] up to Allah and convert to the religion of Shia Islam.
translation: §Y[assassin_protege.GetTitledFirstName]§!将把[assassin_protege.GetHerselfHimself]献给安拉并且改信伊斯兰教什叶派。

original: My child, and apprentice in the shadowy arts of assassination, has been the victim of an unexpected turn of events and a most untimely death. I could be beside myself with pain, but I must focus on recovering from the loss, while the Assassins are informed of my predicament.
translation: 我的孩子，一个精于阴影中的暗杀之术的学徒，不幸成为了一次任务意外转变的受害者，接受了这不合时宜的死亡。我可以独自痛苦着，但是我必须专注于从这次失败中恢复。同时阿萨辛将知晓我的失败。

original: My apprentice in the shadowy arts of assassination has been the victim of an unexpected turn of events and a most untimely death. The Assassins will be informed of my loss and predicament.
translation: 我那精于阴影中的暗杀之术的学徒不幸成为了一次任务意外转变的受害者，接受了这不合时宜的死亡。阿萨辛将会知晓我的失败。

original: This is highly unfortunate.
translation: 这实在是非常不幸。

original: You fail your mission to train an apprentice.\n
translation: 你培养学徒的任务失败了。\n

original: I'm having dinner and plenty of drinks with [satanists_recruiter.GetTitledName] tonight. It's lovely, yet what I am most charmed by is [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName] [satanists_recruiter.GetHerselfHimself]. Why else would I not immediately stop our conversation, which has slowly begun to touch upon some almost heretical ideas, questioning the salvation of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]?
translation: 今晚我与[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledName]共进晚餐，还喝了点酒。晚餐的环境很好，但最让我着迷的是[satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName][satanists_recruiter.GetHerselfHimself]。否则怎么会当我们的话题开始转向一些异端的想法——质疑[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]救赎的存在时——我没有立刻结束我们的对话呢？

original: If we do not ask questions, why did [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] make us curious?
translation: 如果我们不去质疑，为什么[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]会让我们有好奇心？

original: You think it's a great discussion, fueled by alcohol or not.\n
translation: 也许是你喝多了，你觉得这是一场很棒的讨论。\n

original: We should not speak of this, [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName].
translation: 我们不应该谈论这个，[satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName]。

original: You would never question the authority of the almighty.\n
translation: 你永远不能质疑全能之神的权威。\n

original: Meeting with [satanists_recruit.GetTitledFirstName], I made sure to only cautiously question the absolute power of [satanists_recruit.GetHerHis] almighty [satanists_recruit.Religion.GetHighGodName]... Thankfully, it seems that my carefully chosen words had the desired effect on [satanists_recruit.GetHerHim]. From [satanists_recruit.GetHerHis] glittering eyes I got the distinct impression that [satanists_recruit.GetSheHe] enjoyed the philosophical aspect of our conversion.
translation: 在面见[satanists_recruit.GetTitledFirstName]时，我克制自己，只是谨慎地质疑[satanists_recruit.GetHerHis]全能[satanists_recruit.Religion.GetHighGodName]的绝对权柄……谢天谢地，看起来我的谨慎措辞很合[satanists_recruit.GetHerHim]的胃口。从[satanists_recruit.GetHerHis]闪闪发光的眼中我有一种直觉，[satanists_recruit.GetSheHe]很享受这次传教中的哲学探讨。

original: Meeting with [satanists_recruit.GetTitledFirstName], I made sure to only cautiously question the absolute power of [satanists_recruit.GetHerHis] almighty [satanists_recruit.Religion.GetHighGodName]... Regretfully, it seems that my words only irritated my [satanists_recruit.GetRootRelation] – from the steely look [satanists_recruit.GetSheHe] finally gave me, I should probably steer clear of [satanists_recruit.GetHerHim] for now.
translation: 在面见[satanists_recruit.GetTitledFirstName]时，我克制自己，只是谨慎地质疑[satanists_recruit.GetHerHis]全能[satanists_recruit.Religion.GetHighGodName]的绝对权柄……遗憾的是，我的话似乎只是激怒了我的[satanists_recruit.GetRootRelation]——从[satanists_recruit.GetSheHe]冷酷的眼神来看，我现在应该离[satanists_recruit.GetHerHim]远点儿。

original: A sensible [satanists_recruit.GetManWoman], [satanists_recruit.GetFirstName].
translation: 一个通情达理的[satanists_recruit.GetManWoman]，[satanists_recruit.GetFirstName]。

original: Continue your endeavor to recruit §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! to [Root.Society.GetName].\n
translation: 继续尝试招募§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!进入[Root.Society.GetName]。\n

original: I'm not sure [satanists_recruit.GetHerHis] sentiments were sincere...
translation: 我不能确定[satanists_recruit.GetHerHis]态度是否出于真挚……

original: You end your endeavor to recruit §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! to [Root.Society.GetName].\n
translation: 你不再为[Root.Society.GetName]招募§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!。\n

original: Disappointing.
translation: 令人失望。

original: Walking the palisades of my [Root.GetCapitalHolding] I am joined by [satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]. I find myself agreeing with a lot of the concepts [satanists_recruiter.GetSheHe] presents – the futility of prayer particularly resonates with me. Suddenly, [satanists_recruiter.GetSheHe] turns to me and presses a small leather pouch into my hand. "My [Root.GetLordLady], will you carry this with you, for protection?"
translation: 当我沿着[Root.GetCapitalHolding]的栅栏散步的时候，[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]加入了我。我发现自己同意[satanists_recruiter.GetSheHe]陈述的很多概念——尤其是祈祷的无用引起了我的共鸣。突然间，[satanists_recruiter.GetSheHe]转过身来，将一个小皮袋塞进我的手中。「我的[Root.GetLordLady]，你会带着这个护身符吗？」

original: I'll keep it hidden, and I thank you, [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName].
translation: 我会把它藏起来，谢谢你，[satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName]。

original: You encourage the advances made by §Y[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 你促进了§Y[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§!取得的进展。\n

original: What is this? I should call you a [satanists_recruiter.GetDWMagician]!
translation: 这是怎么回事？你这个[satanists_recruiter.GetDWMagician]！

original: You distance yourself from §Y[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 你让自己远离 §Y[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§!。\n

original: I've arranged a run-in with [From.GetTitledFirstName] on the palisades of [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetCapitalHolding] today. [From.GetHerHisCap] face lights up upon seeing me and we stay out talking for hours. I offer [From.GetHerHim] a protection spell, in a leather pouch – of course, I do not explain the content... Yet [From.GetSheHe] smiles, accepting the token.
translation: 今天我与[From.GetTitledFirstName]在[From.GetHerHis][From.GetCapitalHolding]的栅栏边见了面。[From.GetSheHeCap]一见到我就眉飞色舞，我们在外面聊了好几个小时。我给[From.GetHerHim]一个护身符咒，装在一个皮革袋子里——当然我没有告诉他那是什么。不过[From.GetSheHe]笑着收下了。

original: I've arranged a run-in with [From.GetTitledFirstName] on the palisades of [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetCapitalHolding] today. [From.GetHerHisCap] face darkens when I again attempt to discuss my world views. I then offer [From.GetHerHim] my favorite protection spell, a chicken leg in a leather pouch – I thought it was harmless enough, but [From.GetSheHe] refuses to accept the gift.
translation: 今天我与[From.GetTitledFirstName]在[From.GetHerHis][From.GetCapitalHolding]的栅栏边见了面。当我再次试图讨论我的世界观时[From.GetHerHisCap]脸色一沉。我给了[From.GetHerHim]一个我最喜欢的护身咒，一个鸡腿装在一个皮革袋子里——虽说我觉得这已经足够无害，不过[From.GetSheHe]仍然拒绝收下。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] just needs one more little push.
translation: [From.GetSheHeCap]只是需要一点鞭策。

original: Invite §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! to [Root.Society.GetName].
translation: 邀请§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!加入[Root.Society.GetName]。

original: It's been interesting, but I don't think [From.GetSheHe] is ready for more.
translation: 到目前为止这很有趣，但我不认为[From.GetSheHe]已经准备好接受更多。

original: This has been a wasted effort – [From.GetFirstName] is locked in [From.GetHerHis] views.
translation: 这些努力只是白费——[From.GetFirstName]被[From.GetHerHis]观念蒙蔽了双眼。

original: "What if I told you that all you have been taught to believe in is a lie?" [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName] continues, throwing a cautious glance around us before pulling up [satanists_recruiter.GetHerHis] sleeve, revealing a scar in the shape of a pentagram. "[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] lied to Adam in the Garden of Eden. Reject the Tyrant deity and let [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] guide your steps..."
translation: 「如果我告诉你，你所被教育而笃信的一切都是谎言呢？」[satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName]继续说道，谨慎地扫视了我们四周后，撸起[satanists_recruiter.GetHerHis]袖子，露出了一个五芒星形的烙印。「[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]在伊甸园向亚当撒了谎。拒绝那个专制伪神，让[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]指引你的道路……」

original: You truly are a [satanists_recruiter.GetDWMagician] then? Can you [Root.GetDWReasonToJoin]?
translation: 那你真的是一个[satanists_recruiter.GetDWMagician]？你能[Root.GetDWReasonToJoin]吗？

original: You ask §Y[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! how you can begin your journey into this forbidden knowledge.\n
translation: 你向§Y[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§!请教如何才能开始探寻禁忌知识的旅程。\n

original: That is blasphemy, [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName]! Leave my sight, before I call the guards!
translation: 这是渎神，[satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName]！在我呼叫卫兵之前，从我眼前消失！

original: You dismiss §Y[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! offer and pretend it never happened.\n
translation: 你驳回§Y[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§!的提议并假装无事发生。\n

original: When I revealed the brand on my lower arm, expecting the final hook to sink in, [From.GetFirstName] staggered backwards in shock and made a hand gesture for protection. "That is blasphemy, [Root.GetFirstName]" [From.GetSheHe] said, eyes wide. "Leave my sight, before I call the guards!" [From.GetSheHe] called and it was with reluctance, albeit hastily, that I left.
translation: 当我露出我小臂上的烙印，期望这最后的手段能够让对方理解时，[From.GetFirstName]颤抖着，震惊地后退了半步，作出自我防护的手势。「这是严重的亵渎，[Root.GetFirstName]。」[From.GetSheHe]大喊道，双眼圆睁，「在我喊来卫兵们之前，滚出我的视线！」尽管十分不满，我还是匆忙地退了出去。

original: If I can't turn [From.GetHerHim], no one can.
translation: 如果我不能改变[From.GetHerHim]，那就没有人可以。

original: When I proceeded to reveal the brand on my lower arm, certain that the final hook would sink in, [From.GetFirstName] inhaled sharply, worrying me for a second. "You truly are a [Root.GetDWMagician] then", [From.GetSheHe] says, eager and relieved. "Can you help me [From.GetDWReasonToJoin]?" [From.GetSheHe] continues, eyes pleading.
translation: 当我接下来露出在我小臂上的烙痕时，我相信决定性的时刻即将到来，[From.GetFirstName]剧烈地吸了一口气，让我的心刹那间提起来了。「所以你真的是一个[Root.GetDWMagician]」，[From.GetSheHe]放松了下来，同时渴望地说道。「你能帮我[From.GetDWReasonToJoin]么？」[From.GetSheHe]继续说着，目光恳切。

original: Patience, [From.GetSisterBrother]. We will speak more soon.
translation: 耐心点，[From.GetSisterBrother]，我们之后再说。

original: Write a letter to the coven about §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! induction. [satanists_inductor.GetSocietyRank] §Y[satanists_inductor.GetFirstName]§! will handle it from here.
translation: 给秘社写一封有关§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!招募进程的信。[satanists_inductor.GetSocietyRank]§Y[satanists_inductor.GetFirstName]§!将会接手此事。

original: "We might... If you offer yourself up to [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil], you will be granted powers [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] has kept from us humans." Fingering the leather pouch in my pocket, I slowly nod. "Oh, and I think you'll enjoy it..." [satanists_recruiter.GetSheHe] said, with a knowing smile.
translation: 「我们或许可以……如果你向[satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil]献上自己，你将获赐那些[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]禁止我们人类拥有的力量。」我手里摸着口袋里的小皮袋，慢慢地点头。「哦，我想你会喜欢它的……」[satanists_recruiter.GetSheHe]带着一个会心的微笑说道。

original: If there is any chance it'll [Root.GetDWReasonToJoin], I will.
translation: 如果有任何[Root.GetDWReasonToJoin]的机会，我愿意。

original: §Y[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! leaves you alone for now – the coven will be in contact with you.\n
translation: §Y[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§!离开了，留下你一个人——秘社将会与你联系。\n

original: It has been some time since [satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] was in contact with me. I have been mulling over [satanists_recruiter.GetPossPronoun] words. [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] told Adam he would die if he ate of the forbidden fruit... [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] lied. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship] lie.
translation: 离[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]联系我已经有一段时间了。我一直仔细思索着[satanists_recruiter.GetPossPronoun]话。[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]告诉亚当如果他吃了禁果就会死亡……[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]撒了谎。这是一个由[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]们在[Root.GetHouseOfWorship]中撒的谎。

original: It has been some time since [satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] was in contact with me. I have been pondering what [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] would think of me for venturing down this path, but [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName] has already offered me more support than [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] ever has. I have begun studying books on the occult and so far I'm finding the views preached at the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship] to be narrow-minded, at best.
translation: 离[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]上次联系我已经有一段时间了。我一直在想[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]会怎么看待在这条路上渐行渐远的我，但是[satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName]给我提供的支持已经远超[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]曾给我的恩赐。我开始研读关于超自然的书籍，目前为止我发现[Root.GetHouseOfWorship]中的布道都显得有些偏执。

original: Their lies are meant to hold us back!
translation: 他们的谎言是为了阻止我们归来！

original: You continue to await further instruction.\n
translation: 你继续等待着进一步的指示。\n

original: I can't believe I have been so gullible.
translation: 我不敢相信我曾如此轻信他人。

original: I am beginning to feel that I have been missing out...
translation: 我开始感觉到自己错过了什么……

original: Why must we always put the needs of others before our own...?
translation: 为什么我们总是把别人的需求置于我们自己的需求之前？

original: I found some cryptic scrawlings written in blood on my bedroom door this morning. The guards say they haven't seen anyone enter during the night and I dare not ask my [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName] to decipher it. Yet, I think I understand... The pentagram... the mark of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName].
translation: 今天早晨我在卧室的门上发现了一串用血液书写的潦草字迹。而卫兵报告说，他们在夜间没有看到任何人进入，我不敢命令我的[Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName]解读它。因为，我想我明白……五芒星……这是[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]的标志。

original: Of course, the bargain must be struck!
translation: 当然，必须结下契约！

original: You carve a pentagram into your arm, just like the one §Y[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! showed you.\n
translation: 你在自己手臂上刻了一颗五芒星，就像§Y[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§!撸起袖子给你看的那颗一样。\n

original: You cut your into your arm, a star surrounded by a circle, a symbol from your forbidden studies.
translation: 你把它刻入自己的手臂，一个被圆环围绕的星状符号，出自于你的禁忌研究。

original: My immortal soul... What if I'm wrong?
translation: 我不朽的灵魂……如果我错了怎么办？

original: You order your servants to scrub the door clean, putting to rest any rumors this could stir up.\n
translation: 你命令仆从们把门擦洗干净，以防止引出任何传闻。\n

original:
[Root.GetSisterBrotherCap] [Root.GetFirstName],
We have received word of your dedication and desire to join the legion of the True Lord. Await the messenger.

Let the Dark One guide you.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
[Root.GetSisterBrotherCap][Root.GetFirstName]，
我们已经听说了你对于加入真神军团的不懈努力和强烈愿望。请等待信使到来。

愿黑暗引领着你
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: Finally.
translation: 终于。

original: You will be on the look-out for "the messenger".\n
translation: 你会留意到「使者」的。\n

original: I've met an intriguing and hypnotically beautiful [From.GetManWoman] at court. Apparently, this [From.GetFirstName] is a foreign diplomat? I engaged [From.GetHerHim] in conversation for the first time today, and we spoke at length about [Root.GetEducationalTopicPlural]. I was shocked when [From.GetSheHe] carefully pulled up [From.GetHerHis] sleeve, revealing the mark of Lucifer.
translation: 我在宫廷里遇到了一位令人想入非非的美丽[From.GetManWoman]。显然，这[From.GetFirstName]是位外国使节？今天我第一次与[From.GetHerHim]攀谈，我们详细地讨论了[Root.GetEducationTopicPlural]。当[From.GetSheHe]小心地拉起袖子，露出路西法的标志时，我震惊了。

original: I've met an intriguing and hypnotically beautiful [From.GetManWoman] at court. Apparently, this [From.GetFirstName] is a foreign diplomat? I engaged [From.GetHerHim] in conversation for the first time today, and we spoke at length about [Root.GetEducationalTopicPlural]. I was shocked when [From.GetSheHe] carefully pulled up [From.GetHerHis] sleeve, revealing the mark of [From.GetDWDevil].
translation: 我在宫廷里遇到了一位令人想入非非的美丽[From.GetManWoman]。显然，这[From.GetFirstName]是位外国使节？今天我第一次与[From.GetHerHim]攀谈，我们详细地讨论了[Root.GetEducationTopicPlural]。当[From.GetSheHe]小心地拉起[From.GetHerHis]袖子，露出[From.GetDWDevil]的标记时，我感到十分震惊。

original: You're the messenger?
translation: 你就是使者？

original: The [satanists_inductor.GetSocietyRank] smiles. "I'm pleased to find you not only a charming [Root.GetManWoman], [Root.GetFirstName], but also one capable of intellectual discourse. The brethren value the pursuit of knowledge, you see, in addition to more... earthly pursuits." [From.GetHerHisCap] smile turns into a predatory grin as [From.GetSheHe] continues: "We'll soon see exactly how committed you are..."
translation: [satanists_inductor.GetSocietyRank]笑了。「我很高兴发现你不仅仅是一个迷人的[Root.GetManWoman]，[Root.GetFirstName]，还是一个能够进行深入交流的人。你知道，除了更多的世俗追求外，会友们更重视对知识的追求」。[From.GetHerHisCap]微笑变成一种掠夺的狞笑，[From.GetSheHe]继续说：「我们很快就会知道你有多忠诚了……」

original: I... What do you need me to do?
translation: 我……你需要我做什么？

original: §Y[satanists_inductor.GetTitledFirstName]§! offers no reply, instead taking you by the hand.
translation: §Y[satanists_inductor.GetTitledFirstName]§!只是挽起你的手，没有回答。

original: [satanists_inductor.GetFirstName] escorts me to my bedchamber. I hesitate upon entering, finding it flooded with light, as candles form a circle around my bed. Several hooded figures surround the room, chanting in unison. "Fear not, [Root.GetSisterBrother]. Power and pleasure – these are the gifts of [satanists_inductor.GetDWDevil]."
translation: [satanists_inductor.GetFirstName]将我护送到卧室。我犹豫着进入房间，发现房间里充满了光芒，地上摆着许多蜡烛，绕着我的床围成一圈。房间周围有几个戴头巾的人齐声吟唱。「不要害怕，[Root.GetSisterBrother]。力量和愉悦——这些都是[satanists_inductor.GetDWDevil]给你的礼物。」

original: I like the sound of that!
translation: 你这话我爱听！

original: You partake in the ritual.\n
translation: 你参加了仪式.\n

original: I... I can't do this!
translation: 我……我不能这么做！

original: I can't do this! I'm a married [Root.GetManWoman]!
translation: 我不能这么做，我已经结婚了！

original: You refuse this demonic ritual and try to escape!\n
translation: 你拒绝了这个恶魔仪式并试图逃跑！\n

original: When I wake up the cloaked figures are gone and [satanists_inductor.GetFirstName] is lying next to me, a smile tugging at the corner of [satanists_inductor.GetHerHis] mouth. "Welcome to [satanists_inductor.Society.GetName],  [Root.GetTitledFirstName]", [satanists_inductor.GetSheHe] says. I hold [satanists_inductor.GetHerHim] close, wondering how I will look back on this moment.
translation: 我醒来时，披斗篷的身影已经不见了，[satanists_inductor.GetFirstName]躺在我身边，[satanists_inductor.GetHerHis]嘴角露出微笑。「欢迎加入[satanists_inductor.Society.GetName]，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。」[satanists_inductor.GetSheHe]说。我紧紧抱住[satanists_inductor.GetHerHim]，思索着今后会如何记起这个时刻。

original: I wish you had found me sooner.
translation: 真希望你能早点来找我。

original: You become a member of [satanists_inductor.Society.GetName].\n
translation: 你成为[satanists_inductor.Society.GetName]的成员。\n

original: This was a necessary evil.
translation: 这是一个必要的恶行。

original: You become a member of [satanists_inductor.Society.GetName].\n
translation: 你成为[satanists_inductor.Society.GetName]的成员。\n

original: I let go of [satanists_inductor.GetFirstName]'s hand and [satanists_inductor.GetHerHis] smile vanishes. "What are you doing?", the beautiful creature asks. "I'm sorry, [satanists_inductor.GetFirstName]. This is not my path." [satanists_inductor.GetSheHeCap] takes my hand again, but only kisses it gently before turning away. "Only the [satanists_inductor.GetDWDevil] knows. I will remember you, [Root.GetFirstName]." [satanists_inductor.GetSheHeCap] hesitates, before adding: "I think you're special."
translation: 我放开了[satanists_inductor.GetFirstName]的手，[satanists_inductor.GetHerHis]微笑消失了。「你在做什么？」，这尤物问道。「我很抱歉，[satanists_inductor.GetFirstName]。这不是我要走的路。」[satanists_inductor.GetSheHeCap]在转身离开前，再次捧起我的手，但只是轻吻了一下。「只有[satanists_inductor.GetDWDevil]才知道，我会记住你的，[Root.GetFirstName]。」[satanists_inductor.GetSheHeCap]犹豫了一下，补充道：「我觉得你很特别。」

original: [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] may punish me for it, but I'll remember you, too.
translation: [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]可能因此惩罚我，但我也会记住你的。

original: With some help from some of your most loyal guards §Y[satanists_inductor.Society.GetName]§! are discretely escorted away from your [Root.GetCapitalHolding]. "Lost travelers", you explain.\n
translation: 在你最忠诚的卫兵的帮助下，§Y[satanists_inductor.Society.GetName]§!被分别护送离开了你的[Root.GetCapitalHolding]。「迷路的旅客」，你说道。\n

original: My eyes dart wildly around the ungodly scene. The [satanists_inductor.GetSocietyRank] [satanists_inductor.GetFirstName] looks disappointed. My body finally unfreezes and I bolt for the door. "Brothers and sisters, follow [Root.GetHerHim]! [Root.GetFirstName], we can talk about this!" The voice echoes behind me, as I run away. What was I thinking, getting involved in the [Root.GetDWDarkMagic]?! As I flee, panic in my chest, I trip.
translation: 我的眼睛几乎无法忍受这种渎圣的场景。[satanists_inductor.GetFirstName][satanists_inductor.GetSocietyRank]看起来很失望。我终于缓过神来并把门闩上。「兄弟姐妹们，追上[Root.GetHerHim]！[Root.GetFirstName]，我们要好好谈谈！」这声音在我身后回响，我一路跑开。我到底在想什么，居然卷入[Root.GetDWDarkMagic]？！正在我慌张的逃跑的时候，我跌倒了。

original: Guards! GUAAARDS!!!
[satanists_inductor.Society.GetNameCap] escape from your [Root.GetCapitalHolding].\nYou are injured during the chaos.\n
translation: [satanists_inductor.Society.GetNameCap]从你的[Root.GetCapitalHolding]逃脱了。\n你在混乱中受伤了。\n

original: My eyes dart wildly around the ungodly scene. The evil [satanists_inductor.GetSeductressSeducer] rolls [satanists_inductor.GetHerHis] eyes as I bolt for the door. "Brothers and sisters, see to it that [Root.GetSheHe] doesn't do anything stupid." I don't make it far before I stumble and fall to the floor, a spear sticking out of my chest.
translation: 我的眼睛疯狂地扫视着这亵神的场景。当我向门口奔去的时候，邪恶的[satanists_inductor.GetSeductressSeducer]转了转[satanists_inductor.GetHerHis]眼珠。「兄弟姐妹们，注意不要让[Root.GetSheHe]做傻事。」我还没有走远就绊了一跤，跌倒在地板上，一只矛刺穿了我的胸膛。

original: This is... not... good.
translation: 这……可不太好……

original: [satanists_inductor.Society.GetNameCap] escape from your [Root.GetCapitalHolding] and you are tragically killed during the chaos.\n
translation: [satanists_inductor.Society.GetNameCap]从你的[Root.GetCapitalHolding]逃脱了，并且很不幸地你在混乱中被杀死。\n

original: [satanists_inductor.Society.GetNameCap] might not be as bad as I thought, I muse to myself. I sometimes wonder what would have happened had I decided to join them. And I wonder where that beautiful creature went off to. Some ungodly adventure, surely.
translation: [satanists_inductor.Society.GetNameCap]可能没有我想的那么坏，我喃喃自语道。我有时在想我加入他们会怎么样。我还想知道那个尤物会去做什么。肯定是一些渎神的冒险活动。

original: My time is better spent far away from them.
translation: 我最好把时间花在别的上面

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! will never worship [Root.GetDWDevil].\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!永远不会崇拜[Root.GetDWDevil]。\n

original:
The [Root.GetDWDevil] has seen your good work, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]
The recruit you sent us, [satanists_recruit.GetTitledFirstName], has now completed [satanists_recruit.GetHerHis] induction into the coven. I thank you for this contribution – it will not be forgotten.

Signed, Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
[Root.GetDWDevil]已经看到你的工作了，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]
你派到我们这里来的新成员[satanists_recruit.GetTitledFirstName]，已经在秘社完成[satanists_recruit.GetHerHis]入会仪式。我感谢并永不会忘记你的贡献。

此致，大长老[From.GetFirstName]

original:
The [Root.GetDWDevil] knows what has happened, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]
The recruit you sent us, [satanists_recruit.GetTitledFirstName], has proven to be disaster. We have spent significant resources in our attempt to induct [satanists_recruit.GetHerHim], all for naught. This lack of judgment will be remembered.

Signed, Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
[Root.GetDWDevil]知道发生了什么，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]
你新招募的成员[satanists_recruit.GetTitledFirstName]，看来是个添麻烦的人。我们已经花费大量精力教导[satanists_recruit.GetHerHim]，然而徒劳无功。他给我们留下缺乏判断力的印象。

此致，大长老[From.GetFirstName]

original: Bandaged Arm
translation: 缠着绷带的手臂

original: This character has a mild injury, their lower arm being covered by bandage.
translation: 这个角色轻微受伤，小臂被绷带覆盖。

translation: 必须是一个罪人\n

original: You are bent low over your [Root.GetEducationTool], struggling to stay focused and to keep your eyes open, when your [From.GetHusbandWife] [From.GetTitledFirstName] enters. [From.GetSheHeCap] crosses the room and inspects the [Root.GetEducationTool] over your shoulder. "Perhaps a fresh pair of eyes might prove helpful, dear [Root.GetHusbandWife]?"
translation: 你埋头于[Root.GetEducationTool]，挣扎着想要保持清醒与专注，这时你的[From.GetHusbandWife][From.GetTitledFirstName]走了进来。[From.GetSheHeCap]穿过房间站在你的身旁审视着[Root.GetEducationTool]。「亲爱的[Root.GetHusbandWife]，也许你的眼睛应该休息一下了？」

original: Perhaps you are right, [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 也许你是对的，[From.GetFirstName]。

original: Accept §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s offer to help.\n
translation: 接受§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!的帮助。\n

original: You don't think I can handle this on my own?
translation: 你觉得我自己做不到吗？

original: Refuse §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s offer to help.\n
translation: 拒绝§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!的帮助。\n

original: Your [From.GetHusbandWife] has received an education in [From.GetEducationSubject], like yourself, so [From.GetSheHe] quickly grasps the nuances of the problem as you explain it. The two of you set to work, discussing and comparing [Root.GetEducationalTopicPlural]. [From.GetFirstName] is a most competent [From.GetEducationRole]! Within the hour, you have laid the groundwork for a promising solution.
translation: 你的[From.GetHusbandWife]像你一样接受[From.GetEducationSubject]教育，因此当你解释问题之时，[From.GetSheHe]迅速的掌握了其中的细微差别。你们俩开始工作，讨论和比较[Root.GetEducationalTopicPlural]。[From.GetFirstName]是一位极其胜任的[From.GetEducationRole]！不出一会儿，你们已经确定了一个极有成功希望的解决方案。

original: A brilliant idea, [From.GetFirstName]! Have you any additional suggestions?
translation: 一个绝妙的主意，[From.GetFirstName]！你还有别的建议吗？

original: Finish your work with the help of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 在§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!的帮助下完成你的工作。\n

original: Let us retire to the bedchamber, my dear...
translation: 让我们回到卧室，亲爱的……

original: Leave your work for now and spend some quality time with §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!...\n
translation: 你暂时停下了手中的工作，花了些时间陪伴§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!……\n

original: Borrow Money from the Assassins
translation: 向阿萨辛借钱

original: You may borrow money from the order if the Grand Master allows it. You are expected to pay back within a reasonable time.
translation: 如果大长老允许的话，你可以向组织借钱。但你要在约定的时间内还钱。

original: The Grand Master has sufficient funds.
translation: 大长老有充足的资金。

original: Pay Back Debt to the Assassins
translation: 还清阿萨辛的欠款。

original: Pay back the money you owe the Assassins.
translation: 还清你在阿萨辛的欠款。

original: Has §Y[Root.assassins_debt.GetValue]§! gold.
translation: 拥有§Y[Root.assassins_debt.GetValue]§!金钱。

original: Borrow 50 gold
translation: 借 50 金钱

original: Borrow 250 gold
translation: 借 250 金币

original: Borrow 500 gold
translation: 借 500 金币

original: Borrow nothing
translation: 什么也不借

original: Owes Debt to Assassins
translation: 欠阿萨辛债务

original: Owes money to the Assassins.
translation: 欠阿萨辛钱。

original: Donate 300¤ to the Assassins
translation: 捐赠 300¤ 给阿萨辛

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Your generous gift to the Order shall not be forgotten. The money will come to good use in the defense against those who threaten the true faith. 

Praise be to Allah!
Signed, Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

你慷慨献给组织的礼物永远不会被忘记。这些钱将在抵抗威胁真信的不义之徒中被妥善利用。

赞美安拉！
此致，大长老[From.GetFirstName]

original: Excellent.
translation: 非常好。

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

The time has come for you to repay your debt to the Order. I trust you send me the [Root.assassins_debt.GetValue] gold as soon as you receive this letter.

Praise be to Allah!
Signed, Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，

现在是你偿还组织债务的时候了，我相信你一收到信就会寄给我[Root.assassins_debt.GetValue]，不是吗？

赞美安拉！
此致，大长老[From.GetFirstName]

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

The time has come for you to repay your debt to the Order. If you cannot spare the [Root.assassins_debt.GetValue] gold, I have another suggestion. The order is in unending need of champions and your [child_offer.GetRootRelation] [child_offer.GetFirstName] would make an excellent addition to our ranks.

Praise be to Allah!
Signed, Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

现在是你偿还组织债务的时候了，如果你付不起[Root.assassins_debt.GetValue]，那你还有另一条路可走。组织需要大批优秀人才，而你的儿子[child_offer.GetRootRelation][child_offer.GetFirstName]是一个不错的人选。

赞美安拉！
此致，大长老[From.GetFirstName]

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

The time has come for you to repay your debt to the Order. If you cannot spare the [Root.assassins_debt.GetValue] gold, I have another suggestion. If you allow us to build a castle in [castle_offer.GetName] and aid us in its construction, your debt shall be forgotten.

Praise be to Allah!
Signed, Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

现在是你偿还组织债务的时候了，如果你付不起[Root.assassins_debt.GetValue]，那你还有另一条路可走。如果你允许我们在[castle_offer.GetName]修建一个城堡并且在修建过程中施以援手，那我们之间的帐就一笔勾销了。

赞美安拉！
此致，大长老[From.GetFirstName]

original: Of course I shall pay back the gold I owe.
translation: 好的，我会还钱的。

original: I know [child_offer.GetFirstName] will serve faithfully.
translation: 我知道[child_offer.GetFirstName]将会真诚地服务。

original: §Y[child_offer.GetTitledFirstName]§! becomes disinherited.\n
translation: §Y[child_offer.GetTitledFirstName]§!被剥夺继承权。\n

original: The Order shall have a stronghold in [castle_offer.GetName].
translation: 组织应该在[castle_offer.GetName]拥有一座坚固的堡垒。

original: I refuse!
translation: 我拒绝！

original: Do not to pay back the money you owe. Beware – the Grand Master will not take your refusal lightly.\n
translation: 不偿还你欠的钱。小心——大长老可不会就这样轻易接受。\n

original: As the last servant makes their exit, I am finally alone. It has been a long, draining day. Longing for a few carefree moments, I reach for my cup and raise it to my mouth. Wait a moment... what is that smell? There is a faint, bitter note, almost fully disguised by the rich aroma of your drink...
translation: 最后一个仆人离开后，我终于能一个人呆一会了。这真是漫长而枯燥的一天。我拿起自己的杯子，举到唇边，想要享受难得的休闲时刻。等一下……那是什么气味？有一丝若有若无的苦涩气息，几乎完全被杯中饮料的浓郁香气所掩盖……

original: Tired after a long day's work, I absentmindedly raise the cup to my mouth and drain it in one big swallow. I sigh with relief, savoring this one carefree moment. Then I notice the bitter aftertaste on my tongue...
translation: 结束了一整天的劳累工作，我放空身心，举杯痛饮了一大口。轻舒一口气，享受这难得的休闲时刻。然而，我察觉到舌头上泛出一丝苦味……

original: P... poison?!
translation: 毒……毒药？！

original: You search your chambers for clues...\n
translation: 你翻找你的房间寻求线索……\n

original: You suddenly feel violently ill...\n
translation: 你突然间感到极度的不适……\n

original: It only takes me a moment to find it – on the tray from which I grabbed the cup is a sealed letter. I know that symbol. With shaking hands, I tear it open. "This is not your last day, [Root.GetFirstName]. Our patience, however, is not endless. We will claim that which we are owed. The money or your life – that is up to you."
translation: 一小会后，就在我拿起杯子的托盘上，发现一封密信。我认得上面的标记，我颤抖着手撕开了信封。「当你活着看到这封信的时候，说明你死期未到。算你命大，[Root.GetFirstName]。但你给我记住，我们的耐心是有限度的。我们终究会拿回属于我们的东西，要钱要命——你自己看着办吧。」

original: I cannot risk the fury of the Assassins.
translation: 我不敢冒险惹怒阿萨辛。

original: You pay back the money you owe.\n
translation: 你偿还了你欠的钱。\n

original: A vulgar ploy! I do not fold so easily.
translation: 卑劣的伎俩！我绝不就此屈服。

original: You refuse to pay back the money you owe.\n
translation: 你拒绝偿还你欠的钱。\n

original: Recruit to the Assassins
translation: 招募到阿萨辛

original: Attempt to find out whether §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is sympathetic to the cause of the order. If so, you may invite [Root.GetHerHim] to become an Assassin.
translation: 试着观察§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!是否对教团的事业抱有同情。如果是，你可以邀请[Root.GetHerHim]成为阿萨辛教团的一员。

original: Has not been approached by the Assassins previously.
translation: 之前没有接触过阿萨辛。

original: Most guests have departed and evening has turned into early morning, yet [assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] and I are still deep in conversation. We are talking about religion, righteousness, how to do the right thing. [assassins_recruiter.GetFirstName] suggests that giving alms and fasting must surely bring mortals closer to the divine.
translation: 当清晨来临时大多数的来宾已经离去，但我与[assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]仍旧沉浸于谈话之中。我们讨论着宗教与正义，以及如何做正确的事。[assassins_recruiter.GetFirstName]表明，施舍和禁食必然使得人类更接近神。

original: Most guests have departed and evening has turned into early morning, yet I [assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] and are still deep in conversation. We are discussing a hadith [assassins_recruiter.GetFirstName] just read. [assassins_recruiter.GetSheHeCap] suggest that its narrator, Abu Hurairah, might be unreliable and asks if the hadiths recorded by Ali are not preferable.
translation: 夜去晨来，大多数的来宾已经离去，但我与[assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]仍旧沉浸于谈话之中。我们正在讨论[assassins_recruiter.GetFirstName]最近读过的圣训。[assassins_recruiter.GetSheHeCap]暗示圣训的传述者，艾布·胡莱伊勒可能不可靠，并疑惑阿里记录的圣训会不会更好。

original: Those are noble actions, indeed.
translation: 这确实是高尚的行为。

original: Perhaps you are right. I tend to find more value in Ali's words.
translation: 也许你是对的，我设法在阿里的话中找出更多价值。

original: Like the Muslim infidels? Never!
translation: 像那些穆斯林异教徒一样？绝不！

original: [assassins_recruiter.GetFirstName], you sound like a mindless Shiite!
translation: [assassins_recruiter.GetFirstName]，你仿佛一个愚蠢的什叶派教徒！

original: Agreed With Opinion
translation: 同意意见

original: Disagreed With Opinion
translation: 对立的意见

original: I approached [From.GetTitledFirstName] during a feast last night, intending to figure out whether [From.GetSheHe] might be persuaded to convert to the true faith. We had a long, deep conversation and it seems like [From.GetFirstName] is of sound opinions!
translation: 在昨晚的晚宴上，我走近[From.GetTitledFirstName]，试图将[From.GetSheHe]劝回到真正的信仰上来。我们进行了一段漫长而深入的交谈，我觉得[From.GetFirstName]可能是对的。

original: Last night I approached [From.GetTitledFirstName] during a feast, intending to figure out whether [From.GetSheHe] might be persuaded to convert to the true faith. Unfortunately, as soon I steered the conversation towards the topics of the Prophet and his rightful heir, Ali, the narrow-minded [From.GetManWoman] became quite disagreeable...
translation: 昨晚我在一场宴会上找了个机会和[From.GetTitledFirstName]攀谈起来，以此了解[From.GetSheHe]有多大的可能会被说服而皈依真正的信仰。不幸的是，当我聊起先知和他的合法继承人阿里时，这个偏执的[From.GetManWoman]变得相当暴躁……

original: A good start. I shall continue my enquiries.
translation: 一个不错的开端，我应该继续像这样质问下去。

original: Continue in your attempt to recruit §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! to the Assassins.
translation: 你继续尝试招募§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! 到阿萨辛。

original: This is not enough. Proceeding would be too great a risk.
translation: 这还远远不够，继续深入风险太大！

original: Me, a "[GetFromRootInsult]"? That [GetRootFromInsult] is one to talk!
translation: 说我是「[GetFromRootInsult]」？这[GetRootFromInsult]简直是开玩笑！

original: End your attempt to recruit §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! to the Assassins.
translation: 停止招募§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!加入阿萨辛的企图！

original: Since I had such a good time a few weeks back, I invited [assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] to share an informal meal. Yet again the conversation found its way to the topic of religion and righteousness. [assassins_recruiter.GetSheHeCap] expressed [assassins_recruiter.GetHerHis] admiration for those willing to give their life fighting for their beliefs.
translation: 由于前几周那段美妙的相处，我邀请了[assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]一起来吃顿简餐。谈话不知不知觉再次绕到了宗教和正义上。[assassins_recruiter.GetSheHeCap]表达了[assassins_recruiter.GetHerHis]对于那些不惧怕牺牲，为自己信仰而战的人的敬佩。

original: Most guests have departed and evening has turned into early morning, yet [assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName] and I are still deep in conversation. We are talking about religion, righteousness, how to do the right thing. [assassins_recruiter.GetSheHeCap] expresses [assassins_recruiter.GetHerHis] admiration for those willing to give their life fighting for their beliefs.
translation: 当清晨来临时大多数的来宾已经离去，但我与[assassins_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]仍旧沉浸于谈话之中。我们讨论着宗教与正义，以及如何做正确的事。[assassins_recruiter.GetSheHeCap]对于为信仰献身的人表达了[assassins_recruiter.GetHerHis]景仰。

original: I agree, [assassins_recruiter.GetFirstName]. If only I could be more like them.
translation: [assassins_recruiter.GetFirstName]，要是我可以更像他们的话，我同意。

original: I have little regard for fanatics!
translation: 我对狂热分子一点都不关心！

original: Honorable
translation: 光荣可敬

original: Lacks Conviction
translation: 缺乏信念

original: I was just about to draft an invitation when [From.GetTitledFirstName] invited me to dine with [From.GetHerHim]. We talked for many hours, even as the plates were emptied and the cups drained. As I praised those willing to die for their faith, [From.GetFirstName] agreed wholeheartedly, wishing [From.GetSheHe] could be more like them.
translation: 我正要写邀请函时，[From.GetTitledFirstName]邀请我和[From.GetHerHim]一起吃饭。我们聊了好几个小时，正当盘子被收走杯子喝光的时候，我赞美那些愿意为他们的信仰而死的人，[From.GetFirstName]完全同意，但愿[From.GetSheHe]能够更像他们。

original: I was just about to draft an invitation when [From.GetTitledFirstName] invited you to dine with [From.GetHerHim]. The conversation flowed easily and [From.GetFirstName] expressed many admirable sentiments. However, when I mentioned those willing to die for their beliefs, [From.GetSheHe] sneered and condemned "such fanatics".
translation: 当我正准备起草邀请函的时候，收到[From.GetTitledFirstName]要我与[From.GetHerHim]一起用餐的邀请，整个谈话轻松流畅而且[From.GetFirstName]表达了许多令人钦佩的感情，然而，当我提到那些愿意为他们的信仰而死的人，[From.GetSheHe]嘲笑和谴责「这些狂热分子」。

original: I think the time has come to ask the question.
translation: 我想该是问这个问题的时候了。

original: Invite §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! to join the Assassins.
translation: 邀请§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!参加阿萨辛。

original: Although I fear [From.GetFirstName] is unwilling to fight, [From.GetHerselfHimself].
translation: 尽管我感到[From.GetFirstName]并不情愿，为[From.GetHerselfHimself]而战

original: "Fanatics"? [From.GetFirstName] is blind to the righteousness of our ways!
translation: 「狂热分子？」 [From.GetFirstName]对我们的正义视而不见！

original: We are quiet for a moment, both seemingly contemplating these devoted souls. Then [From.GetFirstName] looks up at me, a curious intensity in [From.GetHerHis] gaze. "That is not an impossible wish, [Root.GetFirstName]. Are you ready to kill and, if He wills it, get killed to defend the words of His Prophet and the rightful heir?"
translation: 我们沉默了片刻，似乎都在考量这些忠诚的灵魂。然后[From.GetFirstName]抬头看着我，[From.GetHerHis]眼神中充满了好奇。「那倒不是一个不可能的愿望，[Root.GetFirstName]。你是否做好杀人的准备，或者依照祂的旨意，为了捍卫祂的先知和继承人的话语而牺牲？」

original: I am, [From.GetFirstName]. And you say there is a way?
translation: 我愿意，[From.GetFirstName]。你说你有办法？

original: Ask §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! what you can do to serve a greater cause.
translation: 问问§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!为了更伟大的事业我可以做什么。

original: What nonsense are you speaking, [From.GetFirstName]?
translation: 你在胡说甚么，[From.GetFirstName]？

original: Dismiss §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! question and end the dinner.
translation: 驳回§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!的问题并离开宴席。

original: When I suggested there is a way for [From.GetTitledFirstName] to serve the greater good, [From.GetSheHe] only scoffed dismissively and changed the subject. Judging by the look [From.GetSheHe] gave me as I left, however, it seems as if [From.GetFirstName] is not so oblivious after all...
translation: 当我暗示[From.GetTitledFirstName]有办法能为至善服务时，[From.GetSheHe]只是轻蔑的嘲笑并改变了话题，然而，从我离开时[From.GetSheHe]给我的眼神判断，似乎[From.GetFirstName]没有很快忘掉这件事……

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] is all grand words but lacks true courage. Disappointing.
translation: [From.GetSheHeCap]只会空谈，没有真正的勇气。失望。

original: When I suggested there is a way for [From.GetTitledFirstName] to serve the greater good, [From.GetHerHis] eyes lit up with a glimmer of hope. "I am ready, [Root.GetFirstName]. Please, if it is true, will you set me on this path?"
translation: 当我向[From.GetTitledFirstName]指明了一条光荣之路时，[From.GetHerHis]眼睛绽放出了希望。「我准备好了，尊敬的[Root.GetFirstName]。如果那是真的，你会帮助我走上那条道路吗？」

original: Someone will get in touch with you shortly, [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 不久后就会有人通知你的，[From.GetFirstName]。

original: Write a letter to the order about §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! induction. [assassins_inductor.GetSocietyRank] §Y[assassins_inductor.GetFirstName]§! will handle it from here.
translation: 寄出一封关于§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]的§!入职仪式的信，[assassins_inductor.GetSocietyRank]§Y[assassins_inductor.GetFirstName]§!将会在那里操办此事。

original: "I do, [Root.GetFirstName]," says [From.GetTitledFirstName] with a solemn, almost ceremonial, voice. "There is an Order devoted to Allah and the rightful Caliph. One that defends those true of faith and bring vengeance to their persecutors. The Assassins are always in need of champions. Think it over, and someone might reach out..."
translation: 「是的，[Root.GetFirstName]，」[From.GetTitledFirstName]用庄严，几乎是仪式性的语气说。「有一个为安拉和正统哈里发效力的教团。他们保护真正的信徒，并向迫害者复仇。阿萨辛需要人才。好好考虑一下，有人会联系你的……」

original: Me, an Assassin? Perhaps this is my destiny...
translation: 我将成为一名刺客？或许这就是我的宿命……

original: Think things over while you wait for someone to get in touch.
translation: 在等着别人联系你的时候好好想想。

original: My eyes open, seeing only darkness. For a moment, my mind is blank, before the first thoughts get through the haze of sleep. Why did I wake up? A deep [Root.GetManWoman]'s voice cuts through the silence, startling me. "The time has come for you to profess your devoutness to Allah and the rightful imam Ali."
translation: 我睁着眼睛，却只能看见黑暗。在第一个念头穿过睡眠的阴霾之前我的大脑一片空白。为什么我醒了？一个低沉的[Root.GetManWoman]的声音刺破寂静，惊醒了我。「是时候向安拉和正统伊玛目阿里献上你的虔诚了。」

original: Allahu akbar! Glory to Ali!
translation: 安拉至大！荣耀归于阿里！

original: Declare your devoutness to Allah and Ali.
translation: 宣布你对于安拉和阿里的虔诚。

original: I will shout their names from the rooftops! Allahu akbar!
translation: 我要让他们的名字传遍天下！安拉至大！

original: Openly convert to Shia Islam.\n
translation: 公开皈依什叶派。\n

original: I will carry out Allah's wishes in secret, no matter the risk.
translation: 我会秘密执行安拉的意志，不管有多少危险。

original: Secretly convert to Shia Islam. You may openly covert at a later time.\n
translation: 秘密皈依伊斯兰教什叶派。你可以在以后公开皈依。\n

original: I... I'm not sure I have what it takes.
translation: 我……我不确定我承受的住。

original: Do not declare your devoutness.
translation: 不宣告你的虔诚。

original: "Excellent." I turn my head towards the voice. A hooded figure steps out of the shadows by the [Root.GetChamberOpening] and a hand appears from underneath the cloak, holding out a piece of parchment. "Before we continue, you must sign this. A written pledge of allegiance to the Grand Master of the Assassins. A routine... safety measure."
translation: 「太好了。」我朝声音转过身。一个蒙面人从[Root.GetChamberOpening]的阴影中走出，从斗篷下递出一张羊皮纸。「在我们继续之前，你必须签署这一协议，宣誓效忠阿萨辛的大长老，这是一项例行的……保险措施。」

original: Of course. One moment, let me find a quill...
translation: 当然。等一会，让我找找羽毛笔……

original: Sign the pledge of allegiance.
translation: 签署效忠誓词。

original: But this could be used against me!
translation: 但是这可能被用来对付我！

original: Refuse to sign the pledge of allegiance.
translation: 拒绝签署效忠誓词。

original: As soon as I lift the tip of the quill from the parchment the hooded [Root.GetManWoman] snatches it from the desk. "The Grand Master will be pleased, [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. You will receive an invitation to our stronghold, but for now, go back to bed. You will need the rest." The next moment, [Root.GetSheHe] is gone.
translation: 我刚从羊皮纸上提起羽毛笔尖，带着兜帽的[Root.GetManWoman]一把将它从桌子上夺了过去。「大长老会很高兴的，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]。你将收到我们要塞的邀请，但是现在，回去睡上一觉，你需要好好休息一下。」紧接着，[Root.GetSheHe]就消失了。

original: Farewell... I suppose.
translation: 再见……我想是吧。

original: Now all you can do is wait.
translation: 现在你能做的就是等待。

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
You are hereby invited to the Assassins stronghold in [inductor_rendezvous.County.GetName]. Arrive at the [inductor_rendezvous.GetHolding] of [inductor_rendezvous.GetName] in a fortnight's time. One of our people will collect you there. Until then, keep safe, and breath not a word of this meeting to any living soul.

Praise be to Allah!
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]
您被邀请参加[inductor_rendezvous.County.GetName]中的刺客据点。请在两周的时间内抵达[inductor_rendezvous.GetName]的[inductor_rendezvous.GetHolding]。我们的一位成员将在那里接您。在此之前，请保持安全，并且不要给任何活人透露这次会面的消息。

赞美安拉！
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: I shall be there.
translation: 我会去的。

original: Prepare for your journey to §Y[inductor_rendezvous.GetName]§!.
translation: 准备去§Y[inductor_rendezvous.GetName]§!。

original: The journey to [inductor_rendezvous.GetName] was comfortable, however, the dwindling mountain path to the Assassins' stronghold was a torment to tread. As I finally arrive at the castle, my guide brings me to the main tower, where I am introduced to [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 去往[inductor_rendezvous.GetName]的旅途是舒适的，但通往刺客据点的山路是一种折磨。当我终于到达城堡时，我的向导把我带到主塔，在那里我被介绍给了[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]。

original: I am ready to serve, [From.GetSocietyRank].
translation: 我愿效劳，[From.GetSocietyRank]。

original: There is no time for pleasantries, not even a moment to catch my breath, before [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] leads me through another door, down a spiraling stone staircase. We descend in silence. The stair ends and the [From.GetSocietyRank] opens another door, revealing a gloomy basement room and a figure kneeling on the floor.
translation: 没有时间寒暄，甚至没有喘上一口气的闲余，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]领着我穿过一扇门，沿着螺旋石梯向下。我们就这样一路默默无言地走了下去。当走到楼梯底端时[From.GetSocietyRank]打开了另一扇门，露出了一个阴暗的地下室，在那里有一个身影跪倒在地板上。

original: Who... who is that?
translation: 谁……那是谁？

original: "This," [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] says solemnly as I enter, "is your test". With these words, [From.GetSheHe] pulls the hood from the [assassins_sacrifice.GetManWoman]'s head. It is [assassins_sacrifice.GetTitledFirstName], my [assassins_sacrifice.GetRootRelation]! The shock in [assassins_sacrifice.GetHerHis] eyes must be mirroring my own. "This [assassins_sacrifice.GetManWoman] is an enemy of our faith. End [assassins_sacrifice.GetHerHim]." The [From.GetSocietyRank] offers me a dagger.
translation: 「这，」当我进来之后，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]严肃地说道，「是你的考验。」说着，[From.GetSheHe]从这[assassins_sacrifice.GetManWoman]头上拉下了兜帽。原来是[assassins_sacrifice.GetTitledFirstName]，我的[assassins_sacrifice.GetRootRelation]！[assassins_sacrifice.GetHerHis]眼中流露出的震惊不亚于我。「这个[assassins_sacrifice.GetManWoman]是我们信仰的敌人。杀了[assassins_sacrifice.GetHerHim]。」[From.GetSocietyRank]给了我一把匕首。

original: "This," [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] says solemnly as I enter, "is your test". With these words, [From.GetSheHe] pulls the hood from the [Root.GetManWoman]'s head. It is one of my servants! The chock in [Root.GetHerHis] eyes must be mirroring my own. "This [Root.GetManWoman] is an enemy of our faith. End [Root.GetHerHim]." The [From.GetSocietyRank] offers me a dagger.
translation: 「这，」当我进来之后，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]严肃地说道，「是你的考验。」说着，[From.GetSheHe]从这[Root.GetManWoman]头上拉下了兜帽。这是我的一个仆人！[Root.GetHerHis]眼中所映出的应该是我自己。「这个[Root.GetManWoman]是我们信仰的敌人。杀了[Root.GetHerHim]。」[From.GetSocietyRank]给了我一把匕首。

original: If it is the Grand Master's wish.
translation: 如果这是大长老的意思。

original: You kill the servant.
translation: 你杀了那个仆人。

original: I... I can't do this!
translation: 我…我不能这样做！

original: You refuse and try to escape.\n
translation: 你拒绝并试图逃跑。\n

original: I beg of you, let us go. I can pay you, I swear.
translation: 求求你放了我们，我会付钱的，我发誓。

original: Attempt to bribe §Y[From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]§! into letting you and your intended victim go.\n
translation: 尝试贿赂§Y[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]§!以释放你和你的目标受害人。

original: The blood is still gushing from the infidel's limp body as I kneel in front of the [From.GetSocietyRank]. [From.GetSheHeCap] recites the oath of the Assassins and I repeat after [From.GetHerHim]. As [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] speaks the final words, inducting me into the order, [From.GetSheHe] smears the blood across my cheeks. "Stand up, Adherent [Root.GetFirstName]. Welcome to the Assassins."
translation: 当我在[From.GetSocietyRank]面前跪下时，鲜血仍然从异教徒那蹒跚的身体中不断涌出。[From.GetSheHeCap]背诵阿萨辛的誓词，而我跟着[From.GetHerHim]之后重复。[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]说完最后的几句后誓词后，引导我进入队列。[From.GetSheHe]将血涂抹在我的脸颊上。「起来吧，[Root.GetFirstName]兄弟。欢迎加入阿萨辛。」

original: My life for Allah! Praised be the Assassins!
translation: 我命归于安拉！阿萨辛万岁！

original: There is no time to think. As I accept the dagger from [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] I sink it into [From.GetHerHis] stomach. I free my intended victim and drag [assassins_sacrifice.GetHerHim] after me, up the stairs, without looking back once. You just keep running. By some miracle, no one intervenes.
translation: 没有时间去思考了。我从[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]那里接过匕首，捅进了[From.GetHerHis]腹部。然后，我放开我原定的受害者，头也不回地拖着[assassins_sacrifice.GetHerHim]跟我上楼梯。万幸的是，没有人知晓这一切。

original: We might be safe for now, but for how long?
translation: 我们现在可能安全了。但能安全多久呢？

original: You manage to escape from the assassins.\n
translation: 你成功地从阿萨辛手中逃脱了。\n

original: I turn around and run. [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]'s footsteps get closer behind me and as I reach the top of the stairs, [From.GetSheHe] grips a fistful of my mantle, pulling you down on top of [From.GetHerHis]. Vertigo. Crippling pain. Blind, manic frenzy. By some miracle, you manage to free yourself. You are alive. But for how much longer?
translation: 我转身就跑。[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]的脚步在我背后越来越近，当我到楼梯顶端时，[From.GetSheHe]一把抓住了我的斗篷并将它从[From.GetHerHis]头顶上扯了下来。头晕，剧痛，令人盲目而又疯狂的愤怒。奇迹之下，你成功逃脱了。你还活着！可还能活多久呢？

original: They are... they are coming for me.
translation: 他们……他们冲我来了。

original: There is no time to think. As I accept the dagger from [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] I stab at [From.GetHerHim], without a moment's hesitation. The blade strikes only air. [From.GetSheHeCap] moves too quickly. I am on the floor, trapped under the weight of [From.GetHerHis] body. I plead for my life as [From.GetSheHe] wrestles the weapon from my hand.
translation: 没有时间去思考了。没有任何的犹豫，我从[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]那里接过了匕首并刺向了[From.GetHerHim]。利刃只刺到了空气。[From.GetSheHeCap]移动的太快了。我在地板上，被[From.GetHerHis]身体压住了。当[From.GetSheHe]从我手中夺去武器时，我恳求饶我一命。

original: I... I panicked! Please! You... you have to believe me!
translation: 我…我手抖了！拜托！你……你一定要相信我。

original: The look on [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]'s face is pure disappointment. "We had high hopes for you, [Root.GetFirstName], although it seems we were mistaken." I swallow. Loudly. "This cowardice makes you useless to us. Your gold, on the other hand..." As I leave, my intended victim in tow, my hands will not stop shaking.
translation: [From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]看上去很失望，「我们对你抱很大希望[From.GetFirstName]，虽然貌似是我们错了。」我大声地惨叫。「你的懦弱让你变得对我们没什么卵用，不过你的钱嘛……」。当原本的受害人紧随我离去时，我的手仍在不停颤抖。

original: You... you have my gratitude.
translation: ……感激不尽

original: You have no idea what happened as you wake up on the floor of your [Root.GetChamber], a taste of blood in your mouth and a pounding ache along the side of your face. Slowly, the memories come back. A hooded [Root.GetManWoman]... The Assassins. Perhaps you should consider yourself lucky, getting away with only a black eye.
translation: 当你在[Root.GetChamber]地板上醒来时，你不知道发生了什么，嘴里有血的味道，脸上有一阵剧烈的疼痛。慢慢地，记忆开始浮现。一个戴头巾的[Root.GetManWoman]……阿萨辛。也许你应该认为自己很幸运，除了一点黑眼圈外，还能活着离开。

original: A life of secrecy might not be for me, after all.
translation: 毕竟，对我来说，保密的生活也许并不适合我。

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

The recruit you sent us, [assassins_recruitee.GetTitledFirstName], has now completed [assassins_recruitee.GetHerHis] induction into the order. I thank you for this contribution – it will not be forgotten.

Praise be to Allah!
Signed, Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

你送来的新成员，[assassins_recruitee.GetTitledFirstName]已经完成了[assassins_recruitee.GetHerHis]入门仪式。感谢你的贡献——这不会被遗忘。

赞美安拉！
此致，大长老[From.GetFirstName]

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

The recruit you sent us, [assassins_recruitee.GetTitledFirstName], proved to be disaster. We have spent significant resources in our attempt to induct [assassins_recruitee.GetHerHim], all for naught. This lack of judgment will be remembered.

Signed, Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

你所派给我们的新成员，[assassins_recruitee.GetTitledFirstName]，已经变成了一个灾难。我们使用了极其大量的资源，希望能够让[assassins_recruitee.GetHerHim]合格，但一切都是徒劳的；我们都将记住你那缺乏考虑的愚行。

此致，大长老[From.GetFirstName]

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

I call upon you to defend the true faith. The vile infidel [assassins_target.GetTitledName] is waging war against [shiite_defender.GetTitledFirstName]. It is your duty to end [assassins_target.GetTitledFirstName] and [assassins_target.GetHerHis] intolerable aggressions. Turn [assassins_target.GetHerHim] into an example to fill our enemies' hearts with dread.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

我呼吁你捍卫真正的信仰。邪恶的异教徒[assassins_target.GetTitledName]正在对[shiite_defender.GetTitledFirstName]发动战争。结束[assassins_target.GetTitledFirstName]和[assassins_target.GetHerHis]无法容忍的侵略，是你的责任。让[assassins_target.GetHerHim]的死给敌人一个教训，使他们心中充满恐惧。

此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Yet again the true faith is threatened. The infidel [assassins_aggressor.GetTitledName] is waging war against [shiite_defender.GetTitledFirstName]. We have identified [assassins_target.GetTitledFirstName] as one of his key vassals. End [assassins_target.GetHerHim], [Root.GetSocietyRank], and show the [assassins_aggressor.GetTitle] what fate befalls the Assassins' enemies.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

真正的信仰再次受到威胁。异教徒[assassins_aggressor.GetTitledName]正在对[shiite_defender.GetTitledFirstName]发动战争。我们将[assassins_target.GetTitledFirstName]确定为他的关键封臣之一。了结[assassins_target.GetHerHim]，[Root.GetSocietyRank]，让人们看看[assassins_aggressor.GetTitle]阿萨辛的敌人会有什么下场。

此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Yet again our faith is threatened. The infidel [assassins_aggressor.GetTitledName] is waging war against [shiite_defender.GetTitledFirstName]. We have identified [assassins_target.GetTitledFirstName] as one of his key commanders. End [assassins_target.GetHerHim], [Root.GetSocietyRank], and show the [assassins_aggressor.GetTitle] what fate befalls the Assassins' enemies.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

我们的信仰再次受到威胁。异教徒[assassins_aggressor.GetTitledName]正在对[shiite_defender.GetTitledFirstName]发动战争。我们将[assassins_target.GetTitledFirstName]确定为他的关键将领之一。了结[assassins_target.GetHerHim]，[Root.GetSocietyRank]，让人们看看[assassins_aggressor.GetTitle]阿萨辛的敌人会有什么下场。

此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

An unforgivable crime has been committed. The despicable [assassins_target.GetTitledName] has assaulted one of our own. We cannot let such an insult pass unanswered. Make [assassins_target.GetHerHim] suffer, [Root.GetSocietyRank]. [assassins_target.GetHerHisCap] death will make our enemies think twice before they repeat [assassins_target.GetHerHis] mistake.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

真是滔天罪行。卑鄙的[assassins_target.GetTitledName]袭击了我们的人。我们不能原谅被如此羞辱。要让[assassins_target.GetHerHim]付出代价，[Root.GetSocietyRank]。[assassins_target.GetHerHisCap]死亡会让我们的敌人在以后犯同样的错前三思而后行。

此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

An unforgivable crime has been committed. The despicable [assassins_target.GetTitledName] has murdered one of our own. We cannot let such an insult pass unanswered. Make [assassins_target.GetHerHim] suffer, [Root.GetSocietyRank]. [assassins_target.GetHerHisCap] death will make our enemies think twice before they repeat [assassins_target.GetHerHis] mistake.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

一个不可原谅的罪行已经发生。卑鄙的[assassins_target.GetTitledName]谋杀了我们的一个自己人。我们不能不回应这种侮辱。让[assassins_target.GetHerHim]吃点苦头，[Root.GetSocietyRank]。[assassins_target.GetHerHisCap]死亡会让我们的敌人在重复[assassins_target.GetHerHis]错误之前三思而后行。

此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

I call upon you to take a life in the name of the Order. [assassins_target.GetTitledName] is a wicked [assassins_target.GetManWoman], an enemy of all that which we hold dear. End [assassins_target.GetHerHim], [Root.GetSocietyRank], and make sure [assassins_target.GetSheHe] suffers.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

我号召你以教团之名取人性命。[assassins_target.GetTitledName]是个邪恶的[assassins_target.GetManWoman]，是所有我们所珍重事物的敌人。了结[assassins_target.GetHerHim]，[Root.GetSocietyRank]，确保[assassins_target.GetSheHe]遭受痛苦。

此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

For far too long, the gentle Shi'a of [shiite_province.GetName] has suffered under the cruel rule of [assassins_target.GetTitledFirstName]. It is your sacred duty to end [assassins_target.GetHerHim] and liberate our people. Turn [assassins_target.GetHerHim] into an example to fill our enemies' hearts with dread.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

很久以来，[shiite_province.GetName]的温和的什叶派信徒饱受[assassins_target.GetTitledFirstName]的残暴统治。你的神圣使命就是铲除[assassins_target.GetHerHim]，解放我们的人民。让[assassins_target.GetHerHim]的死给敌人一个教训，使他们心中充满恐惧。.

此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Our enemies are growing bolder. They spread their vile heresies, poisoning the minds of our people. This cannot continue. [assassins_target.GetTitledName] is one of the worst offenders, [Root.GetSocietyRank]. Turn [assassins_target.GetHerHim] into an example to fill our enemies' hearts with dread.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

我们的敌人越来越冒失。他们传播粗鄙的异端信仰，毒害我们人民的思想。我们决不能坐视不理。[assassins_target.GetTitledName]是最糟糕的罪犯之一，[Root.GetSocietyRank]。以[assassins_target.GetHerHim]的下场为例，让我们的敌人心中充满恐惧。

此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: Your wish is my command, [From.GetSocietyRank].
translation: 悉听尊便，[From.GetSocietyRank]。

original: Accept the mission to assassinate §Y[assassins_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 接受暗杀§Y[assassins_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!的任务！\n

original: I fear I cannot carry out this mission.
translation: 恐怕我并不能完成这次任务。

original: Decline the mission to assassinate §Y[assassins_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 放弃暗杀§Y[assassins_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!的任务。\n

original: died at the hands of the Hashshashin $KILLER$
translation: 死于阿萨辛派$KILLER$之手

original: After having relentlessly studied [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s habits and movements, I finally believe I have found the perfect opportunity for the grand spectacle that will be [plot_target.GetHerHis] death. In a week's time, when [plot_target.GetFirstName] leaves the [plot_target.GetHouseOfWorship] after [plot_target.GetReligiousRite]...
translation: 在不断地研究[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]的行为习惯后，我确信我已经找到了干掉[plot_target.GetHerHis]完美机会。一周之内，只要[plot_target.GetFirstName]在[plot_target.GetReligiousRite]后离开[plot_target.GetHouseOfWorship]……

original: Not even the thick walls of [plot_target.Host.GetTitledFirstName]'s prison can protect [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] from Allah's judgment. After having spent many nights watching the rotation of the guards and studied the [plot_target.Host.GetCapitalHolding] from every angle, I think I have found my opening...
translation: 即使[plot_target.Host.GetTitledFirstName]的监狱厚重的围墙也无法保护[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]免受来自安拉的审判。经过了数个夜晚观察守卫的轮换并从各个角度研究[plot_target.Host.GetCapitalHolding]后，我想我已经找到了切入点……

original: The craven [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] has gone into hiding, but no walls or disguises can save [plot_target.GetHerHim] from Allah's wrath. I have identified the servant who brings [plot_target.GetHerHim] messages and last night I followed [Root.GetHerHim] all the way to [plot_target.GetFirstName]'s lair.
translation: 懦弱的[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]已经藏匿起来了。但在安拉的怒火下，没有任何墙壁或伪装可以保护[plot_target.GetHerHim]。我已经确定了给[plot_target.GetHerHim]传递消息的仆人，并且昨晚我跟踪着[Root.GetHerHim]一直到了[plot_target.GetFirstName]的藏身处。

original: The thick [plot_target.Host.Capital.GetHolding] walls of [plot_target.Location.Capital.GetName] might offer [plot_target.GetHerHim] shelter from the epidemic, but the wrath of the Assassins know no such obstacles. After having spent many nights watching the rotation of the guards and studied the [plot_target.Location.GetHolding] from every angle, I think I have found my opening...
translation: [plot_target.Location.Capital.GetName]厚厚的[plot_target.Host.Capital.GetHolding]城墙也许可以给[plot_target.GetHerHim]提供一个庇护所避开流行病，但愤怒的刺客并不将此视为阻碍。花了许多个晚上观察卫兵轮换，从各个角度研究[plot_target.Location.GetHolding]之后，我想我找到了缺口……

original: My target, [plot_target.GetTitledName], is hosting a feast in [plot_target.Location.Capital.GetName] and I have successfully infiltrated [plot_target.GetHerHis] kitchen staff. This will be spectacular...
translation: 我的目标，[plot_target.GetTitledName]将在[plot_target.Location.Capital.GetName]中举办盛宴，我已经成功渗透了[plot_target.GetHerHis]厨房中的工作人员。到时场面一定很壮观……

original: The thick [plot_target.Host.Capital.GetHolding] walls of [plot_target.Location.Capital.GetName] might offer [plot_target.GetHerHim] shelter from lesser dangers, but the wrath of the Assassins know no such obstacles. After having spent many nights watching the rotation of the guards and studied the [plot_target.Location.GetHolding] from every angle, I think I have found my opening...
translation: [plot_target.Location.Capital.GetName]厚重的[plot_target.Host.Capital.GetHolding]城墙也许能给[plot_target.GetHerHim]一个安全点的避难所，但是对于阿萨辛的愤怒来说这点障碍毫无意义，在花费了数个晚上侦查守卫轮班，全面观察[plot_target.Location.GetHolding]之后，我想我找到切入点了……

original: It is time to strike.
translation: 机会来了。

original: Put your plan to assassinate §Y[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]§! in motion.\n
translation: 执行你刺杀§Y[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!的计划。\n

original: I fear this is not the right time.
translation: 恐怕时机未到。

original: Do not put your plan to assassinate §Y[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]§! in motion.\n
translation: 放弃你刺杀§Y[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]§的计划。\n

original: I will let [assassin_plot_owner.GetSocietyRank] [assassin_plot_owner.GetFirstName] know.
translation: 我会让[assassin_plot_owner.GetSocietyRank][assassin_plot_owner.GetFirstName]知道的。

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
