The time has come to put an end to [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] and [plot_target.GetHerHis] sins. In a week's time, when [plot_target.GetFirstName] leaves the [plot_target.GetHouseOfWorship] after [plot_target.GetReligiousRite], I will strike [plot_target.GetHerHim] down.

May our enemies cower in fear!
Signed, [assassin.GetSocietyRank] [assassin.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

是时候了结[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]和[plot_target.GetHerHis]罪恶了。在一周的时间内，[plot_target.GetReligiousRite]结束，[plot_target.GetFirstName]离开[plot_target.GetHouseOfWorship]后，我会将[plot_target.GetHerHim]打倒。

愿我们的敌人常怀畏惧！
此致，[assassin.GetSocietyRank][assassin.GetFirstName]

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

The time has come to put an end to [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] and [plot_target.GetHerHis] sins. I have found a way into the prison where [plot_target.GetSheHe] is held.

May our enemies cower in fear!
Signed, [assassin.GetSocietyRank] [assassin.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

是时候了结[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]和[plot_target.GetHerHis]罪恶了。我已经找到进入[plot_target.GetSheHe]所在监狱的方法了。

让我们的敌人在恐惧中颤栗吧！
此致，[assassin.GetSocietyRank][assassin.GetFirstName]

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

The time has come to put an end to [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] and [plot_target.GetHerHis] sins. I have discovered the den in which [plot_target.GetSheHe] is cowering.

May our enemies cower in fear!
Signed, [assassin.GetSocietyRank] [assassin.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]和[plot_target.GetHerHis]肆行罪恶的时间已经结束了。我找到了[plot_target.GetSheHe]畏缩躲藏之处。

愿我们的敌人永远生活在恐惧的阴影之下！
此致，[assassin.GetSocietyRank][assassin.GetFirstName]。

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

The time has come to put an end to [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] and [plot_target.GetHerHis] sins. I have found a way into the [plot_target.Host.Capital.GetHolding] where [plot_target.GetSheHe] resides.

May our enemies cower in fear!
Signed, [assassin.GetSocietyRank] [assassin.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]

是时候给[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]和[plot_target.GetHerHis]罪孽画上一个句号了。我找到了进入[plot_target.GetSheHe]居住的[plot_target.Host.Capital.GetHolding]的方法。

愿我们的敌人感到畏惧！
此致，[assassin.GetFirstName][assassin.GetSocietyRank]

original: §Y[assassin_plot_owner.GetSocietyRank] [assassin_plot_owner.GetFirstName]§! is putting [From.GetHerHis] plan to assassinate §Y[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]§! in motion.\n
translation: §Y[assassin_plot_owner.GetSocietyRank][assassin_plot_owner.GetFirstName]§!执行[From.GetHerHis]暗杀§Y[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!的计划。\n

original: There is a solemn, almost reverential, atmosphere as the crowd pours out of the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship] after the [Root.GetReligiousRite]. I follow the flow of people absentmindedly while I ponder what the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] said regarding right and wrong, [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] and [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]. Suddenly, I stumble. A moment later something heavy pushes me down into the dirt.
translation: [Root.GetReligiousRite]之后，在庄严而神圣的气氛中，人们涌出了[Root.GetHouseOfWorship]。我跟随着人流，心不在焉地思考着刚刚[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]所说的关于正确与错误、[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]与[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]的内容。突然，我绊倒了。过了一会儿，某个重物把我压入地下。

original: As the cell door creaks I steady myself. [Host.GetTitledFirstName]'s jailer is a brute of a [Host.GetManWoman]. However, when faint light of a distant torch reveals the silhouette in the doorway, my heart sinks from its position in my stomach to the floor. This is not the jailer. And... is that a dagger in [assassin.GetHerHis] hand?
translation: 当牢门发出嘎吱一声时我尽量使自己保持镇定。因为[Host.GetTitledFirstName]的狱卒是凶残的[Host.GetManWoman]。然而，当远处火把的微弱光线倒映出站在门口的轮廓时，我的心脏仿佛从胸腔里下沉到了地板上。这不是狱卒。而且……握在[assassin.GetHerHis]手里的是匕首吗？

original: I open my eyes and suddenly I feel wide awake. Something is not right, I can sense it with all my being. Why is the window open...?\nThe whisper emerging from the shadows is soft as silk. "Did you think you could escape the Assassins, [Root.GetFirstName]?"
translation: 我睁开眼睛，猛地清醒了过来。我能感觉到哪里不对。窗户为什么是开着的……？\n从阴影中传来的低声细语柔软如丝：「你觉得你能从阿萨辛手里逃脱吗，[Root.GetFirstName]？」

original: The atmosphere at court grows more strained each day, so I thought a little feast would do us all good. I am conversing with [conversationalist.GetTitledFirstName] over the main course when the loud clatter of a serving dish crashing to the floor makes me jump out of my seat. I face the clumsy servant but words fail me as I discover the dagger in [assassin.GetHerHis] hand.
translation: 我宫廷里的气氛一天比一天紧张了，我觉得开个小宴会会有帮助。我正在主菜上和[conversationalist.GetTitledFirstName]聊天，一阵盘子摔碎在地上的巨响，吓得我从座位上跳了起来。我面对愚蠢的仆人刚想发怒，但当我发现[assassin.GetHerHis]手里的匕首时，我再也说不出话来……

original: It... it is so hard to breathe. A heavy weight is pressing down on me, constricting my chest, pushing the air out of my lungs. As the worlds come in to focus I see a figure hovering over me. Is that a dagger?
translation: 呼……呼吸太困难了。沉重的重物正压在我身上，挤压着我的胸膛，把空气从我的肺里推出来。随着世界进入聚焦，我看到一个身影晃过我的头顶。那是把匕首吗？

original: I am conversing with [conversationalist.GetTitledFirstName] over the main course when the loud clatter of a serving dish crashing to the floor makes me jump out of my seat. I face the clumsy servant but words fail me as I discover the dagger in [assassin.GetHerHis] hand.
translation: 我正与[conversationalist.GetTitledFirstName]谈论主菜，一阵盘子摔碎在地上的巨响，吓得我从座位上跳了起来。我面对笨手笨脚的仆人刚想发怒，但当我发现[assassin.GetHerHis]手里的匕首时，我再也说不出话来。

original: Guards! Help, guards!
translation: 来人！护驾！

original: "I am here to carry out Allah's judgment, [Root.GetFirstName]." The [assassin.GetManWoman]'s voice is deep, tinted with a strange accent. It rises to a loud shout, "[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]!" The afternoon sun is reflected in the raised dagger, blinding me as [assassin.GetSheHe] stabs downwards.
translation: 「我来这是为了执行安拉的审判，[Root.GetFirstName]。」[assassin.GetManWoman]的嗓音深沉有力，点缀着奇怪的口音。突然那深沉的声音转变为怒吼，「[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]！」刀刃反射的正午阳光晃晕了我的双眼，然后[assassin.GetSheHe]一刀刺下。

original: "No one escapes Allah's judgment, or the Assassins." There is nowhere to run. Nothing within reach to use as a weapon. [assassin.GetSheHeCap] points the dagger at me, and says solemnly: "[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [Root.GetFirstName]."
translation: 「没人能逃过安拉的审判，也没人逃得过阿萨辛。」我已经无处可逃了，也没有可以拿来防身的武器。[assassin.GetSheHeCap]用他的匕首指着我，继续严肃地说：「[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]，[Root.GetFirstName]。」

original: I grasp for the dagger under my pillow, but the shock of this unexpected visit has made my fingers stiff and movement imprecise. Before I can find it, the hooded figure is upon me. A dagger glints in the faint moonlight. "[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [Root.GetFirstName]."
translation: 我急切的想从枕头下面抽出我的匕首，但不速之客的突然袭击让我的手指不听使唤。在我找到匕首之前，那个戴着兜帽的身影已经到了我的面前，随之而来的还有一把在月光下闪着寒光的匕首。「[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]，[Root.GetFirstName]。」

original: "The time has come for the judgment of Allah!" The guests fall silent as the [assassin.GetManWoman]'s shout echoes through the hall. A flash of gleaming metal, and then blood, pouring from between my fingers. A soft whisper as the world grows dim: "[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [Root.GetFirstName]."
translation: 「迎接安拉的审判吧！」[assassin.GetManWoman]的叫喊回荡在山谷间，让客人们都说不出话来。寒光一闪而过，鲜血随之从我的指间流出。在我眼前世界陷入昏暗前，我听到了一阵低语：「[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]，[Root.GetFirstName]。」

original: "No one escapes Allah's judgment, or the Assassins." The [assassin.GetManWoman]'s voice is deep, solemn. "[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [Root.GetFirstName]." The moonlight reflects in the dagger as [assassin.GetSheHe] raises it over her head. I close my eyes.
translation: 「没人能逃过安拉的审判，也没人逃得过阿萨辛。」[assassin.GetManWoman]的声音低沉而严肃，「[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]，[Root.GetFirstName]。」月光从[assassin.GetSheHe]举过头顶的匕首上反射出来，我闭上了眼睛。

original: This is the end, then?
translation: 这就结束了吧？

original: It was easy to separate [plot_target.GetFirstName] from [plot_target.GetHerHis] guards. As if [plot_target.GetSheHe] was a sheep, I herded [plot_target.GetHerHim] into the midst of the crowd, where everyone would see. "[plot_target.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]!" I shouted, raising my dagger. Those who saw will never forget.
translation: 把[plot_target.GetFirstName]和[plot_target.GetHerHis]卫兵分开是很容易的。我把[plot_target.GetSheHe]像赶羊一样驱赶进熙熙攘攘的人群中，让所有人都能看到[plot_target.GetHerHim]。「[plot_target.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]！」我高喊着，同时高举匕首。看到这一幕的人将终身难忘。

original: Due to my extensive preparations, entering the prison of [plot_target.Host.GetTitledFirstName] was almost too easy. The burly jailer had fallen asleep – one less death tonight, it seemed – but [plot_target.GetFirstName] was wide awake when I entered [plot_target.GetHerHis] cell. "[plot_target.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [plot_target.GetFirstName]."
translation: 经过周密的计划，潜进[plot_target.Host.GetTitledFirstName]的地牢不要太容易。虎背熊腰的狱卒正呼呼大睡，看来今晚可以少取一条性命。不过当我摸进[plot_target.GetHerHis]牢房时，[plot_target.GetFirstName]还醒着。「[plot_target.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]，[plot_target.GetFirstName]。

original: [plot_target.GetFirstName] woke with a jerk as I slid through the window, scanning the room with a wild look on [plot_target.GetHerHis] face. "[plot_target.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [plot_target.GetFirstName]," I whispered and [plot_target.GetHerHis] head snapped towards the shadowy corner where I stood. [plot_target.GetSheHeCap] reached for something – a weapon, perhaps – but [plot_target.GetSheHe] was not nearly quick enough.
translation: 当我穿越窗户时，[plot_target.GetFirstName]被这阵响动惊醒了，[plot_target.GetHerHis]脸上带着惊恐的表情扫视整个房间。「[plot_target.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]，[plot_target.GetFirstName]，」我低语道。然后[plot_target.GetHerHis]脑袋猛地转向我藏身的阴影角落。[plot_target.GetSheHeCap]伸手想拿什么东西——可能是一把武器——可惜[plot_target.GetSheHe]身手不够快。

original: Thanks to my servant's disguise I approached [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] unnoticed. [plot_target.GetHerHisCap] courtiers were loud and jolly, doing their best to forget the misery outside the [plot_target.GetCapitalHolding] walls. As I raised my voice and drew my dagger, however, they all fell silent. "[plot_target.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]!"
translation: 多亏了我伪装成仆人，我能不被察觉得接近[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]。[plot_target.GetHerHisCap]廷臣们大声喧哗，尽力忘记[plot_target.GetCapitalHolding]城墙外的苦难。当我提高嗓门、掏出匕首时，他们就都失声了。「[plot_target.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]！」

original: Once I had reached [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s [plot_target.GetChamber], my task became almost too easy. The feeble [plot_target.GetManWoman] could do nothing to defend [plot_target.GetHerselfHimself], if [plot_target.GetSheHe] was even aware of what was about to happen. "[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [Root.GetFirstName]." The moonlight reflected in my dagger as I raised it above my head.
translation: 当我到达[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]的[plot_target.GetChamber]的时候，我的任务就变得非常简单了。即使[plot_target.GetSheHe]能够意识到即将发生什么，虚弱的[plot_target.GetManWoman]也保护不了[plot_target.GetHerselfHimself]。「[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]，[Root.GetFirstName]」。在月光照耀下，我把匕首举过头顶。

original: The hearts of our enemies fill with dread!
translation: 我们敌人的心中充满了恐惧！

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

It is done. [plot_target.GetTitledName] is dead. Everything went according to plan and no one will be able to track [plot_target.GetHerHis] death back to you.

May our enemies cower in fear!
Signed, [assassin.GetSocietyRank] [assassin.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

事情解决了，[plot_target.GetTitledName]死了。一切都像计划的那样好，没人会把[plot_target.GetHerHis]死怀疑到你头上。

愿我们的敌人在恐惧中颤抖！
此致，[assassin.GetSocietyRank][assassin.GetFirstName]

original: "I am here to carry out Allah's judgment, [Root.GetFirstName]." The [assassin.GetManWoman]'s voice rises to a loud shout, "[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]!" As I attempt to deflect the dagger, I manage to tear off [assassin.GetHerHis] mask, revealing a [assassin.GetFaceDescription] face. It is the last thing I see.
translation: 「我来这是为了执行安拉的审判，[Root.GetFirstName]。」[assassin.GetManWoman]的声音越来越高，终于吼叫了出来，「[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]！」当我试图挡住匕首时，我扯下了[assassin.GetHerHis]兜帽，露出了一张[assassin.GetFaceDescription]脸，那是我能看见的最后的东西。

original: "No one escapes Allah's judgment, or the Assassins." There is no where to run. Nothing within reach to use as a weapon. So I shout. As [assassin.GetManWoman] launches [assassin.GetHerselfHimself] at me and in my attempt to defend myself I tear [assassin.GetHerHis] mask off, revealing a [assassin.GetFaceDescription] face. It is the last thing I see.
translation: 「没人能逃过安拉的审判，也没人逃得过阿萨辛。」无路可逃，没有任何触及到的东西可以当做武器。所以我大声呼救。当[assassin.GetManWoman]将[assassin.GetHerselfHimself]朝我冲过来时，我试图保护我自己。我扯下了[assassin.GetHerHis]面具，看到了一张[assassin.GetFaceDescription]脸。这是我死前看到的最后的事物。

original: I shout as loud as I can. There are voices on the other side of the door, someone trying to tear it open, but they are too late. When the assassin launches [assassin.GetHerselfHimself] at me, I manage to tear off [assassin.GetHerHis] mask, revealing a [assassin.GetFaceDescription] face. It is the last thing I see.
translation: 我竭力大叫，从门的那一边传来了什么声响，似乎有什么人想要把它打开，但一切都太迟了。当[assassin.GetHerselfHimself]向我扑来时，我扯下了[assassin.GetHerHis]兜帽，露出了一张[assassin.GetFaceDescription]脸，那是我能看见的最后的东西。

original: "[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]!" As the assassin raises [assassin.GetHerHis] dagger, I grasp for anything within my reach, something to defend myself with. As the weapon tears my flesh I manage to pull down [assassin.GetHerHis] hood, revealing a [assassin.GetFaceDescription] face. It is the last thing I see.
translation: 「[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]！」当刺客扬起[assassin.GetHerHis]匕首，我试图抓起任何能够保护我自己的东西。武器穿透我的血肉，我也成功扯下了[assassin.GetHerHis]兜帽，露出了一张[assassin.GetFaceDescription]脸，那是我最后见到的景象。

original: My feeble cries seems to have alerted the guards, but they are too slow. "No one escapes Allah's judgment, or the Assassins. [Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [Root.GetFirstName]." As [assassin.GetSheHe] raises the dagger, I struggle and manage to tear off the assassin's mask, revealing a [assassin.GetFaceDescription] face. It is the last thing I see.
translation: 我微弱的喊声似乎已经惊动了卫兵，但他们太慢了。「没人能逃的过安拉的审判，也没人逃得过阿萨辛。[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]，[Root.GetFirstName]。」当[assassin.GetSheHe]举起匕首，我挣扎着撕开了刺客的面具，看到一张[assassin.GetFaceDescription]脸。这是我看到的最后一件事。

original: At first, everything went according to plan. It was easy to separate [plot_target.GetFirstName] from [plot_target.GetHerHis] guards. However, when the time came to strike, my victim managed to tear of my mask, revealing my face to everyone around us. While it did not save [plot_target.GetHerHim], I almost did not escape.
translation: 起初，计划进行得很顺利。把[plot_target.GetFirstName]和[plot_target.GetHerHis]守卫分开并不难。但是，当我刺杀的时候，我的受害者设法撕开了我的兜帽，周围的人都看到我的脸。尽管这救不了[plot_target.GetHerHim]的性命，我却差点没能逃脱。

original: The burly jailer had fallen asleep, but [plot_target.GetFirstName] was wide awake when I entered [plot_target.GetHerHis] cell. [plot_target.GetSheHeCap] launched [plot_target.GetHerselfHimself] at me, tearing of my mask. My blade slid easily between [plot_target.GetFirstName]'s ribs, but not before [plot_target.GetSheHe] could scream. I barely managed to escape.
translation: 当我进入[plot_target.GetHerHis]牢房时，魁梧的狱卒已经睡着了，但[plot_target.GetFirstName]还很清醒。[plot_target.GetSheHeCap]抓住机会撕裂了我的面具。我的刀划开了[plot_target.GetFirstName]的肋骨，但[plot_target.GetSheHe]还是发出叫声，引来守卫。我费尽全力侥幸逃脱。

original: [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] woke with a jerk, scanning the room with a wild look on [plot_target.GetHerHis] face. "Guards!" [plot_target.GetSheHe] shouted, panic in [plot_target.GetHerHis] voice. I could hear movements in the adjacent room, and though they were too slow to save [plot_target.GetFirstName], they almost managed to catch me.
translation: [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]惊醒，环视整个房间，面露惊恐之色。「卫兵！」[plot_target.GetSheHe]惊恐的大叫道。我能听到隔壁房间传来的脚步声，尽管他们来的太慢没救下[plot_target.GetFirstName]，但是他们差点就抓住了我。

original: [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] was holding a feast that night. While I managed to approach [plot_target.GetFirstName] unnoticed, [plot_target.GetSheHe] managed to tear off my hood, revealing my face to [plot_target.GetHerHis] entire court. I ended [plot_target.GetHerHim] nonetheless, but was almost caught in the process.
translation: [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]当晚正在举办一场宴会。当我不被察觉地接近[plot_target.GetFirstName]时，[plot_target.GetSheHe]扯下了我的兜帽，把我暴露在[plot_target.GetHerHis]整个宫廷的众目睽睽之下。虽然我结果了[plot_target.GetHerHim]，但是差点被抓住。

original: When I entered [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s [plot_target.GetChamber] and saw that feeble wretch sleeping in [plot_target.GetHerHis] bed I grew careless. How could this possibly go wrong? However, as I bent over [plot_target.GetFirstName], [plot_target.GetSheHe] opened [plot_target.GetHerHis] eyes and screamed. In the following struggle, my mask was torn off. While my dagger found its target, the guards got a good look at my face before I escaped.
translation: 当我进入[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]的[plot_target.GetChamber]，看到那个虚弱的混蛋躺在[plot_target.GetHerHis]床上，我渐渐变得漫不经心。这怎么可能会失败？然而，当我俯下身子时，[plot_target.GetFirstName]，[plot_target.GetSheHe]睁开了眼睛并开始尖叫。在接下来的搏斗中，我的兜帽不慎脱落，当我匕首找到了它的目标，守卫也看到了我的脸。

original: That was... unfortunate.
translation: 那真是……不幸。

original: You were discovered when you assassinated §Y[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 你行刺§Y[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!的时候被发现了。\n

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Your wish has been fulfilled – the despicable [plot_target.GetTitledName] is dead. Unfortunately, however, there was an incident. My identity was discovered and I fear they can track the killing back to you, [Root.GetSocietyRank]. I am most sorry.

Praised be Allah,
Signed, [assassin.GetSocietyRank] [assassin.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

你的愿望已经实现——卑鄙的[plot_target.GetTitledName]已经死了。不幸的是，有点儿意外，我的身份被发现了，我担心他们会追查到你的头上，[Root.GetSocietyRank]。万分抱歉。

赞美安拉，
此致，[assassin.GetSocietyRank][assassin.GetFirstName]

original: At least [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] is dealt with.
translation: 反正[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]会处理。

original: The killing of §Y[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]§! has been tracked back to you.\n
translation: §Y[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!的死亡已经被追查到你的头上。\n

original: "I am here to carry out Allah's judgment, [Root.GetFirstName]. [Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]!" The [assassin.GetManWoman] on top of me pulls a dagger from [assassin.GetHerHis] robes. I lunge for it, hitting it out of [assassin.GetHerHis] hand. I shout, drawing the attention of the crowd, and within heartbeats my assailant and I are separated.
translation: 「我来这是为了执行安拉的审判，[Root.GetFirstName]。[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]！」那个在我上方的[assassin.GetManWoman]从[assassin.GetHerHis]法袍中掏出一把匕首。我扑了上去，将匕首从[assassin.GetHerHis]手中击落。我大声呼喊，吸引附近人的注意，转瞬之间那个攻击我的人就被拉开了。

original: "No one escapes Allah's judgment, or the Assassins." As the [assassin.GetManWoman] raises [assassin.GetHerHis] dagger, I do the only thing I can think of. I tackle [assassin.GetHerHim] to the filthy cell floor and run. I wake the snoring jailer as I sprint past. [Host.GetSheHeCap] catches me within a few heartbeats, but at least the assassin is gone.
translation: 「没人能逃过安拉的审判，也没人逃得过阿萨辛。」当[assassin.GetManWoman]举起了[assassin.GetHerHis]匕首，我做了我脑子里唯一能想到的事。我把[assassin.GetHerHim]摔在肮脏的地板上，转身就跑。我逃跑时吵醒了正在打呼的狱卒。[Host.GetSheHeCap]马上就抓住了我，但至少刺客离开了。

original: I grasp for the dagger under my pillow, but the shock of this unexpected visit has made my fingers stiff and movement imprecise. So I shout, as loud as I can. The guards are forcing their way through the door as I roll off the bed, dodging a dagger. When I scramble to my feet, the assassin is gone.
translation: 我急切的想从枕头下面抽出我的匕首，但不速之客的突然袭击让我的手指不听使唤。我尽可能的大叫，同时滚下床来躲避刺来的匕首，这时破门而入的卫兵们救了我一命。当我能颤抖着从地上爬起来时，刺客已经不见了。

original: "The time has come for the judgment of Allah!" The [assassin.GetManWoman] reaches for something inside [assassin.GetHerHis] robes, but then someone grabs me from behind, pulling me back. One of the guards tackle the assassin to the floor. There is blood, but it is not my assailant's. A moment later, [assassin.GetSheHe] is gone.
translation: 「迎接安拉的审判吧！」说着，[assassin.GetManWoman]将手伸进[assassin.GetHerHis]长袍里掏出了武器。然后我被一个人拉到身后。我的一个卫兵将刺客撞倒。我看到了血，但不是刺客的。过了一会儿，[assassin.GetSheHe]不见了。

original: "No one escapes Allah's judgment, or the Assassins." There is nothing I can do but scream, so I do. Impressively so. There are echoes of footsteps and clashing metal from outside. Before my assailant can finish the deed, four guards burst through the [Root.GetChamberOpening]. The strange [assassin.GetManWoman] gives me one look and then [assassin.GetSheHe] is gone.
translation: 「没人能逃过安拉的审判，也没人逃得过阿萨辛。」我什么都做不了，只能尖叫，所以我尖叫了，十分大声。外面回荡着脚步声和金属碰撞的声音。在行刺者得以成功前，四个守卫穿[Root.GetChamberOpening]而入。陌生的[assassin.GetManWoman]看了我一眼，然后[assassin.GetSheHe]离开了。

original: I am safe for now, but the Assassins will surely try again.
translation: 我现在安全了，但阿萨辛一定会再来。

original: You survived an murder attempt by the Assassins.\n
translation: 你从阿萨辛的谋杀中活了下来。\n

original: At first, everything went according to plan. It was easy to separate [plot_target.GetFirstName] from [plot_target.GetHerHis] guards. However, as I pulled my dagger, [From.GetSheHe] struck it out of my hand. I was about to reach for a second weapon, but upon hearing [plot_target.GetHerHis] screams, the people around us surged towards [plot_target.GetHerHim], separating us.
translation: 起初，计划进行得很顺利。把[plot_target.GetFirstName]和[plot_target.GetHerHis]守卫分开并不难。但是，当我掏出匕首时，[From.GetSheHe]把它从我手中击落。在我将要拿起第二件武器时听到了[plot_target.GetHerHis]尖叫，我们周围的人们涌向[plot_target.GetHerHim]，把我们分开。

original: The burly jailer had fallen asleep but [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] was wide awake when I entered [plot_target.GetHerHis] cell. As I lunged at [plot_target.GetHerHim], [plot_target.GetSheHe] managed to dodge me and ran, right into the arms of the jailer. Not wanting to share [plot_target.GetFirstName]'s cell, I slunk into the shadows.
translation: 当我进入[plot_target.GetHerHis]牢房时，我发现虽然牢房中这个魁梧的狱卒已经熟睡，但是[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]仍然清醒着。于是我立即向[plot_target.GetHerHim]刺了过去，但[plot_target.GetSheHe]躲开了并跑走，正好一头撞进狱卒的怀里。该死！我可不想被抓住扔进[plot_target.GetFirstName]牢房里，于是悄悄地从阴影中溜走了。

original: "[plot_target.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [plot_target.GetFirstName]!" I announced and the [plot_target.GetManWoman] woke with a jerk. I lunged at [plot_target.GetHerHim] from my position by the window. In a manner uncharacteristically quick for someone having just woken up, [plot_target.GetFirstName] dodged my dagger, and in the next moment guards were bursting through the door.
translation: 我宣判道「[plot_target.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]，[plot_target.GetFirstName]！」[plot_target.GetManWoman]猛地醒过来。我立即从窗边刺向[plot_target.GetHerHim]。对一个刚醒来的人来说他的反应有些过于迅速，[plot_target.GetFirstName]躲过了我的匕首然后下一秒守卫们就突地冲了进来。

original: "The time has come for the judgment of Allah!" I raised my dagger, ready to strike, but then someone tackled me from behind. I stabbed, blade tearing flesh, hot blood running down my arm. When I got to my feet, [plot_target.GetFirstName] was outside of my reach. There were too many people, and weapons, between us. I turned around and ran.
translation: 「迎接安拉的审判吧！」我高高扬起了我的匕首，准备狠狠捅下去，但什么人从后面架住了我。我乱戳乱刺，刀刃划伤了自己，鲜血从我的手臂上流下。当我挣扎着站起时，我已经够不着[plot_target.GetFirstName]了。有太多的人拿着武器挡在我们中间，我转过头就逃开了。

original: "No one escapes Allah's judgment, or the Assassins," I whispered as I bent over [plot_target.GetFirstName]'s sleeping figure. [plot_target.GetSheHeCap] woke with a start, and before I could bury the dagger in [plot_target.GetHerHim], [plot_target.GetSheHe] screamed. The next moment, guards burst through the door. There was no more time.
translation: 「没人能逃过安拉的审判，也没人逃得过阿萨辛。」我低语着俯身弯向[plot_target.GetFirstName]熟睡的身姿。但是[plot_target.GetSheHeCap]并没有睡着，并且在我用小刀刺向[plot_target.GetHerHim]时，[plot_target.GetSheHe]出声惊叫。下一刻，守卫已冲进大门。我再也没有机会了。

original: At least I wasn't caught.
translation: 至少我没有被抓住。

original: Your attempt failed, but you managed to flee.\n
translation: 你没能成功，但万幸你逃走了。\n

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

I am sorry to inform you my attempt to end the [plot_target.GetInsultAdjective] [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] failed. Fortunately my identity was not discovered and the attempt will not be tracked back to you. We will bide our time.

Praised be Allah,
Signed, [assassin.GetSocietyRank] [assassin.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

很遗憾的告诉您，我针对[plot_target.GetInsultAdjective][plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]的刺杀行动失败了。幸运的是，我的身份没有被发现，并且没人知道您是主谋。我们还有机会。

赞美安拉，
此致，[assassin.GetSocietyRank][assassin.GetFirstName]

original: There will be another opportunity.
translation: 还会有机会的。

original: The attempt on §Y[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s life failed.\n
translation: 尝试密谋暗杀§Y[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!失败.\n

original: "I am here to carry out Allah's judgment, [Root.GetFirstName]. [Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]!" I launch myself at the assassin and we fall to the ground, a tangle of limbs and curses. [assassin.GetHerHisCap] mask falls off in the struggle, revealing a [assassin.GetFaceDescription] face. By some miracle, I also manage to wound [assassin.GetHerHim] before [assassin.GetSheHe] escaped.
translation: 「我来这是为了执行安拉的审判，[Root.GetFirstName]。[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]！」随即我叫骂着与刺客扭打在一起，滚倒在地面上。[assassin.GetHerHisCap]兜帽掉落了下来，露出了[assassin.GetFaceDescription]脸。奇迹般的，我在[assassin.GetHerHim]逃跑之前打伤了[assassin.GetSheHe]。

original: "No one escapes Allah's judgment, or the Assassins. [Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]!" I launch myself at the assassin and we fall to the floor, a tangle of limbs and curses. [assassin.GetHerHisCap] mask falls off in the struggle, revealing a [assassin.GetFaceDescription] face. By some miracle, I also manage to wound [assassin.GetHerHim] before [assassin.GetSheHe] escaped.
translation: 「没人能逃过安拉的审判，也没人逃得过阿萨辛。[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]！」我把刺客扑在地上，在一顿充斥着诅咒声的争斗后，[assassin.GetHerHisCap]面具掉落了，露出一张[assassin.GetFaceDescription]脸庞。我还奇迹般地在[assassin.GetSheHe]逃走前打伤了[assassin.GetHerHim]。

original: "No one escapes Allah's judgment, or the Assassins. [Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [Root.GetFirstName]." And then, the guards burst through the door. My assailant hesitates for one second too many and my protectors get hold off [assassin.GetHerHim]. There is struggle, curses, and blood. The assassin manages to escape, but all of us saw [assassin.GetHerHis] [assassin.GetFaceDescription] face.
translation: 「没人能逃过安拉的审判，也没人逃得过阿萨辛。[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]，[Root.GetFirstName]。」然后，卫兵从门外冲进来。袭击者迟疑了一秒，但是已经太迟了，我的卫兵挡住了[assassin.GetHerHim]。在这里爆发了战斗、诅咒和流血之后，暗杀者设法逃跑了，但是我们所有人都看见了暗杀者[assassin.GetHerHis][assassin.GetFaceDescription]脸。

original: [assassin.GetSheHeCap] can't get far! After [assassin.GetHerHim]!
translation: [assassin.GetSheHeCap]不可能逃的太远！追上[assassin.GetHerHim]！

original: At first, everything went according to plan. It was easy to separate [plot_target.GetFirstName] from [plot_target.GetHerHis] guards. However, as I pulled my dagger, [plot_target.GetSheHe] threw [plot_target.GetHerselfHimself] at me! In the struggle my mask fell off and I was wounded by my own weapon. By some miracle, I managed to escape.
translation: 起初，计划进行得很顺利。把[plot_target.GetFirstName]和[plot_target.GetHerHis]守卫分开并不难。然而，正当我拔出匕首时，[plot_target.GetSheHe]竟直接撞向了我！扭打中，我的面具被扯掉了，我也被自己的刀划伤了。我奇迹般成功地脱身了。

original: The burly jailer had fallen asleep but [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] was wide awake when I entered [plot_target.GetHerHis] cell. As I lunged at [plot_target.GetHerHim], [plot_target.GetSheHe] managed to block my dagger and tackle me to the floor. In the struggle my mask fell off and I was wounded by my own weapon. By some miracle, I managed to escape.
translation: 当我进入[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]的牢房时，魁梧的狱卒已经睡着了，但[plot_target.GetHerHis]神志很清醒。我持匕首扑向了[plot_target.GetHerHim]，但[plot_target.GetSheHe]挡住了我的匕首还把我摔在地上。我在挣扎当中被割伤，面具也掉了下来。不过我奇迹般的逃走了。

original: "[plot_target.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [plot_target.GetFirstName]," I announced and [plot_target.GetFirstName] woke with a jerk. In a manner uncharacteristically quick for a [plot_target.GetManWoman] having just woken up, [plot_target.GetSheHe] threw [plot_target.GetHerselfHimself] at me! In the struggle my mask fell off and I was wounded by my own weapon. By some miracle, I managed to escape.
translation: 我宣判道：「[plot_target.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]，[plot_target.GetFirstName]！」[plot_target.GetManWoman]猛地醒过来。刚刚清醒的[plot_target.GetManWoman]的反应未免有些太过迅速，[plot_target.GetSheHe]向我猛地扑了过来！在打斗的混乱之中，我的兜帽掉落在地，还不慎被自己的武器所割伤。不过，我奇迹般地逃了出来。

original: "The time has come for the judgment of Allah!" I raised my dagger, ready to strike, but then someone tackled me from behind. In the struggle my mask fell off and I was wounded by my own weapon. By some miracle, I managed to escape.
translation: 「迎接安拉的审判吧！」我举起匕首，准备狠狠一刺，就在那时，有人从后面架住了我。在挣扎中，我的兜帽脱落了，我也被自己的武器刺伤。万幸的是我成功地逃跑了。

original: As I bent over [plot_target.GetFirstName]'s sleeping figure [plot_target.GetSheHe] woke with a start, and before I could bury the dagger in [plot_target.GetHerHim], [plot_target.GetSheHe] screamed. The next moment, guards burst through the door, overwhelming me. In the struggle my mask fell off and I was wounded by my own weapon. By some miracle, I managed to escape.
translation: 当我潜入[plot_target.GetFirstName]的房间时，睡着的[plot_target.GetSheHe]开始苏醒。然而，在我举起匕首给[plot_target.GetHerHim]致命一击之前，[plot_target.GetSheHe]大声喊了起来。下一瞬间，守卫们冲入房间，压倒了我。在打斗的混乱之中，我的兜帽掉落在地，还不慎被自己的武器所割伤。不过，我奇迹般地逃了出来。

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

I am sorry to inform you my attempt to end the [plot_target.GetInsultAdjective] [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] failed. My identity was discovered and I fear they can track the killing back to you, [Root.GetSocietyRank]. I am most sorry.

Praised be Allah,
Signed, [assassin.GetSocietyRank] [assassin.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

很遗憾地告诉你，我谋杀[plot_target.GetInsultAdjective][plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]的计划失败了。我的真实身份被发现了，我担心他们顺藤摸瓜找到你，[Root.GetSocietyRank]。很遗憾。

赞美安拉！
此致，[assassin.GetSocietyRank][assassin.GetFirstName]

original: That useless, [assassin.GetInsultAdjective] [assassin.GetFirstName]!
translation: 没用的家伙，[assassin.GetInsultAdjective][assassin.GetFirstName]！

original: The attempt on §Y[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s life failed and your involvement was discovered.\n
translation: 谋杀§Y[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!的尝试失败了，而且你的参与被发现了。

original: "I am here to carry out Allah's judgment, [Root.GetFirstName]. [Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]!" I launch myself at the assassin and we fall to the ground, a tangle of limbs and curses. By some miracle, I manage to wrestle the dagger from [assassin.GetHerHis] hand and slay [assassin.GetHerHim]!
translation: 「我来这是为了执行安拉的审判，[Root.GetFirstName]。[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]！」我扑向刺客，我们在地上扑成一团，相互咒骂。奇迹发生了，我从[assassin.GetHerHis]手中夺过匕首反杀了[assassin.GetHerHim]！

original: "No one escapes Allah's judgment, or the Assassins. [Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]!" I launch myself at the assassin and we fall to the floor, a tangle of limbs and curses. By some miracle, I manage to wrestle the dagger from [assassin.GetHerHis] hand and slay [assassin.GetHerHim]!
translation: 「没人能逃过安拉的审判，也没人逃得过阿萨辛。[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]！」我扑向刺客，两人在地上扭打作一团。安拉保佑，我成功从[assassin.GetHerHis]手上夺下匕首，了结了[assassin.GetHerHim]！

original: "No one escapes Allah's judgment, or the Assassins. [Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [Root.GetFirstName]." And then, the guards burst through the door. My assailant hesitates for one second too many and my protectors get hold off [assassin.GetHerHim]. There is struggle, curses, and blood. Within moments, the assassin lay dead on the floor.
translation: 「没人能逃过安拉的审判，也没人逃得过阿萨辛。[Root.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]，[Root.GetFirstName]。」紧接着，卫兵冲了进来，刺客犹豫了一瞬，使得我的保护者得以阻止[assassin.GetHerHim]。打斗、咒骂与鲜血充满房间，短短时间之后，刺客倒在了地上。

original: This is the fate befalling the enemies of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 这就是和[Root.GetTitledFirstName]作对的下场！

original: At first, everything went according to plan. It was easy to separate [plot_target.GetFirstName] from [plot_target.GetHerHis] guards. However, as I pulled my dagger, [plot_target.GetSheHe] threw [plot_target.GetHerselfHimself] at me! The struggle was a tangle of limbs, curses, and blood. A sharp pain, and then there was nothing.
translation: 起初，计划进行得很顺利。把[plot_target.GetFirstName]和[plot_target.GetHerHis]守卫分开并不难。然而当我拔出匕首时，[plot_target.GetSheHe]朝我冲了过来！争斗伴随着肢体扭打，诅咒和鲜血。伴随着尖锐的疼痛，一切陷入黑暗。

original: The burly jailer had fallen asleep but [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] was wide awake when I entered [plot_target.GetHerHis] cell. As I lunged at [plot_target.GetHerHim], [plot_target.GetSheHe] managed to block my dagger and tackle me to the floor. The struggle was a tangle of limbs, curses, and blood. A sharp pain, and then there was nothing.
translation: 当我走进[plot_target.GetHerHis]牢房的时候，魁梧的狱卒已经睡了，但[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]完全清醒着。当我刺向[plot_target.GetHerHim]的时候，[plot_target.GetSheHe]制住了我的匕首并且把我擒到地上。打斗中肢体，诅咒和血纠缠在一起。一阵刺痛后，一切都结束了。

original: "[plot_target.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry], [plot_target.GetFirstName]," I announced and [plot_target.GetFirstName] woke with a jerk. In a manner uncharacteristically quick for a [plot_target.GetManWoman] having just woken up, [plot_target.GetSheHe] threw [plot_target.GetHerselfHimself] at me! We fell to the floor, a tangle of limbs, curses, and blood. A sharp pain, and then there was nothing.
translation: 我宣判道∶「[plot_target.GetAssassinsCrimeOutcry]，[plot_target.GetFirstName]！」这时[plot_target.GetManWoman]猛地醒过来。刚刚清醒的[plot_target.GetManWoman]的反应未免有些太过迅速，[plot_target.GetSheHe]向我猛地扑了过来！我们倒向地面，争斗伴随着肢体扭打，诅咒和鲜血。伴随着尖锐的疼痛，一切陷入黑暗。

original: "The time has come for the judgment of Allah!" I raised my dagger, ready to strike, but then someone tackled me from behind. We fell to the floor, a tangle of limbs, curses, and blood. A sharp pain, and then there was nothing.
translation: 「迎接安拉的审判吧！」我举起我的匕首准备挥下，但随后有人从背后攻击我。我们相互咒骂着倒在血泊之中，身子压着身子。一阵剧烈的疼痛传来，然后什么都消失了。

original: As I bent over [plot_target.GetFirstName]'s sleeping figure [plot_target.GetSheHe] woke with a start, and before I could bury the dagger in [plot_target.GetHerHim], [plot_target.GetSheHe] screamed. The next moment, guards burst through the door, overwhelming me. We fell to the floor, a tangle of limbs, curses, and blood. A sharp pain, and then there was nothing.
translation: 当我潜入[plot_target.GetFirstName]的房间时，睡着的[plot_target.GetSheHe]开始苏醒。然而，在我举起匕首给[plot_target.GetHerHim]致命一击之前，[plot_target.GetSheHe]大声喊了起来。下一瞬间，守卫们冲入房间，压倒了我。我们倒向地面，争斗伴随着肢体扭打，诅咒和鲜血。伴随着尖锐的疼痛，一切陷入黑暗。

original: A messenger arrived from [plot_target.Location.GetName] last night. Apparently [assassin.GetSocietyRank] [assassin.GetFirstName] failed in their attempt to slay [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName], and was killed themselves. This will surely be tracked back to you.
translation: 昨晚从[plot_target.Location.GetName]那来了消息，显然[assassin.GetSocietyRank][assassin.GetFirstName]在刺杀[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]的任务中搞砸了并已经被杀死。他们一定会怀疑到我头上。

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

The time is nigh for your subjects in [conversion_province.GetName] to adopt the true religion. Teach them about Allah's greatness and the rightful heir of Muhammad, Ali. When a majority of the population in the county has converted to the Shia faith, your mission is complete.

Praised be Allah!
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

是时候让[conversion_province.GetName]中的臣民接受正信了。教导他们安拉的伟大和阿里作为穆罕默德合法继承人的正统性。当省份中大多数人已经转换为什叶派信仰时，你的任务就完成了。

赞美安拉！
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

The time is nigh for the people in [conversion_province.GetName], a county of your subject [conversion_province_owner.GetTitledFirstName], to adopt the true religion. When a majority of the population in the county has converted to the Shia faith, your mission is complete.

Praised be Allah!
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

是时候让你手下[conversion_province_owner.GetTitledFirstName]省份[conversion_province.GetName]中的人民接受正信了。当省份中大多数人已经转换为什叶派信仰时，你的任务就完成了。

赞美安拉！
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: It shall be done, [From.GetSocietyRank].
translation: 理应如此，[From.GetSocietyRank]。

original: I cannot fulfill your request at this time.
translation: 我现在不能满足你的要求。

original: The people of the county [conversion_province.GetName] has now fully embraced Shia Islam as their religion. From [conversion_province.Capital.GetHolding] to countryside, the names of Allah, his prophets and the Imams are honored and cherished. Your mission is complete.
translation: [conversion_province.GetName]的人民已经接受了什叶派为他们的信仰。从[conversion_province.Capital.GetHolding]到乡村，安拉、他的先知和伊玛目们的名字被纪念和爱护。你的任务完成了。

original: Allahu Akbar!
translation: 安拉至大！

original: As [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] has now met [plot_target.GetHerHis] end at your hands, your mission is completed.
translation: [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]在你的手中丢掉了[plot_target.GetHerHis]性命。你的任务完成了。

original: Collect Debt from [Root.GetFirstName]
translation: 向[Root.GetFirstName]收债

original: By the order of the Grand Master of the Assassins, §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! is responsible for collecting the debt of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!. §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! must infiltrate the target's residence and threaten [Root.GetHerHim] to give the money back.
translation: 根据阿萨辛大长老的命令，§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!负责追讨§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!所欠的债务。§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!必须潜入目标的住宅并威胁[Root.GetHerHim]还钱。

original: Collect Debt
translation: 收债

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! infiltrates the residence of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! and threatens [Root.GetHerHim] to pay [Root.GetHerHis] debt.
translation: 刺客阴谋收债成功

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

[owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName] has refused to pay back what [owes_the_assassins.GetSheHe] owes us. We are in need of that money, and it is up to you to collect the debt. I fear the [owes_the_assassins.GetSocietyRank] need some "encouragement" to part with [owes_the_assassins.GetHerHis] gold. I am sure you can think of something.

Praised be Allah!
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

[owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝偿还[owes_the_assassins.GetSheHe]欠我们的钱。我们需要这笔钱，由你来收回债务。我担心[owes_the_assassins.GetSocietyRank]需要一些「鼓励」来割舍[owes_the_assassins.GetHerHis]黄金。我相信你可以想到怎么做。

赞美安拉！
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: Activate the plot "Collect Debt" plot with §Y[owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName]§! as your target to being your mission.
translation: 选择「收债」密谋，以§Y[owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName]§!为目标开始你的任务。

original: I have ensured a way into the [owes_the_assassins.Host.Capital.GetHolding] of [owes_the_assassins.Host.Capital.GetName] where my target, [owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName], resides. In one way or another, I must attempt to scare [owes_the_assassins.GetHerHim] into paying back [owes_the_assassins.GetHerHis] debt. The question is, where is [owes_the_assassins.GetFirstName]'s weak spot?
translation: 我已经确认了潜入[owes_the_assassins.Host.Capital.GetName]的[owes_the_assassins.Host.Capital.GetHolding]的道路，我的目标[owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName]就住在那里。无论如何，我必须试图去恐吓[owes_the_assassins.GetHerHim]去偿还[owes_the_assassins.GetHerHis]债务。问题在于[owes_the_assassins.GetFirstName]的弱点在哪里？

original: The promise of death scares even the bravest of [owes_the_assassins.GetMenWomen].
translation: 即使是最勇敢的[owes_the_assassins.GetMenWomen]，也会惧怕死亡的承诺。

original: Threaten to assassinate §Y[owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 威胁暗杀§Y[owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName]§!。\n

original: I will threaten someone [owes_the_assassins.GetSheHe] holds dear.
translation: 我会威胁[owes_the_assassins.GetSheHe]所珍视的人。

original: Threaten to assassinate §Y[threaten_dear_relation.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 威胁要暗杀§Y[threaten_dear_relation.GetTitledFirstName]§!。\n

original: [owes_the_assassins.GetSheHeCap] is a greedy [owes_the_assassins.GetManWoman]. I'll target [owes_the_assassins.GetHerHis] wealth.
translation: [owes_the_assassins.GetSheHeCap]是个贪婪的[owes_the_assassins.GetManWoman]，我将谋取[owes_the_assassins.GetHerHis]财富。

original: Threaten to ruin §Y[owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 威胁使§Y[owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName]§!破产。\n

original: I will attack [owes_the_assassins.GetHerHis] profane [owes_the_assassins.Religion.GetHighGodName].
translation: 我将攻击[owes_the_assassins.GetHerHis]亵渎的[owes_the_assassins.Religion.GetHighGodName]。

original: Threaten [owes_the_assassins.Religion.GetHighGodName].\n
translation: 威胁[owes_the_assassins.Religion.GetHighGodName]。\n

original: My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] has come to me, shaken and pale, with a note. [From.GetSheHeCap] found it in [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetChamber] alongside a piece of [From.GetHerHis] favorite cake, which was surely poisoned. The words on the note are directed at me – the Assassins demand that I return the money I owe or my [GetFromRelation] will pay in my stead.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation][From.GetTitledFirstName]来了，面色苍白、身体虚弱，带来一张纸条。[From.GetSheHeCap]是在[From.GetHerHis][From.GetChamber]里发现的，旁边是一块[From.GetHerHis]最喜欢的糕点，显然被人下毒了。纸条的内容是针对我的——刺客们要求我还钱，否则就得让[GetFromRelation]来还。

original: A week ago, a fire broke out in the trade district of [fire_town.GetName]. It consumed many storehouses and shops. The local trade will not recover in many years. At first, it was thought to be an accident, but now I know better. I have found a note in my [Root.GetChamber]. The Assassins want their money back, or my treasury shall burn next.
translation: 一周前，[fire_town.GetName]的贸易区发生了火灾。许多仓库与市场毁于一旦。本地贸易在多年内不会复苏。起初，它被认为是一个意外，但现在我知道了更合理的解释。我在[Root.GetChamber]中找到了一个纸条。阿萨辛希望他们的钱回到他们手里，否则下一个失火的就是我的国库。

original: Trade District Fire
translation: 商业区着火了

original: A fire has ravaged the local trade district, consuming the majority of storehouses and shops, resulting in many bankrupt traders and craftsmen.
translation: 火灾摧毁了当地的贸易区，烧毁了众多的仓库和商店，导致很多商人和工匠破产。

original: Not a single servant turned their head as I entered the [owes_the_assassins.Host.Capital.GetHolding], not even as I stepped into [owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName]'s [owes_the_assassins.GetChamber]. There, I left my note by a cup, which I laced with a non-lethal dose of poison. It seemed to do the trick – [grand_master.GetSocietyRank] [grand_master.GetFirstName] informed me that the money was returned this morning.
translation: 没有一个仆人在我进入[owes_the_assassins.Host.Capital.GetHolding]时转过头来，哪怕我步入了[owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName]的[owes_the_assassins.GetChamber]。我在被我掺了非致死的毒药的杯中留下了一张字条。这方法似乎奏效了——[grand_master.GetSocietyRank][grand_master.GetFirstName]通知我，那笔钱今早还回来了。

original: I infiltrated the kitchen staff and bribed a servant to tell me about the [threaten_dear_relation.GetTitledFirstName]'s favorite cake. I brought a slice containing some "secret ingredients" and placed it in [threaten_dear_relation.GetHerHis] [threaten_dear_relation.GetChamber] next to a note directed at [owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName]. It seemed to do the trick – [grand_master.GetSocietyRank] [grand_master.GetFirstName] informed me that the money was returned this morning.
translation: 我混进了厨房工作人员并贿赂随从得知了[threaten_dear_relation.GetTitledFirstName]最喜欢的蛋糕。我带来了一片含有一些「秘密成分」的蛋糕，并将其放在[threaten_dear_relation.GetHerHis][threaten_dear_relation.GetChamber]中，旁边写着一张针对[owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName]的纸条。这方法似乎奏效了——[grand_master.GetSocietyRank][grand_master.GetFirstName]通知我，那笔钱今早还回来了。

original: I watched the trade districts of [fire_town.GetName] burn from the safety of a distant hill. How it spread! As the flames danced from building to building, I was convinced the message would get across to [owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName]. Indeed, I was correct – [grand_master.GetSocietyRank] [grand_master.GetFirstName] informed me that the money was returned this morning.
translation: 我在远处的一座安全的山上看到[fire_town.GetName]的商业区起火了。火势迅速蔓延，看着火苗在一栋栋建筑间跳跃，我相信这消息很快会传到[owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName]那里。确实，我猜的没错——[grand_master.GetSocietyRank][grand_master.GetFirstName]通知我，那笔钱今早还回来了。

original: Not a single servant turned their head as I entered the [owes_the_assassins.Host.Capital.GetHolding], not even as I stepped into [owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName]'s [owes_the_assassins.GetChamber]. There, I left my note by a cup, which i laced with a non-lethal dose of poison. However, it turns out that [owes_the_assassins.GetFirstName] is a foolhardy [owes_the_assassins.GetManWoman] – [owes_the_assassins.GetSheHe] still refuses to repay [owes_the_assassins.GetHerHis] debt.
translation: 没有一个仆人在我进入[owes_the_assassins.Host.Capital.GetHolding]时转过头来，哪怕我步入了[owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName]的[owes_the_assassins.GetChamber]。我在杯子旁边留下字条，杯中则掺了非致死剂量的毒药。然而，事实证明[owes_the_assassins.GetFirstName]是一个莽撞的[owes_the_assassins.GetManWoman]——[owes_the_assassins.GetSheHe]仍然拒绝偿还[owes_the_assassins.GetHerHis]债务。

original: I infiltrated the kitchen staff of the [owes_the_assassins.Host.Capital.GetHolding] and bribed [threaten_dear_relation.GetTitledFirstName]'s servant to tell me about the [threaten_dear_relation.GetLordLady]'s favorite cake. I brought a slice containing some "secret ingredients" and placed it in [threaten_dear_relation.GetHerHis] [threaten_dear_relation.GetChamber] next to a note directed at [owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName]. However, it turns out that [owes_the_assassins.GetFirstName] is a foolhardy [owes_the_assassins.GetManWoman] – [owes_the_assassins.GetSheHe] still refuses to repay [owes_the_assassins.GetHerHis] debt.
translation: 我混进了[owes_the_assassins.Host.Capital.GetHolding]的厨房工作人员并贿赂[threaten_dear_relation.GetTitledFirstName]的随从得知了[threaten_dear_relation.GetLordLady]最喜欢的蛋糕。我带来了一片含有一些「秘密成分」的蛋糕，并将其放在[threaten_dear_relation.GetHerHis][threaten_dear_relation.GetChamber]中，旁边写着一张针对[owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName]的纸条。然而，事实证明[owes_the_assassins.GetFirstName]是一个莽撞的[owes_the_assassins.GetManWoman]——[owes_the_assassins.GetSheHe]仍然拒绝偿还[owes_the_assassins.GetHerHis]债务。

original: I watched the trade districts of [fire_town.GetName] burn from the safety of a distant hill. How it spread! As the flames danced from building to building, I was convinced the message would get across to [owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName]. However, it turns out that [owes_the_assassins.GetFirstName] is a foolhardy [owes_the_assassins.GetManWoman] – [owes_the_assassins.GetSheHe] still refuses to repay [owes_the_assassins.GetHerHis] debt.
translation: 我在远处的一座安全的山上看到[fire_town.GetName]的商业区起火了。火势迅速蔓延，看着火苗在一栋栋建筑间跳跃，我相信这消息很快会传到[owes_the_assassins.GetTitledFirstName]那里。然而，事实证明[owes_the_assassins.GetFirstName]是一个莽撞的[owes_the_assassins.GetManWoman]——[owes_the_assassins.GetSheHe]仍然拒绝偿还[owes_the_assassins.GetHerHis]债务。

original: That greedy [owes_the_assassins.GetInsultNoun]!
translation: 那个贪婪的[owes_the_assassins.GetInsultNoun]！

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

It is time to strike against the infidel [infidel_holding_owner.GetTitledName]. Your mission is to raise your armies and occupy the [infidel_holding.GetHolding] [infidel_holding.GetName] in [infidel_holding_owner.GetHerHis] county [infidel_holding_province.GetName].

May Allah be with you, [Root.GetSocietyRank]!
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

是时候对付异教徒[infidel_holding_owner.GetTitledName]了。你的任务是召集你的军队并占据[infidel_holding_owner.GetHerHis]省份[infidel_holding_province.GetName]中的[infidel_holding.GetHolding][infidel_holding.GetName]。

愿安拉与你同在，[Root.GetSocietyRank]！
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: The [infidel_holding.GetHolding] [infidel_holding.GetName] is now under my control. I have struck a heavy blow against [infidel_holding_owner.GetTitledName] in the name of the Assassins! My mission is now complete.
translation: [infidel_holding.GetHolding][infidel_holding.GetName]已经处于我的控制下了。以刺客之名！我给了 [infidel_holding_owner.GetTitledName]沉重的一击。我的任务完成了。

original: I shall hoist our banner high over the [infidel_holding.GetHolding]!
translation: 我将在[infidel_holding.GetHolding]上高举我们的旗帜！

original: Intimidate Ruler for Favor
translation: 通过威胁统治者获得一个人情

original: There is something strange, almost ominous, about [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]. The other day when we were exchanging pleasantries, [FromFrom.GetSheHe] asked me about my [Root.GetMatterOfImportance]. Normally, this would not unsettle me, but there was something about the tone of [FromFrom.GetHerHis] voice... Veiled or not, a threat is a threat, and this was certainly one.
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]有些奇怪甚至不祥。有一天，当我们正在寒暄的时候，[FromFrom.GetSheHe]问起我的[Root.GetMatterOfImportance]。通常，这不会令我不安，但[FromFrom.GetHerHis]说话的声调有点问题。不管蒙不蒙面，威胁终究是威胁，而且这的确不可忽视。

original: I cannot risk crossing [FromFrom.GetFirstName].
translation: 我不能冒险无视[FromFrom.GetFirstName]。

original: When I met [From.GetTitledFirstName] the other day, I inquired about [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetMatterOfImportance]. [From.GetSheHeCap] certainly seemed to notice my veiled threat – [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetFaceDescription] face turned ashen and for the reminder of our conversation [From.GetSheHe] would not meet my gaze.
translation: 前几天遇到[From.GetTitledFirstName]时，我问起[From.GetHerHis][From.GetMatterOfImportance]。[From.GetSheHeCap]看上去肯定注意到了我含蓄的威胁——[From.GetHerHis][From.GetFaceDescription]脸变得面如死灰，因为想起我们的谈话，[From.GetSheHe]一直避开我的视线。

original: [From.GetFirstName] will not dare to cross me.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]不敢无视我。

original: Mark for Death
translation: 死亡标记

original: As the Grand Master of the Assassins, §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has the power to mark §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! for death. One of the Assassins will be given a mission to kill §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
translation: 作为阿萨辛大长老，§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!有权把§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!定为暗杀目标。一名阿萨辛将接到任务去刺杀§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!。

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! does not already have a target marked for death.
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!没有已标记的目标

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is marked for death.
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!被死亡标记了。

original: Clear Mark of Death
translation: 清除死亡标记

original: Remove the mark of death on §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!. This will not cancel any ongoing missions.
translation: 移去§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!身上的死亡标记！这不会取消任何正在进行的任务。

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is marked for death.
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!被死亡标记了。

original: The mark of death is cleared from §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
translation: 死亡的标记已经从§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!身上清除！

original: I have marked [From.GetTitledFirstName] for death. Soon enough, one of my assassins will be sent on a mission to end [From.GetHerHis] life. They will notify me when the deed is done.
translation: 我已将[From.GetTitledFirstName]加入死亡名单。不久后，我的其中一名刺客将接到结束[From.GetHerHis]生命的任务。他们将在任务成功时通知我。

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

It is done. [plot_target.GetTitledFirstName] has met [plot_target.GetHerHis] end at my hands. As these news reach our other enemies, they will tremble with fear!

Glory to the Assassins!
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

已经解决掉了[plot_target.GetTitledFirstName]，[plot_target.GetHerHis]生命终结在我手中，当我们的其他敌人收到这个消息，他们将会恐惧的颤抖不止！

荣耀属于阿萨辛！
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

While our members are devout believers, many lack the practical skills, bodily stamina, and rigorous education needed by an expert assassin. Therefore I give you this mission, [Root.GetSocietyRank]: take on a protégé and turn them into a weapon of Allah's fury.

Praised be Allah!
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

虽然我们的成员是虔诚的信徒，但许多人缺乏专业刺客所需的实践技能，身体耐力和严格的教育。因此，我向你传达这个使命，[Root.GetSocietyRank]：接受一个门徒，把他们教导成安拉愤怒的武器。

赞美安拉！
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: Train Protege
translation: 培养门徒

original: You decline the mission and will not be offered another for some time.
translation: 你拒绝了这项任务，在一段时间内不会再提供给你另一个任务。

original: Adherent
translation: 追随者

original: Companion
translation: 同伴

original: Grand Master
translation: 大长老

original: Donate Money to the Assassins
translation: 向阿萨辛捐款

original: You may donate money to the Order in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
translation: 你可以捐赠给教团换取§Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!。

original: Cat Familiar
translation: 猫使魔

original: This character is constantly followed around by a beautiful, black cat with astoundingly green eyes.
translation: 一只有令人叹为观止的绿色的眼睛的美丽黑猫经常围绕在这个角色身边。

original: Wolf Familiar
translation: 狼使魔

original: A big, shaggy wolf is this character's constant companion. The beast is surprisingly obedient.
translation: 一个巨大又毛发蓬松的狼是这个角色形影不离的同伴。这只野兽出奇地听话。

original: Owl Familiar
translation: 鸮使魔

original: A beautiful, snow white owl is often perched on this character's shoulder.
translation: 一只美丽的雪白猫头鹰常栖息在这个角色的肩膀上。

original: Raven Familiar
translation: 鸦使魔

original: A beautiful, coal black raven is often perched on this character's shoulder. It is known to steal shiny objects, from coins to jewelry.
translation: 一只美丽的煤黑色渡鸦经常栖息在此角色的肩膀上。它因喜欢偷从硬币到首饰的发亮物体而知名。

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! has not selected a familiar in the past 5 years\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!在过去的 5 年中没有选择过使魔\n

original: As a [Root.GetSocietyRank] and a weaver of [Root.GetDWDarkMagic], I can summon a supernatural beast to be my companion. This familiar will be my eyes and ears, as well as imbue me with its powers.
translation: 作为一个[Root.GetSocietyRank]和[Root.GetDWDarkMagic]的一名成员，我能召唤一只超自然野兽作为我的同伴。它会成为我的耳目，也会逐渐增强我的力量。

original: I choose the cat, lord of all beasts!
translation: 我选择了猫，万兽之王！

original: A wolf shall be my protector.
translation: 狼能够保护我。

original: I summon the owl, master of the night!
translation: 我召唤猫头鹰，暗夜之主！

original: The raven will grant me its wit.
translation: 乌鸦将赐予我智慧。

original: Summon Familiar
translation: 召唤使魔

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is not already sick.
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!没有生病。

original: It seems like my [Root.GetDWDarkMagic] was successful, however, the result was not quite what I imagined. I had hoped the [GetRootFromInsult] [From.GetTitledFirstName] would be stricken by a mysterious case of pox or plague, but as it turns out, my spell only gave [From.GetHerHim] [From.GetDisease].
translation: 看上去我的[Root.GetDWDarkMagic]成功了，但是，结果和我想象的不太一样。我本希望[GetRootFromInsult][From.GetTitledFirstName]会患上一种神秘的疹子或瘟疫，但结果我的咒语只给[From.GetHerHim]带来了[From.GetDisease]。

original: Praised be [Root.GetDWDevil], my [Root.GetDWDarkMagic] has borne fruit! News has reached me of the [GetRootFromInsult] [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s recent illness. [From.GetSheHeCap] is suffering from [From.GetDisease] and I doubt [From.GetSheHe] will last very long...
translation: 赞美[Root.GetDWDevil]，我的[Root.GetDWDarkMagic]已经显灵。我已听闻[GetRootFromInsult][From.GetTitledFirstName]最近身患疾病。[From.GetSheHeCap]正受到[From.GetDisease]困扰，[From.GetSheHe]命不久矣……

original: At least I hope [From.GetFirstName] suffers!
translation: 我希望至少[From.GetFirstName]会受罪！

original: May [Root.GetDWDemons] dance on [From.GetFirstName]'s grave!
translation: 愿[Root.GetDWDemons]在[From.GetFirstName]的坟墓上跳舞！

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! mysteriously contracts a disease\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!神秘地感染了疾病\n

original: Tainted Touch
translation: 感染之触

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! can use [From.GetDWDarkMagic] to taint §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! health. This will cause severe discomfort and possibly even death.
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!能用[From.GetDWDarkMagic]感染§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的§!健康。这会引起严重不适甚至死亡。

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has a mission to collect §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s§! debt.
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!有一个任务去收§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!的债务。

original: Your mission "[Root.GetQuestName]" involving [From.GetTitledFirstName] is no longer valid.
translation: 你对[From.GetTitledFirstName]的任务「[Root.GetQuestName]」不再有效。

original: $NAME$ counties and characters are hard to convert
translation: $NAME$省份和角色难以被改信

original: Is hard to Convert
translation: 传教困难

original: Is NOT hard to Convert
translation: 传教不困难

original: Religion is resistant to conversion
translation: 该宗教会抵制转化

original: Declared Independence
translation: 宣布独立

original: Holder is §YOrthodox§!, §YPaulician§!, §YMonothelite§! or §YIconoclast§! and NOT a heretic\n
translation: 持有者是§Y东正教§!，§Y保禄派§!，§Y基督一志派§! 或者 §Y圣像破坏派§!并且不是异端\n

original: Is NOT secretly following another religion\n
translation: 没有秘密信仰另一宗教\n

original: The concepts of fairness and rules have lost their luster to me. I have lost the Just trait.
translation: 公平和规则的概念已经不再吸引我。我失去了正直的特质。

original: Why would all these delicious foods and drinks exist if we were not meant to taste them? I've lost the Temperate trait.
translation: 这些美酒佳肴如果不为人享用那为何要存在呢？我失去了温和的特质。

original: Not everything in life needs hard work to achieve. I've lost the Diligent trait.
translation: 不是生活中的每件事都必须努力去实现。我失去了勤奋的品质。

original: Dark Divorce
translation: 诅咒离婚

original: Annul your marriage to §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! by death, using dark rituals and magic. This may have repercussions upon your soul!
translation: 通过深渊的仪式之力，导致§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!死亡而解除与你的婚姻。这很可能会影响到你的灵魂内在！

original: Though my last act of worship has been some time ago, I can still sense an inhuman touch upon my soul whenever I think about what I did. I have become a changed [Root.GetManWoman].
translation: 即使自我上次祈祷已经过了段时日，但无论何时当我回想起来，总能感受到一种超自然的感应。我已经变成一个脱胎换骨的[Root.GetManWoman]了。

original: A tainted soul is but a small price to pay...
translation: 一个受污染的灵魂不过是一个小小的代价……

original: Speak the words, and seal [dark_divorce_target.GetHerHis] fate!
translation: 念出咒语，封印[dark_divorce_target.GetHerHis]命运！

original: Bring the wrath of [dark_divorce_spell_caster.GetDWDevil] upon §Y[dark_divorce_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!!
translation: 让[dark_divorce_spell_caster.GetDWDevil]之怒降临于§Y[dark_divorce_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!！

original: No... I cannot do this.
translation: 不……我做不到这个。

original: Stop the ritual and spare §Y[dark_divorce_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s life. [dark_divorce_target.GetSheHeCap] will be none the wiser.\n
translation: 终止这个仪式以拯救§Y[dark_divorce_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!的生命。[dark_divorce_target.GetSheHeCap]仍不知晓此事。\n

original: A terrifying scream echoes through the hallways, and when I reach the scene I find a group of my courtiers bending over the lifeless form of my [dark_divorce_target.GetHusbandWife] [dark_divorce_target.GetFirstName]. Signs of bodily harm aren't to be found, but the look of sheer terror engraved on [dark_divorce_target.GetHerHis] face is enough to raise the hairs on the back of my neck...
translation: 一声可怕的尖叫声回荡在走廊里，当我到达现场时，我发现我的一群朝臣们正俯身看着我[dark_divorce_target.GetHusbandWife][dark_divorce_target.GetFirstName]的尸体。身体上受伤的迹象尚不可见，但是[dark_divorce_target.GetHerHis]脸上的恐怖表情足以令我发指。

original: I would rather never see what [dark_divorce_target.GetSheHe] saw.
translation: 我宁愿永远也看不到[dark_divorce_target.GetSheHe]看到的东西。

original: One moment my [dark_divorce_target.GetHusbandWife] [dark_divorce_target.GetFirstName] is crossing the open from one building to the next, and the next a blindingly bright light and thunderous sound seemingly shatter the world. After myself and the other witnesses manage to recollect ourselves, we find the singed remains of my [dark_divorce_target.GetHusbandWife]'s body lifeless on the ground.
translation: 当我的[dark_divorce_target.GetHusbandWife][dark_divorce_target.GetFirstName]准备出门的时候，一道霹雳伴随着震耳欲聋的巨响从天而降。过了半晌，我和其他目击者才回过神来。我的爱人[dark_divorce_target.GetHusbandWife]只剩下一具了无生气的尸骸。

original: Out with a bang! [dark_divorce_target.GetSheHeCap] always did have style.
translation: 一声巨响！无疑是[dark_divorce_target.GetSheHeCap]的风格。

original: Screams of panic and agony wake me from my sleep. When I reach my [dark_divorce_target.GetHusbandWife] [dark_divorce_target.GetFirstName]'s bedchambers and turn the red-hot doorknob, I find only a few charred bones remaining of my [dark_divorce_target.GetHusbandWife]'s body. Aside from the bed [dark_divorce_target.GetSheHe] lay in, the bedchambers were luckily completely untouched by the flames.
translation: 恐惧与痛苦的尖叫将我从梦中惊醒。当我到我[dark_divorce_target.GetHusbandWife][dark_divorce_target.GetFirstName]的卧室并拉开红热的门拉手，我只发现了一些我[dark_divorce_target.GetHusbandWife]的烧焦到只剩一些骨头的尸体。除了[dark_divorce_target.GetSheHe]躺的那张床，整个卧室幸运地没有受到火焰侵袭。

original: Damn! I liked that bed.
translation: 妈的！我喜欢那个床。

original: As we walk the grounds a rather cheeky crow pecks at my [dark_divorce_target.GetHusbandWife] [dark_divorce_target.GetFirstName]'s eyes. One crow grows into many, and before long my guards are fighting a hopeless battle, trying to beat the creatures off of [dark_divorce_target.GetHerHim]. When at length [dark_divorce_target.GetHerHis] screams cease and the cloud of black wings lifts, my [dark_divorce_target.GetHusbandWife] is but a bloody heap on the ground.
translation: 当我们在庭院里散步时，一只无耻的乌鸦飞过来啄我[dark_divorce_target.GetHusbandWife][dark_divorce_target.GetFirstName]的眼睛。紧接着一只变成无数只。我的卫兵开始进行一场绝望的战斗，试图从[dark_divorce_target.GetHerHim]身边赶走它们。最终，[dark_divorce_target.GetHerHis]尖叫声停止了，黑色的翅膀们就像乌云一样升起，我的[dark_divorce_target.GetHusbandWife]只剩下了地上的斑斑血迹。

original: Hmm, a real 'murder' of crows...
translation: 喔，一只乌鸦是真正的「杀手」……

original: My [dark_divorce_target.GetHusbandWife] [dark_divorce_target.GetFirstName] has begun to speak in tongues and spew obscenities seemingly at random! The courtiers are beginning to believe [dark_divorce_target.GetHerHim] possessed.
translation: 我的[dark_divorce_target.GetHusbandWife][dark_divorce_target.GetFirstName]开始口吐异语，胡乱地喷出淫秽之言！廷臣们开始相信[dark_divorce_target.GetHerHim]着魔了。

original: This could prove interesting...
translation: 这可能会很有趣……

original: My [dark_divorce_target.GetHusbandWife] [dark_divorce_target.GetFirstName]'s deranged ramblings, cackling and screaming turn to a mad cackling laughter that grows louder as [dark_divorce_target.GetSheHe] emerges from [dark_divorce_target.GetHerHis] bedchambers into the open. With what seems like... glee? [dark_divorce_target.GetSheHeCap] looks at her audience and throws herself off the balcony, a dull thud putting an abrupt end to [dark_divorce_target.GetHerHis] crazed laughter.
translation: 我的[dark_divorce_target.GetHusbandWife][dark_divorce_target.GetFirstName]丢了魂似地到处游荡，时不时发出尖叫和怪笑，声音越来越大，突然[dark_divorce_target.GetSheHe]出现在卧室的窗户里，像是在……唱歌？[dark_divorce_target.GetSheHeCap]看着楼下惊恐万状的「听众」们，然后纵身跃出阳台，[dark_divorce_target.GetHerHis]疯笑也随着一声「砰」的闷响戛然而止。

original: Ahh, silence is truly golden.
translation: 啊，沉默是金。

original: This may have repercussions upon my soul!
translation: 这可能会影响到我的心灵！

original: This might have repercussions upon my soul!
translation: 这可能会对我的灵魂产生影响！

original: died from fear
translation: 惊吓致死

original: was killed by a lightning strike
translation: 被雷击致死

original: spontaneously combusted
translation: 自燃

original: was pecked to death by crows
translation: 被乌鸦啄死

original: Recently did Dark Divorce
translation: 最近进行过诅咒离婚

original: Too frequent unnatural deaths would arouse suspicion. Lay low for a while.
translation: 过于频繁的非正常死亡会引起怀疑。暂时避避风头。

original: Can access §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!\n
translation: 可以拜访§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!\n

original: Raise Army of Assassins
translation: 召集阿萨辛大军

original: As the Grandmaster of the Assassins, you may call upon an army of fanatical followers while at war.
translation: 作为阿萨辛的大长老，你可以在战争时召集信众军。

original: Hire Ships
translation: 雇佣船只

original: Since Assassins have little time for naval matters, it is best to simply hire ships when needed.
translation: 由于刺客们很少有时间处理海军事务，所以最好只在需要时雇用船只。

original: As [From.GetTitledFirstName] is bound to the altar [From.GetSheHe] appears to be mumbling prayers through [From.GetHerHis] gag. [From.GetSheHeCap] is sweating profusely, either due to the heat from the nearby pyres or from fear. [From.GetHerHisCap] holy vestments hang in tatters already, exposing [From.GetHerHis] chest. As the appointed hour draws near the chanting of your brethren builds to a crescendo until, finally, it is time.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]被绑在祭坛上，[From.GetSheHe]似乎在咕哝着祈祷，哪怕[From.GetHerHis]嘴被堵上。不知是被附近的火堆烤的太热，还是恐惧过于强烈，[From.GetSheHeCap]已经汗流浃背。[From.GetHerHisCap]圣衣被剥去，露出了[From.GetHerHis]胸膛。吉时已到，主持祭祀的僧侣们开始吟唱咒语，是时候结果他了。

original: Plunge my knife into [From.GetHerHis] chest!
translation: 我把刀插入[From.GetHerHis]胸膛！

original: Bound and gagged, [From.GetTitledFirstName] is carried out of [From.GetHerHis] cell and dropped into the cauldron. As your acolytes slam down the lid and lock it securely you drop your flaming torch into the firewood stacked around the pot, setting it ablaze. Soon the water within will come to the boil and another soul will be sent to [Root.GetDWDevil].
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]被五花大绑着从[From.GetHerHis]牢房里带了出来，并被扔进了锅里。你的手下「当」的一声扣上了锅盖并把它严实地锁了起来，这时，你用火把点燃了锅下的木柴，剧烈燃烧的木柴很快噼啪作响。要不了多久，锅里的水就会沸腾，又有一个灵魂会被送给[Root.GetDWDevil]了！

original: Good sacrifices are in short supply.
translation: 缺少好的祭品。

original: Your acolytes place little [From.GetFirstName] on the altar and fasten [From.GetHerHim] firmly in place. You step forward and [From.GetHerHis] confusion suddenly becomes terror as [From.GetSheHe] sees the knife in your hand. [From.GetHerHisCap] pitiful scream has only just begun before you slit [From.GetHerHis] throat.
translation: 你的手下把可怜的[From.GetFirstName]丢到了祭坛上，并将[From.GetHerHim]紧紧地绑在了上面。你走上前去，在[From.GetSheHe]看到你手中的刀时，[From.GetHerHis]困惑马上变成了恐惧。[From.GetHerHisCap]痛苦尖叫只持续了一会儿，你的利刃就割开了这个人的喉咙。

original: [Root.GetDWDevil] prefers innocent souls.
translation: [Root.GetDWDevil]渴望无辜的灵魂。

original: A virgin for [Root.GetDWDevil]!
translation: 一个献给[Root.GetDWDevil]的处子！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] looks dazed as [From.GetSheHe] is dragged to the altar, but you can see dawning comprehension on [From.GetHerHis] face as [From.GetSheHe] is tied down. You ignore [From.GetHerHis] begging as chants of praise to [Root.GetDWDevil] build to a crescendo. Finally it is time, you swing your blade in an overhead arc which ends in [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s heart.
translation: 当[From.GetTitledFirstName]被拖到祭坛上时，[From.GetSheHe]看上去还有些茫然，但你绑住[From.GetSheHe]时[From.GetHerHis]脸上现出恍然大悟的神色。你无视了[From.GetHerHis]乞求，开始高唱起对[Root.GetDWDevil]的颂歌。终于时候到了，你将手中的匕首划过一道高高的弧线，插向了[From.GetTitledFirstName]的心脏。

original: Hail [Root.GetDWDevil]!
translation: [Root.GetDWDevil]万岁！

original: You struggle against the bonds holding you to the altar, but there is no give in them. As the unholy chanting rises to a frantic crescendo, you see [From.GetTitledFirstName] walking towards you holding a dagger. You redouble your efforts to escape, but [From.GetTitledFirstName] is already raising [From.GetHerHis] dagger over [From.GetHerHis] head in a two-handed grip. You have time to realize the rope around your right hand is starting to loosen just before [From.GetTitledFirstName] blade slams into your heart.
translation: 你与把你绑在祭坛上的束缚奋力搏斗，但桎梏没有任何松懈。当邪恶的颂歌越来越响时，你看到[From.GetTitledFirstName]拿着匕首渐渐走近。你加倍努力想要逃跑，但是[From.GetTitledFirstName]已经双手将匕首越过[From.GetHerHis]头顶高高举起。你刚觉得自己右手的绳索开始松动，[From.GetTitledFirstName]就把刀刃刺进了你的心脏。

original: Argh!
translation: 啊！

original: Sacrifice to [From.GetDWDevil]
translation: 献祭给[From.GetDWDevil]

original: As §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§W is your prisoner, and you are a member of [From.Society.GetName], you can choose to sacrifice [Root.GetHerHim] to [From.GetDWDevil].
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§W是你的囚犯，作为[From.Society.GetName]的成员，你可以选择把[Root.GetHerHim]献祭给[From.GetDWDevil]。

original: Blood for blood
translation: 血债血偿

original: Death to the infidels
translation: 去死吧，异教徒

original: For the Assassins
translation: 为了阿萨辛

original: [This.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s
translation: [This.Religion.GetPriestTitle]

original: Grand Master [grand_master.GetFirstName] send [grand_master.GetHerHis] regards
translation: 大长老[grand_master.GetFirstName]送来了[grand_master.GetHerHis]问候

original: alliances
translation: 结盟

original: building plans
translation: 建造计划

original: correspondence
translation: 信件

original: diplomats
translation: 外交官

original: doctrines
translation: 教义

original: investment opportunities
translation: 投资机会

original: investments
translation: 投资

original: ledger
translation: 信息统计表

original: maps
