original: Use Hashish from the Assassins
translation: 从阿萨辛获取大麻

original: Assassins can use Hashish to experience divine visions to help them in their cause.
translation: 阿萨辛派可以使用大麻来体验幻象以帮助他们完成事业。

original: Astounding Visions
translation: 令人震惊的幻象

original: This character has experienced astounding sights by using hashish provided by the Assassins.
translation: 此角色在服食大麻后看到了令人震惊的景象。

original: Uplifting Visions
translation: 令人振奋的幻象

original: This character has experienced uplifting sights by using hashish provided by the Assassins.
translation: 此角色在服食大麻后看到了令人振奋的景象。

original: Frightening Visions
translation: 令人恐惧的幻象

original: This character has experienced frightening sights by using hashish provided by the Assassins.
translation: 此角色在服食大麻后看到了令人害怕的景象。

original: Hashish Addict
translation: 大麻上瘾

original: This character is addicted to hashish. They can recover if they abstain from the substance, although this will lead to unpleasant withdrawal symptoms.
translation: 此角色大麻成瘾。如果他们戒除大麻则可以恢复，虽然这将导致令人不快的戒断症状。

original: Withdrawal Symptoms
translation: 戒断症状

original: This character is suffering from withdrawal from hashish.
translation: 此角色正在受大麻戒断反应的折磨。

original: There is wisdom in moderation.
translation: 节制中蕴含着智慧。

original: Be careful in your dosage.
translation: 控制剂量。

original: I must strive for balance.
translation: 我必须为了达到平衡而奋斗。

original: Use the standard dosage.
translation: 使用标准剂量。

original: Truth can only be achieved by the daring.
translation: 真理只能靠勇气来实现。

original: Use as much as possible.
translation: 尽可能多地使用。

original: I have seen the light.
translation: 我看见了曙光。

original: Just one more time can't hurt.
translation: 再来一次不会有事的。

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! has become addicted to hashish. [Root.GetSheHeCap] can recover if they abstain from the substance, although this will lead to unpleasant withdrawal symptoms.\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!已经对大麻成瘾。如果[Root.GetSheHeCap]停用大麻就能恢复正常，不过这会引起不愉快的戒断症状。\n

original: It has been too long since the last time I used the hashish for the visions and I find myself growing more restless each day. My sleep is becoming erratic and I find it hard to focus.
translation: 距离我最后一次服食大麻体验幻象已经过去了很久，我发现自己越来越不安，睡不好也无法集中注意力。

original: I need it!
translation: 我需要这个！

original: Praise be Allah!
translation: 赞美安拉！

original: I can't trust anyone.
translation: 我不能信任任何人。

original: By Allah, they are everywhere. Hiding in every corner, nook and cranny. Flapping their wings and staring at us, trying to fool us that they are only around at night. I must tell my people what is going on!
translation: 安拉保佑，他们无处不在。他们隐藏在每个角落，阴暗处与裂缝，煽动着他们的翅膀，紧盯着我们，试图欺骗我们让我们以为他们只在晚上出现。我必须告诉人们发生了什么！

original: Praise be Allah for opening my vision, it is so obvious to me now that [drug_plotter_reveal.GetTitledName] is trying to kill me!
translation: 赞美安拉使我明目，显然[drug_plotter_reveal.GetTitledName]正试图谋杀我！

original: Allah protect me!
translation: 安拉护佑着我！

original: Praise be Allah for opening my vision, it is so obvious to me now that [drug_plotter_reveal.GetTitledName] is having designs on my [drug_plotter_reveal.PlotTargetTitle.GetFullName]!
translation: 赞美安拉使我明目，现在很显然[drug_plotter_reveal.GetTitledName]正在计划对我的[drug_plotter_reveal.PlotTargetTitle.GetFullName]实施阴谋！

original: Vultures!
translation: 秃鹰！

original: I see now how our world is an intricate web of lies and plots, and it is thanks to the Order that I realized that [drug_plotter_reveal.GetTitledName] is planning to kill [drug_plotter_target.GetTitledName].
translation: 现在我明白了我们的世界是一个谎言和密谋交织而成的粗综复杂的网络，感谢组织让我知道[drug_plotter_reveal.GetTitledName]正在计划谋杀[drug_plotter_target.GetTitledName]。

original: Thank Allah that it is not me they're after.
translation: 感谢安拉，他们的目标不是我。

original: The herbs that the Order has made me realize how we all just desire things like rabid dogs. Like how I now see that [drug_plotter_reveal.GetTitledName] is trying to get [drug_plotter_reveal.GetHerHis] filthy paws on the [drug_plotter_reveal.PlotTargetTitle.GetFullName] belonging to [drug_plotter_target.GetTitledName].
translation: 组织的药草使我意识到我们都只是像疯狗一样渴望。就像我现在看到的那样，[drug_plotter_reveal.GetTitledName]正试图将[drug_plotter_reveal.GetHerHis]脏爪伸向[drug_plotter_target.GetTitledName]的[drug_plotter_reveal.PlotTargetTitle.GetFullName]。

original: They are like vultures.
translation: 他们就像秃鹰。

original: It is incredible how you can so easily not see a person close to you. I must have walked past [slacker_buddy.GetFirstName] hundreds of times without noticing him, but thanks to the Order I can now see what a good friend I have nearby!
translation: 你竟然轻而易举地忽视了接近你的人，这难以置信。我肯定[slacker_buddy.GetFirstName]身边走过数百次却没有注意到他，但是感谢组织我知道了我身边有个多么好的朋友！

original: I tell you, brother!
translation: 我告诉过你了，弟兄！

original: I sank my eye into [drug_new_lover.GetHerHis]. I caught a glimpse of a deep dawn and saw the ancient yesterday and what I do not know.
translation: 我把眼睛投向[drug_new_lover.GetHerHis]眼睛。我瞥到一抹浓重的黎明，看到了古老的昨天和我不知道的东西。

original: I feel the universe flowing between our eyes.
translation: 我觉得宇宙在我眼前飘过。

original: The hashish has finally give me clarity, and now I see the treachery going on all around me. It is clear to me now that my [Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife] is having a relationship with [drug_cheater_lover.GetFirstName] behind my back!
translation: 大麻终于使我清醒，现在我发现了身边的背叛。我明白了，[Root.Spouse.GetHusbandWife]和[drug_cheater_lover.GetFirstName]在我背后有一腿！

original: I will tell everyone!
translation: 我会告诉所有人知道的！

original: No, I must be imagining things.
translation: 不，我一定是在想象。

original: My clothes! They come through the clothes! Subversive forces trying to sway the Righteous from the Path. We must get rid of it, so that They cannot use it, for if we wear them They will be close to the purity of our body.
translation: 我的衣服！它从我的衣服钻进来了！破坏的力量正在尝试使正义的人偏离道路。我们必须脱下衣服，以免它利用衣服，影响身体的纯净。

original: It is the only way!
translation: 这是唯一的办法了！

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! makes a fool of [Root.GetHerselfHimself] to the court.
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§![Root.GetHerselfHimself]在宫中出丑了。

original: The shadows close in from all around making the world seems so dark and frightening. My heart is racing.
translation: 四周的阴影将我包裹，一切显得如此黑暗和可怕。我的心脏在狂跳。

original: I think I'll go lie down.
translation: 我觉得我快撑不住了。

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! dies
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!死亡

original: died from using too much Hashish
translation: 死于过量服用大麻

original: As [Root.GetDWDevil] bids!
translation: 遵循[Root.GetDWDevil]的命令

original: I think there are other things I can do for [Root.GetDWDevil] right now.
translation: 我想现在我能为[Root.GetDWDevil]做点别的事。

original: My forces has breached the outer defenses of the [dw_desecration_target.GetHolding] in [dw_desecration_target.GetName]. I should prepare myself to enter and do the work of [Root.GetDWDevil].
translation: 我的部队突破了[dw_desecration_target.GetName]的[dw_desecration_target.GetHolding]的外部防御。我必须准备好进入并完成[Root.GetDWDevil]的工作。

original: Praise [Root.GetDWDevil]!
translation: 赞美[Root.GetDWDevil]！

original: No, there's too many people around.
translation: 不，周围有太多人了。

original: My preparations and plans have been made, a servant has been bribed to leave a side door to the [dw_desecration_target.GetHolding] in [dw_desecration_target.GetName] open so that I and some faithful servants can enter and do the dark biddings of [Root.GetDWDevil].
translation: 我的准备工作和计划已经完善，一个被收买的仆人为我们在[dw_desecration_target.GetName]的[dw_desecration_target.GetHolding]留了一扇后门，让我和我忠实的仆人可以进来完成[Root.GetDWDevil]的黑暗召唤。

original: It is time.
translation: 是时候了。

original: With a group of handpicked faithful [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] I have entered the hallowed grounds of the [desecration_holder.GetHouseOfWorship] in [dw_desecration_target.GetName]. However as soon as I step inside the doors a [desecration_holder.Religion.GetPriestTitle] throws himself at our feet begging us in the name of [desecration_holder.Religion.GetHighGodName] to show mercy and swears to not utter a word of our presence.
translation: 一群精心挑选过的忠诚[Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural]随我进入在[dw_desecration_target.GetName]内的[desecration_holder.GetHouseOfWorship]。然而我一踏进门口，一个[desecration_holder.Religion.GetPriestTitle]投身到我们脚边，恳求我们以[desecration_holder.Religion.GetHighGodName]的名义发发慈悲，并发誓不说出我们的存在。

original: As I and my cadre of faithful [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] enter the [desecration_holder.GetHouseOfWorship] of [dw_desecration_target.GetName] I find no-one other than [desecration_holder.GetTitledFirstName] in the main chapel.
translation: 我和我忠诚的[Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural]干部进入[dw_desecration_target.GetName]的[desecration_holder.GetHouseOfWorship]后，在礼拜间只找到了[desecration_holder.GetTitledFirstName]。

original: As I and a group of my faithful make our way through the [desecration_holder.GetHouseOfWorship] in [dw_desecration_target.Title.GetName] I spot a [desecration_holder.Religion.GetPriestTitle] tending to their duties in the middle of the night.
translation: 当我和一群忠诚的卫士闯过位于[dw_desecration_target.Title.GetName]的[desecration_holder.GetHouseOfWorship]时，我发现一位[desecration_holder.Religion.GetPriestTitle]正在半夜里尽职地履行他们的职责。

original: As I and a group of my faithful make our way through the [desecration_holder.GetHouseOfWorship] in [dw_desecration_target.Title.GetName] I spot [desecration_holder.GetTitledFirstName] tending to their duties in the middle of the night.
translation: 当我和一群忠诚的卫士闯过位于[dw_desecration_target.Title.GetName]的[desecration_holder.GetHouseOfWorship]时，我发现[desecration_holder.GetTitledFirstName]正在半夜里尽职地履行他们的职责。

original: Seize them. Their blood will be a good sacrifice for [Root.GetDWDevil].
translation: 抓住他们。他们的血将是供奉[Root.GetDWDevil]的不错祭品。

original: Knock them out from behind, they will make for a good sacrifice.
translation: 把他们从后面赶出去，他们会成为很棒的祭品。

original: Kill them, dead men tell no tales.
translation: 杀了他们，死人最能保守秘密。

original: Let them live, if they speak it shall only serve to spread the glory.
translation: 让他们活下去，他们要讲述今晚的事情，将有助于传扬我主的荣耀。

original: Avoid them, no need for the extra risk.
translation: 避开他们，不需要冒额外的风险。

original: As my [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] approach the [desecration_holder.Religion.GetPriestTitle] they call out for help and grab a nearby candelabra. Within short notice a small group of priests come rushing into the room and a melee breaks out around me.
translation: 当我的[Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural]接近这群[desecration_holder.Religion.GetPriestTitle]时，他们大声求救并抓起附近的烛台。不一会儿，一小群教士便冲进了房间与我们展开战斗。

original: As my [Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural] approach [desecration_holder.GetTitledFirstName] [desecration_holder.GetSheHe] calls out for help and grabs a nearby candelabra. Within short notice a small group of their comrades come rushing into the room and a melee breaks out around us.
translation: 当我的[Root.GetReligionWarriorPlural]接近[desecration_holder.GetTitledFirstName]时，[desecration_holder.GetSheHe]大声求救并抓起附近的烛台。不一会儿，一伙他们的同伴便冲进了房间与我们展开战斗。

original: To arms! For [Root.GetDWDevil]!
translation: 准备战斗！为了[Root.GetDWDevil]！

original: Retreat!
translation: 撤退！

original: Navigating our way through the small [desecration_holder.GetHouseOfWorship] I and my companions have entered the small room that goes for the inner sanctum. The room contains the sparsest possible honorings to [desecration_holder.Religion.GetHighGodName] and a scant few decorative idols and relics. The state of this place shows clearly the superiority of our cause!
translation: 我和我的同伴穿过[desecration_holder.GetHouseOfWorship]进入了那间小房子并进到了隐秘的圣所。这间房子有着可能对[desecration_holder.Religion.GetHighGodName]最淡薄的敬意和极其稀少的用于装饰的神像和圣物。这地方的情况显然体现了我们事业的优越性！

original: Making our way through the [desecration_holder.GetHouseOfWorship] I and my companions enter the inner sanctum with its relics and religious idols. A small treasure in both the spiritual and material worlds lies before us. Such a rich and holy place will be most fitting for our dark deeds.
translation: 穿过[desecration_holder.GetHouseOfWorship]，我和我的同伴们进入放有遗物和宗教偶像的圣所。一小部分有精神和物质价值的宝物出现在我们面前。毫无疑问，这样一个富有且神圣的地方，将十分契合我们做出的黑暗行径。

original: Having penetrated the defenses of the impressive [desecration_holder.GetHouseOfWorship] I and my companions have entered the inner sanctum and are preparing for the desecration ritual. The walls are covered in rich tapestries and holy relics and idols are strewn across the room. It is undoubtedly a place of both wealth and piety, perfect for our cause!
translation: 穿过[desecration_holder.GetHouseOfWorship]令人印象深刻的防御工事，我和同伴进入圣所开始为亵渎仪式做准备。这个房间墙上挂满了华丽的挂毯和各种圣物以及圣像。毫无疑问，这是一个充满财富和虔诚的地方，对我们的事业来说是完美的！

original: I will take the most expensive relics for myself!
translation: 我自己拿走最贵重的遗物！

original: I will use the most holy in the rites of desecration!
translation: 我将在亵渎的仪式中使用最神圣的圣物！

original: These relics shall be put to better use. My use.
translation: 这些圣物将为我所用

original: Burn it all in the name of [Root.GetDWDevil]!
translation: 以[Root.GetDWDevil]的名义将其全部烧毁！

original: As the clamor of battle my faithful and I exit the [desecration_holder.GetHouseOfWorship] having completed our ritual of desecration. The holiness of the place will be tainted for years to come.
translation: 随着战斗的喧嚣，完成亵渎仪式后我的忠诚卫士和我离开了[desecration_holder.GetHouseOfWorship]。这个地方的神圣性将在未来几年内受到玷污。

original: The night is silent as we exit the [desecration_holder.GetHouseOfWorship], our foul rites making sure that the holiness of the place is tainted for years to come.
translation: 当我们离开[desecration_holder.GetHouseOfWorship]时，夜晚是寂静的，我们的肮脏仪式确保了这个地方的神圣性在未来几年内受到玷污。

original: [Root.GetDWDevil] will be pleased.
translation: [Root.GetDWDevil]会高兴的。

original: Dark deeds done in secret.
translation: 黑暗的行为要秘密行事。

original: Though I may suffer for now, no earthly ailment is beyond the power of [Root.GetDWDevil]. I am preparing a great ritual to cleanse my body and become like new.
translation: 虽然我现在可能遭受痛苦，但尘世的疾病在[Root.GetDWDevil]的权能面前不值一提。我正在准备一个伟大的仪式来净化我的身体，使它变得焕然一新。

original: [Root.GetDWDevil] may take, and [Root.GetDWDevil] may give.
translation: [Root.GetDWDevil]可能会索取，[Root.GetDWDevil]也可能会给予。

original: As the ritual is being finished I can feel my strength returning to me, purging the weakness that has been holding my body in a vice.
translation: 随着仪式的结束，我能感觉到我的力量回到了我的身体，消弭了我身体的缺陷。

original: The light! The light! Thank [Root.GetDWDevil], I can see again!
translation: 那束光！那束光！感谢[Root.GetDWDevil]，我又能看见了！

original: A miracle! My sword has returned to me! If this is not proof of the power of [Root.GetDWDevil] I do not know what is!
translation: 一个奇迹！我的「剑」回来了！如果这都不能证明[Root.GetDWDevil]力量的伟大，我不知道什么还能证明！

original: What power [Root.GetDWDevil] displays! The pain of regrowth is immense, but I am restored!
translation: [Root.GetDWDevil]展示了多大的威能啊！恢复过程中的痛苦是巨大的，但我仍然恢复了。

original: The blessings of [Root.GetDWDevil] courses through my veins, and I can already feel the filth of disease being forced from my body!
translation: [Root.GetDWDevil]的祝福在我体内流动，我可以感受到疾病已经被驱离了我的身体！

original: [Root.GetDWDevil] has found me unworthy. I have been so loyal, so devout, yet I still suffer under these afflictions! Why, oh why, powerful [Root.GetDWDevil]?
translation: [Root.GetDWDevil]发现我是个没有价值的废物，我如此忠诚，如此虔诚，我现在还在忍受那些折磨！为什么，为什么我不行？全能的[Root.GetDWDevil]啊！

original: I feel the power of [Root.GetDWDevil] course through me, closing wounds and knitting bone back together. I am blessed.
translation: 我感觉到[Root.GetDWDevil]的力量穿过了我，缝合伤口和连接骨头。我被祝福了。

original: I feel the power of [Root.GetDWDevil] course through me, but it seems that my offering was not enough to cure me completely.
translation: 我感觉到[Root.GetDWDevil]的力量穿过了我，但好像我提供的祭品并不能使我完全康复。

original: All will be as [Root.GetDWDevil] desires.
translation: 一切都如[Root.GetDWDevil]所愿。

original: By using their dark magic devil worshipers can heal themselves, sometimes from the most grievous injuries.
translation: 通过使用黑魔法，撒旦教徒们可以从最严重的伤势中治愈自己。

translation: 亵渎一座神殿

translation: 如果我们有着相同的信仰，我相信§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!会很高兴……

original: I am impressed with the language and customs of my liege. I wish I were like that...
translation: 我对我领主的语言和习俗印象深刻。我希望我也是那样……

original: You have become Pagan and are therefore no longer allowed to continue playing without the The Old Gods expansion.
translation: 你的信仰转变为原始信仰，但是没有「逝往神灵」扩展包，因此不允许继续游戏。

original: Going along the teachings of [Root.Society.GetName] I have decided to donate a portion of my wealth to those who need it better.

translation: 堕落操纵者

original: Attempt to negatively influence §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s personality, increasing [Root.GetHerHis] opinion of you by §G50§! upon success. Failure might tarnish your reputation, though...\n
translation: 试图玷污§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!的人格。如若成功，增加[Root.GetHerHis]好感 §G50§!；若是失败，你怕不是会名誉不保……\n

original: Corrupt [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]
translation: 使[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]堕落

original: Corrupt §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! for material gains and [From.GetDWDevil]'s appreciation. This might have repercussions upon your soul!
translation: 使§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!堕落，开始追求物质利益和[From.GetDWDevil]的欣赏。这可能对你的灵魂产生影响！

original: No person lives a life entirely devoid of sin, and neither does [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]. I just have to find some traits of [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] character that I can build on...
translation: 没有人的生活可以与原罪绝缘，[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]同样如此。我只需要找到[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis]个性中可以利用的地方……

original: I'll turn [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] guilty pleasures into vices!
translation: 我会把[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis]这种罪恶的爱好转化为恶习！

original: Send people to find out whether §Y[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]§! has any character traits that could develop into vices.\n
translation: 派人去找找§Y[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!角色特质中有什么能加以利用让他产生恶习的。\n

original: I'm sure [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]'s not quite as virtuous as [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] pretends to be!
translation: 我相信[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]其实并没有[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]表现出来的那么高尚！

original: Send people to find out whether §Y[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]§! has any virtues [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] might not whole-heartedly believe in.\n
translation: 派人去找找§Y[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!是否有什么[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]并非真心相信的美德。\n

original: No, I don't think this is productive.
translation: 不，我不认为这是有效的。

original: Give up your attempt at corrupting §Y[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 放弃你诱惑§Y[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!堕落的计划。\n

original: My agents have proved their worth! It would appear that [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] has a liking for the pleasures of the flesh. A night of debauchery could well turn [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] secret liking into a publicly-known love. I shall write the invitation...
translation: 我的手下立功了！看起来 [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]沉溺于肉体的欲望。一夜放荡就可以让[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis]小秘密人尽皆知。我要开始写邀请函了……

original: My agents have uncovered rumors that [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] rather enjoys his feasts. Introducing [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] to new, exotic flavors might fuel [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] appetite even further. I shall write the invitation...
translation: 我的手下发现有流言称[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]沉溺于举办宴会。让[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim]享受罕见的异国风情酒宴可能进一步加深[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis]欲望。我要开始写邀请函了……

original: Thorough investigation has revealed [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] rather likes [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] gold. I wonder if [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] is a gambling [corrupt_priest_target.GetManWoman]? I shall write the invitation...
translation: 深入调查发现[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]执着于[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis]金钱。看起来[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]似乎是个赌徒[corrupt_priest_target.GetManWoman]？我要开始写邀请函了…

original: It would seem that [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] is somewhat bothered by the hassles of ruling. I could show [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] how much more enjoyable it is to do nothing, instead. I shall write the invitation...
translation: 看起来[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]有点苦恼于执政的艰难。我可以告诉[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim]什么都不做是一件多么享受的事情。我要开始写邀请函了……

original: [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] apparently has problems coming to terms with [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] not having what [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] neighbor has. Perhaps I can convince [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] of how right [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] feelings are over a banquet. I shall write the invitation...
translation: 看起来[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]因为[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis]邻居有某些他没有的东西而陷入了苦恼。或许我能在一场酒宴上让[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim]确信[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis]感受是完全正当的。我要开始写邀请函了……

original: My agents met with several of [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s courtiers, who all spoke of barely-suppressed outbursts of anger on the part of their [corrupt_priest_target.GetLordLady]. I should speak with [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName] and convince [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] to henceforth let it all out, instead. I shall write the invitation...
translation: 我的手下接触了[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]的几个廷臣，他们都提到他们的[corrupt_priest_target.GetLordLady]好几次勉强才压制住失控的情绪。我需要和[corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName]谈谈并说服[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim]今后任由自己的情绪爆发出来。我要开始写邀请函了……

original: [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] seems to quite enjoy flattery and praise. I could organize a celebration in [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] honor, affirming [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] has reason to be haughty. I shall write the invitation...
translation: [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]似乎很喜欢奉承和赞美。我可以举办一场庆典向[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis]崇高表达敬意，确保[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]有理由傲慢下去。我要开始写邀请函了……

original: [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s court appears to be in a mild state of confusion. [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName] seems to have a penchant for telling minor lies and watching the confusion that ensues. I should invite [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] and show [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] how much more rewarding the bigger lies are. I shall write the invitation...
translation: [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]的宫廷看起来处于轻微的混乱状态。[corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName]似乎有撒个小谎并观察随之而来的混乱的爱好。我应该告知[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim]欺骗更多的人能带来多大的乐趣。我要开始写邀请函了……

original: My agents have revealed that [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] is not always equally just in his judgments. If [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] were to visit and judge some of my criminals, I could encourage [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] to judge based on appearance and whim. I shall write the invitation...
translation: 我的手下发现[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]在他判案时并不总是那么公正。如果[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]能够来访并审问一些我的犯人，我就可以怂恿[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim]按照表象和心情随意审判。我要开始写邀请函了……

original: [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s courtiers have learned not to walk too closely by [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] at the top of the staircase. [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHeCap] seems to quite enjoy them getting hurt. I'm sure [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] would like to see my torture chamber! I shall write the invitation...
translation: [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]的廷臣不敢在走到楼梯尽头时与[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim]走得太近。[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHeCap]似乎很享受他们担惊受怕的样子。我确信[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]会喜欢我的拷问室的！我要开始写邀请函了……

original: ...and hope my ploy succeeds.
translation: ……希望我的策略能够成功。

original: Attempt to corrupt §Y[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 尝试诱惑§Y[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!堕落。\n

original: ...and beseech [corrupt_priest_spell_caster.GetDWDevil] to empower me!
translation: ……祈求[corrupt_priest_spell_caster.GetDWDevil]赐予我力量！

original: §Y[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]§! cannot possibly stand against [corrupt_priest_spell_caster.GetDWDevil]!\n
translation: §Y[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!无法抵挡[corrupt_priest_spell_caster.GetDWDevil]的力量！\n

original: ...and coat my words in honey.
translation: ……用我的花言巧语。

original: Well-chosen words will likely have a better effect on §Y[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 甜言蜜语似乎对§Y[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!能起更好作用。\n

original: ...and use my knowledge of [corrupt_priest_spell_caster.Religion.GetScriptureName] to convince [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim].
translation: ……用我有关[corrupt_priest_spell_caster.Religion.GetScriptureName]的知识来说服[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim]。

original: With well-founded arguments §Y[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]§! will likely see the reason in my words.\n
translation: 严密的论证可能使§Y[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!认同我口中的原因。\n

original: The raunchy nights of pleasure and debauchery I hosted at my court for [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] seem to have truly freed [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] from [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] remaining inhibitions. [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHeCap] is most thankful to me for showing [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] needs not be ashamed of pursuing pleasure.
translation: 我为[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]在我宫廷中举办的欲望与放纵的狂欢之夜看起来真的把[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim]从[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis]残余的矜持中解脱了出来。[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHeCap]向我表达了由衷的感激之情，因为我让[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]明白不需要因追求快乐而感到羞愧。

original: The lavish feast to which I invited [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] have paid off, and [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] has already started to consume vast quantities of the delicacies I introduced [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] to. Before [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] left, [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] made sure I understood how grateful [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] was for the experience.
translation: 我为邀请[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]而准备的奢华盛宴已经得到了回报，[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]沉溺于我向[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim]介绍的山珍海味之中。在[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]离开前，[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]不无激动地告诉我[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]是有多享受这次美食的盛宴。

original: During our games of chance [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] struggled more and more to hide [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] fondness for the gold coins on the table. With some well-placed words I managed to make [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] come to terms with [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] greed. Letting [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName] win most of the games ensured [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] left both thankful and in high spirits.
translation: 在我们游戏的过程中[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]越发难以隐藏对台面上金币的喜爱。通过某些精心设计的对话，我把[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim]内心的贪婪逐渐激发出来。我让[corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName]赢了大部分对局，[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]又感激又兴奋。

original: Over the past few days [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] and I did almost every conceivable thing... except managing a court. I have never seen [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] happier, and [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] seemed most excited to spend less time ruling and more time enjoying life.
translation: 在过去的几天中，[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]和我做了几乎所有我们可以想到的事情……除了管理朝政。我从没见过[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim]如此快乐，比起工作[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]似乎更乐衷于花更多的时间享受。

original: As we feasted I subtly directed the conversation towards [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s neighbor. Through carefully-dropped hints I convinced [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName] that [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] does indeed rightfully covet much that is owned by others. The reinforcing effect this had on [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] envy has already become very clear.
translation: 当我们在享用盛宴之时，我巧妙地把话题转移到了[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]的邻里关系上。通过不经意地提示，我说服[corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName]相信[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]确实对很多属于他人的东西有着正当地渴求。很明显这对[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis]心中的嫉妒产生了极大的增强。

original: I slipped some coins to a servant in return for him bumping into [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] in a hallway during [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] visit. Only a few words from me were needed to unleash [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName]'s anger upon the servant. [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHeCap] afterwards confessed to me how liberating it was to let out [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] anger, and was most grateful I helped [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] to discover this.
translation: 在[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]访问期间，我塞给仆人一些钱，让他在走廊上撞到[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis]身上。只需寥寥数语，我就能激发[corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName]对仆人的愤怒。[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHeCap]后来向我坦言发泄出[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis]怒火是多么的解脱，并且非常感谢我帮助[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim]发现了这一点。

original: Over the course of the celebrations [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s ego inflated like a bloated cow. [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHeCap] has already become insufferable to be around, but at least [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] was exceedingly grateful that I 'finally recognized [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] greatness'...
translation: 在庆祝活动过程中，[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]自我膨胀得像一头臃肿的母牛。周围的人已经无法忍受[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHeCap]，但至少[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]非常高兴，因为我终于「意识到了[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis]伟大」……

original: As we feasted, I eventually subtly turned the conversation to the small lies [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] uses for [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] amusement. We discussed how [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe], by using [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] talent for lies, could reap far greater rewards than mere 'amusement'. Thoughtfully, [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName] agreed, and [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] was most thankful to me for opening [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] eyes.
translation: 酒过三巡，我终于巧妙地转变话题，劝[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]用撒谎为自己解闷逗乐。我们讨论了[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]如何通过利用[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis]撒谎的天赋，获得比单纯的「娱乐」更大的回报。思考之后，[corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName]同意了，[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]非常感谢我开拓了[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis]视野。

original: With my calm support [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] began to visibly enjoy sentencing people based on, for instance, their appearance, or the first sentence of their defense. A grateful [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName] afterwards told me [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] far preferred this over the tedious process of listening to lengthy explanations...
translation: 有了我从容的支持，显然[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]开始享受依据如人们的外表，或自辩的第一句话，来下达判决。后来[corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName]充满感激地告诉我，比起听取乏味的漫长辩解，[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]极其偏爱现在这种方式。

original: [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] and I had a lot of fun in the dungeons. The prisoners, not so much. Both [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName] and I discovered a new side of [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] that was quite... unsettling. Not that it detracted from his gratitude.
translation: 我和[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]在地牢里体会到了不少乐趣，但囚犯们就不是那样了。在这过程中我和[corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName]都发现[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim]其实有着相当……令人不安的一面。但这并没有减少他对我的感激之情。

original: It seems that liberating [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] from [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] virtue has had unforeseen effects... Having finally discovered what [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] has missed out on for all these years, [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName] has sunk headlong into utter depravity.
translation: 把[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]从[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis]美德中解脱出来的努力十分有效……[corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName]终于发现这些年来自己错过了许多乐趣，[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]已经彻底堕落了。

original: The things I do for [corrupt_priest_spell_caster.GetDWDevil]...
translation: 为[corrupt_priest_spell_caster.GetDWDevil]效劳……

original: [corrupt_priest_spell_caster.GetDWDevil] will surely bless me!\n
translation: [corrupt_priest_spell_caster.GetDWDevil]肯定会保佑我！\n

original: I am [corrupt_priest_spell_caster.GetDWDevil]'s greatest servant!
translation: 我是[corrupt_priest_spell_caster.GetDWDevil]最伟大的仆人！

original: [corrupt_priest_spell_caster.GetDWDevil] will surely bless me greatly!\n
translation: [corrupt_priest_spell_caster.GetDWDevil]一定会尽全力保佑我！\n

original: Despite my best efforts, one misplaced word was all that was needed for [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] to take offense from my suggestion. [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHeCap] stormed out of the room indignantly, and what's far worse, [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] outed my supposed 'wickedness' to everyone!
translation: 尽管我尽了最大的努力，一言不合[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]就对我的提议动怒了。[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHeCap]愤慨地冲出了房间，更糟的是[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]把我认为的「罪恶」暴露给了所有人！

original: Oh no...
translation: 哦不……

original: People will not be happy to hear this...\n
translation: 人们不会乐意听到这个……\n

original: A lingering touch here, slightly too long a glance there... [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] might not be entirely as chaste as [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] pretends to be. I have just the servant for [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] to meet. I shall write the invitation...
translation: 那缠绵的触碰，那长长的凝视……[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName][corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]或许只是在假作忠贞。[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim]真应该见见我的仆人。我将寄出邀请信……

original: Some of [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s servants reportedly saw [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] sneak into the kitchen at night to enjoy some leftovers. If I could speak to [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName] in private I am sure I could convince [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] there is no need for secrecy on these matters. Perhaps [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] would like to visit my court? I shall write the invitation...
translation: 据说[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]的几个佣人看见[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim]在晚上偷偷潜入厨房享用一些残羹剩饭。如果我能私下跟[corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName]谈谈，我确信我可以说服[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim]没必要在这些事情上保密。或许[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]会愿意造访我的宫廷？我要开始写邀请函了……

original: [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] at times seems almost reluctant to give to others. With a good example [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] could be acquainted with the joys of keeping wealth to yourself. I shall write the invitation...
translation: [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]有时似乎不情愿给予他人。只要有好的榜样，[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]就会体会到独享财富的快乐。我要开始写邀请函了……

original: It's almost as if [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] works hard because [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] has been taught to, and not because [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] believes [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] should. I should show [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] that it is alright not to be a slave to hard work. I shall write the invitation...
translation: [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]之所以努力工作似乎是因为别人教导[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]这么做，而不是[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]真的相信[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]应该这么做。我要让[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim]明白用不着学奴隶做苦工，我要开始写邀请函了……

original: Occasionally [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s smiles and gentle words seem rather forced. With some help I am sure [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] could come to understand that one does not always need to be all smiles with everyone. I shall write the invitation...
translation: [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]的笑意和温柔的话语有时似乎是强装的。相信在我的帮助下，[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]会明白一个人并不总是要对他人笑脸相迎。我要开始写邀请函了……

original: Regular sighs and long, annoyed pauses give away that [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] isn't as patient as is widely thought. Keeping all that frustration pent up inside cannot be healthy. I shall write the invitation...
translation: [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]时常叹气，那漫长且恼人的沉默暴露出他并不像大家认为的那样有耐心。将挫败感压抑在心中可不是健康的生活方式。我要开始写邀请函了……

original: At times, when [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] does not receive his due credit, my agents report it almost seems as if [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] is about to speak up. I will show [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] how it feels to be recognized! I shall write the invitation...
translation: 我的手下报告，当[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]没有受到应有的赞誉时，[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]几度想要畅所欲言。我会告诉[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim]被人赏识的体验！我要开始写邀请函了……

original: Honesty has more than once gotten [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] into trouble. [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHeCap] should learn how to avoid it by using little white lies. I shall write the invitation...
translation: 诚实的特质不止一次使[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]陷入麻烦。[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHeCap]应该学会利用谎言保护自己。我要开始写邀请函了……

original: [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] has allegedly voiced [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] annoyance that being just is so time-consuming. Surely I can make [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName] see how cutting a few corners could save [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] a lot of time. I shall write the invitation...
translation: 据[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]所说，[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis]烦躁是因为秉公执法太耗时了。显然，我能让[corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName]明白敷衍了事能为[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim]节省大量时间。我要开始写邀请函了……

original: ...and hope my ploy succeeds.
translation: ……希望我的策略能够成功。

original: Attempt to corrupt §Y[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 尝试使§Y[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!堕落。\n

original: ...and beseech [corrupt_priest_spell_caster.GetDWDevil] to empower me!
translation: ……祈求[corrupt_priest_spell_caster.GetDWDevil]赐予我力量！

original: §Y[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]§! cannot possibly stand against [corrupt_priest_spell_caster.GetDWDevil]!\n
translation: §Y[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!无法抵挡[corrupt_priest_spell_caster.GetDWDevil]的力量！\n

original: ...and coat my words in honey.
translation: ……用我的花言巧语。

original: Well-chosen words will likely have a better effect on §Y[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 甜言蜜语似乎对§Y[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!能起更好作用。\n

original: ...and use my knowledge of the [corrupt_priest_spell_caster.Religion.GetScriptureName] to convince [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim].
translation: ……用我有关[corrupt_priest_spell_caster.Religion.GetScriptureName]的知识来说服[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim]。

original: With well-founded arguments §Y[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]§! will likely see the reason in my words.\n
translation: 严密的论证可能使§Y[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!能够认同我口中的原因。\n

original: I saw [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s glances at the servant during our conversation. With a few encouraging words I got them to seclude themselves, and [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName] returned a changed [corrupt_priest_target.GetManWoman]. [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHeCap] was most pleased with my support!
translation: 在谈话中，我看到[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]向仆人瞥了一眼。在我的几句鼓励之下，他们俩半推半就进了房间。回来的时候[corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName]整个人都不一样了。[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHeCap]对我的支持感到高兴。

original: Having ensured that I caught [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] eating leftovers in the kitchen after our banquet, I managed to soothe [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] worries and convince [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim] there was no reason to continue to pretend to have a small appetite. Our next banquet was far more enjoyable...
translation: 当我确认抓到[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]在厨房里食用宴会中剩下的残羹冷炙后，我设法抚平[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis]担忧，让[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHim]明白没有必要继续伪装自己胃口很小。我们的下一次宴会将更加地愉快……

original: Using a display of wealth, I managed to convince [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] that sometimes money is of better use in one's own pockets. Thoroughly enticed by the prospect, [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] was most pleased someone had spoken so frankly to him on these matters.
translation: 在金钱的诱惑下，我成功使[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]确信有时金钱还是独享的好。被彻底诱惑的[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]十分高兴有人能使他直面自己的渴望。

original: I showed [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] by example that one can achieve things without working hard. [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName] truly seemed to enjoy the time spent at my court, and [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] has already resolved to spend less time working hard when [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] returns home.
translation: 我通过示例向[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]展示如何在不辛勤劳作的情况下有所收获。[corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName]看来确实很享受在我的宫廷度过的时光，[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]已经决定在[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]回家后不再花时间辛勤工作。

original: The servant I had bribed continued his insolence for hours, before [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s kindness finally broke. We had a good long discussion afterwards, and [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] finally understood that some people are simply not deserving of kindness. [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHeCap] was most thankful to me for opening [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] eyes.
translation: 我贿赂的仆人的傲慢无礼持续了好几个小时，终于[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]的好脾气耗尽了。后来我们进行了长时间的讨论，[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]终于明白有些人根本不值得善待。[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHeCap]非常感激我拓展了[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis]视野。

original: As I heard [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] sigh in frustration at the servant's incompetence, I gave the lad a piece of my mind. Before long, [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName]'s patience ended and [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] joined me in a display of our anger. [corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName] was incredibly grateful for the release, and seems to have done away with patience since.
translation: 当我听到[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]在为仆人的无能感到沮丧叹息时，我给这个小伙子分享了一点看法。不一会儿，[corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName]放弃了耐心，[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]和我一道发泄怒火。[corrupt_priest_target.GetFirstName]对这次发泄感到非常感激，而且似乎已经放弃了耐心。

original: All that was needed was to insist on giving [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] the credit that [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] was due. After some half-hearted attempts at avoiding it, [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] finally accepted the praise, and seems to have gotten a taste for recognition now.
translation: 我只需坚持给[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]一份[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]应有的赞誉。在一番欲拒还迎之后，[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]终于接受了赞誉，并且似乎已经尝到了受认可的滋味。

original: A simple demonstration of talking my way out of an embarrassing situation by using a small lie was enough to get [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] interested. With some explanation and reassurance that nobody would get hurt, [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe] seems to have finally abandoned [corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis] honesty.
translation: 我简单地演示使用一个小谎言摆脱尴尬的方法，引起了[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]的兴趣。我向[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]解释并保证没有人会受到伤害，[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHe]似乎最终放弃了[corrupt_priest_target.GetHerHis]诚实。

original: I showed [corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName] how quickly I judged some of the more bothersome criminals based on my intuition rather than a detailed examination of the facts. [corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHeCap] was most impressed, and has already started following my example!
translation: 我向[corrupt_priest_target.GetTitledFirstName]展示了如若基于直觉而非详查案情，处理那些棘手的案件可以有多快。这着实令[corrupt_priest_target.GetSheHeCap]印象深刻，并开始遵照我的方法了！

original: I am so altruistic!
translation: 我可真好心！

original: [corrupt_priest_spell_caster.GetDWDevil] will surely bless me!\n
translation: [corrupt_priest_spell_caster.GetDWDevil]肯定会保佑我！\n

original: Corrupt Priest
translation: 堕落教士

original: I will see to it!
translation: 我会去办的！

original: Unfortunately I cannot do so at this time.
translation: 不幸的是，我现在不能这样做。

original: Demonic Possession
translation: 恶魔附体

original: Attempt to possess §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! with a [From.GetDWDemon], making [Root.GetHerHim] fanatically loyal to you. This may have repercussions upon your soul!
translation: 尝试让[From.GetDWDemon]附身于§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!，让[Root.GetHerHim]狂热地忠诚于你。这可能会对你的灵魂产生影响！

original: Possession of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! has not already been attempted\n
translation: 尚未尝试过附身§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!\n

original: I will see to it!
translation: 我会去办的！

original: Unfortunately I cannot do so at this time.
translation: 不幸的是，我现在不能这样做。

original: In the middle of the night, I seclude myself in the room I have meticulously prepared for tonight's [Root.GetDWDarkMagic]. With every step of the ritual completed, the air in the room grows more and more oppressing, until finally I sense I am about to unleash a being of terrible power upon my unsuspecting foe.
translation: 午夜，我待在为今晚的[Root.GetDWDarkMagic]精心准备的房间里。随着仪式每一步的完成，房间里的空气越来越压抑，最后我感觉到我即将向毫无防备的敌人释放出一股可怕的力量。

original: Do it!
translation: 上吧！

original: Send out the being to take possession of §Y[possess_courtier_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!!\n
translation: 放出它来附身§Y[possess_courtier_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!！\n

original: No, I'll be merciful...
translation: 不，我会以慈悲为怀……

original: §Y[possess_courtier_target.GetTitledFirstName]§! will be none the wiser.\n
translation: §Y[possess_courtier_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!对此一无所知。\n

original: The ritual was a resounding success! [possess_courtier_target.GetTitledFirstName] seems to have taken quite a liking to me, and is now far more amenable to my suggestions. The unfortunate side effect is that [possess_courtier_target.GetSheHe] has become quite obviously... insane.
translation: 仪式完全成功了！[possess_courtier_target.GetTitledFirstName]变得更加喜欢我，并且更愿意接受我的建议了！但不幸的是，[possess_courtier_target.GetSheHe]显然变得有些……疯狂。

original: Exactly as planned.
translation: 正如计划好的一样。

original: Not everything has gone according to plan. Although something quite clearly seems to have taken up residence within [possess_courtier_target.GetTitledFirstName], whatever it is does not seem to be inclined to make [possess_courtier_target.GetFirstName] more loyal towards you...
translation: 并非一切都按计划进行。尽管明显有什么东西像似占据了[possess_courtier_target.GetTitledFirstName]的身体，但无论怎样它看起来好像都不能使[possess_courtier_target.GetFirstName]更忠诚于你……

original: Curses!
translation: 该死！

original: §Y[possess_courtier_target.GetTitledFirstName]§! retains [possess_courtier_target.GetHerHis] free will.\n
translation: §Y[possess_courtier_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!保留了[possess_courtier_target.GetHerHis]自由意志。\n

original: The ritual has failed completely. Whether [possess_courtier_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s mind proved too strong, or due to some other reason, the entity did not manage to take a hold of [possess_courtier_target.GetHerHim]. [possess_courtier_target.GetFirstName]'s mind has completely shattered in the process, however.
translation: 仪式完全失败了。不知道是因为[possess_courtier_target.GetTitledFirstName]的精神过于强大，还是由于其他原因，这个实体没有控制住[possess_courtier_target.GetHerHim]。而且，[possess_courtier_target.GetFirstName]的理智在整个过程中，已经完全崩溃了。

original: How... Unfortunate.
translation: 噢……倒霉。

original: §Y[possess_courtier_target.GetTitledFirstName]§! retains their free will, or what remains of it.\n
translation: §Y[possess_courtier_target.GetTitledFirstName]§!捍卫了他的自由意志——或者自由意志的遗骸。\n

original: Despite [possess_courtier_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s frequent bouts of madness, [possess_courtier_target.GetSheHe] has indeed been loyal so far. Which is why it comes as such a surprise to hear [possess_courtier_target.GetHerHis] characteristic cackling laughter behind you as cold steel sinks into your back.
translation: 尽管[possess_courtier_target.GetTitledFirstName]时不时发疯，但至今为止[possess_courtier_target.GetSheHe]一直忠心耿耿。所以听到[possess_courtier_target.GetHerHis]特色的咯咯笑在你背后响起，如同一把冰冷的利器插进你的后背时，你是如此地惊讶。

original: B-but you were so loyal!
translation: 但……但你曾如此忠心！

original: [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName]'s slothfulness has long been known in the Order, subjecting [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetHerHim] to its scorn. I could teach [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetHerHim] to set up a horarium to structure [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetHerHis] time, helping [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetHerHim] to work harder.
translation: [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap][benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName]的怠惰在修会中早就广为人知，这让[benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetHerHim]受到轻蔑。我可以教[benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetHerHim]建立一个日程表管理[benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetHerHis]时间，帮助[benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetHerHim]更加努力地工作。

original: Despite having been a part of the Order for a long time, [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName] still does not truly exemplify the Benedictine ideals of hard work and structure. I could teach [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetHerHim] to set up a horarium to structure [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetHerHis] time.
translation: 尽管长期以来都是修会的一份子，[benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap][benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName]仍然没有真正展出本笃会理想的勤劳和组织性。我可以教[benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetHerHim]设置一个时间表来安排好[benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetHerHis]时间。

original: I will, but [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetHerHis] first lesson must be that good things do not come for free.
translation: 我会做的，但是[benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetHerHis]第一件事就是学会天下没有免费的午餐这个道理。

original: Offer to help [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetTitledFirstName] in return for monetary compensation.\n
translation: 向[benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetTitledFirstName]主动提供帮助以换取金钱补偿。\n

original: No, [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSheHe] must find [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetHerHis] own way.
translation: 不，[benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSheHe]必须独立成长。

original: Do not help [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetTitledFirstName].\n
translation: 不帮助[benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetTitledFirstName]。\n

original:
Blessings to you, [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName],
Forgive me for writing so candidly, but your unfortunate lack of work ethic is putting our Order in a poor light. I propose to aid you to find structure and purpose in life. A minor form of compensation in return for my help would already go a long way to teaching you the value of hard work.

Signed, [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetFirstName]
translation:
祝你安好，[benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap][benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName]，
原谅我写得如此坦白，但是很不幸你缺乏职业道德使我们的修会处于弱势。我提议帮助你找到生活中的安排和目标。作为对我的帮助的回报，小小的补偿形式对教会你辛勤工作的价值很有帮助。

此致，[benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetSisterBrotherCap][benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetFirstName]

original:
Blessings to you, [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName],
I have observed your attempts at following the Rule of Saint Benedict, and I noticed you could do with some help. Allow me to offer mine. However, the first lesson must be that nothing in life is obtained without cost, and a minor form of compensation would therefore be required.

Signed, [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetFirstName]
translation:
祝你安好，[benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap][benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName]，
我观您遵循圣本笃的规则，并且注意到您要帮助才能做到。请允许我来指点您。但是，我给您的第一堂课就是人生中一切都是有代价的，因此我需要一点小小的补偿。

此致，[benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetSisterBrotherCap][benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetFirstName]

original: [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetSheHeCap] is right, I could use the help...
translation: [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetSheHeCap]没错，我可以接受他的帮助……

original: How dare [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetSheHe]?!
translation: [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetSheHe]竟敢？！

original: I don't need [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetHerHis] help.
translation: 我不需要[benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetHerHis]帮助。

original:
Blessings to you, [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetFirstName],
I thank you for your offer of help, and I send to you the requested payment alongside this message. I look forward to your guidance!

Signed, [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName]
translation:
祝你安好，[benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetSisterBrotherCap][benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetFirstName]，
感谢您提供的帮助，我已随信寄送您所要求的报酬。期待着您的指导！

此致，[benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap][benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName]

original: Excellent, let us begin...
translation: 很好，让我们开始……

original: Help [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetTitledFirstName] to become a hard worker.\n
translation: 帮助[benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetTitledFirstName]成为一个勤劳的人。\n

original: With patient dedication [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetTitledFirstName] has shown me how to create a horarium to assign my time appropriately, making it easier to structure the work I do. It has already proven to be most useful, and work comes more easily to me now.
translation: [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetTitledFirstName]通过耐心努力向我展示了如何创建一个时间表来适当地分配我的时间，使我更容易安排我所做的工作。它已被证明非常有用，现在工作对我来说更容易了。

original: [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetFirstName] is a gift from the Lord himself!
translation: [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetSisterBrotherCap][benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetFirstName]是上帝亲赐的礼物！

original: With some help and ample amounts of discipline the horarium [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetFirstName] helped me create has allowed me to defeat my laziness. Hard work is so much more fulfilling!
translation: 随着一些帮助和严明的纪律，[benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetSisterBrotherCap][benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetFirstName]帮我战胜我的怠惰，辛勤工作使人充实！

original: [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetFirstName]'s horarium was exactly what I needed to truly live up to the ideals of our Order.
translation: 要真正实现我们修会的理念，[benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetSisterBrotherCap][benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetFirstName]的时间表是必需的。

original: Hard work is its own reward.
translation: 努力工作本身就是报偿。

original:
[benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetFirstName].
I am most offended by your insinuation that I embarrass the Order. I neither need nor desire your aid, and I would not think to pay you for it even if I did. Perhaps you should focus on your own work rather than stick your nose in others' affairs.

Signed, [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName]
translation:
[benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetSisterBrotherCap][benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetFirstName]。
你暗示我让修会蒙羞，我感到非常冒犯。我既不需要也不希望得到你的帮助，就算我接受了，我也不会为你付出代价。或许你应该专注于自己的工作，而不是把自己的注意力放在别人的事情上。

此致，[benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap][benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName]

original:
Blessings to you, [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetFirstName],
I thank you for your offer of help, but I do not feel that it is necessary at this point.

Signed, [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName]
translation:
祝你安好，[benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetSisterBrotherCap][benedictines_diligent_mentor.GetFirstName]。
我感谢你提供的帮助，但我不认为这是必要的。

此致，[benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap][benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName]

original: This is... Unfortunate.
translation: 这可真是……不幸。

original: Very well.
translation: 很好。

original: [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetTitledFirstName] has rejected my offer of help.
translation: [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝了我的帮助。

original: The horarium I helped [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName] create has worked wonders. [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSheHeCap] has bettered [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetHerHis] ways, and now works hard like a true Benedictine!
translation: 我帮助[benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap][benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName]制定的礼拜日程表发挥了惊人的作用。现在，[benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSheHeCap]改善了[benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetHerHis]方式，能够像一个真正的本笃会僧侣一样努力工作。

original: With the aid of the new horarium I helped [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetHerHim] make, [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName] has become a proper hard worker.
translation: 我帮助[benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetHerHim]制作的日程表使[benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap][benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName]成为了真正勤奋的人。

original: [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap] [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName] is now truly one of us.
translation: [benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetSisterBrotherCap][benedictines_diligent_mentee.GetFirstName]现在真正成为我们的一员。

original: Outraged
translation: 激怒

original: Owns at least $VAL|Y$ artifacts (currently: $CUR$)
translation: 拥有至少 $VAL|Y$ 件宝物（当前：$CUR$）

original: Owns less than $VAL|Y$ artifacts (currently: $CUR$)
translation: 拥有少于 $VAL|Y$ 件宝物（当前：$CUR$）

original: All Artifacts
translation: 所有宝物

original: Adds $ARTIFACT|Y$ to the treasury of $CHAR|Y$\n
translation: 将$ARTIFACT|Y$加入$CHAR|Y$的宝库\n

original: The quality of $WHAT|Y$ is $COMP|Y$ than $VAL|Y$
translation: $WHAT|Y$的品质$COMP|Y$ $VAL|Y$

original: The quality of $WHAT|Y$ is §RNOT§! $COMP|Y$ than $VAL|Y$
translation: $WHAT|Y$的品质§R不§!$COMP|Y$ $VAL|Y$

original: $WHAT|Y$ has the flag "$FLAG|Y$"
translation: $WHAT|Y$拥有旗标「$FLAG|Y$」

original: $WHAT|Y$ does not have the flag "$FLAG|Y$"
translation: $WHAT|Y$没有旗标「$FLAG|Y$」

original: Is active
translation: 激活

original: Inactive
translation: 无效

original: Some Artifacts have Conditions that must be fulfilled before granting its holder its effects.
translation: 一些宝物在授予持有者其效果之前必须满足条件。

original: $HOLDER|Y$ accepts the mission $WHAT|Y$.\n $DESC$
translation: $HOLDER|Y$接受任务$WHAT|Y$。\n$DESC$

original: $HOLDER|Y$ completes the mission "$WHAT|Y$" successfully
translation: $HOLDER|Y$成功完成任务「$WHAT|Y$」

original: $HOLDER|Y$ fails the mission "$WHAT|Y$"
translation: $HOLDER|Y$未能完成任务「$WHAT|Y$」

original: $HOLDER|Y$ accepts the mission $WHAT|Y$ targeting $TARGET|Y$. $DESC$
translation: $HOLDER|Y$接受针对$TARGET|Y$的任务$WHAT|Y$。$DESC$

original: Clears target of $WHAT|Y$ for $HOLDER|Y$

translation: 拥有少于 $VAL|Y$ 个任务（当前：$CUR$个）

original: Hunting enemies

original: §Y[This.GetBestName]§! has NOT been discovered as a member of a secret society [This.GetSheHe] is a part of
translation: §Y[This.GetBestName]§!所参加的秘密社团尚未被发现

translation: 一个秘密社团

translation: 社团

translation: 被发现的秘密社团

translation: 社团任务目标

translation: $NAME|Y$在$LIEGE|Y$位于$LOCATION|Y$的宫廷中进行$ACTION|Y$

original: In $LIEGE|Y$'s court of $WHERE|Y$ to $ACTION|Y$
translation: 在$LIEGE|Y$位于$WHERE|Y$的宫廷进行$ACTION|Y$

original: Threat Decay Speed
translation: 威胁度衰减速度

translation: §R没有军队§!

original: Focus on sieging enemy counties
translation: 专注于围攻敌国省份

original: Council Consideration
translation: 内阁审议

original: §GYes§!
translation: §G赞成§!

original: §RNo§!
translation: §R反对§!

original: The council is currently considering:\n $LAW|Y$
translation: 内阁正在审议：\n$LAW|Y$

translation: $WHO|Y$会投$HOW$票给$WHAT|Y$

translation: $WHO|Y$投$HOW$票给$WHAT|Y$

translation: $WHO|Y$对$WHAT|Y$§Y意见不明§!

original: The council is currently voting on: $LAW|Y$
translation: 内阁正在投票表决：$LAW|Y$

original: Send the law for review by the council
translation: 让内阁评审法律

original: Grant §Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§! to §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
translation: 将§Y[ThirdPartyTitle.GetFullName]§!授予§Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!。

original: Imprison §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!.
translation: 监禁§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!。

original: Release §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!.
translation: 释放§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!。

original: Execute §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!.
translation: 处决§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!。

original: Banish §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!.
translation: 驱逐§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!。

original: Demand that §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§! embrace the §Y[Actor.Religion.GetName]§! faith.
translation: 要求§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!接受§Y[Actor.Religion.GetName]§!信仰。

original: Invite §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§! to court.
translation: 邀请§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!到宫廷。

original: Make §Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]§! subject to §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W.
translation: 使§Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetBestName]§!成为§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W的封臣。

original: Invite §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§! to join the plot §Y[Actor.GetPlot]§W.
translation: 邀请§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§!参与阴谋§Y[Actor.GetPlot]§W。

original: [This.GetBestName] will rank up from [This.GetSocietyRank] in [This.Society.GetNameCap] ( [This.Society.GetName] ) for a cost of 100 [This.Society.GetCurrency]
translation: [This.GetBestName]将消耗 100 [This.Society.GetCurrency]来从[This.Society.GetNameCap]（[This.Society.GetName]）的[This.GetSocietyRank]升阶。

original: I shall do a pilgrimage to one of the holy sites of the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith seeking enlightenment and purification.
translation: 我要去[Root.Religion.GetName]的一个圣地朝圣，希望能启迪心智，净化心灵。

original: I will start making travel plans.
translation: 我要开始规划行程了。

original: There are many places a devout [Root.Religion.GetName] might visit during a pilgrimage. They will undoubtedly all offer enlightenment but a closer location may make for a safer journey.
translation: 有很多地方等着虔诚的[Root.Religion.GetName]信徒去拜访朝圣。无疑它们都能提供神的启示，但是选择近一些的地点会让旅途更加安全。

original: I will go to Sarnath, where the Sanga was born.
translation: 我将前往鹿野苑，僧伽诞生之地

original: I will go to Bodh Gaya, where Buddha achieved enlightenment.
translation: 我将前往菩提伽耶，佛陀悟道之地。

original: I will go to the monasteries of Sanchi.
translation: 我将前往桑吉的庙宇。

original: There are many places a devout [Root.Religion.GetName] might visit during a pilgrimage. They will undoubtedly all offer enlightenment but a closer location may make for a safer journey.
translation: 有很多地方等着虔诚的[Root.Religion.GetName]信徒去拜访朝圣。无疑它们都能提供神的启示，但是选择近一些的地点会让旅途更加安全。

original: I will go to the white pond of Shravanabelegola.
translation: 我将去室罗伐拿白泽的白色池塘

original: I will travel to the mountain of Girnar.
translation: 我将前往吉尔纳尔山

original: I will go to Shikarji, where twenty of the tirthankaras achieved Moksha.
translation: 我将前往式佉罗时，那是二十名蒂尔丹嘉拉渡津者实现解脱的地方。

original: There are many places a devout [Root.Religion.GetName] might visit during a pilgrimage. They will undoubtedly all offer enlightenment but a closer location may make for a safer journey.
translation: 有很多地方等着虔诚的[Root.Religion.GetName]信徒去拜访朝圣。无疑它们都能提供神的启示，但是选择近一些的地点会让旅途更加安全。

original: I will go to the eternal city of Varanasi to cleanse myself at the ghats.
translation: 我将要去永恒之城波罗奈，在河坛边洗净我的灵魂。

original: I will travel to the mountain of Girnar.
translation: 我将前往吉尔纳尔山。

original: I will seek Mathura, the birthplace of Krishna.
translation: 我将探访秣菟罗，奎师那诞生之地。

original: My preparations are done and the time has come to begin my pilgrimage to Sarnath. Soon I shall experience the tranquility and enlightenment of the park in which the Buddha held his first lectures.
translation: 我已做好准备，该启程去鹿野苑的朝圣之旅了。不久我就会在佛陀第一次演法的苑囿里体验到宁静和启迪了。

original: My Journey Begins!
translation: 旅程开始！

original: My preparations are all done and it is now time to begin my pilgrimage for Bodh Gaya and the sacred Bodhi Tree.
translation: 我已经准备万全，是时候启程前往菩提耶伽朝拜菩提圣树了。

original: My Journey Begins!
translation: 旅程开始！

original: I have packed my things and made preparations for my household to make do without me. It is time to set out for Monasteries of Sanchi.
translation: 我收拾好我的东西，为我的家庭做好了离开我而生活的准备。是时候出发前往桑吉寺院了。

original: My Journey Begins!
translation: 旅程开始！

original: I have packed my things and made preparations for my household to make do without me. It is time to start my pilgrimage for Shravanabelagola.
translation: 我收拾好我的东西，为我的家庭做好了离开我而生活的准备。是时候开始我对室罗伐拿白泽的朝圣了。

original: My Journey Begins!
translation: 旅程开始！

original: I have packed my things and made preparations for my household to make do without me. It is time to start my pilgrimage for the ancient mountains of Girnar.
translation: 我收拾好我的东西，为我的家庭做好了离开我而生活的准备。是时候开始我对吉尔纳尔古山的朝圣了。

original: My Journey Begins!
translation: 旅程开始！

original: I have packed my things and made preparations for my household to make do without me. It is time to set out for the forest of Madhuban and the Shikarji peaks.
translation: 我收拾好我的东西，为我的家庭做好了离开我而生活的准备。是时候出发去摩度婆那蜜林与式佉罗时群峰了。

original: My Journey Begins!
translation: 旅程开始！

original: I have packed my things and made preparations for my household to make do without me. It is time to set out for the land of Braj and the twin cities of Mathura and Vrindavan.
translation: 我收拾好我的东西，为我的家庭做好了离开我而生活的准备。是时候出发去缚罗日之地与秣菟罗和勿邻陀林双城了。

original: My Journey Begins!
translation: 旅程开始！

original: I have packed my things and made preparations for my household to make do without me. It is time to set out for the ancient city of Varanasi. Soon I shall cleanse my body in the Ganges as generations have before me.
translation: 我收拾好我的东西，为我的家庭做好了离开我而生活的准备。是时候出发去古城波罗奈了。不久，我将如历代前辈一般在恒河中清洗我的身体。

original: My Journey Begins!
translation: 旅程开始！

original: [Root.GetTitledName] made a pilgrimage to Sarnath.
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]前往鹿野苑朝圣。

original: [Root.GetTitledName] made a pilgrimage to Bodh Gaya.
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]前往菩提伽耶朝圣。

original: [Root.GetTitledName] made a pilgrimage to Sanchi.
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]前往桑吉朝圣。

original: [Root.GetTitledName] made a pilgrimage to Shikarji.
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]前往式佉罗时朝圣。

original: [Root.GetTitledName] made a pilgrimage to Shravanabelagola.
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]前往室罗伐拿白泽朝圣。

original: [Root.GetTitledName] made a pilgrimage to Girnar.
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]前往吉尔纳尔山朝圣。

original: [Root.GetTitledName] made a pilgrimage to Varanasi.
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]前往波罗奈朝圣。

original: [Root.GetTitledName] made a pilgrimage to Mathura.
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]前往秣菟罗朝圣。

original: It is the season of the monsoon and rain is pouring down. Roads turn to mud and crops wash away. The life of a pilgrim can sometimes be a hard and arduous one.
translation: 现在正是雨季，雨水正倾泻而下。道路变得泥泞，庄稼被冲走了。朝圣者的生活有时是艰难而困苦的。

original: My faith will keep me strong and safe.
translation: 我的信仰会保佑我健全。

original: I regret setting out on this adventure.
translation: 我后悔开始了这次冒险。

original: The dry season is upon us and there is no water in sight. A pilgrim's life can sometimes harsh and unforgiving but it is clear this is taking a heavier toll on the villages I pass by than it does on me.
translation: 旱季就快到了，前方依然没有水的踪迹，朝圣者的生活有时是艰难而困苦的。但很明显我路过的村庄比我受的罪更大。

original: I must attempt to alleviate their suffering.
translation: 我必须试着减轻他们的痛苦。

original: Such is life in the dry season.
translation: 旱季的生活就是如此。

original: Any traveller would balk at the prospect of traversing hills and jungle but it was the shorter route. Emerging from the undergrowth however it is becoming increasingly clear that I have made a mistake. The road ahead is not necessarily as dangerous as what now lies behind, but it is quite clearly not the right road.
translation: 所有旅行者都会忽略穿越山丘和丛林的前路，但这条路是捷径。然而，从丛林下走出时，我越来越清楚我错了。前面的道路不一定像刚才走过的那样危险，但显然不是正确的道路。

original: I knew I shouldn't have trusted those locals!
translation: 我就知道不应该相信这些本地人！

original: I should have paid better attention to their instructions.
translation: 我本该更重视他们的指导的。

original: Let's explore this area and learn more about life in the jungle!
translation: 让我们探索这片地区，了解更多关于丛林中的生活！

original: A large group of mounted warriors block our way. The local Raja is a man that has taken it upon himself to relieve pilgrims, merchants or other travelers of some of their wealth in order to allow them passage. Turning back is not an option, either we pay or we will have to fight these men.
translation: 一大群骑马的士兵挡住我们的路。当地的罗阇是一个收买路财才能让朝圣者、商贾或其他旅人继续上路的恶霸。我们不愿回头，要么乖乖付钱，要么将不得不和这群人打一场。

original: Pay them their fee.
translation: 如数付钱。

original: We must defend what is ours!
translation: 我必须守住我们的东西！

original: It has been days since we last saw a settlement and deep forests surround us on all sides. The small road we have been following has all but disappeared in the thick undergrowth. As I look up I can make out a huge creature native to this jungle on the other side.
translation: 不见边际的密林环绕着我们，上次看到村庄已经是好几天以前了。我们一直沿着走的小路在厚厚的灌木下几乎消失了。当我抬起头时，我能看到对面有一头巨大的丛林野生动物。

original: Turn, and run!
translation: 掉头就跑！

original: I must fight this beast!
translation: 我必须和这只野兽斗一斗！

original: Since this journey began I have come to pass through many cities and villages. Few have been as poor as the settlement that now lies before us. Men, women and children live in such poverty that it is hard to see how they can endure, and yet... These are some of the happiest people I have ever come across!
translation: 自这段旅程开始以来，我到过许多城市和乡村。几乎没有现在比我眼前这个定居点更差的。男人，女人和儿童生活在这样的贫困中，很难看出他们是如何忍受的，然而……这些都是我见过的最幸福的人！

original: I can learn much from these villagers.
translation: 我可以从这些乡下人身上学到不少东西。

original: I will teach them about the ways of the real world!
translation: 我将要教导他们通往真实世界之路！

original: A pilgrimage is as much an inner adventure as it is a journey through the physical realm. As my goal grows ever closer the people I meet and the places I see has made me reflect and re-evaluate things I thought I knew about life.
translation: 同在现实中的旅行一样，朝圣也是一场心灵上的冒险。随着我接近目的地，所见所闻都让我开始反思我对人生的理解。

original: This is a marvelous opportunity.
translation: 这是一个绝好的机会。

original: It is time to rest.
translation: 是时候休息休息了。

original: As we looked for a place to set up camp at the end of a long day we stumbled across a sentry. Having examined our group he decided that we are harmless pilgrims and bid us to enter the camp of his master, a rich vaishya merchant of the southern trade guilds.
translation: 当我们寻找合适的地方建立营地以结束漫长的一天时，我们偶然发现了一个哨兵。在观察过我们的团队后，他判断我们是无害的朝圣者，并且让我们进入其主人的营地，面见这位南方贸易公会的富有吠舍商人。

original: I must thank them for their kindness.
translation: 我必须为他们的善良道谢。

original: They are only giving me what is my right.
translation: 他们只是把我应得的给我。

original: Everything seems to taste foul today. Was it the local cuisine or that night spent camping in a swamp? It is hard to say for sure but something is not right with this pilgrim...
translation: 今天吃什么都没胃口。是因为不习惯当地口味，还是因为昨夜在沼泽露营？我很难确定，不过这次朝圣之旅不是十分顺利……

original: A small offering and then I must continue onwards.
translation: 吃少一点，然后我必须继续前进。

original: It is time to rest and heal.
translation: 是时候休整一下了。

original: You come across a thriving city in the middle of a dry upland. The secret of their prosperity seems to be huge water tanks, built and maintained by the local Raja. A separate reservoir is also under construction to allow the city to grow even bigger. You stop to admire this feat of engineering and cannot help wondering how much a similar construction could benefit [Root.Capital.GetName].
translation: 你在干旱的高地上遇到了一座繁华的城市。他们繁荣的秘密似乎是由当地的罗阇建造和维护的巨大水箱。一座单独的水库正在建设中，以使这座城市更加繁荣壮大。你停下来欣赏这个工程的壮举，并不禁想知道一个类似的建筑可以为[Root.Capital.GetName]获得多少收益。

original: I must learn more about these reservoirs.
translation: 我一定要更深入了解这些水库。

original: Such a futile endeavor, rain falls where it wills.
translation: 这是无用功，雨想下哪就下在哪。

original: In the middle of a small village stands an unusually large pipal tree. The villagers have built a platform of grass and mud around its center, this is clearly a place for spiritual reflection and discussion.
translation: 在一个小村庄中心有一棵非常大的菩提树。村民们用草和泥建成了一个平台，这显然是一个供人进行精神反思和讨论的场所。

original: I must stay and learn what these people can teach me.
translation: 我必须留下来学一学这些人教我的东西。

original: I have no time to lose.
translation: 已经没时间可以浪费了。

original: After a trek of many days through unfamiliar lands I now stand before an unfamiliar but dazzingly splendid city. Houses of rich and poor alike are made of stone and on the central hilltop a citadel looks out over massive water reservoirs to keep the inhabitants supplied with water at all times.
translation: 经过多日穿越异邦的跋涉，我现在站在一个陌生但令人目眩的城市前。这里穷人和富人的房子都用石头搭建，在城市中央的高地上，一座城堡下临巨大的水库，随时为居民供水。

original: Let us rest and enjoy city life!
translation: 让我们放松一下，享受城市生活吧！

original: You will make new acquaintances.\n
translation: 你将结识新朋友。\n

original: City life is an unnecessary diversion.
translation: 城市生活是毫无意义的消遣。

original: Following an audience with the local Raja you spend the rest of the day exploring the city. Its central position along a major trade route attracts travelers from all over the region. Among the many travelers you meet a [new_friend_far_away_from_home.GetManWoman] entirely after your own mind. Your meeting does not last long but as you part your new friend invites you to visit [new_friend_far_away_from_home.GetHerHim] in [new_friend_far_away_from_home.GetHerHis] native [home_of_new_friend.GetName].
translation: 这天在面见当地罗阇后，你在剩下的时间里游览这座城市。城市的中心坐落在主要贸易路线上，吸引了该地区的旅客。在众多旅行者中，你遇到一个和你投缘的[new_friend_far_away_from_home.GetManWoman]。你们的会面没有持续很长时间，但是当你道别时你的新朋友时邀请你到[new_friend_far_away_from_home.GetHerHis]当地的[home_of_new_friend.GetName]拜访[new_friend_far_away_from_home.GetHerHim]。

original: Following an audience with the local Raja you spend the rest of the day exploring the city. Its central position along a major trade route attracts travelers from all over the region. Among the many travelers you unexpectedly meet an old acquaintance from home.  [new_friend_far_away_from_home.GetName] is also on the road and you use this opportunity to get to know each other better. You find that [new_friend_far_away_from_home.GetSheHe] is a [new_friend_far_away_from_home.GetManWoman] entirely after your own mind and as you part you promise to see each other again in [home_of_new_friend.GetName].
translation: 这天在面见当地罗阇后，你在剩下的时间里游览这座城市。城市的中心坐落在主要贸易路线上，吸引了该地区的旅客。在众多旅行者中，你意外碰见了熟人。[new_friend_far_away_from_home.GetName]也在赶路，你们利用这个机会增进了双方的了解。你发现[new_friend_far_away_from_home.GetSheHe]是个和你很投缘的[new_friend_far_away_from_home.GetManWoman]，道别时你与对方相约在[home_of_new_friend.GetName]再见。

original: I have made a new friend!
translation: 我又交了个新朋友！

original: As I entered the city I was quickly invited to the citadel of the local Raja. Entering the audience chamber another visitor storms in demanding to know why I was given this right to enter before [new_enemy_far_away_from_home.GetHerHim]. The Raja manages to calm the situation somewhat but as [new_enemy_far_away_from_home.GetSheHe] leaves [new_enemy_far_away_from_home.GetSheHe] swears that I will pay for this slight.
translation: 我一进入这座城市就被当地的罗阇邀请到了他的城堡里。我们一进到会客厅，另一位访客就冲进来质问为何我有权先于[new_enemy_far_away_from_home.GetHerHim]得到接见。罗阇勉强稳定了局势，但当[new_enemy_far_away_from_home.GetSheHe]离开的时候[new_enemy_far_away_from_home.GetSheHe]发誓会让我为今天的事付出代价。

original: It would seem I have made a new enemy.
translation: 看来我有了一个新的敌人。

original: As I entered the city I was quickly invited to the citadel of the local Raja. Entering the audience chamber another visitor storms in demanding to know why I was given this right to enter before [new_enemy_far_away_from_home.GetHerHim]. The Raja manages to calm the situation somewhat but as [new_enemy_far_away_from_home.GetSheHe] leaves he swears that I will pay for this slight.
translation: 我一进入这座城市就被当地的罗阇邀请到了他的城堡里。我们一进到会客厅，另一位访客就冲进来质问为何我有权先于[new_enemy_far_away_from_home.GetHerHim]得到接见。罗阇勉强稳定了局势，但当[new_enemy_far_away_from_home.GetSheHe]离开的时候他发誓会让我为今天的事付出代价。

original: Spending time and money in a city is a good way to make new acquaintances. I cannot help however this has been a day wasted on my journey.
translation: 在城市里耗费时间和金钱是认识新朋友的好方法。不过我还是忍不住说，途中已经浪费了整整一天了。

original: It is time we continue towards our goal.
translation: 我们是时候继续向着目标前进了。

original: It has been months since I left my home behind. I cannot help but wonder how my house and family fares without me. Surely I arranged things as well as possible before I left however, who could I trust if not friends and family?
translation: 我离家已经几个月了。我不由得想，我的家人没有我过得怎样。不过我出发前已经尽可能做好安排，要是不去信任朋友和家人，我还能信任谁？

original: I am sure everything is fine.
translation: 我很确定一切正常。

original: I cannot let go of these thoughts...
translation: 我不能摒弃这些想法……

original: Arrival in Sarnath
translation: 抵达鹿野苑

original: A short journey from the holy city of Varanasi lies Sarnath. This is the park in which Buddha gave his first sermons, setting the wheel of the Dharma in motion, telling his followers of the four noble truths and founding the Sangha itself. Today the park is home to the imposing Dhamek Stupa and over a thousand priests and monks.\n\nThis is one of the most bustling centers of Buddhist teachings in India and one of the sites named by the Buddha himself as a worthy pilgrimage.
translation: 从圣城波罗奈出发，经过短暂的旅程，就到了鹿野苑。这里是佛陀初次讲经布道的园地，他在这里初转法轮，给他的追随者传授了四谛，并成立了僧伽。如今，园中有壮丽的答枚克佛塔，同时也是一千多名祭司和僧侣们的家园。\n\n这里是印度最繁华的佛教教义中心之一，也是以佛陀本身命名的一个名副其实的朝圣之地。

original: I must seek the middle way.
translation: 我必须找到中庸之道。

original: Bodh Gaya
translation: 菩提伽耶

original: You have finally arrived in Bodh Gaya, by many considered the seat of Buddhism. It was here that Buddha once sat under the tree of enlightenment, meditating on the mysteries of the universe. Over the centuries rulers and influentials both in India and further away have contributed to a great number of temples, monasteries and shrines at this post. To this day the monks of Bodh Gaya has kept a giant Bodhi Tree alive here, a huge pipal right next to the 'Diamond Throne' that a ruler of another age built to commemorate the event.\n\nAs you approach the blue tiled walls of the massive Mahabodhi temple you reflect on how different this site must be from when Buddha himself came here. At that point he was not unlike yourself, a simple ascetic seeking enlightenment.
translation: 你终于来到了菩提伽耶，许多人眼中的佛陀圣座。正是在这里，佛陀曾坐于启蒙之树下，冥想着宇宙的奥秘。几个世纪以来，印度与四方诸国的王公和权贵们在这里修建了许多庙宇，寺庙和神龛。当今菩提伽耶的僧侣们在这里养护着一棵巨大的菩提树，其左侧则是「金刚座」，另一个时代的王公为纪念此事而建造的石像。\n\n当你轻轻触碰恢弘的摩诃菩提寺那蓝色瓷砖墙时，你的思绪却飘向千百年前佛陀的到来，彼时的这里又该与现在有多么的不同。在那时，他与你无异，仅仅是一位一心寻求开悟的苦行者。

original: I too seek to be enlightened.
translation: 我也在寻求启示。

original: Sanchi
translation: 桑吉

original: You have finally arrived in Sanchi, one of the oldest centers of Buddhist worship in the world. Legend has it the original Stupa here was constructed by Emperor Ashoka at the insistence of his Vidishan queen Devi. Ever since Buddhists have been coming here to seek out the serenely secluded environment, and over hundreds of years more temples, stupas and monasteries have sprung up in this ideal place for monastic life.\n\nAs you approach the elaborate Torana of the ancient Great Stupa of Ashoka you reflect on the generations of faithful that have walked this way before you as well as on the fate of Sariputra and Mahamoggalana whose relics lie within.
translation: 你最终抵达了世界上最古老的佛教宗教中心之一的桑吉。相传此处最早的佛塔是阿育王在卑提写王后提毗的坚持下建造。自从僧侣来这里寻找秘境静修，几百年来数不清的的寺庙，佛塔和寺院在这个出家的理想地点不断涌现。\n\n当您接近古代阿育王精心建造的大佛塔的山门，你不禁回想起在你面前走的这条路，曾走过许多代的善男信女，这里也是舍利弗和摩诃目犍连的舍利所在之处。

original: As is fitting for a disciple of Buddha.
translation: 很适合佛门弟子。

original: Shravanabelagola
translation: 室罗伐拿白泽

original: You have finally arrived in Shravanabelagola, the white pond of the Shravana. For centuries great monks and Sravakas have meditated here on the hills of Chandragiri and Vindhyagiri, among them even great kings and emperors. As you approach the main pond you reflect on the faith of Bahubali whose atonement for his sins and sublimation into godhood is commemorated here by a 57 feet statue in his likeness. Shravanabelagola is the site of many Jain mathas and temples and is the site where some of the holiest scriptures are kept.\n\nFortunately you have arrived in time for the Mahamastakabhisheka ceremony and get to watch as the statue of Bahubali is bathed and anointed and sprinkled with powders of Sandalwood and Vermilion.
