translation: 你终于到达了室罗伐拿白泽，这个位于室罗伐拿的白色池塘。几个世纪以来，伟大的僧侣和声闻乘修行者们都曾在旃陀罗耆厘和频陀耆厘的山丘上冥想，其中甚至有伟大的国王和皇帝。当你走近主池时，你想到了巴霍巴利王的信仰，他为他的罪孽赎罪然后升华为神格，并被人们按照他的容貌刻出了五十七英尺高的雕像作为纪念。室罗伐拿白泽是许多耆那教寺院和寺庙的遗址，也是一些最神圣经文的所在地。\n\n幸好你及时赶到了大献祭仪式，观看了巴霍巴利王的雕像沐浴并涂洒了用檀香木和朱砂制成的香粉。

original: It is time I proceed to the temples and mathas of this place.
translation: 我应该出发，去这里的寺院了。

original: Girnar
translation: 吉尔纳尔

original: You have arrived in the temple district of Taleti at the foot of Girnar. A long set of stairs will take you up the sacred mountain to see the shrines and temples. It was here that Krishna was once confined by his mother and where he tricked Kalayavana to meet the inflaming ire of the sleeping Muchukunda.\n\nAs you reach the Bhavnat shrine you observe the hundreds of naked Sadhus making their offerings to Shiva and bathing themselves in the tank of the temple. The entire place is resounding with sounds and music and according to some Shiva himself is near.
translation: 你已经到达了耆罗那梨山脚下的陀勒帝神庙区。一条绵延的山道将指引你登上圣山，去参观圣殿和寺庙。正是在这里，奎师那曾被母亲囚禁在那里，这也是他诱骗伽罗耶婆那国王去迎接沉睡的牟珠军陀的怒火的地方。\n\n当你到达婆伐那他神殿时，你看到了数百名赤裸的苦行僧向湿婆祭拜，他们都沐浴在圣殿中的水池里。整个地方萦绕着辉煌的声音和音乐中，相传，湿婆身体的一部分就在附近。

original: I must continue my ascent.
translation: 我必须继续攀登。

original: Arrival at Shikarji
translation: 抵达式佉罗时

original: Having crossed the Madhuban forest, you have finally reached the foot of the Parasnath hills and the pilgrimage of Shikarji. On these mountain peaks 20 out of the 24 tirthankaras achieved moksha through meditation making this one of the holiest of places in the world. Their ascent to Nirvana has left a permanent mark on this place, and during your climb upwards to the sacred peaks you pass the small marble tonks left to commemorate each and every one of them.
translation: 穿过摩度婆那蜜林，你终于到达了钵湿伐那他山脚以及式佉罗时朝圣地。在这些山峰上，二十四位渡津者其中的二十位通过冥想获得了涅槃，使这里成为世界上最神圣的地方之一。他们向极乐世界的攀登在这个地方留下了永久的印记，当你攀登上神圣的山峰时，你会通过留下的小块大理石来纪念他们中的每一个人。

original: It is time to begin my ascent.
translation: 是时候开始攀登了。

original: Arrival in Mathura.
translation: 抵达秣菟罗。

original: You have finally arrived at the heart of Braj, in Mathura, the place where lord Krishna was once born. It is said the first temple constructed at this ancient site was built by Vajranabha, the great-grandson of Krishna himself. Since then the devoted have travelled to this place to give their offerings and see this most holy of Hindu places. Today thousands of pilgrims come here, and to the nearby Vrindavan where Krishna spent his youth, every year to circumambulate Govardhana and the other temples.
translation: 你终于到达了缚罗日的心脏地带——秣菟罗，世主奎师那出生的地方。据说在这古老的地方，第一座庙宇是由奎师那自己的曾孙缚日罗那婆建造的。从那时起，虔诚的人来到这里奉献他们的祭品，来看印度教最神圣的一个地方。如今，成千上万的朝圣者来到这里，来到奎师那度过其年少时光的勿邻陀林，并且每年都会去巡礼牛增山和其他寺庙。

original: It is beautiful!
translation: 真美啊！

original: The Eternal City
translation: 永恒之城

original: At the confluence of the Varuna and the Assi lies one of the oldest cities of India. Known by names such as Varanasi, Kasi or Banaras this is also one of the holiest places in the world. For thousands of years pilgrims have visited the hundreds of temples and the many ghats that lead into the holy river Ganges. They have sought enlightenment and purification or in some cases, to die in this place where salvation is guaranteed.\n\nEager to perform your own cleansing you approach the Dashashwamedh Ghats, a set of stairs said to have been created to welcome Shiva by lord Brahma millennia ago, you reflect on Ganges, Krishna and the cycle of rebirth.
translation: 波罗奈，或称迦尸、贝拿勒斯，位于婆楼那河和阿斯河的交汇处，是印度最古老的城市之一，也被印度信徒认为是世界上最神圣的地方之一。几千年来，无数朝圣者拜访了这里的数百座寺庙以及由亲水台阶引入进圣河恒河中的众多河坛。他们寻求启示和净化，抑或寻求终眠于这救赎允诺之地。\n\n渴求洁净自我的你来到陀舍湿婆迷陀河坛，这些亲水台阶据说是数千年前梵天为了迎接湿婆而建造的，你在此思考恒河、奎师那和轮回。

original: I believe it is time for a bath!
translation: 我觉得是时候去洗个澡了！

original: This place is invigorating to the mind. Being able to engage with so many great minds of religion and theology has stimulated my understanding and willingness to explore the finer points of the faith. Hours and even days are lost in conversation with Sadhus, Priests and Monks about the deeper meaning of various passages in [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName].
translation: 这个地方让人精神振奋。能够接触到如此多的宗教和神学的伟大思想，这激发了我探索信仰精妙之处的理解和意愿。我花费了数小时甚至数天的时间与圣人，祭司和僧侣交流关于[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]中不同段落的深层含义。

original: Enlightenment can only be achieved through Meditation.
translation: 启迪只能通过冥想达成。

original: Purification and Enlightenment have never before felt as tangible as in this place. Pilgrims are circumambulating shrines, sadhus are conveying their blessings upon the faithful and monks and gurus meditate together. I join those in worship that for thousands of years have attended this place and others like it. This is a profound experience unlike anything I have ever felt before.
translation: 来这儿之前，我从未如此真切的感受到净化和启蒙的力量。朝圣者环绕着神龛，苦行僧正在向信徒传递他们的祝福，僧侣和大师们一起冥想。我加入祈祷的人群，千百年来他们一直在这个地方冥思，其他人也加入进来。这是一次全新体验。

original: I cannot wait to tell others about this!
translation: 我迫不及待要告诉别人这个了！

original: Many pilgrims have stories of the experiences from their journeys and the great enlightenment or purification achieved in at the destination. I expected much more than I have found here. The place is certainly full of monks, sadhus, priests and holy men but neither circumambulation, meditation or cleansing has left me with anything but an empty feeling of doubt.
translation: 许多朝圣者都有自己的故事，内容无非是朝圣途中得到的伟大启示，或是心灵在圣地得到的荡涤。可我在这里的收获却让我大失所望。毫无疑问，这个地方充斥着僧侣、苦行僧、祭司和圣人，但无论是绕行、冥想还是清洁，都让我感到一种空虚的疑惑。

original: What is my purpose here?
translation: 我到这来干嘛？

original: Eager to engage other in discussion I rushed right ahead to the centers of learning. I can tell the ideas and thoughts I have had over the years have made an impression on others here. Even great minds, scholars and sadhus alike seem taken by my reasoning and my home-grown theological arguments.
translation: 热切地想参与其他人讨论的我直奔学习中心。我说出我多年来的思想和理念，在这里给别人留下了深刻的印象。即使是伟大的思想家、学者和圣人，似乎也被我的推理和自身的神学观点所吸引。

original: It is but a small contribution to the knowledge of mankind.
translation: 只不过是为人类的知识做点小贡献而已。

original: There are people here from every corner of the world. Though we are united in reverence of this holy place their languages, clothes and even the people themselves seem exotic and different. Meeting and conversing with strangers is in itself an experience that will impact me more than the religious aspects of this pilgrimage itself.
translation: 这里的人们来自世界的各个角落。虽然我们都来到这个神圣的地方朝圣，但是他们的语言，衣着甚至长相都显得异乎寻常和不同。与陌生人会面并交谈，是一种比这次朝圣的宗教方面本身更让我印象深刻的体验。

original: I must talk to them all!
translation: 我必须和他们好好谈谈！

original: I must observe and learn about the peoples of this world.
translation: 我一定要观察并了解世界上的各民族。

original: A pilgrimage can be undertaken for many reasons. For some it is a way to atone for past sins, for others a way to repay the universe for what they have. To many the pilgrimage is a great and rejuvenating journey. I feel convinced this is so, for my journey has left me invigorated in a way I have never experienced before.
translation: 朝圣可以由许多原因进行。对于某些人来说，这是弥补过去罪恶的一种方式，对于其他人来说，这是一种将他们所拥有的东西偿还宇宙的方式。对许多朝圣者来说，这是一次伟大而振奋的旅程。我确信这是事实，因为这次旅程让我前所未有地活跃起来。

original: Perhaps the time has come to begin the journey home?
translation: 也许到了该回家的时候？

original: Like me many others have come here to seek the spiritual experience of their life. To some this is draining but I find it to be quite invigorating. With the appetite of the mind sated perhaps it is time to enjoy myself?
translation: 和我一样，许多人来到这里寻求关于他们生命的精神体验。对某些人来说，这是一个劳累的过程，但我觉得它很有活力。随着精神的欲求得到满足，也许是时候犒劳我自己了？

original: Yes, why not?
translation: 何乐不为？

original: I must exercise control of the body as well as the mind.
translation: 我必须练习控制身和心。

original: Healer?
translation: 治病术士？

original: A holy place such as this has always attracted mystics, sadhus and yogis. After completing my cleansing bath in the Ganges and started to climb back up the ghats I met an old wrinkled man who bestowed his blessing upon me. Ever since I have felt more powerful and invigorated.
translation: 这样的圣地一直吸引着神秘主义者、苦行僧和瑜伽行者。在恒河完成我的洁净浴开始爬回高山时我遇到了一个满脸皱纹的老人，他祝福了我。从此我感觉我变得更强大更有活力了。

original: A holy place such as this has always attracted mystics, sadhus and yogis. Knowing that their blessings are said to have great power I could not help but seek out one who is said to have a way to heal the sick. I spent some time with this man and ate and drank a variety of things according to his instructions. For the most part it is hard to remember what happened but it appears I slept for several days before leaving him with a feeling of invigoration I have not felt for a long time.
translation: 像这样的圣地一直吸引神秘主义者、苦行僧和瑜伽行者。我知晓他们的祝福据说拥有巨大的力量，因此忍不住去寻找一个据说能治愈疾病的人。我花了段时间和这个人在一起，并根据他的指示吃喝了多种东西。在期间的绝大部分时间里，我难以记住发生了什么。在怀着兴奋的心情离开之前，我似乎睡了好几天，然而我对这么长的时间一无所知。

original: I have been healed by a higher power!
translation: 我已经被某种神圣力量治愈了！

original: This man was truly a great healer.
translation: 这个人真是一位杰出的医者。

original: I must learn more about this mystery!
translation: 关于这个谜，我必须了解更多！

original: Surrounded by pilgrims, temples and shrines it is hard not to be taken aback by the great faith of the masses. Their reverence really is quite endearing. Should I reveal my true identity to them and receive their open adoration and worship? What better place to do this than here, a destination they have all sought out to experience my favor...
translation: 被朝圣者、寺庙和神龛所包围，我很难不被民众的伟大信仰所震惊。他们的敬畏让人欣喜。我应该向他们展示我的真实身份，接受他们公开的崇拜和敬仰吗？哪里还有比这更好的地方，一个他们都想沐浴我的恩惠的地方……

original: Let them see me for who I truly am!
translation: 让他们看看真正的我是谁！

original: They could not bear to receive me in full glory, for now I must spare them.
translation: 他们无法承受我的无上荣耀，暂且放过他们。

original: Enrichment of the spirit is all well and good but perhaps it is now time to see what the temporal world has to offer. Surely there is both food, good company and good drink to be had nearby? Now that I am here I must sate my appetite for the local delicacies.
translation: 精神富足固然是好事，但现在也许更应该看看现世提供了什么。当然现在眼前有美食好友和美酒，现在我要用当地美食来大饱口福了！

original: Let us see what this place truly has to offer...
translation: 让我们看看这个地方实际上有什么……

original: I must strive to overcome the crass demands of flesh and bone.
translation: 我一定要努力奋斗，克服肉体的贪欲。

original: The adoration I thought I saw was clearly nothing but blind stupidity! These pilgrims are fools and do not know the full extent of my power. The lucky ones may never find out but those that ejected me from the temple grounds will curse this day.
translation: 我以为我了解的崇拜显然不过是盲目的愚蠢！这些朝圣者是愚蠢的，并不知道我的权力有何种程度。幸运的人可能永远不会发现，但那些把我从庙宇里驱逐出来的人会为今天的所作所为而遭报应。

original: They do not realize what they have awoken...
translation: 他们不知道自己唤醒了什么……

original: I am home at last after my journey. I have learnt new things, experienced the greatness of the faith and met with interesting people. While it is good to be home I am confident that I will always remember this trip very fondly.
translation: 在旅行结束后，我回到了家。这场旅行让我学到了一些新鲜事物，体验了信仰的伟大，遇到了有趣的人。回到家感觉很棒，但我仍确信我会永远怀念这趟旅程。

original: A great experience!
translation: 一次伟大的体验！

original: I am home at last after a long journey. While it is said that a pilgrimage can rejuvenate the soul and body I cannot claim it did for me. On the whole this has been a most disappointing experience.
translation: 在长途旅行之后，我终于回到了家。常言道朝圣能使人灵魂恢复活力，而我认为并没有在我身上奏效。总而言之，这是一次令人失望的体验。

original: My home is my castle.
translation: 我的家就是我的城堡。

original: I am finally home after a long and tiring journey. Though the insolent rats did not recognize me or pay proper homage, it was still an enlightening experience. Now there is plenty of time to prepare their day of reckoning.
translation: 经过漫长而疲惫的旅程，我终于回到家乡。尽管傲慢的鼠辈没有认出我，也没有给予我应有的尊敬，但这仍然是一种启发性的经历。现在有足够的时间来准备和他们算总账了。

original: They will pay for their shortsightedness.
translation: 他们会为自己的短视而付出代价的。

original: Pilgrim
translation: 朝圣

original: The character has completed a great pilgrimage.
translation: 此角色已经完成了一次伟大的朝圣。

original: Go on Pilgrimage
translation: 去朝圣

original: Go on a Pilgrimage to one of the holy places of India.
translation: 去印度的圣地之一朝圣。

original: You must perform a holy pilgrimage to atone for your sins and to reflect upon the greatness of God. This spiritual journey will help you reflect upon yourself and increase your standing with the order.
translation: 你必须进行神圣的朝圣，为了补赎你的罪，也为了深思上帝的伟大。这场精神旅程将帮助你反思自己，并增强你的自律。

original: To complete this mission, activate the decision §Y'Go on a Pilgrimage'§! in the Intrigue menu and successfully complete a pilgrimage to one of the holy cities of Christianity.
translation: 要完成这项任务，使用密谋界面的决议§Y「去朝圣」§!并成功地完成对一个基督教圣城的朝圣。

original: Go on a Pilgrimage
translation: 去朝圣

original: You must perform a holy pilgrimage to cleanse yourself and to strive to enlightenment.
translation: 你必须去圣地朝圣以洁净身心，启迪心智。

original: To complete this mission, activate the decision §Y'Go on Pilgrimage'§! in the Intrigue menu and successfully complete a pilgrimage to one a holy site.
translation: 要完成这项任务，使用密谋界面的决议§Y「去朝圣」§!并成功地完成对一个圣地的朝圣。

original:
[Root.GetMOGreeting] [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName].

We are glad to hear that you have performed a pilgrimage in the name of our faith.
Signed [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
[Root.GetMOGreeting][Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]。

你以我们信仰的名义进行了朝圣，我们由衷的感到高兴。
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: It was the journey of a lifetime.
translation: 这是终生的旅程。

original: do something about my rival
translation: 对我的仇敌做点什么

original: Adopts the name $NEWNAME|Y$
translation: 采用名称$NEWNAME|Y$

original: Is NOT in combat
translation: 不在战斗中

original: Is in combat
translation: 在战斗中

original: Is a navy
translation: 是海军

original: Is NOT a navy
translation: 不是海军

original: Combat will start in this province on $DATE|Y$ between $PARTY_ONE|Y$ and $PARTY_TWO|Y$.
translation: $DATE|Y$，$PARTY_ONE|Y$与$PARTY_TWO|Y$之间的战斗将在此地开始。

original: $ATTACKER|Y$ will suffer from a river-crossing penalty:
translation: $ATTACKER|Y$会受到跨河惩罚

original: $ATTACKER|Y$ will suffer from a major river-crossing penalty:
translation: $ATTACKER|Y$会受到跨大河惩罚

original: $ATTACKER|Y$ will suffer from a strait-crossing penalty:
translation: $ATTACKER|Y$会受到跨海峡惩罚

original: $ATTACKER|Y$ will suffer from a naval-landing penalty:
translation: $ATTACKER|Y$会受到登陆惩罚

original: $DEFENDER|Y$ will get a defensive bonus from the $TERRAIN|Y$ in the province:
translation: $DEFENDER|Y$在该省份将由于$TERRAIN|Y$地形影响获得防御加成：

original: Only men
translation: 仅男性

original: Only foreigners
translation: 仅外国人

original: Only adults
translation: 仅成年人

original: Only those who can be ransomed
translation: 仅可索要赎金者

original: Reset Prisoner Filters
translation: 重设囚犯过滤器

original: Reset Browser Filters
translation: 重置查找器过滤

original: Foreigner
translation: 外国人

original: Ransomable
translation: 可索要赎金

original: Execution Tyranny
translation: 处决引起不满

original: Execution Piety
translation: 处决需要虔诚

original: Only piety
translation: 只需虔诚

original: Abroad
translation: 只有国外不满

original: None
translation: 无

original: Diplo Range
translation: 外交范围

original: Join Court
translation: 加入宫廷

original: Release Prisoners
translation: 释放囚犯

original: Release $COUNT|Y$ characters from your dungeons.
translation: 释放 $COUNT|Y$ 个在你的地牢中的角色。

original: Release $COUNT|Y$ character from your dungeons.
translation: 释放 $COUNT|Y$ 个在你的地牢中的角色。

original: Ransom Prisoners
translation: 赎回囚犯

original: Attempt to ransom $COUNT|Y$ characters in your dungeons.\n This will give up to $GOLD|Y$ gold in ransom.
translation: 尝试为你地牢中的 $COUNT|Y$ 名囚犯索要赎金。\n赎金共计 $GOLD|Y$ 金币。

original: Attempt to ransom $COUNT|Y$ character in your dungeons.\n This will give up to $GOLD|Y$ gold in ransom.
translation: 尝试为你地牢中的 $COUNT|Y$ 名囚犯索要赎金。\n赎金共计 $GOLD|Y$ 金币。

original: Execute Prisoners
translation: 处决囚犯

original: Execute $COUNT|Y$ characters in your dungeons.
translation: 处决 $COUNT|Y$ 个在你的地牢中的角色

original: Execute $COUNT|Y$ character in your dungeons.
translation: 处决 $COUNT|Y$ 个在你的地牢中的角色。

original: This will upset the realms of some of the characters executed.
translation: 这样做将导致某些被处决角色所在国家的不满。

original: This will cause you to lose $PIETY|Y$ piety.
translation: 这将使你失去 $PIETY|Y$ 虔诚。

original: This will not cause you to lose any piety.
translation: 这不会使你失去虔诚。

original: This will not worsen your vassals' opinion of you.
translation: 这并不会降低你的封臣对你的好感。

original: This will worsen your vassals' opinion of you by $TYRANNY|Y$.
translation: 这样做将使你的封臣对你的好感降低 $TYRANNY|Y$。

original: Exclude from mass release/ransom/execute
translation: 从批量释放/赎回/处决中剔除

original: The council will consider one or more of these actions tyrannical!
translation: 内阁将这些行为视为暴政！

original: Ask to Join Plot
translation: 请求加入阴谋

original: Ask a character to join their scheme to [Recipient.GetPlot].
translation: 请求加入某个角色[Recipient.GetPlot]的阴谋。

original: Characters who back a plot can be called to war by the plot leader. You will very likely to help the plot leader achieve their goal, and will start getting events that move the plot forward.
translation: 阴谋发起者可以召唤参与阴谋的角色参战。你可以帮助阴谋发起者达成目的，这将触发事件，推动你们的阴谋更进一步。

original: Request to Join Plot Accepted
translation: 已接受加入阴谋的请求

original: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W joined §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]'s§W plot to [Recipient.GetPlot].
translation: §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W加入了§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W的[Recipient.GetPlot]阴谋。

original: Request to Join Plot Declined
translation: 加入阴谋的请求被拒绝

original: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W declined to let §Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W join §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]'s§W plot to [Recipient.GetPlot].
translation: §Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W拒绝让§Y[Actor.GetBestName]§W参与§Y[Recipient.GetBestName]§W的[Recipient.GetPlot]阴谋。

original: [Actor.GetDynName] wants to join [Recipient.GetPossPronoun] Plot
translation: [Actor.GetDynName]想加入[Recipient.GetPossPronoun]阴谋

original: We would like to join your plot to [Recipient.GetPlot]
translation: 我们想加入你的[Recipient.GetPlot]阴谋

original: The more the merrier
translation: 多多益善

original: I was remiss not to invite you in the first place. You may indeed join my plot to [From.GetPlot].
translation: 当初我因为马虎而没有邀请你。你确实可以参与我[From.GetPlot]的密谋。

original: Why would I want the help of the likes of you with my plot to [From.GetPlot]?
translation: 为什么我让你这种人参与我[From.GetPlot]的计划？

original: My Plots
translation: 我的阴谋

original: Backed Plots
translation: 支持的阴谋

original: Mark decision as important
translation: 标记为重要决议

original: Mark decision as not important
translation: 标记为非重要决议

original: Reset Decision Importance
translation: 重设决议重要性

original: Is a direct vassal of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!\n
translation: 是§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!的直属封臣\n

original: Is a Count's secondary County\n
translation: 是伯爵的第二块伯爵领\n

original: Is a County in the held capital Duchy of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!\n
translation: 是§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!首都所在公国的一个伯爵领\n

original: Is a Duchy with no de jure County under its holder\n
translation: 是公国且持有者不持有该头衔下任何法理伯爵领\n

original: Is a County held by a Duke whom is not its de jure liege\n
translation: 是公爵直辖的非法理伯爵领\n

original: §YMight be convinced to join our Court by a bag of gold§!
translation: §Y会在收下一包金币后同意加入我们的宫廷§!

original: Slot 0
translation: 栏位 0

original: Slot 1
translation: 栏位 1

original: Slot 2
translation: 栏位 2

original: Slot 3
translation: 栏位 3

original: Empty Slot
translation: 空栏位

original: Save Filters
translation: 存储过滤器

original: Load Filters
translation: 读取过滤器

original: All Rules
translation: 所有规则

original: The Reaper's Due
translation: 死神索命

original: Historical Direction
translation: 历史方向

original: Warfare
translation: 战争

original: Religion
translation: 宗教

original: De Jure Drift
translation: 法理转变

original: Various
translation: 杂项

original: Diplomacy
translation: 外交

original: Way of Life
translation: 生活之道

original: Save Rules
translation: 保存规则

original: Load Rules
translation: 载入规则

original: Levy: $NUM$/$TOTAL|G$
translation: 征召兵：$NUM$/$TOTAL|G$

original: Total: $NUM$/$TOTAL|G$
translation: 总计：$NUM$/$TOTAL|G$

original: Embark the selected units
translation: 选定单位登船

original: Choosing the embark option will load as many of the selected units onto ships as possible.
translation: 选择登船选项将尽可能多地将所选单位装载到船上。

original: A disciple of [Root.GetDWDevil] will soon appear at the court of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 一名[Root.GetDWDevil]的追随者将很快出现在§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!的宫廷中。\n

original: Finally, my devout servant has arrived. [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetBestName] is a most accomplished [From.GetDWMagician] and well-versed in the hallowed secrets of [From.GetDWDarkMagic]. With [From.GetHerHim] at my side, I shall continue to carry out the work of the great [Root.GetDWDevil].
translation: 我虔诚的仆人终于抵达了。[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetBestName]是最为成功的[From.GetDWMagician]，精通[From.GetDWDarkMagic]的神圣的奥秘。有[From.GetHerHim]在我身边，我将继续执行伟大的[Root.GetDWDevil]的工作。

original: Welcome to my court, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 欢迎来到我的宫廷，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetTitledFirstName]！

original: Invite Disciple of [Root.GetDWDevil]
translation: 邀请[Root.GetDWDevil]追随者

original: As the [Root.GetSocietyRank] of [Root.Society.GetName], §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! can invite a disciple of [Root.GetDWDevil] to join [Root.GetHerHis] court.
translation: 作为[Root.Society.GetName]的[Root.GetSocietyRank]，§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!能够邀请一位[Root.GetDWDevil]的追随者加入[Root.GetHerHis]宫廷。

original: Praised be [Root.GetMOGod]!
translation: 赞美[Root.GetMOGod]！

original: I will double my efforts from now on!
translation: 从现在起我会付出双倍的努力！

original: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. While I was skeptical at first, I have found much truth in the words of [Root.GetMOSaint]. This is truly a path worth treading. I am a doubter no more.
translation: 我成为一个更好的[Root.GetReligiousPerson]信徒的愿望引领我遵从[Root.GetMOCode]。虽然我一开始很怀疑，但我发现[Root.GetMOSaint]的训导中有很多的真理。这确实是一条值得践行的道路。我不再怀疑了。

original: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. As I have followed this holy path, I have reigned in my bodily desires for food and other physical excesses.
translation: 我成为一个更好的[Root.GetReligiousPerson]信徒的愿望引领我遵从[Root.GetMOCode]。当我沿着这条神圣的道路努力行进时，我已经压制了我的食欲以及其他的身体欲望。

original: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. As I have followed this holy path, I have felt my need for material goods diminish. I no longer crave excess and indulgences.
translation: 我成为一个更好的[Root.GetReligiousPerson]信徒的愿望引领我遵从[Root.GetMOCode]。当我沿着这条神圣道路行进时，我感到我对物质的需求减少了。我不再渴望过瘾和放纵。

original: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. Following in the footsteps of [Root.GetMOSaint] has motivated me to be more active and spend my time on matters of greater importance than naps and games.
translation: 我成为一个更好的[Root.GetReligiousPerson]信徒的愿望引领我遵从[Root.GetMOCode]。追随[Root.GetMOSaint]的脚步已经成为我内心深处的动力，使我把花在打盹和游戏上的时间转移到更有意义的事情上。

original: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. As I have striven to be more like [Root.GetMOSaint] I have also realized that I rarely envy the fortune of others anymore.
translation: 我成为一个更好的[Root.GetReligiousPerson]信徒的愿望引领我遵从[Root.GetMOCode]。当我努力变得更像[Root.GetMOSaint]时。我也意识到我很少嫉妒别人的财富了。

original: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. I used to get angered by the smallest things, but lately I have striven to be more like [Root.GetMOSaint] and nowadays I barely notice that which used to annoy me.
translation: 我成为一名更好的[Root.GetReligiousPerson]信徒的愿望引领我遵从[Root.GetMOCode]。我过去经常因为一些琐碎的事情而发怒，但最近我尽力去做得更像[Root.GetMOSaint]，并且我现在几乎不去注意那些过去常使我生气的事情了。

original: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. In my attempts to become more like [Root.GetMOSaint], I have striven to think less of myself and more of others. The sense of pride which once shackled me is gone.
translation: 我成为一名更好的[Root.GetReligiousPerson]信徒的愿望引领我遵从[Root.GetMOCode]。为了力求变得更像[Root.GetMOSaint]，我尽力去更少地考虑自己，并且更多地考虑他人。那曾经束缚着我的骄傲感消失了。

original: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. Once, I used lies and deceit to get out of trouble and fulfill my desires. Following the path of [Root.GetMOSaint] has taught me better.
translation: 我成为一个更好的[Root.GetReligiousPerson]信徒的愿望引领我遵从[Root.GetMOCode]。曾经，我用谎言和欺骗来摆脱困境，并满足我的欲望。遵循[Root.GetMOSaint]的道路使我受益良多。

original: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. Studying the works and life of [Root.GetMOSaint] has made me realize the error of my ways. I have promised myself to treat others with less ire and more compassion.
translation: 我成为一名更好的[Root.GetReligiousPerson]信徒的愿望引领我遵从[Root.GetMOCode]。学习[Root.GetMOSaint]的行为和生活让我意识到我生活方式中的错误。我答应我自己要待人和蔼、慈悲。

original: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. As I have followed this holy path, I have noticed that my sense of ego and need for recognition has all but vanished. This change has helped me focus on the things which really matter.
translation: 我成为一名更好的[Root.GetReligiousPerson]信徒的愿望引领我遵从[Root.GetMOCode]。自从我开始了这条正确的道路，我开始注意到我的自负心烟消云散了。无论如何，从现在开始我会把精力放在更加重要的事情上。

original: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. Since I joined [Root.Society.GetName] I have practiced charity, yet it was not until today I realized I was truly glad to let go of my personal possessions. Helping those in need is truly fulfilling.
translation: 我成为一名更好的[Root.GetReligiousPerson]信徒的愿望引领我遵从[Root.GetMOCode]。自从加入了[Root.Society.GetName]，我日行一善，然而直到今天我才意识到我真的很乐意去捐献我的个人财产。帮助那些需要帮助的人真是令人愉悦。

original: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. Abstaining from my bodily desires has allowed me to connect with people on a much deeper level. I also find that my mind is clearer and more peaceful than it has ever been before.
translation: 我成为一名更好的[Root.GetReligiousPerson]信徒的愿望引领我遵从[Root.GetMOCode]。戒除肉欲让我与他人建立更深层次的联系。并且，我发现我的精神变得比以前更加澄澈、平静。

original: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. Following in the footsteps of [Root.GetMOSaint], I have realized the value of kindness. Every display of compassion brings us closer to a purer, gentler and holier world.
translation: 我成为一名更好的[Root.GetReligiousPerson]信徒的愿望引领我遵从[Root.GetMOCode]。追随着[Root.GetMOSaint]的步伐，我认识到仁慈的价值。每一个慈悲的表现都将我带至一个更纯洁、更温和、更神圣的世界。

original: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. In my quest to live like [Root.GetMOSaint] I have avoided indulgences and impulsive actions. Each time I have been tested, my self-control has grown, and now I resist most desires with an ease I have never experienced previously.
translation: 我成为一名更好的[Root.GetReligiousPerson]信徒的愿望引领我遵从[Root.GetMOCode]。在我像[Root.GetMOSaint]一样生活着的追求中，我避免了放纵以及任性的行为。每当我被考验后，我的自控能力就会上升，并且现在我能够轻易抗拒绝大多数我不曾经历过的诱惑。

original: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. On this holy path I have discovered the value of being true, to myself as well as others. Once I would lie to hide my sin and shame, however, I no longer feel I have anything to hide.
translation: 我成为一名更好的[Root.GetReligiousPerson]信徒的愿望引领我遵从[Root.GetMOCode]。在这条神圣的道路上，我发现了对自己、对他人诚实的价值。我曾经以谎言来掩盖我的罪孽和羞耻，然而，我已不再认为我有什么东西需要掩盖的了。

original: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. It took time and effort, but finally studying the life of [Root.GetMOSaint] has shown me the error of my ways. I will no longer strive to obtain personal glory – I live to serve [Root.Society.GetName].
translation: 我成为一名更好的[Root.GetReligiousPerson]信徒的愿望引领我遵从[Root.GetMOCode]。这花费了时间和努力，但在最后，学习[Root.GetMOSaint]的生活方式展示了我生活方式的错误。我将不再尽力去获得个人的荣誉——我活着就是为了服务[Root.Society.GetName]。

original: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. By following this holy path I have shed my material and prideful desires, one by one. Now I am truly content with my place in this world and no longer crave more.
translation: 我成为一个更好的[Root.GetReligiousPerson]信徒的愿望引领我遵从[Root.GetMOCode]。通过遵循这条圣洁的道路，我逐一摆脱了我的物欲和自大。现在我对我在这个世界的位置感到了真正的满足，并且不再有更多的渴求。

original: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. By studying the life of [Root.GetMOSaint], I have found the value of patience and acceptance. This realization has granted me the peace of mind I never thought I would have.
translation: 我成为一名更好的[Root.GetReligiousPerson]信徒的愿望引领我遵从[Root.GetMOCode]。通过学习[Root.GetMOSaint]的生活，我发现了耐心和接受的价值。这一认识赐予了我从未想过会拥有的心平气和。

original: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. I no longer feel the need to serve my own desires – I would much rather labor to make this world a better place for everyone in it. In my work I have found a true connection to the divine.
translation: 我成为一名更好的[Root.GetReligiousPerson]信徒的愿望引领我遵从[Root.GetMOCode]。我不再需要满足一己私欲了——我宁愿为了每个人而努力将这个世界变得更美好。在工作中，我发现了与神明的真正连接。

original: Doing Penance
translation: 正在进行苦修

original: This character has secluded themselves to contemplate their sins and deepen their connection to God.
translation: 这个角色已经通过隐修来反思自己原罪并加深了和上帝的联系。

original: In Meditation
translation: 在冥想

original: failing terribly to overcome the vice.\n
translation: 无法克服这种恶习。\n

original: This character has secluded themselves to meditate on the truths of their life and the universe.
translation: 此角色已经与世隔绝以冥想宇宙和生命的真理。

original: During my time [Root.GetMOPenanceMeditation] I have spent many long hours contemplating my carnal desires. Despite my attempts to stay true to [Root.GetMOCode], I can never seem to restrict myself around [Root.GetMenWomenPreference]! As I sit here in solitude, ignoring that relentless heat in the pit of my stomach is getting harder and harder...
translation: 在我[Root.GetMOPenanceMeditation]的时候，我花了许多时间思考我的肉欲。尽管我试图坚持[Root.GetMOCode]，我似乎永远无法限制自己不去想[Root.GetMenWomenPreference]！当我独坐时，想要无视我腹中腾起的火焰变得越来越难……

original: If I find a [Root.GetManWomanPreference] to quench my lust with, I can focus afterwards.
translation: 如果我找到一个[Root.GetManWomanPreference]平息欲望，我之后可以更专注。

original: I swear, I will not lie with a [Root.GetManWomanPreference] for at least three years!
translation: 我发誓，至少三年我不会和[Root.GetManWomanPreference]一起睡！

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! makes some progress [Root.GetMOPenanceMeditation].
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!在[Root.GetMOPenanceMeditation]中有一些进展。

original: I waited until midnight before I left my chambers and hurried towards the quarters of [holy_seclusion_lover.GetTitledFirstName]. [holy_seclusion_lover.GetSheHeCap] greeted me with the sweetest of smiles and in [holy_seclusion_lover.GetHerHis] arms, all of my wishes were fulfilled. When I returned to my chambers some hours later, the [Root.Location.GetHolding] was still deserted.
translation: 我等到半夜才离开房间，急匆匆地奔向[holy_seclusion_lover.GetTitledFirstName]的住处。[holy_seclusion_lover.GetSheHeCap]用最甜蜜的微笑迎接我，在[holy_seclusion_lover.GetHerHis]怀抱里，我的所有愿望都得到了满足。几个小时后，我回到了自己的房间，[Root.Location.GetHolding]依旧很冷清。

original: I waited until midnight before I left my chambers and hurried towards the servants' quarters. There I found a [Root.GetManWomanPreference] with the sweetest of smiles that told me all of my wishes would be fulfilled. When I returned to my chambers some hours later, the [Root.Location.GetHolding] was still deserted.
translation: 我等到半夜才离开房间，急匆匆地奔向仆人的住处。一个[Root.GetManWomanPreference]用最甜蜜的微笑告诉我，我的所有愿望都会得到满足。几个小时后，我回到了自己的房间，[Root.Location.GetHolding]依旧很冷清。

original: Now I can focus again!
translation: 现在我又能专注了！

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! makes no progress [Root.GetMOPenanceMeditation].\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!在[Root.GetMOPenanceMeditation]中没有进展。\n

original: I waited until midnight before I left my seclusion and ventured out in the [Root.Location.GetHolding] to find a willing lover. I visited the chambers of the [Root.GetMenWomenPreference] I had shared a bed with before, but all of them were either asleep or uninterested. As morning approached I returned to my lonely bed, where I spent some time with a fantasy before drifting off to sleep...
translation: 我等到半夜才离开我的隐居之处，冒险在[Root.Location.GetHolding]寻找一个心甘情愿的情人。我去我以前睡过的[Root.GetMenWomenPreference]的房间，但他们要么都睡着了，要么都不感兴趣。随着清晨的临近，我回到了我孤独的床上，花了一些时间幻想，然后飘飘然地入睡……

original: Well, that was a futile effort.
translation: 好吧，这是徒劳的努力。

original: At first, every day I went without a [Root.GetManWomanPreference]'s touch felt like torture. At night it was all I dreamed about and during the day I could hardly think about anything else. But then, somehow, it got easier. I became more comfortable in my solitude and adhering to [Root.GetMOCode] does not feel as impossible as it once did.
translation: 起先，没有与[Root.GetManWomanPreference]接触的每个日子里对我来说都像是一种折磨。在晚上我不断的做梦，而白天则是几乎不可能思考任何别的事情。但后来，这种情形得到了某种程度上的缓解。我在独处中变得愈发舒缓，遵守[Root.GetMOCode]也不像以前那么不可忍受了。

original: Now, I know my own strength. Mind over body.
translation: 现在，我了解了我的力量，心胜于物。

original: Promise of Celibacy
translation: 承诺独身

original: This character has promised to remain celibate for three years.
translation: 此角色已经承诺保持三年的独身。

original: Rampant Sinner
translation: 猖獗的罪人

original: This character simply cannot help but act shamefully. Even as they attempted to do penance, they fell to sin.
translation: 这个角色不禁让人羞愧。即使他们试图忏悔，他们还是犯下了罪过。

original: Rampant Sinner
translation: 猖獗的罪人

original: This character simply cannot help but act shamefully. Even as they secluded themselves to meditate, they fell to sin.
translation: 这个角色不禁让人羞愧。即使他们闭关冥想，他们还是犯下了罪过。

original: I tried to ignore the thoughts, but it was impossible! In the end, I could not take it anymore, and snuck out one evening to visit the local brothel. Afterwards, I returned to my chambers, thinking that was the end of it. However, it turns out that someone saw me, and now everyone knows!
translation: 我尽力去忽视这些想法，但我做不到！最后，我忍无可忍，在一天傍晚，我偷偷溜出去造访本地的妓院。之后，我回到了我的卧室，以为这件事到此为止了。然而，事实证明有人看到了我，并且现在每个人都知道了这件事！

original: I must learn to control this!
translation: 我必须学会控制这个！

original: I know that [Root.GetMOSaint] was a paragon of temperance, however I struggle to control my appetite. While [Root.GetMOPenanceMeditation], I am supposed to eat very simple food in small portions, but I am growing weary. I cannot concentrate when my stomach rumbles like this!
translation: 我知道[Root.GetMOSaint]是我的榜样，然而我还是无法控制我的食欲。在[Root.GetMOPenanceMeditation]期间，我也许应当只少量食用一些粗茶淡饭，但我越来越无法控制自己。我不能在我的胃咕咕叫的时候集中注意力！

original: After a little treat I shall return to my duties with doubled focus!
translation: 稍稍犒赏自己后，我将以双倍的专注重新回到我的职责中！

original: I shall defeat my desires with a fast!
translation: 我应该用斋戒打败我的欲望！

original: I waited until midnight before I made my way to the kitchens. I found some of my favorite treats in one of the pantries. After many days on the most dreary of diets, they tasted like the most delicious food I had ever eaten! My appetite is satiated for now and no one is the wiser.
translation: 我等到半夜才走向厨房。我在其中一个储藏室里发现了一些我最喜欢的食材。在忍受了那么久单调无味的饮食之后，它们简直就是我吃过的最美味的佳肴！我的食欲现在已经得到满足了，谁也不会知道这件事……

original: That was exactly what I needed.
translation: 这正是我需要的。

original: After midnight I ventured to the kitchens to find something to still my hunger. I quickly found my favorite treats and proceeded to shove handfuls into my mouth. However, my binge was interrupted as a servant entered the room. As I hid in the pantry, the shame washed over me, and I could not eat anything else.
translation: 午夜后，我冒险去厨房找一些东西充饥。我很快找到了我最喜欢的食物，并继续向我的嘴里推了一把。然而，当仆人进入房间时，我的大吃大喝被打断了。当我藏在储藏室里时，羞愧的情绪一涌而上，我什么也吃不下了。

original: Now I just feel nauseated...
translation: 我只觉得恶心……

original: During the first days of my fast, I felt as if I was going to die. As I woke on the third day, however, I was surprised by how clear my mind was and how little the lack of sustenance bothered me. The next day when I broke my fast and returned to my simple diet, it was more than enough to satisfy me.
translation: 在禁食的第一天，我感觉自己好像要死了。然而，当我在第三天醒来时，我惊讶于我的思维如此清晰，缺乏营养也并不怎么使我困扰。又过了一天，当我开斋之后，简单的饮食也足以让我满意。

original: I am stronger than I thought.
translation: 我比我想象中的更加坚韧。

original: The first day of the fast went reasonably well, but on the second one, I woke up ravenous. I thought I would die! I hurried to the kitchen, ignoring the servants' stares. Once there I proceeded to shove anything edible I could find into my mouth, not caring who saw me. Now everyone knows about my failure!
translation: 斋戒的第一天相当顺利，但在第二天，我被饿醒了。我以为我要死了！我匆匆赶到厨房，顾不得仆人的目光。一旦到了那里，我就开始把任何可以食用的东西都塞进我的嘴里，而不管谁会看到我。现在每个人都知道我斋戒失败了！

original: How could I shame myself so?
translation: 我怎能如此羞辱自己？

original: My [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] always talks about the importance of charity, and I do give alms to the poor on a regular basis. However, I often feel reluctant when doing so, and it brings me shame. While [Root.GetMOPenanceMeditation], I have had plenty of time to think about this. Perhaps I should strive to be more charitable?
translation: 我的[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]总是谈论慈善的重要性，并且我确实定期给穷人施舍。然而，我常常感到我并不情愿这样做，这使我感到羞愧。当[Root.GetMOPenanceMeditation]时，我有大量的时间来思考这个问题。也许我应该努力变得更加仁慈？

original: I still give, don't I? Surely that must be enough.
translation: 我仍然在施舍，不是吗？显然这足够了。

original: I don't give enough. I will make another donation!
translation: 我捐的不够。我会再捐赠一次！

original: After coming to the realization that I am already doing so much for my subjects as their [Root.GetTitle], I have been able to put the thought about charity out of my mind. It does not distract me any longer.
translation: 在意识到自己作为[Root.GetTitle]已为臣民做了如此多事情之后，我现在能够不再那么关注慈善事业了。

original: I am a good [Root.GetReligiousPerson], on the whole.
translation: 我是一个虔诚的[Root.GetReligiousPerson]信徒，总的来说。

original: I thought I was happy with my decision, but then the guilt came creeping. I should not crave money and possessions in this way. These feelings are not in accordance with [Root.GetMOCode], but I cannot help myself.
translation: 我还为我的决定暗自欢喜，但很快内疚感开始涌上心头。我不该以这种方式求财。内心的感受与[Root.GetMOCode]殊为不符，我却情不自禁。

original: I am a good [Root.GetReligiousPerson], am I not? Surely?
translation: 我是一个虔诚的[Root.GetReligiousPerson]信徒，不是吗？确定？

original: I ordered one of my most trusted servants to take a substantial sum of money from my personal treasury and bring it to the local [Root.GetMOBuilding]. Strangely enough, when [Root.GetSheHe] left, I felt... relief. Perhaps this is the first step towards freeing myself of the desire for material possessions?
translation: 我命令我最信任的一个仆人从我的个人金库中拿出一大笔钱，并把它带到当地[Root.GetMOBuilding]。奇怪的是，当[Root.GetSheHe]离开时，我感到……安心。也许这是我从物质财富欲望中解脱的第一步？

original: The money will come to good use, I am sure.
translation: 钱将会被妥善利用，我很确定。

original: I wish I wouldn't have acted so rashly...
translation: 我不该那么轻率……

original: For a true follower of [Root.GetMOCode], the importance of saying [Root.GetPrayers] and studying [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] – at least my [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] says so. However, while [Root.GetMOPenanceMeditation] for days on end, I struggle to stay focused. Sometimes I feel that I am just sitting here, doing nothing. If I closed my eyes for just a moment... surely that would not be so bad?
translation: 对于[Root.GetMOCode]真正的追随者，[Root.GetPrayers]和研究[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]是很重要的——至少我的[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]这么说。然而，当[Root.GetMOPenanceMeditation]连续几天后，我很难再专注下去。有时候我觉得我只是坐在那里，什么都没做。如果我闭上眼睛一会儿……那肯定不会那么糟吧？

original: A little nap would do me good.
translation: 小憩对我有益。

original: If I am getting tired, I must double my efforts!
translation: 如果我开始厌倦，我必须加倍努力！

original: I was so immensely bored by my [Root.GetPrayers] and [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName], but after a little nap my duties did not feel quite so impossible anymore. I cannot expect myself to become like [Root.GetMOSaint] overnight. One step at a time, I say!
translation: 我真的对[Root.GetPrayers]以及[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]非常厌倦了，然而在经过调整之后，我找回了当初的热情，不再觉得这个任务是如此难以完成了。虽然我还是无法相信自己的每个夜晚会变得与[Root.GetMOSaint]一样努力。一步一个脚印！

original: That was wise of me.
translation: 聪明如我。

original: Waking up was an unpleasant experience, to say the least. I had sunk to the floor and also managed to get drool all over the chest of my garb. When I sluggishly pushed myself back to seated, I was aghast to realize that the room was pitch black! It was in the middle of the night and every single candle had burned out.
translation: 至少可以说，这次醒来不是一次愉快的经历。我掉到了地板上，胸口的衣服上浸满了口水。当我迟缓地把身子挪回座位时，我惊呆了，我意识到房间里漆黑一片！现在已经是半夜了，每根蜡烛都烧完了。

original: It was only supposed to be a little nap!
translation: 我就小睡了一下！

original: During the first hours every minute felt like an eternity, but then it got easier. My weariness was as good as gone and a certain passage of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] grabbed my interest. I kept reading, consumed by the powerful words, and suddenly it was morning! I went to sleep with a smile upon my lips and a renewed sense of purpose.
translation: 在最初的几个小时里，我每分钟都觉得度日如年，但到后来一切变得容易多了。我的疲倦已经过去了，而[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]中的一段文字让我大感兴趣。我努力阅读着，沉浸在充满力量的语句中，恍惚间已经是清晨了！我的嘴角含着微笑沉入梦乡，心里又充满了使命感。

original: Self-control is far greater a reward than indulgence.
translation: 自制远胜于放纵。

original: I do not remember falling asleep, but suddenly I realized I was sprawled across the floor. Apparently I had crashed on top of my copy of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName], because once I struggled to my feet I noticed that its pages were torn and that I had ink smeared across my face. No matter how hard I tried, I could not wash it off. Surely my servants are gossiping about my failure, and soon everyone will know!
translation: 我不记得自己是何时入睡的，但我突然意识到我正趴在地板上。显然，我撞坏了我的[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]，因为当我挣扎着站起来时，我注意到它的书页撕破了，而我的脸上沾满了墨水。无论我怎么努力，都洗不掉这污痕。我的仆人一定是在议论我的失败，很快大家都会知道这件事了！

original: What an embarrassment!
translation: 多尴尬啊！

original: Through perseverance and concentration you have managed to defeat your sinful nature and maintain seclusion.
translation: 通过毅力和专注，你已经设法打败你的罪恶本性并保持隐居。

original: You have been betrayed by your sinful nature and broken seclusion for a time. This has shamed you in the eyes of others and greatly hampered your progress.
translation: 你被你的罪恶本性所背叛，并暂时打破了隐居。这让你在别人眼里感到羞耻，并且严重阻碍了你的进步。

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! struggles while [Root.GetMOPenanceMeditation].\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!努力[Root.GetMOPenanceMeditation]。\n

original: Adherent
translation: 追随者

original: Companion
translation: 同伴

original: Propagandist
translation: 传道者

original: Grand Mistress
translation: 女大长老

original: Propagandist
translation: 传道者

original: The Grand Master will get in contact with §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! about the loan.\n
translation: 大长老将就事宜贷款和§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!进行联系。\n

original: For me, the biggest challenge while [Root.GetMOPenanceMeditation] is the solitude. As I sit here and reflect upon [Root.GetMOCode], thoughts enter my mind which I desperately want to share with someone, but I have barely exchanged a single word since I began my seclusion. I glance out of my window only to see [potential_friend.GetTitledFirstName] engaged in a lively conversation with some friends.
translation: 对我来说，[Root.GetMOPenanceMeditation]中最大的挑战是孤独。当我坐在这里，沉思[Root.GetMOCode]时，各种想法进入了我的脑海，我非常想和别人分享，但自从我开始隐居以来，我几乎连一句话都没说过。我向窗外瞥了一眼，只看到[potential_friend.GetTitledFirstName]在和一些朋友进行欢快的的交谈。

original: I will go down there and join them, if only for a few minutes!
translation: 我会下去并加入他们，顶多几分钟！

original: I should stay here, alone with my thoughts.
translation: 我应该留在这里，独自思考。

original: While [potential_friend.GetTitledFirstName] and [potential_friend.GetHerHis] friends were surprised to see me, they were excellent company! As I stood there, surrounded by people, I could not stop talking. What was supposed to be a few minutes turned into an hour before my companions had to excuse themselves and get back to their duties.
translation: [potential_friend.GetTitledFirstName]和[potential_friend.GetHerHis]朋友看到我很惊讶，但他们是很棒的同伴！当我站在那里，被人群环绕时，我不停地说话。几分钟的时间变成了一个小时，直到我的同伴们不得不说声抱歉并回到自己的岗位上。

original: That was nice, although I know I shouldn't have.
translation: 这很好，虽然我知道我不应该这么做。

original: This is the challenge I have been given, and I will not give up so quickly. I returned to my copy of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] and continued where I had left off. During the first few pages, thoughts about the jolly friends in the courtyard kept distracting me, but after a while I found peace in my reading.
translation: 这是上天给予我的挑战，我不会这么快放弃。我回到书卷前，从中断的地方开始继续阅读我的[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]副本。在读前几页时，院子里快乐朋友的想法不断让我分心，但过了一段时间，我在阅读中找到了安宁。

original: Being alone is not so bad, after all.
translation: 毕竟，独自一人也没那么糟糕。

original: I left the window and returned to my copy of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] and continued where I had left off. However, my heart was not really in it, and thoughts about the jolly friends in the courtyard kept distracting me. Then my thoughts drifted to my own companions, and how they had made no attempts to get in touch for weeks...
translation: 我离开了窗口，回到我的[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]书本上，并从中断的地方继续往下读。然而，我的心并不在这里，关于在院子里快乐玩耍的朋友们的想法一直在分散着我的注意力。我的思绪渐渐飘向了同伴们，他们怎么几个星期都不想着联系我……

original: How did [Root.GetMOSaint] cope with this loneliness?
translation: [Root.GetMOSaint]是怎么应对这种孤独的？

original: I cannot make sense of this passage of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]! The words are archaic and their meaning is deeply hidden by copious layers of symbolism. It would greatly benefit my spiritual development if I discovered the text's essence on my own, although at this point, perhaps I would be better of asking my [court_spiritual.GetJobTitle].
translation: 我不能理解[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]的文章的意思。它的用词不仅古老而且还把意思隐藏在复杂的象征手法中。如果我自己理解了文章的意思，那将对我的精神发展有很大的好处，或者我可能最好是去问一下我的[court_spiritual.GetJobTitle]。

original: I will figure this out on my own.
translation: 我自己来解决这个问题。

original: There is no shame in asking for help.
translation: 寻求他人帮助并不可耻。

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! interprets the passage successfully, a testament to [Root.GetHerHis] great understanding of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName].\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!解读这个片段非常成功，证明对于[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName][Root.GetHerHis]理解很到位。\n

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! fails to make sense of the passage.\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!没有理解这段经文。\n

original: §Y[court_spiritual.GetTitledName]§! manages to explain the passage to §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: §Y[court_spiritual.GetTitledName]§!成功向§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!解释了这段话。\n

original: §Y[court_spiritual.GetTitledName]§! is unhelpful and §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! fails to make sense of the passage.\n
translation: §Y[court_spiritual.GetTitledName]§!没能起到任何帮助，§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!理解这段经文失败了。\n

original: Ignorant
translation: 无知

original: A true follower of [Root.GetMOCode] does not give up easily. I kept at it, reading the passage again and again, compared it with other holy texts and mulled over the wording for hours at end. It went slowly, but every now and then I uncovered a new piece of the puzzle, and suddenly, I saw it! Such elegance, such depth! I will carry this revelation with me until the day I die.
translation: 一个真正的[Root.GetMOCode]追随者不会轻易放弃。我不停地阅读它，一遍又一遍地咀嚼着文字，把它与其他神圣的文本进行比较，并在结尾处仔细思考了几个小时。进展很慢，但我不时发现一个新的谜团，突然，我看到了！如此优雅，如此深邃！我将带着这个启示直到我死的那一天。

original: The wisdom of [Root.GetMOGod] is infinite and indisputable.
translation: [Root.GetMOGod]的智慧无穷无尽，不可置疑。

original: The wisdom of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] is infinite and indisputable.
translation: [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]具有无上的智慧。

original: In my obstinacy, I refused to ask for help. Surely I, the [Root.GetTitle], would know enough of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] to understand the meaning of this passage! Hour upon hour I sat staring at the words, trying to make sense of them, but each interpretation I could think of felt lackluster and hollow...
translation: 顽固的我拒绝寻求帮助。很显然，[Root.GetTitle]我知道足够的[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]来理解这段经文的意义！时间不断流逝，我盯着这些语句，试图理解它们，但是我能想到的每一种解释那么黯淡和空洞……

original: The wisdom of [Root.GetMOGod] is beyond my understanding.
translation: [Root.GetMOGod]的智慧超出了我的理解。

original: The wisdom of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] is beyond my understanding.
translation: [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]的智慧超出了我的理解。

original: Being proud is not in accordance with [Root.GetMOCode], so I decided to ask [court_spiritual.GetJobTitle] [court_spiritual.GetFirstName] for help. [court_spiritual.GetSheHeCap] was happily surprised by my request and together we proceeded to unravel the wordings of the passage. With [court_spiritual.GetFirstName]'s patient guidance, I managed to make sense of it at the end!
translation: 骄傲不符合[Root.GetMOCode]，所以我决定向[court_spiritual.GetJobTitle][court_spiritual.GetFirstName]寻求帮助。[court_spiritual.GetSheHeCap]对于我的请求感到惊喜。我们一起着手阐明经文的意思。在[court_spiritual.GetFirstName]的耐心指导下，我终于弄明白了！

original: I immediately sought out [court_spiritual.GetJobTitle] [court_spiritual.GetFirstName] to request [court_spiritual.GetHerHis] aid. I seemed to have caught [court_spiritual.GetHerHim] at a bad time, however, for [court_spiritual.GetSheHe] agreed with some discernible reluctance. [court_spiritual.GetFirstName] had no patience with me and when I failed to keep up, I left in anger!
translation: 我立刻去找[court_spiritual.GetJobTitle][court_spiritual.GetFirstName]来寻求[court_spiritual.GetHerHis]帮助。但我觉得找[court_spiritual.GetHerHim]的时机不对，因为[court_spiritual.GetSheHe]答应得很不情愿。[court_spiritual.GetFirstName]对我很没有耐心，我发现自己跟不上他，生气地离开了。

original: [court_spiritual.GetJobTitle] [court_spiritual.GetFirstName] is the ignorant one!
translation: [court_spiritual.GetJobTitle][court_spiritual.GetFirstName]是无知的！

original: Kind Parent
translation: 慈父慈母

original: I am bent over [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName], trying to make sense of an especially cryptic passage, when a faint tap on the door breaks my concentration. I call for my visitor to enter. To my surprise, little [interrupting_child.GetFirstName]'s [interrupting_child.GetFaceDescription] face peaks through the opening. "[Root.GetFatherMotherCap], why are you hiding? I miss you!"
translation: 我伏案研究[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]，正试图弄清一段特别神秘的文章，这时微弱的敲门声打断了我的专注。我让访客进来。出乎意料的是，小[interrupting_child.GetFirstName]的[interrupting_child.GetFaceDescription]脸探过门缝。「[Root.GetFatherMotherCap]，你为什么要躲起来？我想你了！」

original: Come here, [interrupting_child.GetDaughterSon], and we shall read [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName].
translation: 过来这边，[interrupting_child.GetDaughterSon]，我们来读读[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]。

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! teaches §Y[interrupting_child.GetTitledFirstName]§! an important lesson from [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName], thus doing a valuable deed according to [Root.GetMOCode].\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!用[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]给§Y[interrupting_child.GetTitledFirstName]§!上了一堂重要的课，遵照[Root.GetMOCode]做了宝贵的善举。\n

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! fails to teach §Y[interrupting_child.GetTitledFirstName]§!, thus wasting time which could have been spent contemplating [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName].\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!教授§Y[interrupting_child.GetTitledFirstName]§!失败了，因此浪费了许多可以用于思考[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]的时间。\n

original: I am sorry, my [GetRootFromCompliment]. Come and sit on my lap.
translation: 我很抱歉，我的[GetRootFromCompliment]。来坐在我的腿上。

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! takes some time to comfort [Root.GetHerHis] child, delaying [Root.GetHerHis] progress somewhat.\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!花了一些时间去安慰[Root.GetHerHis]孩子，这稍微推迟了[Root.GetHerHis]进程。\n

original: I do not have time right now, [interrupting_child.GetFirstName].
translation: 我现在没有时间，[interrupting_child.GetFirstName]。

original: §Y[interrupting_child.GetTitledFirstName]§! understands and §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! can go back to [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName].\n
translation: §Y[interrupting_child.GetTitledFirstName]§!表示理解并且§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!可以重新回到[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]上来。\n

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is insensitive and hurts §Y[interrupting_child.GetTitledFirstName]§!, thus harming [Root.GetHerHis] progress [Root.GetMOPenanceMeditation].\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!如此钝感，伤害了§Y[interrupting_child.GetTitledFirstName]§!的感情，这导致对[Root.GetMOPenanceMeditation]的进展产生了不好的影响。\n

original: [interrupting_child.GetFirstName] listened attentively as I read from [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]. After I was done, [interrupting_child.GetSheHe] had many questions which we discussed thoroughly. While [interrupting_child.GetFirstName] is still too young to grasp the finer nuances, I do think [interrupting_child.GetSheHe] learned something important. Helping my [interrupting_child.GetDaughterSon] is truly rewarding.
translation: 在我读[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]时，[interrupting_child.GetFirstName]一直仔细聆听。读完以后，[interrupting_child.GetSheHe]问了很多我们之前彻底讨论过的问题。虽然[interrupting_child.GetFirstName]还太小，无法掌握其中的微言大义，但我确实认为[interrupting_child.GetSheHe]学到了一些重要的东西。帮助我的[interrupting_child.GetDaughterSon]真的很有意义。

original: I am proud of you, my [interrupting_child.GetDaughterSon]!
translation: 我为你感到骄傲，我的[interrupting_child.GetDaughterSon]！

original: Cruel Parent
translation: 严父严母

original: I read one of my favorite passages from [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] to [interrupting_child.GetFirstName], although I could quickly tell [interrupting_child.GetSheHe] had no interest in the holy words. I then failed to engage my [interrupting_child.GetDaughterSon] in a conversation about the passage, so I considered myself defeated and sent [interrupting_child.GetHerHim] on [interrupting_child.GetHerHis] way.
translation: 我给[interrupting_child.GetFirstName]读了我在[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]中最喜欢的一段文章，然而我很快就察觉到[interrupting_child.GetSheHe]这神圣的文字毫无兴趣。接下来我试图与我[interrupting_child.GetDaughterSon]谈论这段文章的努力也失败了，我想我是没办法了，只好让[interrupting_child.GetHerHim]走[interrupting_child.GetHerHis]自己的路。

original: My [interrupting_child.GetDaughterSon] has... other qualities.
translation: 我的[interrupting_child.GetDaughterSon]有着……别的品质。

original: I patiently explained to [interrupting_child.GetFirstName] that I was preoccupied with holy duties, and that I would return to court once they were finished. [interrupting_child.GetSheHeCap] did not understand the importance of my seclusion, most likely, although my gentle words made sure [interrupting_child.GetSheHe] was not hurt.
translation: 我耐心地向[interrupting_child.GetFirstName]解释，我为神献上一切，但是只要隐修结束，我就会回来继续陪你。尽管[interrupting_child.GetSheHeCap]仍然不明白我隐修的重要性，但是我温柔的话语让[interrupting_child.GetSheHe]没有伤心。

original: I shall return to [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName].
translation: 我应该回到[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]阅读中。

original: "I am preoccupied with my holy studies, [interrupting_child.GetFirstName], and I want no distractions! Go and find your [other_parent.GetFatherMother] and leave me to [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]!" For an uncomfortably long moment, [interrupting_child.GetFirstName] just stared at me. Then, with a loud sob, [interrupting_child.GetSheHe] turned around and ran, leaving the door ajar.
translation: 「我现在要集中精神于我神圣的修行中，[interrupting_child.GetFirstName]，我不想分心！去找你的[other_parent.GetFatherMother]，让我专心读[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]！」有一段令人不舒服的长时间，[interrupting_child.GetFirstName]只是盯着我看。然后[interrupting_child.GetSheHe]开始大声抽泣，转过身跑开了，只留下半开着的门。

original: That came out wrong...
translation: 这不是我想要的结果……

original:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

The hectic life of a ruler rarely allows for sufficient time for contemplation. I ask of you to seclude yourself and think about your life and your actions – a sort of penance for your sins.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
[Root.GetMOGreeting]，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]

处理繁重的领地事务让你极难有时间去沉思，我要求你隐居反思自己的人生和行为——为你的罪做苦修补赎。

[Root.GetMOFarewell]，
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

The hectic life of a ruler rarely allows for sufficient time for contemplation. I ask of you to seclude yourself and think about the universe and your place in it. Awareness is the first step to freedom, [Root.GetSocietyRank].

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
[Root.GetMOGreeting]，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]

统治者的忙碌生活常使沉思的时间受限。我要求您隔绝尘嚣，思考宇宙和您所处其中之位。心灵觉悟是通往自由的第一步，[Root.GetSocietyRank]。

[Root.GetMOFarewell]，
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: Today, my seclusion begins. I have selected a simple chamber in the [Root.GetCapitalHolding] where I will spend most of my time during the coming months. Within those bare walls, I shall do my [Root.GetPrayers], read [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] and contemplate my life and actions.
translation: 今天，我的隐居开始了。我在[Root.GetCapitalHolding]中选择了一个简单的房间，未来几个月我将在这里度过大部分时间。在那些光秃秃的墙壁里，我会[Root.GetPrayers]，阅读[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]并反思我的生活和行为。

original: [Root.GetMOGod] shall be my companion.
translation: [Root.GetMOGod]将陪伴着我。

original: In solitude there is peace.
translation: 在孤独中找到平静。

original: Do Penance
translation: 进行苦修

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! can seclude [Root.GetHerselfHimself] and contemplate their life and sins in order to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson].
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!可以隔绝[Root.GetHerselfHimself]并沉思他们的人生和罪过以成为一个更好的[Root.GetReligiousPerson]信徒。

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! has not secluded [Root.GetHerselfHimself] to do penance recently.\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!近期没有闭门忏悔。\n

original: Begin Secluded Meditation
translation: 开始闭关冥想

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! can seclude [Root.GetHerselfHimself] and meditate upon their life and the universe to move closer towards spiritual enlightenment.
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!可以隔绝[Root.GetHerselfHimself]并沉思宇宙和他们的生命来更接近心灵的启迪。

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! has not secluded [Root.GetHerselfHimself] to meditate recently.\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!近期没有闭关冥想。\n

original: I have spent the entire day saying [Root.GetPrayers] in deep concentration. During the first hours I noticed nothing out of the ordinary, although at some point I lost track of time and entered a dreamlike state. There was nothing but the holy words passing through my lips, and they rang true as the sweetest music.
translation: 我花了一整天的时间极为专注地[Root.GetPrayers]。在最初的几个小时里，我没有发现任何异常，尽管在某些时候我失去了时间的轨迹，进入了梦幻般的状态。这里除了我嘴里吐出的神圣词汇之外别无所有，他们就像最甜美的音乐一般真实。

original: There is a bountiful well of wisdom in [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]. Today, I have uncovered new meanings in several passages which I have previously never given much thought. I shall take these lessons to heart and carry them with me, no matter where life takes me. Mark my words, [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] is truly is a book of wonders!
translation: [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]里蕴藏着丰富的知识。今天我在几页书中发现了一些我从未深思过的全新意义。无论以后发生什么，我都要把这些知识铭记于心。记住这些，[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]是一本奇迹之书！

original: Today has been a day of new insights and revelations. In my seclusion I have had plenty of time to think about my actions, my life and my place in this world. Things I had never thought about before suddenly became so clear.
translation: 今天是新的见解和启示的一天。在我的隐居时光中，我有足够的时间反思我的行为，我的生活和我在这个世界的位置。之前我从未思考过的问题突然变得如此明晰。

original: [Root.GetMOGod] has shown me the light!
translation: [Root.GetMOGod]让我领悟！

original: Today my awareness has truly expended.
translation: 今天我的意识已经真正消耗了。

original:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]
We are pleased with your progress. During the time you spent in contemplative seclusion you have taken a great step on the path of [Root.GetMOCode]. Hereby I declare your mission completed.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName].
translation:
[Root.GetMOGreeting]，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]
我们对你的进步感到满意。在你隐居沉思的时候，你已经在[Root.GetMOCode]的道路上迈出了一大步。因此我宣布你的任务已完成。

此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: You honor me, [From.GetSocietyRank]
translation: 我的荣幸，[From.GetSocietyRank]

original:
To [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]
I have heard some disturbing tales regarding your time in holy seclusion, [Root.GetSocietyRank]. I fear that you are not yet ready for the contemplation I expected of you. We will revisit this mission at a later date, but for the time being, I must consider this a failure.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
致[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]
我听到一些关于你隐居生活的不好的传闻，[Root.GetSocietyRank]。我担心你没有为这种冥思做好准备。我们过一段时间会重新评估你的任务，但是目前为止，我认为你失败了。

此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: I have failed you, [From.GetSocietyRank].
translation: 我让你失望了，[From.GetSocietyRank]。

original: [Root.holy_seclusion_points.GetName]: [Root.holy_seclusion_points.GetValue]
translation: [Root.holy_seclusion_points.GetName]：[Root.holy_seclusion_points.GetValue]

translation: 声闻
