original:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]
You have impressed us all with your noble rule and adherence to [Root.GetMOCode]. As a reward for your recent advancement to the rank of [Root.GetSocietyRank], I have sent you one of [Root.GetMOSaint]'s finger bones. Protect this holy relic with your life.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
[Root.GetMOGreeting]，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]
你的高贵原则和对[Root.GetMOCode]的遵守给我们所有人留下了深刻的印象。作为你最近晋升到[Root.GetSocietyRank]等级的奖励，我寄给你了一个[Root.GetMOSaint]的指骨。希望你不惜生命代价保护这个神圣的遗物。

此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: Saint's Fingerbone
translation: 圣指骨

original: This little bone is said to have come from a great saint.
translation: 据说这颗指骨来自一位伟大的圣人。

original: Muni
translation: 牟尼

original: This man has taken the Mahavrata vows and lives a life of asceticism, thus making him unable to marry or inherit.
translation: 这个男人接受了大雄尊者的誓言并决定终身不娶，所以这个人无法结婚或继承领地。

original: Aryika
translation: 苦行女僧

original: This woman has taken the Mahavrata vows and lives a life of asceticism, thus making her unable to marry or inherit.
translation: 这个女人接受了大雄尊者的誓言并决定终身不嫁，所以这个人无法结婚或继承领地。

original: Bhikkhu
translation: 比丘

original: This man lives a life of asceticism in accordance with the Patimokkha rules, thus making him unable to marry or inherit.
translation: 这个男人遵守出家人的戒律并决定终身不娶，所以这个人无法结婚或继承领地。

original: Bhikkuni
translation: 比丘尼

original: This woman lives a life of asceticism in accordance with the Patimokkha rules, thus making her unable to marry or inherit.
translation: 这个女人遵守出家人的戒律并决定终身不娶，所以这个人无法结婚或继承领地。

original: Sanyasi
translation: 苦行僧

original: This man has chosen a life of simplicity and celibacy, thus making him unable to marry or inherit.
translation: 这个男人选择了一种朴素而独身的生活方式，所以这个男人无法结婚或继承领地。

original: Sanyasini
translation: 苦行尼

original: This woman has chosen a life of simplicity and celibacy, thus making her unable to marry or inherit.
translation: 这个女人选择了一种朴素而独身的生活方式，所以这个女人无法结婚或继承领地。

original: Thief
translation: 小偷

original: Useless Moron
translation: 废物

original: My [rumor_councillor.GetJobTitle], [rumor_councillor.GetTitledFirstName], has brought me the most extraordinary news! Apparently [rumor_councillor.GetSheHe] has uncovered a rumor concerning an exceedingly special artifact. The specifics of [rumor_councillor.GetFirstName]'s information are uncertain, but [rumor_councillor.GetSheHe] is convinced that there is a degree of truth to the tales.
translation: 我的[rumor_councillor.GetJobTitle]，[rumor_councillor.GetTitledFirstName]，给我给我带来了离奇的消息！显然，[rumor_councillor.GetSheHe]发现了一个关于极特殊的宝物的消息。[rumor_councillor.GetFirstName]的消息并不确切，但[rumor_councillor.GetSheHe]认为这些故事有一定真实性。

original: Start the search at once, [rumor_councillor.GetJobTitle]!
translation: 立刻展开搜寻，[rumor_councillor.GetJobTitle]！

original: §Y[rumor_councillor.GetJobTitle] [rumor_councillor.GetFirstName]§! immediately begins to search for the extraordinary artifact.\n
translation: §Y[rumor_councillor.GetJobTitle][rumor_councillor.GetFirstName]§!立即开始寻找非凡宝物。\n

original: Excellent! You have my thanks, [rumor_councillor.GetFirstName]
translation: 太棒了！谢谢你，[rumor_councillor.GetFirstName]

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! can ask one of [Root.GetHerHis] councillors to search for the extraordinary artifact.\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!可以要求[Root.GetHerHis]一名内阁成员去寻找非凡宝物。\n

original: Rumor of Extraordinary Artifact
translation: 非凡宝物的传闻

original: This character has been reach by a rumor of an extraordinary artifact! They can send one of their councillors to search for it.
translation: 这个角色已经听闻了一个非凡的宝物的传闻！他们可以派他们的一位内阁成员去寻找它。

original: After the council meeting, [rumor_councillor.GetJobTitle] [rumor_councillor.GetFirstName] asked me to exchange a few words in private. Apparently [rumor_councillor.GetSheHe] has uncovered a rumor concerning a rare artifact. [rumor_councillor.GetFirstName] believed there was some truth to the rumor and urged me to have a search arranged.
translation: 内阁会议之后，[rumor_councillor.GetJobTitle][rumor_councillor.GetFirstName]找我私人谈话。显然，[rumor_councillor.GetSheHe]发现了一个关于稀世宝物的消息。[rumor_councillor.GetFirstName]相信这是真的并劝我去寻找它。

original: A good idea, [rumor_councillor.GetJobTitle]. You should arrange it.
translation: 这是一个好主意，[rumor_councillor.GetJobTitle]。你应该去筹备它。

original: §Y[rumor_councillor.GetJobTitle] [rumor_councillor.GetFirstName]§! immediately begins to search for the rare artifact.\n
translation: §Y[rumor_councillor.GetJobTitle][rumor_councillor.GetFirstName]§!立即开始寻找稀世宝物。\n

original: You have my thanks, [rumor_councillor.GetFirstName]!
translation: 谢谢你，[rumor_councillor.GetFirstName]！

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! can ask one of [Root.GetHerHis] councillors to search for the rare artifact.\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!可以要求[Root.GetHerHis]一名内阁成员去寻找稀世宝物。\n

original: Rumor of Rare Artifact
translation: 稀世宝物的传闻

original: This character has been reached by a rumor of a rare artifact! They can send one of their councillors to search for it.
translation: 这个角色已经听闻了一个稀世宝物的传闻！他们可以派他们的一位内阁成员去寻找它。

original: During this evening's council meeting, [rumor_councillor.GetJobTitle] [rumor_councillor.GetFirstName] told us of a rumor [rumor_councillor.GetSheHe] had encountered. The peasants speak of an artifact hidden not far away from here. The specifics of [rumor_councillor.GetFirstName]'s information are uncertain, but perhaps this would be worth investigating.
translation: 在夜晚的内阁会议上，[rumor_councillor.GetJobTitle][rumor_councillor.GetFirstName]告诉我们[rumor_councillor.GetSheHe]听到了一个传说。农民说一件宝物藏在离这里很远的地方。[rumor_councillor.GetFirstName]的信息的细节并不确切，但可能值得调查。

original: [rumor_councillor.GetJobTitle] [rumor_councillor.GetFirstName], arrange a search.
translation: 筹备一次搜寻行动，[rumor_councillor.GetJobTitle][rumor_councillor.GetFirstName]。

original: §Y[rumor_councillor.GetJobTitle] [rumor_councillor.GetFirstName]§! immediately begins to search for the artifact.\n
translation: §Y[rumor_councillor.GetJobTitle][rumor_councillor.GetFirstName]§!马上开始寻找宝物。\n

original: Interesting...
translation: 有趣……

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! can ask one of [Root.GetHerHis] councillors to search for the artifact.\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!可以要求[Root.GetHerHis]一名内阁成员去寻找宝物。\n

original: Rumor of Artifact
translation: 宝物传闻

original: This character heard a rumor concerning an artifact. They can send one of their councillors to search for it.
translation: 这个角色听说了一个关于宝物的传闻。他们可以派一位内阁成员去寻找宝物。

original: [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] approached me after the council meeting to request some more diplomats to aid [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] in obtaining more information concerning the rumored artifact. While I could divert some of my envoys to this task for a time, our regular diplomatic efforts would suffer due to the neglect.
translation: [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle][relic_hunter.GetFirstName]在内阁会议后向我走近，向我申请额外的外交官帮助[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]获得更多关于传说中的宝物的信息。虽然我可以暂时将我的一些特使转移到这项任务上，但我们往常的外交努力会因为被忽视而受到影响。

original: You shall have your diplomats, [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle].
translation: 你会得到你要求的外交官，[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]。

original: §Y[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName]§! makes significant progress in the search for the rumored artifact.\n
translation: §Y[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle][relic_hunter.GetFirstName]§!在传说中宝物的搜寻中取得了显著进展。\n

original: I cannot spare these important resources.
translation: 我不能让出这些重要资源。

original: §Y[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName]§! struggles in the search for the rumored artifact.\n
translation: §Y[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle][relic_hunter.GetFirstName]§!在传说中宝物的搜寻中踟蹰不前。\n

original: The hunt for the rumored artifact has begun to slow down, [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] just informed me. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] has some valuable and promising leads, but to investigate them the search must venture into distant, inhospitable lands. [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] claims [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] needs more soldiers to attempt such a venture.
translation: [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle][relic_hunter.GetFirstName]刚刚通知我，对传说中的宝物的搜寻已经开始放缓。[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap]有一些有价值的、有希望的线索，但要调查它们，必须进入遥远、荒凉的土地搜索。[relic_hunter.GetFirstName]声称[relic_hunter.GetSheHe]需要更多士兵来尝试这样的冒险。

original: We cannot miss this opportunity.
translation: 我们不能错过这个机会。

original: Occupied Diplomats
translation: 忙碌的外交官

original: The court diplomats of this ruler are occupied with a special project and general diplomatic efforts are suffering as a consequence.
translation: 这位统治者的宫廷外交官被特别任务占用，一般外交行为正在受到影响。

original: Adventuring Soldiers
translation: 冒险的士兵

original: A large number of this character's soldiers are occupied with a mission in distant lands.
translation: 这个角色的一支大军在遥远的土地忙于执行任务。

original: My [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has sought me out with [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] concerns regarding the search for the relic. [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has asked me to issue a decree allowing [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] treasure hunters to appropriate the resources and men they need from the local burghers.
translation: 我的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle][relic_hunter.GetFirstName]一直在找我讨论[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]对遗物搜索的想法。[relic_hunter.GetFirstName]已经请求我签署一项法令允许[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]宝藏猎人从当地商人那里挪用资源和人力。

original: You shall have your decree, [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle].
translation: 你会得到你想要的法令，[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]。

original: I cannot provoke my subjects in such a way.
translation: 我不能以这样的方式惹怒我的臣民。

original: [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has uncovered several clues indicating that [spy_target.GetTitledFirstName] of [spy_title.GetName] possesses important information regarding the rumored artifact. However, [spy_target.GetSheHe] is unwilling to talk and [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] wants more spies transferring from their regular missions to target the [spy_target.GetTitle] instead.
translation: [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle][reic_hunter.GetFirstName]已经发现了一些线索，表明[spy_title.GetName]的[spy_target.GetTitledFirstName]拥有关于传闻工艺品的重要信息。然而[spy_target.GetSheHe]不愿多谈，并且[relic_hunter.GetFirstName]希望更多的间谍从他们的常规任务中转移到[spy_target.GetTitle]的目标中来。

original: The artifact is of great importance. The spies are yours.
translation: 这件宝物非常重要。这些间谍归你调配了。

original: [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has spent many weeks bent over ancient tomes and scrolls in search of more information regarding the rumored artifact. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] claims to be on the right path but apparently the progress is slow. [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has asked of me to order the best scholars in [primary_title.GetName] to aid [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] in [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] efforts.
translation: [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle][relic_hunter.GetFirstName]花费了数周时间在古代书籍和卷轴中寻找关于传说中的宝物的更多讯息。[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap]声称自己没有入歧途，但显然进展缓慢。[relic_hunter.GetFirstName]请求我命令[primary_title.GetName]最优秀的学者帮助[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]进行[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]工作。

original: The brightest minds shall be at your disposal.
translation: 最聪明的头脑将会任你支配。

original: Decree of Appropriation
translation: 拨款法令

original: This character has made a decree allowing their treasure hunters to appropriate any resources required from the local burghers.
translation: 这个角色已经颁布了一项法令，允许他们的寻宝者从本地市民中挪用所需的一切资源。

original: Occupied Spies
translation: 忙碌的间谍

original: This character has had a large number of their spies diverted from their current missions to investigate rumors of a lost artifact.
translation: 这个角色有大批间谍从他们手头任务转到调查失传宝物的传闻来。

original: Occupied Scholars
translation: 忙碌的学者

original: This character has ordered the brightest minds in their demesne to aid an investigation concerning a lost artifact.
translation: 这个角色已命令直辖领中最有智慧的人才去协助关于失落宝物的调查。

original: Despite the monthly sum of gold I have set aside for the artifact investigation, [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] claims that [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] lacks the sufficient funds. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] has asked me to put an additional sum to [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] disposal.
translation: 尽管我已经为宝物调查拨付了每月的专项预算，[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle][relic_hunter.GetFirstName]仍声称[relic_hunter.GetSheHe]缺乏足够的资金。[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap]要求我签署一笔额外的专款供[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]支配。

original: I understand, [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]. You shall have the money.
translation: 我明白，[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]。你将会获得一些资金。

original: 'Lacks the sufficient funds'? What a wastrel!
translation: 「缺少足够的资金」？真是废物！

original: §Y[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName]§! is given no additional money.\n
translation: §Y[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle][relic_hunter.GetFirstName]§!没有被给予额外的资金。\n

original: One of my spies has brought me some disturbing news. Apparently [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has been putting the extra funds I gave [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] in [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] own pocket!
translation: 我的一个间谍给我带来了一些令人不安的消息。很显然[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle][relic_hunter.GetFirstName]已经把我给[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]的额外资金挪进了[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]自己的口袋！

original: I never should have trusted that light-fingered traitor!
translation: 我从不该信任那个惯偷叛徒！

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! reveals the crime of §Y[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName]§! and is allowed to imprison [relic_hunter.GetHerHim].\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!揭露了§Y[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle][relic_hunter.GetFirstName]§!的罪行并被允许逮捕[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]。\n

original: I shall show mercy but demand doubled efforts.
translation: 我会宽恕你，但我要求你加倍努力。

original: §Y[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName]§! is thankful and works harder from now on, speeding up the search a little.
translation: §Y[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle][relic_hunter.GetFirstName]§!表示感激并从此工作得更加卖力，这稍微提升了搜寻的速度。

original: For some time now, I have been worried about [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName]'s progress, or rather, the lack thereof. Now my worst fears have been confirmed. As a consequence of [relic_hunter.GetFirstName]'s carelessness, an accident has occurred and a large amount of the resources and documentation was ruined!
translation: 我为[relic_hunter.GetFirstName]的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]工作进展，或者说落后的进展已经担忧很长时间了。现在我内心中最恐惧的噩梦已成为现实。因为[relic_hunter.GetFirstName]的疏忽大意，现在一场灾难发生了，大量的资源与档案被毁！

original: Why did I entrust the search to that [GetRootFromInsult]?!
translation: 我怎么就派了那个[GetRootFromInsult]去找的？

original: There is a big setback in the search for the rumored artifact.
translation: 传说中宝物的搜寻遭遇重大挫折。

original: [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has shared an intriguing discovery with me. During [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] search for the artifact, [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] has come across the rumors of an even rarer object! If we decide to pursue this new lead instead we can still make use of some of the old research and resources, [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] tells me.
translation: [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle][relic_hunter.GetFirstName]与我分享了一个有趣的发现。在[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]宝物搜寻期间，[relic_hunter.GetSheHe]听到了一件更稀有物品的谣言！[relic_hunter.GetFirstName]告诉我，如果改为寻找这个新东西，以前的研究和资源仍然能够派上用场。

original: How exciting! We shall investigate the new lead instead.
translation: 真令人兴奋啊！我们将会调查新的线索。

original: The original investigation ends, but some of the progress will still be helpful in the new search.\n
translation: 原先的调查结束了，但其中的某些进展仍将对新的搜索有所帮助。\n

original: The risks are too great. We stay on the original path.
translation: 风险太大了。我们待在原来的路上。

original: Search for Artifact
translation: 寻找宝物

original: Because §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has heard of the rumors of a lost artifact [From.GetSheHe] can order [From.GetHerHis] [Root.GetJobTitle], §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!, to arrange a search for it.
translation: 因为§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!听说过失落宝物的传言，所以[From.GetSheHe]可以命令[From.GetHerHis][Root.GetJobTitle]，§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!安排针对宝物的搜索。

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! is a councilor of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!是§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!的一名内阁成员。\n

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! arranges a search for the rumored artifact.\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!筹备了一场对传闻中的宝物的搜寻。\n

original: The previous artifact hunter is replaced.\n
translation: 先前的寻宝人已被替换。\n

original: Some of the previously made progress is lost.\n
translation: 一些以前的进展丢失了。\n

original: End Search for Artifact
translation: 不再寻找宝物

original: Ask §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! to stop searching for the rumored artifact.
translation: 要求§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!停止对传闻中的宝物的搜寻。

original: The search for the artifact is ended. A new councilor can be appointed to lead the search as long as the rumor is still viable.
translation: 这次搜寻宝物的行动结束了。只要传闻仍然存在，一名新的内阁成员就可以被任命去领导搜寻行动。

original: [Root.relic_score.GetValue]
translation: [Root.relic_score.GetValue]

original: Paying for Artifact Search
translation: 为寻宝活动付款

original: This character is paying one of their councilors to search for a rumored artifact.
translation: 这个角色付钱给一位内阁成员去搜寻一件传说中的宝物。

original: Paying for Artifact Search
translation: 为寻宝活动付款

original: This character is paying one of their councilors to search for artifacts.
translation: 这个角色付钱给一位内阁成员去搜寻宝物。

original: Paying for Artifact Search
translation: 为寻宝活动付款

original: This character is paying one of their councilors to search for artifacts.
translation: 这个角色付钱给一位内阁成员去搜寻宝物。

original: [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] came to me with some regrettable news. It seems like the too much has passed since we first uncovered the rumor of the artifact and now the trail has gone cold. There is no hope of finding the lost treasure and the search has been canceled.
translation: [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle][relic_hunter.GetFirstName]带来了一些令人遗憾的消息。距离我们首次发现宝物的传闻已经过了很多年，现在这条线索已经过时了。已经没有希望找到失去的宝藏了，搜索不得不取消。

original: [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] can no longer fulfill [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] duty to search for the rumored artifact. I can select another councilor to replace [relic_hunter.GetHerHim].
translation: [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle][relic_hunter.GetFirstName]不再能够执行[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]搜寻传闻中财宝的使命了。我能够选择另一名内阁成员去代替[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]。

original: [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap] must have cast a curse on me and my venture to recover the lost artifact, for I was just brought the most dreadful news! [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] died in an unexplainable accident while searching for the artifact.
translation: [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap]一定对我和我寻回失落宝物的旅途施以了诅咒，因为我刚刚得知一个可怕的消息！[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle][relic_hunter.GetFirstName]在搜寻宝物时死于无法解释的意外。

original: [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] is with [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] now.
translation: [relic_hunter.GetFirstName]魂归[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]了。

original: The names of some Assassins will live on forever. These extraordinary [Root.GetMenWomen] spent their entire lives studying and practicing the arts of an Assassin – disguise, infiltration, combat, and war strategies, as well as the customs and languages of their enemies. Finding and training the shining star of the next generation is a duty which has fallen upon you.
translation: 一些刺客的名字将永存于世。这些非凡的[Root.GetMenWomen]一生都在学习和实践刺客的艺术——伪装、渗透、战斗和战争策略，以及敌人的习俗和语言。寻找和培养下一代闪耀之星是一项落到你身上的责任。

original: Assassinate [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 暗杀[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]

original: The Assassins prefer to intimidate their enemies into submission, but a threat is not threatening without any actual weight behind it. Therefore the Order assassinate their biggest enemies publicly to strike fear in the hearts of anyone who dare oppose them. Your mission is to assassinate §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!, a punishment for [FromFrom.GetHerHis] crimes against the Order and the True Faith.
translation: 刺客们喜欢将他们的敌人吓破胆，但是背后没有分量的威胁并不能吓住敌人们。因此，为了在任何胆敢反对他们的人心中制造恐惧，教团决定在公共场所行刺他们最大的敌人。你的任务是刺杀§Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!，这是一种惩罚，因为[FromFrom.GetHerHis]罪行违背了教团和真正的信仰。

original: To complete this mission, §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! must successfully complete a murder plot against [Root.GetHerHis] target, §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!. To initiate the plot, select the diplomatic action §Y'Plot to Kill'§! by right-clicking on the portrait of §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
translation: 要完成这项任务，§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!必须成功完成对[Root.GetHerHis]目标，§Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!的谋杀密谋。通过在§Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!的头像上右键点击并选择§Y密谋杀死§!的外交行动以发起密谋。

original: Convert [FromFrom.GetName] to Shi'ism
translation: 使[FromFrom.GetName]皈依什叶派

original: The most essential goals of the Assassins is to protect the believers of the True Faith and spread the words of Allah, Muhammad and Ali to every corner of the Earth. While even the most remote lands shall be converted one day, first we must turn to places closer to home. Your mission is to convert the county [FromFrom.GetName] to Shi'ism.
translation: 对于阿萨辛来说最重要的目标就是保护拥有真正信仰的信徒，并将安拉、穆罕默德和阿里的话传遍世界上的每一个角落。总有一天即使是最偏远的土地也会皈依，但首先我们必须从距离我们较近的目标开始，你的任务是让[FromFrom.GetName]皈依什叶派。

original: To complete this mission, the religion of the county [FromFrom.GetName] must become Shia. To convert [FromFrom.GetName], send your court Mullah to §Y'Proselytize'§! there.
translation: 要完成这个任务，必须把[FromFrom.GetName]伯爵领的信仰变为什叶派。派遣你的宫廷毛拉在那里§Y「传教」§!，使[FromFrom.GetName]皈依。

original: Collect Debt From [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 从[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]处收债

original: §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§! borrowed a significant amount of gold from the Order. When it was time to pay it back, [FromFrom.GetSheHe] refused. It is your mission to scare §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§! to the point where [FromFrom.GetSheHe] will beg the Order to accept [FromFrom.GetHerHis] money.
translation: §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!欠下了教团大量的黄金。到了偿还日期时，[FromFrom.GetSheHe]这个老赖拒绝支付。我们的任务是恐吓§Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!让[FromFrom.GetSheHe]乖乖还[FromFrom.GetHerHis]钱。

original: To complete this mission, §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! must successfully complete a debt collection plot against [Root.GetHerHis] target, §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!. To initiate the plot, select §Y'Collect Debt from [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'§! in the Intrigue menu.
translation: 要完成这项任务，§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!必须成功完成对[Root.GetHerHis]目标，§Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!的收债密谋。在密谋菜单选择§Y向[FromFrom.GetFirstName]收债§!以开始这个密谋。

original: Occupy [FromFrom.GetName]
translation: 占领[FromFrom.GetName]

original: To protect the True Faith, the Assassins must sometimes make a preemptive strike against the infidels. You shall attack one of our enemies' key holdings, the [FromFrom.GetHolding] of [FromFrom.GetName] in [FromFrom.Location.County.GetName]. Your mission is completed when the [FromFrom.GetHolding] is under your control.
translation: 为了保护真正的信仰，阿萨辛们必须有时对异教徒进行先发制人的打击。你应该攻击我们的某个敌人的战略要冲，位于[FromFrom.Location.County.GetName]中[FromFrom.GetName]的[FromFrom.GetHolding]。当[FromFrom.GetHolding]在我们的控制之下时，你的任务就完成了。

original: To complete this mission, declare war on §Y[FromFrom.Holder.Realm.Holder.GetTitledName]§! and siege the holding [FromFrom.GetName] in the county [FromFrom.Location.GetName] until it is under the control of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
translation: 要完成这项任务，对§Y[FromFrom.Holder.Realm.Holder.GetTitledName]§!宣战并且围攻在伯爵领[FromFrom.Location.GetName]上的[FromFrom.GetName]领地直到它处于§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!的控制下。

original: Corrupt [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 腐化[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]

original: The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] are oblivious fools. §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§! leads [FromFrom.GetHerHis] sheepish flock down a path which will only bring weakness and stagnation. It is up to you to give [FromFrom.GetHerHim] a new direction.
translation: [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]们都是迟钝的蠢货。§Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!领导着[FromFrom.GetHerHis]怯懦的羊群走向一条只会带来虚弱和停滞的道路。你决定给[FromFrom.GetHerHim]指引一个新的方向。

original: To complete this mission, §Gright-click§! on the portrait of §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!, select §Y'Corrupt [FromFrom.Religion.GetPriestTitle]'§! and successfully corrupt [FromFrom.GetHerHim].
translation: 要完成这项任务，在§Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!的头像上§G右键点击§!，选择§Y腐化[FromFrom.Religion.GetPriestTitle]§!并成功使[FromFrom.GetHerHim]堕落。

original: Desecrate the Temple of [FromFrom.GetName]
translation: 亵渎[FromFrom.GetName]的神殿

original: Sacrifice a Ruler
translation: 献祭领主

original: The powerful and mighty [Root.GetDWDevil] takes and gives. While we are rewarded with powers far beyond what most kings and queens ever dream of, everything has a price. [Root.GetDWDevil] demands payment in blood and souls. Offer them the life of a powerful ruler.
translation: 强大而威武的[Root.GetDWDevil]时而索取时而给予。虽然我们获得了比诸多君王梦寐以求的还要强大的力量，但任何事情都有代价。[Root.GetDWDevil]要求支付血液和灵魂。献祭强大统治者的生命以兹享用。

original: To complete this mission, §Gright-click§! on the portrait of a prisoner in your dungeons who is a landed ruler and select §Y'Sacrifice to [Root.GetDWDevil]'§!.
translation: 在你监狱里的一个有地的囚犯领主的头像上§G右键点击§!并选择§Y献祭给[Root.GetDWDevil]§!以完成任务。

original: Sacrifice a Holy Person
translation: 献祭圣职者

original: The powerful and mighty [Root.GetDWDevil] takes and gives. While we are rewarded with powers far beyond what most kings and queens ever dream of, everything has a price. [Root.GetDWDevil] demands payment in blood and souls. Offer them someone who pledged their life to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].
translation: 强大无比的[Root.GetDWDevil]施与也同样索取，我们得到了大多数国王女王做梦也想象不到的权利，然而凡事都有代价。[Root.GetDWDevil]所要求的报酬是献祭肉体与灵魂。被献祭的这个人曾宣誓将生命供奉给[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]。

original: To complete this mission, §Gright-click§! on the portrait of a prisoner in your dungeons who is a [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] or an ascetic and select §Y'Sacrifice to [Root.GetDWDevil]'§!.
translation: §G右键点击§!你牢狱中的一个[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]或苦行者囚犯头像并选择§Y「献祭给[Root.GetDWDevil]」§!以完成该任务。

original: Sacrifice a Virgin
translation: 献祭处子

original: The powerful and mighty [Root.GetDWDevil] takes and gives. While we are rewarded with powers far beyond what most kings and queens ever dream of, everything has a price. [Root.GetDWDevil] demands payment in blood and souls. Offer them the life of someone who has never known love.
translation: 强大而威武的[Root.GetDWDevil]时而索取时而给予。虽然我们获得了比诸多君王梦寐以求的还要强大的力量，但任何事情都有代价。[Root.GetDWDevil]要求支付血液和灵魂。献祭未经人事者的生命以兹享用。

original: To complete this mission, §Gright-click§! on the portrait of a prisoner in your dungeons who is a virgin and select §Y'Sacrifice to [Root.GetDWDevil]'§!. Children, chaste and ascetic characters are likely virgins.
translation: 要完成这项任务，在你监狱里的一个童贞囚犯的头像上§G右键点击§!并选择§Y「献祭给[Root.GetDWDevil]」§!以完成任务。儿童、忠贞者以及苦行者很有可能是童贞。

original: Sacrifice a Dwarf
translation: 献祭侏儒

original: The powerful and mighty [Root.GetDWDevil] takes and gives. While we are rewarded with powers far beyond what most kings and queens ever dream of, everything has a price. [Root.GetDWDevil] demands payment in blood and souls. Offer them the life of a dwarf.
translation: 强大而威武的[Root.GetDWDevil]时而索取时而给予。虽然我们获得了比诸多君王梦寐以求的还要强大的力量，但任何事情都有代价。[Root.GetDWDevil]要求支付血液和灵魂。献祭矮人的生命以兹享用。

original: To complete this mission, §Gright-click§! on the portrait of a prisoner in your dungeons who is a dwarf and select §Y'Sacrifice to [Root.GetDWDevil]'§!.
translation: 要完成这项任务，在你监狱里的一个侏儒囚犯的头像上§G右键点击§!并选择§Y「献祭给[Root.GetDWDevil]」§!。

original: Spawn of [Root.GetDWDevil]
translation: [Root.GetDWDevil]之卵

original: The time has come for the embodied spawn of [Root.GetDWDevil] to enter this world and bring about a new era of glorious majesty. This child will lead humankind to a great future where we, the true followers, shall rule empires. The honor of choosing the unholy mother has fallen upon you.
translation: [Root.GetDWDevil]的具现之卵即将进入世间，开创辉煌壮丽的新纪元。这个孩子将带领人类走向伟大的未来，在那里我们这些真正的追随者将主宰诸多帝国。选择渎圣之母的荣耀已降于汝身。

original: Demonic Possession
translation: 恶魔附体

original: Our almighty [Root.GetDWDevil] needs all sort of servants. For some missions, a true [Root.GetDWMagician] is needed. Other and more menial tasks, however, do not require the same kind of power and wit. Place §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§! under your control and have them carry out [Root.GetDWDevil]'s wishes.
translation: 我们「全能」的[Root.GetDWDevil]需要各种仆人。为了某些特殊任务，一个专业的[Root.GetDWMagician]不可或缺。然而，其他的琐事并不需要如此程度的力量和智慧。将§Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!置于你的控制下，让他们贯彻[Root.GetDWDevil]的意志。

original: To complete this mission, §Gright-click§! on the portrait of §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!, select §Y'Demonic Possession'§! and successfully enthrall [FromFrom.GetHerHim].
translation: 要完成这项任务，在§Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!的头像上§G右键点击§!，选择§Y恶魔附体§!并成功附身[FromFrom.GetHerHim]。

original: Secluded Penance
translation: 闭门苦修

original: To complete this mission, select §Y'Do Penance'§! in the Intrigue Menu and successfully complete your holy seclusion.
translation: 要完成这项任务，在密谋菜单选择§Y进行苦修§!并成功完成你神圣的隐居。

original: Secluded Meditation
translation: 闭门冥想

original: To bring yourself closer to the divine and the final freedom, you are to seclude yourself to meditate. Spend your days reading [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName], saying mantras and contemplating your actions and the universe. During this time, you must live simply and restrict your access to the outside world.
translation: 为了让自己更接近神圣和最终的自由，你必须闭门冥想。花时间阅读[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]，诵念咒语，思考你的行为和宇宙。您必须简朴地生活并与外部世界隔绝。

original: To complete this mission, select §Y'Begin Secluded Meditation'§! in the Intrigue Menu and successfully complete your holy seclusion.
translation: 要完成这项任务，在密谋菜单选择§Y开始闭门冥想§!并成功完成你神圣的隐居。

original: Donate to Charity
translation: 慈善捐赠

original: An important function of [Root.Society.GetName] is helping those in need. Our ability to perform charity is entirely dependent upon donations from the wealthy. As a powerful ruler you are expected to contribute to this cause.
translation: 帮助那些需要帮助的人是[Root.Society.GetName]的一个重要职责。而我们励行慈善的能力完全取决于富人的捐赠。作为一个强大的统治者，我们希望你能为这个事业做出贡献。

original: Pick the Theology Focus
translation: 选择神学重心

original: Even though a member of [Root.Society.GetName] always keeps their spiritual development in mind, no matter where they go and what they do, there is a time in all of our lives where these matters become even more crucial. It is time for you to focus on theology.
translation: 即使[Root.Society.GetName]的成员一直把他们的精神发展放在心上，不管他们去哪里或做什么，但是在我们的生命中都有一段时间，这些事情会变得更为至关重要。现在是你专注于神学的时候了。

original: To complete this mission, pick the §Y'Theology'§! focus in the Character screen.
translation: 要完成这项任务，在角色界面选择「§Y神学§!」重心。

original: Build a [Root.GetHouseOfWorship]
translation: 建造一座[Root.GetHouseOfWorship]

original: To every member of the [Root.Society.GetName], the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship] is like a second home. We come here to study, worship and say our [Root.GetPrayers]. Building a new [Root.GetHouseOfWorship] will offer a safe harbor for the local believers and act as an outpost of the Faith, an outstretched hand to those on the wrong path.
translation: 对[Root.Society.GetName]的每一位成员来讲，[Root.GetHouseOfWorship]就像是自己的家一样。我们聚集在此学习、礼拜以及默默[Root.GetPrayers]。建立一座新的[Root.GetHouseOfWorship]会给本地的信徒们一个安全港湾并且作为一个信仰的前哨站，给那些走上歧途的人们伸出一双手。

original: To complete this mission, build a temple holding in a county in your realm.
translation: 在你领地的一个省份上建造一座神殿以完成这项任务。

original: As a practitioner of [Root.GetDWDarkMagic], §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! can summon a familiar of [Root.GetHerHis] choice. This supernatural guardian will grant §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! its powers by increasing [Root.GetHerHis] attributes.
translation: 身为[Root.GetDWDarkMagic]的执掌者，§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!可以根据[Root.GetHerHis]选择召唤一个使魔。这个超自然的守护者会将它的力量赋予§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!，从而增加[Root.GetHerHis]属性。

original: And so, it is done.
translation: 如此一来，完成了。

original: Now you can only await the pending birth.
translation: 现在你只能等待即将到来的分娩。

original: Finally, [From.GetSheHe] is here! As I look down on the [From.GetFaceDescription], brilliant face of my little [From.GetSonDaughter], I truly feel that everything I had to do to bring this moment into existence was worth it. Only time will reveal what powers [From.GetHerHis] [Root.GetDWDemon] blood has granted [From.GetHerHim], but I anticipate great things to come...
translation: [From.GetSheHe]终于到来了！当我低头看向我的小[From.GetSonDaughter]那[From.GetFaceDescription]闪耀脸蛋，我感到我为这一刻所做的一切努力都是完全值得的。只有时间会揭示[From.GetHerHis][Root.GetDWDemon]之血赋予了[From.GetHerHim]什么力量，但我期待好事到来……

original: Finally, [From.GetSheHe] is here! [unholy_mother.GetTitledFirstName] went into labor last night and early this morning, little [From.GetFirstName] was born. [From.GetSheHeCap] seems strong and healthy. Even though only time can reveal what powers [From.GetHerHis] [Root.GetDWDemon] blood has granted [From.GetHerHim], I anticipate great things to come...
translation: [From.GetSheHe]终于到来了！[unholy_mother.GetTitledFirstName]昨天晚上开始分娩，到今天凌晨，小[From.GetFirstName]诞生了。[From.GetSheHeCap]看起来很健壮。只有时间会揭示[From.GetHerHis][Root.GetDWDemon]之血赋予了[From.GetHerHim]什么力量，但我期待好事到来……

original: Hail [Root.GetDWDevil]!
translation: [Root.GetDWDevil]万岁！

original:
[Root.GetDWDevil]'s favors, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

We believe it would please [Root.GetDWDevil] greatly should [corrupt_priest_mission_target.GetTitledFirstName] fall into depravity. See to it, and you will be greatly rewarded.

[Root.GetDWExpression]
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
[Root.GetDWDevil]的宠儿，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]

我们相信，如果[corrupt_priest_mission_target.GetTitledFirstName]堕入深渊，它会让[Root.GetDWDevil]大为受用。处理这件事对你大有好处。

[Root.GetDWExpression]
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original:
Greetings, [Root.GetTitledFirstName]

[Root.GetDWDevil] has demanded another soul to aid us on our glorious mission. Bewitch [demonic_possession_mission_target.GetTitledFirstName] and make [demonic_possession_mission_target.GetHerHim] your loyal servant – willing or not. Please see to this matter at once.

[Root.GetDWExpression]
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
致[Root.GetTitledFirstName]

[Root.GetDWDevil]需要另一个灵魂来协助我们伟大的事业。对[demonic_possession_mission_target.GetTitledFirstName]施加法术，让[demonic_possession_mission_target.GetHerHim]变成你忠诚的仆人——不论本人是否愿意。请立刻处理这件事情。

[Root.GetDWExpression]
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original:
[Root.GetDWDevil]'s favors, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

An opportunity to strike at the foolish followers of false gods has presented itself. Their [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s in [dw_desecration_target.GetName] are ignorant of the true state of the world. Tear down their idols and steal their wealth in the name of [Root.GetDWDevil]!

[Root.GetDWExpression]
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
[Root.GetDWDevil]的宠儿，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]啊，

打击信仰伪神之人的机会已然出现。他们在[dw_desecration_target.GetName]的[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]们显然对世界的真实一无所知。以[Root.GetDWDevil]的名义，他们的偶像将化为一堆残骸，他们的财富将为我们所拥有！

[Root.GetDWExpression]
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original:
[Root.GetDWDevil]'s favors, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

The great and mighty [Root.GetDWDevil] has given us so much, and now it is time for us to offer them a gift in return. [Root.GetDWDevil] craves a soul to serve them in their dark realm and we have the perfect kind in mind. Capture and sacrifice a [Root.GetDWSacrifice], [Root.GetSocietyRank]!

[Root.GetDWExpression]
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
[Root.GetDWDevil]的宠儿，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

伟大的[Root.GetDWDevil]已经给了我们很多东西，现在是时候让我们准备一份礼物作为回报了。[Root.GetDWDevil]渴望能有一个灵魂在他们的黑暗国度中为他们服务，而我们心里已经有了一个完美的方法。抓住并献祭一个[Root.GetDWSacrifice]吧，[Root.GetSocietyRank]！

[Root.GetDWExpression]
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original:
[Root.GetDWDevil]'s favors, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

The day we have long awaited is finally upon us! The time has come for the child of [Root.GetDWDevil] to enter this world and lead us to a new area of power and glory! The choice of the lucky mother falls upon you, honorable [Root.GetSocietyRank].

[Root.GetDWExpression]
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
[Root.GetDWDevil]的宠儿，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

我们期待已久的一天终于来临了！是时候让[Root.GetDWDevil]的孩子进入这个世界，赐予我们权力和荣耀！选择那位幸运母亲的荣耀已降于汝身，光荣的[Root.GetSocietyRank]。

[Root.GetDWExpression]
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

[Root.Society.GetNameCap] is in need of more funds to maintain charitable functions. We hope you are able to spare some of your worldly wealth to help us on this holy mission.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
[Root.GetMOGreeting]，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]

[Root.Society.GetNameCap]需要更多的资金以维持慈善事业。希望你能捐出部分世俗财产，帮助我们完成这项神圣的使命。

[Root.GetMOFarewell]，
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

It has been brought to our attention that you are perhaps not spending the appropriate effort on matters of theology. We would like to encourage you to set aside your worldly worries and focus on matters divine in nature.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
[Root.GetMOGreeting]，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]

我们注意到到你可能在神学方面下的功夫不够。我们鼓励你暂时放下世俗的担忧，专心研究神圣的学问。

[Root.GetMOFarewell]，
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

The Order and [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] cares much for the souls of our members. As such we would like to advise you to go on a pilgrimage, since you have not yet done so.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
[Root.GetMOGreeting]，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]

修会和[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]非常关心我们成员的灵魂。鉴于你尚未完成朝圣，因此，我们建议你去朝圣。

[Root.GetMOFarewell]，
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

Bringing the True Faith and salvation to others is among the holiest of duties. Therefore we ask of you to construct a new [Root.GetHouseOfWorship] in your lands so your subjects may have somewhere to say [Root.GetPrayers] and worship.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
[Root.GetMOGreeting]，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]

为他人带来真正的信仰和拯救是最神圣的职责之一。因此，我们要求你在你的土地上建造一个新的[Root.GetHouseOfWorship]，这样你的臣民就可以在某个地方进行[Root.GetPrayers]和礼拜。

[Root.GetMOFarewell]，
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

[Root.Society.GetNameCap] has received your graciously donated gift. You have our thanks, in addition to those whose lives will be greatly approved by your charity.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
[Root.GetMOGreeting]，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]

[Root.Society.GetNameCap]已经收到了您慷慨相赠的礼物。那些生活将因您的慷慨捐赠而极大改善的人们和我们都对您充满着感谢。

[Root.GetMOFarewell]，
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: I only did my duty, [From.GetSocietyRank].
translation: 我只是尽了我的义务而已，[From.GetSocietyRank]。

original:
[Root.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

We are happy to hear that you have devoted your time to matters of theology. May the coming years of devoted study bless you with new insights.

[Root.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
[Root.GetMOGreeting]，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]

我们很高兴地得知了你花费了大量的时间致力于神学之上。愿你在未来几年的研究生活中能够领悟一些新的见解。

[Root.GetMOFarewell]，
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] shall be my foremost companion.

此致，
[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: Enables §Gright-clicking§! the portraits of your prisoners to Sacrifice them to [Root.GetDWDevil], in order to gain §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!. Certain prisoners, and mission targets, will please [Root.Society.GetName] more. Be aware that too many Sacrifices may draw attention to your society.
translation: 允许§G右键点击§!你囚徒的头像，将他们献祭给[Root.GetDWDevil]以换取§Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!。某些囚徒和任务目标会使[Root.Society.GetName]感到更加满意。注意，过多的献祭会使你的社团被人注意。

original: Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your character's portrait to Summon a Familiar, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.

original: Enables §Gright-clicking§! the portrait of your spouse in order to annul your marriage, in the name of [Root.GetDWDevil], in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!. Your spouse will be no more.
translation: 允许§G右键点击§!你配偶的头像，以[Root.GetDWDevil]的名义来取消婚姻。需要花费§Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!，你的配偶将会死去。

original: Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your character's portrait in order to perform a dark ritual to heal yourself, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
translation: 允许§G右键点击§!你的头像以使用黑暗仪式治愈你自己，需要花费§Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!。

original: Enables the decision to invite a member of §Y[Root.Society.GetName]§! to join you at your court, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
translation: 允许决议邀请一名§Y[Root.Society.GetName]§!成员到你的宫廷，需要花费§Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!。

original: Enables §Gright-clicking§! the portraits of your children in an attempt to steal their life force, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
translation: 允许§G右键点击§!你子女的头像盗取他们的寿命，需要花费§Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!。

original: Enables §Gright-clicking§! the portraits of your vassals, courtiers, and rivals, in an attempt to curse them with bad health and disease, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
translation: 允许§G右键点击§!你封臣、内阁成员及仇敌的头像诅咒他们，降低他们的健康或让他们生病，需要花费§Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!。

original: Next rank will unlock: §YSummon Familiar§!, §YTainted Touch§!, and §YDemonic Possession§!
translation: 下一位阶将解锁：§Y召唤使魔§!，§Y感染之触§!和§Y恶魔附体§!

original: Next rank will unlock: §YDark Divorce§! and §YDark Healing§!
translation: 下一位阶将解锁：§Y诅咒离婚§!和§Y黑暗治疗术§!

original: Next rank will unlock: §YInvite Disciple§! and §YAbsorb Lifeforce§!
translation: 下一位阶将解锁：§Y邀请追随者§!和§Y吸收生命力§!

original: Enables the decision to borrow money of the Order.
translation: 允许决议向阿萨辛贷款。

original: Enables the decision to donate money to §YThe Assassins§!, to gain §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
translation: 允许决议捐钱给§Y阿萨辛§!，以获得§Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!。

original: Enables the decision to raise special ships, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
translation: 允许决议征召特殊船只，需要花费§Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!。

original: Enables the decision to raise special troops, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
translation: 允许决议召集特殊军队，需要花费§Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!。

original: Enables §Gright-clicking§! the portraits of other rulers in order to intimidate them into owing you a favor.
translation: 允许§G右键点击§!其他统治者头像以威胁他们欠你一个人情。

original: Enables §Gright-clicking§! the portraits of an adult character in order to mark them for assassination, in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!. This will encourage other members of §YThe Assassins§! to go after your mark.
translation: 允许在一个成年角色头像上§G点击右键§!以标记他们并刺杀，需要花费§Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!。这将激励§Y阿萨辛§!的其他成员去刺杀你标记的目标。

original:
[Root.GetSRGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

As secret practitioners of our religion we are under constant scrutiny. We ask that you spend some time trying to blend into the religious community of your realm, in order to distract any harmful forces discovering our true beliefs.

[Root.GetSRFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
[Root.GetSRGreeting]，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]

作为我们教会的秘密推行者，我们一直处在严格的监视之下。我们要求你花一些时间来融入到你领地的宗教团体中去，从而分散任何可能发现我们真实信仰的有害力量。

[Root.GetSRFarewell]，
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: Blend In
translation: 融入

original: Conduct Secret Ceremony
translation: 举办秘密仪式

original: To complete this mission you need to §Gright-click§! your own portrait and choose §YPrepare Secret Ceremony§!.
translation: 要完成这项任务，你需要§G右键点击§!你的头像并选择§Y准备秘密仪式§!。

original: Prepare Secret Ceremony
translation: 准备秘密仪式

original: As a secret worshiper of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], you may prepare a small ceremony to honor your true religion.
translation: 作为[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]的秘密崇信者，你可以准备一个小型仪式来崇拜你的真实信仰。

original: Blend In
translation: 融入

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! can make an effort to blend into the religious society of the realm in order to keep [Root.GetHerHis] society safely hidden.
translation: 为了让[Root.GetHerHis]社团安全地隐藏起来，§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!可以努力去融入当地的宗教社团。

original: Has not recently attempted this mission
translation: 最近没有尝试过这个任务

original: Eager Believer
translation: 热心的信徒

original: This character is currently making an effort to fit into the religious community at court.
translation: 这个角色目前正在努力融入宫廷里的宗教团体。

original: Character is in the same society as you are.
translation: 角色和你在同一个社团。

original: Starting today, I shall dedicate myself to convincing the court of my deep devoutness, in the name of the [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] faith and [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. My allies in [This.Society.GetName] will understand. This is a necessary step if I am to ever convince my people to see the path I, nay, [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] has actually laid out before them. They will thank me later.
translation: 从今日起，我将努力向廷臣证明我的虔诚，以[Root.Religion.GetGroupName]和[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的名义起誓。我在[This.Society.GetName]的盟友们会理解的。如果我要说服我的人民，让他们看到我，哦不，[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]给他们的前途，那这就是必须采取的方法。他们之后会感谢我的。

original: I'll make them see.
translation: 我会让他们看到的。

original: My advisors inform me that [stubborn_courtier.GetTitledName] has been overheard questioning my loyalty to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. When I summon [stubborn_courtier.GetHerHim], [stubborn_courtier.GetSheHe] is apologetic, but a raised eyebrow tells of [stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis] doubt. "It's just a rumor, my [Root.GetLordLady]... You are not overly interested in [Root.GetReligiousRite], but you could surely quote any passage of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] without hesitation...?"
translation: 有人告诉我，他无意中听到[stubborn_courtier.GetTitledName]质疑我对[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的忠诚。于是我传唤了[stubborn_courtier.GetHerHim]，[stubborn_courtier.GetSheHe]为他的行为表示了歉意，可是那对扬起的眉毛仍然显露出[stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis]怀疑。「这仅仅是个谣传，我尊敬的[Root.GetLordLady]……你对[Root.GetReligiousRite]并不热心，但是你肯定能够毫不犹豫地背出[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]里每一个章节……？」

original: Of course I could, [stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName].
translation: 我当然会的，[stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName]。

original: You should not be questioning me. I am your [Root.GetTitle]!
translation: 你不应该质问我。我可是你的[Root.GetTitle]！

original: Is there any way I can make you think otherwise, [stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName]...?
translation: 我有什么办法能让你回心转意吗，[stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName]……？

original: As I began reciting [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName], [stubborn_courtier.GetTitledName]'s eyes widened. I intentionally focused on what I believed to be [stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis] favorite passage, speaking clearly to [stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis] interests as a [stubborn_courtier.GetEducationRole]. My gambit seems to have paid off because the deep bow [stubborn_courtier.GetSheHe] bestowed upon me was nothing short of embarrassment and an eagerness to make up for [stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis] obvious blunder.
translation: 当我开始背诵[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]时，[stubborn_courtier.GetTitledName]睁大了眼睛。我故意把重点放在我认为是[stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis]最喜欢的段落上，迎合[stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis][stubborn_courtier.GetEducationRole]兴趣。我的这个把戏似乎已经得到了回报，[stubborn_courtier.GetSheHe]对我深深的鞠躬，表现出他有多么尴尬，多么渴望弥补[stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis]显而易见的失误。

original: That about do it for you, [stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName]?
translation: 这不是你让我做的么，[stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName]？

original: As I rack my brain for the appropriate lines to shove triumphantly in [stubborn_courtier.GetTitledName]'s face, my palms grow sweaty.\n"Ezekiel 25:17! I will carry out great vengeance on them..." I begin. Then a slow panic begins to rise within my chest. [stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName] frowns. \n"No, wait, that doesn't seem right. That's not..." I mumble as [stubborn_courtier.GetSheHe] shakes [stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis] head and with a roll of [stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis] eyes walks away, leaving me alone with my failure. By the damnation of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName], how did I get this so wrong?
translation: 我绞尽脑汁回想适当的段落以便能对[stubborn_courtier.GetTitledName]耀武扬威，我的手掌开始发汗。\n「以西结书25:17！我向他们大施报应……」我开始背诵。然后，我的胸膛内一股恐惧感缓缓升起。[stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName]皱起眉头。\n「不，等等，看起来不太对，那不是……」我支支吾吾地说。[stubborn_courtier.GetSheHe]摇摇[stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis]脑袋，翻着[stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis]白眼走开，只留下失败的我。该死的[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]，我是怎么搞砸的？

original: I've made a fool of myself.
translation: 我让自己看起来像个傻子。

original: I make it clear to [stubborn_courtier.GetTitledName] that it seems almost heretical for someone supposedly well-versed in [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] to display such a poor understanding of the relationship between a ruler and [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].\n[stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName] clearly did not expect to have their own religious understanding challenged, and I try not to smile to myself as [stubborn_courtier.GetSheHe] sputters an apology. As [stubborn_courtier.GetSheHe] prepares to leave, I remind [stubborn_courtier.GetHerHim] that many questions can be dangerous to ask.
translation: 我对[stubborn_courtier.GetTitledName]清楚地表明，对于一个通晓[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]的人来说，错误地理解统治者与[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]之间的关系，是几乎可以被认定为异端的行为。\n[stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName]显然没有想到我会向他的宗教理解提出挑战，当[stubborn_courtier.GetSheHe]忙不迭地谢罪时，我忍住没有发笑。当[stubborn_courtier.GetSheHe]准备离开时，我提醒[stubborn_courtier.GetHerHim]许多问题可不能随随便便问。

original: [stubborn_courtier.GetSheHeCap] understands my veiled threat.
translation: [stubborn_courtier.GetSheHeCap]理解了我含蓄的威胁。

original: My voice must not have sounded as threatening as I believed it to. When I told [stubborn_courtier.GetTitledFirstName] how it could be dangerous to ask the wrong questions, [stubborn_courtier.GetSheHe] only laughed. As I followed up with stories of other unfortunate souls who had questioned their liege's faith, [stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis] grin remained. When [stubborn_courtier.GetSheHe] finally departed, it was with an even more disconcerting sentence. "I know exactly where my soul belongs, but I am unsure about yours."
translation: 我的嗓音肯定不像我以为的那样有威胁。当我告诉[stubborn_courtier.GetTitledFirstName]提出错误的问题会是如何危险，[stubborn_courtier.GetSheHe]只是笑笑。当我继续讲故事描述那些可怜人质疑领主信仰的下场时，[stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis]还是在笑。当[stubborn_courtier.GetSheHe]终于离开时，留下一句更令人不安的话。「我确切知道我的灵魂归于何处，但我不确定您的。」

original: No, wait! I know lines of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]!
translation: 不，等等！我知道[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]的语句！

original:
[Root.GetSRGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

We are proud to hear of your valiant efforts to remain an undetected member of [This.Society.GetName]. We are honored to count you as one of our own.

[Root.GetSRFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
[Root.GetSRGreeting]，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]

我们自豪地听闻您为了保护[This.Society.GetName]秘密成员所做出的不懈努力。我们很荣幸能够将您列为我们自己的一员。

[Root.GetSRFarewell]，
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: Very well.
translation: 很好。

original:
[Root.GetSRGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

We are sorry to hear of your flimsy efforts to remain a low-key member of [This.Society.GetName]. We had higher hopes than this.

[Root.GetSRFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
[Root.GetSRGreeting]，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]

得知您为了保护[This.Society.GetName]的低调成员所做出的薄弱努力，我们感到很遗憾。我们对您的期待不止于此。

[Root.GetSRFarewell]，
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: Curses!
translation: 该死！

original: [concerned_friend.GetTitledFirstName] has come to me as a friend, to inquire about my wellbeing. "I feel as though I never see you pray anymore, is something heavy burdening your mind?" [concerned_friend.GetSheHe] asks.\nI think of my true beliefs, and how they need to be kept secret, even of those closest to me.
translation: [concerned_friend.GetTitledFirstName]作为朋友前来询问我的健康状况。「我好想很久没见你祈祷了，你是有什么沉重的心理负担吗？」[concerned_friend.GetSheHe]问道。\n我想到我真正的信仰，我应该对他们保密，就算他们是我最亲密的人。

original: Oh, I have been having these terrible dreams.
translation: 哦，我一直在做些可怕的梦。

original: I... Everything is fine.
translation: 我……一切都好。

original: Actually, I've been meaning to speak to you about [concerned_friend.GetEducationalTopicPlural].
translation: 其实，我一直想和你谈谈[concerned_friend.GetEducationalTopicPlural]。

original: I regale [concerned_friend.GetTitledFirstName] with tales of my "dark dreams" of strange and foreign rituals. [concerned_friend.GetSheHeCap] can barely believe the vividness with which I describe the faith of the unbelievers. Afterwards [concerned_friend.GetSheHe] offers me a listening ear for whenever I may be burdened like this again.\nIf only [concerned_friend.GetSheHe] knew.
translation: 我为了取悦[concerned_friend.GetTitledFirstName]，讲述了我那「黑暗的梦境」中看到的光怪陆离的仪式。我对不信教者的信仰的描述太过生动，[concerned_friend.GetSheHeCap]几乎不能相信。后来，每当我受到这样的困扰时，[concerned_friend.GetSheHe]总是做我的倾听者。\n要是[concerned_friend.GetSheHe]能知道就好了。

original: [concerned_friend.GetFirstName] is a good, loyal and trusting [concerned_friend.GetRootRelation].
translation: [concerned_friend.GetFirstName]是一个优秀的，忠诚的，值得信赖的[concerned_friend.GetRootRelation]。

original: As I describe my "dark dreams," [concerned_friend.GetTitledFirstName]'s expression grows ever more concerned. "You recall these dreams very well," [concerned_friend.GetSheHe] says. "Almost more like memories."\n[concerned_friend.GetFirstName] doesn't comment on it again, but later you worry that you may have made [concerned_friend.GetHerHim] more worried, not less.
translation: 我描述起我那「黑暗的梦境」，[concerned_friend.GetTitledFirstName]却越发担心起来。「你回想起的梦境非常清晰。」[concerned_friend.GetSheHe]说。「几乎更像是记忆。」\n[concerned_friend.GetFirstName]没有再谈及这件事，但后来你担心[concerned_friend.GetHerHim]更加为你忧虑，而非相反。

original: I think I gave away too much.
translation: 我想我透露的太多了。

original: I tried to reassure [concerned_friend.GetTitledFirstName] that everything is as it should, and soon enough we were conversing and laughing like we used to. When the evening was over, [concerned_friend.GetFirstName] looked me in the eyes. "It is good to see that all is well with you after all."
translation: 我尝试用一切都理应如此来安抚[concerned_friend.GetTitledFirstName]，很快我们就像从前一样开始愉快地交谈起来。在一起度过了这样一个愉悦的夜晚之后，[concerned_friend.GetFirstName]真挚地看着我，说道：「我很高兴看见你一切安好」。

original: Of course.
translation: 当然。

original: I tried to reassure [concerned_friend.GetTitledFirstName] that everything is as it should, but my mind would not stay still. Did they already know the truth about my faith? As our conversation drifted onto theology, I briskly told [concerned_friend.GetHerHim] that I had to retire for the evening. I barely said goodbye before I had them escorted out.
translation: 我尝试用一切正常来安抚[concerned_friend.GetTitledFirstName]，然而我的内心却掀起了波澜。他们是否早就知道我信仰上存在的问题？随着我们的谈话转向神学领域，我迅速地告诉[concerned_friend.GetHerHim]我不得不去休息了来打断这个话题。直到将他们送出房间，我才勉强地向他们道了声晚安。

original: I could have handled that better.
translation: 我可以处理的更好。

original: I have been thinking about my efforts to blend into the [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] community and while I am aware of what is expected of me, I am often overcome with the desire to talk to someone. Perhaps [trusted_friend.GetTitledName]? Surely [trusted_friend.GetSheHe] would understand my struggle?
translation: 我一直在想努力融入[Root.Religion.GetGroupName]团体，当我意识到别人对我的期待时，我常常想和别人交谈。也许[trusted_friend.GetTitledName]？[trusted_friend.GetSheHe]肯定会理解我的努力吧？

original: Being a [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent], but pretending that I am not, has begun to make me shy away of conversation on religious matters. From the frown on some people's faces, I worry that my indecision is becoming noticeable.
translation: 身为一个[Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]追随者，却要假装自己不是，这一点已经开始让我回避在宗教事务上的谈话。从一些人皱起的眉头来看，我担心我的犹豫不决正在被注意到。

original: The weight of carrying my beliefs in secret is becoming increasingly difficult. I am not fond of lying, and so when [trusted_friend.GetFirstName] bids me farewell after an audience, and [trusted_friend.GetSheHe] blesses me in the name of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], I shift uncomfortably in my seat.
translation: 我保护我秘密信仰上的压力越来越大。我不爱撒谎，所以当[trusted_friend.GetFirstName][trusted_friend.GetSheHe]在一次拜会后与我告别，以[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的名义祝福我时，我感到如坐针毡。

original: I'll summon a meeting.
translation: 我将召集一次会谈。

original: If I don't have anything intelligent to say, it's better that I am quiet.
translation: 如果我没有什么话可说，我最好保持安静。

original: I can't pretend all the time.
translation: 我不能一直假装下去。

original: I can't trust anyone.
translation: 我不能相信任何人。

original: I need to play along more.
translation: 我需要更多单独表演。

original: The show must go on.
translation: 演出必须继续。

original: [trusted_friend.GetTitledName] joined me for a walk today, and I must admit to feeling better after talking to [trusted_friend.GetHerHim]. While I left out the most important details of my current spiritual anxieties, [trusted_friend.GetSheHe] concluded our meeting by placing an encouraging hand on my shoulder. "[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] is with us – I am sure of it, my [Root.GetLordLady]."
translation: 今天[trusted_friend.GetTitledName]和我一起散步，我必须承认和[trusted_friend.GetHerHim]交谈后感觉好多了。当我将一些最严重的的精神焦虑抛在脑后时，[trusted_friend.GetSheHe]结束了我们的会面，将一只鼓舞人心的手放在了我的肩膀上。「我确信[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]与我们同在，我的[Root.GetLordLady]。」

original: During a meeting today, what started as an idle discussion on the subject of [Root.GetEducationalTopicPlural], somehow got my councilors into a heated debate over theology. When prompted about my own opinion on the matter, I offered them my most stony gaze in return. "Of course, my [Root.GetLordLady]. Your opinion is obviously that of the traditional scholars. Our apologies."
translation: 今天的一场会议上，一开始本来是关于[Root.GetEducationalTopicPlural]的随意讨论，不知怎么地变成内阁成员之间关于神学的激烈争吵。当有人提议让我说说关于此事意见的时候，我狠狠地瞪了他们一眼。「当然，我的[Root.GetLordLady]，您显然和传统学者的观点一致，我们道歉。」

original: The next time [trusted_friend.GetTitledFirstName] bids me farewell with a blessing of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] I reply that [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] certainly could treat us better. [trusted_friend.GetFirstName] hesitates for a second, but then laughs. "You have such nerve, my [Root.GetLordLady]", [trusted_friend.GetSheHe] says. "It's all in jest, my friend" I say, only half-faking my smile.
translation: 当[trusted_friend.GetTitledFirstName]与我道别时祝福[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]后，我回答道[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]肯定可以更好地善待我们。[trusted_friend.GetFirstName]犹豫了一会，然后笑了。「你这句话胆子真大，我的[Root.GetLordLady]。」[trusted_friend.GetSheHe]说。「我只是开个玩笑，我的朋友」我半真半假地笑道。

original: We will see, friend.
translation: 我们拭目以待，朋友。

original: Of course.
translation: 当然。

original: [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], give me strength.
translation: [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]，给予我力量。

original: [trusted_friend.GetTitledName] joined me for a walk today, and at first I felt a lot better simply talking to [trusted_friend.GetHerHim]. I struggled to leave out the details of my current spiritual anxieties, but [trusted_friend.GetSheHe] shot me glances of concern throughout our meeting. As we parted, [trusted_friend.GetSheHe] placed a gentle hand on my shoulder. "[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] is with us – I am sure of it... Even if you are not, my [Root.GetLordLady]."
translation: 今天我和[trusted_friend.GetTitledName]一起散了散步，在一开始和[trusted_friend.GetHerHim]简单交谈之后，我感觉好多了。我努力尝试把那些困扰我精神的细枝末节排除在外，但[trusted_friend.GetSheHe]还是看出来了，并向我投以关切的目光。当我们分开的时候，[trusted_friend.GetSheHe]温和地将手放在我的肩膀上。「[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]与我们同在——我确信如此……即使你并不确信，我的[Root.GetLordLady]。」

original: During a meeting today, what started as an idle discussion on the subject of [Root.GetEducationalTopicPlural] somehow got my councilors into a heated debate over theology... When I was finally prompted about my own opinion on the matter, I shrunk into my chair and mumbled something about us all perhaps making an effort to get along. "[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] wouldn't want us to squabble", I concluded, but they did not seem convinced.
translation: 今天的一场会议上，一开始本来是关于[Root.GetEducationalTopicPlural]的随意讨论，不知怎么地变成内阁成员之间关于神学的激烈争吵。当有人提议让我说说关于此事意见的时候，我缩回了椅子上，含混地说了一些关于我们应该如何和谐共处的废话。「[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]肯定不希望我们这么吵」，我总结道，但是他们看起来不太信服。

original: The next time [trusted_friend.GetTitledFirstName] bids me farewell with a blessing of [trusted_friend.GetHerHis] [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], I am at a loss for words. "Something the matter, my [Root.GetLordLady]?" [trusted_friend.GetSheHe] asks. "It's nothing", I say, but [trusted_friend.GetSheHe] does not seem convinced. "I know you are struggling with your faith, my friend" [trusted_friend.GetSheHe] then says, before continuing: "– but you must stop. For the sake of the realm."
translation: [trusted_friend.GetTitledFirstName]用赞美[trusted_friend.GetHerHis][Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的话语向我道别时，我一时不知道怎么回应。「出什么事了，我的[Root.GetLordLady]？」[trusted_friend.GetSheHe]问道。「没什么。」我说，但[trusted_friend.GetSheHe]似乎并不相信。「我知道你在为你的信仰而挣扎，我的朋友，」[trusted_friend.GetSheHe]说道，「——但是为了领地，你必须停下来。」

original: Oh no! I cannot afford rumors of my faith wavering!
translation: 哦不！我无法承受关于我的信仰摇摆不定的传言！

original: I'm not sure what I should have said?
translation: 我不确定我应该说什么？

original: Is it that obvious?
translation: 这么明显吗？

original: I invited [trusted_friend.GetTitledName] to a walk today. While not disclosing too much, I gently steered our conversation towards [trusted_friend.GetHerHis] theological views. "I think perhaps that [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] is just a name, for a concept we share with many, my [Root.GetLordLady]", [trusted_friend.GetSheHe] admitted in the end.
translation: 今天我邀请[trusted_friend.GetTitledName]散步。不着痕迹地，我渐渐将我们的谈话引向[trusted_friend.GetHerHis]神学观点。「我认为或许[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]只是一个名字，一个我们与许多人共同认可的概念，我的[Root.GetLordLady]」，[trusted_friend.GetSheHe]最终认同了这一点。

original: During a meeting today, what started as an idle discussion on the subject of [Root.GetEducationalTopicPlural] somehow got my councilors into a heated debate over theology. When finally prompted about my own opinion on the matter, I slammed my fist into the table, stating that there is only one true religion, before smiling gently. Their faces reddened. "Of course, my [Root.GetLordLady]. Our apologies."
translation: 今天的一场会议上，一开始本来是关于[Root.GetEducationalTopicPlural]的随意讨论，不知怎么地变成内阁成员之间关于神学的激烈争吵。当我终于有插上话的机会的时候，我一拳锤在桌子上，「只有一个真正的宗教」，我微笑着说道。他们脸都涨红了。「当然，我的[Root.GetLordLady]。抱歉。」

original: The next time [trusted_friend.GetTitledFirstName] bids me farewell with a blessing of [trusted_friend.GetHerHis] [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], I reply that [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] has already blessed me, with the companionship we share. [trusted_friend.GetFirstName] gives an earnest smile. "Always so eloquent, my [Root.GetLordLady]". "Only among my friends" I respond, giving a mock bow.
translation: [trusted_friend.GetTitledFirstName]送别时又一次祝福[trusted_friend.GetHerHis][Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]，我回答说我们的友谊就是[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]对我的保佑。[trusted_friend.GetFirstName]真诚地笑了。「你真是能言善辩，我的[Root.GetLordLady]」。「只有朋友之间才会这样。」我回答道，滑稽地鞠了一躬。

original: Interested indeed.
translation: 确实有趣。

original: Technically, it wasn't lying...
translation: 准确地说，这不是说谎……

original: White lies are good lies.
translation: 善意的谎言是好谎言。

original: I have been avoiding [trusted_friend.GetTitledName] for some time now. When [trusted_friend.GetSheHe] eventually caught me, it was awkward. "Something has changed in you, my [Root.GetLordLady]" [trusted_friend.GetSheHe] said stiffly. My stomach lurched. "It is not you, it is I", I confessed. Then I told [trusted_friend.GetHerHim] that I've been doubting [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s plan for me. [trusted_friend.GetSheHeCap] seemed unimpressed. I hope I have not said too much.
translation: 我已经躲了[trusted_friend.GetTitledName]有一段时间了。当[trusted_friend.GetSheHe]最终逮到我时，那场面很尴尬。「你变了，我的[Root.GetLordLady]。」[trusted_friend.GetSheHe]生硬地说道。我的胃一颤。「不是你，而是我。」我承认道。然后我告诉[trusted_friend.GetHerHim]我一直都在质疑[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]对我的安排。[trusted_friend.GetSheHeCap]似乎无动于衷。我希望我还没有说出太多的东西来。

original: During a meeting today, what started as an idle discussion on the subject of [Root.GetEducationalTopicPlural] somehow got my councilors into a heated debate over theology... When I was finally prompted about my own opinion on the matter, I shrunk into my chair. "Surely, we have more important things to discuss", I mumbled. "More important than [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], my [Root.GetLordLady]?" came the retort, aghast.
translation: 今天的一场会议上，一开始本来是关于[Root.GetEducationalTopicPlural]的随意讨论，不知怎么地变成内阁成员之间关于神学的激烈争吵……当有人提议让我说说关于此事意见的时候，我缩回了椅子上，「很显然，我们有更重要的事情要讨论」，我嘟哝道。「还有比[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]更重要的吗，我的[Root.GetLordLady]？」有人惊讶地诘问道。

original: The next time [trusted_friend.GetTitledFirstName] bids me farewell with a blessing of [trusted_friend.GetHerHis] [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], I am at a loss for words. "Something the matter, my [Root.GetLordLady]?" [trusted_friend.GetSheHe] asks. "It's nothing", I say, but [trusted_friend.GetSheHe] only sighs, exasperated. "I refused to believe the rumors, but you truly do not believe in our [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] anymore, do you? My [Root.GetTitle], you'll doom us all."
translation: [trusted_friend.GetTitledFirstName]用赞美[trusted_friend.GetHerHis][Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的话语向向我道别时，我一时不知道怎么回应。「出什么事了，我的[Root.GetLordLady]？」[trusted_friend.GetSheHe]问道。「没什么。」我说，但[trusted_friend.GetSheHe]只是叹了口气，怒气冲冲地说：「我本不想相信那些谣言，但你是真的不再相信我们的[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]了，不是么？我的[Root.GetTitle]，你会毁了我们所有人的。」

original: I thought [trusted_friend.GetSheHe] would understand.
translation: 我认为[trusted_friend.GetSheHe]会理解的。

original: Does even my own council doubt me?
translation: 甚至我的内阁也怀疑我吗？

original: Well, crap.
translation: 好吧，废话。

original: In an effort to convince the court of my piety, I have chosen to attend [Root.GetHouseOfWorship] and give a grand speech to my people, and to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] eyes me curiously as I enter the building, and I stop for moment to gather my thoughts. May [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] forgive me, but I need to impress these people and choose my words carefully.
translation: 为使宫廷相信我的虔诚，我选择了参观[Root.GetHouseOfWorship]，并面向我的人民和[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]发表隆重的演讲。当我进入教堂时，一位[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]好奇地注视着我，我停下来整理我的思绪。我需要慎重的遣词造句，并打动这些人，愿[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]能原谅我。

original: In an effort to convince the court of my piety, I have chosen to visit the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship], and pray with the [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.Religion.GetGroupName]s. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] eyes me curiously as I enter the building, and I stop for moment to gather my thoughts. May [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] forgive me, but I need to make a good impression here.
translation: 为使宫廷相信我的虔诚，我选择了参观[Root.GetHouseOfWorship]，并与[Root.Religion.GetName][Root.Religion.GetGroupName]信徒一起祈祷。当我进入教堂时，一位[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]好奇地注视着我，我停下来整理我的思绪。望[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]宽恕我，我真的需要在这里营造个好的形象。

original: In an effort to convince the court of my devotion to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], I have chosen to visit the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship], and pray with the [Root.Religion.GetGroupName]s. A [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] eyes me curiously as I enter the building, and I stop for moment to gather my thoughts. May [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] forgive me, but I need to make a good impression here.
translation: 为了向廷臣们展示我对于[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的信仰，我选择前往[Root.GetHouseOfWorship]，和[Root.Religion.GetGroupName]信徒一起祷告。当我走进去的时候，一个[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]好奇地看着我。我停下来理了一下思绪。望[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]宽恕我，我真的需要在这里营造个好的形象。

original: In an effort to convince the court of my commitment to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], I have gone to [Root.GetHouseOfWorship], to leave an offering at the altar of the gods. A [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] eyes me warily as I walk up the steps and enter the building. May [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] forgive me, but I need to make a good impression here.
translation: 为了向廷臣们展示我有多么热爱[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]，我前往[Root.GetHouseOfWorship]，给神的祭坛献祭。当我走在台阶上的时候，一个[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]警惕地看着我。望[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]宽恕我，我真的需要在这里营造个好的形象。

original: In an effort to convince the court of my commitment to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], I have gone to [Root.GetHouseOfWorship], to leave an offering at the sacred altar. A [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] eyes me warily as I walk up the steps and enter the building. May [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] forgive me, but I need to make a good impression here.
translation: 为了向廷臣们展示我有多么热爱[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]，我前往[Root.GetHouseOfWorship]，给神圣的祭坛献祭。当我走在台阶上的时候，一个[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]警惕地看着我。望[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]宽恕我，我真的需要在这里营造个好的形象。

original: In an effort to convince the court of my commitment to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], I have gone to [Root.GetHouseOfWorship], to make an offering at the altar of the gods. A [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] eyes me warily as I walk up the steps and enter the building. May [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] forgive me, but I need to make a good impression here.
translation: 为了向廷臣们展示我有多么热爱[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]，我前往[Root.GetHouseOfWorship]，给神的祭坛献祭。当我走在台阶上的时候，一个[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]警惕地看着我。望[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]宽恕我，我真的需要在这里营造个好的形象。

original: In an effort to convince the court of my commitment to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], I have gone to [Root.GetHouseOfWorship], and to visit the altar of God. A [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] eyes me warily as I walk up the steps and enter the building. May [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] forgive me, but I need to make a good impression here.
translation: 为了向廷臣们展示我有多么热爱[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]，我前往[Root.GetHouseOfWorship]，参观神的祭坛。当我走在台阶上的时候，一个[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]警惕地看着我。望[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]宽恕我，我真的需要在这里营造个好的形象。

original: In an effort to convince my people of my commitment to the ancestors, I have come to make an offering at the sacred altar of our elders. A [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] eyes me warily as I walk the steps up to the temple. May [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] forgive me, but I need to make a good impression here.
translation: 为了使子民相信我将兑现祖先的承诺，我必须在祖先的祭坛上献上一份祭品，我注意到[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]在我走上祭坛台阶时，警惕着注视着我……望[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]宽恕我，我真的需要在这里营造个好的形象。

original: In an effort to convince the court of my piety, I have chosen to visit the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship], and pray with the [Root.Religion.GetGroupName]s. A [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] eyes me curiously as I enter the building, and I stop for moment to gather my thoughts. May [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] forgive me, but I need to make a good impression here.
translation: 为了向廷臣们展示我的虔诚，我选择前往[Root.GetHouseOfWorship]，和[Root.Religion.GetGroupName]信徒一起祷告。当我走进去的时候，一个[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]好奇地看着我。我停下来理了一下思绪。望[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]宽恕我，我真的需要在这里营造个好的形象。

original: I will do something spectacular.
translation: 我将做一些令人惊叹之事。

original: I shall speak of their [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].
translation: 我将会谈到他们的[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]。

original: As I step up to the altar, people eye me carefully. They depend upon me, as [Root.GetTitle] and my connection to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], to guide them. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] nods encouragingly at me, and I look up to study the ornamental windows of the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship]. When I finally speak, I imagine that I am praising [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] – unsurprising, my words have never seemed more true.
translation: 当我步上圣坛时，我的人民仔细的注视着我。他们需要我，[Root.GetTitle]以及我与[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的联系来指引他们。[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]朝我鼓励地点头，我便抬头研究起[Root.GetHouseOfWorship]的装饰窗。当我最终开口的时候，我想象着我在向[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]祈祷——果然，我的话语无比真实。

original: As I step up to the altar, my people eye me carefully. They depend on their [Root.GetTitle], and [Root.GetHerHis] connection to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], to guide them. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] nods at me, and I look up to study the ornamental windows of the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship]. When I finally speak, I imagine that I am praising [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] – unsurprising, my words have never seemed more true.
translation: 当我步上圣坛时，我的人民仔细的注视着我，他们需要他们的[Root.GetTitle]以及[Root.GetHerHis]与[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的联系来指引他们。[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]朝我点头，我便抬头研究起[Root.GetHouseOfWorship]的装饰窗。当我最终开口的时候，我想象着我在向[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]祈祷——果然，我的话语无比真实。

original: As I step up in front of them, my people eye me carefully. They depend on their [Root.GetTitle], and [Root.GetHerHis] connection to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], to guide them. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] nods at me, and I stare into the flames of the altar candle lights for a moment. When I finally speak, I imagine that I am praising [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] – unsurprising, my words have never seemed more true.
translation: 当我站到他们面前时，我的人民仔细的注视着我，他们需要他们的[Root.GetTitle]以及[Root.GetHerHis]与[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的联系来指引他们。[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]朝我点头，我则凝视了一会儿祭坛上的烛火。当我最终开口的时候，我想象着我在赞美[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]——果然，我的话语无比真实。

original: As I step up in front of them, my people eye me carefully. They depend on their [Root.GetTitle], and [Root.GetHerHis] connection to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], to guide them. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] nods at me, and I look up to study the ornamental windows of the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship]. When I finally speak, I imagine that I am praising [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] – unsurprising, my words have never seemed more true.
translation: 当我站到他们面前时，我的人民仔细的注视着我，他们需要他们的[Root.GetTitle]以及[Root.GetHerHis]与[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的联系来指引他们。[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]朝我点头，我便抬头研究起[Root.GetHouseOfWorship]的装饰窗。当我最终开口的时候，我想象着我在赞美[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]——果然，我的话语无比真实。

original: I strew the flowers around the feet of the statue, while the worshipers murmur at my presence. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] nods at me, and I bow before the ornamental sculpture. When I finally turn to address the gathering crowd, I imagine that it is[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] I am praising – unsurprising, my words have never seemed more true.
translation: 我在雕像的附近撒满花瓣，而崇拜者则在我的面前低语。[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]向我点头，我向装饰和雕塑鞠躬。当我最终转向面对聚集的人群时，我想象我在赞美[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]——果然，我的话语无比真实。

original: I strew the flowers around the feet of the statue, while the worshipers murmur at my presence. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] nods at me, and I bow before the beautifully carved sculpture. When I finally turn to address the gathering crowd, I imagine that it is[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] I am praising – unsurprising, my words have never seemed more true.
translation: 我在雕像的附近撒满花瓣，而崇拜者则在我的面前低语。[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]向我点头，我向装饰和雕塑鞠躬。当我最终转向面对聚集的人群时，我想象我在赞美[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]——果然，我的话语无比真实。

original: I strew the flowers around the feet of the statue, while the worshipers murmur at my presence. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] smiles at me, and I inhale deeply, while studying the ornamental carvings on the walls. When I finally speak, I imagine that I am praising [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] – unsurprising, my words have never seemed more true.
translation: 我在雕像的附近撒满花瓣，而崇拜者则在我的面前低语。[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]向我微笑，我一边深深吸气，一边研究墙上的装饰和雕刻。当我终于开口时，我想象我在赞美[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]——果然，我的话语无比真实。

original: My voice carried by the crisp morning air, my words ring louder than I could have hoped. "Tengri creates death. We have all been created in order to die", I proclaim in front of the Sky God's followers. They nod eagerly, swallowing my lines with a warrior's thirst. They do not know that it is [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] that fuels my passion. Seeing their faces as I continue my speech, I am not sure it matters.
translation: 我的声音被凉爽的清晨空气所承载，因此话语比我希望的更响亮。「长生天创造了死亡。我们都是为了死亡而被创造的」，我在天空神的追随者们面前如此颂扬。他们急切地点头，用战士的渴望吞咽下我的话语。他们不知道是[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]激发了我的热情。当我继续演讲时，看到他们的面孔，我不确定这是否要紧。

original: I grab one of the torches of the ground and lift it high above my head. "The Creator watches, even in the night, when all seems dark..." I begin. Even though my heart has abandoned this faith, seeing their faces lit by the flame, I realize the power my words hold for them. They depend on me, their [Root.GetTitle] to guide them through their hardships. If it's their [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] or [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] by my side, I am not sure it matters.
translation: 我抓住火把并将它高举过头顶。「当一切都似乎陷入黑暗时，造物主在看着，即便是黑夜也不例外……」我开始吟诵着。虽然我的心已经放弃了这个信念，看到他们的脸被火光所照亮，我仍意识到我的话语对于他们的力量。他们依靠着我，他们的[Root.GetTitle]引导他们渡过难关。如果他们的[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]或[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]就在我身边，我不确定这是否要紧。

original: As I step up to the altar, the people eye me carefully. They depend upon me, as [Root.GetTitle] and my connection to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], to guide them. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] nods encouragingly at me, and I look up to study the ornamental windows of the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship]. When I finally speak, I imagine that I am praising [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] – unsurprising, my words have never seemed more true.
translation: 当我步上圣坛时，我的人民仔细的注视着我，他们依赖我作为[Root.GetTitle]以及我与[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的联系来指引他们。[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]朝我鼓励地点头，我便抬头研究起[Root.GetHouseOfWorship]的装饰窗。当我最终开口的时候，我想象着我在向[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]祈祷——果然，我的话语无比真实。

original: [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] guides me, even now.
translation: [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]指引着我，即使是现在。

original: As I step up to the altar, people eye me warily. They depend upon me, as [Root.GetTitle] and my connection to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], to guide them. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] nods solemnly at me. I look up at the ornamental windows of the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship], silently begging [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] for some surge of inspiration – it never comes and my heart sinks. I run off the stage, leaving rows of people confused.
translation: 当我步上圣坛时，我的人民仔细的注视着我，他们依赖我作[Root.GetTitle]以及我与[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的联系来指引他们。[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]朝我郑重地点头，我便抬头研究起[Root.GetHouseOfWorship]的装饰窗，默默祈求[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]赐我灵感——然而并没有出现，我的心随之一沉。我跑下了台阶，留下一脸困惑的人群。

original: As I step up to the altar, the [Root.Religion.GetGroupName]s eye me warily. They depend upon me, as [Root.GetTitle] and my connection to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], to guide them. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] nods solemnly at me. I look up at the ornamental windows of the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship], silently begging [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] for some surge of inspiration – it never comes and my heart sinks. I run off the stage, leaving rows of people confused.
translation: 当我步上圣坛时，[Root.Religion.GetGroupName]信徒警惕地注视着我，他们依赖我作[Root.GetTitle]以及我与[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的联系来指引他们。[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]朝我郑重地点头，我便抬头研究起[Root.GetHouseOfWorship]的装饰窗，默默祈求[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]赐我灵感——然而并没有出现，我的心随之一沉。我跑下了台阶，留下一脸困惑的人群。

original: With each step I take, my confidence fades. I turn to look at my people, and find their eyes wary.
