They need me, as [Root.GetTitle], and my connection to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], to guide them. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] nods solemnly at me. I look up at the ornamental windows of the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship], silently begging [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] for some surge of inspiration – it never comes. I run off the stage, leaving rows of people confused.
translation: 每当我向前走一步，我的信心都在消退。我回头看了一眼我的人民，只收到他们警惕的眼神。他们依赖我作[Root.GetTitle]，以及我与[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的联系来指引他们。[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]朝我郑重地点头，我便抬头研究起[Root.GetHouseOfWorship]的装饰窗，默默祈求[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]赐我灵感——然而并没有出现，我的心随之一沉。我跑下了台阶，留下一脸困惑的人群。

original: As I step up to the altar, the [Root.Religion.GetGroupName]s eye me warily. They depend upon me, as [Root.GetTitle] and my connection to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], to guide them. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] nods solemnly at me. I look up at the ornamental windows of the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship], silently begging [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] for some surge of inspiration – it never comes. I run off the stage, leaving rows of people confused.
translation: 当我步上圣坛时，[Root.Religion.GetGroupName]信徒警惕地注视着我，他们依赖我作[Root.GetTitle]，以及我与[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的联系来指引他们。[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]朝我郑重地点头，我便抬头研究起[Root.GetHouseOfWorship]的装饰窗，默默祈求[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]赐我灵感——然而并没有出现。我跑下了台阶，留下一脸困惑的人群。

original: I strew the flowers around the feet of the statue, while the worshipers murmur at my presence. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] nods at me, and I bow before the ornamental sculpture. What can I tell them? In my heart, I pray to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] for some surge of inspiration – it never comes. I hastily exit the sanctuary, leaving my people confused.
translation: 我在雕像的附近撒满花瓣，而崇拜者则在我的面前低语。[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]向我点头，我向装饰和雕塑鞠躬。我能告诉他们什么？我在心中向[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]祈祷以获得一些灵感——然而并没有出现。我匆匆离开圣殿，留下一脸困惑的人群。

original: I strew the flowers around the feet of the statue, while the worshipers murmur at my presence. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] shoots me a suspicious glance, and I inhale deeply, while studying the ornamental carvings on the walls. Isn't [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] a vengeful god? The beautiful temple suddenly feels far too crowded. In a moment of weakness, I hastily exit the sanctuary, leaving the worshipers confused.
translation: 我在雕像的附近撒满花瓣，而崇拜者则在我的面前低语。[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]怀疑地瞥了我一眼，我深深吸了一口气，研究墙上的装饰和雕刻。[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]是个有报复心的神吧？这座美丽的寺庙突然令我感到太拥挤。在一阵虚弱中，我匆匆离开圣殿，留下一脸困惑的崇拜者们。

original: As I walk up the steps, I begin to fidget. I turn to look at my people, only to find their eyes wary. Even the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] shoots me a suspicious glance, and I inhale sharply. A carved horse's head, which I used to find beautiful, glares at me and I find myself averting my eyes. Isn't [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] a vengeful god? The beautiful temple suddenly feels far too crowded and I decide to burst out of the building, leaving the worshipers confused.
translation: 当我走上台阶时，我开始烦躁不安。我回头看了一眼我的人民，只收到他们警惕的眼神。连[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]怀疑地瞥了我一眼，我深深吸了一口气。我曾觉得美丽的雕刻马头如今在瞪着我，我发现自己避开了视线。[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]是个有报复心的神吧？这座美丽的寺庙突然令我感到太拥挤，我决定逃出圣殿，留下一脸困惑的崇拜者们。

original: I strew the flowers around the altar, while the worshipers murmur at my presence. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] shoots me a suspicious glance and I take a deep breath, averting her eyes. The ancestral spirits can be vengeful, can they not? And why is it so warm here? The place suddenly feels far too crowded. Before I say anything at all, I hastily withdraw of the stage, leaving the worshipers confused.
translation: 我在雕像的附近撒满花瓣，而崇拜者则在我的面前低语。[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]怀疑地瞥了我一眼，我深深吸了一口气，避开了她的眼神。祖先之灵报复心可能太重了吧？为什么这里这么暖和？我突然觉得这地方太拥挤了。我一言不发，匆匆退离祭台，留下一脸困惑的崇拜者们。

original: As I step up to the altar, the [Root.Religion.GetGroupName]s eye me warily. They depend upon me, as [Root.GetTitle] and my connection to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], to guide them. The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] nods solemnly at me. I look up at the ornamental windows of the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship], silently begging [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] for some surge of inspiration – it never comes. Instead my heart beats frantically and I withdraw of the crowd, without a word to comfort them.
translation: 当我步上圣坛时，[Root.Religion.GetGroupName]信徒警惕地注视着我，他们需要[Root.GetTitle]我，以及我与[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的联系来指引他们。[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]朝我郑重地点头，我便抬头研究起[Root.GetHouseOfWorship]的装饰窗，默默祈求[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]赐我灵感——然而并没有出现。相反我的心脏疯狂地跳动，我默然地从人群中撤出，连句安抚他们的话都没讲。

original: This is not what I had intended.
translation: 这不是我预料之内的。

original: I step up to the altar and make a quick decision – as I reach the center of the stage I collapse to the floor. The worshipers gasp as I, their [Root.GetTitle], begin quoting [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]. I roll my eyes back as I speak, as if confronting the skies themselves. When my last words ring out, everyone seems to be holding their breath. For a moment I worry that my stunt has failed. Then the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] exclaims "A VISION! My [Root.GetLordLady], let me help you stand!"
translation: 我步上圣坛并迅速做出决定——当我到达台阶中间时，我瘫倒在地。崇拜者们倒吸了一口气，这时我，他们的[Root.GetTitle]，开始援引[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]。我说话时翻着白眼，好像在直面上天。当我说完最后一句话时，每个人似乎都屏住了呼吸。有那么一刻我担心自己的演技失败了。然后，[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]惊呼道：「是神视！我的[Root.GetLordLady]，让我帮您站起来！」

original: I step up to the altar and make a quick decision – as I near a great statue of Vishnu, I collapse to the floor. Worshipers around me gasp as I, their [Root.GetTitle], begin quoting [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]. I roll my eyes back as I speak, as if confronting the skies themselves. When my last words ring out, everyone seems to be holding their breath. For a moment I worry that my stunt has failed. Then the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] exclaims "A VISION! My [Root.GetLordLady], let me help you stand!"
translation: 我步上圣坛并迅速做出决定——当我走近毗湿奴大像时，我瘫倒在地。崇拜者们倒吸了一口气，这时我，他们的[Root.GetTitle]，开始援引[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]。我说话时翻着白眼，好像在直面上天。当我说完最后一句话时，每个人似乎都屏住了呼吸。有那么一刻我担心自己的演技失败了。然后，[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]惊呼道：「是神视！我的[Root.GetLordLady]，让我帮您站起来！」

original: As I step up to the altar I make a quick decision – I collapse dramatically into the arms of a statue, to the gasps of onlooking worshipers. Then I begin quoting [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName], and I roll my eyes back as I speak, as if confronting the skies themselves. When my last words ring out, everyone seems to be holding their breath. For a moment I worry that my stunt has failed. Then the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] exclaims "A VISION! My [Root.GetLordLady], let me help you stand!"
translation: 当我步入祭坛时，我迅速做出决定——我戏剧性地倒在了一尊雕像的怀里，旁观的崇拜者们倒吸了一口气。这时我开始援引[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]，我说话时翻着白眼，好像在直面上天。当我说完最后一句话时，每个人似乎都屏住了呼吸。有那么一刻我担心自己的演技失败了。然后，[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]惊呼道：「是神视！我的[Root.GetLordLady]，让我帮您站起来！」

original: As I step up to the altar I make a quick decision – I collapse dramatically into the arms of the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle], to the gasps of onlooking worshipers. Then I begin quoting [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName], and I roll my eyes back as I speak, as if confronting the skies themselves. When my last words ring out, everyone seems to be holding their breath. For a moment I worry that my stunt has failed. Then the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] exclaims "A VISION! My [Root.GetLordLady], let me help you stand!"
translation: 当我步入祭坛时，我迅速做出决定——我戏剧性地倒在了[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]的怀里，旁观的崇拜者们倒吸了一口气。这时我开始援引[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]，我说话时翻着白眼，好像在直面上天。当我说完最后一句话时，每个人似乎都屏住了呼吸。有那么一刻我担心自己的演技失败了。然后，[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]惊呼道：「是神视！我的[Root.GetLordLady]，让我帮您站起来！」

original: Oh, thank you.
translation: 噢，谢谢。

original: I step towards the pulpit and make a bold decision – as I reach the center of the stage I collapse to the floor. The worshipers gasp as I, their [Root.GetTitle], begin quoting fragments of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]. I roll my eyes back as I speak, as if confronting the skies themselves. When my last words ring out, people start to whisper. For a moment I am convinced that my stunt has succeeded. Then the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] prods at me. "Uhm, my [Root.GetLordLady]? Let's get you back onto your feet."
translation: 我走向讲坛，做出了一个大胆的决定——当我到达台阶中间时，我瘫倒在地。崇拜者们倒吸了一口气，这时我，他们的[Root.GetTitle]，开始援引[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]片段。我说话时翻着白眼，好像在直面上天。当我说完最后一句话时，人们开始窃窃私语。有那么一刻我确信我的表演成功了。之后[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]过来戳了戳我。「唔，我的[Root.GetLordLady]？请振作一点。」

original: I step up to the altar and make a bold decision – as I reach the center of the stage I collapse to the floor. The worshipers gasp as I, their [Root.GetTitle], begin quoting fragments of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]. I roll my eyes back as I speak, as if confronting the skies themselves. When my last words ring out, people start to whisper. For a moment I am convinced that my stunt has succeeded. Then the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] prods at me. "Uhm, my [Root.GetLordLady]? Let's get you back onto your feet."
translation: 我步入祭坛，做出了一个大胆的决定——当我到达台阶中间时，我瘫倒在地。崇拜者们倒吸了一口气，这时我，他们的[Root.GetTitle]，开始援引[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]片段。我说话时翻着白眼，好像在直面上天。当我说完最后一句话时，人们开始窃窃私语。有那么一刻我确信我的表演成功了。之后[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]过来戳了戳我。「唔，我的[Root.GetLordLady]？请振作一点。」

original: I step forwards and make a bold decision – as I reach the center of the crowd I collapse to the floor. The worshipers gasp as I, their [Root.GetTitle], begin quoting fragments of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]. I roll my eyes back as I speak, as if confronting the skies themselves. When my last words ring out, people start to whisper. For a moment I am convinced that my stunt has succeeded. Then the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] prods at me. "Uhm, my [Root.GetLordLady]? Let's get you back onto your feet."
translation: 我走向前去，做出了一个大胆的决定。当我走到人群中心时，我瘫倒在地。崇拜者们倒吸了一口气，这时我，他们的[Root.GetTitle]，开始援引[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]片段。我说话时翻着白眼，好像在直面上天。当我说完最后一句话时，人们开始窃窃私语。有那么一刻我确信我的表演成功了。之后[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]过来戳了戳我。「唔，我的[Root.GetLordLady]？请振作一点。」

original: I step forwards and make a bold decision – as I reach a group of people I collapse to the floor. The worshipers gasp as I, their [Root.GetTitle], begin quoting fragments of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]. I roll my eyes back as I speak, as if confronting the skies themselves. When my last words ring out, they start to whisper. For a moment I am convinced that my stunt has succeeded. Then the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] prods at me. "Uhm, my [Root.GetLordLady]? Let's get you back onto your feet."
translation: 我走向前去，做出了一个大胆的决定。当我走到人群中时，我瘫倒在地。崇拜者们倒吸了一口气，这时我，他们的[Root.GetTitle]，开始援引[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]片段。我说话时翻着白眼，好像在直面上天。当我说完最后一句话时，人们开始窃窃私语。有那么一刻我确信我的表演成功了。之后[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]过来戳了戳我。「唔，我的[Root.GetLordLady]？请振作一点。」

original: B-but... Don't you think I had a holy vision?
translation: 但……但你不觉得我获得了神视吗？

original: Hesitant Believer
translation: 迟疑的信徒

original: This character is not comfortable discussing their faith.
translation: 这个角色对谈论他的信仰感到不快。

original: Devout Believer
translation: 虔诚的信徒

original: This character gives the impression of being very devout.
translation: 这个角色给人的印象非常虔诚。

original: I make sure that I am regularly seen studying [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName].\nToday my [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledName] came to me to compliment my efforts!
translation: 我确信经常有人看到我研究[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]。\n今天我的[Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName][Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledName]来找我称赞我的努力！

original: I have arranged for my [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName] [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledName] to help me with readings of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]. [Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName] commented that such a studiousness is evidence of a true faithful!
translation: 我已经安排了我的[Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName][Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledName]来帮助我阅读[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]。[Root.job_spiritual.GetFirstName]评论说，这样的好学证明了我真诚的信仰！

original: In my efforts to blend in with the believers around me, I believe I have come to learn more [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] theology than most of them know themselves.\nThey would be foolish to challenge my understanding of the faith.
translation: 在我努力与周围的信徒融为一体的过程中，我相信我学来的[Root.Religion.GetGroupName]神学比他们中的大多数了解到的都要多。\n如果他们挑战我对信仰的理解，那可真是愚蠢至极。

original: A group of courtiers spotted me praying today. As they came within earshot I made sure to mutter the name of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] repeatedly.\nThey ended up joining me in my prayer.
translation: 一群朝臣发现了我今天在祈祷。当他们靠近时，我反复轻声念叨着[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的名字。\n他们最终加入了我的祈祷。

original: I passed by a beggar in the street today and quoted a passage of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] to her, loud enough for anyone passing by to hear. Apparently the exchange became quite the conversation starter at court!
translation: 今天我在路上经过了一个乞丐，并向她引用了一段[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]，大声到足以让任何路过的人听清。显然，这场交易变成了宫廷中对话的话头！

original: I was studying copied pages of [Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] with a fellow faithful when a servant entered my room unannounced. He apologized, but glanced across the scattered pages on my table... Both my companion and I let out a sigh of relief when the servant – in obvious illiteracy – complimented our dedication to the [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] faith.
translation: 我正在和一个教友研读[Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]的抄本时，一个仆人没打招呼就闯了进来。他道歉了，但是看到了我桌子上散落的书页……我和教友都松了一口气，因为我们发现这个仆人——显然他不识字——恭维我们投身于[Root.Religion.GetGroupName]信仰。

original: My tedious work is starting to pay off...!
translation: 我乏味的工作开始有回报了……！

original: I aim to please.
translation: 我很乐意。

original: Certain aspects of this endeavor are easier than others.
translation: 这一努力的某些方面比其他的要容易。

original: That was unexpected!
translation: 出乎意料！

original: For once, gossip works in my favor.
translation: 这一次，流言对我有利。

original: [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], be praised!
translation: 赞美[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]！

original: While my guest [From.GetTitledFirstName] has yet to understand the true nature of the world, the right methods of persuasion might get through to [From.GetHerHim]... Not many survive the long journey to the truth, and few can bear it once it is revealed to them, but [From.GetFirstName] would be an asset to our ranks.
translation: 虽然我的客人[From.GetTitledFirstName]尚未了解世界的真实，但正确的劝说方法依然可能使[From.GetHerHim]理解……没有多少人能在漫长的追求真理的旅程中坚持下来，少数人甚至会在它被揭示出来时对其感到恐惧，但[From.GetFirstName]将成为我们队伍的财富。

original: Leave us alone, guard. Do not return until first light.
translation: 卫兵，让我们单独待一会儿。在黎明前不要回来。

original: The cost of knowledge is great, and [From.GetFirstName] is not the first to have suffered this much for it. At least they did not succumb, but rose to see it eye to eye.
translation: 获得知识的代价是巨大的，而[From.GetFirstName]并不是第一个遭受如此巨大痛苦的人。至少他们并未屈服，而是站起来亲眼目睹。

original: While [From.GetFirstName] has not been quite the same since [From.GetSheHe] truly awoke, [From.GetHerHis] mind is less broken now than it was before.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]自[From.GetSheHe]真正醒来后跟之前并不完全相同，现在[From.GetHerHis]思维没有以前那么破碎了。

original: At first [From.GetTitledFirstName] resisted fiercely, but it slowly dawned on [From.GetHerHim] that no god would bother to answer [From.GetHerHis] prayers.\nCome morning I was exhausted, but [From.GetFirstName] more than willingly swore allegiance to [From.GetHerHis] true master.
translation: 起初[From.GetTitledFirstName]坚决拒绝，但是[From.GetHerHim]渐渐明白上帝不会回应[From.GetHerHis]祈祷。\n在黎明到来时我感到筋疲力尽，但是[From.GetFirstName]更愿意发誓效忠于[From.GetHerHis]真正的主人。

original: The light no longer blinds you, dear [From.GetSisterBrother].
translation: 光不再蒙蔽着你，亲爱的[From.GetSisterBrother]。

original: The truth puts a greater strain on some than others, and as [From.GetTitledFirstName] professed [From.GetHerHis] newfound allegiance between shattered screams, our true lord saw fit to grant [From.GetHerHim] the sweet release of death at the height of my dark ritual.
translation: 真相总是给某些人带来巨大的压力，而当[From.GetTitledFirstName]在[From.GetHerHis]刺耳的尖叫之间宣称新的忠诚对象时，我们真正的主人准许[From.GetHerHim]在黑暗仪式的高潮释放甜蜜的死亡。

original: You have truly been blessed, [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 你被祝福了，[From.GetFirstName]。

original: Even when I held nothing back, [From.GetTitledFirstName] refused to let the name of [Root.GetDWDevil] pass [From.GetHerHis] lips. [From.GetHerHisCap] broken bones will be a reminder of what happens to those who stand in our way.
translation: 即便我说得如此清楚，[From.GetTitledFirstName]还是不肯从[From.GetHerHis]口中说出[Root.GetDWDevil]之名。[From.GetHerHisCap]断掉的骨头将会很好地说明挡我们路的人会有什么下场。

original: Even when I held nothing back, [From.GetTitledFirstName] refused to let the name of [Root.GetDWDevil] pass [From.GetHerHis] lips. [From.GetHerHisCap] mind was not as protected, and if [From.GetSheHe] ever speaks again, it will be nothing but mad ramblings.
translation: 即便我说得如此清楚，[From.GetTitledFirstName]还是不肯从[From.GetHerHis]口中说出[Root.GetDWDevil]之名。可惜[From.GetHerHisCap]头脑并没有受到同等保护，就算[From.GetSheHe]能再次开口说话，也只剩疯言乱语了。

original: Even when I held nothing back, [From.GetTitledFirstName] refused to let the name of [Root.GetDWDevil] pass [From.GetHerHis] lips. If I had pushed [From.GetHerHim] any further, either [From.GetHerHis] bones or [From.GetHerHis] mind would have given in.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]还是不肯从[From.GetHerHis]口中说出[Root.GetDWDevil]之名。如果我当时再强迫一下[From.GetHerHim]，不管是[From.GetHerHis]骨头还是[From.GetHerHis]内心都会屈服的。

original: You will belong to [Root.GetDWDevil] in time, as all will.
translation: 你最后将属于[Root.GetDWDevil]，就像其他所有人一样。

original: Use every method of persuasion to convince §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§! to join §Y[From.Society.GetName]§!.
translation: 使出浑身解数说服§Y[Root.GetTitledName]§!加入§Y[From.Society.GetName]§!。

original: Your induction attempt is successful! [Root.GetDWDevil] welcomes §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! into the coven.\n
translation: 你的招募尝试奏效了！[Root.GetDWDevil]欢迎§Y[From.GetTitledName]§!入会。\n

original: The viewing Character is the holder of this Character Modifier\n
translation: 查看的角色是这个角色修正的拥有者\n

original: Embarrassed Believer
translation: 难堪的信徒

original: This character is recovering from something humiliating.
translation: 这个角色正在从一些羞辱的事情中恢复过来。

original: Unimpressed
translation: 不为所动

original: Conducted Secret Ceremony
translation: 进行秘密仪式

original:
[Root.GetSRGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]

As a secret practitioner of our religion it is sometimes easy to neglect your true self. For your sake, as well as that of [This.Society.GetName], we ask that you conduct a secret ceremony in honor of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName].

[Root.GetSRFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
[Root.GetSRGreeting]，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]

作为我们宗教的秘密践行者，有时你很容易忽视你的真实自我。为了你和[This.Society.GetName]好，我们要求你举行秘密仪式以向[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]表示敬意。

[Root.GetSRFarewell]，
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: Has NOT recently attempted this
translation: 最近没有尝试过

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has offered to travel to my [Root.Capital.GetCapitalHolding] to support me in my secret ceremony. "For a fellow [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]", [From.GetSheHe] writes. While I consider my response, I place the letter onto the hearth. As the flames crumple the paper, I rest my hand on the pocket where I keep my hidden [Root.GetSRTrinketSymbol], safe, and away from prying eyes.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]提议到我的[Root.Capital.GetCapitalHolding]来协助我进行秘密典礼。「为了所有的[Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]追随者」，[From.GetSheHe]写道。我一边思考怎么回答，一边把这封信放在了炉火上。炉火把纸烧成了灰，我把手插回了口袋，口袋里藏着我的[Root.GetSRTrinketSymbol]，它很安全，不会被一双双窥探的眼睛看到。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has offered to support me in my secret ceremony. "For a fellow [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]", [From.GetSheHe] writes. While I consider my response, I place the letter onto the hearth. As the flames crumple the paper, I rest my hand on the pocket where I keep my hidden [Root.GetSRTrinketSymbol], safe, and away from prying eyes.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]提议协助我进行秘密典礼。「为了所有的[Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]追随者」，[From.GetSheHe]写道。我一边思考怎么回答，一边把这封信放在了炉火上。炉火把纸烧成了灰，我把手插回了口袋，口袋里藏着我的[Root.GetSRTrinketSymbol]，它很安全，不会被一双双窥探的眼睛看到。

original: I appreciate the gesture.
translation: 我欣赏这个举动。

original: I will see to the preparations.\n
translation: 我会留意准备工作的。\n

original: No, I don't have time for this right now.
translation: 不，我现在没有时间做这个。

original: I had just lit the candles when [unfortunate_interrupter.GetTitledName] walked in on us. [unfortunate_interrupter.GetSheHeCap] gasped at the sight of our foreign ceremony, but before [unfortunate_interrupter.GetSheHe] had time to alert the guards, [From.GetFirstName] tackled [unfortunate_interrupter.GetHerHim]. The [unfortunate_interrupter.GetManWoman] must've hit [unfortunate_interrupter.GetHerHis] head on something though – when the blood started pouring onto the floor, [From.GetFirstName] backed away in horror.
translation: 我刚点起一支蜡烛，[unfortunate_interrupter.GetTitledName]就走进来撞见了我们，[unfortunate_interrupter.GetSheHeCap]看到我们奇异的仪式倒抽一口冷气，但在[unfortunate_interrupter.GetSheHe]来得及呼叫卫兵之前，[From.GetFirstName]就制服了[unfortunate_interrupter.GetHerHim]。这个[unfortunate_interrupter.GetManWoman]肯定是被什么东西撞到了[unfortunate_interrupter.GetHerHis]头——当血开始涌流在地时，[From.GetFirstName]惊恐地退缩了。

original: This is terrible! What did you do?!
translation: 这太可怕了！你做了什么？！

original: Even though an unfortunate accident, the ceremony to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] is a complete failure.\n
translation: 因为发生了不幸的事故，[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]的祭祀仪式彻底失败了。\n

original: [From.GetFirstName] lights the candles, as I speak the words of prayer to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. Hidden in this secret chamber, I can still hear the sounds of people outside. This had all seemed so clever before – now I am wondering if it is worth the risk of being discovered. I sigh and squeeze my pendant tightly, ignoring the rolling eyes of [From.GetFirstName].
translation: [From.GetFirstName]点亮了蜡烛，然后我开始向[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]祈祷时。藏匿在密室中的我仍然能够听见外面人们的声音。以前这一切似乎都很聪明——现在我更想知道这是否值得我冒险。我叹了口气，无视掉[From.GetFirstName]的白眼，紧紧攥住了我的吊坠。

original: I don't need your judgment, [From.GetSisterBrother].
translation: 我不需要你的意见，[From.GetSisterBrother]。

original: You complete the ceremony, but agree to not talk about it.\n
translation: 你完成了仪式，但同意不去谈论它。\n

original: [From.GetFirstName] lights the candles, and I speak the words of prayer to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. I close my eyes as we join hands and bow our heads before the holy symbols on the wall. Performing a secret ceremony, in a secret chamber, I should be nervous, or excited. Or... something. I don't feel much at all? Yet [From.GetFirstName] turns to me afterwards. "Thank you, [Root.GetSisterBrother]. I needed this."
translation: [From.GetFirstName]点亮了蜡烛，我向[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]祷告。我闭上眼睛，向那面有着神圣象征的墙壁携手垂下头。密室中举行着的秘密仪式应该让我感到紧张或兴奋，或者……别的什么，但我怎么什么都没感觉到呢？片刻之后[From.GetFirstName]转向了我：「谢谢，[Root.GetSisterBrother]，这正是我所需要的。」

original: I'm glad for you, [From.GetSisterBrother].
translation: 我为你感到高兴，[From.GetSisterBrother]。

original: You complete the ceremony, and §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! smiles at you.\n
translation: 你完成了仪式，并且§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!对你微笑。\n

original: [From.GetFirstName] lights the candles, and I speak the words of prayer to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. I close my eyes as we join hands and bow our heads before the holy symbols, the ones I usually keep hidden behind heavy curtains. This is how it should be – for a moment, all I can hear is the sound of my own breathing, and I feel... safe.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]点亮了蜡烛，我向[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]祷告。我闭上眼睛，向那面有着神圣标志的墙壁携手垂下头，平常我把这些标志隐藏在窗帘后面。就是这样——有那么一瞬间，我能听到的只有我自己的呼吸声，而我感到如此的……安全。

original: [From.GetFirstName] lights the candles, and I speak the words of prayer to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. I close my eyes as we join hands and bow our heads before the holy symbols – the ones I usually keep hidden behind heavy curtains. For a moment, all I can hear is the sound of my own breathing, and I feel... safe. "One day, we'll be free", [From.GetFirstName] says.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]点亮了蜡烛，我向[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]祷告。我闭上眼睛，向那面有着神圣标志的墙壁携手垂下头——平常我把这些标志隐藏在窗帘后面。有那么一瞬间，我能听到的只有我自己的呼吸声，而我感到如此的……安全。「总有一天我们会自由的。」，[From.GetFirstName]说道。

original: [From.GetFirstName] lights the candles, and I speak the words of prayer. I close my eyes as we join hands and bow our heads before the holy symbols – the ones I usually keep hidden behind heavy curtains. I have not felt this relaxed in months. When I open my eyes, I find [From.GetFirstName] averting [From.GetHerHis] gaze from me, blushing.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]点亮了蜡烛，我诵念祷告词。我闭上眼睛，向那面有着神圣标志的墙壁携手垂下头——平常我把这些标志隐藏在窗帘后面。我已经有好几个月没有感到如此放松。当我睁开了眼睛，我发现[From.GetFirstName]躲开了[From.GetHerHis]视线，满脸通红。

original: [From.GetFirstName] lights the candles, and I speak the words of prayer. To my surprise, [From.GetFirstName] takes my hand – the faint light of the room reflected only in [From.GetHerHis] eyes, and the holy symbol hanging from a pendant around [From.GetHerHis] neck. "We're supposed to be praying", I mumble and let go, still feeling the warmth of [From.GetHerHis] hand on my skin.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]点亮了蜡烛，我进行着祷告。然而令我惊讶的是，[From.GetFirstName]牵起了我的手，[From.GetHerHis]眼中映照着房间里微弱的光线，而神圣的标志就浮现在环绕着[From.GetHerHis]颈脖的吊坠上。「我们应该认真祈祷」我喃喃着抽开了手，可我的皮肤上依然残留着[From.GetHerHis]手所带来的温度。

original: We should do this again, sometime.
translation: 我们应该找时间再举行一次。

original: You complete the ceremony, both you and §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! feeling better.\n
translation: 你完成了仪式，你和§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!都感觉更好了。\n

original: You complete the ceremony, and walk away with some new and confusing feelings...\n
translation: 你完成了仪式，并且怀着一些新奇困惑的感觉离开了……\n

original: I light the candles, while [From.GetFirstName], in a low voice, begins to sing a haunting melody. I bow my head, deciding resolutely that I am a true [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent] and this will not change. [From.GetFirstName] echoes my thoughts, when [From.GetSheHe] finally speaks: "This ceremony is as much for [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], as it is for us". I nod, and we join hands in prayer.
translation: 我点亮了蜡烛，[From.GetFirstName]开始低声轻唱，那令人难以忘怀的旋律。我在此俯首，毅然决然的选择成为一个真正[Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]追随者，这将始终不渝。[From.GetFirstName]回应了我的想法，最后[From.GetSheHe]说道：「这个仪式既是献给[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]，也是为我们举行的」。我点了点头，然后我们再度加入了祈祷。

original: I light the candles, while [From.GetFirstName] begins to sing quietly, a haunting melody, in reverence to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. I close my eyes, in relief, over being able to practice my faith and to say the words of prayer without judgment. I look over to [From.GetFirstName], who is still singing, and I smile. Kinship such as this, is a gift.
translation: 我点亮了蜡烛，[From.GetFirstName]开始低声轻唱，那令人难以忘怀的旋律，诉说着对[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]的崇敬。我闭上了眼睛，感到十分放松，可以毫无保留的倾吐着祷告的话语。我看向了[From.GetFirstName]，那个依然在歌唱的人，我露出了微笑，能够拥有这样的亲眷，简直一种是恩赐。

original: I lit the candles, while [From.GetFirstName] began to sing quietly, a wistful melody. I swear by [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], I almost dropped the fire I was holding, as [From.GetHerHis] voice struck a brilliant chord in me. It was so beautiful – the hymn, and the [From.GetManWoman] performing it. I shook my head, trying to focus on the ceremony. In my heart, something flickered to life.
translation: 我点亮了蜡烛，[From.GetFirstName]开始低声轻唱，那是如此令人惆怅的旋律。我向[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]起誓，当[From.GetHerHis]声音伴随着悠扬的弦音向我袭来时，我几乎握不住手中的火把。真是甜美——不仅是圣歌，还有演唱的[From.GetManWoman]。我摇了摇头，试图把注意力集中在典礼上。在我的心中，有某些东西悄悄萌发了。

original: I lit the candles, while [From.GetFirstName] began to sing quietly, a wistful melody, full of longing. I've never seen [From.GetHerHim] so solemn before, and I was struck by the admiration that welled up in me. By [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], I and [From.GetFirstName]? What was I thinking? I shook my head, trying to focus on the ceremony – in my heart, something flickered to life.
translation: 我点亮了蜡烛，[From.GetFirstName]开始低声轻唱，那是如此令人惆怅的旋律，带着深切的渴望。我从来没有见过[From.GetHerHim]如此庄重，我的仰慕如同潮水般涌了上来。看在[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]的份上，我和[From.GetFirstName]？我在想些什么呢！我摇晃了下脑袋，尝试将注意力集中在仪式上，然而在我的心里，有什么已经悄然闯入了我的生命之中。

original: It was extraordinary.
translation: 这真是特别。

original: You complete the ceremony and walk away with a renewed faith.\n
translation: 你完成了仪式，并怀着新的信念离开。\n

original: You complete the ceremony and walk away with a new-found strength, and some interesting feelings...\n
translation: 你完成了仪式并带着新的力量，以及一些有趣的感觉离开了……\n

original: Holy Cross
translation: 圣十字架

original: six-pointed star
translation: 六芒星

original: figurine of Buddha
translation: 佛像

original: figurine of Ganesha
translation: 象头神像

original: figurine
translation: 耆那神像

original: fire symbol
translation: 火焰标志

original: Thor's hammer
translation: 雷神之锤

original: hatchet amulet
translation: 斧形护身符

original: world tree-symbol
translation: 世界树标志

original: life tree-symbol
translation: 生命树标志

original: Ukko's hammer
translation: 乌戈之锤

original: fire symbol
translation: 火焰标志

original: sun symbol
translation: 太阳标志

original: I have received a letter from my fellow member of [This.Society.GetName], [From.GetTitledFirstName]: "Dear [Root.GetSisterBrother] [Root.GetFirstName]. Will you, as the [Root.Religion.GetGroupName] scholar you are, please offer me some advice on my poetry? Or, the attempt of it?" Reading through the attached documents, there are multiple verses, all in honor of [From.Religion.GetHighGodName].
translation: 我收到了一封来自[This.Society.GetName]成员[From.GetTitledFirstName]的信：「亲爱的[Root.GetSisterBrother][Root.GetFirstName]。祝你安好，作为[Root.Religion.GetGroupName]的学者，能否请你为我的诗歌提出些建议呢？要不，试试看？」我阅读了那些随信附上的文字，有众多章节都是在歌颂[From.Religion.GetHighGodName]的荣光。

original: Hmm... I am missing the more comforting aspects of faith.
translation: 唔……我想要看到信仰更令人慰藉的方面。

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will receive a letter with your advice.\n
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!将会收到一封带有你建议的信。\n

original: While I enjoy the metaphors, they seem a little forced?
translation: 虽然我喜欢隐喻，但它们似乎有点勉强？

original: Writing is frivolous.
translation: 写作毫无意义。

original: You can't be bothered with this.\n
translation: 你不能被此烦扰。\n

original: I was beginning to think that [From.GetTitledFirstName] took offense to my comments, but today I have received a new draft of [From.GetHerHis] work – I am surprised to find that [From.GetHerHis] words really speak to me. Scribbled in the margin I can just make out: "I implore you, [Root.GetSisterBrother], bear with me. It is not finished".
translation: 我开始觉得[From.GetTitledFirstName]对我的评论感到了冒犯，但今天我收到了一份[From.GetHerHis]新作品——我惊讶地发现[From.GetHerHis]文字确实打动我。书页边的空白处潦草地写着：「我恳求你，[Root.GetSisterBrother]，请再等等我。它还没有完成。」

original: Nonsense! This is brilliant work and the world needs to see it!
translation: 胡说！这么伟大的作品要让全世界都看到！

original: You make sure the writings are published, against the wishes of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 你决定将作品出版，尽管这违背§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!的意愿。\n

original: I think [This.Society.GetName] will treasure these words.
translation: 我认为[This.Society.GetName]会珍视这些文字。

original: You intend to make sure that the writings will go to §Y[This.Society.GetName]§! for safe-keeping.\n
translation: 你打算确保这些著作能够安全送到§Y[This.Society.GetName]§!进行妥善保管。\n

original: Can I keep this?
translation: 我能留着这个吗？

original: You find great comfort in the writings.\n
translation: 你在作品中感到极大的安慰。\n

original: If I were to put these poems out, in my own name...
translation: 如果我把这些诗词发表出去，署上我的名字……

original: You decide to steal the writings and take the credit yourself.\n
translation: 你决定窃取这些著作成果并且一力承担风险。\n

original: "I cannot believe that you went against my wishes", [From.GetTitledName] writes to me. "The poems were far from finished, and now I receive word that my metaphors could use work? I have been humiliated!" I put the letter away, frowning.
translation: 「我无法相信你违背了我的意愿，」[From.GetTitledName]写信给我。「这些诗歌还没有完成，现在我收到建议说也许我的比喻需要改进？我被羞辱了！」我放下了信，皱着眉头。

original: "I cannot believe that you went against my wishes", [From.GetTitledName] writes to me. "The poems were far from finished, and now people are saying that perhaps I do not understand the comforting aspects of [From.Religion.GetHighGodName]? I have been humiliated!" I put the letter away, frowning.
translation: 「我无法相信你违背了我的意愿，」[From.GetTitledName]给我写道。「那些诗远未完成，现在人们都开始说也许我不理解[From.Religion.GetHighGodName]安慰人心的一面？我感觉自己被羞辱了！」我把信移开，紧锁眉头。

original: Hrmph. You cannot fault a [Root.GetManWoman] for seizing an opportunity.
translation: 哎。你不能因为我抓住了机会而责备我这个[Root.GetManWoman]。

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will understand, in time.\n
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!总有一天会理解的。\n

original: "I am flattered that you think [This.Society.GetName] could benefit from my work", [From.GetTitledName] writes in [From.GetHerHis] letter. "Thank you for your support, [Root.GetSisterBrother]" [From.GetSheHe] continues, before assuring me of the finishing touches [From.GetSheHe] intends to see to before the final version of the manuscript will enter the library.
translation: 「你认为[This.Society.GetName]可以从我的作品中得益，对此我感到受宠若惊」，[From.GetTitledName]在[From.GetHerHis]信中写道。「感谢你的支持，[Root.GetSisterBrother]。」[From.GetSheHe]继续写道，向我保证[From.GetSheHe]只想在手稿的最终版本进入图书馆之前再处理一下收尾部分。

original: I am honored to be surrounded by minds like [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 我很荣幸能够结交像[From.GetFirstName]这样拥有聪明头脑的人。

original: "I cannot believe that my words could have such an impact on someone, honored [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName]." I place the letter on the mantelpiece, the sigil of [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] a friendly reminder of the comfort I feel.
translation: 「我无法相信我的话可能会对某人产生如此的影响，尊敬的[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]。」我把这封信放在壁炉架上，[From.GetOnlyDynastyName]的印记总是令我感到友情的安慰。

original: I am lucky to be a part of [This.Society.GetName].
translation: 我很荣幸能成为[This.Society.GetName]的一分子。

original: You feel better.\n
translation: 你感觉舒服多了。\n

original: Patron of the Arts
translation: 艺术赞助人

original: This character views art as something meant for the public.
translation: 这个角色把艺术视为面向大众的东西。

original: Preserver of Poetry
translation: 诗歌保存者

original: This character has taken steps to ensure that certain great literary works be preserved for future generations.
translation: 这个角色已经采取措施确保某些伟大的文学作品为后代而留存。

original: Published Poet
translation: 著作发表的诗人

original: This character is renowned for their religious poetry.
translation: 此角色以宗教诗歌而闻名。

original: "I suppose that I should be flattered that you felt the need to stoop this low, you [Root.GetInsultAdjective] [Root.GetInsultNoun]", I read. My [From.GetSisterBrother] [From.GetFirstName] seems to have gotten wind of "my" poetry – it's currently the talk of the town and people seem to really appreciate how I focused on the comforting aspects of faith.
translation: 「能让你这种无耻小人如此卑躬屈膝，我想我应该感到受宠若惊，你这[Root.GetInsultAdjective][Root.GetInsultNoun]」，我读道。我的[From.GetSisterBrother][From.GetFirstName]应该已经得到了关于我的「作品」的风声。它现在是镇上人们谈论的话题，人们似乎非常欣赏我专注于信仰给人安慰的一面。

original: "I suppose that I should be flattered that you felt the need to stoop this low, you [Root.GetInsultAdjective] [Root.GetInsultNoun]", I read. My [From.GetSisterBrother] [From.GetFirstName] seems to have gotten wind of "my" poetry – it's currently the talk of the town and people seem to really appreciate how effortless my metaphors seem.
translation: 「能让你这种无耻小人如此卑躬屈膝，我想我应该感到受宠若惊，你这[Root.GetInsultAdjective][Root.GetInsultNoun]」，我读道。我的[From.GetSisterBrother][From.GetFirstName]应该已经得到了关于我的「作品」的风声。它现在是镇上人们谈论的话题，人们似乎非常欣赏我自然的隐喻。

original: Sorry, [From.GetTitledName], but [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] works in mysterious ways.
translation: 对不起，[From.GetTitledName]，但是[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]以神秘的方式工作。

original: §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! will get over this. In time. Maybe.\n
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledName]§!总能克服的。过一段时间。也许吧。\n

original: Green Fingers
translation: 园艺能手

original: This character has a way with plants.
translation: 这个角色擅长与植物相处。

original: Dirty Hands
translation: 脏手

original: This character tried their hand at gardening, but all they got was dirty.
translation: 这个角色尝试园艺，但仅仅让他们变得肮脏。

original: The Name of the Rose
translation: 玫瑰之名

original: This character has a keen interest in the cultivation of roses.
translation: 这个角色对玫瑰花的培育很有兴趣。

original: Rose Gardens
translation: 玫瑰园

original: Roses, in a multitude of colors, are found in the gardens of this character.
translation: 这个角色的花园里可以发现五颜六色的玫瑰。

original: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] has contacted me, asking if I have any interest in learning more about roses. Apparently [From.GetHerHis] latest achievement involves a dark red variant, mixed with a particular type of yellow wild rose.
translation: [From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]与我联系，询问我是否有兴趣了解更多有关玫瑰的信息。显然[From.GetHerHis]最新的成就涉及到暗红色的变种与一种特殊类型的黄色野玫瑰杂交。

original: Fascinating! I shall visit the monastery where this feat has been accomplished.
translation: 太有趣了！我将拜访完成了这个壮举的修道院。

original: Fascinating! I shall visit the matha where this feat has been accomplished.
translation: 太有趣了！我将拜访完成了这个壮举的修会。

original: You will visit the garden where §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! has conducted [From.GetHerHis] botany.\n
translation: 你将会到访§Y[From.GetTitledName]§!研究[From.GetHerHis]植物的那个花园。\n

original: Oh, I simply must have some!
translation: 哦，我一定得要一些！

original: You will send someone to collect some of these roses.\n
translation: 你将派人去收集其中一些玫瑰。\n

original: As a matter of fact, I have been working on something similar!
translation: 事实上，我一直在做类似的事情！

original: You will send some of your own samples to §Y[From.GetTitledName]§!.\n
translation: 你将会送一些你自己的样本给§Y[From.GetTitledName]§!。\n

original: This seems like a waste of my time.
translation: 这似乎是在浪费我的时间。

original: Escorted through the gardens of the monastery, I immediately spot the work of [From.GetSisterBrother] [From.GetFirstName]. The roses are a delicate mixture of red and yellow, a hue of sunset at their center. "They're beautiful", my escort nods, offering me a small spade. "They're a little cramped over there though, would you mind helping out?"
translation: 当我被护送着进入了修道院的花园时，我立刻察觉到了[From.GetSisterBrother][From.GetFirstName]的杰作。玫瑰精致的混合着红色与黄色，中心如同日落般的色调。「它们实在太美了！」，我的护卫点了点头并递给我了一把铲子，「它们似乎有点拥挤了，你愿意来帮忙吗？」

original: I would love to! There is something... grounding, to gardening.
translation: 我愿意！我有一些园艺……基础吧。

original: The [Root.GetSocietyRank] smiles.\n
translation: [Root.GetSocietyRank]微笑着。\n

original: Oh, I can do that. I think.
translation: 噢，我能做那个，我想。

original: You embrace this new interest.\n
translation: 你接受了这个新的爱好。\n

original: Thank you, but no thanks. These are marvelous though!
translation: 谢谢你，但还是免了。虽然这些都很不可思议！

original: The [Root.GetSocietyRank] nods at you in agreement – §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! will receive a letter with your compliments.\n
translation: [Root.GetSocietyRank]点头赞同你——§Y[From.GetTitledName]§!会收到你的一封贺信。\n

original: The roses that I had sent for have now been planted in my own gardens, their beauty spreading joy to anybody who passes by them. What a true marvel of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!
translation: 我送来的玫瑰花现在已经种在我自己的花园里了，它们的美丽给任何经过它们的人带来欢乐。真是[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的奇迹！

original: [This.Society.GetName] be praised!
translation: 赞美[This.Society.GetName]！

original: §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! will receive your thanks.\n
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledName]§!将收到你的谢意。\n

original: It seems that [From.GetSisterBrother] [From.GetFirstName] has received the sample from my garden that I sent [From.GetHerHim]. Today a courier presented me with some elaborate coal sketches of the various rose species [From.GetFirstName] has been occupying [From.GetHerselfHimself] with – included are ideas of new ones, provided we continue to work together.
translation: [From.GetSisterBrother][From.GetFirstName]似乎已经收到我从花园寄给[From.GetHerHim]的样品。今天一位信使送来一些精心绘制的炭绘，画中是[From.GetFirstName][From.GetHerselfHimself]忙于照料的各种玫瑰——还包括一些新的想法，只要我们能够继续合作。

original: I am happy to help!
translation: 我乐于助人！

original: You do [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s work.\n
translation: 你做了[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的工作。\n

original: While attending prayer one early morning, I notice my [From.GetSisterBrother] [From.GetFirstName] drowsing off in [From.GetHerHis] seat. Meanwhile, our fellow members of [This.Society.GetName] are deep in their contemplation and do not seem to have noticed yet.
translation: 在清晨参加祈祷时，我注意到[From.GetSisterBrother][From.GetFirstName]正在[From.GetHerHis]座位上打着瞌睡。与此同时，其他[This.Society.GetName]成员深深沉浸在冥想之中，完全没发现。

original: I should wake [From.GetHerHim], before anyone catches on.
translation: 在别人逮住之前，我应该叫醒[From.GetHerHim]。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] looks like [From.GetSheHe] could use a nap...
translation: [From.GetSheHeCap]看起来认为[From.GetSheHe]可以打个小盹……

original: I think I heard [From.GetHerHim] request a mustache.
translation: 我想我听到[From.GetHerHim]想要胡子。

original: I gently prod at [From.GetFirstName], but I get no reaction. Then I shove my elbow into [From.GetHerHis] side, causing [From.GetHerHim] to cough and open [From.GetHerHis] eyes, a flash of anger in them. [From.GetHerHisCap] face turns red as [From.GetSheHe] blinks, the situation dawning on [From.GetHerHim] suddenly. "Thank you", [From.GetSheHe] mumbles, sheepishly.
translation: 我轻戳了[From.GetFirstName]，但毫无反应。然后我用手肘推撞[From.GetHerHis]身侧，[From.GetHerHim]一阵咳嗽，带着愤怒的眼神睁开了[From.GetHerHis]双眼。当[From.GetSheHe]眨眼时，[From.GetHerHisCap]脸突然变红了。「谢谢你」，[From.GetSheHe]羞怯地嘟囔着。

original: Think nothing of it, friend.
translation: 没关系，朋友。

original: It seems I saved you from some real embarrassment there...
translation: 看来我将你从窘迫中解救了出来……

original: As [From.GetFirstName] continues [From.GetHerHis] nap, it does not take long before [From.GetSheHe] starts to snore. I discretely edge away from [From.GetHerHim], and when [From.GetSheHe] finally wakes up, it is to the faces of disapproval from [From.GetHerHis] companions. How awkward for [From.GetHerHim].
translation: [From.GetFirstName]继续打[From.GetHerHis]盹，没多久[From.GetSheHe]就开始打呼了。我谨慎的挪得离[From.GetHerHim]远了一点，当[From.GetSheHe]终于醒了时候，他看到的是[From.GetHerHis]同伴们的不满的脸。真尴尬。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] did look rather comfortable there, for a while...
translation: [From.GetSheHeCap]看起来相当舒服，暂时……

original: I scurry off to fetch some ink, before I gently sit down beside the lightly sleeping [From.GetFirstName] and begin my work. It takes a few minutes, but in the end I am more than satisfied – [From.GetHerHis] new mustache is marvelous! For some reason, [From.GetSisterBrother] [From.GetFirstName] does not return my smile when [From.GetSheHe] awakes from [From.GetHerHis] slumber.
translation: 我匆匆去取了些墨水，在轻睡的[From.GetFirstName]旁边缓慢坐下，然后开始工作。虽然只花了几分钟，但最后我还是很满意的——[From.GetHerHis]新胡子真是太棒了！出于某种原因，当[From.GetSheHe]从[From.GetHerHis]睡梦中醒来时，[From.GetSisterBrother][From.GetFirstName]并没有回敬我的微笑。

original: What is not to like?
translation: 有什么不喜欢？

original: Invite Holy Ascetic
translation: 邀请苦行圣者

original: Invite a holy ascetic belonging to [Root.Society.GetName] to join your court.
translation: 邀请一个属于[Root.Society.GetName]的苦行圣者加入你的宫廷。

original: A holy ascetic will soon appear at the court of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 一名苦行圣者将很快出现在§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!的宫廷中。\n

original: The [From.GetAscetic] [From.GetBestName] has finally arrived at my court. [From.GetFirstName] is a most noble and wise [From.GetManWoman] and I will happily receive [From.GetHerHis] council in matters of religion and scholarly pursuits.
translation: [From.GetAscetic][From.GetBestName]终于来到了我的宫廷。[From.GetFirstName]是一位最为高贵、最具有智慧的[From.GetManWoman]，在宗教与学术事务上，[From.GetHerHis]建议令我不胜欣喜。

original: [Root.GetMOGreeting], [From.GetBestName]!
translation: [Root.GetMOGreeting]，[From.GetBestName]！

original: Evoke Sympathy for [From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]
translation: 唤起对[From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]的同情

original: Approach §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! and attempt to make [Root.GetHerHim] sympathize with [From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons].
translation: 接近§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!并试图让[Root.GetHerHim]对[From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]心生怜悯。

original: After some careful planning, I am seated next to [From.GetTitledFirstName] at a formal dinner. I have planned to tell [From.GetHerHim] about a family of [Root.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons] that was attacked and driven from their home in [Root.Capital.GetName] in an attempt to rouse [From.GetHerHis] sympathies, but what angle should I employ?
translation: 经过周密计划，在一个正式的晚宴上，我坐在[From.GetTitledFirstName]的旁边。我打算告诉[From.GetHerHim]，一个[Root.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]家庭在[Root.Capital.GetName]的家中遭到袭击和驱赶，以试图唤起[From.GetHerHis]同情，但我应该采用什么样的立场呢？

original: They were forced to leave many loved ones behind.
translation: 他们被迫离开了亲人们。

original: Talk about the relatives and friends of the attacked family and how they will never see each other again, hoping this will tug on the heartstrings of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 谈论受袭家庭的亲属和朋友，以及他们将如何再也见不到彼此，希望这将牵动§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!的心弦。\n

original: Their scars, both physical and emotional, will never fade.
translation: 他们的伤疤，无论是身体上的还是精神上的，都永远不会消退。

original: Talk about personal trauma, hoping that §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! can relate.\n
translation: 谈论个人创伤，希望§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!能有同感。\n

original: They had a profitable business. It was burned to the ground.
translation: 他们做着有利可图的生意，产业却被烧成白地。

original: Talk about the business the family lost and how valuable it was to the community, hoping that §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will realize how the prosperity of the capital and was affected.\n
translation: 和§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!谈谈家族错失的生意及其对社区的意义，他会明白这将影响首都的繁荣的。\n

original: I will go to any lengths to prevent this from happening again!
translation: 我会竭尽全力防止这种事情再次发生！

original: Talk about how important this matters is to you personally, hoping that §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! cares enough about your opinion.\n
translation: 谈论这些事情对你个人来说是多么的重要，希望§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!在乎你的意见。\n

original: I am sat next to [From.GetTitledFirstName] at a dinner when [From.GetSheHe] tells about a family of [From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons] which was attacked in [From.GetHerHis] capital, [From.Capital.GetName]. 'They will never see their friends and relatives again, the poor souls,' [From.GetFirstName] says with a heavy sigh.
translation: 晚宴的时候我坐在[From.GetTitledFirstName]旁边，[From.GetSheHe]讲述了[From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]一家在[From.GetHerHis]首都[From.Capital.GetName]的被袭击的事情。「他们再也看不到他们的朋友和亲戚了」[From.GetFirstName]叹息道。

original: I am sat next to [From.GetTitledFirstName] at a dinner when [From.GetSheHe] tells about a family of [From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons] which was attacked in [From.GetHerHis] capital, [From.Capital.GetName]. 'I never saw them myself, but apparently the mother was maimed in the attack. The children will surely be haunted by nightmares for years to come,' [From.GetFirstName] sighs.
translation: 晚宴的时候我坐在[From.GetTitledFirstName]旁边，[From.GetSheHe]讲述了[From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]一家在[From.GetHerHis]首都[From.Capital.GetName]被袭击的事情。「我没亲自见过他们家，但显然母亲在袭击中受伤了。在未来的几年里，孩子们肯定会被恶梦缠身。」[From.GetFirstName]叹息道。

original: I am sat next to [From.GetTitledFirstName] at a dinner when [From.GetSheHe] tells about a family of [From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons] which was attacked in [From.GetHerHis] capital, [From.Capital.GetName]. 'I wish they had been left alone – their business was a vital cog in the local economy and a great source of taxes,' [From.GetFirstName] sighs.
translation: 晚宴的时候我坐在[From.GetTitledFirstName]旁边，[From.GetSheHe]讲述了[From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]一家在[From.GetHerHis]首都[From.Capital.GetName]被袭击的事情。「我真希望没人去攻击他们——他们的生意是当地经济中的一个重要组成部分，也是一个很好的税收来源」[From.GetFirstName]叹息道。

original: I am sat next to [From.GetTitledFirstName] at a dinner when [From.GetSheHe] tells about a family of [From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons] which was attacked in [From.GetHerHis] capital, [From.Capital.GetName]. 'Nothing angers me as when people are persecuted and harmed, simply because of their faith!' [From.GetFirstName] growls.
translation: 晚宴的时候我坐在[From.GetTitledFirstName]旁边，[From.GetSheHe]讲述了[From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]一家在[From.GetHerHis]首都[From.Capital.GetName]被袭击的事情。「没有什么比仅仅因为信仰而使人们受到攻击和迫害更使我生气了」[From.GetFirstName]咆哮道。

original: Such senseless violence! My heart aches for them.
translation: 如此无谓的暴力！我真替他们感到心疼。

original: They were [From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons] and only have themselves to blame!
translation: 他们只能怪他们自己是[From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] was visibly moved by the story about the poor family. After our conversation, [From.GetSheHe] became very quiet and only responded in short, half-hearted sentences when spoken to. Just before our departure, [From.GetFirstName] pulled me aside and thanked me for opening [From.GetHerHis] eyes.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]显然被这可怜的一家人的故事打动了。我们谈话过后，[From.GetSheHe]变得一言不发，有人搭话时只简短地回几句心不在焉的话。在我们动身之前，[From.GetFirstName]把我拉到一旁，感谢我让[From.GetSheHe]睁眼看清了世界。

original: I knew we would find an ally in [From.GetFirstName]!
translation: 我早就知道[From.GetFirstName]会是我们的同路人！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] only scoffed at my story and haughtily claimed that the family, as 'a bunch of filthy heathens', only had themselves to blame. Then [From.GetSheHe] turned to the [From.GetManWomanOpp] on [From.GetHerHis] other side and proceeded to ignore me for the rest of the evening.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]只是嘲笑我的故事，并傲慢地宣称：作为「一群肮脏的异教徒」，这个家庭只能怪他们自己。然后[From.GetSheHe]转向[From.GetHerHis]另一侧的[From.GetManWomanOpp]，整晚都无视了我。

original: [From.GetFirstName] is not yet ready to accept the truth.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]还没有准备好接受真相。

original:
[Root.GetSRGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

We are hopeful that [induction_target.GetTitledFirstName] is of the right mindset and quality of character to become one of us. As we need powerful allies of the cause, it is your mission to show [induction_target.GetHerHim] the light.

[Root.GetSRFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
[Root.GetSRGreeting]，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

我们希望[induction_target.GetTitledFirstName]具有正确的心态和品格以成为我们中的一员。因为我们的事业需要强大的盟友，所以您的任务是给[induction_target.GetHerHim]指明方向。

[Root.GetSRFarewell]，
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: Induct [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] to the True Faith
translation: 引导[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]到真正的信仰中

original: We believe that the [FromFrom.GetTitle] of [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName], [FromFrom.GetDynName], could be turned into a supporter of our cause. It is your mission to secretly convert [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] to the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] faith.
translation: 我们相信[FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName][FromFrom.GetTitle][FromFrom.GetDynName]有潜力被转化为我们事业的支持者。你的任务是让[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]暗中皈依[Root.TrueReligion.GetName]信仰。

original: To complete this mission, §Gright-click§! on the portrait of §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!, select §Y'Induct Into the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] Faith'§! and successfully make [FromFrom.GetHerHim] a secret believer of the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] faith. If §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§! does not currently have the §YSympathy for [Root.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]§! trait, §Y'Evoke Sympathy for [Root.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]'§! must be selected and successfully completed first.\n
translation: 要完成这项任务，请在§Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!的肖像上§G右击§!，选择§Y「引入[Root.TrueReligion.GetName]信仰」§! 并且成功使[FromFrom.GetHerHim]成为[Root.TrueReligion.GetName]信仰的秘密信徒。如果§Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!没有§Y[Root.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]同情者§!特质，必须先§Y「唤起对[Root.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]的同情」§!\n

original:
[Root.GetSRGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

To bring about the liberation of those who follow the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] faith, we must first win the sympathies of those in power. Approach [sympathy_target.GetTitledFirstName] and turn [sympathy_target.GetHerHim] into a supporter of our cause.

[Root.GetSRFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
[Root.GetSRGreeting]，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

为了给信仰[Root.TrueReligion.GetName]的人带来解放，我们必须先获得当权者的支持。接近[sympathy_target.GetTitledFirstName]，然后把[sympathy_target.GetHerHim]发展成我们事业的支持者。

[Root.GetSRFarewell]，
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: Evoke the Sympathy of [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 唤起[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]的同情

original: The first step towards liberation as well as the religious conversion of lost souls is spreading sympathy for the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] faith. Approach [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] and turn [FromFrom.GetHerHim] into a supporter of our cause.
translation: 通向解脱与堕落灵魂的宗教皈依之第一步是传播对[Root.TrueReligion.GetName]信仰的同情，和[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]套近乎并把[FromFrom.GetHerHim]转化为我们事业的支持者。

original: To complete this mission, §Gright-click§! on the portrait of §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!, select §Y'Evoke Sympathy for [FromFrom.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]'§! and successfully make them a supporter of the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] faith.\n
translation: 要完成这项任务，在§Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!的头像上§G右键点击§!，选择§Y唤起对[FromFrom.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]的同情§!，并且成功使他们成为[Root.TrueReligion.GetName]信仰的支持者。\n

original: Induct Into the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] Faith
translation: 引导到[From.TrueReligion.GetName]信仰中

original: Attempt to make [Root.GetTitledFirstName] a secret believer of the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] Faith.
translation: 试图使[Root.GetTitledFirstName]成为一个[From.TrueReligion.GetName]信仰的秘密信徒。

original: Has not been approached to be inducted into another faith recently\n
translation: 近期还没有被人接触并招募去另一个信仰\n

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! attempts to find a way to make §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! contemplate the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] Faith.\n
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!尝试寻找方法，让§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!考虑[From.TrueReligion.GetName]信仰。\n

original: I have arranged for one of my spies to leave a tome of the [Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] with an anonymous note in the [secret_religion_inductee.GetChamber] of [secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName]. If the tome is left open on a passage which [secret_religion_inductee.GetFirstName] finds relevant, I am hopeful [secret_religion_inductee.GetSheHe] will find truth in the holy words – but what might catch [secret_religion_inductee.GetHerHis] eye...?
translation: 我已经安排我的一名密探在[secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName]的[secret_religion_inductee.GetChamber]中的一卷[Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]上面留下匿名笔记。如果这卷书被翻开并留在[secret_religion_inductee.GetFirstName]认为很重要的一页上，我对[secret_religion_inductee.GetSheHe]将找到圣言中的真理抱有希望——但什么才能吸引[secret_religion_inductee.GetHerHis]注意力呢……？

original: A tale about a legendary warrior.
translation: 一部歌颂传奇战士的史诗。

original: Leave the [Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] open on a passage about war and warriors, hoping it will be relevant to §Y[secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 给§Y[secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName]§!翻开[Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]中有关战争与勇士的章节，希望这能引起他的兴趣。\n

original: Something stressing the importance of community.
translation: 一些强调共同体重要性的内容。

original: Leave the [Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] open on a passage about community, hoping it will be relevant to §Y[secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 给§Y[secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName]§!翻开[Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]中有关共同体的章节，希望这能引起他的兴趣。\n

original: A passage on ethics and philosophy.
translation: 一篇论述伦理和哲学的论文。

original: Leave the [Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] open on a passage on ethics and philosophy, hoping it will be relevant to §Y[secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 给§Y[secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName]§!翻开[Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]中有关伦理学和哲学的章节，希望这能引起他的兴趣。\n

original: A story about a fair and mighty ruler.
translation: 一段讲述公正而威严的君主的故事。

original: Leave the [Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] open on a passage about legendary rulers, hoping it will be relevant to §Y[secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 给§Y[secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName]§!翻开[Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]中有关传奇君主的章节，希望这能引起他的兴趣。\n

original: As I retired to my [secret_religion_inductee.GetChamber], I was shocked to find a copy of the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] [secret_religion_inductor.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] on my bed! At first, I thought someone had left it there with the intention to frame me, but then I noticed a little note left on top of the open tome. 'I think you will find this interesting. Please, give it a chance. Signed, a friend.'
translation: 当我回到我的[secret_religion_inductee.GetChamber]时，我震惊地在我的床上发现[secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName][secret_religion_inductor.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]的抄本！一开始，我以为有人把它放在那里是为了陷害我，但后来我注意到有人在打开的书上留下了一个小纸条。「我想你会觉得这很有趣。拜托，请看一眼。此致，一位朋友。」

original: Intriguing. I guess a little read cannot hurt...
translation: 真有趣，我猜读上一点不会有什么坏处……

original: Read the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] [secret_religion_inductor.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName].
translation: 阅读[secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName][secret_religion_inductor.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]。

original: Blasphemy! The unholy words shall burn!
translation: 渎神！这些罪恶的话语必须烧毁！

original: Burn the copy of the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] [secret_religion_inductor.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName].
translation: 焚烧[secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName][secret_religion_inductor.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]的副本。

original: Never! I will hide it where no one shall ever find it.
translation: 门都没有！我会把它藏到没人找得到的地方。

original: Get rid of the copy of the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] [secret_religion_inductor.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName].
translation: 扔掉[secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName][secret_religion_inductor.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]的副本。

original: The copy of the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] [secret_religion_inductor.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] I found in my [Root.GetChamber] had been left open on a passage on a legendary war and the brave heroes who fought in it to defend the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] faith. The story intrigued me enough to make me continue reading. Over the course of only a few weeks, I had finished the entire tome.
translation: 我在我[Root.GetChamber]发现的[secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName][secret_religion_inductor.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]副本打开的部分上记载着一篇无畏的英雄们为捍卫[secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName]信仰而在一场传奇战争中战斗的故事。这个故事引起了我足够的兴趣，让我继续阅读。在短短几个星期的时间里，我读完了整本书。

original: The copy of the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] [secret_religion_inductor.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] I found in my [Root.GetChamber] had been left open on a passage on the importance of family, friends and the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] community. The words intrigued me enough to make me continue reading. Over the course of a few weeks, I had finished the entire tome.
translation: 我在我[Root.GetChamber]发现的[secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName][secret_religion_inductor.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]副本上打开的部分记载着一篇家庭，朋友以及[secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName]社团的重要性的文章。这篇文章引起了我足够的兴趣，让我继续阅读。在短短几个星期的时间里，我读完了整本书。

original: The copy of the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] [secret_religion_inductor.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] I found in my [Root.GetChamber] had been left open on a passage on the greater questions – right and wrong, the higher purpose, the afterlife – and as I pondered the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] perspective on these matters, I found myself intrigued enough to continue reading.
translation: 我在我[Root.GetChamber]发现了[secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName][secret_religion_inductor.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]副本，摊开的段落探讨更宏大的问题——对与错、更崇高的目标、死后的生命——我从[secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName]的视角思考这些问题。我觉得自己很有兴趣继续读下去。

original: The copy of the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] [secret_religion_inductor.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] I found in my [Root.GetChamber] had been left open on a passage on a legendary [Root.GetQueenKing] and how [Root.GetHerHis] empire blossomed under [Root.GetHerHis] fair and steady rule. The story intrigued me enough to make me continue reading. Over the course of a few weeks, I had finished the entire tome.
translation: 我在我[Root.GetChamber]发现的[secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName][secret_religion_inductor.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]副本，摊开的段落是关于传说中的[Root.GetQueenKing]以及[Root.GetHerHis]帝国是如何在[Root.GetHerHis]公正稳定的统治下繁荣发展。这篇故事引起了我足够的兴趣，让我继续阅读。在短短几个星期的时间里，我读完了整本书。

original: I have been blind, but now I see! Never have I read truer words!
translation: 我曾经盲目如斯，如今重见光明！我从来没看到过如此接近真理的言语！

original: Secretly adopt the [secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName] faith.\n
translation: 暗中信奉起[secret_religion_inductor.TrueReligion.GetName]。\n

original: Reading this has reaffirmed my confidence in my own beliefs.
translation: 阅读这篇文章坚定了我对自己信仰的信心。

original: My spies have brought me some outstanding news! Apparently [secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName] reads the [Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] every night and now seems to worship [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], like we do, in secret. My plan succeeded!
translation: 我的间谍给我带来了一些好消息！据称[secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName]每天晚上都要阅读[Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]，现在似乎已经和我们一样秘密崇拜着[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]。我的计划奏效了！

original: It is time for [secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName] to join us.
translation: 是时候让[secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName]加入我们了。

original: Approach §Y[secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName]§! and attempt to recruit [secret_religion_inductee.GetHerHim] to §Y[Root.Society.GetName]§!.
translation: 接近§Y[secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName]§!并尝试招募[secret_religion_inductee.GetHerHim]到§Y[Root.Society.GetName]§!中。

original: This will do, for now.
translation: 会奏效的，暂时。

original: [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], I have failed you.
translation: [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]，我让您失望了。

original: Invite to [From.Society.GetName]
translation: 邀请到[From.Society.GetName]

original: Approach §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! and invite [Root.GetHerHim] to join §Y[From.Society.GetName]§!.
translation: 接近§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!并邀请[Root.GetHerHim]加入§Y[From.Society.GetName]§!。

original: Has not been invited to join §Y[From.Society.GetName]§! recently
translation: 最近没有被邀请加入§Y[From.Society.GetName]§!

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! approaches §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! with the intent of inviting [Root.GetHerHim] to join §Y[From.Society.GetName]§!.
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!接近 §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!的目的是邀请[Root.GetHerHim]加入§Y[From.Society.GetName]§!。

original: The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] has everyone's full attention – except mine. My thoughts are elsewhere as I try to ignore [spiritual_gender.GetHerHis] sacrilegious words echoing through the [Root.GetHouseOfWorship]. Suddenly, my concentration is shattered when the stranger next to me grabs my hand and draws something in my palm with their index finger. The holy symbol of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]!
translation: 除了我以外，其他所有人都将注意力集中在[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]上。为了不听[spiritual_gender.GetHerHis]那些在[Root.GetHouseOfWorship]的亵渎话语，我开始神游四海。突然我的注意力分散了，我旁边的陌生人抓住我的手，用食指在我的手掌上画东西。这是[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]的神圣标志！

original: I must follow them once [Root.GetReligiousRite] is over!
translation: 一旦[Root.GetReligiousRite]结束，我必须跟着他们！

original: Follow the mysterious stranger who drew the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] symbol in your palm.
translation: 跟随那位将[Root.TrueReligion.GetName]的符号画在你手掌上的神秘陌生人。

original: It could be a trap. I cannot risk it...
translation: 这可能是个陷阱，我不能冒这个险……

original: Ignore the stranger who approached you.
translation: 无视那个接近你的陌生人。

original: I follow the stranger as [secret_religion_recruiter.GetSheHe] departs from the crowd and ventures into a deserted alleyway. As I round the corner, I find [secret_religion_recruiter.GetHerHim] waiting. It is [secret_religion_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]! '[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]'s blessings, [Root.GetFirstName]' [secret_religion_recruiter.GetSheHe] greets me. 'Are you ready to fight for the True Faith?'
translation: 那个陌生人离开人群，我跟着[secret_religion_recruiter.GetSheHe]，冒险进入一条废弃的小巷。当我走到拐角处时，我发现[secret_religion_recruiter.GetHerHim]在等着我。是[secret_religion_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]。「[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]保佑，[Root.GetFirstName]，」[secret_religion_recruiter.GetSheHe]欢迎道，「你准备好为真正的信仰而战了吗？」

original: I follow the stranger as [secret_religion_recruiter.GetSheHe] departs from the crowd and ventures into a deserted alleyway. As I round the corner, I find [secret_religion_recruiter.GetHerHim] waiting. '[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]'s blessings, [Root.GetFirstName]' [secret_religion_recruiter.GetSheHe] greets me. 'My name is [secret_religion_recruiter.GetDynName]. Are you ready to fight for the True Faith?'
translation: 那个陌生人离开人群，我跟着[secret_religion_recruiter.GetSheHe]，冒险进入一条无人的小巷。当我走到拐角处时，我发现[secret_religion_recruiter.GetHerHim]在等着我。「[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]保佑，[Root.GetFirstName]，」[secret_religion_recruiter.GetSheHe]欢迎道，「我叫[secret_religion_recruiter.GetDynName]。你准备好为真正的信仰而战了吗？」

original: I have been waiting for this day!
translation: 我一直在等这一天！

original: Ensure §Y[secret_religion_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! that you want to join the secret [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] society.
translation: 向§Y[secret_religion_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§!确认你将加入秘密[Root.TrueReligion.GetName]社团。

original: I... I am not ready.
translation: 我……我还没准备好。

original: Leave the alleyway and pretend like nothing happened.
translation: 离开这个小巷并假装无事发生。

original: I covered my face before [secret_religion_recruitee.GetReligiousRite] and once at the [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHouseOfWorship] I sat down next to [secret_religion_recruitee.GetFirstName]. At the end of the service, I grabbed [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHerHis] hand and drew the holy symbol of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] with my finger in [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHerHis] palm. Afterwards [secret_religion_recruitee.GetSheHe] followed me into a deserted alley where I revealed my identity and invited [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHerHim] to join us. [secret_religion_recruitee.GetFirstName] said yes.
translation: 我在[secret_religion_recruitee.GetReligiousRite]之前遮住了脸，一到[secret_religion_recruitee.GetHouseOfWorship]我就在[secret_religion_recruitee.GetFirstName]旁坐了下来。在最后的时候。我抓住了[secret_religion_recruitee.GetHerHis]手并用我的手指在[secret_religion_recruitee.GetHerHis]手掌上画了[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]的神圣标志。然后[secret_religion_recruitee.GetSheHe]跟着我进入了一处无人的小巷。我在那里表露了我的身份并且邀请[secret_religion_recruitee.GetHerHim]加入我们。[secret_religion_recruitee.GetFirstName]答应了。

original: Another champion of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] joins our ranks!
translation: 又一个[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]的捍卫者加入到我们的行列！

original: I covered my face before [secret_religion_recruitee.GetReligiousRite] and once at the [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHouseOfWorship] I sat down next to [secret_religion_recruitee.GetFirstName]. At the end of the service, I grabbed [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHerHis] hand and drew the holy symbol of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] with my finger in [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHerHis] palm. Afterwards, [secret_religion_recruitee.GetSheHe] pretended like nothing had happened and I left the [secret_religion_recruitee.GetHouseOfWorship], my quest unsuccessful.
translation: 我在[secret_religion_recruitee.GetReligiousRite]之前遮住了脸，一到[secret_religion_recruitee.GetHouseOfWorship]我就在[secret_religion_recruitee.GetFirstName]旁坐了下来。在最后的时候。我抓住了[secret_religion_recruitee.GetHerHis]手并用我的手指在[secret_religion_recruitee.GetHerHis]手掌上画了[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]神圣标志。这之后[secret_religion_recruitee.GetSheHe]似乎什么表现都没有。我离开[secret_religion_recruitee.GetHouseOfWorship]，我的邀请失败了。

original: Such a disappointment.
translation: 真是扫兴。

original: A smile spreads across [secret_religion_recruiter.GetFirstName]'s [secret_religion_recruiter.GetFaceDescription] face. 'Excellent. Then I am honored to welcome you to [secret_religion_recruiter.Society.GetName]. Together we work to bring about the liberation of the true believers and a new era of [secret_religion_recruiter.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]'s glory. You will receive your first mission soon.'
translation: [secret_religion_recruiter.GetFirstName]的[secret_religion_recruiter.GetFaceDescription]脸上挂着微笑。「好极了。我很荣幸地欢迎你来到[secret_religion_recruiter.Society.GetName]。我们共同致力于实现真正的信徒的解放和[secret_religion_recruiter.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]的荣耀的新纪元。你很快就会接到你的第一个任务。」

original: [secret_religion_recruiter.GetSRFarewell], [secret_religion_recruiter.GetFirstName]!
translation: [secret_religion_recruiter.GetSRFarewell]，[secret_religion_recruiter.GetFirstName]！

original: Is also a secret follower of the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] faith.
translation: 也是一个[From.TrueReligion.GetName]信仰的秘密追随者。

original: Lately, I have found myself worrying about my little [GetFromRelation], [From.GetFirstName]. The [From.GetLadLass] is brought up believing in a false god who can offer [From.GetHerHim] nothing but illusions and hollow promises. Perhaps [From.GetFirstName] is ready to be introduced to the true faith?
translation: 最近，我开始担心起我的小[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetFirstName]。这[From.GetLadLass]被教育去相信一个除了幻想和空洞的许诺外什么也不能向[From.GetHerHim]提供的伪神。也许是时候向[From.GetFirstName]介绍真正的信仰了？

original: I shall read [From.GetHerHim] the [Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName].
translation: 我会给[From.GetHerHim]读读[Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]。

original: No, the risks are too great, for me and [From.GetHerHim] both!
translation: 不，对于我和[From.GetHerHim]来说，风险都太大了！

original: Attempt to induct §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! into the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] faith.
translation: 试图吸纳§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!加入[Root.TrueReligion.GetName]信仰。

original: Do not attempt to induct §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! into the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] faith.
translation: 不试图吸纳§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!加入[Root.TrueReligion.GetName]信仰。

original: When my [GetFromRelation] summoned me to [From.GetHerHis] study, I thought it was time for another boring lecture on manners or morals. However, as I enter the room, [From.GetSheHe] invites me to sit next to [From.GetHerHim] and proceeds to read from a thick tome, which [From.GetSheHe] calls 'the [From.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]'. The stories are about kings and queens, '[From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]' and the almighty '[From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]'.
translation: 当我的[GetFromRelation]要我去[From.GetHerHis]书房，我以为会是又一个关于利益或者道德的无聊演讲。但是是当我走进房间时，[From.GetSheHe]邀请我坐到[From.GetHerHim]旁边，读一本被[From.GetSheHe]叫做「[From.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]」的厚书。这是关于国王和王后，「[From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]」和全能的[From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]的故事。

original: When my [GetFromRelation] summoned me to [From.GetHerHis] study, I thought it was time for another boring lecture on manners or morals. However, as I enter the room, [From.GetSheHe] invites me to sit next to [From.GetHerHim]. With an open [From.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] resting on [From.GetHerHis] lap, [From.GetSheHe] proceeds to explain some 'essential' matters which [From.GetSheHe] says the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] has gotten wrong.
translation: 当我的[GetFromRelation]要我去[From.GetHerHis]书房，我以为会是又一个关于利益或者道德的无聊演讲。但是是当我走进房间时，[From.GetSheHe]邀请我坐到[From.GetHerHim]旁边，一本[From.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]放在[From.GetHerHis]膝盖上。[From.GetSheHe]开始讲解一些[From.GetSheHe]说[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]搞错了的「基本」问题。

original: Oh, [From.GetFirstName], please tell me more!
translation: 噢，[From.GetFirstName]，请告诉我更多！

original: I guess that makes sense. Can I play now?
translation: 我想这是有道理的。现在我可以玩吗？

original: This is stupid!
translation: 那可真蠢！

original: I summoned [From.GetFirstName] to my study where I proceeded to read [From.GetHerHim] the [Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]. At first, the [From.GetLadLass] was fidgeting in [From.GetHerHis] seat, but my choice of passage was a good one. Soon [From.GetSheHe] hung on my every word, eyes round as the full moon. As I put the tome away, [From.GetFirstName] bombarded me with questions and we kept talking for hours.
translation: 我把[From.GetFirstName]叫到了我的书房，我在那给[From.GetHerHim]读了[Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]。一开始，[From.GetLadLass]在[From.GetHerHis]位子上坐立不安。但我选择选了一篇很有趣的文章。很快[From.GetSheHe]就瞪着圆溜溜的眼睛凝神听了我说的每一个字。当我把书放下时，[From.GetFirstName]连珠炮似的向我发问，随后我们共同探讨了数个小时。

original: I really got through to little [From.GetFirstName]!
translation: 我已经让小[From.GetFirstName]充分了解了！

original: I summoned [From.GetFirstName] to my study where I proceeded to read [From.GetHerHim] the [Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] seemed to truly enjoy the story. While [From.GetFirstName] was more excited about returning to [From.GetHerHis] playmates than having a conversation about what I had just read, I think I got through to [From.GetHerHim] in some way.
translation: 我把[From.GetFirstName]叫到了我的书房，我在那给[From.GetHerHim]读了[Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]。[From.GetSheHeCap]似乎挺喜欢这些故事。但比起与我讨论刚才我读到的故事，[From.GetFirstName]对回去跟[From.GetHerHis]朋友玩更感兴趣。我想我从某种程度上理解[From.GetHerHim]了。

original: This is a first step, at least.
translation: 至少，这是第一步。

original: I summoned [From.GetFirstName] to my study where I proceeded to read [From.GetHerHim] the [Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]. I could tell from the first minute that I had a real challenge ahead of me. The [From.GetLadLass] was fidgeting in [From.GetHerHis] seat and played with [From.GetHerHis] sleeves. However, I was not expecting [From.GetHerHim] to shout at me when I brought up [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]!
translation: 我将[From.GetFirstName]叫到我的书房并给[From.GetHerHim]读了[Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]。从第一分钟我就知道，我面前有一个真正的挑战。[From.GetLadLass]在[From.GetHerHis]座位上坐立不安的摆弄着[From.GetHerHis]袖子。但是我没想到[From.GetHerHim]在我谈到[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]对我大吼起来！

original: I will give this one more try.
translation: 我再试一次。

original: It is clear to me now – [From.GetFirstName] isn't ready.
translation: 我现在明白了——[From.GetFirstName]还没有准备好。

original: Yet again, I have been summoned to my [GetFromRelation]'s study. [From.GetSheHeCap] is cradling the tome from which [From.GetSheHe] read last time, but today I am not given a lecture. Instead, we are having a conversation about [From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons] and [From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. [From.GetSheHeCap] is asking me questions and patiently listens to my responses.
translation: 我再一次被叫到我的[GetFromRelation]的书房。[From.GetSheHeCap]抱着[From.GetSheHe]上一次读的书，但我今天没有听一段讲课。我们讨论了[From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]和[From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]。[From.GetSheHeCap]问了我一些问题并且很认真地倾听了我的回答。

original: I think I understand now, [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 我想我现在明白了，[From.GetFirstName]。

original: But this is not what the [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle] told me!
translation: 但[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]不是这么告诉我的！

original: This time around, instead of lecturing, I tried to have a conversation with [From.GetFirstName] and listened patiently to what [From.GetSheHe] had to say. We discussed [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] and the [Root.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons] at lengths, and in the end it seemed like [From.GetFirstName] understood and agreed with my point of view!
translation: 这一次，我没有讲课，而是试着和[From.GetFirstName]交谈，耐心地听[From.GetSheHe]说的话。我们详细讨论了[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]和[Root.GetTrugionGroupPerson]，最后[From.GetFirstName]似乎理解并同意了我的观点！

original: [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]'s truth shall always prevail!
translation: [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]的真理将永远盛行！

original: This time around, instead of lecturing, I tried to have a conversation with [From.GetFirstName] and listened patiently to what [From.GetSheHe] had to say. Sadly, even though [From.GetSheHe] was more willing to listen to me as well, [From.GetHerHis] opinions were set in stone. [From.GetSheHeCap] refused to question the things the [From.Religion.GetPriestTitle] had taught [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 这一次，我没有讲课，而是试着和[From.GetFirstName]交谈，耐心地听[From.GetSheHe]说的话。可悲的是，即使[From.GetSheHe]更愿意听我说的话，[From.GetHerHis]仍然不肯改变观点。[From.GetSheHeCap]拒绝质疑[From.Religion.GetPriestTitle]教给[From.GetHerHim]的东西。

original: As someone who has influence over the upbringing of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!, §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! can make an attempt to secretly induct [Root.GetHerHim] into the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] Faith.
translation: 作为一个对§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!的家庭教育有影响之人，§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!可以尝试秘密吸纳[Root.GetHerHim]加入[From.TrueReligion.GetName]。

original: Is not a secret believer in the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] faith\n
translation: 不是[From.TrueReligion.GetName]信仰的一名秘密信徒\n

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will approach §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! and attempt to teach [Root.GetHerHim] about the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] faith.
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!将会接近§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!并试图教[Root.GetHerHim]关于[From.TrueReligion.GetName]信仰的内容。

original: Enables you to induct children in your court to your true religion by right-clicking their portraits.
translation: 允许你通过右击你宫廷中孩子们的头像，引导他们进入你真正信仰的宗教。

original: Enables you to evoke the sympathy of characters in other religion groups than your true religion by right-clicking their portraits.
translation: 允许你通过右键点击他们的头像来唤起其他宗教团体中的角色对你真实宗教的同情。

original: Enables you to secretly induct characters into your true religion by right-clicking their portraits.
translation: 允许你通过右键点击他们的头像秘密地吸纳角色进入你真正信仰的宗教。

original: Enables you to spread your true religion secretly among the inhabitants of a county in your realm by right-clicking its county shield in the county view. If you openly adopt your true faith, these counties will convert as well. This power is available in the Intrigue Screen.
translation: 允许你通过右键点击省份盾徽，秘密地传播您的真实宗教信仰。如果你公开承认你的真实信仰，这些省份也会跟着转变。密谋界面提供此功能。

original: Enables you to openly adopt your true faith. The other secretly religious characters and counties of your true faith in the realm will convert with you. This power is available in the Intrigue Screen.
translation: 允许你公开你的真实信仰。在王国里，其他信仰你真实信仰的秘密宗教角色和省份将和你一道皈依。密谋界面提供此功能。

original: Power: §YBenedictine Diligence§!\nUpon reaching rank 4, you will be approached by a fellow member of the Benedictine Order who will help you to become more diligent.
translation: 能力：§Y本笃会的勤勉精神§!\n当你到达四阶的时候，本笃会的同伴将会接触你，来帮你变得更加勤勉。

original: Enables you to become celibate by using decision in the Intrigue Screen.
translation: 允许你使用密谋界面中的决议成为独身者。

original: Enables you to stop being celibate by using decision in the Intrigue Screen.
translation: 允许你使用密谋界面中的决议停止独身。

original: Enables you to invite a learned ascetic member of the order to your court.
translation: 允许你邀请一位有学问的苦行者到你的宫廷。

original: the Goldsmith
translation: 金器匠

original: The Crown of Majesty
translation: 威严之冠

original: The hooped crown is made from gold and decorated with foreign precious stones – emeralds, rubies, sapphires and diamonds – the finest ones the size of quails eggs.
translation: 这件箍冠由黄金制成，镶嵌着异域名贵的宝石——祖母绿、红宝石、蓝宝石和钻石——最珍贵的几颗都有鹌鹑蛋大小。

original: Emerald Scepter
translation: 翡翠权杖

original: This scepter is famed for the unusual amount and quality of emeralds adorning it. The origins of the stones are shrouded in mysteries, the tales are as numerous as the stars.
translation: 这柄权杖因它上面装饰的翡翠而得名。这些翡翠的数量和品质都不同寻常，它们来源已经不可考，而关于它们的故事像星星一样多。
