original: Sword of Heroes
translation: 英雄之剑

original: This ornamental weapon is an impressive sight. The blade is gilded and the hilt is adorned with foreign precious stones, such as rubies and sapphires, and agate cameos depicting legendary warriors.
translation: 这件装饰性武器令人印象深刻。刀片镀上了金，剑柄装饰着来自异域的宝石，如红宝石和蓝宝石，还有描绘了传说中的战士的玛瑙浮雕。

original: Crown of Pearls
translation: 珍珠宝冠

original: Every inch of this golden hooped golden crown is covered in pearls of all sizes, complemented by sapphires, as well as cameos depicting religious characters engraved in mother-of-pearl.
translation: 这件纯金箍冠的每一寸都被各种大小的珍珠所覆盖，其间还有蓝宝石以及用浮雕手法雕刻着宗教人物的珍珠母。

original: Ruby Scepter
translation: 红宝石权杖

original: This golden scepter, adorned with opals, almandines and pearls, is crowned by an impressively big and lustrous ruby.
translation: 这柄纯金权杖装饰着猫眼石，贵榴石和珍珠，顶端镶嵌着一块硕大璀璨的红宝石。

original: Golden Sword
translation: 黄金剑

original: This gilded blade and hilt, while useless in battle, will impress their holders every subject. The pommel is decorated with a single, magnificent emerald.
translation: 尽管在战斗中毫无用处，但这个镀金的刀刃和刀柄还是会给持有者的每个臣子留下深刻的印象。剑首装饰有一整块硕大的翡翠。

original: Crown of Lilies
translation: 百合之冠

original: The mass of garnets and opals are truly made justice by the silver and gilded base of this crown. The model is an open one with four stylized lilies.
translation: 宝冠的镀金银底座完美衬托了其上的大量石榴石和猫眼石。外形顶部开放，并有四朵符号化的百合。

original: Noble Scepter
translation: 高贵权杖

original: This scepter signifies its holder's right to rule. The gilded rod is adorned with pearls and garnets.
translation: 镀金的杖柄装饰着珍珠和石榴石，这件宝物彰显了主人的统治权力。

original: Engraved Sword
translation: 纹饰剑

original: This sword will not bring its bearer much luck on the battlefield, but the adorned blade and gilded hilt is a beautiful sight indeed.
translation: 这把剑在战场上不会给它的主人带来好运，但是精心装饰的刀刃和镀金的刀柄确实看起来很漂亮。

original: During the last few days, I have overheard the same conversation again and again. Apparently, a most renowned goldsmith is traveling through [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] and my courtiers are prattling excitedly about [smith.GetHerHis] work. Perhaps I should invite this [smith.GetManWoman] and employ [smith.GetHerHis] services?
translation: 在过去的几天里，我不断地听到了相同的传言。看来，一位最享有盛名的金器匠正路过[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]，而我的廷臣们都在兴奋地谈论[smith.GetHerHis]作品。也许我应该邀请这位[smith.GetManWoman]来试试[smith.GetHerHis]手艺？

original: Nothing displays authority like fine jewelry.
translation: 没什么比珠宝更能展示权威了。

original: Invite the famous goldsmith to your court.
translation: 邀请远近闻名的金匠前来你的宫廷。

original: I have no money to spare for such frivolities.
translation: 我没有多余的钱用于这种无聊的事情。

original: Do not invite the goldsmith to your court.
translation: 不邀请金匠前来。

original: The goldsmith, [From.GetTitledFirstName], courteously accepted my invitation and arrived at court a mere week later. [From.GetSheHeCap] has presented me with some sketches of [From.GetHerHis] previous work and several letters of recommendation. I am assured of [From.GetHerHis] skill, although I ask myself just how much money I can spare for a set of crown jewels.
translation: 那位名叫[From.GetTitledFirstName]的金匠得体地接受了我的邀请，仅仅一个星期以后就抵达了。[From.GetSheHeCap]向我展示了一些[From.GetHerHis]之前作品的草图和几封推荐信。我很相信[From.GetHerHis]技术，但我还是不敢肯定我能为一套御宝花多少钱。

original: One and all shall see the indisputable might of house [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]!
translation: 人人都会看到[Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]无可争辩的力量。

original: Spare no expenses and order the most expensive crown jewels money can buy.\n
translation: 不惜成本，订购可以买得到的最昂贵的御宝。\n

original: I will order something impressive, but sensible.
translation: 我会订制一些令人印象深刻，价格又较为合理的东西。

original: Order crown jewels which are 'impressive, but sensible'.\n
translation: 订购「令人印象深刻，价格又较为合理」的那套御宝。\n

original: Surely good craftsmanship is the most important aspect?
translation: 当然，好的手艺才是最重要的吧？

original: Order the least costly set of crown jewels.\n
translation: 订购较便宜的那套御宝。\n

original: I have changed my mind. You services are no longer required.
translation: 我改主意了，我不需要你的服务了。

original: Dismiss §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
translation: 解雇§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!。

original: I was overcome by excitement and curiosity when [From.GetFirstName] informed me the crown jewels were completed! As I am waiting in my throne for [From.GetHerHis] servants to carry the great box across the room I struggle not to leap up and meet them half-way. When I finally touch the heavy lid, my hands are shaking...
translation: 当[From.GetFirstName]告诉我御宝已经完成时，我被兴奋和好奇征服了！当我在我的宝座上等待[From.GetHerHis]仆人扛着这个巨大的箱子穿过房间时，我努力让自己不跳起来。当我终于触摸到沉重的盖子时，我的双手在颤抖……

original: Regalia worthy of a true [Root.GetTitle]!
translation: 与真正[Root.GetTitle]相称的珍品！

original: [From.GetFirstName] has kept me up to date on the progress of the crown jewelry. I knew they were nearing completion, but when the heavy box was brought to me today, I was still momentarily breathless with excitement!
translation: [From.GetFirstName]始终让我对皇冠珠宝的最新进展保持了解。我知道他们已经接近完工了，但是当今天把沉重的箱子带给我的时候，我仍然兴奋得屏住了呼吸！

original: [From.GetFirstName] is truly a master!
translation: [From.GetFirstName]真是个工艺大师！

original: A heavy box has been brought before me. [From.GetFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] work and the crown jewels are completed. While I expect no artifact of legends, I am still excited to see [From.GetHerHis] handiwork.
translation: 一个沉重的箱子被送到了我面前，[From.GetFirstName]终于完成了[From.GetHerHis]工作，御宝终于制作完成了。虽然我并没有指望着看到什么传说中的宝物，但我还是不可抑制的期望着看到[From.GetHerHis]作品。

original: Let us see what [From.GetSheHe] has accomplished...
translation: 让我们看看[From.GetSheHe]做出来了什么宝贝……

original: Dagger of Glory
translation: 荣耀短剑

original: This dagger, with its gilded blade and heavily adorned hilt, radiates power. Gleaming rubies, garnets and diamonds are placed in swirling patterns along the hilt.
translation: 这把匕首有着镀金的刀片和装饰繁复的刀柄，璀璨夺目的红宝石、石榴石和钻石呈螺旋状镶嵌在刀柄上。

original: Ruby Bracelets
translation: 红宝石手镯

original: These golden bracelets are decorated with rubies and engraved pieces of ivory.
translation: 这些黄金手镯装饰着红宝石和雕刻的象牙片。

original: Bejeweled Dagger
translation: 宝石短剑

original: The finely crafted dagger has a pommel set with sapphires and amethysts. The hilt is decorated with elaborately embroidered patterns in gold and silver threads.
translation: 一把用蓝宝石和紫水晶制作护手的精美匕首，它的刀柄上绣有金银丝绣图案。

original: Golden Bracelets
translation: 黄金手镯

original: A set of heavy gold bracelets with intricate engravings and filigree.
translation: 一套带有精致的雕刻和花丝镶嵌的沉重的金手镯。

original: Engraved Dagger
translation: 雕花短剑

original: Intricate patterns and famous poems are engraved into the blade of this dagger. Its hilt is embroidered with silver thread and adorned with opals and pearls.
translation: 错综复杂的图案和著名的诗歌刻在这把匕首的刀刃上，它的剑柄上绣有银线和蛋白石和珍珠装饰。

original: Silver Bracelets
translation: 纯银手镯

original: These heavy silver bracelets are beautifully engraved and adorned with ivory and glimmering crystals.
translation: 沉重的银手镯雕刻精美，装饰有象牙和闪闪发光的晶体。

original: Celestial Necklace
translation: 天空项链

original: With its dozens upon dozens of diamonds and sapphires, this necklace is as beautiful as the night sky itself. Its centerpiece is a marvelous, walnut-sized blue diamond.
translation: 这条由许多钻石和蓝宝石串成的项链像夜空一样美丽，它的中心是一枚令人叹为观止的蓝色钻石，足有核桃大小。

original: Necklace of Radiance
translation: 辉光项链

original: When the light hits it, the gold and rubies of this necklace sparkle as if on fire.
translation: 当有光线照射时，这条项链上的金子和红宝石闪闪发光，就像着火了一样。

original: Collar of Pearls
translation: 珍珠项链

original: Hoops upon hoops of pearls create the base for this necklace. An extra dimension is added to the piece by a dozen pea-sized amethysts.
translation: 项链的基底是一环一环的珍珠，其上点缀着十几颗豆粒大小的紫水晶。

original: Heavenly Circlet
translation: 天堂头环

original: This majestic circlet is adorned with golden wings and uncommonly big and lustrous sapphires.
translation: 这个壮丽的环冠两旁装饰着金色的翅膀和一块非常大而有光泽的蓝宝石。

original: Staff of Majesty
translation: 庄严权杖

original: This heavy gilded staff is engraved with scenes from ancient tales and adorned with both emeralds and ivory.
translation: 这柄沉重的镀金权杖雕刻着古代史诗的场景，并用祖母绿和象牙装饰。

original: Circlet of the Sun
translation: 太阳头环

original: When light falls upon the wearer of this circlet, the gold and rubies glow like the sun itself.
translation: 当光线照在佩戴者身上时，黄金和红宝石闪闪发光，就如同太阳本身一样。

original: Golden Staff
translation: 黄金权杖

original: This gilded staff is covered in the most intricate engravings.
translation: 这柄镀金的权杖布满了复杂的花纹。

original: Circlet of Twilight
translation: 暮光头环

original: The circlet is a beautiful silver hoop adorned with pyropes and pearls.
translation: 这个环冠是一件美丽的银质圆环上面镶嵌着红榴石和珍珠。

original: Crown of Crows
translation: 群鸦之冠

original: This golden masterpiece is decorated with filigree leaves and vines. A dozen gleaming crows with amber eyes are perched along the top, their wings spread out as if they are about to take flight.
translation: 这件金质杰作上饰有金银丝线勾勒的树叶与藤蔓。十几只闪闪发光的鸦鸟顺次栖息于顶部，双眼均由琥珀制成，它们两翅展开，如同即将展翅飞翔一般。

original: Crown of the Sea
translation: 海洋之冠

original: The peaks of the silver crown are shaped and engraved to look like the crest of waves. A dozen pearls are spaced out evenly along the band.
translation: 银冠的峰顶呈现波浪形，十几颗珍珠均匀地分布在镶边外侧。

original: Iron Crown
translation: 铁之冠

original: While this crown is not fashioned out of the noblest of materials, the craftsmanship is excellent. It is decorated with filigree in geometrical patterns, enhanced with pieces of silver.
translation: 虽然这个宝冠并不是用最贵重的材料制成，但是其制作工艺非常出色。它上面装饰着的复杂几何金纹并衬以银片。

original: Hero's Crown
translation: 英雄之冠

original: The base of the crown is a heavy golden band, and each peak is shaped and engraved in the likeness of legendary warriors. The centerpiece is a single, gleaming ruby.
translation: 宝冠的基底是一圈沉重的金带，每一个冠峰都被雕成了传说中的战士的形状，中央是一整块闪闪发光的红宝石。

original: Axe of the Ancestors
translation: 先祖之斧

original: This gilded axe is engraved with pictures from the ancestral legends. Ambers are set in the handle.
translation: 这把镀金斧头上刻着祖先传说的图画。琥珀镶嵌在手柄上。

original: Amber Crown
translation: 琥珀之冠

original: This silver crown is decorated with engravings depicting the gods and decorated with fine pieces of amber.
translation: 这银冠饰有描绘诸神的雕刻和数块上佳的琥珀。

original: Obsidian Axe
translation: 黑曜石斧

original: The shape of this axe is simple because the material is impressive enough on its own. The head is made from the blackest and glossiest of obsidian.
translation: 这把斧子的形状很简单，因为材料本身就足够令人印象深刻。斧头是由黝黑而有光泽的黑曜石制成。

original: Engraved crown
translation: 纹饰宝冠

original: This iron crown, while of a common material, is truly an impressive piece of craftsmanship with its detailed engravings.
translation: 这顶铁冠虽然是用寻常的材料制成，但它精致的花纹使它依旧让人印象深刻。

original: Ceremonial Axe
translation: 仪仗斧

original: A beautiful ceremonial axe set with polished colored stones.
translation: 一把镶有抛光彩色宝石的美丽仪仗斧。

original: 'I am most sorry, my [Root.GetTitle],' [From.GetFirstName] said apologetically. The goldsmith has informed me that the precious metals and gemstones needed to produce the crown jewels I ordered are impossible to find in my own realm. 'I can send a [From.GetManWoman] on an expedition to acquire said materials, although it will be costly.'
translation: 「实在非常抱歉，我的[Root.GetTitle]」，[From.GetFirstName]满怀歉意。金匠告诉我，打造我要求的御宝需要珍贵的金属和特殊的工具，可我的领地内根本找不到这些东西。「我可以派一个[From.GetManWoman]不远千里收集这些材料，尽管这可能要多花点钱」。

original: Send someone to the end of the world, if need be!
translation: 派人到世界的尽头，如果必要的话！

original: Insist that you shall have the crown jewels you ordered, despite the extra cost.\n
translation: 尽管要支付额外的费用，但你一定要得到你订购的御宝。\n

original: I am not made of money. Do your best with what is available.
translation: 我可没那么多钱，尽量用现成的吧。

original: Settle for a less luxurious set of crown jewels than the ones you initially ordered.\n
translation: 买一套不那么豪华的御宝，而不是你最初订的那套。\n

original: Send [From.GetHerHim] immediately!
translation: 立即派出[From.GetHerHim]！

original: Insist that you shall have the crown jewels you ordered, despite the extra cost.\n
translation: 尽管要支付额外的费用，但你一定要得到你订购的御宝。\n

original: Do what you can with local materials.
translation: 利用当地材料尽可能完成。

original: Settle for a less luxurious set of crown jewels than the ones you initially ordered.\n
translation: 买一套不那么豪华的御宝，而不是你最初订的那套。\n

original: the Weaponsmith
translation: 武器匠

original: A fine idea, [Root.job_marshal.GetJobTitle] [Root.job_marshal.GetFirstName]!
translation: 好主意，[Root.job_marshal.GetJobTitle][Root.job_marshal.GetFirstName]！

original: Our own smiths are capable enough!
translation: 我们自己的工匠已经足够了！

original: You can never go wrong with a good sword.
translation: 选一把好剑总归没毛病。

original: You can never go wrong with a good scimitar.
translation: 选一把好弯刀总归没毛病。

original: A lance is what I desire.
translation: 一杆长枪正是我想要的。

original: I have always been one for axes.
translation: 我一向喜欢斧头。

original: I will crush my enemies with a mace!
translation: 我会用狼牙棒击碎我的敌人！

original: A fine bow would serve me well.
translation: 一把弓和我肯定很配。

original: "A [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]. I see. An excellent choice, my [Root.GetTitle]" says [From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName] and calls forward the assistant cradling three [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]s in [From.GetHerHis] arms. "I have three examples of different quality levels here. One must determine what one needs and how much one is willing to pay, however they would all serve your Highness well."
translation: 「[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]，我明白了，一个很好的选择，我的[Root.GetTitle]」[From.GetFirstName]大师叫助手取来三把[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]抱在[From.GetHerHis]怀里，继续说：「我这里有三个不同品质等级的样品，一个人必须确定自己需要什么，愿意付出多少。不论如何，它们的品质都配得上您的高贵地位。」

original: I would not go in to battle with anything but the very best.
translation: 我只会带着最好的那件装备参与战斗。

original: I do not need any frills, craft me something effective.
translation: 我用不着什么装饰，来点儿有用的吧。

original: I am sure whatever you make is good enough, [From.GetMasterMistressCap].
translation: 我相信你无论做什么都足够好，大师。

original: Actually, I changed my mind.
translation: 其实，我改变了主意。

original: I was struck with nervous excitement when [From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName] announced that the [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] was nearing its completion. Today I have received the [From.GetMasterMistressCap] in my throne room. A sturdy box is in [From.GetHerHis] arms, and as [From.GetSheHe] opens the lid, I find it almost impossible to breathe. 'What will you name her, my [Root.GetTitle]?'
translation: 当[From.GetFirstName]大师宣布[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]几近完成的时候，我几乎难以遏制我的兴奋之情。今天，我在我的宝座室里接待了大师。一个结实的箱子就那样静静地躺在[From.GetHerHis]臂膀之中。当[From.GetSheHe]打开它时，我竟一时间忘记了呼吸。「您打算怎么称呼她呢，我的[Root.GetTitle]？」

original: This sword will be known as Heartseeker!
translation: 这把剑将被称为穿心剑！

original: The Golden Scimitar!
translation: 黄金弯刀！

original: This lance will be known as The Impaler!
translation: 这把枪将被称为穿刺之枪！

original: This axe will be known as Cleaver!
translation: 这把斧头将被冠名为切割之斧！

original: The Foe Hammer!
translation: 破敌之锤！

original: This bow will be known as Silent Wind!
translation: 这把弓将被称为寂静之风！

original: My every foe shall fear Vengeance!
translation: 我的每个敌人都会害怕复仇剑！

original: Scimitar of Fortune is a fitting name, no?
translation: 幸运弯刀是一个合适的名字，不是吗？

original: My every foe shall fear The Trident!
translation: 我的每个敌人都会害怕三叉戟！

original: My every foe shall fear The Ravager!
translation: 我的每个敌人都会害怕蹂躏之斧！

original: My every foe shall fear The Bone Breaker!
translation: 我的每个敌人都会害怕碎骨锤！

original: My every foe shall fear Lightning!
translation: 我的每个敌人都会害怕闪电！

original: She looks like a Fury, doesn't she?
translation: 她看起来像一团怒火，不是吗？

original: Scimitar of Conquest!
translation: 征服弯刀！

original: The Piercer is a fitting name, no?
translation: 贯穿之枪听起来是个不错的名字，不是吗？

original: She looks like a Marauder, doesn't she?
translation: 她像一个掠夺者，不是吗？

original: The Shatterer is a fitting name, no?
translation: 破碎之锤听起来是个不错的名字，不是吗？

original: She looks like an Eagle, doesn't she?
translation: 她看起来像只神鹰，不是吗？

original: This is excellent, [From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName]!
translation: 这太棒了，[From.GetFirstName]大师！

original: [From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName]'s main assistant has brought me the finished [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]. There are no engravings or precious materials to enhance it, but the design has some elegance of its own. Looking pretty is not her main purpose, anyway.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]大师终于完成了[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]的制作。这件武器既没有精美的雕刻，也没有镶嵌什么珍贵的宝石，但它的确在某种程度上有它独特的设计感。反正看起来美观并不是它的主要目的。

original: I am sure she will serve me well.
translation: 我相信她会为我服务。

original:
[From.GetMOGreeting], [Root.GetTitledFirstName]

We are delighted by your decision to join our ranks as a lay member, [Root.GetTitle]. Together we shall strive for the betterment of ourselves and our fellow [Root.GetReligiousPerson]s by following [From.GetMOCode].

[From.GetMOFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
[From.GetMOGreeting]，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]

我们很高兴你决定成为我们协会的在俗会员，[Root.GetTitle]。我们将一起遵循[From.GetMOCode]以为我们和[Root.GetReligiousPerson]信徒同伴们的福祉一起奋斗。

[From.GetMOFarewell]，
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: It is a great honor, [From.GetSocietyRank].
translation: 这是莫大的荣幸，[From.GetSocietyRank]

original: I am trying to focus on my training, but [From.GetSheHe] is always there! No matter if I am studying in the great Order library, hid behind piles of books, or sparring with a fellow Assassin, [From.GetTitledFirstName] apparently has to do the same. And [From.GetHerHis] taunts and snide comments! They are driving me mad!
translation: 我尝试专注于我的训练，但是[From.GetSheHe]总是干扰我。无论我是在图书馆的书堆后面学习，还是与刺客同伴练习对打，[From.GetTitledFirstName]都在一旁做一样的事情。[From.GetHerHis]冷嘲热讽快把我逼疯了！

original: It is time to really determine who the superior assassin is.
translation: 是时候确定谁是更厉害的杀手了。

original: Challenge §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!. This might have a number of outcomes, depending on whether you win or lose and how [From.GetSheHe] takes it. You might learn a permanent or temporary skill, get injured, gain a new friend or declare a new rival.
translation: 挑战§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!。根据你的输赢，以及[From.GetSheHe]如何应对会造成许多不同的结果。你可能会学会一种永久的或暂时性的技巧，受伤，获得新的朋友或得到一个新的对手。

original: Let [From.GetHerHim] try – I am not easily provoked!
translation: 让[From.GetHerHim]尽管试试——我可没有那么容易被激怒！

original: Ignore §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! and focus on your training.\n
translation: 忽视§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!并专注于你的训练。\n

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] was not slow to accept my challenge. It was a simple one: we would both craft disguises and enter the nearby town at noon the next day. The first person to spot the other, sneak up on them and place a dagger at their throat would be the winner!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]很快接受了我的挑战。这是一个简单的方法：我们将在第二天中午进行伪装并进入附近的城镇。第一个发现其他人，偷偷逼近，并把匕首对准喉咙的将是胜利者！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] gladly accepted my challenge. We decided to not complicate anything – a duel at midday the following day, a pair of daggers our only weapons. The first person to draw blood would be the winner.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]欣然接受了我的挑战。我们决定不让事态复杂化——在第二天中午进行决斗，一对匕首将是我们唯一的武器。第一个划破对方皮肤、使之流血的人是胜利者。

original: I am ready.
translation: 我准备好了。

original: The challenge is about to begin.\n
translation: 挑战马上开始。\n

original: I was sweating underneath my heavy robe and veil in the relentless noon sun, but this was what my training prepared me for. I kept my eyes peeled and within the hour I spotted another whose gait was incredibly familiar. As I placed the dagger against [From.GetFirstName]'s throat, [From.GetSheHe] laughed heartily. ' A fair victory, [Root.GetSocietyRank].'
translation: 在正午无情的阳光下，我在厚重的长袍和面纱下汗流不止，但我正是为此训练的。我目不转睛地看着，不到一个小时，我就发现了另一个步态熟悉的人。当我把匕首对准[From.GetFirstName]喉咙时，[From.GetSheHe]大笑起来「公平的胜利，[Root.GetSocietyRank]。」

original: We were evenly matched, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I. We had been at it for... hours? I knew I would not last for much longer, and as a last desperate measure, I fearlessly lunged at [From.GetHerHim]. We fell to the ground and I managed to nick [From.GetHerHis] arm. [From.GetFirstName]'s body shook as [From.GetSheHe] laughed underneath me. 'A fair victory, [Root.GetSocietyRank].'
translation: 我与[From.GetTitledFirstName]势均力敌，我们已经进行了……几个小时了？我知道我撑不了多久了，作为最后一项手段，我无畏地向[From.GetHerHim]扑过去。我们摔倒在地，我成功划破了[From.GetHerHis]手臂。[From.GetFirstName][From.GetSheHe]在我身下颤抖着笑着「公平的胜利，[Root.GetSocietyRank]。」

original: We were evenly matched, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I. I did not remember when we had lost our weapons. Now we were wrestling on the ground, neither of us getting enough of an advantage, sweat soaking our clothes and stinging our eyes. 'Draw?' I breathed. 'Alright, draw,' [From.GetFirstName] chuckled in response.
translation: 我与[From.GetTitledFirstName]势均力敌。我不记得我们什么时候丢了武器。现在我们在地上摔跤，双方都没有得到足够的优势，汗水浸透了我们的衣服，刺痛了我们的眼睛。「平局？」我低声说，「好吧，平局。」[From.GetFirstName]轻笑着回答道。

original: I was sweating underneath my heavy robe and veil in the relentless noon sun. Where was [From.GetTitledFirstName]? I scanned the crowd nervously, but nothing. And then – the coolness of a blade against my throat. 'Impressive disguise, [From.GetSocietyRank]. I mean it,' [From.GetFirstName] chuckled and gave me a hearty pat on the back.
translation: 在正午无情的阳光下，我在厚重的长袍和面纱下汗流不止。[From.GetTitledFirstName]在哪？我紧张地扫视着人群，但什么也没有。然后一把冰冷的刀刃抵住我的喉咙。「令人印象深刻的伪装[From.GetSocietyRank]，我是说真的。」[From.GetFirstName]轻笑道，衷心地拍了拍我的背。

original: We were evenly matched, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I. I had to try my very hardest to keep [From.GetHerHim] at bay. A droplet of sweat fell into my eye, and as I instinctively raised my hand to wipe it away, [From.GetFirstName] lunged and nicked my arm as we fell. 'Good match, [From.GetSocietyRank],' [From.GetSheHe] chuckled and rolled over on [From.GetHerHis] back.
translation: 我与[From.GetTitledFirstName]势均力敌。我不得不尽全力来对付[From.GetHerHim]。一滴汗珠掉进我的眼睛，当我本能地举起手擦拭它的时候，[From.GetFirstName]突然扑过来刺中了我的手臂，我们都跌倒在地。「不错的比赛，[From.GetSocietyRank]，」[From.GetSheHe]轻笑道并翻身起来。

original: We should do this again, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 我们应该再来一次，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]。

original: [From.GetFirstName], you... you are marvelous.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]，你……你棒极了。

original: You realize that you had a crush on §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! all along and profess your feelings.
translation: 你意识到你一直很迷恋§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!并表达了你的感受。

original: Now we both know who the best is.
translation: 现在我们都知道谁是最好的了。

original: Tell your fellow assassins about how you won over §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 告诉你的阿萨辛同伴你是如何赢过§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!的。\n

original: I was sweating underneath my heavy robe and veil in the relentless noon sun, but this was what my training prepared me for. I kept my eyes peeled and within the hour I spotted another whose gait was incredibly familiar. As I placed the dagger against [From.GetFirstName]'s throat, [From.GetSheHe] cursed my name.
translation: 在正午无情的阳光下，我在厚重的长袍和面纱下汗流不止，但我正是为此训练的。我目不转睛地看着，不到一个小时，我就发现了另一个步态熟悉的人。当我把匕首对准[From.GetFirstName]喉咙时，[From.GetSheHe]诅咒了我的名字。

original: We were evenly matched, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I. We had been at it for... hours? I knew I would not last for much longer, and as a last desperate measure, I fearlessly lunged at [From.GetHerHim]. We fell to the ground and I managed to nick [From.GetHerHis] arm. [From.GetFirstName] cursed me loudly as [From.GetSheHe] pushed my body of [From.GetHerHis].
translation: 我与[From.GetTitledFirstName]势均力敌，我们已经进行了……几个小时了？我知道我撑不了多久了，作为最后一项手段，我无畏地向[From.GetHerHim]扑过去。我们摔倒在地，我成功划破了[From.GetHerHis]手臂。[From.GetFirstName]大声地诅咒我，[From.GetSheHe]把我的身体从[From.GetHerHis]身上推开。

original: Who is the master now, you [GetRootFromInsult]!
translation: 现在谁更厉害，你这个[GetRootFromInsult]！

original: Punish §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 惩罚§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!。\n

original: I am bigger than this.
translation: 我可没这么小气。

original: Now that you have won over §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!, go back to ignoring [From.GetHerHim].\n
translation: 现在你赢了§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!，回去后不用再理睬[From.GetHerHim]了。\n

original: I was sweating underneath my heavy robe and veil in the relentless noon sun. Where was [From.GetTitledFirstName]? I scanned the crowd nervously, but nothing. And then – the coolness of a blade against my throat. 'Who laughs now, [Root.GetFirstName]?' [From.GetFirstName] whispered before slashing the dagger across my shoulder.
translation: 在正午无情的阳光下，我在厚重的长袍和面纱下汗流不止。[From.GetTitledFirstName]在哪？我紧张地扫视着人群，但什么也没有。然后一把冰冷的刀刃抵住我的喉咙。「现在看看谁在笑，[Root.GetFirstName]？」[From.GetFirstName]小声说道，然后用匕首划破了我的肩膀。

original: We were evenly matched, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and I. I had to try my very hardest to keep [From.GetHerHim] at bay. A droplet of sweat fell into my eye, and as I instinctively raised my hand to wipe it away, [From.GetFirstName] lunged and slashed the blade across my dagger hand with a triumphant shout.
translation: 我与[From.GetTitledFirstName]势均力敌。我不得不尽全力来对付[From.GetHerHim]。一滴汗珠掉进我的眼睛，当我本能地举起手擦拭它的时候，[From.GetFirstName]突然扑过来，一边得意地笑着，一边挥着剑穿过我拿着匕首的那只手。

original: I will kill that [GetRootFromInsult]!
translation: 我会杀死那个[GetRootFromInsult]！

original: I could read [From.GetFirstName]'s answer in [From.GetHerHis] eyes as soon as the words had escaped my lips and my heart sank like a stone. It took [From.GetHerHim] a moment to recollect [From.GetHerselfHimself]. 'I am flattered, [From.GetFirstName]. Really, I am. But... I do not feel the same way. I'm sorry. Let us be friends?'
translation: 话一出口，我就从[From.GetFirstName]的眼睛中读出了[From.GetHerHis]回答，我的心在逐渐下沉。[From.GetHerHim]愣了一会才让[From.GetHerselfHimself]回过神来。「我真的很高兴，[From.GetFirstName]。真的。但是……我没有同样的感觉，抱歉，我们还是继续做朋友吧？」

original: For a moment, the world stood still. I could not breathe. Then the most radiant, heart-warming smile spread across [From.GetFirstName]'s [From.GetFaceDescription] face. 'I thought you would never ask, [Root.GetFirstName].'
translation: 有那么一会儿，世界都静止了。我无法呼吸。然后，最灿烂、最温暖人心的微笑浮现在了[From.GetFirstName]的[From.GetFaceDescription]脸上。「我以为你永远不会问的，[Root.GetFirstName]。」

original: I am honored to be your friend, [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 成为你的朋友是我的荣幸，[From.GetFirstName]。

original: I... I don't think I can do that.
translation: 我……我不认为我能做那个。

original: Oh, my [GetRootFromCompliment]!
translation: 噢，我的[GetRootFromCompliment]！

original: Focused on Training
translation: 专注于训练

original: This character is spending all their time in focused training to master their skills with disguises and daggers as well as knowledge of foreign languages and customs.
translation: 这个角色把所有的时间都花在了集中训练上，用伪装和匕首来掌握他们的技能，以及对外国语言和风俗习惯的了解。

original: Won Duel
translation: 在对决中获胜

original: This character won a duel against an opponent.
translation: 这个角色赢得了对决

original: Outwitted Opponent
translation: 以智取胜的对手

original: This character outwitted an opponent.
translation: 这个角色以智谋战胜对手。

original: I have found out that my superior, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName], has a guilty pleasure. Despite [From.GetHerHis] sober appearance, when no one is watching, [From.GetSheHe] feasts on wine and treats. I have requested a meeting with [From.GetHerHim] and dropped a hint about my recently acquired knowledge. How should I use it to my advantage?
translation: 我发现我的上级[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]在享受一些罪恶的快乐。尽管[From.GetHerHis]外表清醒，但当没有人观察时，[From.GetSheHe]却尽情地享用着葡萄酒和美食。我要求与[From.GetHerHim]会面，并暗示我最近发现的东西。我该如何利用它来发挥我的优势呢？

original: I have found out that my superior, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName], has a guilty pleasure. [From.GetSheHeCap] is a slave to [From.GetHerHis] carnal passions – I saw [From.GetHerHim] together with [lover_of_target.GetTitledFirstName] myself. I have requested a meeting with [From.GetHerHim] and dropped a hint about my recently acquired knowledge. How should I use it to my advantage?
translation: 我发现我的上级[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]在享受一些罪恶的快乐。[From.GetSheHeCap]是[From.GetHerHis]色欲的奴隶——我亲眼看到[From.GetHerHim]和[lover_of_target.GetTitledFirstName]在一起。我要求与[From.GetHerHim]会面，并暗示我最近发现的东西。我该如何利用它来发挥我的优势呢？

original: A while ago, I noticed the frail nature of my superior, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]. People whisper about the [GetRootFromInsult], but no one has dared to draw any attention to the matter. However, for all [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] knows, maybe there is a plot in the workings! I could blackmail [From.GetHerHim] to get what I want.
translation: 不久之前，我注意到我的领主[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]的脆弱本性。人们都窃窃私语着那个[GetRootFromInsult]的事，但还没有人胆敢提出来。然而，对[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]来说无所谓，也许在这之中有阴谋！我可以勒索[From.GetHerHim]来拿到我想要的。

original: I will request a promotion.
translation: 我将要求晋升。

original: I will win [From.GetHerHis] trust by a promise to be on [From.GetHerHis] side.
translation: 通过站在[From.GetHerHis]那一边，我将会赢得[From.GetHerHis]信任。

original: While the uninitiated might believe that assassins always operate on their own, this is rarely the case. That being said, we are often occupied with our own, equally important, missions. [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] has asked for my help assassinating [assassin_quest_target.GetTitledFirstName], however I am unsure if I can spare the time...
translation: 尽管外行可能认为刺客总是自己动手，但这种情况很少发生。这就是说，我们经常忙于自己同样重要的任务。[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]已经要求我帮忙暗杀[assassin_quest_target.GetTitledFirstName]，但是我不确定是否能腾出时间……

original: Help me end [my_quest_target.GetTitledFirstName] and you shall have my blade.
translation: 帮助我了结[my_quest_target.GetTitledFirstName]我就会帮你。

original: Pull some strings for me, and I'll help you.
translation: 帮我拉关系走后门，我就会帮助你。

original: Anything for a friend, [From.GetFirstName]!
translation: 为朋友我愿两肋插刀，[From.GetFirstName]！

original: I am sorry, I am too occupied.
translation: 我很抱歉，我太忙了。

original: They are all staring at me, whispering behind my back! As I turn my head towards them, they look away, but I am sure of it. They know. Perhaps not the specifics, but they know. They will come for me, any day now. Being one of [Root.Society.GetName] always felt worth the risk, but I am not so sure anymore...
translation: 他们都盯着我，在背后议论我！当我把头转向他们时，他们看向别处，但我确信他们刚才在看我。他们自己清楚。也许没那么具体，但他们清楚。他们随时都会来找我。作为一个[Root.Society.GetName]总是富有冒险精神，但我并不那么肯定了……

original: Some days, I think I am going insane. It is probably all in my head, but sometimes I notice people staring at me. When my courtiers whisper it is impossible to shake the suspicion that it might be about me. Being one of [Root.Society.GetName] always felt worth the risk, but I am not so sure anymore...
translation: 有些时候，我想我是疯了。它可能是我的脑子在作怪，但有时我注意到人们盯着我看。当我的廷臣们耳语时，我无法不怀疑是他们在谈论我。作为一个[Root.Society.GetName]总应富有冒险精神，但我没什么把握……

original: How long before I crack under the pressure?
translation: 在压力爆发前我能承受多久？

original: The last few months have been tough, so when I was invited to the home of [From.GetTitledFirstName] for a small ceremony, it felt like a gift from [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]. [From.GetHerHisCap] words about staying brave and the importance of community touched me deeply. I mentioned this after the ceremony was over, and we ended up talking for hours.
translation: 过去的几个月很艰苦，所以当我受邀到[From.GetTitledFirstName]的家中参加一个小型的仪式时，我觉得这是一份来自[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]的礼物。[From.GetHerHisCap]关于要保持勇敢和社团重要性的话，深深触动了我。仪式结束后我提到了这一点，最后我们聊了几个小时。

original: Thank you. Now I realize I am not alone.
translation: 谢谢。现在我意识到我不是一个人。

original: I feel as if there is a special connection between us, [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 我感到我们之间仿佛有一种特别的联系，[From.GetFirstName]。

original: Listening to the words of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! touched you deep, deep down. Confess your romantic feelings to [From.GetHerHim].
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!的语句深深地打动了你。向[From.GetHerHim]表白你的浪漫感觉。

original: Thank §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! for [From.GetHerHis] unwavering friendship.
translation: 感谢§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§![From.GetHerHis]坚定不移的友谊。

original: You rarely find a more devoted follower of [From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] than my fellow [From.GetTrueReligionPerson], [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]. While this is a respectable quality, the good [From.GetSocietyRank] can sometimes struggle to hide [From.GetHerHis] true religion. [From.GetHerHisCap] inability to tell a good lie is a danger to [From.GetHerselfHimself] as well as [From.Society.GetName].
translation: 你很少找到比你的[From.GetTrueReligionPerson]信徒同伴，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]更忠诚于[From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]的追随者。虽然这是一种值得尊敬的品质，但一个好的[From.GetSocietyRank]有时很难隐藏[From.GetHerHis]真正的信仰。[From.GetHerHisCap]心直口快会使[From.GetHerselfHimself]和[From.Society.GetName]都陷入危险之中。

original: You rarely find a more devoted follower of [From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] than my fellow [From.GetTrueReligionPerson], [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]. While this is a respectable quality, the good [From.GetSocietyRank] can sometimes struggle to hide [From.GetHerHis] true religion. [From.GetHerHisCap] bad temper and inability to keep quiet is a danger to [From.GetHerselfHimself] as well as [From.Society.GetName].
translation: 你很少找到比你的[From.GetTrueReligionPerson]信徒同伴，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]更忠诚于[From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]的追随者。虽然这是一种值得尊敬的品质，但一个好的[From.GetSocietyRank]有时很难隐藏[From.GetHerHis]真正的信仰。[From.GetHerHisCap]坏脾气和口无遮拦会使[From.GetHerselfHimself]和[From.Society.GetName]都陷入危险之中。

original: You rarely find a more devoted follower of [From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] than my fellow [From.GetTrueReligionPerson], [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]. While this is a respectable quality, the good [From.GetSocietyRank] can sometimes struggle to hide [From.GetHerHis] true religion. [From.GetHerHisCap] sloppiness and tendency to forget [From.GetHerHis] things everywhere is a danger to [From.GetHerselfHimself] as well as [From.Society.GetName].
translation: 你很少找到比你的[From.GetTrueReligionPerson]信徒同伴，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]更忠诚于[From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]的追随者。虽然这是一种值得尊敬的品质，但一个好的[From.GetSocietyRank]有时很难隐藏[From.GetHerHis]真正的信仰。[From.GetHerHisCap]粗心和[From.GetHerHis]丢三落四会使[From.GetHerselfHimself]和[From.Society.GetName]都陷入危险之中。

original: You rarely find a more devoted follower of [From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] than my fellow [From.GetTrueReligionPerson], [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]. While this is a respectable quality, the good [From.GetSocietyRank] can sometimes struggle to hide [From.GetHerHis] true religion. [From.GetHerHisCap] tendency to trust just about anyone is a danger to [From.GetHerselfHimself] as well as [From.Society.GetName].
translation: 你很少找到比你的[From.GetTrueReligionPerson]信徒同伴，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]更忠诚于[From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]的追随者。虽然这是一种值得尊敬的品质，但一个好的[From.GetSocietyRank]有时很难隐藏[From.GetHerHis]真正的信仰。[From.GetHerHisCap]轻信他人使[From.GetHerselfHimself]和[From.Society.GetName]都陷入危险之中。

original: You rarely find a more devoted follower of [From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] than my fellow [From.GetTrueReligionPerson], [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]. While this is a respectable quality, the good [From.GetSocietyRank] can sometimes struggle to hide [From.GetHerHis] true religion. [From.GetHerHisCap] unawareness and indiscreet behavior is a danger to [From.GetHerselfHimself] as well as [From.Society.GetName].
translation: 你很少找到比你的[From.GetTrueReligionPerson]信徒同伴，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]更忠诚于[From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]的追随者。虽然这是一种值得尊敬的品质，但一个好的[From.GetSocietyRank]有时很难隐藏[From.GetHerHis]真正的信仰。[From.GetHerHisCap]轻举妄动会使[From.GetHerselfHimself]和[From.Society.GetName]都陷入危险之中。

original: I shall offer [From.GetFirstName] my help!
translation: 我将为[From.GetFirstName]提供帮助！

original: You approach §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! and offer [From.GetHerHim] your help in dealing with [From.GetHerHis] struggles to keep [From.GetHerHis] true religion hidden.
translation: 你接近§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!并给[From.GetHerHim]提供帮助，让[From.GetHerHis]得以秘密地保留真正的信仰，

original: My assistance does not come for free.
translation: 我的帮助不是免费的。

original: You approach §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! and offer [From.GetHerHim] your help in dealing with [From.GetHerHis] struggles to keep [From.GetHerHis] true religion hidden in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
translation: 你接近§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!并给[From.GetHerHim]提供帮助，让[From.GetHerHis]得以秘密地保留真正的信仰，以换取§Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!。

original: I have my own problems to deal with.
translation: 我有我自己的问题要处理。

original: Do not offer §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! any help.\n
translation: 不给§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!提供任何帮助。\n

original: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] approached me the other day with a somber look upon [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetFaceDescription] face. [From.GetSheHeCap] told me [From.GetSheHe] was worried about my honesty. 'Normally, it is a fine quality in a [Root.GetTrueReligionPerson], but you ought to be more careful.' [From.GetFirstName] offered to help me become a better liar.
translation: 几天前，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]沉着[From.GetHerHis][From.GetFaceDescription]脸走过来。[From.GetSheHeCap]说[From.GetSheHe]担心我的诚实。「通常来说在[Root.GetTrueReligionPerson]信徒中这是个不错的品质，但你应该更加小心一些。」[From.GetFirstName]提出帮助我成为一个更好的说谎者。

original: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] approached me the other day with a somber look upon [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetFaceDescription] face. [From.GetSheHeCap] told me [From.GetSheHe] was worried about my angry outbursts. 'If you lose your head, you can put all of us in danger. You never know who might hear you!' [From.GetFirstName] offered to help me manage my anger.
translation: 几天前，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]沉着[From.GetHerHis][From.GetFaceDescription]脸走过来。[From.GetSheHeCap]说[From.GetSheHe]担心我的易怒。「如果你失去理智，你会让我们所有人都处于危险之中。你永远不知道谁会注意到你说的话。」[From.GetFirstName]提出帮助我控制自己的易怒。

original: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] approached me the other day with a somber look upon [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetFaceDescription] face. [From.GetSheHeCap] told me [From.GetSheHe] was worried about my occasional sloppiness. 'Normally, I would not dare to criticize, but I fear your tendency to forget things here and there is a threat our secret.' [From.GetFirstName] offered to help me become more attentive.
translation: 几天前，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]沉着[From.GetHerHis][From.GetFaceDescription]脸走过来。[From.GetSheHeCap]说[From.GetSheHe]担心我有时候粗心大意。「通常来说，我不愿批评别人，但我害怕你忘记保守我们的秘密。」[From.GetFirstName]提出帮助我变得更细心。

original: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] approached me the other day with a somber look upon [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetFaceDescription] face. [From.GetSheHeCap] told me [From.GetSheHe] was worried about my trustful nature. 'Normally, it is a fine quality in a [Root.GetTrueReligionPerson], but you ought to be more wary.' [From.GetFirstName] offered to help me become more careful.
translation: 几天前，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]沉着[From.GetHerHis][From.GetFaceDescription]脸走过来。[From.GetSheHeCap]说[From.GetSheHe]担心我的天真。「通常来说在[Root.GetTrueReligionPerson]信徒中这是个不错的品质，但你应该更加小心一些。」[From.GetFirstName]提出帮助我更加小心。

original: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] approached me the other day with a somber look upon [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetFaceDescription] face. [From.GetSheHeCap] told me [From.GetSheHe] was worried about my indiscreet behavior. 'Our secret is not easy to keep, but all of our lives depend on it, [Root.GetFirstName].' [From.GetFirstName] offered to help me become more aware of my actions.
translation: 几天前，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]沉着[From.GetHerHis][From.GetFaceDescription]脸走过来。[From.GetSheHeCap]说[From.GetSheHe]担心我轻率的表现。「保守我们的秘密不是易事，但我们所有人性命都取决于此。」[From.GetFirstName]提出帮助我更注意自己的行为。

original: I will accept [From.GetHerHis] thoughtful offer.
translation: 我会接受[From.GetHerHis]体贴提议。

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will attempt to help you hide your true religion.\n
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!将尝试帮助你隐瞒你的真实信仰。\n

original: your visibility and risk of discovery decreasing.\n
translation: 你的可见性和被发现概率降低了。\n

original: you failing to learn anything.\n
translation: 你没有学到任何东西。\n

original: I think it might be worth a try.
translation: 我认为这可能值得一试。

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will attempt to help you hide your true religion in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!.\n
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!会试图帮助你隐藏你真正的宗教来换取§Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!。\n

original: Nonsense! I am doing just fine.
translation: 废话！我做得很好。

original: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] listened to my concerns and agreed to accept my help. Since then, we have met a few evenings each week to work on [From.GetHerHis] flaws together. It has been a struggle, but [From.GetFirstName] has been a diligent student and I am most pleased with [From.GetHerHis] development!
translation: [From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]听了我的担忧并同意接受我的帮助。从那以后，我们每周都有几个晚上一起针对[From.GetHerHis]缺陷进行练习。这是一场艰苦奋斗，但[From.GetFirstName]一直是一个勤奋的学生，我对[From.GetHerHis]发展非常满意！

original: The visibility and risk of discovery of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! decreases.\n
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!的可见性和被发现概率下降了。\n

original: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] listened to my concerns and agreed to accept my help. Since then, we have met a few evenings each week to work on [From.GetHerHis] flaws together. I knew it would not be easy, but despite our hardest efforts, [From.GetSheHe] has not made much progress.
translation: 在聆听了我的顾虑后，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]同意接受我的帮助。从那以后，我们几次在晚间相见，共同排查[From.GetHerHis]破绽。我知道这不能一蹴而就，但尽管我们共同努力，[From.GetSheHe]还是没能取得什么进展。

original: I expected more from [From.GetHerHim].
translation: [From.GetHerHim]没有达到我的期望。

original: When I approached [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] [From.GetSheHe] simply dismissed my concerns. I plead to [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] to keep the fool in check and all of us safe!
translation: 当我找到[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]时，[From.GetSheHe]认为我的顾虑毫无依据。我祈求[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]好好看着那个傻瓜，以保我们大家的安全！

original: Since our conversation a few weeks ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] and I have met a few evenings each week. It has been a struggle, I cannot deny that, but in the end it was all worth it. [From.GetFirstName] is proud of my development and I am relieved to no longer be a danger to [Root.Society.GetName].
translation: 自从几周前的对话以来，我和[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]每周都会挑几个晚上会面。不能否认，这是一场艰苦奋斗，但最终它是值得的。[From.GetFirstName]为我的进展而自豪，我很宽慰自己不再对[Root.Society.GetName]构成威胁。

original: I thank you for your help and patience, [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 谢谢你的帮助和耐心，[From.GetFirstName]。

original: Your visibility and risk of discovery has decreased.\n
translation: 你的可见性和被发现的风险降低了。\n

original: Since our conversation a few weeks ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] and I have met a few evenings each week to work together. It has been a struggle. I have tried my very best, but can I deny that which is in my nature? Did not [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] create me like this?
translation: 自几周前的那次谈话以来，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]和我每天晚上都在一起工作。这真的非常困难。我已经尽我所能，但我怎能拒绝自己的天性呢？[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]不就是这样创造的我们吗？

original: I hope [From.GetFirstName] isn't too disappointed with me.
translation: 希望[From.GetFirstName]不要对我太失望。

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! and [From.GetHerHis] accomplices sets out for §Y[Root.GetName]§!.
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!和[From.GetHerHis]同伴出发去§Y[Root.GetName]§!。

original: To complete this mission, §Gright-click§! on the title shield of §Y[FromFrom.GetName]§!, select §Y'Desecrate Temple'§! and successfully desecrate the [FromFrom.GetHolding] of §Y[FromFrom.GetName]§!.
translation: 要完成这项任务，§G右键点击§! §Y[FromFrom.GetName]§!的盾徽，选择§Y亵渎神殿§!并成功亵渎§Y[FromFrom.GetName]§!的[FromFrom.GetHolding]。

original:
To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

It has come to our attention that you no longer adhere to the true faith. As defending the Shia Religion and its followers is the reason why exist, our foremost duty, this is an act of the highest degree of treachery. If you want to keep your life, never cross our path again. 

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
致[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，

我们注意到你不再坚持真正的信仰。捍卫什叶派宗教及其追随者是我们生存的意义和最重大的义务，这是最高程度的背叛行为。如果你想维持你现在的生活，下次别让我们再碰上你。

此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original:
To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

It has come to our attention that you no longer adhere to the true faith. While we hope you will realize your grave error and return to [From.Religion.GetHighGodName], we cannot be lenient. You are banned from [From.Society.GetName].

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
致[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，

我们注意到你不再坚持真正的信仰。虽然我们希望你会意识到你的严重错误并回到[From.Religion.GetHighGodName]，但我们不能对你宽大处之。你被禁止留在[From.Society.GetName]。

此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original:
To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

It has come to our attention that you have publicly embraced the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] faith. While your devotion is admirable, it has put you in a perilous position and we can no longer remain in contact with you.

[From.GetSRFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
致[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，

我们注意到你已公开接受[From.TrueReligion.GetName]信仰。虽然你的献身精神是令人钦佩的，但这使你处于危险的境地，我们不能再与你保持联系。

[From.GetSRFarewell]，
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original:
To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

It has come to our attention that you no longer adhere to the true faith. While we hope you will realize the grave errors of your ways and return to [From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], we cannot be lenient. We must protect our own. If you betray our secrets, we will drag you down with us.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
致[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，

我们注意到你不再坚持真正的信仰。虽然我们希望你会意识到你的严重错误并回到[From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]，但我们不能对你宽大处之。我们必须保护自己。如果你出卖了我们的秘密，我们会拉你一起陪葬。

此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: Seems like I made some enemies today.
translation: 看起来我今天结下了几个仇家。

original: You no longer fulfill the requirements for joining [From.GetName].
translation: 你不再满足加入[From.GetName]的要求。

original: "What if I told you that all you have been taught to believe in is a lie?" [satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName] continues, throwing a cautious glance around us before pulling up [satanists_recruiter.GetHerHis] sleeve, revealing a scar in the shape of [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil]'s mark. "[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] is a liar. Reject the Tyrant deity and let [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil] guide your steps..."
translation: 「如果我告诉你，你所被教育而笃信的一切都是谎言呢？」[satanists_recruiter.GetFirstName]继续说道，谨慎地扫视了我们四周后，撸起[satanists_recruiter.GetHerHis]袖子，露出一个[satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil]徽记形状的烙印。「[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]就是个骗子。拒绝那个专制伪神，让[satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil]指引你的道路……」

original: I found some cryptic scrawlings written in blood on my bedroom door this morning. The guards say they haven't seen anyone enter during the night and I dare not ask my [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName] to decipher it. Yet, I think I understand... The mark of [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil]...
translation: 今天早晨我在卧室的门上发现了一串用血液书写的潦草字迹。而卫兵报告说，他们在夜间没有看到任何人进入，我不敢命令我的[Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName]解读它。因为，我想我明白……这是[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]的标志。

original: You carve [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil]'s mark into your arm, just like the one §Y[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§! showed you.\n
translation: 你把[satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil]的标志刻在你的手臂上，就像 §Y[satanists_recruiter.GetTitledFirstName]§!展示给你看的那样。\n

original: You're well aware that a duel with [From.GetTitledFirstName] is a great challenge, but you step up to it and the fight begins. A crowd has gathered to witness the event, and you have no idea if their deafening cheers are meant for you or your opponent. The commotion is overwhelming, and you quickly find yourself without a sword, your hand badly cut and unable to grasp the weapon to continue the duel. You try pleading for mercy, but get but nothing but silence in reply as [From.GetTitledFirstName] raises [From.GetHerHis] sword to your throat and stabs. While you fade from this world the last thing you hear is the cheering crowd.
translation: 你很清楚与[From.GetTitledFirstName]的决斗是一个很大的挑战，但是你仍然上前一步准备开始战斗。一群人凑在一起看热闹，你不知道他们震耳欲聋的欢呼是向着你还是你的对手。争斗是压倒性的，你很快发现自己剑脱了手，手被打伤，无法抓住武器继续决斗。你试着恳求怜悯，但回应你的只有沉默，因为[From.GetTitledFirstName]将[From.GetHerHis]剑引向你的喉咙并刺了下去。当你离开这个世界时，你最后听到的是人群的欢呼。

original: the four Purusarthas
translation: 四大追求

original: long
translation: 修长的

original: To complete this mission, select §Y'Donate to Charity'§!.
translation: 欲完成这项任务，请选择§Y「慈善捐赠」§!。

original: My wish to become a better [Root.GetReligiousPerson] has led me to [Root.GetMOCode]. My attempts to follow in the footsteps of [Root.GetMOSaint] has led me to realize the sinful nature of my lusts. I will try to see [Root.GetMenWomenPreference] for who they are, and not simply objects of my desire, from now on.
translation: 我成为一个更好的[Root.GetReligiousPerson]信徒的愿望引领我遵从[Root.GetMOCode]。我试图追随[Root.GetMOSaint]的脚步，这使我意识到了我的肉欲的罪恶本质。从现在开始，我会尝试把[Root.GetMenWomenPreference]看做他们本身，而不是简单地看作我欲望的对象。

original: Finally, a new era of righteousness has begun. For many years we have worked in the shadows, but the rumors are no longer whispered. The name of 'Hassan-i Sabbah', the conqueror of our mountain fortress of Alamut, is known throughout [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] and beyond. The faithful and meek shall find shelter under our wings while the impious and infidels shall fear our fury!
translation: 最终，正义的新时代来临了。多年来，我们一直耕耘于阴影中，但现在我们不再是窃窃私语中的传闻。阿拉木图的山中堡垒征服者的名字，「哈桑·萨巴赫」，是众所周知的[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]。忠诚和温顺的人会在我们的翅膀下找到藏身之处，而不虔诚者和异教徒则会畏惧我们的愤怒！

original: News of our Order's successful occupation of the mountain fortress of Masyaf in Syria is spreading. Our enemies, the infidels and the impious, have begun to realize what they are dealing with. May they cower in fear!
translation: 组织顺利地占领了位于叙利亚的山中要塞迈斯亚夫，这一消息很快便传了出去。我们的敌人，那些异教徒们开始意识到他们面对的是怎样的敌人了。愿他们永远在恐惧中颤抖！

original: With the fall of our last fortress, our Order has been forced into hiding. Some may think this is the end, but they are fools. We have worked from the shadows before and will do so again. One day we shall rise again, mightier than ever!
translation: 随着我们最后的据点的陷落，我们的组织被迫隐藏起来。有些人可能认为这就是终结，但他们是傻瓜。我们以前曾在阴影中活着，将来还会这样做。有一天，我们将再次崛起，比以往更加强大！

original: This setback will not be the end of The Assassins!
translation: 这些挫折不会击倒阿萨辛！

original: This is a dark day, indeed. Our righteous order has suffered an enormous setback. All of our mountain fortresses and hideouts have been found and burnt to the ground. The few members who survived the infidels' onslaught are hiding amongst enemies, always in danger. While an era has ended and even though our former glory might never be restored, we shall never give up.
translation: 这真是黑暗的一天，我们正当的结社遭受了巨大的挫折。我们所有的山堡和藏身地都被发现并烧毁了。少数在异教徒突袭中幸存下来的成员潜伏在敌人之中，身处险境。一个时代已经终结，尽管我们昔日的辉煌也许永远不复存在，但我们永远不会放弃。

original: Praised be Allah! The Assassins will never be broken! We have suffered in the shadows for many years, but now, a new era begins. We rebuilt our strength and recaptured the mountain fortresses of old. Our enemies will sleep with one eye open from now on...
translation: 赞美安拉！阿萨辛永远不会毁灭！我们在阴影中遭受了很多年的痛苦，但现在，一个新的时代开始了。我们重建了我们的力量，夺回了原来的山中要塞。我们的敌人从现在开始将夜不能寐……

original: §YAllied Order: Siege§!
translation: §Y友军命令：包围§!

original: §YAllied Order: Attach Army§!
translation: §Y友军命令：跟随军队§!

original: §RYou cannot give this order unless the County is occupied by the enemy.§!
translation: §R除非领地被敌人占领，否则你不能下达这一命令。§!

original: Portrait layer $LAYER|Y$ is using property number $INDEX|Y$.
translation: 肖像图层 $LAYER|Y$ 正在使用属性编号 $INDEX|Y$。

original: Portrait layer $LAYER|Y$ is not using property number $INDEX|Y$.
translation: 肖像图层 $LAYER|Y$ 未在使用属性编号 $INDEX|Y$。

original: Visible to the viewer if:
translation: 对于察看者可见如果：

original: (§G*§!) Has the same trait
translation: (§G*§!)拥有相同特质

original: (§G*§!) Is the trait holder
translation: (§G*§!)是特质拥有者

original: You can give directions to allied armies, though they might not always comply.
translation: 你可以给友军下达指示，尽管他们可能并不总是遵从。

original: Not Mine
translation: 不是我的

original: Obedient
translation: 顺从的

original: Is obedient to $WHO|Y$
translation: 服从于$WHO|Y$

original: Is not obedient to $WHO|Y$
translation: 不服从于$WHO|Y$

original: Will not interfere with $WHO|Y$
translation: 不会妨碍到$WHO|Y$

original: May interfere with $WHO|Y$
translation: 可能会妨碍到$WHO|Y$

original: Is member of a §YDevil Worshipper§! society\n
translation: 是§Y恶魔崇拜者§!社团的成员\n

original: Already at the highest rank
translation: 已经位于最高的位阶

original: §YTake Action§!
translation: §Y采取行动§!

original: Take the action the council is currently considering. Note that if the council votes no, this will incur tyranny.
translation: 采取内阁目前正在审议的行动。请注意，如果内阁投票否决，这将被视作暴政。

original: §YStart Vote§!
translation: §Y开始投票§!

original: Have the council vote on the law they're currently considering.
translation: 要求内阁就目前正在审议的法律进行投票。

original: Use a favor to have the council vote on what they're currently considering.
translation: 用一个人情来要求内阁成员对他们目前正在审议的问题进行投票。

original: §YEnd Consideration§!
translation: §Y结束审议§!

original: Have the council stop considering the issue at hand.
translation: 让内阁停止审议当前的问题。

original: §GRight-click to have the council consider the issue§!
translation: §G点击右键使内阁成员们审议这个议案§!

original: Rejoin World
translation: 重归世界

original: Leave seclusion and rejoin the world.\nIt will be some time until you can seclude yourself once more.
translation: 离开隐居处并重新回到这个世界。\n到你能再一次与世隔绝还需要一段时间。

original: Has an unoccupied demesne county or barony\n
translation: 拥有一个没有被占领的直辖伯爵领或男爵领\n

original: Go to the target $TARGET|Y$
translation: 前往目标$TARGET|Y$

original: Can invite society members if
translation: 能够邀请社团成员假如

original: Has §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§! greater or equal to [Root.GetSocietyRankUpTooltip1]\n
translation: 拥有的§Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!大于或等于[Root.GetSocietyRankUpTooltip1]\n

original: [Root.GetSocietyRankUpTooltip3]
translation: [Root.GetSocietyRankUpTooltip3]

original: [Root.GetSocietyRankUpTooltip4]
translation: [Root.GetSocietyRankUpTooltip4]

original: Must have no vice traits\n
translation: 必须没有恶习特质\n

original: §YLikely Council Position§!\nThe council position of a human player cannot be predicted.
translation: §Y可能的内阁席位§!\n一位人类玩家的内阁席位是不可预料的。

original: §YLikely Council Positions§!\nThe higher the score, the more likely it is the character will choose the given council position. Note that the actual appointment to the council may change some of the factors involved.\n--------------
translation: §Y可能的内阁立场§!\n得分越高，角色选择所给内阁职位的可能性越大。请注意，内阁的实际委任可能会改变一些相关因素。\n--------------

original: Opinion of $WHO|Y$ multiplied by $FACTOR|Y$
translation: 对$WHO|Y$的好感度乘以 $FACTOR|Y$

original: Power compared to $WHO|Y$ multiplied by $FACTOR|Y$
translation: 实力与$WHO|Y$相比乘以 $FACTOR|Y$

original: Realm size compared to $WHO|Y$ multiplied by $FACTOR|Y$
translation: 领土的大小与$WHO|Y$相比乘以 $FACTOR|Y$

original: Realm size divided by $DIVISOR|Y$, squared, then multiplied by $FACTOR|Y$
translation: 领地规模除以 $DIVISOR|Y$，平方，然后乘以$FACTOR|Y$。

original: §RYou are not allowed to join factions while you have a truce with your liege.§!
translation: §R在你和领主有停战协议时，你不被允许加入派系。§!

original: Same Mods
translation: 相同的模组

original: Same Version
translation: 相同的版本

original: Rank difference within $SOCIETY|Y$: $VALUE$
translation: 在$SOCIETY|Y$内的位阶差异：$VALUE$

original: Murder Plot Power
translation: 谋杀阴谋力量

original: All controlled armies
translation: 所有控制的军队

original: Any character
translation: 任何角色

original: Any controlled army
translation: 任何控制的军队

original: Is NOT the same society as $SOCIETY|Y$
translation: 和$SOCIETY|Y$不是同一个社团

original: Is the same society as $SOCIETY|Y$
translation: 和$SOCIETY|Y$是同一个社团

original: Flank does NOT utilize the tactic $TACTIC|Y$
translation: 侧翼没有利用战术$TACTIC|Y$

original: Flank utilizes the tactic $TACTIC|Y$
translation: 侧翼利用战术$TACTIC|Y$

original: Army suffers $AMOUNT|Y$ casualties
translation: 军队遭受了 $AMOUNT|Y$ 伤亡

original: Army suffers $PERCENTAGE|Y%$ of its troops as casualties
translation: 部队承受 $PERCENTAGE|Y%$ 的人员伤亡

original: Army suffers a morale loss of $VALUE|+$
translation: 军队士气减成 $VALUE|+$

original: Army gains a morale boost of $VALUE|+$
translation: 军队士气加成 $VALUE|+$

original: Flank changes tactic to $TACTIC|$
translation: 侧翼战术改变为$TACTIC|$

original: Found Religious Cult
translation: 建立秘信社团

original: Create a following enabling you to sow seeds of the true faith in the darkness until you have enough followers to emerge from the shadows.
translation: 创建一个拥护你的社团，使你能在黑暗中播下真正信仰的种子，一旦你有了足够多的追随者，它会从阴影里破土而出。

original: Falsely Confess Faith
translation: 假意改信

original: Convert to your liege's faith
translation: 皈依你领主的信仰

original: Openly Adopt Faith
translation: 公开承认秘密信仰

original: The followers of [Root.Society.GetNameCap] has for too long lurked in the shadows. The time has finally come to reveal our true beliefs now that we are so many that we can no longer be ignored.
translation: [Root.Society.GetNameCap]的追随者在阴影中潜伏了太久。现在，终于是时候昭示我们真正的信念，如今我们如此之多以至于人们不能再忽视我们。

original: The time has come! [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] believes our secret community of faithful has grown strong enough to no longer need to hide in the shadows. It is time to profess to the entire realm that I am a true follower of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], standing proud with my [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] brothers and sisters!
translation: 这一刻终于到来了！[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]相信我们的秘密社团已经足够强大，不再需要躲藏在阴影里。是时候告知全国，我是[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]真正的信徒，以我[Root.TrueReligion.GetName]的兄弟姐妹们为荣！

original: At last!
translation: 终于！

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has revealed an astounding secret. [From.GetSheHeCap] is a [From.GetTrueReligionAdherent], and [From.GetSheHe] is not alone among the nobility of our realm. I have long held an interest in the practices of [From.TrueReligion.GetName] believers, and [From.GetFirstName] has encouraged all those who hold true faith in their heart to profess.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]揭开了一个令人震惊的秘密。[From.GetSheHeCap]是一个[From.GetTrueReligionAdherent]追随者，并且[From.GetSheHe]不是我们国境内贵族中的唯一一个。长久以来，我一直对[From.TrueReligion.GetName]信徒们的做法颇为关注，[From.GetFirstName]已经鼓动所有那些坚守内心真正信仰的人们公开他们的信仰。

original: Welcome me into your arms, [From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]!
translation: 让我进入您的怀抱吧，[From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]！

original: I wish to understand the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] faith, but it is still wrong.
translation: 我试图理解[From.TrueReligion.GetName]信仰，但它仍然是错误的。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has revealed a shocking truth. [From.GetSheHeCap] is a [From.GetTrueReligionAdherent], and [From.GetSheHe] is not alone among the nobility of our realm. For years they have been building communities of adherents to their faith, and there are even places in my own lands where most of the populace prays to [From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]!
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]揭开了一个令人震惊的事实。[From.GetSheHeCap]是一个[From.GetTrueReligionAdherent]追随者，并且[From.GetSheHe]不是我们国境内贵族中的唯一一个。多年以来，他们一直在建立追随他们信仰的社团，甚至在我自己的土地上，大部分民众也都在向[From.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]祈祷！

original: How did they keep it secret for so long?
translation: 他们怎么保密这么久？

original: While [From.GetTitledFirstName] has always been a little strange, I never could have known that [From.GetSheHe] was secretly a [From.GetTrueReligionAdherent]! Along with a community of other nobles in my realm who have been harboring infidel beliefs for years, [From.GetSheHe] has now openly professed to what [From.GetSheHe] dares call 'the true faith.'
translation: 虽然[From.GetTitledFirstName]一直有一点奇怪，但我怎么也不会知道[From.GetSheHe]是一个[From.GetTrueReligionAdherent]追随者！伙同我国境内一个将异教信仰隐瞒多年的贵族社团一起，[From.GetSheHe]现在公然信奉[From.GetSheHe]胆敢称为的「真正的信仰」。

original: While there are only a handful of them, there are a few people in [target_province.GetName] who by the grace of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] are willing to attend our hidden [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] sermons. It will take a long time, but they will become true converts, and will be able to spread our message to ever more new believers. One day we will openly join together in our faith, without fear of persecution.
translation: 尽管不多，但是在 [target_province.GetName]还是有一些人蒙[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]的恩宠愿意来参加我们秘密的[Root.TrueReligion.GetName]布道。这将需要很长的时间，但他们将成为真正的皈依者，并且能够将我们的信息传播给越来越多的新信徒。总有一天，我们会公开地团结在我们的信仰下，不惧怕迫害。

original: With the passing of [target_province.GetName] from our realm, my fellow believers and I are finding it to be more challenging than ever to spread the word of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] there.\nPeople seemed to be listening, but for now our efforts must be abandoned until we find a new opportunity.
translation: 随着[target_province.GetName]脱离了我们的国土，我的信徒们和我发现在那里传播[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]的福音比以往任何时候都更具挑战性。\n人们只是看似在听我们传道，但现在，在我们找到新的机会之前，我们的的努力必须被放弃。

original: Our effort to establish a community of [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]s in [target_province.GetName] has proven far easier than I thought. The populace seems unusually receptive to the word of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], and as the congregation grows in number, so does its influence. We may have a self-sustaining community of believers sooner than we thought.
translation: 看起来在[target_province.GetName]建立[Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]社团比我想象的要容易得多。民众似乎异乎寻常地接受了[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]的圣言，随着会众数量的增长，它的影响力也随之增加。我们可能会比计划更快地建立一个自我维持的信徒团体。

original: [target_province.GetName] is blessed by [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]!
translation: [target_province.GetName]受到[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]祝福！

original: Our effort to establish a community of [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]s in [target_province.GetName] is going well. As the congregation grows in number, so does its influence, and more people turn to the faith.
translation: 我们试图在[target_province.GetName]建立[Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]社团的工作进展顺利。它的影响力随着会众的人数一起增长，越来越多的人投向了真正的信仰。

original: We continue in [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]'s name.
translation: 我们继续以[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]的名义。

original: Our effort to establish a community of [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]s in [target_province.GetName] is not working out. The preachers I have given charge of the congregation to are struggling to attract new believers, and without growth even some of our early converts are starting to harbor doubts.
translation: 我们试图在[target_province.GetName]建立一个[Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]社团的努力没能取得成效。我任命掌管会众的传教士正在为努力吸引新的信徒而挣扎，并且因为没有发展，甚至一些早期的皈依者也开始产生了怀疑。

original: I will provide all the support they require.
translation: 我会提供他们需要的所有支持。

original: We should abandon our efforts in [target_province.GetName] for now.
translation: 我们现在应该暂时放弃[target_province.GetName]。

original: After much work, dedication and prayer, the community of [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]s in [target_province.GetName] has grown far larger than what it once was. Believers in great numbers share joy and hardships while ensuring their faith stays hidden from the wider world. The congregation has become a small cosmos of faithful, and new converts find the truth of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] by the day.
translation: 经过许多的工作、奉献和祈祷后，在[target_province.GetName]的[Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]社团规模已经今非昔比。众多的信徒们分享他们的欢悦与艰辛，同时确保他们的信仰不被外面更宽广的世界察觉。会众们已经汇成了一个笃信的小世界，每天都有新的皈依者寻找到[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]的真相。

original: You all rest in the embrace of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]!
translation: 你们都依偎在[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]的怀中！

original:
[Root.GetSRGreeting], [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Our community is growing steadily in the shadows, but for our ultimate goal to see the light of day we need to have the support of the local populace. You should spread our teaching in the lands of [target_province.GetName].

[Root.GetSRFarewell],
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
[Root.GetSRGreeting]，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

我们的社团在阴影中稳定地发展，但是为了我们能存在于阳光下的终极目标，我们需要当地民众的支持。你应当在[target_province.GetName]传播我们的教诲。

[Root.GetSRFarewell]，
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: Prepare Ground in [FromFrom.GetName]
translation: 在[FromFrom.GetName]做好准备

original: Prepare Ground
translation: 做好准备

original: Order a loyal agent to secretly spread our teachings in a target province.
translation: 命令一个忠诚的间谍秘密地把我们的教诲传到一个目标省份。

original: Personally Adopt Faith
translation: 个人承认秘密信仰

original: Give up the charade of your the false religion you've acted upon and openly declare your true faith.
translation: 放弃你虚伪的宗教伪装，公开宣布你的真实信仰。

original: Renounce Secret Faith
translation: 放弃秘密信仰

original: You quit the practices of your secret religion and concede your faith in favor of your public religion.
translation: 你放弃了你的秘密信仰并皈依了你公开信仰的宗教。

original: A loyal servant is sent to found a community of the true faith in [Root.GetName]
translation: 一个忠实的仆人已经被派往[Root.GetName]去建立信奉真正信仰的团体

original: In due time these beautiful seeds will blossom.
translation: 在适当的时候，这些美丽的种子将开花。

original: We can no longer safely operate in that area.
translation: 我们再也不能在那里安全地运作。

original: Our agent will report back about the progress of our conversion.
translation: 我们的特工将向我们汇报省份的改信进度。

original: Neophyte
translation: 新手

original: Initiate
translation: 初学者

original: Adept
translation: 达者

original: Maga
translation: 女贤士

original: Neophyte
translation: 新手

original: Initiate
translation: 初学者

original: Adept
translation: 达者

original: Magus
translation: 贤士

original: I was in the middle of a conversation with the chef when [worried_secret_member.GetFirstName] appears from nowhere, grabs me by the arm and pulls me to a nearby room. With a wrinkled forehead and sweaty palms [worried_secret_member.GetSheHe] told me that [worried_secret_member.GetSheHe] intend to leave our society after being haunted too many times by shadows in the darkness.
translation: 我正在和厨师谈话的时候，[worried_secret_member.GetFirstName]突然出现了，抓住我的胳膊，把我拉到了附近的一个房间。[worried_secret_member.GetSheHe]额头上满是皱纹，手心冒着汗，说道，[worried_secret_member.GetSheHe]被黑暗中的阴影折磨太久太多了，她打算离开我们的社团。

original: Persuade by talking about solidarity.
translation: 用团结说服对方

original: Explain the importance of devotion.
translation: 解释奉献的重要性。

original: Use your soothing voice to calm [worried_secret_member.GetHerHim] down.
translation: 用你舒缓的声音让[worried_secret_member.GetHerHim]平静下来。

original: If that's the way [worried_secret_member.GetSheHe] feels about it.
translation: 如果[worried_secret_member.GetSheHe]是这么想的话。

original: I gave a speech to [worried_secret_member.GetFirstName] about the importance of solidarity for our movement. I emphasized how important every member of our society is so that we can be strong together. [worried_secret_member.GetFirstName] seemed to sympathize with my speech and told me that [worried_secret_member.GetSheHe] will continue to back our cause.
translation: 我对[worried_secret_member.GetFirstName]讲了一场关于团结一致的重要性的演讲。我强调社团中的每个人都不可或缺，只有这样我们才能在一起强大起来。[worried_secret_member.GetFirstName]似乎认同了我的演讲并且告诉我说[worried_secret_member.GetSheHe]会继续支持我们的事业。

original: I gave a speech to [worried_secret_member.GetFirstName] about the importance of solidarity for our movement. I emphasized how important every member of our society is so that we can be strong together. [worried_secret_member.GetFirstName] stood there unmoved by my soft words, still determined to abandon our cause.
translation: 我对[worried_secret_member.GetFirstName]讲了一场关于团结一致的重要性的演讲。我强调社团中的每个人都不可或缺，只有这样我们才能在一起强大起来。[worried_secret_member.GetFirstName]站在那一动不动，没有被我打动，仍然打算抛弃我们的事业。

original: I told [worried_secret_member.GetFirstName] that this is a time of trials but that we have to endure. [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] observes us and will reward us in due time. Feeling the pressure of divine intervention [worried_secret_member.GetFirstName] promised to keep our true faith for the time being.
translation: 我告诉[worried_secret_member.GetFirstName]，这是考验我的时候，我们必须忍受。[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]正注视着我们，并将在合适的时候给予奖励。在感受到神的压力之后，[worried_secret_member.GetFirstName]承诺暂时继续保持我们真正的信仰。

original: I told [worried_secret_member.GetFirstName] that this is a time of trials but that we have to endure. [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] observes us and will reward us in due time. However, [worried_secret_member.GetFirstName] was still more worried about the present situation than divine judgement and ran off before I could stop [worried_secret_member.GetHerHim].
translation: 我告诉[worried_secret_member.GetFirstName]，这是考验我的时候，我们必须忍受。[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]正注视着我们，并将在合适的时候给予奖励。然而[worried_secret_member.GetFirstName]比起神的审判更担心现在的状况，随后在我阻止[worried_secret_member.GetHerHim]之前就跑掉了。

original: After getting [worried_secret_member.GetFirstName] seated and listened to [worried_secret_member.GetHerHis] worried feelings I managed to calm [worried_secret_member.GetHerHim] down. After having ventilated most of [worried_secret_member.GetHerHis] thoughts [worried_secret_member.GetFirstName] was determined that our community and cause is something worth fighting for.
translation: 让[worried_secret_member.GetFirstName]坐下来并倾听[worried_secret_member.GetHerHis]担忧之后，我设法使[worried_secret_member.GetHerHim]冷静下来。在充分讨论了[worried_secret_member.GetHerHis]想法后[worried_secret_member.GetFirstName]坚信了我们的社团以及事业是值得奋斗的。

original: One for all, and all for one!
translation: 人人为我，我为人人！

original: That makes one less of our meagre company.
translation: 这样我们可怜的队伍就又少了一个人。

original: Unfaithful Rumors
translation: 不忠的传言

original: There are rumors about this character not being true to their faith.
translation: 有传言说这个角色不忠于他的信仰。

original: There's a rumor about an artist in the vicinity that creates the most magnificent landscape paintings with features of human nature.
translation: 有传言说在附近的一个艺术家，创造了最宏伟且具有人性特征的风景画。

original: I need to have one of those in my possession.
translation: 我必须拥有其中一件。

original: Beautiful paintings. Alas, I can't afford one.
translation: 美丽的画。唉，但我买不起。

original: I got a personal unveiling of the painting I commissioned for. The artist truly did a remarkable job with it.
translation: 我亲手揭开了我委托的绘画。这位艺术家确实做了出色的工作。

original: But it feels like something is missing.
translation: 但这感觉像少了点什么。

original: Ask the artist to add some hidden [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] symbols.\nShe might take offence to your request.
translation: 请艺术家添加一些隐藏的[Root.TrueReligion.GetName]符号。\n她可能因为你的请求而生气。

original: Ask the artist to add some hidden [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] symbols.\nHe might take offence to your request.
translation: 请艺术家添加一些隐藏的[Root.TrueReligion.GetName]符号。\n他可能因为你的请求而生气。

original: I'll just add some details of my own.
translation: 我会自己添加一些细节。

original: To the best of your skills you'll give the painting a touch of [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] symbols.
translation: 你将尽你所能在这幅画中加入一些[Root.TrueReligion.GetName]的符号。

original: This should be on display for all my prominent guests.
translation: 这应该展示给我所有的杰出嘉宾。

original: Magnificent Painting
translation: 华丽的画作

original: This remarkable painting almost comes to life and brings you outdoor in nature while you're still observing it from under a roof. A truly enchanting piece of art.
translation: 这幅非凡的画几乎栩栩如生，即使你在屋檐下欣赏，也让你感觉身处在户外的大自然。一件真正迷人的艺术品。

original: When I showed off my latest addition to my art collection one particular person spent a long time studying the painting. Turns out that it was [society_art_observer.GetSocietyRank] [society_art_observer.GetFirstName] whom later shook my hand and discretely left a [Root.GetSRTrinketSymbol] in my palm.
translation: 当我炫耀我最新的艺术收藏时，某个人花了很长时间研究这幅画。原来是[society_art_observer.GetSocietyRank][society_art_observer.GetFirstName]。这之后他握了握我的手，在我手掌上留下一个[Root.GetSRTrinketSymbol]。

original: I'm happy to have other enlightened fellows around.
translation: 我很高兴有其他开明的人。

original: I hope someone can appreciate this.
translation: 我希望某人能欣赏这个。

original: I'll have to hide this catastrophe.
translation: 我必须掩盖这次惨剧。

original: Avant-Garde Painting
translation: 先锋派绘画

original: For good and bad, this painting has its own... unique style.
translation: 无论好坏，这幅画有着……独特的风格。

original: That sounds like exactly what I need.
translation: 这听起来正是我想要的。

original: You disguise yourselves to visit a local watering hole.
translation: 你乔装拜访了一家本地酒店。

original: Is [society_character.GetSheHe] joking? I have so much to do!
translation: [society_character.GetSheHe]在开玩笑吗？我还有很多事情要做！

original: "You're misunderstanding! Let me explain..."
translation: 「你误会了！让我来解释清楚……」

original: Attempt to resolve the situation diplomatically.
translation: 试图在外交上解决这个问题。

original: "A threat? I'll add injury to those insults!"
translation: 「你在威胁我？我会加重对这些侮辱的报复！」

original: Go for a distinctly undiplomatic solution.
translation: 去寻求一个明显的非外交解决方案。

original: It didn't take long to calm the brawler, as just a few leaps of logic was enough to convince him that our beliefs weren't so fundamentally different. After sitting together for the rest of the evening, he even reluctantly admitted that there might be something to our [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] arguments after all! Later, [society_character.GetTitledFirstName] complimented me on my theological efforts.
translation: 没花多少工夫就让这位争吵者平静下来了，因为只要几次逻辑跳跃就足以让他相信我们的信仰并没有本质上的不同。在一起坐了一个晚上之后，他甚至不情愿地承认，我们有关[Root.TrueReligion.GetName]的争论是有价值的！随后，[society_character.GetTitledFirstName]称赞了我在神学方面的努力。

original: As it turns out, the beginning of a bar fight is not the best place for theological debate. My argument was drowned out by the shout of pain from [society_character.GetTitledFirstName] as the first punch was thrown. After that the entire tavern descended into chaos. To make matters worse, the brawler who had initiated the fight quoted lines from [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] as we were thrown on our faces into the street.
translation: 事实证明，酒吧大并不是开始一场神学辩论的最佳场所。我的辩论被[society_character.GetTitledFirstName]挨揍后的痛苦叫喊淹没了。在那之后，整个酒馆陷入了混乱。更糟糕的是，挑起这场战斗的斗殴者引用了[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]的话，随后我们就被扔到了大街上。

original: I'm proud that turned out so well.
translation: 我很自豪结果如此出色。

original: It certainly distracted me from my stress at court.
translation: 当然，这让我转移了注意，暂时忘却宫廷的压力。

original: In these dark times, [Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]s must stand up for each other. I shoved [society_character.GetTitledFirstName] out of the way of the first punch, and as the tavern descended into brawling chaos I made sure [society_character.GetSheHe] was left unharmed. In the end my fists were battered and bruised, but there was not a single person left standing who dared question me when I proclaimed the superiority of the [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] faith.
translation: 在这个黑暗的时代，[Root.GetTrueReligionAdherent]追随者必须为彼此挺身而出。我把[society_character.GetTitledFirstName]从拳头下推开，当酒馆陷入喧闹的混乱时，我确保[society_character.GetSheHe]不会受到伤害。最后，虽然我的拳头流血青肿，但当我宣布[Root.TrueReligion.GetName]信仰的优越性时没有一个敢质疑的人还站着了。

original: Some kind of divine fury must have driven the brawler, for he turned out to be an unstoppable beast! Even as we tried to restrain him simultaneously he merely shrugged us off and let his fists fly. Soon others joined in the fight on both sides, and we crawled our way to safety. As we made our way out we could still hear praise for [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] shouted over the sound of cracking wood and shattering glass.
translation: 一定是某种神圣的愤怒驱赶了斗殴者，因为他原来是一只不可阻挡的野兽！即使我们试图同时压制他，他也只是耸耸肩，继续挥舞拳头。不久，其他人参加了双方的战斗，我们爬到了安全的地方。当我们出去的时候，我们仍然能听到赞美[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的高喊，盖过了木头折断和玻璃碎裂的声音。

original: It felt good to fight in the name of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName].
translation: 以[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]的名义进行的战斗，感觉真好。

original: [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] can prove strength by healing my wounds instead...
translation: [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]可以通过治愈我的伤口来证明力量……

original: Bruised Knuckles
translation: 关节受伤

original: Mediator
translation: 调停人

original: Accept, but secretly worship [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]
translation: 同意，但秘密崇拜[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]

original: I feel the [old_religion.Religion.GetName] way of life calling to me still. My [demander.GetLordLady]'s demand for me to abandon my beliefs and never enter my [old_religion.GetHouseOfWorship] again only makes the urge stronger. I find no truth in the [demander.Religion.GetName] faith and truly doubt [demander.GetHerHis] [demander.GetHouseOfWorship] will ever be a place for me.
translation: 我觉得[old_religion.Religion.GetName]的生活方式仍然在召唤着我。我的[demander.GetLordLady]要求我放弃我的信仰，并且再也不进入我的[old_religion.GetHouseOfWorship]，这只会使我的欲望更加强烈。我在[demander.Religion.GetName]信仰中找不到真理，而且深深的怀疑[demander.GetHerHis][demander.GetHouseOfWorship]是不是适合我的地方。

original: I will stay a true [old_religion.Religion.GetName], even if I have to do so in secret.
translation: 我将继续做真正的[old_religion.Religion.GetName]，即使我只能偷偷这么做。

original: I must purge my mind of these thoughts and fully embrace [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].
translation: 我必须净化我的思想，完全拥抱[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]。

original: the Fellowship of Hel
translation: 赫尔团契

original: The Tooth of Buddha
translation: 佛牙舍利

original: This is the tooth of Buddha that was once smuggled out of Kalinga. It is one of the most holy relics in existence from the Great Buddha and its custody requires the kingliest of qualities.
translation: 这是从羯陵伽偷运出的佛牙舍利。它是伟大的佛陀现存的最神圣的遗物之一，只有王者才配拥有它。

original: The Mountain of Light
translation: 光之山

original: Jeweled Danda
translation: 宝石檀陀

original: Sarira
translation: 舍利子

original: This is a small crystal like bead that was once retrieved from the ashes of a cremated spiritual master. It is an object of some power and is believed to be able to ward off evil and convey blessings upon those that possess it.
translation: 这是一颗小小的水晶般的珠子，曾经从火葬的圣人的骨灰中找回。它是某种力量的化身，被认为能够抵御邪恶并向拥有它的人传达祝福。

original: Sariraka Bone
translation: 骨舍利

original: This is a bone that once belonged to the Buddha himself. They serve as Cetiya, or a reminder of the great Gautama Buddha.
translation: 这是一块曾经属于佛陀本人的遗骨。它们被安置在支提遗塔，用来纪念伟大的乔达摩悉达多。

original: The Tooth of Buddha
translation: 佛牙舍利

original: Having received the news of [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]'s return you hurry to the throne room. As you receive [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] presents you with a small box containing an unusually large tooth. It is with great reverence in [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] voice that [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] announces: 'This is the sacred tooth of Buddha. It is the same relic that was once left in the custody of Khema, smuggled out of Kalinga by princess Hemamali and which has since been cared for by the finest kings in all of India'. To be the custodian of this relic is to exhibit the greatest of kingly virtues, it marks the divine right of the holder to rule over men. Your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] has brought you a greater prize than you dared imagine.\n\nAs you look up from the tooth itself you realize this is something that has not escaped [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] [relic_hunter.GetHerselfHimself]. A steady gaze meets yours, this is clearly the look of a [relic_hunter.GetManWoman] that expects a great reward.
translation: 你收到[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]的消息之后急匆匆地赶回王座室，当你接见[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]时[relic_hunter.GetSheHe]呈上一个小盒，里面装着一颗异常大的牙齿。[relic_hunter.GetFirstName]用[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]非常崇敬的声音说道：「这是佛陀的圣牙，曾经由谶摩保管，在被赫摩玛拉公主偷运出羯陵伽那城后由全印度最伟大的国王保管的就是这个，成为这件遗物的保管人本身就彰显着王者的美德。它代表着统治人类的神圣权利。」你的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]给了你一份超出你想象的礼物。\n\n当你从圣牙上抬起头时你注意到你不该忘记[relic_hunter.GetFirstName][relic_hunter.GetHerselfHimself]。目光凝视在你身上，显然[relic_hunter.GetManWoman]期望一个巨大的奖赏。

original: The Mountain of Light
translation: 光之山

original:
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] and [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] expedition has returned from their search and now stand before you. In an opened box lies the largest diamond you have ever seen. 'It is known as the Mountain of Light' your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] tells you, 'and it is a stone that has brought wealth, prestige and splendor to those that have owned it for centuries.'
