Surely with this stone in your hands you will be the envy of every ruler alive. In truth it is as magnificent as it is terrifying, you cannot help but recall the saying that all large gemstones are cursed...

Looking up you realize [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] is and [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] companions are still here, awaiting a reward for the kingly prize they have brought you.
translation:
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]和[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]探险队已经从他们的搜索中返回，现在站在你们面前。一个打开的盒子里放着你这辈子见过的最大的钻石。「他被称为光之山，」你的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]告诉你，「这是一块几个世纪以来给拥有它的人带来财富，威望和荣耀的石头。」 

拿着这块石头，你无疑将成为每一个活着的统治者羡慕的对象。事实上，它既美丽又可怕，你不禁想起一句谚语：所有的大宝石都被诅咒了……

你抬头看了看，意识到[relic_hunter.GetFirstName]和[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]伙伴正等着你给他们的奖赏。

original: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] travels, presenting you with a carefully wrapped Danda. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] claims that this scepter is of great age and that it has belonged to a number of ancient monarchs before you.
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]从[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]旅行中返回，给你带了一个精心包装的檀陀杖。[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap]声称这个权杖很古老，曾属于你之前的许多古代君主。

original: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] search and brings with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a small crystal-like bead. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] insist that this what remained after the cremation of a great spiritual master and that it is an object of great power.
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]从[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]搜索中返回，[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]带来了一个类似水晶的小珠子。[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap]坚持认为，这是一位伟大的精神导师火化后留下的东西，具有强大的能量。

original: My [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] has returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] quest and brings with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a carefully packaged bone that [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] insists once belonged to the great Buddha himself.
translation: 我的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]从[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]探索中回来并且[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]带回来一个精心包装的骨头。[relic_hunter.GetSheHe]坚持说它曾经属于伟大的佛陀。

original: Lucifer's Own
translation: 路西法仆从

original: Lucifer's Own
translation: 路西法仆从

original: Call for my Court Physician at once!
translation: 立即召唤我的宫廷医师！

original: [Root.GetTitledFirstName] won't receive any more notifications about sick relatives.
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]不会收到有关患病亲属的更多通知。

original: I must protect this child of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap]!
translation: 我必须保护[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap]的孩子！

original: [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap] has honored me with this child!
translation: [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap]用这个孩子赐予我荣耀！

original: Clear Education Trait\n
translation: 明确的教育特质\n

original: [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] shall lead us to victory!
translation: [From.GetSubjectPronounCap]将带领我们走向胜利！

original: The blessed child of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] is playful...
translation: 被[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]祝福的孩子很调皮……

original: Odd looking strangers in exotic ships came ashore today, heralds of a great empire far to the west. Oddly enough, they claim that their new ruler came to them from this side of the ocean. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] wishes us to know that [From.GetSubjectPronoun] is coming back at the head of a vast army, promising to "bring judgment upon the false god."
translation: 异国船只上的奇怪陌生人今天登陆了，他们自称是遥远西方的一个伟大帝国的使者。奇怪的是，他们声称他们的新统治者从海洋那边过来了。[From.GetSubjectPronounCap]希望我们知道[From.GetSubjectPronoun]带着一支无尽的军队又回来了，要「给予伪神审判。」

original: Apocalypse Nigh
translation: 天启降临

original: Our great hope and savior, [From.GetBestNameWithoutRegnalNumber], [From.GetSonDaughter] of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName], has gathered [From.GetPossPronoun] most devoted followers and boarded a small fleet of longships bound for the other side of the Atlantic ocean. Guided by the Great Serpent, [From.GetSubjectPronoun] promised to return at the head of a host such as the world has never seen. All the works of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] shall be cast down and [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] will rule the world forever!
translation: 我们的希望和救世主，[From.GetBestNameWithoutRegnalNumber]，[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]的[From.GetSonDaughter]，聚集了[From.GetPossPronoun]最忠实的追随者登上了一支长船小舰队，驶向大西洋的另一边。在巨蛇的引领下，[From.GetSubjectPronoun]承诺会作为一个全世界闻所未闻的势力的主人回归。所有有关[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]东西都将被推翻，[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]将永远统治这个世界。

original: Iblis Akbar!
translation: 易卜劣斯至大！

original: Hail [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]!
translation: [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]万岁！

original: Apocalypse Nigh?
translation: 天启降临？

original: Your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetBestNameWithoutRegnalNumber] – widely considered the [From.GetSonDaughter] of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] – has gathered [From.GetPossPronoun] most devoted followers and boarded a small fleet of longships bound for the other side of the Atlantic ocean. Defiantly embracing the role of demonic antagonist, [From.GetSubjectPronoun] has promised to subjugate the lands of the distant west and return in triumph at the head of a host such as the world has never seen...
translation: 你的[GetFromRelation][From.GetBestNameWithoutRegnalNumber]——普遍认为是[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]的[From.GetSonDaughter]——已经聚集起了[From.GetPossPronoun]许多忠诚的追随者，登上了一小队长船前往大西洋彼岸。[From.GetSubjectPronoun]嚣张地接受了自己作为恶魔般挑战者的角色，发誓要征服遥远的西部的土地，作为一个全世界闻所未闻的势力的主人凯旋而归……

original: [From.GetFirstName] was never right in the head.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]的脑子就没对的时候。

original: There are rumors of exotic strangers in weird looking ships making landfall all along the Atlantic coast. They claim to be heralds of a great emperor from beyond the Atlantic Ocean – a [FromFrom.GetManWoman] from our continent who crossed the trackless seas to somehow become ruler of the peoples of the sunset. This emperor [FromFrom.GetFirstName] threatens doom to all who follow "the false god of Abraham"!
translation: 有传闻说奇怪的陌生人在大西洋海岸登陆。他们自称是一个大西洋对岸的伟大帝国的使者。一个来自我们大陆的[FromFrom.GetManWoman]穿过海洋成为了日落处人民的统治者。这个皇帝[FromFrom.GetFirstName]威胁要毁灭所有的「亚伯拉罕伪神」！

original: The [FromFrom.GetSonDaughter] of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] returns!
translation: [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]的[FromFrom.GetSonDaughter]回来了！

original: The Child of Satan
translation: 撒旦之子

original: The day of reckoning is nigh. The [From.GetSonDaughter] of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] is finally loose in the world of men! Our new [From.GetMasterMistress] will lead us to victory against the lying Creator and all his weak minions! The brothers and sisters of [GetLucifersOwnSocietyName] must stand ready to support [From.GetBestNameWithoutRegnalNumber] in [From.GetPossPronoun] relentless march towards Armageddon.
translation: 最后清算的日子就快到了。[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]的[From.GetSonDaughter]终于在人类世界降生！我们的新[From.GetMasterMistress]将领导我们走向胜利，击败说谎的造物主和他所有软弱的奴才！[GetLucifersOwnSocietyName]的兄弟姐妹们必须随时准备在[From.GetPossPronoun]末日之战中支持[From.GetBestNameWithoutRegnalNumber]的无尽征程。

original: My [From.GetSonDaughter]! I am so proud...
translation: 我的[From.GetSonDaughter]！我是如此自豪……

original: Apocalypse Lost
translation: 天启丧失

original: Our [From.GetMasterMistress], the [From.GetSonDaughter] of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] [From.GetReflexivePronoun], has returned to [From.GetPossPronoun] father in Hell! The brethren are in shock, but we must not lose faith in His great plan. For reasons beyond our ken, the time must simply not have been right. No doubt the Chosen One will return in a different age, when belief in the feeble Creator deity has waned to a mere ember...
translation: 我们的[From.GetMasterMistress]，[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]，[From.GetReflexivePronoun]的[From.GetSonDaughter]，已经返回到地狱中[From.GetPossPronoun]父亲身旁！兄弟姐妹无不震惊。但我们不能对他的伟大计划失去信心，由于我们所无法理解的原因，现在的时机尚不成熟。毫无疑问，当人们对虚弱的创世神的信仰减弱到余烬时，被选中的人就会于另一个世代回归……

original: [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap]'s will be done!
translation: [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap]的事业必将胜利！

original: My [From.GetSisterBrother] in [Root.GetDWBrethrenType], [From.GetBestNameWithoutRegnalNumber], was passing by and decided to pay me a surprise visit! [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] is in a lewd mood and thought we might stage an impromptu orgy in honor of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName].
translation: 我置身[Root.GetDWBrethrenType]的[From.GetSisterBrother]，[From.GetBestNameWithoutRegnalNumber]，在路过时决定给我来一个突然拜访！[From.GetSubjectPronounCap]有一个下流的想法，认为我们可以进行一场即兴狂欢以向[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]表达敬意。

original: My [GetFromRelation] and [From.GetSisterBrother] in [Root.GetDWBrethrenType], [From.GetFirstName], is feeling lascivious and just suggested that we might stage an impromptu orgy together – in honor of the Great Serpent, of course!
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]，[Root.GetDWBrethrenType]的[From.GetSisterBrother]，[From.GetFirstName]，有了下流的想法，建议举行一场即兴狂欢——当然是为了荣耀巨蛇！

original: What a lovely idea! I'll wear my [Root.GetDWPartyClothes].
translation: 一个多么令人愉快的想法啊！我将会穿上我的[Root.GetDWPartyClothes]。

original: No way! [From.GetPossPronounCap] debaucheries never end well...
translation: 没门！[From.GetPossPronounCap]放荡永无止境……

original: Demonic orgies can be rewarding, but remember that [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] is a cruel master...
translation: 恶魔般的狂欢可能是有益的，但请记住[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]是一个残暴的主人……

original: Where am I?! Oh yes... the orgy – three days of wicked debaucheries conducted by a Priapic dwarf from Hell. The drugs, the copulation, the succubus with the hypnotic flute... the ritual murder. Was it real? All I know is that [From.GetFirstName] sure knows how to throw a party!
translation: 我在哪？喔，对了……狂欢——一个来自地狱的阳刚的侏儒举办了三天放荡狂欢。毒品，性交，带着催眠笛子的梦魔……还有杀人祭祀。这是真的么？我唯一知道的就是[From.GetFirstName]确实知道怎么办一场派对！

original: Having indulged in at least four different kinds of exotic drugs, the last three days are a fiery haze in my mind. There was a woman with a forked tongue, a one-eyed dwarf and many other wonderful freaks – some of them might even have been real! Mmmm, and the tricks [From.GetFirstName] and I taught each other!
translation: 在沉溺于至少四种不同种类的异国毒品之后，过去的三天在我的脑海里是一片火热的烟雾。有一个有着分叉舌头的女人，一个独眼的侏儒和许多其他奇妙的怪人——有些人甚至可能是真实的！嗯，还有[From.GetFirstName]和我教给每个人的把戏！

original: My memories of the last few days are dreamlike. There was lots of smoke, a cackling old crone and a nubile young woman with a long tail that could do all kinds of things... Oh, and there was a loud midget ordering me and [From.GetFirstName] into various interesting positions. I never realized I liked [From.GetMenWomen] that way...
translation: 我对过去几天的回忆就像梦一样。有很多烟，一个咯咯叫的老太婆和一个身材矮小的年轻女人，她的尾巴很长，可以做各种各样的事情……哦，还有一个大嗓门的侏儒命令我和[From.GetFirstName]摆出各种有趣的体位。我从来没有意识到我喜欢[From.GetMenWomen]这样……

original: But most of all, my compliments to the chef!
translation: 但最重要的是，我向厨师致敬！

original: I feel great!
translation: 我感觉很棒！

original: I feel drained.
translation: 我感到筋疲力尽。

original: I feel like a changed [Root.GetManWoman]...
translation: 我感觉自己是个脱胎换骨的[Root.GetManWoman]……

original: Let's do it again sometime.
translation: 让我们改日再做一次吧。

original: Satyric Blessing
translation: 萨堤耳的祝福

original: This man has been favored with the virility and animal magnetism of satyrs.
translation: 这个人受到了萨堤耳的阳刚之气和野性魅力的青睐。

original: Blessing of Lilith
translation: 莉莉丝的祝福

original: This woman has been blessed with the sensuality and infernal allure of Lilith, Adam's first wife.
translation: 这个女人被亚当的第一任妻子莉莉丝赐予性感与恶魔的魅力。

original: Blessing of Baalberith
translation: 巴耳贝黎特的祝福

original: Baalberith, the demon prince of murder and chief secretary of Hell, has blessed this character with overflowing coffers.
translation: 巴耳贝黎特，谋杀之恶魔君主和地狱的首席大臣，赐予这个角色满溢的金库。

original: Blessing of Azazel
translation: 阿匝则耳的祝福

original: Azazel, the Fallen Angel of War, has blessed this character with martial prowess.
translation: 阿匝则耳，堕落的战争天使，赐予这个角色军事技巧。

original: Blessing of Avnas
translation: 亚米的祝福

original: The great demon Avnas has blessed this character with secret knowledge.
translation: 大恶魔亚米赐予这个角色秘密的知识。

original: Blessing of Belial
translation: 贝里雅耳的祝福

original: The Demon Prince of Trickery has blessed this character with charm and a glib tongue.
translation: 狡诈之恶魔君主赐予这个角色魅力和口齿伶俐。

original: Blessing of Mammon
translation: 玛门的祝福

original: Great Mammon, Prince of Hell, has blessed this character with business acumen.
translation: 伟大的玛门，地狱之君主，赐予这个角色敏锐的商业头脑。

original: Blessing of Vetis
translation: 韦蒂什的祝福

original: Vetis, the Tempter of the Holy, has blessed this character with a devious mind.
translation: 韦蒂什是圣灵的诱惑者，用一颗狡猾的心赐福于这个角色。

original: (Hidden from the world at large...)
translation: （对于大部分世人不可见……）

translation: 主教法冠

translation: 新型毒药

original: After a lengthy discussion about the logistics of an upcoming ritual, my [From.GetSisterBrother] in [Root.GetDWBrethrenType], [From.GetBestNameWithoutRegnalNumber] stood up abruptly, a depraved grin splitting [From.GetPossPronoun] face: 'Well, I'm bored. Let's head down to the [Root.GetDWSettlement] and have some fun with the peasants!'
translation: 在对即将到来的仪式进行了冗长的讨论之后，我置身[Root.GetDWBrethrenType]的[From.GetSisterBrother]，[From.GetBestNameWithoutRegnalNumber]突然站起来，[From.GetPossPronoun]脸上露出了邪恶的笑容，说道：「我感到很无聊，让我们去[Root.GetDWSettlement]里找那群乡巴佬的乐子吧！」

original: After discussing the details of an upcoming ritual, my [From.GetSisterBrother] in [Root.GetDWBrethrenType], [From.GetBestNameWithoutRegnalNumber] stood up abruptly, a depraved grin splitting [From.GetPossPronoun] face: 'Well, I'm bored. Let's head down to the [Root.GetDWSettlement] and have some fun!' There it was – the expected attempt on my life... Good thing I've already subverted most of [From.GetPossPronoun] retainers!
translation: 在讨论了即将举行的仪式的细节之后，我[Root.GetDWBrethrenType]的[From.GetSisterBrother]，[From.GetBestNameWithoutRegnalNumber]突然站了起来，[From.GetPossPronoun]脸上露出了邪恶的笑容：「好吧，我很无聊。让我们去[Root.GetDWSettlement]找点乐子！」又来了——我一直都能猜到……幸运的是，我已经击败了[From.GetPossPronoun]大多数仆人！

original: My [GetFromRelation] and fellow [From.GetSisterBrother] in [Root.GetDWBrethrenType], [From.GetFirstName] and I had been discussing a small devotion to [Root.GetDWRandomDemon] when [From.GetSubjectPronoun] suddenly stood up, stretched and said: 'I'm in the mood for mayhem! Let's dress up and head down to the [Root.GetDWSettlement].'
translation: 我置身[Root.GetDWBrethrenType]的[GetFromRelation]和[From.GetSisterBrother]，[From.GetFirstName]与我一起讨论一场[Root.GetDWRandomDemon]的小型祭祀时，[From.GetSubjectPronoun]突然站起来说：「我想破坏点什么！让我们装扮一下然后去[Root.GetDWSettlement]。」

original: About time! I'll bring my [Root.GetDWImplements]!
translation: 早该如此！我会带上我的[Root.GetDWImplements]！

original: I don't want to risk riling up the rabble.
translation: 我不想冒风险去惹怒那群乡巴佬。

original: Demonic outings can be rewarding, but remember that [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] is a cruel master...
translation: 与恶魔相伴出游是个有趣的想法，但是记住[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]是个残暴的主人……

original: Wearing nondescript common clothes, [From.GetFirstName] and I are slowly making our way to town in amicable silence. As we pass by a neatly kept garden in front of a cozy-looking house, I am suddenly overcome with hatred and revulsion. This family is clearly favored by [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]...
translation: [From.GetFirstName]和我穿着不起眼的普通衣服，默默地往城里走去。当我们经过一座舒适房屋前的整洁花园时，我突然充满了仇恨和厌恶。这个家庭显然受到[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的青睐……

original: [From.GetFirstName] and I are riding down to the camp at a lazy trot. As we pass by some children playing in front of an impressive yurt I am suddenly overcome with hatred and revulsion. This family is clearly favored by [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]...
translation: [From.GetFirstName]和我骑着马慢慢前往营地。当我们经过一个令人印象深刻的帐篷时，我突然充满了仇恨和厌恶。这个家庭显然受到[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]的青睐……

original: Keep going. They get to live... for now.
translation: 继续前进。他们能活下去了……暂时。

original: [From.GetFirstName]... it's time to do [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]'s work!
translation: [From.GetFirstName]……是时候进行[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]的事业了！

original: You picked the wrong neighbor, my friends...
translation: 你挑错了邻居，我的朋友……

original: The father of the family died last. Ah, but the marvels he got to see first! [FromFrom.GetFirstName] carved the wife's face off and pranced around wearing it as a mask, taunting and kissing the man while I boiled baby fat to make a flying potion. Finally, we constructed an idol of [Root.GetDWRandomDemon] from the dismembered bodies.
translation: 这个家庭的父亲是最后一个死去的。啊，可他临终之前首先见证了神迹！[FromFrom.GetFirstName]切下妻子的脸庞并戴在脸上作为面具，昂首阔步地在房间打转，然后嘲弄并亲吻男人。我煮沸婴儿的脂肪来调制飞身药水。最后，我们用肢解的躯体打造了[Root.GetDWRandomDemon]的神像。

original: The father broke free just as we were putting out the eyes of the oldest girl. Somehow, the man got hold of a huge pestle and managed to brain [FromFrom.GetFirstName] before I could cut him down! [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] must have been displeased with [FromFrom.GetFirstName], but I honored [FromFrom.GetObjectPronoun] by using parts of [FromFrom.GetObjectPronoun] for the idol of [Root.GetDWRandomDemon] I built with the bodies...
translation: 正当我们把他大女儿的眼睛挖出来的时候，这位父亲挣脱了束缚。在我将他砍倒之前，他成功地抓起了一根巨大的棒子，对着[FromFrom.GetFirstName]的脑门砸了下去！[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]一定是对[FromFrom.GetFirstName]不满了，但是我仍然用[FromFrom.GetObjectPronoun]的残体和其余尸体组建了[Root.GetDWRandomDemon]的神像，以此来纪念[FromFrom.GetObjectPronoun]……

original: Burn it all, no one must know!
translation: 全烧了，决不能让任何人知道！

original: Leaving it would please [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] more...
translation: 离开会让[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]更高兴……

original: The locals will surely be... upset.
translation: 当地人肯定会……不满。

original: Predictably, the local populace didn't appreciate the glorious monument of flesh that we left for them to find. Rumors are running rife and it won't take much for the whole of [Root.Location.GetName] to erupt into open rebellion.
translation: 可以预见，当地的民众并不喜欢我们留给他们寻找的光荣的肉体纪念碑。谣言正在蔓延，用不了多久整个[Root.Location.GetName]都会爆发公开的叛乱。

original: Ignorant scum. [Root.Location.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] will not save them...
translation: 无知败类。[Root.Location.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]是不会拯救他们的……

original: Predictably, the populace of [Root.Location.GetName] didn't appreciate the glorious monument of tortured flesh that we left for them to find. In fact, they were so riled up that they've taken up arms against their rightful rulers!
translation: 可以预见，[Root.Location.GetName]的民众并不喜欢我们留给他们寻找的光荣的拷问肉体纪念碑。事实上，他们被激怒了，拿起了武器反抗他们合法的统治者！

original: Playtime is over. I will show them REAL horrors!
translation: 游戏时间结束了。我要向他们展示真正的恐怖！

original: I can hear the laughter of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]. I have done well!
translation: 我已经能够听到[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]的大笑声了。我做的很好！

original: The tavern was packed when we arrived. [From.GetFirstName] distracted the tavern keeper while I dosed the barrels with '[Root.GetDWDrug]'. An hour later, the mood was getting festive. Two hours later and the crowd had descended into utter madness. [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap] knows what they saw while we were offering up the staff to [Root.GetDWRandomDemon].
translation: 我们到达酒馆时，里面挤满了人。[From.GetFirstName]分散酒馆老板的注意力，我则用「[Root.GetDWDrug]」给酒桶下药。一小时后，气氛变得欢快起来。两小时后，人群陷入了彻底的疯狂。当我们将酒馆侍者献祭给[Root.GetDWRandomDemon]时，[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap]才知道酒馆里的人看到了什么。

original: The tavern was packed when we arrived. [From.GetFirstName] distracted the tavern keeper while I dosed the barrels with '[Root.GetDWDrug]'. An hour later, the mood was getting festive. That's when [From.GetFirstName] decided to play a prank on me, locking me into a room with three burly warriors who were starting to rave and hallucinate...
translation: 我们到达酒馆时，里面挤满了人。[From.GetFirstName]分散酒馆老板的注意力，我则用「[Root.GetDWDrug]」给酒桶下药。一小时后，气氛变得欢快起来。就在这时，[From.GetFirstName]决定对我搞恶作剧，把我锁进了一个房间，里面有三个强壮的武士，他们开始胡言乱语、产生幻觉……

original: Amusing. On to the next place, [From.GetFirstName]?
translation: 有趣。去下一个地方吗，[From.GetFirstName]？

original: Err, I just drank the beer, didn't I?!
translation: 额，我刚喝了酒，不是吗？！

original: The curse of [Root.GetDWRandomDemon] upon you, [From.GetBitchBastard]!
translation: [Root.GetDWRandomDemon]诅咒你，[From.GetBitchBastard]！

original: That drug can ruin the mind permanently!
translation: 那种药会永久破坏心灵！

original: When I came to, [FromFrom.GetFirstName] was long gone... so much for fellowship. Uuuh, I can't think straight. Where am I?
translation: 当我到达的时候，[FromFrom.GetFirstName]已经走了很长一段时间……友谊到此为止。呃，我不能清醒地思考了。我在哪儿？

original: And why am I naked?!
translation: 为什么我赤身裸体？！

original: For some time now, my [From.GetSisterBrother] in [Root.GetDWBrethrenType], [From.GetBestNameWithoutRegnalNumber] and I have been researching the proper ritual for invoking a certain [Root.GetDWDemonTerm]. A few weeks back, our kin managed to procure an ancient clay tablet with the missing incantation. We stand ready now to attain powers undreamed of by mortal [Root.GetMenWomen]...
translation: 一段时间以来，我置身[Root.GetDWBrethrenType]的[From.GetSisterBrother]，[From.GetBestNameWithoutRegnalNumber]和我一直在研究调用某个[Root.GetDWDemonTerm]的正确仪式。几个星期前，我们的亲属设法采购到了一块记有遗失符咒的古老粘土板。我们现在准备好获得凡夫俗子未曾想象过的力量……

original: For some time now, my dear [GetFromRelation] and [From.GetSisterBrother] in [Root.GetDWBrethrenType], [From.GetFirstName] and I have been researching the proper ritual for invoking a certain [Root.GetDWDemonTerm]. A few weeks back, our brethren managed to procure an ancient clay tablet with the missing incantation. We stand ready to attain powers undreamed of by mortal [Root.GetMenWomen]...
translation: 一段时间以来，我亲爱的置身[Root.GetDWBrethrenType]的[GetFromRelation]和[From.GetSisterBrother]，[From.GetFirstName]和我一直在研究祈求某个[Root.GetDWDemonTerm]的正确仪式。几个星期前，我们的同党设法采购到了一块记有遗失符咒的古老粘土板。我们现在准备好获得凡夫俗子未曾想象过的力量……

original: Unlimited Power!
translation: 无限的力量！

original: Summoning rituals of this magnitude carry serious risks...
translation: 如此大规模的召唤仪式会有严重风险……

original: We should think this through...
translation: 我们应该好好想想……

original: A Grand Summoning
translation: 一次伟大的召唤

original: Our coven surrounds the summoning circle, the correct symbols drawn, the fatty candles burning a sickly green. [From.GetFirstName] intones the final invocation just as I offer up the sacrifice... Distracted by the spurting blood, at first I don't notice the man standing in the circle like he was there all along. Looking straight at me with a smirk, he says 'Bravely done, child! You have no understanding of the forces you are meddling with, but I did find your sacrifice pleasing. Quid pro quo – name your desire, [Root.GetBoyGirl]...'
translation: 我们的秘社围绕着召唤圈，在脂肪蜡烛燃烧产生的惨绿色光中绘制正确的符号。当我献祭时，[From.GetFirstName]吟诵起最后的祷文……我被喷涌的鲜血分心，起初竟没有注意到那个男人站在圆圈里，就像他一直在那里一样。他直视着我，嘻笑说：「你很勇敢，孩子！你不了解你正在操弄的力量，但我确实觉得你的牺牲令人愉快。等价交换——说出你的愿望，[Root.GetBoyGirl]……」

original: Great Lord, I seek power!
translation: 伟大的神啊，我追求力量！

original: Our coven surrounds the summoning circle, the correct symbols drawn, the fatty candles burning a sickly green. [From.GetFirstName] intones the final invocation just as I offer up the sacrifice... but I bungle the cut and the drugged child starts screaming. The dagger slips from my bloody hands when I hear the insane laughter issuing forth from the circle: 'Pathetic cattle! You are playing with forces you cannot comprehend! Learn your place!' Pandemonium erupts as a fiery figure flashes into being and then starts to fade away. Some brethren start crying or shrieking, others try to kill each other. One sister is trying to poke her own eyes out right in front of [From.GetFirstName], who just stands there, drool running down the corner of [From.GetPossPronoun] mouth.
translation: 我们的秘社围绕着召唤圈，在脂肪蜡烛燃烧产生的惨绿色光中绘制正确的符号。在我开始献祭时候[From.GetFirstName]吟诵最后的咒文……但是我弄坏了伤口，麻醉的孩子开始尖叫。匕首从我血淋淋的手上滑落，突然我听到从圆圈里发出的疯狂的笑声：「可怜的犊子！你在玩弄你无法理解的力量！认清你的身份！」随着这个炽热的身影闪现，然后开始消逝，混乱爆发了。一些兄弟开始哭泣或尖叫，其他人试图自相残杀。一个姐姐正试图在[From.GetFirstName]面前戳瞎自己的眼睛，而那个人刚才还站在这里，现在[From.GetPossPronoun]嘴角却在流口水。

original: Pray kill my rival, [rival_1.GetTitledName]!
translation: 请杀了我的仇人，[rival_1.GetTitledName]吧！

original: Pray kill my rival, [rival_2.GetTitledName]!
translation: 请杀了我的仇人，[rival_2.GetTitledName]吧！

original: I feel terrible!
translation: 我感觉糟透了！

original: A foul miasma spreads throughout [Root.Location.GetName].
translation: 一股肮脏的瘴气传播到了[Root.Location.GetName]。

original: Not my manhood!
translation: 不，我的命根子！

original: Duh? I can't... think...
translation: 嗯？我不能……思考……

original: We won't be able to keep this a secret...
translation: 我们不能保守这个秘密……

original: The laughter... it's in my head now!
translation: 笑声……现在就在我脑子里！

original: This is all [From.GetFirstName]'s fault!
translation: 这都是[From.GetFirstName]的错！

original: While enjoying a quiet snack in my study, I suddenly felt an irresistible urge to jump out the window. Just like in a dream, I walked over and did it.
translation: 当我在书房里享受一顿安静的零食时，我突然感觉到一股要跳出窗外的无法抗拒的冲动。就像在梦里，我走过去然后做了这件事。

original: AAAAaahh...
translation: 啊啊啊……

original: [FromFrom.GetBestNameWithoutRegnalNumber], my [FromFrom.GetSisterBrother] in [Root.GetDWBrethrenType], wants me to join [FromFrom.GetObjectPronoun] for a lark over in [From.GetName]. There is a certain [From.Religion.GetPriestTitle] and would-be witch hunter who has been a thorn in our side for some time. It is time to teach the arrogant fool a lesson in manners...
translation: [FromFrom.GetBestNameWithoutRegnalNumber]，我置身[Root.GetDWBrethrenType]的[FromFrom.GetSisterBrother]，想要我加入[FromFrom.GetObjectPronoun]来戏弄一下[From.GetName]。那里有一个[From.Religion.GetPriestTitle]，梦想成为女巫猎人的宗教狂热分子，是我们的眼中钉。是时候给这个目中无人的蠢货上一堂「礼仪课」了……

original: My [GetFromFromRelation], [FromFrom.GetFirstName], wants me to join [FromFrom.GetObjectPronoun] for a lark over in [From.GetName]. There is a turbulent [From.Religion.GetPriestTitle] there who has been antagonizing [Root.Society.GetName] for quite some time. It is time to teach the arrogant fool a lesson in manners...
translation: 我的[GetFromFromRelation]，[FromFrom.GetFirstName]，想让我加入[FromFrom.GetObjectPronoun]来戏弄一下[From.GetName]。那里有一个狂热的[From.Religion.GetPriestTitle]，他已经与[Root.Society.GetName]对抗了相当长的一段时间。是时候给这个目中无人的蠢货上一堂「礼仪课」了……

original: Time to dust off my acting skills!
translation: 开演之时已至！

original: That is outside my Realm so we can safely stir up some real trouble!
translation: 这不是我自己的领土，所以我们可以安全地挑起一些真正的麻烦！

original: I don't like it...
translation: 我不喜欢这个……

original: We found the zealous [FromFromFrom.Religion.GetPriestTitle] in [FromFromFrom.GetName], praying in seclusion. [From.GetFirstName] snuck up from behind and gave the fool a hard kick in the head. As I gave a devotion to [Root.GetDWRandomDemon], [From.GetFirstName] proceeded to relieve [From.GetReflexivePronoun] on the comatose preacher. Then the butchery commenced...
translation: 我们在[FromFromFrom.GetName]找到了狂热的[FromFromFrom.Religion.GetPriestTitle]，那人正在隐居祷告。[From.GetFirstName]从后面悄悄摸过去，在背后给那傻瓜的头来了一脚踢击。当我为[Root.GetDWRandomDemon]献祭的时候，[From.GetFirstName]开始在昏迷不醒的传教士身上解手。杀戮正式开始……

original: Tour the countryside, masquerading as the [FromFromFrom.Religion.GetPriestTitle].
translation: 伪装成[FromFromFrom.Religion.GetPriestTitle]，游览整个乡村。

original: With baggy clothes and enough grime on the face, one of us can probably manage a passing likeness...
translation: 穿着宽松的衣服，脸上满是污垢，我们中的一个人伪装得非常像……

original: Host a decadent feast in the idiot's name!
translation: 以笨蛋的名义主持一场腐败的盛宴！

original: We shall discredit the local clergy with a party that will live in infamy!
translation: 我们将用一场充满罪恶的宴会来诋毁当地的教士！

original: Masquerading as the dead [From.Religion.GetPriestTitle] and attendant, we have been riding between every [Root.GetDWSettlement] and market in [From.GetName], preaching the 'Word of [From.Religion.GetHighGodName]' to the masses. Eager ears are picking up on our revolutionary message – the path to salvation requires self-indulgence and the rejection of so called authorities – especially the clergy!
translation: 假扮成死去的[From.Religion.GetPriestTitle]和随从，我们穿梭在每一个 [Root.GetDWSettlement]和[From.GetName]的市场里，向大众布道「[From.Religion.GetHighGodName]的话语」。人们热切的耳朵正在接收我们革命性的信息——拯救的道路需要自我放纵和拒绝所谓的权威——特别是神职人员！

original: [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap] will do the rest!
translation: [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodNameCap]将会完成剩下的工作！

original: [FromFromFrom.GetFirstName] and I staged a lavish feast in the abode of the dead [FromFromFrom.Religion.GetPriestTitle], taking care to only invite dignitaries who weren't well acquainted. The guests were shocked at the dancers, the half-naked musicians and the heady smoke from exotic 'incense', but when we brought in the prostitutes half the guests stood up and left – the other half were delighted!
translation: [FromFromFrom.GetFirstName]和我在死者[FromFromFrom.Religion.GetPriestTitle]的住处举行了盛大的宴会，只邀请那些不熟悉的贵宾。客人们对舞者、半裸的音乐家和来自异国情调的「香熏」的浓烟感到震惊，但当我们带妓女进来时，有一半的客人站起来离开了——另一半则高兴极了。

original: What will people think of your servants now, [From.Religion.GetHighGodName]!?
translation: 现在人们会怎样看待您的仆人，[From.Religion.GetHighGodName]？

original: My compatriot in the recent escapade to [FromFromFrom.GetName], [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], seems to have played a prank on me. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] appears to have told [local_ruler.GetTitledName] that I was behind the rabble rousing.
translation: 我那最近逃到[FromFromFrom.GetName]的同胞，[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]好像在对我恶作剧。看来[From.GetSubjectPronounCap]已经告诉[local_ruler.GetTitledName]我是幕后黑手。

original: We'll see who gets the last laugh, [From.GetFirstName]...
translation: 看谁笑到最后，[From.GetFirstName]……

original: I just learned that my neighbor, [From.GetTitledName], has been stirring up the rabble in [local_province.GetName] with heretical nonsense!
translation: 我才得知我的邻居，[From.GetTitledName]，在[local_province.GetName]鼓动暴民，说些异端的胡话！

original: That scheming [GetRootFromInsult]!
translation: 那个诡计多端的[GetRootFromInsult]！

original: Decadent Clergy
translation: 腐化的神父

original: Songs of Anguish
translation: 痛苦之歌

original: My nights are plagued by terrible nightmares featuring the vile [dw_buddy.GetBestNameWithoutRegnalNumber], my rival [dw_buddy.GetSisterBrother] in [Root.GetDWBrethrenType]. [dw_buddy.GetSubjectPronounCap] howls and roars at me to the tune of infernal bagpipes while [Root.GetDWRandomDemon] looks on, bellowing with laughter. I am sure that [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] is sending me these dreams for a reason... I must prove myself worthy or be discarded as a weakling – such is the way of [Root.Society.GetName].
translation: 我的夜晚被可怕的恶梦折磨着，梦里有着[dw_buddy.GetBestNameWithoutRegnalNumber]，即我在[Root.GetDWBrethrenType]的仇人[dw_buddy.GetSisterBrother]。[dw_buddy.GetSubjectPronounCap]向我嚎叫咆哮，声调像极了地狱里的风笛，而[Root.GetDWRandomDemon]在狂笑着旁观。我确定[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]让我梦到这些是有原因的……我必须要证明自己的价值，否则就会被当作弱者抛弃——这就是[Root.Society.GetName]的准则。

original: Invite [dw_buddy.GetFirstName] over for some fun...
translation: 邀请[dw_buddy.GetFirstName]来玩玩……

original: No, dreams are just meaningless nonsense.
translation: 不，梦只是毫无意义的胡扯。

original: [This.GetSubjectPronounCap] will think this is an offer of reconciliation, but I'll have [This.GetObjectPronoun] scream for real...
translation: [This.GetSubjectPronounCap]认为这是一个双方和解的提议，但我会让[This.GetObjectPronoun]为他们所面临的困境而失声哭嚎……

original: Pretend to walk into this trap...
translation: 假装走进这个陷阱……

original: My treacherous rival is in for a very nasty surprise!
translation: 我那背信弃义的对手非常令人吃惊！

original: My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], declined my offer to lay our differences aside and have some harmless fun together. The [GetRootFromInsult] must have sensed my true intentions...
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]，拒绝了我搁置差异，一起享受些无害的乐趣的提议。那[GetRootFromInsult]一定是察觉到了我真正的意图……

original: Damnation!
translation: 该死！

original: As [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] arrived for our meeting, my servants threw a sack over [From.GetObjectPronoun] and beat the [GetRootFromInsult] into submission. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] is now snugly stowed into a brazen bull that I had built especially for this occasion. Surrounding the bull are some crucified scum from my dungeon, drenched in oil.\n\nIt took some work to find three genuinely insane musicians, but as they start up their demented tune and the fires are lit underneath the bull, I lean back and realize it was all worth it. As soon as the first bellows start issuing forth from the bull, I order the human candles lit. I close my eyes and hum along with the infernal choir, my nightmares conquered once and for all...
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]一来跟我见面，我的仆人就朝[From.GetObjectPronoun]身上套了一个口袋，并将[GetRootFromInsult]打到求饶。现在[From.GetSubjectPronounCap]被紧紧地塞进了我特别为这个场合建造的铜制的公牛里。围绕着公牛的是来自我地牢的被钉死的人渣，他们被浸在油里。\n\n我们花了好一些工夫去找到三位真正疯狂的音乐家，但是当他们开始他们痴迷的曲调并且公牛下面的火焰点燃时，我靠向后，意识到这一切都是值得的。第一声吼叫开始从公牛里传出，我马上点燃「人肉蜡烛」。我闭上眼睛，与地狱合唱团一起哼唱，我的恶梦一劳永逸地结束了……

original: These are the pleasures that await us all in Hell!
translation: 这就是在地狱等待着我们的全部快乐！

original: As [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] and I were making our way down to the [Root.GetDWSettlement] along a darkened trail, someone suddenly threw a sack over me and I was mercilessly pummeled until I lost consciousness. When I came to, I was hogtied and lying on the cold ground. My blindfold was roughly pulled off and I beheld a great brazen bull with firewood stacked underneath! Hooded characters forced me inside, with my mouth near a funnel of some kind. The hatch closed and soon I could hear demented music and chanting as the bull started to heat up. Please, [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], forgive me. Save my soul!
translation: 当[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]和我一起沿着幽暗的街道走到[Root.GetDWSettlement]时，突然有人将袋子套在我的头上，我被无情的殴打到失去了意识。当我醒来时发现我被捆绑着，躺在冰冷的地上。我的头套被粗鲁的拉开，我看到一只下面堆满了柴火的铜制的公牛！戴着兜帽的人强迫我进入铜牛中，让我的嘴巴靠近某种漏斗一样的东西。舱口关闭，很快我就听到发狂一样的音乐和咏唱，公牛开始被加热。请[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]宽恕我，拯救我的灵魂吧！

original: AAARRGH! AAAAH!
translation: 啊！啊！！啊！

original: As [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] and I were making our way down to the [Root.GetDWSettlement] along a darkened trail, someone threw a sack over me and knocked me about a bit. Playing along with the charade, I was whisked away and switched for another bundled up victim...\n\nLater, I watched from the shadows as [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] staged a demented musical ritual. [FromFrom.GetSubjectPronounCap] had brought an actual brazen bull, just like the one built for the Tyrant of Akragas in ancient times. Believing me to be inside, the [GetRootFromFromInsult] ordered the flames lit. With the bull heating up, oil was poured over a bunch of crucified prisoners and set on fire – human candles screaming in accompaniment to the bellows issuing forth from the bull. The fool never realized [FromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun] was cooking [FromFrom.GetPossPronoun] own [GetFromFromVsFromRelation], [From.GetFirstName]!
translation: 正当[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]和我沿着一条黑暗的小路前往[Root.GetDWSettlement]时，有人朝我罩上一个麻袋，并把我打了一顿。经过一番金蝉脱壳，我逃了出去，换成了另一个捆绑的受害者…… \n\n后来，我从阴影中看到[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]上演了一种疯狂的音乐仪式。[FromFrom.GetSubjectPronounCap]带来了一头真正的青铜公牛，就像在古代为阿克拉伽斯的暴君建造的一样。[GetRootFromFromInsult]以为是我在里面，命令点燃火焰。随着公牛升温，油被泼在一堆被钉十字架的囚犯身上并点上火——人肉蜡烛伴随着从公牛传出的嚎叫。这个傻瓜根本不知道[FromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun]正在烹饪[FromFrom.GetPossPronoun]自己的[GetFromFromVsFromRelation]，[From.GetFirstName]！

original: Hail [Root.GetDWRandomDemon]!
translation: [Root.GetDWRandomDemon]万岁！

original: Nemesis
translation: 报应

original: What is this box doing on my desk? Let's look inside... it's a bright white skull, gleaming like a jewel. Hmm, and there's a note: 'I really enjoyed the prank you tried to pull on me the other night! Good thing I wasn't actually in that bull... but, have you seen your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] lately? – Your old friend, [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal].'
translation: 这个盒子为什么会在我的桌子上？看看里面……这是一块明亮的白色头骨，闪闪发光像一颗宝石。嗯，还有一张纸条，写道：「我真的很喜欢这个恶作剧，你试图在那个晚上算计我！很好然而我可不在那只青铜公牛里……不过，你最近有没有见过你的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]？——你的老朋友，[FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]上。」

original: [FromFromFrom.GetFirstName]!!!
translation: [FromFromFrom.GetFirstName]！！！

original: You have increased your Martial skill (§G+1§!) while leading troops in battle in §Y[Root.Location.GetName]§!.
translation: 你在§Y[Root.Location.GetName]§!率领军队作战时军事技能得到了提升（§G+1§!）。

original: Your [Root.GetMyMarshalName], [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], has initiated a massive recruitment drive in §Y[From.Location.GetName]§!.
translation: 你的[Root.GetMyMarshalName]，[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]，开始在§Y[From.Location.GetName]§!大规模招募新兵。

original: Your [Root.GetMyTreasurerName], [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], has collected a special tithe in §Y[From.Location.GetName]§!.
translation: 您的[Root.GetMyTreasurerName]，[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]，已经从§Y[From.Location.GetName]§!课得了一笔额外的税款。

original: Your [Root.GetMyTreasurerName], [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], was wounded by angry peasants while collecting taxes in §Y[From.Location.GetName]§!!
translation: 您的[Root.GetMyTreasurerName]，[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]，在§Y[From.Location.GetName]§!收税时被一群愤怒的农民打伤了！

original: Your [Root.GetMyTreasurerName], [From.GetTitledName], was killed by a mob of angry peasants while trying to collect the extra taxes you had ordered.
translation: 您的[Root.GetMyTreasurerName]，[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]，在征收您指定的额外税时被一伙愤怒的农民杀死了！

original: You've regained some of the weight you lost – the food shortage is finally over!
translation: 你已经恢复了一部分你减少的体重——食物短缺终于结束了！

original: At least $VAL|Y$% of characters in the realm that:
translation: 领土内至少$VAL|Y$%的角色：

original: Less than $VAL|Y$% of characters in the realm that:
translation: 领土内少于$VAL|Y$%的角色：

original: No current quest
translation: 没有执行的任务

original: City build cost modifier
translation: 城市建造花费修正

original: Feudal build cost modifier
translation: 封建建造花费修正

original: Temple build cost modifier
translation: 神殿建造花费修正

original: Tribal build cost modifier
translation: 部落建造花费修正

original: City build time modifier
translation: 城市建造时间修正

original: Feudal build time modifier
translation: 封建建造时间修正

original: Temple build time modifier
translation: 神殿建造时间修正

original: Tribal Build time modifier
translation: 部落建造时间修正

original: Local City build cost modifier
translation: 本地城市建造花费修正

original: Local Feudal build cost modifier
translation: 本地封建建造花费修正

original: Local Temple build cost modifier
translation: 本地神殿建造花费修正

original: Local Tribal build cost modifier
translation: 本地部落建造花费修正

original: Local City build time modifier
translation: 本地城市建造时间修正

original: Local Feudal build time modifier
translation: 本地封建建造时间修正

original: Local Temple build time modifier
translation: 本地神殿建造时间修正

original: Local Tribal build time modifier
translation: 本地部落建造时间修正

original: Any artifact owned
translation: 任意拥有的宝物

original: No artifact owned
translation: 不拥有宝物

original: Is $TYPE|Y$
translation: 是$TYPE|Y$

original: Is §RNOT§! $TYPE|Y$
translation: §R不是§! $TYPE|Y$

original: Is the same as $TARGET|Y$
translation: 与$TARGET|Y$相同

original: Is §RNOT§! the same as $TARGET|Y$
translation: 与$TARGET|Y$§R不§!相同

original: $TARGET|Y$ already owns a copy
translation: $TARGET|Y$已经拥有一个副本

original: $TARGET|Y$ does §RNOT§! already own
translation: $TARGET|Y$§R不§!曾拥有

original: Original owner: $OWNER|Y$
translation: 原拥有者：$OWNER|Y$

original: $ADJ$ $ARMY$
translation: $ADJ$$ARMY$

original: $HOUSE$ $DYN$
translation: $HOUSE$$DYN$

original: $DYN$ $NAME$
translation: $DYN$ $NAME$

original: $PREFIX$ $NAME$
translation: $PREFIX$ $NAME$

original: $PETTY$ $PREFIX$ $NAME$
translation: $PETTY$ $PREFIX$ $NAME$

original: $TRIBAL$ $PREFIX$ $NAME$
translation: $TRIBAL$ $PREFIX$ $NAME$

original: $TITULAR$ $PREFIX$ $NAME$
translation: $TITULAR$ $PREFIX$ $NAME$

original: $TRIBAL$ $PETTY$ $PREFIX$ $NAME$
translation: $TRIBAL$ $PETTY$ $PREFIX$ $NAME$

original: $TITULAR$ $PETTY$ $PREFIX$ $NAME$
translation: $TITULAR$ $PETTY$ $PREFIX$ $NAME$

original: $RELIGION|Y$ (§R$PARENT$ $HERESY$§!)
translation: $RELIGION|Y$（§R$PARENT$ $HERESY$§!）

original: $RELIGION|Y$ (§Y$REFORMED$ $PARENT$§!)
translation: $RELIGION|Y$（§Y$REFORMED$ $PARENT$§!）

original: Cleanse Dead Owner
translation: 净化死者

original: The previous owner of this [Root.GetHolding] has been dead for some time now. Time has come to rid the place of this foul spirit!
translation: [Root.GetHolding]曾经的主人已然长眠于地下。而今摆脱这个邪恶灵魂的时机已至！

original: Foolish Behavior
translation: 愚蠢的行为

original: This character made a fool of [GetHerselfHimself].
translation: 此角色[GetHerselfHimself]出丑了。

original: Arming Sword
translation: 武装剑

original: A common sword type worn by many in battle.
translation: 战斗中许多人装备的普通剑型。

original: Longsword
translation: 长剑

original: A longsword of fine steel. A capable sword that will inflict great damage on its foes.
translation: 一把精钢铸成的长剑，可以对敌人造成巨大的伤害。

original: Heartseeker
translation: 穿心剑

original: A high quality sword, known as Heartseeker. Named after its ability to pierce any armor, it is sure to bring enemies to a swift fate.
translation: 一把精良的角斗剑，以其能刺穿任何盔甲的能力命名被赐名为穿心剑，它肯定会让敌人迅速毙命。

original: Vengeance
translation: 复仇

original: Forged with the finest steel available, the sword was named Vengeance, to bring certain doom to any traitor.
translation: 剑用最好的钢材锻造，它被命名为复仇，将给任何背叛者带来注定的毁灭。

original: Fury
translation: 怒火

original: A great and magnificent sword known as Fury. Swift in hand-to-hand combat as well as battle, it is sure to bring victory to the one who wields it.
translation: 怒火是一把巨大而华丽的剑。它一定会给挥舞它的人带来胜利，无论是在决斗抑或战场中。

original: Scimitar
translation: 弯刀

original: A scimitar of finer quality than your common blade.
translation: 一把比普通长刀品质稍高的弯刀。

original: Fine Scimitar
translation: 精品弯刀

original: A well-forged blade that can stand against most weapons.
translation: 一把反复锻铸的剑刃，可以抵抗大多数武器。

original: The Golden Scimitar
translation: 黄金弯刀

original: Named The Golden Scimitar, it is a weapon of exceptional quality forged by a master craftsman. The handle is adorned with ornaments made of gold and jewels.
translation: 黄金弯刀由一个著名的武器大师锻造，它的手柄上饰有金饰珠宝饰物。

original: Scimitar of Fortune
translation: 幸运弯刀

original: A blade of the finest steel and a handle inlaid with gold. Named the Scimitar of Fortune, it is said to bestow the owner with luck.
translation: 这把被称作幸运弯刀的弯刀由精钢铸成，把手镶金，据说能给它的主人带来好运。

original: Scimitar of Conquest
translation: 征服弯刀

original: Forged by the best of craftsmen, the Scimitar of Conquest is a blade of victory and triumph. Both handle and hilt are covered in diamonds.
translation: 征服弯刀由最好的工匠打造，是一把象征着胜利和凯旋的宝刀，把手和刀柄上都镶有钻石。

original: Lance
translation: 长枪

original: A wooden lance with a metal tip attached, used by cavalry in combat.
translation: 一种带有金属尖端的木制长矛，在战斗中常被骑兵使用。

original: Two-handed Lance
translation: 双手长枪

original: With a longer lance, you can keep your distance from the enemy while still being able to strike a lethal blow.
translation: 有了长枪，你可以在与敌人保持距离的同时进行致命打击。

original: The Impaler
translation: 穿刺之枪

original: A heavy lance named The Impaler. The weight alone will allow it to impale any lightly armored opponent during a charge.
translation: 穿刺之枪是一杆沉重的枪，它的重量就确保了在冲锋时它能够刺穿任何轻装敌人的身体。

original: The Trident
translation: 三叉戟

original: Named The Trident, this lance is equipped with a long and heavy metal tip of the finest steel.
translation: 长枪被命名为三叉戟，配备了一个用最好的钢铸成的长而重的金属枪尖。

original: The Piercer
translation: 贯穿之枪

original: Crafted to be long, yet sturdy, The Piercer will make short work of any enemy foolish enough to stand in your way.
translation: 贯穿之枪被打造得长且坚固，这让任何敢于挡在你路上的敌人都看起来非常愚蠢。

original: Throwing Axe
translation: 投斧

original: A small and well-crafted axe commonly used in both melee combat and for throwing.
translation: 一种小而制作精良的斧头，通常用于近战和投掷。

original: Battle Axe
translation: 战斧

original: A larger battle axe is able to give more cleaving power, making it more effective against armored foes.
translation: 一把更大的战斧能够提供更多的劈砍能力，使它更有效地对付装甲敌人。

original: Cleaver
translation: 切割之斧

original: A mighty battle axe named Cleaver. The size alone will make it easy to shred your opponents with a single strike.
translation: 一把可怕的被称为切割之斧的战斧，它的大小让持有者很容易地用一次打击撕碎对手。

original: Ravager
translation: 蹂躏之斧

original: A long double bladed axe named Ravager. Crafted with high quality steel, the axe will wreak havoc among your enemies.
translation: 一把名叫蹂躏之斧的长双刃斧，这把精铁打造的武器将会在你的敌人中大杀四方。

original: Marauder
translation: 掠夺者

original: Named Marauder, this exceptionally light weighted and well-crafted battle axe allows you to lay waste to your enemies without getting exhausted yourself.
translation: 这把轻斧被赐名为掠夺者，这把非常轻巧而精良的战斧可以让你毫不费力地放倒敌人。

original: Mace
translation: 钉锤

original: A mace made of an iron head mounted on a wooden shaft.
translation: 一把由铁头安装在木轴上制成的锤子。

original: Iron Mace
translation: 铁钉头槌

original: A mace forged entirely out of iron that allow for more powerful blows.
translation: 一种完全用铁锻造的钉锤，使打击更有力。

original: The Foe Hammer
translation: 破敌之锤

original: The Foe Hammer is a gigantic and well-balanced two handed mace that will make short work of any foe, armored or not.
translation: 破敌之锤是一把巨大且平衡良好的双手重锤，无论你的敌人是否穿着盔甲，它都会很快干掉他们。

original: The Bone Breaker
translation: 碎骨锤

original: Known as The Bone Breaker, this two handed mace has a large and heavy head able to crush all opponents with its weight.
translation: 这把双手锤被称为碎骨锤，它又大又重的锤头可以用它的重量碾碎所有对手。

original: The Shatterer
translation: 破碎之锤

original: A large mace with spikes mounted on the head, named The Shatterer. For it will shatter your enemies, in both mind and body.
translation: 一把在锤尖装有尖刺的战锤，被人恐惧地称作破碎之锤，它会粉碎你的敌人，头脑和身体都是。

original: Self Bow
translation: 单弓

original: A bow made from a single piece of fine wood.
translation: 由一块上好木材制成的弓。

original: Composite Bow
translation: 复合弓

original: Composite bows are constructed with a wooden core, glued together with horn and sinew. Allowing for a smaller bow with greater power.
translation: 复合弓是用木芯构成，用角筋粘在一起制成的弓。这种工艺使得较小的弓具有更大的力量。

original: Silent Wind
translation: 寂静之风

original: A composite bow of the highest quality. It is named Silent Wind for being able to silently dispatch enemies.
translation: 一张品质最高的复合弓，被称做寂静之风，能够无声地让敌人毙命。

original: Lightning
translation: 闪电

original: Named Lightning, this bow fire arrows with incredible force. Killing opponents in an instant.
translation: 以闪电为名，这张弓能以令人惊讶的力量射出箭矢，在瞬间杀死对手。

original: Eagle
translation: 神鹰

original: Known simply as Eagle. This exceptional bow can strike enemies at great distances with considerable precision.
translation: 正如它的名字神鹰一样，这张特殊的弓能在极远的地方相当精确的打击敌人。

original: [Root.GetSocietyRankUpTooltip2]
translation: [Root.GetSocietyRankUpTooltip2]

original: Divine relic or not, finding artifacts is what I pay [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] for!
translation: 不管是否是圣物，找到它都是[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]的责任！

original: I will ensure [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] swims in money!
translation: 我会保证[relic_hunter.GetSheHe]拥有无尽钱财！

original: [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] has truly earned my favor!
translation: 我欠[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap]一个天大人情。

original: Everyone shall hear of [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] legendary achievements!
translation: 每个人都该听听[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]传奇故事！

original: Though an impressive find, finding artifacts is what I pay [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] for!
translation: 尽管是惊奇的发现，但探寻宝物是[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]收钱后的义务！

original: I will ensure [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] is richly compensated!
translation: 我保证[relic_hunter.GetSheHe]会得到丰厚的补偿！

original: [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] shall have my favor.
translation: 我欠[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap]一个人情。

original: Everyone shall hear of [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] impressive achievements!
translation: 各位应该听听[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]精彩故事！

original: Finding artifacts is what I pay [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] for!
translation: 寻找宝物是[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]的义务！

original: I will ensure [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] is suitably rewarded.
translation: 我保证[relic_hunter.GetSheHe]会得到合适的奖赏。

original: [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] has earned my favor, I suppose.
translation: 我想[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap]获得了我的人情。

original: Everyone shall hear of [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] achievements!
translation: 大家都该听一听[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]成就！

original: [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has finally returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] travels, and has brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a most remarkable, exquisite horn. It produces a tone unmatched in volume, instilling courage in the hearts of all who hear it. Could this be the Gjallarhorn of myth?
translation: [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle][relic_hunter.GetFirstName]终于从[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]旅途中回来了，[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]随身带着一个引人注目的精致号角。它产生的音量是无与伦比，在所有听到它的人心中灌输勇气。这是神话中海姆达尔的号角吗？

original: Andvari's Gift
translation: 安德瓦利之宝

original: The Hammer of the Thundergod
translation: 雷神之锤

original:
Proudly, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] strides into your throne room. With a flourish of [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] cloak [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] produces a heavy hammer from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] belt, placing it head-first at [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] feet. Kneeling before it, your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] solemnly proclaims: 'I have recovered the hammer of Thor, the Thundergod, himself!'

As you reach down for it you notice that it looks strange – unlike any craftsmanship you have encountered in your realm thus far. The haft is obviously shorter than it was intended to be, and as your fingers touch it is not hard to convince yourself of the surge of power coursing through your body. Surely this means you were meant to wield it!

Looking up, [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] still waits for you to speak...
translation:
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]骄傲地迈进你的王座室。[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]披风猎猎，[relic_hunter.GetSheHe]从[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]腰带上解下一柄沉重的锤子，把它头朝下放在[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]脚边。你的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]跪在它面前庄严宣布：「我找到雷神索尔的锤子了！」

当你伸手去拿它时，你注意到它看起来很奇怪——不像你在你的王国里遇到的任何宝物。锤柄显然比正常的要短。当你触碰它时，一股能量涌进你的身体。显然这意味着你被它认同了！

看上去[relic_hunter.GetFirstName]仍然等着你发话……

original: The Fetish of Souls
translation: 缚灵物神

original:
Having returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] long travels, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] comes up to you and pulls out a small, carefully-wrapped package from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] clothes. With an awe-struck gaze [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] removes the cloth wrapping and reveals a piece of strangely-formed bark.

'I have found the spirits of our ancestors...' [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] whispers reverently, handing it to you. Turning it the right way up, you immediately understand what [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] means. The bark has clearly taken the shape of not just one, but three distinct visages, each staring ominously into your soul. You can sense the connection with your forebears... And the power they no doubt offer you over others.

[relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has truly proven [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] worth today.
translation:
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]从[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]长途旅行回来后，来到你跟前，从[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]衣服里拿出一个包装仔细的小包裹。[relic_hunter.GetSheHe]带着敬畏的目光打开布包，露出一片奇怪的树皮。

「我找到了我们祖先之灵……」[relic_hunter.GetFirstName]恭敬地低语着，把它递给你。把它转到正确的方向后，你马上就明白了[relic_hunter.GetSheHe]的意思。树皮上有不只是一张，而是三张不同的脸，每一张都以不祥的眼神盯着你的灵魂。你能感觉到和你祖先的联系……他们无疑为你提供了超越他人的力量。

[relic_hunter.GetFirstName]今天确实证明了[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]价值。

original: The Mill of Fortune
translation: 三宝磨

original:
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] gently places a large box on the floor before you. As [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] men proceed to break it open, a single gold coin rolls falls to the floor through one of the box's widening cracks. [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] picks it up and hands it to you, smiling brightly. 'I have found you the Mill of Fortune!'

In the opened box you see a very well-made quern, and your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] continues [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] explanation. 'This is not the first time we have found coins near the Sampo on our way back here. Flour and salt, too... It seems one's fortunes increase just by being near it.'

Rolling the coin on your knuckles you ponder the importance of this find. [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] may have found you the means to create wealth from nothingness itself...
translation:
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]轻轻地将一口大箱子放在你面前的地板上。当[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]人试图打开它时，一枚金币从盒子开口处滚了出来，落在地板上。[relic_hunter.GetFirstName]捡起它后笑着递给你。「我发现了三宝磨！」

你在打开的盒子里面看到一个精致的手推磨，你的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]继续解释道。「这不是我们回来时第一次在三宝磨旁发现金币。也发现过面粉和盐……似乎在它旁边就能增加运气。」

硬币滚到你的脚踝旁，你思考者这个宝物的重要性。[relic_hunter.GetFirstName]也许帮你找到了从虚空中创造财富的办法……

original: The Axe of Perun
translation: 佩伦之斧

original:
The gathering of thick thunderclouds overhead accompanies [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]'s' return to your court, and, drenched, [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] kneels before you in your throne room, holding up a large axe for you in [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] hands. 'The axe, my [Root.GetLordLady], of Perun Himself...'

As you rise and step towards [relic_hunter.GetHerHim], you see the axe's fine quality, and the bolts of lightning clearly visible on the sides of the axe-head. You reach for it, and just as you grab hold and lift it from your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]'s hands a thunderclap can be heard in the distance. Surely this is a good omen!

Holding the imposing axe as if you were born to it, you look down at the awe-struck [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] who brought it to you...
translation:
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]在狂风暴雨中浑身湿透的回到你的宫廷，[relic_hunter.GetSheHe]跪在你的王座室里，手里拿着一把大斧头。「这把斧头，我的[Root.GetLordLady]，是佩伦的……」

当你站起来朝 [relic_hunter.GetHerHim]走去的时候，你看到斧头做工精良，斧头两侧的闪电也清晰可见。你向它伸过手去，就在你抓住它并把它从你的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]手中拿起来的时候，远处传来一阵雷鸣。这当然是个好兆头！

这把斧头似乎生来就该属于你，你低头看向为你带来这件宝物的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]……

original: The Axe of Perkunas
translation: 佩尔库纳斯之斧

original:
A proud [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] enters your throne room, a huge weapon on [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] shoulder. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] bows, and when [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] holds out the weapon you see it is a huge two-handed axe, the head of which is crafted out of stone... 'My search has been long and difficult,' your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] says, 'but what I bring you can be no other than the axe wielded by Perkunas himself!'

You take the axe and inspect it. It does indeed bear a striking resemblance to the description you've heard of it, from legend. It feels heavy and powerful in your hands, and though it might not be the perfect weapon in combat you definitely exude an air of authority around you while you wield it...

Your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle], at least, seems impressed, as [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] waits for you to speak.
translation:
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]骄傲地迈进你的王座室，[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]肩膀上扛着一件巨大的武器。[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap]向你鞠了下躬，当[relic_hunter.GetSheHe]举起武器时，你看到了一柄巨大的石头双手斧……「我的旅程艰难又漫长，」你的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]说道，「但我为您带来了佩尔库纳斯的斧头！」

你拿起斧头仔细检查。它确实与你从传说中听到的描述有惊人的相似之处。它在你的手中感觉沉重而有力，虽然它可能不是战斗中的完美武器，但当你挥舞它的时候，你不禁散发出一种威严之气……

这让你的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]留下深刻印象，但[relic_hunter.GetSheHe]仍然等着你开口。

original: The Yada Tashy
translation: 札答石

original:
Paired with a brief, but heavy downpour, a drenched [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] returns from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] lengthy travels. Once in your presence, [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] produces a small box, and opens it to reveal a beautiful, strange stone. With a broad smile [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] hands it to you. 'This... This stone is the Rain Stone... The Yada Tashy. It must be! Rain has followed our every step...'

You hold the stone in your hand, and ponder the earlier downpour's sudden onset. It makes sense! And with this stone, your lands' crops are all but assured to grow well. Other than the obvious benefit in food production, this should also make you more popular among your subjects.

The [relic_hunter.GetManWoman] who made it possible smiles at your elation, waiting patiently...
translation:
在一场短暂的暴雨中，湿透的[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]结束了[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]漫长旅途返回了。[relic_hunter.GetSheHe]一回来就掏出一个小盒子打开，里面装着美丽的奇怪石头。[relic_hunter.GetSheHe]带着灿烂的微笑递给我。「雨石……这一定是札答石。一定是！雨跟了我们一路……」

你握着石头，思考着刚才的突然降临的倾盆大雨。这是真的！有了这块石头，你领地里的庄稼就会长得更好。除了食物生产的明显好处之外，他还会使你更受欢迎。

实现这一切的[relic_hunter.GetManWoman]微笑着着你兴高采烈，耐心的等待着……

original: The time has come to end my wedlock with [dark_divorce_target.GetFirstName]: if not before [dark_divorce_spell_caster.Religion.GetHighGodName], then before [dark_divorce_spell_caster.GetDWDevil]! Secluding myself, I pray and chant within the confines of the symbols I prepared on the floor. Holding a lock of [dark_divorce_target.GetFirstName]'s hair in my hand, only a few more spoken lines are needed to complete the ritual...
translation: 是时候结束我与[dark_divorce_target.GetFirstName]的婚姻关系了：如果不能在[dark_divorce_spell_caster.Religion.GetHighGodName]面前，那就在[dark_divorce_spell_caster.GetDWDevil]面前结束！我把自己关了起来，开始在早先准备好的魔法阵中祈祷咏唱。手中握着一绺[dark_divorce_target.GetFirstName]的头发，只需要再念几句咒语，我就能完成这个仪式了……

original: Found Minor Artifact
translation: 找到小宝物

original: Found Medium Artifact
translation: 找到中等宝物

original: Found Major Artifact
translation: 找到大宝物

original: Extremely Disappointed
translation: 极度绝望

original: Received Reward
translation: 已接受赏赐

original: The Remains of the First Pope
translation: 圣伯多禄的遗骨

original:
At long last, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has come home from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] quest to find a powerful artifact. Holding a small metal box, your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] appears before you and, bowing, offers it to you. 'My [Root.GetLordLady], I have searched far and wide, and have found you the bones of Saint Peter, himself!'

Opening the box to sate your curiosity, you indeed find the aged bones and skull of a man, packed in the small space of the container. Properly protected from the elements, it is likely that they will continue to survive for a long time to come. And so long that they do, they will be sure to improve the Christian world's disposition towards you.

Seemingly expecting for you to speak, [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] waits patiently before you.
translation:
终于[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]带着一个强大的宝物从[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]任务中回来了。你的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]在你面前躬身将一个金属小盒献给你。「我的[Root.GetLordLady]，我找遍了世界，终于发现了圣伯多禄的遗骨。」

为满足你的好奇打开盒子，你确实发现一个男人的陈年遗骸和头骨包裹着放在容器的狭小空间内。这些骨头保存良好，未受自然环境的侵蚀，似乎还能继续存留许久。倘若如此，这些骨头必将提升你和整个基督教世界的关系。

[relic_hunter.GetFirstName]在你面前耐心的等待着，似乎在等你开口。

original: Returning from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] travels, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] an intriguing piece of clothing. My [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] gives me a seamless, finely-woven tunic, which [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] claims is none other than the one Jesus wore before his crucifixion!
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]从[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]旅途中返回时，[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]带回了一件有趣的衣服。我的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]给我一件无缝，精致的梭织外衣，[relic_hunter.GetSheHe]声称这是耶稣在钉上十字架前所穿的那件！

original: Returning from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] travels, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a small, ornate metal box. Within it lies a old woven crown of a particularly prickly plant... Surely this must be the Crown of Thorns Jesus himself wore on the cross!
translation: 我的[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]从[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]旅途中归来，[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]带着一个小而华丽的金属盒子。里面有一个古老的用有刺的植物编织的冠冕。这一定是耶稣基督在十字架上戴着的王冠！

original: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned, carrying with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a small box, within which lies a single, large, old-looking nail. My [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] ensures me that this is an ancient fragment of the True Cross! This will surely improve my standing in the Christian world.
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]回来了，[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]带着一个小盒子。盒子里静静地躺着一个又大又旧的钉子。我的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]告诉我这是真十字架的一部分！这肯定会提高我在基督教世界的地位。

original: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned carrying a small box. Inside it I find a small piece of preserved skin, which my [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] ensures is none other but the prepuce of Jesus himself!
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]回来了，[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]带着一个小盒子。盒子里面我发现了一小块保存完好的皮肤，我的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]保证这肯定是耶稣自己的包皮，而决不是别人！

original: [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has finally returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] travels, and has brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a small box containing a single fingerbone. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] ensures me that it belonged to a saint, and that therefore it is most prestigious to possess it.
translation: [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle][relic_hunter.GetFirstName]最终从[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]旅程中返回了，[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]带回一个装有一截手指骨的小盒子。[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap]声称这属于一个圣人，因此只有最有威望的人才能拥有它。

original: The Staff of the Sixth Day
translation: 第六日之杖

original:
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned, bearing a seemingly ordinary shepherd's staff. Holding it delicately, and clearly treating the simple object with devout respect, your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] hands it to you. 'I have found you the staff held by Moses, which split the Red Sea and produced water from naught but rock.'

Indeed, once you hold it is not hard to recognize it for the remarkable object that it is. Created by God Himself on the Sixth Day of Creation, he who holds it is sure to have God's favor!

Smiling as [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] sees the realization of the staff's potential power creep onto your face, [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] waits patiently for you to speak.
translation:
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]回来了，手里拿着一个看似普通的牧羊人手杖。[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]小心翼翼地握住它，并以虔诚尊敬的态度将它交给你。「我发现了摩西的手杖，它能劈开红海并且从石头中变出水来。」

一旦你握住了它，就不难认出它是多么不起的东西。上帝在创世的第六天创造了它，拥有它的人肯定会得到上帝的青睐！

当[relic_hunter.GetSheHe]看到权杖潜在的力量慢慢出现再你脸前，[relic_hunter.GetFirstName]微笑着，耐心地等着你开口。

original: The Harp of God's Musician
translation: 神乐手的竖琴

original:
Followed by one of [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] men, who carefully carries a beautiful harp, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] returns from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] long search. With a broad smile, [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] gives a sign for the man to hand you the instrument.

'What you hold in your hands, my [Root.GetLordLady], is what I have determined to be the actual harp played by King David, himself.' Running your fingers over the strings, the sound is almost divine! To have a talented musician play this instrument would undoubtedly put even the most cantankerous of visitors in a good mood.

You highly doubt it would work on [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] if you made [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] leave without a reward, though...
translation:
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]从[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]漫长探索中返回了，[reic_hunter.GetHerHis]身后跟着一个人，小心翼翼地拿着一支美丽的竖琴。脸上挂着大大的笑容，[relic_hunter.GetSheHe]给那个人做了个手势，让他把乐器递给你。

「我的[Root.GetLordLady]，我确信你手上拿着的就是大卫王本人弹奏过的竖琴。」你把手放在琴弦上，它的声音是如此神圣！一位才华横溢的音乐家演奏这台乐器无疑会让最狂躁的拜访者心情愉快。

但你十分怀疑如果你让[relic_hunter.GetFirstName]不拿报酬就滚蛋，这台竖琴是否会对[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]起作用……

original: Upon [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] return, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] hands me a small jewelry box within which lies a small, engraved, brass and iron signet ring. Its seal, I discover, is a Star of David, and my [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] says that all signs point towards this being the seal of King Solomon, himself!
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]一回来就递给我一个小珠宝盒，里面装着一个铜铁雕刻的小戒指。我发现印章是刻的是代表大卫的六芒星，并且我的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]说所有的证据都表明这是所罗门王的印章！

original: The Prophet's Seal
translation: 先知之印

original:
Having returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] artifact hunt, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] hands you a small ebony box. Within it, you find a crystal-encased, ivory-bordered seal.

'This is the seal used by the Prophet Muhammad', your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] says as you inspect the beautiful object. 'It must be, for it matches all depictions we have of the seal used on Muhammad's letters.' Not only will the Muslim world now surely look up to you, but you can henceforth also claim to write with the authority of Muhammad, himself!

Your [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] waits as you gaze at the seal, clearly expecting a reward...
translation:
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]从[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]寻宝旅程返回后递给你一个小乌木盒子。你在里面发现一个水晶包裹的象牙边印章

「这个印章曾经由先知默罕穆德使用，」你的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]在你检查这个美丽的珍品时说，「它肯定真的，因为它符合我们对穆罕默德信上所用印章的所有描述。」你现在不仅得到了穆斯林世界的尊重，而且你今后也可以声称自己继承了穆罕默德的权威！

在你凝视印章的时候，你的[relic_hunter.GetFirstName]在旁边等着你的奖赏。

original: The Prophet's Battle Standard
translation: 先知的战旗

original:
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] comes before you, proudly carrying a large, inspiring banner. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] does not need to speak for you to recognize it, for it has all the necessary signs allowing you to readily identify it as Muhammad's personal standard.

With it, you will not only be an inspiration to the men under your command, but also to the Muslim world as a whole. Holding it in your hands, you feel the connection to the Prophet, and you know that your men will fight like lions wherever it is seen.

As draw your gaze away from it, you see your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] is still standing there, waiting...
translation:
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]出现在你身前，骄傲地举着一面巨大的鼓舞人心的旗帜。[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap]没必要帮你去辨别它，因为它有代表穆罕默德本人身份的所有必要的标志。

有了它，你不仅会鼓舞你指挥下的人，而且也会鼓舞整个穆斯林世界。把它握在手中，你会感觉到与先知的联系，你知道你的人无论在哪里都会像狮子一样战斗。

当把你的目光从它上面移开，你看到你的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]仍然站在那里，等待着……

original: The Prophet's Blessed Mantle
translation: 先知的圣袍

original:
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] returns from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] search, followed by two men who carry a heavy, ornate gold box, which they place on the floor before you. Bowing, your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] proclaims: 'My search is concluded. I have brought home with me the Blessed Mantle – a gift from the Prophet Muhamad to the poet Zuhayr.'

Opening the box, you find the Mantle wrapped in forty pieces of richly-decorated cloth. The mantle itself is a beautiful buttoned white coat made from goat hair, sure to increase your standing in the Muslim world.

Pleased, your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] waits for you to speak...
translation:
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]从[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]搜索中回来了，后面跟着两个人，他们拿着一个厚重，华丽的黄金盒子，放在你面前的地板上。鞠躬后，你的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]说道：「我的搜索结束了。我已经把先知穆罕默德送给诗人祖海尔的一件礼物带回来了。」

打开盒子，你发现袍子被包在四十块装饰华丽的布里。袍子本身是一件由山羊毛制成带着漂亮纽扣的白色外套，一定会提高你在穆斯林世界中的地位。

你的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]兴奋的等着你的回话……

original: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned and brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a beautiful sword. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] has proof that it is one of the Prophet Mohammad's nine swords! Not only is it a finely-crafted blade, but it should also make men more eager to follow me in battle.
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]回来了，[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]带着一把漂亮的剑。[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap]有证据证明它是先知穆罕默德的九把剑之一！它不仅是一把精心制作的宝剑，而且还能让人们在战斗中更加紧密的团结在我的周围。

original: Returning from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] travels, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a small box within which lies an ancient piece of parchment – a letter addressed to an ancient foreign ruler. Age has not worn the letter past legibility, and so it is possible to clearly identify the signature of the Prophet Mohammad, himself!
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]从[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]旅途中回来了，[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]递给我一个小盒子，里面装有一张古老的羊皮纸——写给古代外国统治者的一封信。时间并没有使信件难以辨认，在信上能很清晰的看到先知默罕穆德本人的签名！

original: [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has finally returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] travels, and has brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a small glass reliquary. Inside, one can clearly see a single hair, which my [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] claims is a hair from the beard of the Prophet Muhammad, himself!
translation: [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle][relic_hunter.GetFirstName]最终从[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]旅程中返回了，[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]带回一个玻璃匣子。人们可以轻易地看到在里面有一根毛发，我的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]声称这是先知穆罕默德本人胡须上的一根毛发！

original: Upon [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] return, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] hands me a richly-decorated flask filled with some kind of liquid. According to my [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle], this is a flask of rose water that has been infused with holy power by dipping a single button of the Blessed Mantle into it. It purportedly has miraculous qualities!
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]一回来就递给我一个装满某种液体、装饰华丽的瓶子。据我的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]所说，这是一瓶用圣袍的一颗纽扣浸泡后注入入了神圣力量的玫瑰香水。据说它有神奇的功效！

original: The Cup of Jamshid
translation: 贾姆希德之杯

original:
At long last, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has come home from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] quest to find a powerful artifact. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] reaches in [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] satchel and produces a beautiful golden cup, which [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] hands to you.

'This can be no other than the Cup of Jamshid from myth,' your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] says, 'drink from it and the truth of this world and all seven heavens will be yours!' The significance of this find sinks in as you hold the cup and listen to your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]'s words... Properly utilized in a ritual of divination, this cup could indeed, if the legends are to be believed, provide you with the answers to many questions.

After a short while you realize [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] is still waiting...
translation:
终于，[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]在找到一件强大宝物后结束了[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]旅行回来了。[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap]从[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]包裹中拿出一个金杯子。[relic_hunter.GetSheHe]把它递给了你。

「这无疑是神话中贾姆希德的酒杯，」你的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]说道，「用它喝酒，人间和七重天的一切真相你都将知道！」你拿着酒杯，听着[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]讲解，好一会才理解到这项发现的重要性……如果传说可信的的话，在占卜仪式中适当地使用这个杯子，你将得到许多问题的答案。

过了一会你意识到[relic_hunter.GetFirstName]还在等你……

original: The Babr-e Bayan
translation: 虎皮衣

original:
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] comes before you, proudly carrying a large coat made of leopard-skin. Handing the garment to you reverently, your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] explains: 'After a long and arduous search, I have recovered the Babr-e Bayan – Rostam's legendary coat!'

Despite Rostam wearing it in many a war, you find no damage whatsoever on the dark-colored garment as you inspect it. This can only be interpreted as proof of its legendary invulnerability! Donning it yourself would certainly make you much less likely to come to harm in personal combat.

As you ponder this find's implications, your [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] is seemingly waiting for a reward...
translation:
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]来到你面前，骄傲地拿着一件由豹皮制成的外套。虔诚的把衣服交给你后，你的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]解释道：「经过漫长而艰苦的搜寻，我找到了传说中的罗斯塔姆皮衣。」

尽管罗斯塔姆穿着它进行了无数次战斗，但你在这件黑色的衣服上找不到任何伤痕。这正说明了传说的可信！如果你自己穿上它，那么你在战斗中受到伤害的可能性就会大大降低。

当你思考这一发现的含义时，你的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]似乎正在等着领奖赏……

original: Returning from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] travels, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] an unbelievable find! The Derafsh Kaviani, long thought to have been lost and destroyed when the Muslims invaded the Sasanian Empire, seems to have survived, and has now returned to its rightful Zoroastrian holders! This leather banner, in red, purple and gold, will hang beautifully in my throne room.
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]从[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]旅程中归来，[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]有一个难以置信的发现！长久以来被认为在穆斯林入侵萨珊帝国时丢失的卡维战旗似乎被重新发现，并且又回到了祆教徒手中！这面由红紫金构成的皮质战旗将漂亮的挂在我的王座室。

original: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned, carrying with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a box containing a small sapling of a strange bush. My [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] is convinced that this is a sapling that has sprouted from the divine Haoma bush, and surely, based on its strange looks, it cannot be anything else!
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]回来了，[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]带着一个装着一棵奇怪的灌木树苗的盒子。我的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]确信这是一株从神圣的豪麻灌木中发芽的树苗，当然，根据它的奇怪的外表，它不可能是别的东西了！

original: [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has finally returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] travels, and has brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a large, beautiful cypress branch. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] tells me that this is a branch of the mighty cypress tree that Zoroaster himself planted in Keshmar! Perhaps an equally mighty tree will sprout from it, here.
translation: [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle][relic_hunter.GetFirstName]最终从[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]旅程中返回，[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]带回来一株巨大美丽的柏树条。[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap]告知这是琐罗亚斯德本人种植在凯什马尔的柏树的枝条。也许在这里也会长出一棵同样高大的树木。

original: This jeweled circlet of gold has a central band of iron that was beaten out of a single Nail of the True Cross. It has been used for the coronations of the kings and queens of Lombardy, since.
translation: 这个镶有宝石的金环冠中间是一条铁带，由真十字架的一根钉子打制而成。自那时起，它就被用于伦巴第国王和王后的加冕礼中。

original: The burial shroud that Jesus was wrapped in upon his death. It still bears the clear image of a man, including a hauntingly-real imprint of a face.
translation: 耶稣死后埋葬的裹尸布。它仍然具有清晰的人形象，包括一个令人难忘的真实印记的脸。

original: Lance of Longinus
translation: 朗基努斯之枪

original: The spear that the Roman soldier Longinus thrust into the side of Jesus, as he hung from the cross, to ensure that Christ was dead. The miraculous combination of blood and water flowed from the wound and coated the lance.
translation: 罗马士兵朗基努斯以确保十字架上耶稣死亡而刺的长矛。血和水奇迹般地在伤口上结合，流淌在长矛上。

original: The chalice Jesus used at the Last Supper. Said to have contained the Blood of Christ after being taken down from the cross, it must surely possess magical powers!
translation: 耶稣在最后晚餐所用的酒杯。传说杯中盛满了被钉死在十字架后的基督之血，它一定拥有魔法的力量！

original: Holy Grail
translation: 圣杯

original: The chalice Jesus used at the Last Supper. Said to have contained the Blood of Christ after being taken down from the cross, it must surely possess magical powers!
translation: 耶稣在最后晚餐所用的酒杯。传说杯中盛满了被钉死在十字架后的基督之血，它一定拥有魔法的力量！

original: Nail of the True Cross
translation: 圣钉

original: A nail of the cross Jesus was crucified upon. To possess such a fragment of the True Cross is tremendously prestigious!
translation: 圣钉是历史上的把耶稣钉在十字架上的三或四颗钉子，拥有圣钉能大大提升你在基督教世界的威望！

original: This small iron box contains the remains of the apostle Peter, himself, by some considered to be the First Pope. To possess it is to be the envy of the Christian world.
translation: 这小铁盒子中容纳了使徒伯多禄的遗骸，他被视为为第一个教宗。占有他遗骸的人成为全基督世界的嫉妒对象。

original: The foreskin of Jesus Christ, cut and placed in an alabaster box of spikenard oil on the 8th day after his birth, so that it might be preserved. Thus, it is the only body part of Christ remaining on Earth, after his ascension into Heaven.
translation: 耶稣基督的包皮，在祂诞生的八天后，割下并存放在一个甘松香油涂抹的雪花石膏制的盒子里，所以才能被保存下来。因此，这是基督升天后身体唯一在地上的存留。

original: The crown of thorns that Jesus wore during his crucifixion. Once intended to mock Jesus' claims of divine authority, it now has become a symbol of precisely that.
translation: 耶稣在受难时戴的荆棘冠冕，用以蔑视耶稣宣称的天赋圣权，现在它恰恰变成了天赋圣权的象征。

original: The woven tunic that Jesus wore before his crucifixion. Rather than divide it into four parts, like Christ's other garments, the tunic was without seams, and so was kept whole by the soldiers who had crucified him.
translation: 耶稣在十字架前戴的一件编织的外衣。不是像耶稣基督的其他衣服一样把它分为四个部分，那件外套没有缝，所以被执行十字架钉刑的士兵们完全保留了下来。

original: The staff given to Moses by God, who had created it on the Sixth Day of Creation. It performed many miracles, such as splitting the Red Sea, producing water from rock, and possessing the ability to turn into a cobra.
translation: 上帝给予摩西的权杖，此杖在创世的第六天被创造。它展现了许多奇迹，比如分裂红海，从岩石中产出水，并拥有变成眼镜蛇的能力。

original: King David of Israel, before becoming a king, was an accomplished harpist at the court of King Saul. This is the harp he played, and even after all these centuries it is still a remarkable instrument.
translation: 大卫王在成为以色列国王之前，在扫罗王的宫廷里是一位有成就的竖琴师。这是他弹奏的竖琴，即使经过了几个世纪，它仍然是一个非凡的乐器。

original: This engraved, brass and iron signet ring sports the Seal of Solomon: a hexagram or Star of David. According to legend, it allows its possessor to command demons!
translation: 这枚雕刻的铜铁戒指印有所罗门的印章：六芒星或大卫之星。根据传说，它允许其拥有者指挥恶魔！

original: The Ark, crafted out of shittim wood at God's direction, containing the stone tablets of the Ten Commandments and a pot of manna.
translation: 约柜用上帝指定的皂荚木制成，装有十诫的石碑和一罐吗哪。

original: The white mantle of goat's hair given by the Prophet to the poet Ka'b bin Zuhayr. It was later sold by his children to Muawiyah I, the founder of the Umayyad dynasty.
translation: 先知给诗人卡尔布·本·祖海尔的白毛披风。后来，他的子孙将其卖给了伍麦叶王朝的创始人穆阿维叶一世。

original: By soaking the Blessed Mantle in rose water, it is possible to infuse the Mantle's essence into potable form. This water is said to have miraculous qualities!
translation: 被浸泡在玫瑰花水中的圣袍，它的浸泡使圣袍的精华溶入水中成为可饮用状态。据说这水有着不可思议的品质！

original: This is the seal the Prophet used to sign and seal any letters sent by him, so that none would doubt the author's identity.
translation: 这是先知用来签署和盖章信件的印记，以便没有任何人怀疑作者的身份。

original: The Sacred Standard of the Prophet, himself, sure to instill great courage in all God-fearing men upon the battlefield.
translation: 先知的神圣旗帜。他曾亲自带着它上战场，激励所有敬畏安拉的人。

original: A letter to a foreign king, penned and signed by the Prophet Muhammad, himself.
translation: 一封写给外国国王的信，由先知默罕默德本人写下并签字。

original: A clear glass reliquary that contains a single strand of hair from the beard of Muhammad, shaved after his death by the Prophet's favored barber.
translation: 一个透明的玻璃器皿装着从穆罕默德的胡须中提取出的一缕毛发，它被先知喜爱的理发师在死后剪下。

original: This golden cup, supported by a winged lion, is said to contain an elixir of immortality. It can also be used to divine deep truths both in this world and the Seven Heavens.
translation: 这个金色的杯子，由一只有翼的狮子支撑着，据说它含有长生不老药。它也可以用来在人间和七重天堂中探寻真理。

original: Zoroaster, himself, planted a great cypress tree in the area of Keshmar at least a thousand years ago. The tree's magnificence and size are legendary, and these qualities can be clearly observed within this branch.
translation: 至少一千年前，琐罗亚斯德在凯什马尔地区亲手种植了一棵巨大的柏树。这棵树的壮丽和大小千古流芳，在这根枝桠中可以清楚地观察到这些品质。

original: The legendary hero Rostam's dark leopard-skin coat. Worn above a suit of armor, it is said to be impervious to harm from weapons, fire, and water.
translation: 传说中的英雄罗斯塔姆的黑豹皮大衣。穿在一套盔甲之上，据说它刀枪不入，水火不侵。

original: A sapling of the divine Haoma bush, a fragrant golden-green bush that is said to grow on mountains. It can be consumed to aid healing, physical strength, alertness and awareness, and the cravings of the flesh.
translation: 神圣豪麻树的树苗，这个金绿色的芳香灌木据说生长在高山之上。它可以被用来帮助治疗，强身健体，提升反应力，并且还可以增强对肉体的渴望。

original: Mjolnir
translation: 雷神之锤

original: A strangely short-hafted hammer that looks as if it might have been flawed during production. It bears a striking resemblance to the hammer wielded by Thor, the Thundergod, as told in myth.
translation: 一把奇特的短柄锤，看起来可能在锻造的过程中有所缺陷。它与雷神索尔所挥舞的锤子有惊人的相似之处，就如同神话中所说的那样。

original: Andvaranaut
translation: 吸金指环

original: This beautiful golden ring seems to make wealth flood to its owner, though all know Andvari's Curse draws ever closer...
translation: 这枚美丽的金戒指似乎让财富不断地涌向它的主人，尽管所有人都知道安德瓦里的诅咒已越来越近……

original: Gjallarhorn
translation: 加拉尔号角

original: This magnificent horn produces an unmatched volume when blown. It matches closely the description of Heimdall's Gjallarhorn in myth.
translation: 这个精致的号角在吹奏时会产生无与伦比的音量。它与神话中海姆达尔的加拉尔号角的描述非常吻合。

original: The Fetish of Souls
translation: 缚灵物神

original: A piece of bark that has grown into the shape of a trio of visages. The trio's unsettling gazes pierce one's soul, almost as if some form of spirit still remains behind their eyes...
translation: 一片树皮，已经长成了三张脸的形状。三张脸使人不安的目光刺穿了一个人的灵魂，就好像某种形式的灵魂还在他们的眼睛后面……

original: Sampo
translation: 三宝磨

original: A strangely well-crafted quern, bearing a striking resemblance to the Mill of Fortune. It is said to be able to produce gold, flour and salt from nothing at all.
translation: 这是一个奇怪的精心制作的手推磨，与命运之磨有着惊人的相似之处。据说它能够凭空产生黄金、面粉和盐。

original: Axe of Perun
translation: 佩伦之斧

original: This exquisite bearded axe is adorned with the symbol of Perun himself: a lightning bolt. It seems to be the Thundergod's very own weapon!
translation: 这把精致的髯斧饰有佩伦自己的象征：闪电。这似乎是雷神的专属武器！

original: Axe of Perkunas
translation: 佩尔库纳斯之斧

original: Yada Tashy
translation: 札答石

original: This strange and beautiful stone is said to be able to summon rain. A prosperous harvest is all but assured for its holder!
translation: 据说这颗奇异美丽的石头能召唤雨水。为拥有者的作物丰收保证！
