original: The voices that have plagued me recently have begun to recede. Those who are close to me have told me they thought me possessed by a demon of sorts... But no more! What little voices remain seem to disappear whenever I clutch Solomon's ring. Perhaps it truly does hold power over demons?
translation: 最近困扰我的声音已经开始消退。那些亲近我的人告诉我，他们认为我被某种恶魔所占据……但是现在没有了！每当我抓住所罗门的戒指时，剩下的微小声音似乎消失了。也许它真的能控制恶魔？

original: No demon shall hold sway over me!
translation: 没有魔鬼能掌控我！

original: Alas! It was just a brief interval of lucidity...
translation: 哎呀！那只不过是短暂的清醒……

original: Since I possess the Blessed Mantle, it would certainly be possible to instill a portion of the Mantle's power into drinkable form. This could be done through a ritual involving soaking the garment in an infusion of rose water, and catching the water that is wrung from it in bottles. To do it right, the ritual would have to be quite expensive, however...
translation: 既然我拥有了圣袍，就有可能把圣袍的一部分能量灌输成可饮用的形式。这可以通过一种仪式来完成，步骤包括将衣服浸泡在玫瑰的浸液中，并从瓶子中获得被榨出的水。要做到完美无瑕，仪式一定要花费昂贵，但是……

original: This sounds like an excellent idea!
translation: 这听起来是个绝妙的主意！

original: No, this sounds too expensive.
translation: 不，听起来太贵了。

original: This mysterious axe has a purple sheen, and has the strange symbols '+' and '2' engraved in the handle. It seems to be of quite... epic... workmanship, compared to regular weaponry.
translation: 这把神秘的斧头泛着紫色的光泽，手柄上刻着奇怪的「+」号和「2」号。与其他常规的武器相比，它的做工看起来……宛如史诗。

original: Strange Chest
translation: 奇怪的箱子

original: This strange chest has been made out of an unknown type of metal. Despite not being able to open it, you can clearly tell the chest is not empty.
translation: 这个奇怪的箱子是由一种未知的金属制成的。尽管不能打开它，你可以清楚地知道箱子里不是空的。

original: This aberration of a weapon must be destroyed!
translation: 这种畸变的武器必须被摧毁！

original: The Necronomicon
translation: 《死灵之书》

original: A mysterious book dealing about the strange spheres beyond. Many strange and unholy truths are recorded on its pages...
translation: 一本神秘的书，讲述着不可名状的领域。许多奇怪和邪恶的真理被记载在它的书页上……

original: Finger of St. John
translation: 圣若翰的指骨

original: A finger belonging to St. John the Baptist. St. John was a prophet of the Messiah, and was also the one to baptize Jesus.
translation: 一个属于洗者圣若翰的指骨。圣若翰是默西亚的先知，也是施洗耶稣的人。

original: Head of a [This.GetArtifactSourceCap]
translation: [This.GetArtifactSourceCap]的头骨

original: The venerated head of a [This.GetArtifactSource]. It once contained great wisdom.
translation: 这是可敬的[This.GetArtifactSource]的头骨，它曾经饱含智慧。

original: Tongue of a [This.GetArtifactSourceCap]
translation: [This.GetArtifactSourceCap]的舌头

original: The venerated tongue of a [This.GetArtifactSource]. It once spoke many eloquent truths.
translation: 这是可敬的[This.GetArtifactSource]的舌头，它曾道出无数有说服力的真理。

original: Tongue of an Unbeliever
translation: 异教徒的舌头

original: The despised tongue of a foul unbeliever. It once spread lies and deceit.
translation: 这是一个卑鄙的异教徒的舌头。它曾传播谎言和欺诈。

original: Hand of a [This.GetArtifactSourceCap]
translation: [This.GetArtifactSourceCap]的手

original: The venerated hand of a [This.GetArtifactSource]. It once held mighty weapons, winning him great victories.
translation: 这是可敬的[This.GetArtifactSource]的手，它曾经握着强大的武器，使主人所向披靡。

original: Arm of a [This.GetArtifactSourceCap]
translation: [This.GetArtifactSourceCap]的手臂

original: The venerated arm of a [This.GetArtifactSource]. It once held a scepter in just rule.
translation: 这是可敬的[This.GetArtifactSource]的手臂，它曾握着公正的权杖。

original: Foot of a [This.GetArtifactSourceCap]
translation: [This.GetArtifactSourceCap]的脚

original: The venerated foot of a [This.GetArtifactSource]. It once bore him on many long travels.
translation: 这是可敬的[This.GetArtifactSource]的脚，它曾与主人一同走遍天下。

original: Ancient Rusty Weapon
translation: 古老的生锈武器

original: An ancient, but rusty weapon. It once belonged to a great hero, but is now only fit for display in a collection.
translation: 古老而已生锈的武器。它曾经属于一位伟大的英雄，而如今只能作为一件展品。

original: Chains of St. Peter
translation: 圣伯多禄之链

original: The chains that held St. Peter in Herod's dungeon, until the saint was released and led to freedom by an angel.
translation: 圣伯多禄被希律王囚禁在地牢所用的铁链。后来圣伯多禄被一名天使解救。

original: Right Hand of St. Demetrius
translation: 圣德米特里的右手

original: The right hand of St. Demetrius of Thessaloniki, one of the patron saints of Crusades. He blessed Nestor so the man might defeat the pagan giant Lyaios, for which both were executed.
translation: 来自塞萨洛尼基的圣德米特里的右手，是十字军远征的守护神之一。他祝福了涅斯托尔，使他能打败异教徒巨人莱亚奥斯，为此他们都被处死了。

original: Veil of Veronica
translation: 维罗尼卡的面纱

original: The cloth used to wipe Jesus' face clear of blood and sweat. The Sudarium still bears the image of the face of Jesus Christ.
translation: 用来擦拭耶稣脸上的血和汗的圣帕。圣帕上依然具有耶稣的脸的形象。

original: Image of Edessa
translation: 埃德萨圣像

original: A piece of cloth on which the face of Jesus was imprinted. King Abgar of Edessa received it from Christ to cure him of an illness.
translation: 一块印有耶稣面部的布，是耶稣为了给埃德萨国王阿布加治病而送给他的。

original: Remains of St. Cessianus
translation: 圣凯西亚努斯的遗骨

original: A small box containing the bones of a child. They belong to Cessianus, who was murdered at the age of eight during the persecutions of Roman Emperor Diocletian.
translation: 一个装有儿童遗骨的小盒子。这是凯西亚努斯的遗骨，他在八岁时被罗马皇帝戴克里先迫害而牺牲。

original: Weeping Statue
translation: 哭泣的雕像

original: A statue of the Virgin Mary. Every now and then, a drop of water or even blood will trickle down from the statue's eyes, in what can only be described as a miracle.
translation: 一尊圣母玛利亚雕像。它的眼睛每时每刻都在滴水甚至滴血，这只能解释为奇迹。

original: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned and brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a well-preserved head. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] has proof that it once belonged to a [This.GetArtifactSource]! Perhaps it might bestow upon me some of the wisdom it once contained?
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]回来了，[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]带着一颗完好的头。[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap]有证据证明它曾经属于[This.GetArtifactSource]！也许它能赐予我前人的智慧？

original: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned and brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a well-preserved tongue. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] has proof that it once belonged to a [This.GetArtifactSource]! Perhaps it might bestow upon me some of the eloquence it once possessed?
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]回来了，[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]带着一颗完好的头。[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap]有证据证明它曾经属于[This.GetArtifactSource]！也许它能赐予我前人的口才？

original: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned and brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a well-preserved tongue. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] has proof that it once belonged to an infamous unbeliever! Perhaps it might bestow upon me some of penchant for deceit its owner once possessed?
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]回来了，[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]带着一条完好的舌头。[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap]有证据证明它曾经属于一个怀疑论者！也许它能给我一些它的主人的欺诈能力？

original: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned and brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a well-preserved hand. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] has proof that it once belonged to a [This.GetArtifactSource]! Perhaps it might guide my hand when next I find myself in battle?
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]回来了，[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]带着一颗完好的头。[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap]有证据证明它曾经属于[This.GetArtifactSource]！也许它能在我下次战斗的时候帮我一把？

original: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned and brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a well-preserved arm. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] has proof that it once belonged to a [This.GetArtifactSource]! Perhaps it might bestow upon me some of the knowledge of statecraft its owner once possessed?
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]回来了，[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]带着一只完好的手臂。[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap]有证据证明它曾经属于[This.GetArtifactSource]！也许它能赐予我一些管理封地的知识？

original: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned and brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a well-preserved foot. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] has proof that it once belonged to a [This.GetArtifactSource]! It helped its owner to travel far and wide, but now it will go nicely in my collection...
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]回来了，[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]带着一只完好的脚。[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap]有证据证明它曾经属于[This.GetArtifactSource]！也许它的主人能靠它步行万里，但现在它会是我的一件不错的藏品……

original: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned and brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] an ancient, rusty sword. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] has proof that it once belonged to a [This.GetArtifactSource]! By adding it to my collection, it will surely make me the envy of the known world!
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]回来了，[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]带着一把古老的生锈的剑。[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap]有证据证明它曾经属于 [This.GetArtifactSource]！把它添加进我的收藏，这肯定会让我成为世人羡慕的对象！

original: Returning from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] travels, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a small box within which lie a pair of ancient iron manacles and chains. These, [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] claims, once held Saint Peter in Herod's dungeon!
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]从[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]旅途中回来了，[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]带回了一个装着古老的铁手铐和铁链的小盒子。[relic_hunter.GetSheHe]声称希律王曾经用这些锁链把圣伯多禄关在地牢里！

original: [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has finally returned from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] travels, and has brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a small metal box. Inside lies a mummified hand, which my [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] claims belonged to Saint Demetrius!
translation: [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle][relic_hunter.GetFirstName]最终从[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]旅程中返回。[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]带回来一个小金属盒，里面放着一个干瘪的手，[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap]声称它属于圣德米特里！

original: Upon [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] return, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] hands me a richly-decorated frame, containing a piece of cloth with a clear outline of a face. According to my [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle], this is the cloth used by Veronica to wipe the blood and sweat from Jesus' face as he bore the cross!
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]一回来就递给我一个装饰华丽的框架，里面有一块布，上面印着一张清晰的人脸。根据我的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]所说，这耶稣背负十字架行走时维罗妮卡用来擦拭他脸上的血和汗水的圣帕。

original: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned and brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] an old metal box. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] has proof that the bones within it once belonged to St. Cessianus, who was martyred in Diocletian's Great Persecution.
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]回来了，[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]带着一个旧金属盒子。[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap]有证据证明里面的骨头曾经属于被戴克里先迫害而死的圣凯西亚努斯。

original: Returning from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] travels, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a beautiful wooden statue of the Virgin Mary. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] claims that every so often, the statue miraculously cries tears of water or even blood!
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]从[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]旅途中回来了，[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]带回了一尊漂亮的圣母玛利亚木质雕像。[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap]声称这尊雕像常常奇迹般地流泪，甚至是血泪！

original: Upon [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] return, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] hands me a richly-decorated frame, containing a piece of cloth with a clear outline of a face. According to my [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle], this is the miraculous image of Jesus sent by Christ to King Abgar of Edessa to cure him of an illness!
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]一回来就递给我一个装饰华丽的框架，里面有一块布，上面印着一张清晰的人脸。根据我的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]所说，这是治好埃德萨王阿布加疾病的的耶稣基督圣像！

original: Cloak of Mohammad
translation: 穆罕默德的斗篷

original: A cloak that has been worn by the Prophet Mohammad. This alone is reason enough to accord it a shrine of the highest importance!
translation: 先知穆罕穆德穿过的外衣。仅凭这个原因，它就值得放在最重要的神龛中。

original: Upon [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] return, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] hands me an old, but beautifully-made cloak. According to my [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle], it was worn by the Prophet, himself! Showing it to the populace at times of unrest might well help calm them down...
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]一回来就递给我一个老旧但漂亮的披风。根据我的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]所说，这是先知本人穿过的。在动乱时期向民众展示它很可能有助于让他们平静下来……

original: Tooth of Mohammad
translation: 穆罕默德的牙齿

original: A tooth that once belonged to Mohammad. It was lost when the Prophet was struck by a battle axe at the Battle of Uhud.
translation: 一颗曾经属于穆罕默德的牙齿。它是先知在吾侯德战役中被一把战斧击中时掉落的。

original: Upon [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] return, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] hands me a tiny wooden box, containing a piece of cloth within which lies a single human tooth. According to my [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle], this is one of the four teeth Mohammad lost at the Battle of Uhud!
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]一回来就递给我一个小盒子，里面装着一颗用布包裹着的人类牙齿。根据我的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]所说，这就是穆罕默德在吾侯德战役丢失的四颗牙齿中的一颗。

original: Mohammad's Bowl
translation: 穆罕默德之碗

original: The bowl from which Mohammad drank soup prepared by his first wife Khadija.
translation: 穆罕默德喝他第一任妻子海迪彻为他煮的汤所用的碗。

original: Blessed Sandals
translation: 受祝福的凉鞋

original: The Prophet's sandals, said to bestow Mohammad's blessings on those who touch them.
translation: 先知穿过的鞋，据说寄寓着先知对触摸者的祝福。

original: Returning from [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] travels, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a simple bowl. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] claims that it is the very bowl from which the Prophet ate soup!
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]从[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]旅途中回来了，[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]带回了一个朴素的碗。[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap]声称这是先知穆罕默德用来喝过汤的碗！

original: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned and brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] a pair of very old sandals. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] has proof that they were once worn by the Prophet, himself! It is said they still bestow Mohammad's blessings upon those who touch them...
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]回来了，[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]带着一双旧凉鞋。[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap]有证据证明它曾经被先知穿过！据说它仍然可以给触碰它的人以默罕默德的祝福……

original: Cyrus Cylinder
translation: 居鲁士文书

original: A clay cylinder praising the Persian King Cyrus as the rightful conqueror and benefactor of Babylon, and describing how he rebuilt its walls, temples and sanctuaries. An inspiration for all Persian rulers!
translation: 一块圆柱形泥版，赞美居鲁士大帝为合法的征服者，使巴比伦人民受益，并描述了他如何重建城墙、神庙和庇护所。这对所有波斯统治者都是振奋人心的！

original: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned and brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] an ancient clay cylinder, covered in inscriptions. When translated, they speak of King Cyrus's rightful conquest of the city of Babylon, and how he was a great benefactor of the Babylonian people. Being a Persian ruler, like Cyrus, this is welcome reinforcement of my right to rule!
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]回来了，[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]带回了一个古老的黏土圆柱，上面写着铭文。翻译之后发现上面记载着居鲁士大帝对巴比伦的合法征服以及对巴比伦人民的伟大恩情。作为一个如同居鲁士一样的波斯统治者，这能够增加我统治的合法性！

original: The Tabernacle
translation: 会幕

original: A portable tent and place of worship that served the Israelites from the time of the Exodus to their conquest of the Promised Land.
translation: 以色列人从出埃及到征服应许之地期间使用的便携帐篷兼朝拜场所。

original: King David's Sling
translation: 大卫王的投石索

original: The sling that King David used to fell the giant Goliath in personal combat.
translation: 大卫王与巨人歌利亚搏斗时打倒后者的投石索。

original: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] has returned and brought with [relic_hunter.GetHerHim] an large wagon willed in ancient cloth and poles. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] claims that this is the famed Tabernacle that our ancestors used on their way to the Promised Land!
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]回来了，[relic_hunter.GetHerHim]带着一辆马车，这辆车用古老的布料和木杆做成。[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap]声称这是我们祖先前往应许之地时携带的约柜！

original: Upon [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] return, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] hands me a small wooden box, containing a well-made leather sling. According to my [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle], this is the very sling King David used to defeat Goliath!
translation: [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]一回来就递给我一个小盒子，里面装着一个制作精良的弹弓。根据我的[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle]所说，这就是大卫王击败歌利亚所用的弹弓！

original: Wonderful news!
translation: 好消息！

original: Hmm, interesting.
translation: 嗯，有趣。

original: Laying waste to [target_title.GetName] [target_title.GetHolding] in [target_location.GetName] wasn't enough for the underhanded [looter.GetTitledFirstName]... [looter.GetHerHisCap]'s troops also managed to find and steal one of my prized possessions!
translation: 毁掉在[target_location.GetName]的[target_title.GetName][target_title.GetHolding]不足以满足[looter.GetTitledFirstName]这个卑鄙小人……[looter.GetHerHisCap]部队还设法找到并偷走了我的珍贵财宝！

original: Oh no...
translation: 哦，不……

original: [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] be praised!
translation: 赞美[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]！

original: One less imitation to worry about!
translation: 又少了一个冒牌货！

original: Excellent. It will go nicely in my collection.
translation: 很好，我会收藏它的。

original: That'll teach 'em!
translation: 那件事会给他们一个教训！

original: Laying waste to [target_title.GetName] [target_title.GetHolding] in [target_location.GetName] wasn't enough for the dastardly [looter.GetTitledFirstName]... [looter.GetHerHisCap]'s troops also managed to find and steal a priceless relic!
translation: 毁掉在[target_location.GetName]的[target_title.GetName][target_title.GetHolding]不足以满足[looter.GetTitledFirstName]这个卑鄙小人……[looter.GetHerHisCap]部队还设法找到并偷走了无价的遗物！

original: Laying waste to [target_title.GetName] [target_title.GetHolding] in [target_location.GetName] wasn't enough for the dastardly [looter.GetTitledFirstName]... [looter.GetHerHisCap]'s troops also managed to find priceless relic. [looter.GetFirstName], however, claims it was an imitation, and had it destroyed!
translation: 毁掉在[target_location.GetName]的[target_title.GetName][target_title.GetHolding]不足以满足[looter.GetTitledFirstName]这个卑鄙小人……[looter.GetHerHisCap]部队还设法找到了无价之宝。然而，[looter.GetFirstName]宣称这是一件赝品，并将它毁掉了！

original: Laying waste to [target_title.GetName] [target_title.GetHolding] in [target_location.GetName] wasn't enough for the dastardly [looter.GetTitledFirstName]... [looter.GetHerHisCap]'s troops also managed to find a priceless relic, and it is now in the hands of foul barbarians!
translation: 毁掉在[target_location.GetName]的[target_title.GetName][target_title.GetHolding]不足以满足[looter.GetTitledFirstName]这个卑鄙小人……[looter.GetHerHisCap]部队还设法找到了无价之宝。现在是时候收拾这些下作的野蛮人了！

original: Laying waste to [target_title.GetName] [target_title.GetHolding] in [target_location.GetName] wasn't enough for the dastardly [looter.GetTitledFirstName]... [looter.GetHerHisCap]'s troops also managed to find priceless relic. The honorless barbarian scum promptly had it destroyed!
translation: 毁掉在[target_location.GetName]的[target_title.GetName][target_title.GetHolding]不足以满足[looter.GetTitledFirstName]这个卑鄙小人……[looter.GetHerHisCap]部队还设法找到了无价之宝。毫无荣誉可言的野蛮人渣滓迅速地毁掉了它！

original: The thieving scum!
translation: 这偷东西的混蛋！

original: But... It was clear mine was the original!
translation: 不过……很明显我的藏品是真品！

original: The barbarian scum!
translation: 这野蛮的混蛋！

original: Have they no respect for the divine?!
translation: 他们难道不尊重神吗？！

original: At last it is held by someone who is truly worthy!
translation: 它最终好歹还是归属于一个值得拥有它的人！

original: This heretical imitation will no longer plague the world!
translation: 这种异端的赝品不再会祸害全世界！

original: It will become the centerpiece of my collection!
translation: 这是我收藏品中最出色的！

original: Let it be known that I am the scourge of the [original_item_owner.Religion.TrueReligion.GetName] world!
translation: 让全世界都知道我是[original_item_owner.Religion.TrueReligion.GetName]之鞭！

original: Laying waste to [target_title.GetName] [target_title.GetHolding] in [target_location.GetName] wasn't enough for the despicable [looter.GetTitledFirstName]... [looter.GetHerHisCap]'s troops also managed to find and steal one of my great artifacts of [original_item_owner.Religion.GetName]!
translation: 毁掉在[target_location.GetName]的[target_title.GetName][target_title.GetHolding]不足以满足[looter.GetTitledFirstName]这个卑鄙小人……[looter.GetHerHisCap]部队还设法找到并偷取了我的一件[original_item_owner.Religion.GetName]瑰宝！

original: Laying waste to [target_title.GetName] [target_title.GetHolding] in [target_location.GetName] wasn't enough for the dastardly [looter.GetTitledFirstName]... [looter.GetHerHisCap]'s troops also managed to find one of my great artifacts of [original_item_owner.Religion.GetName]. [looter.GetFirstName], however, claims it was an imitation, and had it destroyed!
translation: 毁掉在[target_location.GetName]的[target_title.GetName][target_title.GetHolding]不足以满足[looter.GetTitledFirstName]这个卑鄙小人……[looter.GetHerHisCap]部队还设法找到了我的一件[original_item_owner.Religion.GetName]瑰宝……然而，[looter.GetFirstName]宣称这是一件赝品，并将它毁掉了！

original: Laying waste to [target_title.GetName] [target_title.GetHolding] in [target_location.GetName] wasn't enough for the despicable [looter.GetTitledFirstName]... [looter.GetHerHisCap]'s troops also managed to find and steal one of my great artifacts of [original_item_owner.Religion.GetName]! [original_item_owner.Religion.GetHighGodName] knows what blasphemy they now subject it to...
translation: 毁掉在[target_location.GetName]的[target_title.GetName][target_title.GetHolding]不足以满足[looter.GetTitledFirstName]这个卑鄙小人……[looter.GetHerHisCap]部队还设法找到了我的一件[original_item_owner.Religion.GetName]瑰宝！只有[original_item_owner.Religion.GetHighGodName]知道现在他们在怎么亵渎它……

original: Laying waste to [target_title.GetName] [target_title.GetHolding] in [target_location.GetName] wasn't enough for the despicable [looter.GetTitledFirstName]... [looter.GetHerHisCap]'s troops also managed to find one of my great artifacts of [original_item_owner.Religion.GetName]... The honorless barbarian scum promptly had it destroyed!
translation: 毁掉在[target_location.GetName]的[target_title.GetName][target_title.GetHolding]不足以满足[looter.GetTitledFirstName]这个卑鄙小人……[looter.GetHerHisCap]部队还设法找到了我的一件[original_item_owner.Religion.GetName]瑰宝……毫无荣誉可言的野蛮人渣滓迅速地毁掉了它！

original: How dare the bastard tarnish it with [looter.GetHerHis] unworthy hands?!
translation: 这杂种竟敢用[looter.GetHerHis]不洁净的手玷污它？！

original: What... What has [looter.GetSheHe] done?!
translation: [looter.GetSheHe]做了什么？！

original: Oh, the shame is unbearable!
translation: 噢，这种耻辱不可忍受！

original: This is an affront to all of [original_item_owner.Religion.GetName]!
translation: 这是对所有[original_item_owner.Religion.GetName]信徒的冒犯！

original: As things have settled down a bit after you inherited your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s realm, you decide to enter the treasury and see what [cursed_diamond_parent.GetSheHe] has left for you. Sadly, you find that [cursed_diamond_parent.GetHerHis] famous diamond is gone! Someone must have stolen it while you were preoccupied with the transition of power.
translation: 在你继承了你的[GetFromRelation][From.GetTitledFirstName]的领地后，形势稳定了下来，你决定进入宝库，看看[cursed_diamond_parent.GetSheHe]给你留了什么。不幸的是，[cursed_diamond_parent.GetHerHis]那颗著名的钻石已经不见踪迹。一定有人在你忙于权力交接时偷走了它。

original: Drat! I suppose I will never find it again...
translation: 该死！我猜再也找不到了……

original: Has not attempted to corrupt §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! the past §Y10§! years\n
translation: 过去 §Y10§! 年没有尝试使§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!堕落\n

original: Has the quest §YCorrupt [Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!\n
translation: 拥有任务§Y使[Root.GetTitledFirstName]堕落§!\n

original: There are a few monasteries close by, where the lay members of [Root.Society.GetName] frequently convene. As such, it is expected that I every so often attend these meetings, and that I spend a fair amount of time at these monasteries to get in touch with the monastic foundations of the order. Such a period is about to start.
translation: 附近有几个修道院，[Root.Society.GetName]的在俗会员经常在这里召集。因此，我希望能经常参加这些会议，通过我在这些修道院花费足够多的时间来取得与修道基金会的联系。这个过程即将开始。

original: I will fulfill my duties, as expected.
translation: 我将如你所愿地完成我的使命。

original: I have now been at the monastery for a few days, surrounded by others who share my passion for [monastic_befriender.Religion.GetHighGodName]. And yet, I still find I miss having a friend. [monastic_friend.GetSocietyRank] [monastic_friend.GetFirstName] and myself seem to be getting along quite well, though... Perhaps this could blossom into a true friendship if we did something together? I'm sure [monastic_friend.GetSheHe] would greatly enjoy...
translation: 我已经在修道院待了几天，周围的其他人，与我共享着对[monastic_befriender.Religion.GetHighGodName]的热情。可是，我仍然缺少一个朋友。然而[monastic_friend.GetFirstName][monastic_friend.GetSocietyRank]似乎和我相处得不错……如果我们一起做些什么，也许能发展出一段真正的友谊呢？我确信[monastic_friend.GetSheHe]会很喜欢……

original: ...playing a game of military strategy.
translation: ……玩军事策略游戏。

original: ...discussing [monastic_befriender.Religion.GetScriptureName].
translation: ……讨论[monastic_befriender.Religion.GetScriptureName]。

original: ...discussing the intricacies of managing a realm.
translation: ……讨论管理国家的复杂事务。

original: ...taking a stroll and simply enjoying some small talk.
translation: ……散步然后享受一下闲聊。

original: [monastic_friend.GetTitledFirstName] truly enjoyed my suggestion, and we have become close friends! We regularly seek each other out during our free time, and I am starting to notice that it affects my focus on my monastic duties...
translation: [monastic_friend.GetTitledFirstName]真的很喜欢我的建议，我们已经成为亲密的朋友了！我们经常在空闲时间寻找对方，我开始注意到它甚至影响了我对身为僧侣义务的关注。

original: Let's focus on my duties. It is why I am here, after all.
translation: 让我专注于自己的使命吧，毕竟我就是为此而来的。

original: Let's spend more time with [monastic_friend.GetFirstName].
translation: 让我们和[monastic_friend.GetFirstName]多待一会儿。

original: Spending time in the monastery all day, alongside my friend [monastic_friend.GetTitledFirstName], I am sometimes overcome with sinful cravings of the flesh... It is surely simply the lack of [monastic_befriender.GetMenWomenPreference] around here! I suspect that [monastic_friend.GetFirstName] is also plagued by this.
translation: 我和我的朋友，[monastic_friend.GetTitledFirstName]，整日在修道院无所事事，消磨时光。有时我也会被肉体的欲望征服……这当然是[monastic_befriender.GetMenWomenPreference]太少的缘故。我怀疑，[monastic_friend.GetFirstName]也被这个问题深深困扰着。

original: I will manage, somehow.
translation: 我会想办法克服的。

original: Well, what are friends for?
translation: 呃，朋友是干什么用的？

original: If §Y[monastic_friend.GetTitledFirstName]§! enjoys this activity, this might lead to a friendship. Perhaps if it related to [monastic_friend.GetHerHis] education...?\n
translation: 如果§Y[monastic_friend.GetTitledFirstName]§!很享受这次活动，这可能会是友谊的起点。也许[monastic_friend.GetHerHis]对这次活动的感受与[monastic_friend.GetHerHis]教育有关……？\n

original: What is the harm? It is not as if we are doing anything... Unnatural.\n
translation: 有什么坏处吗？我们又不是什么也没做……不自然。\n

original: Played a Game of Strategy
translation: 玩一局战略游戏

original: This character has engaged in a game of military thinking with a friend.
translation: 此人曾经和朋友玩过军事推演游戏。

original: Discussed Holy Text
translation: 讨论过宗教文献

original: This character discussed the holy text with a friend.
translation: 此角色已经与朋友讨论过宗教文献。

original: Discussed Realm Management
translation: 讨论过治国理政

original: This character discussed the intricacies of realm management with a friend.
translation: 此人曾经和朋友讨论过国家治理的复杂事务。

original: Practiced Small Talk
translation: 曾经闲聊过

original: This character practiced small talk with a friend.
translation: 此角色已经与朋友闲聊过了。

original: Focused on Monastic Studies
translation: 专注于修行

original: This character has focused hard on his monastic studies, while spending time visiting [From.GetHerHis] monastic order.
translation: 此人已努力投身于修行，同时常常拜访[From.GetHerHis]修道会。

original: Though we had a good time, it doesn't seem that [monastic_friend.GetSocietyRank] [monastic_friend.GetFirstName] was too enamored with the activity I suggested... It's doubtful the seeds of our friendship will grow any further, after all.
translation: 虽然我们度过了一段美好的时光，但[monastic_friend.GetSocietyRank][monastic_friend.GetFirstName]看起来对我建议的活动并不是十分喜欢……我很怀疑友谊的种子能否在我们之中生根发芽。

original: That's too bad...
translation: 那太糟糕了……

original: Stole Artifact
translation: 宝物被盗

original: Punished for Stealing
translation: 因盗窃被处罚

original: Celebrated Artifact
translation: 宝物庆典

original: Caught Red-Handed
translation: 被当场抓获

original: This character was caught attempting a theft. [GetSheHeCap] does not seem to be as sneaky as [GetSheHe] thinks [GetSheHe] is.
translation: 此人在盗窃过程中被抓获。[GetSheHeCap]似乎没有[GetSheHe]想象中那样深藏不露。

original: Doing Penance
translation: 进行苦修

original: This character is doing public penance for an attempted theft.
translation: 此人由于盗窃未遂公开忏悔。

original: Patron of a Relic
translation: 遗物赞助人

original: This character has selflessly used their personal wealth to fund a celebration in honor of a monastery's relic.
translation: 这个人无私地利用他的个人财富来举行了一个纪念寺院遗物的庆典。

original: Visiting the monastery at which my order has convened this time, I join my fellow lay members in dutifully performing all tasks required of us. In the evening, after the day's hard work, the Abbot gathers all of the visiting lay members, and reveals the monastery's great treasure: a great relic that has been safeguarded here for many generations!
translation: 我拜访了我所在修会召集的修道院，和在俗会员们一起尽职尽责地完成我们的所有任务。晚上，经过一天的辛勤工作，院长召集了所有来访的在俗会员们，并揭示了修道院的珍宝：一个被人们在这里保护了好几代的伟大遗物！

original: That's nice, I guess.
translation: 我认为这是好事儿。

original: Let us celebrate its glory! I'm paying!
translation: 让我们欢庆吧！我来付钱！

original: This will likely please everyone in the order.\n
translation: 这很可能使修会所有人都感到快乐。\n

original: It should be mine!
translation: 这应该归我！

original: Having decided that the relic would be much better 'safeguarded' in my own hands, I must now tackle the task of how to 'liberate' it from the confines of the monastery. I can think of a few different paths to take...
translation: 我已经决定将遗物更好地「保护」在我自己手中，剩下亟待解决的任务就是决定如何将它从修道院中「解放」出来。我可以想出几个不同的途径……

original: Grab it and RUN!
translation: 拿起它就逃！

original: Though bold and simple, simply waiting for nobody to be looking and then running as fast as possible is not likely to result in success...\n
translation: 尽管想法大胆而简单，但只是等到没有人看到，然后尽可能地快跑，不可能取得成功……\n

original: Bribe the Abbot.
translation: 贿赂院长。

original: Bribing the Abbot to ensure nobody is around would be almost guaranteed to succeed. He is, however, just as guaranteed to have a high price...\n
translation: 贿赂修道院院长以求没有人在场几乎可以完全保证计划的成功。但他，那位院长，有点过于贪婪了……\n

original: Play a trick on everyone.
translation: 捉弄所有人。

original: Using your superior sense of subterfuge you might stand a decent chance at successfully taking the relic without anyone noticing.\n
translation: 得益于你那远超常人的阴谋诡计，你将有机会在无人知晓的情况下悄然取走文物。\n

original: I will ask my lover to help me!
translation: 我将请求我的情人帮助我！

original: The power of love always succeeds! ...right?\n
translation: 依靠爱的力量总是能成功……对不对？\n

original: Deep in the night I have snuck down to the relic's chamber. Adrenaline pumps through my veins as I take hold of the priceless artifact, savoring the feeling of it in my hands... But suddenly I hear the sound of footsteps and turn around to find [monastic_artifact_witness.GetSocietyRank] [monastic_artifact_witness.GetFirstName] looking at me with wide eyes!
translation: 我在深夜里悄悄溜进了保存圣物的房间。当我拿到了无价的宝物，并在手中品味着它的触感时，我感觉到体内的肾上腺素飙升……但突然间我听到脚步声，我转身看到[monastic_artifact_witness.GetSocietyRank][monastic_artifact_witness.GetFirstName]正睁大着眼睛看着我！

original: You have caught me... I submit to the order's judgment.
translation: 你抓住我了……我服从修会的判决。

original: Surrender to §Y[monastic_artifact_witness.GetTitledFirstName]§! and do public penance to atone for your actions.\n
translation: 向§Y[monastic_artifact_witness.GetTitledFirstName]§!投降并且公开忏悔你的罪行来赎罪。\n

original: Use their surprise to make a break for it!
translation: 出其不意！溜了溜了！

original: You're sure you can escape, however, this will upset your Brothers and Sisters greatly, and your time with the order will certainly end... Forever.\n
translation: 你确信你能够逃离，然而，这种行为会让你的兄弟姐妹非常不高兴，而你的社团生活也将离你远去……永远。\n

original: Leave no witnesses!
translation: 不要留下任何目击者！

original: Attempt to murder §Y[monastic_artifact_witness.GetTitledFirstName]§!!\n
translation: 尝试谋杀§Y[monastic_artifact_witness.GetTitledFirstName]§!！\n

original: I have done it! I have the relic and there is not a scratch on me! I have covered my tracks as best I can. Nobody seems to suspect it was I who killed [monastic_artifact_witness.GetSocietyRank] [monastic_artifact_witness.GetFirstName] and took the artifact.
translation: 我做到了！我拥有了遗物，没有留下任何谋杀证据。我尽可能的消灭了证据。似乎没有人怀疑我杀了[monastic_artifact_witness.GetSocietyRank][monastic_artifact_witness.GetFirstName]并且拿走了遗物。

original: It had to be done.
translation: 不得不做。

original: I have done it! I have the relic and only suffered a minor scratch in the scuffle. It will heal in time, and I even managed to hide it from my Brothers and Sisters.
translation: 我成功了！终于，这件圣物落入了我的手中，而我仅仅在混乱中受了点擦伤。这点小伤很快就会愈合，而我甚至没让我的兄弟姐妹发现这伤口。

original: Good, but... Ow!
translation: 很好，但是……嗷！

original: I have the relic, but it almost literally cost me an arm and a leg... I was lucky to only have lost what I did, and even more so that everyone seemed to believe the tale I spun of bravely fighting off the 'unknown thief'.
translation: 我拿到了这个遗物，但我差点儿失去一条胳膊和一条腿……就我失去的代价来看我已经够幸运了，更幸运的是每个人似乎都相信我所编造的大战「无名盗匪」的故事。

original: I'm not sure this was a good trade...
translation: 我不确定这是一笔好买卖……

original: As I dash towards [monastic_artifact_witness.GetHerHim], [monastic_artifact_witness.GetSocietyRank] [monastic_artifact_witness.GetFirstName] does not seem to be as surprised as I took [monastic_artifact_witness.GetHerHim] for! Swiftly [monastic_artifact_witness.GetSheHe] draws a blade, and as I wrestle [monastic_artifact_witness.GetHerHim] to the ground I feel the cold metal sink in my chest...
translation: 当我冲向[monastic_artifact_witness.GetHerHim]时，[monastic_artifact_witness.GetSocietyRank][monastic_artifact_witness.GetFirstName][monastic_artifact_witness.GetHerHim]并没有如我预料的那般感到震惊！[monastic_artifact_witness.GetSheHe]流畅的挥出一剑，当我将[monastic_artifact_witness.GetHerHim]击倒在地上的时候，我感到一块冰冷的金属插入了我的胸口……

original: Noooooooooooo!

I have done it! I have the relic, and shook off my pursuer. But [monastic_artifact_witness.GetSocietyRank] [monastic_artifact_witness.GetFirstName] saw me blatantly steal the artifact, and so my life in the order is certainly forfeit...
translation: 我做到了！我拥有了遗物，并摆脱了追捕者。但是[monastic_artifact_witness.GetSocietyRank][monastic_artifact_witness.GetFirstName]看到了我在众目睽睽中偷走了遗物。所以我在修会的正常生活毁了……

original: Details, details!
translation: 行事注意细节！

original: Deep in the night I have snuck down to the relic's chamber. Adrenaline pumps through my veins as I take hold of the priceless artifact... But suddenly I hear the sound of footsteps and turn around to find my lover [monastic_artifact_lover.GetTitledFirstName] keep [monastic_artifact_witness.GetSocietyRank] [monastic_artifact_witness.GetFirstName] distracted, allowing me to make my escape unnoticed!
translation: 深夜，我悄悄溜进了遗迹的房间。当我拿到无价的宝物时，肾上腺素涌过我的血管……突然，我听到了脚步声，我转身发现我的情人[monastic_artifact_lover.GetTitledFirstName]正在分散[monastic_artifact_witness.GetSocietyRank][monastic_artifact_witness.GetFirstName]的注意力，让我可以悄无声息地逃走！

original: Love DOES always win!
translation: 爱能战胜一切！

original: My plan went flawlessly! Not a single soul saw or heard me during the night, and it was not ere daybreak that the theft was discovered. Nobody suspects it was I!
translation: 我的计划完美无瑕！在夜里，没有任何人看见或者听到我的行踪，我的盗窃行为并没有在拂晓前被发现。没有人怀疑是我干的！

original: I am the best!
translation: 我是最棒的！

original: My offer of funding a celebration of the relic was well-received, and has heightened my standing in the eyes of my Brothers and Sisters! For many days we sang, prayed and paraded the holy relic around the nearby villages. Donations to the monastery have increased greatly! All in all, it was a tremendous success.
translation: 我为庆祝遗物的筹款广受好评，这提高了我在我的兄弟姐妹眼中的地位。在许多天里，我们在附近村庄唱歌、祈祷、巡展圣器。修道院收到的捐赠大大增加了！总而言之，这是一个巨大的成功。

original: Well worth the money!
translation: 这钱花的很值！

original: The society's members are pleased with your celebration!\n
translation: 社团成员们对你的庆祝仪式感到满意！\n

original: Did not betray society\n
translation: 没有出卖过社团\n

original:
To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

I know it was you who murdered [monastic_artifact_witness.GetTitledFirstName] and who took our prized relic. As soon as I have the necessary proof, I shall expose you to the order!

Signed,
[monastic_artifact_blackmailer.GetSocietyRank] [monastic_artifact_blackmailer.GetFirstName]
translation:
致[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，我知道是你杀了[monastic_artifact_witness.GetTitledFirstName]，并拿走了我们珍贵的遗物。只要我拿到必要的证据，我绝对会在修会揭发你的行径！

此致，
[monastic_artifact_blackmailer.GetSocietyRank][monastic_artifact_blackmailer.GetFirstName]

original: Bribe [monastic_artifact_blackmailer.GetHerHim]!
translation: 贿赂[monastic_artifact_blackmailer.GetHerHim]！

original: Allow [monastic_artifact_blackmailer.GetHerHim] the honor of returning the artifact, and buy [monastic_artifact_blackmailer.GetHerHis] silence!
translation: 让[monastic_artifact_blackmailer.GetHerHim]代为归还宝物获得荣耀，换取[monastic_artifact_blackmailer.GetHerHis]缄默！

original: Keep it, regardless!
translation: 不惜一切代价，继续！

original: Your Brothers and Sisters will undoubtedly be extremely displeased, and your time with the order will certainly end... Forever.\n
translation: 你的兄弟姐妹无疑会非常不满意，而你的教团生活也会终止……直到永远。\n

original: This will place my lover §Y[monastic_artifact_lover.GetTitledFirstName]§! in a very awkward position!\n
translation: 这会让我的情人§Y[monastic_artifact_lover.GetTitledFirstName]§!处在非常尴尬的境地中！\n

original: I found out that my lover, [monastic_artifact_lover.GetTitledFirstName], could not bear the shame of being incriminated in my theft of the artifact, and rather stepped out of life than face [monastic_artifact_lover.GetHerHis] Brothers and Sisters any longer.
translation: 我发现我的情人[monastic_artifact_lover.GetTitledFirstName]无法承受被我偷盗宝物的罪行所牵连的耻辱，已然选择离开了人世，而不再面对[monastic_artifact_lover.GetHerHis]兄弟姐妹。

original: Oh no... My dear §Y[monastic_artifact_lover.GetFirstName]§!!
translation: 哦，不……我亲爱的§Y[monastic_artifact_lover.GetFirstName]§!！

original: Start planning the theft of the §YSeamless Robe of Jesus§!!
translation: 开始谋划盗窃§Y耶稣的无缝长袍§!！

original: Start planning the theft of the §YCrown of Thorns§!!
translation: 开始谋划盗窃§Y荆棘冠冕§!！

original: Start planning the theft of the §YFragment of the True Cross§!!
translation: 开始谋划盗窃§Y真十字架碎片§!！

original: Start planning the theft of the §YHoly Prepuce§!!
translation: 开始谋划盗窃§Y圣包皮§!！

original: Start planning the theft of the §YImage of Edessa§!!
translation: 开始谋划盗窃§Y埃德萨圣像§!！

original: Start planning the theft of the §YJeweled Danda§!!
translation: 开始谋划盗窃§Y宝石檀陀§!！

original: Start planning the theft of the §YSariraka Bone§!!
translation: 开始谋划盗窃§Y佛骨舍利§!！

original: Start planning the theft of the §YSarira§!!
translation: 开始谋划盗窃§Y舍利子§!！

original: Absorb Lifeforce
translation: 吸收生命力

original: Kill [Root.GetFirstName] and use [Root.GetHerHis] Lifeforce to prolong your own life.
translation: 杀死[Root.GetFirstName]并使用[Root.GetHerHis]生命力给你延长寿命。

original: As the ritual comes to a close, your [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] finally dies and you feel the first small trickle of their lifeforce join with your own. All that remains is to consume [From.GetHerHis] organs to absorb the full potential.
translation: 随着仪式的结束，你的[GetFromRelation][From.GetFirstName]终于死去，你感觉到他们的生命力的最初的涓滴被你吸取。剩下的就是消耗[From.GetHerHis]器官吸收全部潜在生命力。

original: The things we do for life...
translation: 为了我们的生命……

original: The unholy vigor which has been sustaining me has faded. Once again I feel every year of my true age, a thoroughly unpleasant experience.
translation: 那维持着我永恒活力的邪恶力量已然褪去，又一次，我感受到了时间流经我的身躯，感受到我那真实的寿命，真是一点都不让人感到愉悦。

original: I know what I must do
translation: 我知道我得做什么了

original: Stolen Health
translation: 偷取健康

original: Stolen Vitality
translation: 偷取活力

original: Stolen Life
translation: 偷取生命

original: Propose that §Y[AdultExtra.GetTitledFirstName]§! should become the guardian of §Y[ChildExtra.GetTitledFirstName]§W. As a guardian, §Y[AdultExtra.GetTitledFirstName]§W will be responsible for educating §Y[ChildExtra.GetTitledFirstName]§W.\n Parents cannot declare war on the guardian of their child, or the liege of the guardian.\n
translation: 提议§Y[AdultExtra.GetTitledFirstName]§!成为§Y[ChildExtra.GetTitledFirstName]§W的监护人。作为监护人，§Y[AdultExtra.GetTitledFirstName]§W将承担对§Y[ChildExtra.GetTitledFirstName]§W进行教育的义务。\n作为父母，将不能对监护人及其领主宣战。\n

original: Assign Guardian
translation: 指定监护人

original: Popular Ruler
translation: 受欢迎的统治者

original: This character is well-liked by every ruler nearby.
translation: 这一角色深受附近每一位统治者的喜爱。

original: My [Root.GetMyTreasurerName], [Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], has been hard at work in §Y[admin_bonus_province.GetName]§W, increasing infrastructure and motivating the local people to work ever harder!
translation: 我的[Root.GetMyTreasurerName]，[Root.job_treasurer.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]，一直在§Y[admin_bonus_province.GetName]§W努力工作，增建当地的基础设施，并鼓舞当地群众更加辛勤地去劳作！

original:
My liege,
I write to you with good news! I have successfully sabotaged [From.Location.GetName], causing considerable disruption.

Your humble Spymaster,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我的领主，
我将喜讯献于您！我已经成功进行了对[From.Location.GetName]的秘密行动，并造成了十分可观的破坏。

您卑微的间谍总管，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: The Heir will take over when the §YLeader of the Society§! dies, they are chosen based on §YMember Score§!.
translation: 继承者将会在§Y社团领袖§!死后接管事务，他们是基于§Y成员分数§!所挑选出来的。

original: You cannot see the §YLeader§! of Secret Societies unless you join.
translation: 你看不见秘密社团的§Y领导者§!，除非你加入它。

original: Unknown Title
translation: 未知头衔

original: You cannot see the §YHeir§! of Secret Societies unless you join.
translation: 你看不见秘密社团的§Y继承人§!，除非你加入它。

original: You are not a member of this Society.
translation: 你不是这个社团的成员。

original: You have no rank in this Society.
translation: 你在这个社团里没有位阶。

original: By carefully showing subtle interest in joining this Society you will hopefully be discretely contacted by a member of $SOCIETY|Y$.
translation: 通过小心地表露出参加这个社团的兴趣，你希望能够被$SOCIETY|Y$的成员秘密地联系。

original: Withdraw interest in joining the $SOCIETY|Y$.
translation: 撤销对加入$SOCIETY|Y$的兴趣。

original: By refusing to respond to the secret signs flashed at you by shadowy strangers you can make it clear you no longer have any interest in joining $SOCIETY|Y$.
translation: 通过拒绝回应神秘的陌生人们对你亮出的暗号，你可以清楚地表明你不再有兴趣加入$SOCIETY|Y$。

original: During [From.job_chancellor.GetHerHis] visit to my court, the [From.job_chancellor.GetJobTitle] of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName], [From.job_chancellor.GetTitledName], has really convinced me of what a benevolent and peaceful ruler [From.job_chancellor.GetHerHis] liege [From.GetTitledName] is.
translation: 在[From.job_chancellor.GetHerHis]访问我的宫廷期间，[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的[From.job_chancellor.GetJobTitle]，[From.job_chancellor.GetTitledName]，已经成功让我相信[From.job_chancellor.GetHerHis]领主[From.GetTitledName]是一位仁慈与和平的统治者。

original: I feel a new appreciation for [From.GetTitledName]!
translation: 我对[From.GetTitledName]有了新的评价！

original: A job well done!
translation: 干得漂亮！

original: Build Spy Network
translation: 建立间谍网

original:
Blessed [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName].

We are pleased to hear that you have safely returned from your pilgrimage, and trust that it has been an inspiring experience for you.
Signed [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
有福的[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]。

我们很高兴听到您已经安全地从您的朝圣中归来，并相信这对您而言是一次鼓舞人心的经历。
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: Praise [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]!
translation: 赞美[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]！

original:
Blessed [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName].

We are pleased to hear that you have completed the construction of a new [FromFromFromFrom.GetHolding] in [FromFromFromFrom.GetName]. It should go a long way to spread the word of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] ever further!
Signed [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
有福的[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]。

我们很高兴地听到你在[FromFromFromFrom.GetName]完成了一个新[FromFromFromFrom.GetHolding]的修建。它将进一步传播[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]的话语！ 
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: All in the name of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]!
translation: 一切以[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]之名！

original: [This.GetMasterMistress]
translation: [This.GetMasterMistress]

original: [This.GetSocietyRank]
translation: [This.GetSocietyRank]

original: Attempt to impregnate [Root.GetBestName] with the Spawn of [From.GetDWDevil]
translation: 试图用[From.GetDWDevil]之卵使[Root.GetBestName]受孕

original: My [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName], [Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledName], has informed me that [suspected_society_member.GetBestName] has been associating with the wrong sort of people.
translation: 我的[Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName]，[Root.job_spiritual.GetTitledName]告诉我，[suspected_society_member.GetBestName]跟不正当的人员有接触。

original: Upsetting news...
translation: 令人心烦的消息……

original: [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] has been told I am a member of an outlawed society.
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitledName]被告知我是一个非法社团的成员。

original: This is not good!
translation: 这可不好！

original: They declined our gift!
translation: 他们拒绝了我们的礼物！

original: Declined Mission
translation: 被拒绝的任务

original: Declined Missions
translation: 被拒绝的任务

original:
My liege, you sent me out to spread word of your good nature and wise rule, yet I can find no ruler who does not already hold you in the highest regard. I beg you for a new assignment.

Your humble [Root.GetChancellorName],
[Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
我的领主，您派遣我传播关于您的温厚与仁治的言辞，如今，我发现所有的统治者都对你抱有最高的敬意。我请求您予我新的使命。

您卑微的仆人[Root.GetChancellorName]，
[Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstName]

original: Member of outlawed society
translation: 非法社团成员

original: Confess to your liege's faith for political reasons while still practicing your true faith in private. This will allow you to join or found your secret faith's Society.
translation: 出于政治原因改信你领主的信仰，同时在私下仍信奉你的真实信仰。这将允许你加入或发现你的秘密信仰的社团。

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! attempts to find a way to approach §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! and talk about [From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]. If successful, [Root.GetSheHe] may help to convert the realm.\n
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!尝试寻找一种接近§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!并与之谈及[From.GetTrueReligionGroupPersons]的方式。如果成功，[Root.GetSheHe]也许会帮助领地的人民皈依。

original: Has not been approached to be made sympathetic to people of other religions recently, or is the target of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s mission\n
translation: 还没有被唤起对其他宗教人士的同情，或者是§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!任务的目标\n

original: Well-Fed
translation: 养尊处优

original: This character has a habit of eating well, and receives all the benefits to health that that entails.
translation: 这个角色有一个好的饮食习惯，并得到了健康带来的所有益处。

original: The [Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]s of the [From.GetHolding] of [From.GetName] worship their weak, false [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]. Tear down their powerless idols, torch their holy books and steal their riches in honor of [Root.GetDWDevil]! Right-click the title's shield to perform this action.
translation: [From.GetHolding]的[Root.Religion.GetPriestTitle]，[From.GetName]竟然信仰着伪神[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]。让我们砸毁他们那无力的偶像，撕碎他们的经卷，并偷走他们的财富，来纪念伟大的[Root.GetDWDevil]！右键点击头衔盾徽来执行此项操作。

original:
Still dressed in traveler's garb, [relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName] enters your throne room and kneels before you. Looking rather pale and a bit sickly, [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] produces a small object, placing it gingerly in the palm of your outstretched hand.

'Andvari's Gift... The Andvaranaut, my liege...' [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] whispers reverently. 'It must be. Its power is undeniable, it has already brought me many riches on the road back to the court.' You nod solemnly in response. Though it feels light in your hand, you already feel the burden on your soul. This ring must have enormous power, but you remember hearing in legends the curse that lies upon it...

Regardless, with this find [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has truly surpassed [relic_hunter.GetHerselfHimself]!
translation:
[relic_hunter.GetTitledFirstName]仍然穿着旅行者的服装，进入你的王座室后跪在你面前。[relic_hunter.GetSheHe]苍白着脸，掏出一个小物件，小心翼翼的放在你伸出的手掌上。

「侏儒安德瓦利的宝物……吸金指环，我的陛下……」[relic_hunter.GetFirstName]恭敬的低语道，「一定是它，它的力量毋庸置疑，它在我回宫的路上已经为我带来了许多财富了。」你庄严地点了点头，他仅仅是在你的手上发着光就让你感受到了你灵魂的负担。这个戒指一定有巨大的力量，但是你还记得传说中它的诅咒…………

无论如何[relic_hunter.GetFirstName]确实带来了超过[relic_hunter.GetHerselfHimself]的宝物！

original: Rejected Society Membership Offer
translation: 拒绝社团成员的邀请

original:
Greetings [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

We have become aware that your inductor passed away before being able to complete your recruitment. We therefore wish to rectify this oversight, and offer you membership of [From.Society.GetName].
[From.GetDWExpression]

Signed, Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
致[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，

祝您平安。

我们注意到，在您成为本社光荣的一员之前，您的入社介绍人已经过世了。因此，我们希望纠正这一疏忽，并向你提供[From.Society.GetName]的会员资格。
[From.GetDWExpression]

此致，社团领袖[From.GetFirstName]

original:
Greetings [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

We have become aware that your inductor passed away before being able to complete your recruitment. We therefore wish to rectify this oversight, and offer you membership of [From.Society.GetName].
Allahu akbar! Glory to Ali!

Signed, Grand Master [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
致[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，

祝您平安。我们注意到，在您成为本社光荣的一员之前，您的入社介绍人已经过世了。因此，我们希望纠正这一疏忽，并向您提供[From.Society.GetName]的会员资格。
安拉至大！荣耀归于阿里！

此致，社团领袖[From.GetFirstName]

original: I accept. [Root.GetDWExpression]
translation: 我同意。[Root.GetDWExpression]

original: I have changed my mind.
translation: 我已经改变主意了。

original: Write a Magnum Opus
translation: 编写一部巨著

original: Record your life's work for posterity in an encrypted Magnum Opus.
translation: 将你一生的工作编写成一部加密的巨著流传后世。

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! has not already written a Magnum Opus\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!没有创作过巨著。\n

original: Does NOT already own a Magnum Opus on ritualistic Theurgy\n
translation: 未拥有神通术仪式方面的巨著\n

original: Does NOT already own a Magnum Opus on contemplative Theurgy\n
translation: 未拥有神通术冥想方面的巨著\n

original: Does NOT already own a Magnum Opus on stellar Astrology\n
translation: 未拥有恒星占星术方面的巨著\n

original: Does NOT already own a Magnum Opus on planetary Astrology\n
translation: 未拥有行星占星学方面的巨著\n

original: Does NOT already own a Magnum Opus on alchemical Universal Panacea\n
translation: 未拥有炼金万灵药方面的巨著\n

original: Does NOT already own a Magnum Opus on transmutative Alchemy\n
translation: 未拥有炼金术嬗变方面的巨著\n

original: Writing Magnum Opus
translation: 正在编写巨著

original: This character is writing a Magnum Opus.
translation: 此角色正在编写一部巨著。

original: Secluded at my writing desk, quill in hand and plenty a bottle of ink nearby, I find myself staring down upon the blank parchment. The sheer scale of the task upon which I am about to embark dawns upon me – I need to record my knowledge, but also hide it from those who are unworthy...
translation: 我在写字台上与世隔绝着，我一手持羽毛笔，另一手拿着一瓶墨水，我发现自己正凝视着那张空白羊皮纸。我即将开始的任务规模巨大——我需要记录下我的知识，同时也要隐瞒那些并不值得的人……

original: It will take a great deal of time and effort, but it will be glorious!
translation: 需要花很多时间和精力，不过这很不错！

original: Over the past few months I have developed an elaborate cypher that I will use to encode my life's work. However, before I can continue I must decide upon a direction in which to take my Opus, as the sum of all my knowledge is simply too great to be recorded in a single book.
translation: 在过去的几个月里，我开发了一个精心设计的密钥，我将用它来加密我的一生之作。然而，在我继续下去之前，我必须先决定选择一个我作品的方向，因为我所拥有的知识总和实在是太大了，根本无法在一本书中记录下来。

original: Focus my efforts on writing on Theurgy.
translation: 专注于神通术方面的写作。

original: Ascension and union with [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] is what future generations must strive for.\n
translation: 升天并与[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]合一是后代必须努力达成的。\n

original: Focus my efforts on writing on Astrology.
translation: 专注于占星术方面的写作。

original: The movements of the stars and planets will allow your successors to understand the mind of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap].\n
translation: 恒星和行星的运动会使你的后继者窥见[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]的思想。\n

original: Focus my efforts on writing on Alchemy.
translation: 专注于炼金术方面的写作。

original: Through working with transmutation and healing agents your heirs can transform and perfect themselves.\n
translation: 在嬗变和治愈药剂的共同作用下你的后代可以转变并完善自己。\n

original: I have made ample headway in recording my knowledge on the subject of Theurgy, but it is still too vast to touch upon everything. It will be necessary to narrow the focus of my efforts even further, and to write on only one of Theurgy's aspects.
translation: 我在记录我对这门学科的知识方面取得了很大进展，但它仍然太庞大，以致无法触及一切。有必要进一步缩小我的努力重点，只写神通术的这一个方面。

original: I will focus on rituals and invocations.
translation: 我将专注于仪式和祈祷。

original: Rituals allow one to invoke the will and presence of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap], a necessary first step if one wishes to ultimately unite with the Divine.
translation: 通过这种仪式，人们能够乞求[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]的意志和显现。如果你希望最终与神结合，这是必要的第一步。

original: I will focus on the art of contemplation and meditation.
translation: 我将专注于凝视和冥想。

original: Contemplation allows one to draw nearer to the mind of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap], and possibly achieve true Understanding.
translation: 沉思可以使人们更加接近并可能真正理解[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]的意志。

original: I have made ample headway in recording my knowledge on the subject of the stars and planets, but it is still too vast to touch upon all that makes up Astrology. It will be necessary to narrow the focus of my efforts even further, and to write on only one of Astrology's aspects.
translation: 我在记录关于星体和行星的知识方面已经取得了长足的进展，但是它仍然太庞大，无法触及所有构成占星术的事物。有必要进一步缩小我的努力重点，只写占星术的这一个方面。

original: I will focus on the stars.
translation: 我将专注于恒星。

original: The stars hold extensive knowledge, and proper reading of them will bring one closer to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap].\n
translation: 恒星蕴含着丰富的知识，正确解读它们能使人更接近[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]。\n

original: I will focus on the planets.
translation: 我将专注于行星。

original: The planets, and their motion through the stars, reveal clues about both the mind of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] as well as the personalities of individuals.\n
translation: 行星及其在恒星间的运动揭示了[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]的思想以及每个个体的人性。\n

original: I have made ample headway in recording my knowledge on the subject of transmutation and panacea, but it is still too vast to touch upon all that makes up Alchemy. It will be necessary to narrow the focus of my efforts even further, and to write on only one of Alchemy's aspects.
translation: 我在记录嬗变和万能药的知识方面取得了很大进展，但它仍然太庞大，我无法触及所有构成炼金术的东西。有必要进一步缩小我的努力重点，只写炼金术的其中一个方面。

original: I will focus on the Universal Panacea.
translation: 我将专注于万灵药。

original: The Universal Panacea would cure all diseases and allow life eternal, bringing the natural human body to perfection.
translation: 万灵药能治愈一切疾病，让生命永续，使人的身体变得完美。

original: I will focus on transmutation.
translation: 我将专注于嬗变。

original: Transforming metals into gold is a necessary stepping stone towards transforming and perfecting oneself.
translation: 将金属转化为黄金是改造和完善自身的必经之路。

original: It is done! It is finished! After a year of sweat and toil I have managed to produce a grand work on ritualistic Theurgy. This tome shall stand the test of ages, ensuring my knowledge and name shall conquer time, itself. It will serve my successors well, and perhaps they will one day be able to add their knowledge to mine.
translation: 完成了！完成了！经过一年的汗水和辛劳，我终于成功地完成了一项关于神通术仪式的伟大工作。这本书将经得起岁月的考验，确保我的知识和名字能战胜时间。它将为我的继任者服务，也许他们有一天能够将他们的知识添加到我的著作中。

original: "Ascend and be one with [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]!"
translation: 「升天并且与[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]合一！」

original: It is done! It is finished! After a year of sweat and toil I have managed to produce a grand work on contemplative Theurgy. This tome shall stand the test of ages, ensuring my knowledge and name shall conquer time, itself. It will serve my successors well, and perhaps they will one day be able to add their knowledge to mine.
translation: 完成了！完成了！经过一年的汗水和辛劳，我终于成功地完成了一项关于神通术冥想的伟大工作。这本书将经得起岁月的考验，确保我的知识和名字能战胜时间。它将为我的继任者服务，也许他们有一天能够将他们的知识添加到我的著作中。

original: "Open your mind to the Truth of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]!"
translation: 「面对[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]的真理敞开心扉！」

original: It is done! It is finished! After a year of sweat and toil I have managed to produce a grand work on stellar Astrology. This tome shall stand the test of ages, ensuring my knowledge and name shall conquer time, itself. It will serve my successors well, and perhaps they will one day be able to add their knowledge to mine.
translation: 完成了！完成了！经过一年的汗水和辛劳，我终于成功地完成了一项关于恒星占星术的伟大工作。这本书将经得起岁月的考验，确保我的知识和名字能战胜时间。它将为我的继任者服务，也许他们有一天能够将他们的知识添加到我的著作中。

original: "[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]'s Truth is in the stars!"
translation: 「[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]的真理在星辰中！」

original: It is done! It is finished! After a year of sweat and toil I have managed to produce a grand work on planetary Astrology. This tome shall stand the test of ages, ensuring my knowledge and name shall conquer time, itself. It will serve my successors well, and perhaps they will one day be able to add their knowledge to mine.
translation: 完成了！完成了！经过一年的汗水和辛劳，我终于成功地完成了一项关于行星占星术的伟大工作。这本书将经得起岁月的考验，确保我的知识和名字能战胜时间。它将为我的继任者服务，也许他们有一天能够将他们的知识添加到我的著作中。

original: "The Will of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] is revealed in the movement of the planets!"
translation: 「行星的运行揭示了[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap]的旨意！」

original: It is done! It is finished! After a year of sweat and toil I have managed to produce a grand work on alchemical Universal Panacea. This tome shall stand the test of ages, ensuring my knowledge and name shall conquer time, itself. It will serve my successors well, and perhaps they will one day be able to add their knowledge to mine.
translation: 完成了！完成了！经过一年的汗水和辛劳，我终于成功地完成了一项关于炼金万灵药的伟大工作。这本书将经得起岁月的考验，确保我的知识和名字能战胜时间。它将为我的继任者服务，也许他们有一天能够将他们的知识添加到我的著作中。

original: "Perfect is the body that is free from disease and age!"
translation: 「完美是没有疾病和岁月侵蚀的身体！」

original: It is done! It is finished! After a year of sweat and toil I have managed to produce a grand work on transmutative Alchemy. This tome shall stand the test of ages, ensuring my knowledge and name shall conquer time, itself. It will serve my successors well, and perhaps they will one day be able to add their knowledge to mine.
translation: 完成了！完成了！经过一年的汗水和辛劳，我终于成功地完成了一项关于炼金术嬗变的伟大工作。这本书将经得起岁月的考验，确保我的知识和名字能战胜时间。它将为我的继任者服务，也许他们有一天能够将他们的知识添加到我的著作中。

original: "Turn metal into gold, and the soul will follow suit!"
translation: 「把金属变成金子，灵魂也一样！」

original: Magnum Opus on Ritualistic Theurgy
translation: 神通术仪式巨著

original: This Magnum Opus contains many secrets of ritualistic Theurgy, but it has been encrypted with an elaborate cypher, allowing only the brightest to decipher it.
translation: 这部巨著包含了许多神通术仪式的秘密，但是它已经用密码精心加密了，只有最聪明的人才能破解它。

original: Magnum Opus on Ritualistic Theurgy
translation: 神通术仪式巨著

original: This Magnum Opus of excellent quality contains many secrets of ritualistic Theurgy, but it has been encrypted with an elaborate cypher, allowing only the brightest to decipher it.
translation: 这部优秀的巨著包含了许多神通术仪式的秘密，但是它已经用密码精心加密了，只有最聪明的人才能破解它。

translation: 神通术仪式巨著

original: Magnum Opus on Planetary Astrology
translation: 行星占星术巨著

original: This Magnum Opus of extraordinary quality contains many secrets of planetary Astrology, but it has been encrypted with an elaborate cypher, allowing only the brightest to decipher it.
translation: 这部惊人的巨著包含了许多行星占星术的秘密，但是它已经用密码精心加密了，只有最聪明的人才能破解它。

original: Magnum Opus on Planetary Astrology
translation: 行星占星术巨著

original: This masterwork Magnum Opus contains many secrets of planetary Astrology, but it has been encrypted with an elaborate cypher, allowing only the brightest to decipher it.
translation: 这部大师级的巨著包含了许多行星占星术的秘密，但是它已经用密码精心加密了，只有最聪明的人才能破解它。

original: Magnum Opus on Universal Panacea
translation: 万灵药巨著

original: This Magnum Opus contains many secrets of alchemical Universal Panacea, but it has been encrypted with an elaborate cypher, allowing only the brightest to decipher it.
translation: 这部巨著包含了许多炼金万灵药的秘密，但是它已经用密码精心加密了，只有最聪明的人才能破解它。

original: Magnum Opus on Universal Panacea
translation: 万灵药巨著

original: This Magnum Opus of excellent quality contains many secrets of alchemical Universal Panacea, but it has been encrypted with an elaborate cypher, allowing only the brightest to decipher it.
translation: 这部优秀的巨著包含了许多炼金万灵药的秘密，但是它已经用密码精心加密了，只有最聪明的人才能破解它。

translation: 万灵药巨著

translation: 万灵药巨著
