original: Magnum Opus on Transmutative Alchemy
translation: 炼金术嬗变巨著

original: This Magnum Opus contains many secrets of transmutative Alchemy, but it has been encrypted with an elaborate cypher, allowing only the brightest to decipher it.
translation: 这部巨著包含了许多炼金术嬗变的秘密，但是它已经用密码精心加密了，只有最聪明的人才能破解它。

original: Magnum Opus on Transmutative Alchemy
translation: 炼金术嬗变巨著

original: This Magnum Opus of excellent quality contains many secrets of transmutative Alchemy, but it has been encrypted with an elaborate cypher, allowing only the brightest to decipher it.
translation: 这部优秀的巨著包含了许多炼金术嬗变的秘密，但是它已经用密码精心加密了，只有最聪明的人才能破解它。

original: Magnum Opus on Transmutative Alchemy
translation: 炼金术嬗变巨著

original: This Magnum Opus of extraordinary quality contains many secrets of transmutative Alchemy, but it has been encrypted with an elaborate cypher, allowing only the brightest to decipher it.
translation: 这部惊人的巨著包含了许多炼金术嬗变的秘密，但是它已经用密码精心加密了，只有最聪明的人才能破解它。

original: Magnum Opus on Transmutative Alchemy
translation: 炼金术嬗变巨著

original: This masterwork Magnum Opus contains many secrets of transmutative Alchemy, but it has been encrypted with an elaborate cypher, allowing only the brightest to decipher it.
translation: 这部大师级的巨著包含了许多炼金术嬗变的秘密，但是它已经用密码精心加密了，只有最聪明的人才能破解它。

original: Your [From.GetJobTitle], §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!, has secluded [From.GetReflexivePronoun] in §Y[From.Location.GetName]§! and is thus unable to perform [From.GetPossPronoun] tasks for the time being.
translation: 你的[From.GetJobTitle]，§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!已经在§Y[From.Location.GetName]§!隔离[From.GetReflexivePronoun]了，因此现在无法执行[From.GetPossPronoun]任务。

original: Attempt to Abduct
translation: 尝试绑架

original: Attempt to abduct and imprison §Y[This.GetBestName]§! with the help of your brethren in §Y[From.Society.GetName]§!.
translation: 尝试在你的§Y[From.Society.GetName]§!兄弟帮助下绑架囚禁§Y[This.GetBestName]§!

original: I have put the word out among my brethren in [Root.Society.GetName]. When an opportunity presents itself, the brothers and sisters in [From.Capital.GetName] will attempt to snatch [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] and bring [From.GetObjectPronoun] to me in chains...
translation: 我把我的想法告诉了我在[Root.Society.GetName]的兄弟姐妹们，当机会来临的时候，在[From.Capital.GetName]的兄弟姐妹将试着绑走[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]，让[From.GetObjectPronoun]带着锁链来到我这里。

original: There is no point trying to abduct [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] anymore, considering [FromFromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun] is dead!
translation: 考虑到[FromFromFrom.GetSubjectPronoun]已经死了，再试图绑架[FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]已经没有任何意义了！

original: Annoying!
translation: 真讨厌！

original: [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has ended up in prison, so there is no point trying to abduct [FromFromFrom.GetObjectPronoun] anymore.
translation: [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]已经被关进了监狱，再试图绑架[FromFromFrom.GetObjectPronoun]已经没有任何意义了。

original: Very well...
translation: 非常好……

original: My brethren are not having much luck in their attempts to abduct [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]. Perhaps [Root.Society.GetName] are not influential enough to pull it off... Should I call it off?
translation: 我的弟兄们在试图绑架[FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]方面并没有太多好运。也许[Root.Society.GetName]没有足够的影响力来圆满完成……我应该取消吗？

original: Chances would improve if our Society Influence was higher in the world...
translation: 如果我们的社团在世界上的影响力变高我们的机遇也会随之增加……

original: [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has joined [Root.Society.GetName], so the brethren will no longer assist with [FromFromFrom.GetPossPronoun] abduction.
translation: [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]已经加入[Root.Society.GetName]，所以弟兄们将不再提供帮助给[FromFromFrom.GetPossPronoun]绑架。

original: This might take a while...
translation: 这可能需要过一段时间……

original: My fellows in [Root.Society.GetName] have informed me that [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] plans to travel the realm incognito for a lark, mingling with the common folk. [FromFromFrom.GetSubjectPronounCap] will only be protected by two loyal friends during this little adventure – a great opportunity to have [FromFromFrom.GetObjectPronoun] abducted, if I so wished...
translation: 我在[Root.Society.GetName]的兄弟告诉我，[FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]打算低调地去乡下游玩，这意味着只有两个朋友保护[FromFromFrom.GetSubjectPronounCap]进行这一次小冒险——绑架[FromFromFrom.GetObjectPronoun]的绝好机会去，只要你愿意动手……

original: My fellows in [Root.Society.GetName] have managed to insert themselves among the servants of [FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] and stand ready to snatch the child at my command.
translation: 我在[Root.Society.GetName]中的同伴们已经设法将自己安插进[FromFromFrom.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]的仆人中，只待我一声令下。

original: Approve the scheme!
translation: 就这么干！

original: No... I have a bad feeling about this.
translation: 别这样……我有不好的预感。

original: The plan to abduct [This.GetFirstName] is set in motion.
translation: 开始实施绑架 [This.GetFirstName]的计划。

original: I had been playing with my friends for hours in the field when one of my attendants suddenly made a strange noise and keeled over. All hell broke loose as the guards and servants started fighting each other. A veteran soldier picked me up and started running back towards home...
translation: 我和朋友们在田野里玩了好几个小时，这时我的一个仆人突然发出奇怪的声音然后晕了过去。卫兵和仆人们开始斗殴，一切都崩溃了。一个老兵把我抱起来，向家跑去……

original: Someone is picking me up. I don't know this strange lady, and where is she taking me..?
translation: 有人来接我。我不认识这个奇怪的女人，她要把我带到哪里去……？

original: ...but he stumbles and falls, blow dart in his neck!
translation: ……但是他绊倒了，正好摔断了他的脖子！

original: These people look mean!
translation: 这些人看起来很卑鄙！

original: ...and keeps running, saving me from the traitors!
translation: ……继续努力，把我从叛徒那里救出来！

original: The guards stopped the lady and brought me back.
translation: 卫兵阻止了那位女士并把我带了回去。

original: My guards tell me they suspect [From.GetTitledName] of this outrage!
translation: 我的侍卫告诉我他们怀疑这起暴行是[From.GetTitledName]干的！

original: My competent brethren in [Root.Society.GetName] managed to snatch [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal] from [From.GetPossPronoun] guards and bring [From.GetObjectPronoun] to me in a sack!
translation: 我[Root.Society.GetName]里的厉害同党设法从[From.GetPossPronoun]卫士手里捉住了[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]并且把[From.GetObjectPronoun]装在布袋里带到了我面前！

original: Idiots!
translation: 白痴！

original: No, I'll just have to be patient.
translation: 噢不，我得再耐心点。

original: Attempted Abduction
translation: 绑架未遂

original: Stop Abduction Scheme
translation: 停止绑架计划

original: Call off my Society members from abducting my current target.
translation: 取消社团成员对当前目标的绑架计划。

original: Abduction efforts stop
translation: 停止绑架行动

original: Stop Trying to Abduct
translation: 放弃绑架

original: Stop trying to abduct §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]§!. I should turn my attention elsewhere...
translation: 放弃绑架§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]§!。我应该将注意力转向别的地方……

original: Your [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName], §Y[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]§!, was attacked by heathens in §Y[wounded_location.GetName]§! while trying to spread the faith.
translation: 你的[Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName]，§Y[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]§!，在§Y[wounded_location.GetName]§!试图传播信仰时受到异教徒的攻击！

original: I can hardly believe it, but I have uncovered proof that [FromFromFrom.GetTitledName] consorts with demons and secretly worships [FromFromFrom.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]! [FromFromFrom.GetSubjectPronounCap] is a member of a cult called [FromFromFrom.Society.GetName]... How should I use this explosive information?
translation: 虽然难以置信，但是我有证据证明[FromFromFrom.GetTitledName]与恶魔交往，并且秘密崇拜[FromFromFrom.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]！[FromFromFrom.GetSubjectPronounCap]是一个名为[FromFromFrom.Society.GetName]的邪教组织的成员……我要怎样利用这个爆炸性的信息呢？

original: I have uncovered proof that [FromFromFrom.GetTitledName] is a member of a subversive cult called [FromFromFrom.Society.GetName]... How should I use this explosive information?
translation: 我发现了[FromFromFrom.GetTitledName]是一个名为[FromFromFrom.Society.GetName]的谋逆邪教组织成员的证据……我应该如何利用这个爆炸性信息？

original: Charge: Secret Cultist
translation: 指控：秘密邪教徒

original: Charge: Witch
translation: 指控：女巫

original: [From.GetTitledName] has found out that I am a member of [Root.Society.GetName]! This is obviously a disaster and a just cause for imprisonment, title revokation... or execution.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]发现我是[Root.Society.GetName]的成员！这显然是一场灾难，也是监禁，革职……或死刑的正当理由。

original: [From.GetTitledName] claims to have proof that I am a member of [Root.Society.GetName] – just cause for arrest and imprisonment!
translation: [From.GetTitledName]声称有证据证明我是[Root.Society.GetName]的成员——这是逮捕和监禁的正当理由！

original: [From.GetTitledName] has provided me with undeniable proof that [target_spy_on.GetTitledName] is a witch and a demon worshipper! How should I use this information?
translation: [From.GetTitledName]为我提供了确凿的证据，证明[target_spy_on.GetTitledName]是一个女巫和一个恶魔崇拜者！我应该如何使用这些信息？

original: [From.GetTitledName] has provided me with undeniable proof that [target_spy_on.GetTitledName] is a member of [target_spy_on.Society.GetName]! How should I use this information?
translation: [From.GetTitledName]为我提供了确凿的证据，证明[target_spy_on.GetTitledName]是[target_spy_on.Society.GetName]的成员！我应该如何利用这个信息？

original: [From.GetTitledName] says that [From.GetSubjectPronoun] knows I'm a witch and a demon worshipper and claims to have witnesses that can testify against me! However, [From.GetSubjectPronoun] promises to keep this to [From.GetReflexivePronoun] if I promise to stay out of all factions...
translation: [From.GetTitledName]告诉我，[From.GetSubjectPronoun]知道我是一个可耻的女巫和恶魔崇拜者，并声称有证人可以作证指认我！然而，[From.GetSubjectPronoun]向我承诺，只要我保证不加入任何反对领主的派系，他就会把这件事烂在[From.GetReflexivePronoun]的肚子里。

original: [From.GetTitledName] says that [From.GetSubjectPronoun] knows I'm a member of [Root.Society.GetName] and claims to have witnesses that can testify against me! However, [From.GetSubjectPronoun] promises to keep this to [From.GetReflexivePronoun] if I promise to stay out of all factions...
translation: [From.GetTitledName]告诉我，[From.GetSubjectPronoun]知道我是[Root.Society.GetName]的一分子，并且声称有证人可以作证来指认我！然而，[From.GetSubjectPronoun]向我承诺，只要我保证不加入任何反对领主的派系，他就会把这件事烂在[From.GetReflexivePronoun]的肚子里。

original: Publicly denounce §Y[target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstName]§!!\n
translation: 公开谴责§Y[target_spy_on.GetTitledFirstName]§!！\n

original: Arrange a concubinage.
translation: 安排纳妾。

original: §Y[GetTitledFirstName]§! is Prestigious
translation: §Y[GetTitledFirstName]§!是有威望的

original: Enables §Gright-clicking§! the portraits of your vassals, courtiers, and rivals, in an attempt to possess them with a fanatically loyal demon...
translation: 允许§G右键点击§!你封臣、内阁成员及仇敌的头像，尝试让狂热而忠诚的恶魔占据他们的身心……

original: My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], keeps asking me to press [From.GetPossPronoun] claim on [claimant_claim.GetName] for the glory of our dynasty.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]，不断要求我为了家族的荣耀索取[From.GetPossPronoun]对于[claimant_claim.GetName]的宣称。

original: the Hermetic Society
translation: 赫耳墨斯学会

original: Hermetics believe that there are deeply hidden secrets about this world that only the worthy can uncover. As a member of the Hermetics you will seek the truth in the stars and planets, through diligent experimentation, and by careful interpretation of ancient texts and symbols.
translation: 赫耳墨斯学会相信这个世界上有无穷无尽的值得去探索的真理，作为赫耳墨斯学会的成员，你将通过不断的试验，破解古文，研读神秘的符号去寻找蕴藏在星空和大地之中的真理。

original: [Root.GetFullName] starts the construction of a Laboratory.
translation: [Root.GetFullName]开始建造一座实验室。

original: Esoteric Knowledge
translation: 深奥学识

original: Construct Laboratory
translation: 建造实验室

original: Constructing your own laboratory will help you in the various experiments needed to delve into the deeper truths of creation. It can however easily get very costly...
translation: 建造你自己的实验室将帮助你进行各种必要的实验来深入探索创造的更深层次的真理。但是它很快就会变得非常昂贵……

original: A truly useful Laboratory can take both time and money to assemble but without an office dedicated to alchemy I doubt I will ever be able to unveil the deeper secrets of the world.
translation: 一个真正有用的实验室可能要花费时间和金钱来组建，但若没有一个专门致力于炼金术的实验室，我怀疑我永远也无法揭开这个世界更深的秘密。

original: For science!
translation: 为了科学！

original: On second thought, there are more pressing matters.
translation: 转念一想，还有更紧急的事情。

original: Secrecy is of great importance as the experiments I will perform in my laboratory may both frighten the ignorant and tantalize my fellow alchemists. To keep intruders away laboratories are often built deep within a castle, but a more accessible building would likely be more efficient...
translation: 保密是非常重要的，因为我将在我的实验室里进行的实验既会吓到无知的人，又会使我的炼金术士们迷惑不解。为了使入侵者远离实验室，实验室往往建在城堡的深处，但是更容易进入的建筑可能会更有效率……

original: My secrets will be safe deep within the walls of [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]!
translation: 我的秘密在[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]深墙内是安全的！

original: The plans for your laboratory will have to fit into your existing castle.
translation: 你实验室的计划将适应你现有的城堡。

original: Let us build an efficient and accessible office for research!
translation: 让我们建立一个高效和便利的研究办公室！

original: The plans for your laboratory will only be dictated by what is most efficient but your secrets will not be as well guarded.
translation: 你的实验室的计划将只由最有效的方式决定，但您的秘密将不会得到很好的保护。

original: Let us build a guarded compound on an island.
translation: 让我们在岛上建造一个戒备森严的大院。

original: Let us build a remote guarded compound.
translation: 让我们建个偏僻的戒备森严的大院。

original: Though isolated your laboratory can be as big as it needs to be.
translation: 尽管有些偏远，但这可以将你的实验室建造得如它所需要的那般巨大。

original: In order to properly heat and transform metals or other substances I require furnaces of differing temperature and flames of different types. The alchemical texts speak of various setups that could be beneficial.
translation: 为了适当地加热和转换金属或其他物质，我需要不同温度和不同类型火焰的熔炉。炼金术文献讲述了各种有益的装置。

original: A modest setup with one furnace will be enough.
translation: 用一个炉子做一个适当的装置就足够了。

original: [Root.GetFullName] will aim for a small but functional laboratory.
translation: [Root.GetFullName]将目标定位为小但功能齐全的实验室。

original: I can work around a small but varied setup.
translation: 我可以用一个小而多样化的装置工作。

original: [Root.GetFullName] will aim to build a laboratory that can handle somewhat more complicated procedures.
translation: [Root.GetFullName]计划建造一个能处理更复杂工序的实验室。

original: I will require a state of the art laboratory!
translation: 我需要一个最先进的实验室！

original: [Root.GetFullName] will aim to build an advanced laboratory, capable of handling a number of complicated procedures.
translation: [Root.GetFullName]旨在建立一个能够处理一些复杂的实验流程的先进的实验室。

original: I will aim higher than any of those that have come before me!
translation: 我要制定一个超越前人的目标！

original: [Root.GetFullName] will build an experimental setup with as many furnaces, basins, and other contraptions as can reasonably be fitted.
translation: [Root.GetFullName]将建造一个实验装置，有许多炉子、盆和其他可以被合理安装的装置。

original: The glass in which I keep my concoctions is brittle and breaks easily. This may be tolerable for beakers and other dispensable glass but earlier today a giant alembic shattered into a thousand pieces after having been heated carelessly by one of my helpers...
translation: 我保存调制品的玻璃杯很脆，容易破碎。这对烧杯和其他可有可无的玻璃器皿来说可能是可以接受的，但今天早些时候，我的一个助手不小心加热后，一个巨大的蒸馏器碎成了无数片……

original: Let us try to limit their use then.
translation: 让我们试着限制它们的使用。

original: [Root.GetFullName] will keep buying glass of inferior quality but helpers will be instructed to handle it with extreme care from now on.
translation: [Root.GetFullName]将会持续购买劣质的玻璃，然后指示助手们从今以后十万分小心地处理这些玻璃。

original: We must only ever buy the most expensive and durable glass.
translation: 我们必须只购买最昂贵耐用的玻璃。

original: [Root.GetFullName] will from now on spend more to ensure all glass that enter the laboratory is as durable and clear as possible.
translation: [Root.GetFullName]将从现在开始花更多钱以确保所有进入实验室的玻璃器皿尽可能干净耐用。

original: Not all pottery is suited for the kind of alchemical work I do. My experiments require both the porous orange pottery that can absorb components in the crucible and the dark and highly fire resistant pots in which even the strongest metal can be melted. Good quality does come at a high price however...
translation: 不是所有的陶器都适合我做的那种炼金术。我的实验既需要多孔橙色陶器，它可以吸收坩埚中的成分，也需要黑色和高度耐火的陶器，在这些陶器中，即使是最强的金属也可以熔化。但是良好的品质也拥有一个很高的价格。

original: In time locals will rise to this challenge.
translation: 本地陶器可以应对这一挑战。

original: [Root.GetFullName] will keep the laboratory supplied using the pottery from local potters to avoid the high price of imported crucibles.
translation: [Root.GetFullName]将保持实验室供给使用本地制陶工人生产的陶器，以避免进口坩埚的高价。

original: Only the best will be good enough!
translation: 只有最好的才是足够好的！

original: [Root.GetFullName] will now only tolerate the best of imported pottery from master potters.
translation: [Root.GetFullName]只接受由制陶大师制作的最好的进口陶器。

original: The local smiths do not seem to appreciate the great care that must be taken to create the kind of tools we need to work the fires of my laboratory. Perhaps in time they will learn but so far the results have been most disappointing.
translation: 当地的铁匠似乎并没有意识到我们必须精心设计我们实验室所需要的工具。也许到时候他们会知道，但到目前为止，结果是最令人失望的。

original: In time they will learn.
translation: 他们终究会学会的。

original: [Root.GetFullName] will cut costs by relying on local smiths to produce the tools and other ironwork required for [Root.GetHerHis] alchemical experiments.
translation: [Root.GetFullName]将会从当地铁匠处购买工具和其他铁器，以此降低 [Root.GetHerHis]炼金实验的成本。

original: We must import the tools we need.
translation: 我们必须进口我们需要的工具。

original: [Root.GetFullName] will import alchemical tools from the master smiths that are best skilled to make them.
translation: [Root.GetFullName]将进口由拥有最优秀制作手艺的大师级铁匠制作的炼金工具。

original: Sometimes the difference identifying success can be as hard as achieving it. Many metals and other substances are so alike that only an expert can tell them apart. To avoid mishaps perhaps it would be best to invest in a rich library of reference literature to avoid unwelcome surprises.
translation: 有时，区分成功的区别可能和取得成功一样困难。许多金属和其他物质是如此相似，只有专家才能区分它们。为了避免不幸，最好投资于丰富的参考文献图书馆，以避免令人讨厌的意外。

original: The books I have will be quite enough.
translation: 我拥有的书籍已经足够了。

original: [Root.GetFullName] will avoid spending money frivolously on books that tell [Root.GetHerHis] what he already knows.
translation: [Root.GetFullName]会避免在那些不能给[Root.GetHerHim]带来新知识的书上花钱。

original: My librarians shall not rest until we have such a collection.
translation: 除非我们有这样的藏书，否则我的图书管理员不能休息。

original: [Root.GetFullName] will ensure the success of [Root.GetHerHis] future experiments by assembling a reference library for all occasions.
translation: 为了保证[Root.GetHerHis]未来实验的成果，[Root.GetFullName]设计了应对所有状况的处理方案。

original: It may not be the most advanced office of alchemy, in fact it might well be the opposite of that, but I have finally completed a laboratory in which to conduct my experiments. Soon the secrets of this world will reveal themselves to me!
translation: 它可能不是炼金术最先进的实验室，事实可能正好相反，但我终于完成了一个实验室来进行我的实验。很快，这个世界的秘密就会向我展现出来！

original: Time to light the furnace...
translation: 是时候给熔炉点火了……

original: Simple Laboratory
translation: 简易实验室

original: In order to conduct experiments in an efficient way this character has constructed a small laboratory. It is not the most impressive of alchemical offices but it has the necessities needed to heat, melt and distill various substances.
translation: 为了有效地进行实验，这个角色建造了一个小型实验室。它不是最令人震撼的炼金术实验室，但它有能力加热、熔化和蒸馏各种物质。

original: The work to create an office in which I can conduct my experiments is finally complete! It may not compare to the greatest laboratories of this age but it will surely help me find the knowledge which I seek.
translation: 一个可以完成我实验的实验室的工作终于完成了！它可能无法与这个时代最伟大的实验室相比，但它肯定会帮助我找到我所寻求的知识。

original: Let us get started!
translation: 让我们开始吧！

original: Laboratory
translation: 实验室

original: In order to conduct experiments in an efficient way this character has constructed a laboratory. It has the basic necessities needed to heat, distill, putrefy and combine various metals and other substances.
translation: 为了有效地进行实验，这个角色建造了一个实验室。它具有加热、蒸馏、腐化和化合各种金属和其他物质所需的基本必需品。

original: My laboratory is finally completed. Will it be able to fulfill my dreams of enlightenment? Only time will tell...
translation: 我的实验室终于完成了。它能实现我的启迪之梦吗？只有时间才能证明……

original: As Above, So Below
translation: 正如古老的炼金术原理所言：下如同上，上如同下；依此成全太一的奇迹。

original: Impressive Laboratory
translation: 令人震撼的实验室

original: This character has spent considerable time and money to build a laboratory where metals and other substances can be manipulated. The setup has attracted some attention from others and is the envy of poorer dabblers in the esoteric arts.
translation: 这个角色花费了大量的时间和金钱建造了一个实验室，在那里可以操控金属和其他物质。这种设置吸引了其他人的注意，是在深奥艺术中穷苦的探索者们所羡慕的对象。

original: The Ambition of a [Root.GetTitle]
translation: [Root.GetTitle]的雄心

original: After months of hard work and a considerable amount of money spent, the laboratory of [Root.GetFullName] is the envy of anyone who wishes to delve into the deeper secrets of life. This office of alchemy allows the [Root.GetTitle] to perform any experiment that has so far been documented and is a testament to [Root.GetHerHis] great ambitions in the field.
translation: 在数月的努力以及大量的资金投入后，[Root.GetFullName]的实验室已可令所有立志探索世间奥秘的人嫉妒。这座炼金工房能让[Root.GetTitle]进行任何文献中记载的实验，而且这也是在这一领域[Root.GetHerHis]巨大野心的见证。

original: As Above, So Below!
translation: 正如古老的炼金术原理所言：下如同上，上如同下；依此成全太一的奇迹。

original: State of the Art Laboratory
translation: 先进的实验室

original: This character has spent both time and a small fortune to construct a proper office where alchemical experiments can be performed. This laboratory is built to be able to handle any experiment currently documented and employs a small team of helpers to keep all the furnaces going at all times.
translation: 这个角色花费了时间和一些小小的运气来建立一个可以进行炼金实验的实验室。这个实验室被建立来处理目前的所有实验文档，并雇佣了一小组助手来确保所有炉子都能够全天候地运行。

original: The House of Chemistry
translation: 炼金之屋

original: With no expenses spared and under the constant supervision of [Root.GetFullName] a house unlike any other has been erected to realize the dream of a perfect alchemical working environment. Many of the contraptions have been conceived and drawn by the [Root.GetTitle] personally and the great number of furnaces alone employs a team of helpers from all the entire realm.\n\nThe office now stands ready to allow [Root.GetFullName] to uncover the secrets of the world, all it requires is for its master to give the instructions.
translation: 在[Root.GetFullName]毫不吝惜的花费和持续的监督下，一座与众不同的可以提供完美炼金环境的房屋已经搭建完毕。许多设备都是由[Root.GetTitle]亲自设计并制作，大量熔炉也雇佣了来自全境的助手团队来完成。\n\n工作室现在随时准备为[Root.GetFullName]发现世界的秘密，只待主人下达指示。

original: Time to get to work!
translation: 是时候工作了！

original: Famous Laboratory
translation: 著名的实验室

original: Equal parts brilliance, deep pockets and rigorous discipline has allowed this character to build a palace of the alchemical arts. This laboratory is not only large in size it is pioneering a number of new techniques to manipulate and combine the many substances of the world.
translation: 广博的才华、深厚的财力和严格的纪律使得这个角色能够建造炼金术艺术的宫殿。这个实验室不仅规模很大，还开创了许多新技术来操纵和组合世界上的许多物质。

original: Build a Laboratory
translation: 建造实验室

original: You must construct a laboratory in which your experiments to uncover the hidden secrets of the universe can be undertaken.
translation: 你必须建造一个实验室。通过这个实验室，你可以去探索蕴藏在星空之中的奥秘。

original: To complete this mission, activate the decision §Y'Construct Laboratory'§! in the Intrigue menu and successfully complete the construction of a Laboratory.
translation: 要完成这项任务，在密谋界面启动决议§Y「建设实验室」§!，成功完成实验室的建设。

original:
To [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

It has come to my attention that you still lack a proper office of Alchemy! How can you hope to uncover the secrets of [Root.GetHermesThriceBlessed], without the proper tools or staff? You should build one or your work will fade into obscurity.

As above, so below.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
致[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

您仍然缺乏一间正式的炼金室的事引起了我的注意！没有合适的工具和成员您怎么能够揭示[Root.GetHermesThriceBlessed]的奥秘呢？您应该建一座炼金室，要不你的工作将默默无闻。

上如同下，下如同上。
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original:
To [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Master, I feel we are both held back by the lack of a proper office of Alchemy. If we are to uncover the secrets of [Root.GetHermesThriceBlessed], we will need the proper tools and work space. Unless you build a laboratory or our work here will fade into obscurity.

As above, so below.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
致[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

大师，我感觉我们因为缺乏一座正式的炼金室而推迟了进展。如果我们想揭开[Root.GetHermesThriceBlessed]的奥秘，我们就需要合适的工具和炼金场所。除非您建了一座实验室，否则我们的工作将默默无闻。

上如同下，下如同上。
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: With a laboratory of my own I can proceed to perform greater works than ever before. How I ever got by without a dedicated workspace and the right tools I will never understand. The secrets of [Root.GetHermesThriceBlessed], shall be mine!
translation: 有了我自己的实验室，我就可以进行比以前更大的工作了。如果没有一个专用的工作空间和正确的工具，我将永远无法理解。[Root.GetHermesThriceBlessed]的秘密，将是我的。

original: My new laboratory is the envy of both those that now live and all that came before me. I dare say even [Root.GetHermesThriceBlessed], himself would be impressed by the setup I now employ to uncover the hidden secrets of matter and spirit.
translation: 我的新实验室折服了我身边所有的人，我打赌就算是[Root.GetHermesThriceBlessed]他自己都会被这个实验室所打动。现在，我可以利用这个实验室去探索物质和精神的奥秘了。

original: My work has just begun.
translation: 我的工作刚刚开始。

original: Hermes, the Thrice Blessed
translation: 三重伟大者赫耳墨斯

original: Idris, the Interpreter
translation: 翻译家伊德里斯

original: The entire castle just shook, waking me from the dreamless sleep that comes after hours of preparatory laboratory work. Did I forget to properly lock the laboratory?
translation: 整个城堡都在摇晃着，使我从几个小时的实验室准备工作后的睡梦中惊醒。难道我忘记锁门了吗？

original: Alas, a sacrifice for science!
translation: 啊，为了科学牺牲！

original: We must really tighten up security...
translation: 我们必须切实加强安保工作……

original: [Root.GetFullName] will spend funds to improve security and increase the efficiency of [Root.GetHerHis] Laboratory.
translation: [Root.GetFullName]将花费资金来提高[Root.GetHerHis]实验室的安全性并提升效率。

original: To the ignorant laboratory equipment can appear both frightening and alien. Word has gotten out of some of the unusual contraptions that have been built for my laboratory. A small mob has assembled outside, demanding answers about why I am constructing so clearly ungodly things.
translation: 对于无辜的实验室设备来说，这既可怕又陌生。一些为我的实验室建造不寻常的设备的谣言已经流传开来。一群愚民聚集在外面，要求我回应为什么要建造如此不敬的东西。

original: I must try to accommodate them.
translation: 我必须尽力去安抚他们。

original: [Root.GetFullName] will make changes to [Root.GetHerHis] laboratory to placate the frightened locals rather than to increase efficiency.
translation: [Root.GetFullName]将对[Root.GetHerHis]实验室做整改，以安抚受惊吓的当地人，而不是提高效率。

original: Why listen to rabble?
translation: 为何要听愚民之言？

original: Disaster has struck! An increasingly foul stench from the kitchen area made the guards investigate my stores of alchemical ingredients. I have been focusing so much on the work of assembling my laboratory that the ingredients have begun to rot!
translation: 灾难降临了！厨房里越来越臭的臭味导致守卫们调查我储存的炼金术原料。因为我一直把精力集中在组装实验室的工作上，以致于原料开始腐烂！

original: Save what can be saved.
translation: 挽救可以挽救的东西。

original: We must build a better storage for the future!
translation: 将来我们必须建造一座更好的仓库！

original:
Greetings [Root.GetTitledFirstName]!
We are delighted to learn that you have taken your first step towards enlightenment. The secrets of the Corpus may be obscured to you now, but in time you may come to understand them as I have.

Hold in thy mind all thou wouldst know, and [Root.GetHermesThriceBlessed], will teach thee.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
致[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，
祝您平安。得知您已经迈出了开化的第一步，我们感到十分高兴。现在赫耳墨斯文集的奥秘对于你可能是晦涩的，但您终将会像我一样理解它们。

牢记汝所知，[Root.GetHermesThriceBlessed]，将谆谆诲汝。
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: This is what I desire to hear!
translation: 这就是我希望听到的！

original: After spending weeks improving the painting I proudly take a step back to behold my work. Sweat gathers on my forehead as I realize what my additions to the painting actually looks like: The original painting is beyond repair! It is now riddled with stick figures, random shapes, and other artistic mishaps.
translation: 在花了几个星期的时间改进这幅画之后，我自豪地退后一步来看我的作品。当我意识到我把这幅画添补成了什么样子时，我的额头满是冷汗：原画无法被修复了！现在整幅画上都是简笔人物，随便的图形和其余的艺术灾难。

original: Has NOT recently ventured to acquired ingredients
translation: 最近没有获取过原材料

original: Acquire Ingredients
translation: 获得原料

original: I have called upon my apprentice, [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] to help me gather ingredients that are needed for further studies of the mysteries in the world. But first I need to decide what kind of ingredients we need.
translation: 我招来我的学徒，[gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName]帮助我收集进一步研究世界上神秘事物所需要的原料。但首先我需要决定我们需要什么样的原料。

original: [gathering_companion.GetSocietyRank] [gathering_companion.GetFirstName] has offered [gathering_companion.GetHerHis] help with gathering much needed ingredients for further studies of the mysteries in the world. But first I need to decide what kind of ingredients we need.
translation: [gathering_companion.GetSocietyRank][gathering_companion.GetFirstName]慷慨地向我提供了[gathering_companion.GetHerHis]帮助，为进一步研究世界上的神秘事物收集许多原料。但是首先需要弄清楚，哪些原料是我们必需的。

original: We will gather herbs in the hills.
translation: 我们会在山里采集草药。

original: In the forest we will hunt for the most prized animal parts.
translation: 我们将在森林里猎取最珍贵的动物内脏。

original: I'm sure we will find useful materials in the marketplace.
translation: 我相信我们会在市场上找到有用的材料。

original: On second thought, I don't have time for this.
translation: 再想一想，我没有时间做这件事。

original: [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] and I arrived in the hills early in the morning to collect various useful herbs that we could find in the countryside.
translation: [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName]和我一早就来到这座小山上，收集我们可以在野外找到的有用草药。

original: Our combined knowledge will be useful for identifying the plants.
translation: 我们的知识将有助于识别植物。

original: I at least know how to identify some plants.
translation: 我至少知道如何去识别一些植物。

original: Which were the poisonous ones again?
translation: 不过哪些是有毒的呢？

original: [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] is most resourceful. While discussing the different aspects of the elements we identify a plethora of plants by tasting and smelling them and the days pass without us even noticing.
translation: [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName]是个足智多谋的人。在讨论元素的不同方面时，我们通过品尝和嗅出它们来识别大量的植物，我们甚至没有注意到时间的流逝。

original: We already have more than we can carry.
translation: 我们拥有的东西远超出自己能承载的。

original: We have now spent days looking high and low for useful herbs. With both me and [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] exhausted we are forced to conclude that the small assortment of interesting plants is what we are getting out of this.
translation: 我们花了几天时间寻找有用的草药。我和[gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName]疲惫不堪，我们不得不承认：唯一的收获，是一个包含了几种有趣植物的小配方。

original: At least we got something out of this.
translation: 至少我们从中得到了点东西。

original: My mouth is feeling funny and numb after [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] got me to taste a weird looking plant.
translation: [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName]让我吃了一种奇怪的植物后，我的嘴巴感觉滑稽又麻木。

original: Let's head home already.
translation: 我们这就回家吧。

original: Together with a small band of hunters [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] and I have set out to hunt animals in the forest in an attempt to gather animal parts. These ingredients will be invaluable in experiments to understanding the aspects of the world.
translation: [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName]和我与一小群猎人一起，开始在森林中猎杀动物，来试图收集动物的器官。对于理解世界的各个方面，这些器官将是非常宝贵的实验原料。

original: Our combined hunting experience should make this easy.
translation: 我们狩猎的经验结合起来应该会让这容易许多。

original: Let's catch our prey.
translation: 让我们抓住猎物。

original: I hope someone here knows how to take down a beast.
translation: 我希望这有人知道如何制服一只野兽。

original: With the help of [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] tracking the animals of the forest they now have nowhere to hide. It almost feels too easy now.
translation: 有[gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName]帮助追踪森林动物，它们如今已无处藏身。感觉真是太容易了。

original: A successful hunt.
translation: 一次成功的狩猎。

original: The forest is full of wild animals. Even though they are delusive creatures our cunning is more than enough to find their hiding places.
translation: 森林里充满了野生动物。哪怕是虚幻的生物，以我们的狡猾，找到他们的藏身之地也绰绰有余。

original: Some of these parts will prove useful.
translation: 其中一部分将被证明是有用的。

original: As I was nocking an arrow, carefully studying my prey on the other side of the shaft, suddenly [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] starts shouting and screaming. While I'm glaring angrily at [gathering_companion.GetHerHim] and the game runs tauntingly its way, [gathering_companion.GetFirstName] tries to explain [gathering_companion.GetHerselfHimself].\n"The sun-rays weren't hitting the glade and thus the organs would've been useless!"
translation: 当我在一边给箭头刻凹痕，一边打量我箭杆另一边的猎物时，[gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName]突然开始大吼和尖叫。当我愤怒地注视着[gathering_companion.GetHerHim]，顺便看着猎物嘲弄地逃跑远去的时候，[gathering_companion.GetFirstName]试图解释[gathering_companion.GetHerselfHimself]。\n「阳光无法照耀到空地上，所以器官将会是没用的！」

original: That's one way to ruin a hunt.
translation: 这是破坏狩猎的一种方式。

original: The stalls around us are brimming with all different kinds of goods and people are swarming around us. [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] and I look each other in the eyes nodding. We know that we will need to be thorough in our search and excellent in our haggling if we want to make some good deals here.
translation: 我们周围的摊位充满了各种各样的商品，人们在我们身边来来往往。[gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName]和我对望了一样，在对方的眼中都看出了同样的意思。我们知道，如果我们想要如愿以偿满载而归，那我们就需要在这儿对每一个摊位进行彻底搜索，并在讨价还价中取得胜利。

original: Our charismatic touch bring forth the best wares to the lowest prices.
translation: 我们的超凡魅力会以最低的价格带来最好的产品。

original: Better get started then.
translation: 最好赶快开始吧。

original: What can this thing be worth?
translation: 这东西能值多少钱？

original: Slipping by the stalls nearly every single one of them has an interesting item. I merely poke [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName] to make [gathering_companion.GetHerHim] aware of it and [gathering_companion.GetSheHe] puts on the smooth-talking. After [gathering_companion.GetHerHis] haggling people almost end up giving us the items for free.
translation: 每一个从身旁溜过的摊位，几乎都有一个有趣的商品。我只是戳了戳[gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName]，让[gathering_companion.GetHerHim]意识到这一点，[gathering_companion.GetSheHe]就变得能说会道。在[gathering_companion.GetHerHis]讨价还价之后，人们几乎都给了我们免费的东西。

original: How did we end up with so many things?
translation: 我们怎么会有这么多收获？

original: Navigating the different scenes and smells of the town square at this hour can be confusing. Still I managed to find some good quality ingredients at a decent price as did [gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 在这个时候，在城市广场上浏览不同的场景和气味会让人困惑。尽管如此，我还是像[gathering_companion.GetTitledFirstName]一样设法找到了一些物美价廉的配料。

original: You can find the most interesting things here.
translation: 你可以在这里找到最有趣的东西。

original: No matter how hard we looked there never seemed to be anything interesting. Somehow I still ended up with my bags full of useless junk that someone sold.
translation: 不管我们怎么努力寻找，这里似乎没有什么有趣的东西。不知不觉地，我的袋子还是装满了别人卖的无用的垃圾。

original: I feel fooled.
translation: 我感觉被愚弄了。

original: [Root.gath_res.GetValue] herbal ingredients added to inventory.\n
translation: [Root.gath_res.GetValue]种药草原料加入库存。\n

original: [Root.gath_res.GetValue] animal part ingredients added to inventory.\n

original: [Root.gath_res.GetValue] alchemical ingredients added to inventory.\n

original:
To [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

My [Root.GetSisterBrother], as you know we're always in need of more ingredients to perform our experiments. These experiments are essential to uncover the mysteries of the world. I propose a joint venture to combine our knowledge in an effort to identify and gather ingredients so that our search for truth will not be halted by such worldly things as material shortages.

As above, so below.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
致[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

我的[Root.GetSisterBrother]，如你所知，为了做实验，我们总是需要更多原料。这些实验对揭示世界之谜是很有必要的。我提议我们一起外出，结合我们的知识去识别和收集原料，使得我们对真理的探寻不会被原料短缺这种世俗的小事所中止。

上如同下，下如同上。
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: Brew Potion of Eudaimonia
translation: 调制幸福药水

original: As a [From.GetSocietyRank] of [From.Society.GetName], §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! can brew a potion to raise low spirits.
translation: 作为[From.GetSocietyRank]的[From.Society.GetName]，§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!可以调制一剂药水来振奋精神。

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! brews [From.GetHerselfHimself] a potion.\n
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!为[From.GetHerselfHimself]调制了一剂药水。\n

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! brews a potion for §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!为§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!调制药水。\n

original: Apathetic
translation: 冷淡

original: This character has reoccurring apathetic episodes which prevents them from living an ordinary life.
translation: 这个角色身上反复表现的冷漠态度阻止他们过上平常的生活。

original: I brewed the potion just like the enciphered recipe dictated. Mere seconds after it passed my lips a wave of pleasurable sensations rolled over me! While the peak of my bliss was short-lived, that first rush must have washed away the dispiriting darkness that has plagued me for so long.
translation: 我的药水是用密码般的配方调制而成的。仅仅在液体划过我的嘴唇几秒钟后，愉悦的感觉就席卷了我。虽然我的高潮是短暂的，但第一次冲击就冲走了困扰我这么久的沮丧黑暗。

original: I feel different. Lighter!
translation: 有种不一样的感觉。真轻松！

original: 'I do not mean to meddle, [Root.GetTitledFirstName], but you do not seem to be well,' says [From.GetTitledFirstName], concern tinting [From.GetHerHis] voice. 'In my studies, I have unveiled a secret to raise low spirits and bring about happiness.' [From.GetSheHeCap] offers me a flask containing an unidentifiable liquid.
translation: 「我不是有意干涉，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，但你似乎不太好，」[From.GetTitledFirstName]用[From.GetHerHis]充满关心的声音说道，「在我的学习中，我发现了一个提高士气带来幸福快乐的秘密。」[From.GetSheHeCap]提供给我一个瓶子，里面装着一种无法辨认的液体。

original: I am willing to give it a try, [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 我很愿意试一试，[From.GetFirstName]。

original: Drink the potion. §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has assured you there will be no side effects...
translation: 服下药剂。§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! 向你保证不会有副作用。

original: What is that vile concoction? Magic? Only [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] can cure me!
translation: 这是什么糟糕的混合物？魔法？只有 [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]才能治好我！

original: Refuse to drink the potion.
translation: 拒绝喝下药水。

original: I brewed the potion just like the enciphered recipe dictated. [From.GetTitledFirstName] gratefully accepted my help and as soon as [From.GetSheHe] drank my concoction, I could see a change in [From.GetHerHim]. Now the light has returned to [From.GetHerHis] eyes!
translation: 我的药水是用密码般的配方调制而成的。[From.GetTitledFirstName]感激的接受了我的帮助，一旦 [From.GetSheHe]喝下了我的混合物，我就能观察[From.GetHerHim]的变化。现在光亮返回了[From.GetHerHis]眼睛。

original: I am glad I could be of assistance, [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 我很高兴我能帮上忙，[From.GetFirstName]。

original: For a while I felt like nothing could extinguish the renewed sense of joy and purpose I gained after drinking the potion. It seems as if I was mistaken. Life and duty wears one down and I am no exception. There is nothing more, no great secret to uncover. Just toil and anguish, every day until my last.
translation: 有一段时间，我觉得没有什么能熄灭我在喝完药水后获得的快乐和目标感。现在看来我好像弄错了。生活和责任使人疲惫不堪，我也不例外。没有什么更多的更大的秘密要揭开。每天辛苦工作，直到最后一天。

original: It was too good to be true...
translation: 好得让人无法相信是真的……

original: I have been struck by a great loss. The death of [From.GetTitledFirstName] has left me without an apprentice and an assistant, as well as a companion. While I already contemplate taking on a new pupil, I shall surely mourn for [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 我遭受到了巨大的损失。[From.GetTitledFirstName]的去世让我失去了一个学徒、助手和同伴。虽然我已经考虑重新招一个新学生，但我一定会为[From.GetFirstName]哀悼。

original: The death of [From.GetTitledFirstName] has left me without an apprentice and an assistant. I shall mourn over [From.GetHerHis] passing, of course, but there was also a hint of relief to my reaction as I was brought the news. Now I can finally take on a proper pupil.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]的去世让我失去了学徒和助手。理所当然，我会为[From.GetHerHis]离世哀悼，但是我收到这个消息的时候我却同样有了一种如释重负的感觉。现在我终于可以有一个合适的弟子了。

original: Go to [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 归于[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]吧，[From.GetFirstName]。

original: Apprentice
translation: 学徒

original:
To [Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

I must say, dear colleague, I cannot fathom how you get along without a proper assistant! My own is both bright and obedient. Not once have I detected the stench of alcohol upon [From.GetHerHisOpp] breath. Take my advice and find an apprentice of your own.

As above, so below.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
致[Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

亲爱的同事，我必须坦言，我不明白您是如何在没有一名合适的助手的情况下进行工作的！我的助手聪慧且听话。我一次也没有发现过[From.GetHerHisOpp]的呼吸带有酒味。请您采纳我的建议，并且找一个学徒来辅助您。

上如同下，下如同上。
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: Find an Apprentice
translation: 找一名学徒

original: Every respectable scholar of the Hermetic arts should take on an apprentice. Alchemical experiments are complex operations which requires extra hands, and what [Root.GetTitle] has enough time to search dusty libraries, shady markets and faraway forests for rare ingredients?
translation: 每个受人尊敬的赫耳墨斯学者都应该有一个学徒。炼金实验是复杂的操作，需要额外的人手，况且身为[Root.GetTitle]，你有足够的时间来到积灰的图书馆搜索资料，在阴暗的市场和遥远的森林里寻找稀有的炼金术原料吗？

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! must either assign an apprentice through the §YMinor Titles§! screen or keep their eyes open for a promising pupil to appear to complete this mission.
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!必须授予§Y荣誉头衔§!或者等待潜力候选人出现从而指派学徒去完成这项任务。

original: Over the past months, the thought of an apprentice has been at the forefront of my mind. I have considered my advisors, but I dare say not one of them seem fit for the role. However, one of my servants has caught my eye. [From.GetFirstName] is an attentive [From.GetManWoman] with steady hands and a good head on [From.GetHerHis] shoulders.
translation: 过去的几个月里，收一名学徒的想法一直在我的脑海里盘旋。我考虑过我的顾问们，但我敢说他们当中没有一个适合这个角色。然而，一个仆人引起了我的注意。[From.GetFirstName]是个细心的[From.GetManWoman]，有着稳健的双手，并且[From.GetHerHis]肩膀上长着一个好头脑。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] knows how to obey, at the very least.
translation: 至少[From.GetSheHeCap]知道如何服从。

original: Surely I can find someone more worthy than a servant!
translation: 当然，我能找到一个比仆人更有价值的人！

original: You decide to keep looking for an apprentice.
translation: 你决定继续寻找一个学徒。

original: I have a good feeling about this! With [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] as my apprentice, I am sure to uncover many a secret. Perhaps I shall event perform the great work, the Magnum opus!
translation: 我对这有很好的感觉。[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]作为我的学徒，我一定会发现许多秘密。也许我甚至能编撰伟大的作品，一部巨著！

original: Bright times are ahead.
translation: 光明的时光近在眼前。

original: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]'s apprenticeship has reached its end. [From.GetSheHeCap] knows enough of alchemy, astrology and Theurgy to be acknowledged as a hermetic scholar in [From.GetHerHis] own rights. As a parting gift, I gave [From.GetHerHim] a tome containing a few of my most well-guarded secrets. I did not pretend to notice the tears in [From.GetHerHis] eyes, but they touched me deeply.
translation: [From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]的学业已经结束了。[From.GetSheHeCap]拥有了足够的炼金术和占星术知识以及神通，让他有权成为一名赫耳墨斯学者。我给了[From.GetHerHim]一本包含我最保守秘密的厚书作为离别礼物。我假装没有注意到[From.GetHerHis]眼中的泪水，但是它们深深触动了我。

original: Best of luck in your studies, [From.GetSocietyRank]!
translation: 祝你研究顺利，[From.GetSocietyRank]！

original: Epic Adventure
translation: 史诗冒险

original: Great Adventure
translation: 伟大冒险

original: Nice Adventure
translation: 愉快冒险

original: Emerald Tablet
translation: 翠玉录

original:
To [Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

My [Root.GetSisterBrother], I have a proposal which might interest you. An old letter detailing the possible locations of some lost hermetic writings came into my possession not many moons ago. If you fund an expedition, we can search for these treasures together!

As above, so below.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
致[Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

我的[Root.GetSisterBrother]，我有一个你可能会感兴趣的提议。不久前一封信落到了我的手里，它详细描述了一些遗失的赫耳墨斯文献的可能地点。如果你资助这场探险，我们可以一起寻找这些宝藏！

上如同下，下如同上。
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original:
To [Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
The letter mentioned three lost texts: a tome in a local antiquary, a scroll hidden in a [temple_site.Holder.GetHouseOfWorship] in [temple_site.GetName], and a tablet in the ancient library ruins of [ruin_site.GetName] in [ruin_site.Holder.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. The further we venture, in distance as well as into the past, the greater secrets we might uncover. The choice is yours.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
致[Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank][Root.GetFirstName]，
信上提到了三个遗失的文本：本地古董商所持有的一本厚书，一张藏在[temple_site.GetName]内的[temple_site.Holder.GetHouseOfWorship]的卷轴，以及位于[ruin_site.Holder.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]内的[ruin_site.GetName]古图书馆遗址的一块碑。我们探索得越远，追溯得越久，就越可能会发现更大的秘密。这将由你来做决定。

此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original:
To [Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
I have the best of news! Since our last correspondence I have acquired a map leading to a surviving chamber of the great library in Alexandria! While the previous options remain – a tome here in [Root.Capital.GetName], a scroll in [temple_site.GetName] and tablet in [ruin_site.Holder.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName] – I would argue that this opportunity is too great to pass up.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
致[Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank][Root.GetFirstName]，
我有一个好消息！自从我们上次通信后，我获得了一张通往亚历山大大图书馆废墟的一个幸存房间的地图。尽管之前的选项依然可行——在[Root.Capital.GetName]的一本古籍，在[temple_site.GetName]的一份卷轴以及在[ruin_site.Holder.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的一块碑——我认为这是一个绝好的机会，不能放弃。

此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: Excellent indeed! We shall go to Alexandria!
translation: 确实不错！我们将前往亚历山大！

original: You and §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! set off on an expedition to Alexandria, hoping to find the ruins of the Great Library.\n
translation: 你和§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!出发前往亚历山大，希望能找到大图书馆的废墟。\n

original: Let us travel to the ruins in [ruin_site.GetName].
translation: 让我们前往[ruin_site.GetName]的废墟。

original: You and §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! set off on an expedition to [ruin_site.GetName], hoping to find a tablet in the ruins there.\n
translation: 你和§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!启程前往[ruin_site.GetName]，希望能在废墟中找到一块碑。\n

original: It seems like the best option is the scroll in [temple_site.GetName].
translation: 看起来最好的选项就是那份存放在[temple_site.GetName]的卷轴了。

original: You and §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! set off on an expedition to [temple_site.GetName], hoping to find a scroll in a [temple_site.Holder.GetHouseOfWorship] there.\n
translation: 你和§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!启程前往[temple_site.GetName]，希望能在[temple_site.Holder.GetHouseOfWorship]找到一个卷轴。\n

original: I do not have much to spare... Surely the local antiquary will do?
translation: 我没有太多的空闲……但当地的古董商人应该有吧？

original: You and §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! and set off to a local antiquarian in search for an old tome.\n
translation: 你和§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!一起去一个本地古董收藏家那里寻找一本古籍。\n

original: a successful search.\n
translation: 一次成功的搜寻。\n

original: Tabula Smaragdina
translation: 翠玉录

original: When we found the engraved door to the chamber, we could hardly believe our eyes. [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] and I had nearly given up. That day would be the very last of our search, we had decided, so our discovery must surely have been a divine miracle! My hands were shaking as I, alongside the servants, cleared the last rubble and heaved the door open.\n\nLantern held high over our heads, my colleague and I entered first. The faint light fell on countless pots and chests, elaborate wall paintings and a great forge. Something else reflected the light from deep within the chamber, something vibrantly green... [From.GetFirstName]'s breaths were quick and shallow. 'It.... it cannot be!'
translation: 难以置信，我们竟然真的发现了通往墓室的浮雕大门。[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]和我都几乎要放弃了。本来我们都已经决定那天的搜索将会是我们本次行动的最后一次了！这一定是神迹！我和随从们双手颤抖地清理掉最后的瓦砾，打开了那扇门。\n\n我和我的同僚将提灯高举过头顶走在前头。昏暗的灯光洒落在数不胜数的容器与箱子上，还有精美的壁画以及一个巨大的锻炉。等等，在房间的深处还有些东西在闪光，绿晃晃的……[From.GetFirstName]的呼吸突然急促起来。「那，那不可能！」

original: Finally, the deepest secrets of Hermes Trismegistus shall be mine!
translation: 终究，赫耳墨斯·特利斯墨吉斯忒斯的最深的秘密将会是我的！

original: Our expedition into foreign lands encountered some difficulties, but in the end we made it to the ruins of [ruin_site.GetName] safely. After a fortnight of excavation the servants uncovered the entrance to a hidden underground chamber. [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] and I entered side by side, the air heavy with excitement.
translation: 我们在外国的远征探险遇到了一些苦难，但最终我们安全抵到了 [ruin_site.GetName]的废墟。在两周的发掘之后，仆人们找到了一个通向隐藏的地下墓室的入口。[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]和我并肩进入，空气中充满了兴奋。

original: Do my eyes deceive me, or are those symbols hieroglyphs?
translation: 是我的眼睛在骗我，还是说那些符号是象形文字？

original: The bribe we offered the [temple_site.Holder.Religion.GetPriestTitle] of [temple_site.GetName] was enough to make [temple_site.Holder.GetHerHim] unlock the inner chambers of the [temple_site.Holder.GetHouseOfWorship]. We examined every nook and cranny for clues of the scroll's hiding place. On the fifth day, one of the servants announced [Root.GetSheHe] had found a hidden chamber...
translation: 我们给[temple_site.GetName][temple_site.Holder.Religion.GetPriestTitle]足够的贿赂让[temple_site.Holder.GetHerHim]打开[temple_site.Holder.GetHouseOfWorship]的内室。我们检查了每一个角落和裂缝寻找卷轴的藏身之处的线索。在第五天，一个仆人宣布[Root.GetSheHe]发现了一个密室……

original: We found it, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]!
translation: [From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]，我们找到它了！

original: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] and I searched every shelf and chest in the dusty old shop. For days on end we did nothing but breathe dust and leaf through boring old texts. They were all full of nonsense! On the fourth day, I was thus incredibly surprised to lay my eyes on the symbols of the Three Primes!
translation: [From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]和我在满是灰尘的老店里搜查了所有的书架和箱子。几天来，我们除了呼吸灰尘和翻阅枯燥的旧书之外，什么也没做。他们都是胡说八道！第四天，我惊讶地看着三个素数的符号！

original: I think I found the tome, [From.GetFirstName]!
translation: 我想我找到了册子了，[From.GetFirstName]！

original: My misgivings arose early after our arrival in Alexandria, but [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] insisted that we must have misinterpreted the map. After every failure, [From.GetSheHe] had a new idea. A suspicion crept upon me... What if the map was forged, and [From.GetFirstName] knew? Was the blasted expedition a plot to ruin me?!
translation: 我们在抵达亚历山大后很早就产生了疑虑，但[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]坚持认为我们一定曲解了地图。在经过多次失败后，[From.GetSheHe]有了一个新的主意。但是疑虑却绕上了我的心头……地图是不是伪造的，而且[From.GetFirstName]知道这些？这场被诅咒的冒险是不是一个毁灭我的阴谋？

original: Our expedition into foreign lands certainly encountered its fair share of difficulties. We dealt with everything from unfavorable weather to lame horses, but in the end, the fraudulent guide was the nail in the coffin. When [Root.GetSheHe] escaped with our last gold, we also discovered that we were in the wrong part of [ruin_site.Holder.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]!
translation: 我们在外国的远征探险当然遇到了一些苦难。我们面对着从恶劣天气到马匹跛足的许多问题，但是最终，那个骗子向导是对我们的致命一击。当[Root.GetSheHe]带着我们最后的金子逃走后，我们也发现自己身处[ruin_site.Holder.TopLiege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的错误地点！

original: The bribe we offered the [temple_site.Holder.Religion.GetPriestTitle] of [temple_site.GetName] was enough to make [temple_site.Holder.GetHerHim] unlock the inner chambers of the [temple_site.Holder.GetHouseOfWorship]. We examined every nook and cranny for clues of the scroll's hiding place. After a week of nothing more interesting than the discovery of a stash of lewd letters, we had to admit defeat.
translation: 我们向[temple_site.Holder.Religion.GetPriestTitle]的[temple_site.GetName]提供的贿赂足以让[temple_site.Holder.GetHerHim]打开[temple_site.Holder.GetHouseOfWorship]的内室了。我们仔细检查了每一个角落，寻找着卷轴藏匿处的线索。一周之后，除了一堆藏匿起来的淫秽作品以外我们再也找不到任何能够引人注意的东西，我们不得不承认失败。

original: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] and I searched every shelf and chest in the dusty old shop. For days at end we did nothing but breathe dust and page through boring old texts. They were all full of nonsense! After a week, we had to admit defeat. We would never uncover anything of worth in this place.
translation: [From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]和我在满是灰尘的老店里搜查了所有的书架和箱子。几天来，我们除了呼吸灰尘和翻阅枯燥的旧书之外，什么也没做。他们都是胡说八道！一个星期后，我们不得不承认失败。我们永远不会发现这个地方有价值的东西。

original: Find a Hermetic Text
translation: 寻找一份赫耳墨斯文献

original: Your colleague [FromFrom.GetSocietyRank] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] has found a letter detailing the possible locations of some great old works of Hermeticism. A deal has been struck – [FromFrom.GetSocietyRank] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] shall share the contents of the letter with you, and you shall fund the expedition.
translation: 你的同事[FromFrom.GetSocietyRank][FromFrom.GetFirstName]发现了一封信，详细描述了赫耳墨斯学会的一些伟大作品的可能位置。一项协议达成了——[FromFrom.GetSocietyRank][FromFrom.GetFirstName]将和你分享信里的内容，而你将资助这场远征探险。

original: If §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! sets out on one of the expeditions suggested by §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! and finds an old hermetic text, the mission is completed.
translation: 如果§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!启程前往§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!推荐的其中一处地点并找到一个古老的赫耳墨斯文献，任务就完成了。

original:
To [Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

[infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] is a pompous, featherbrained scoundrel – you know it to be true, [Root.GetSisterBrother]! It is time for [infiltration_target.GetHerHim] to pay for [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] sins. Let us ruin [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] laboratory and steal [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] secrets!

As above, so below.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
致[Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

[infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank][infiltration_target.GetFirstName]是个自大而轻浮的混账——我想您明白这一点，[Root.GetSisterBrother]！是时候让[infiltration_target.GetHerHim]为[infiltration_target.GetHerHis]罪过负责了。让我们捣毁[infiltration_target.GetHerHis]实验室并且窃取[infiltration_target.GetHerHis]秘密吧！

上如同下，下如同上。
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original:
To [Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

My friend, we have a common nemesis. You know of whom I speak – the despicable idiot [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]! The thought of [infiltration_target.GetHerHim] being a member of our respectable community... it makes me sick! Let us ruin [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] laboratory and steal [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] secrets!

As above, so below.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
致[Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

我的朋友，我们有着共同的敌人。您也知道我说的就是[infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank][infiltration_target.GetFirstName]——那个卑鄙的蠢货！[infiltration_target.GetHerHim]成为我们这一受人尊敬的学会的一员的想法真是……让我作呕！让我们捣毁[infiltration_target.GetHerHis]实验室并且窃取[infiltration_target.GetHerHis]秘密吧！

上如同下，下如同上。
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original:
To [Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

[infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] is a greedy, slothful idiot who deserves none of the riches in [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] possession. What do you say, [Root.GetSisterBrother] – shall we raid [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] laboratory and claim that which should be ours?

As above, so below.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
致[Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

[infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank][infiltration_target.GetFirstName]这个贪婪而懒惰的蠢货不配继续占有[infiltration_target.GetHerHis]资产。[Root.GetSisterBrother]，我们一起去查抄[infiltration_target.GetHerHis]实验室并宣称它应为我们所有，您意下如何？

上如同下，下如同上。

此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: Infiltrate the Laboratory of [FromFrom.GetSocietyRank] [FromFrom.GetFirstName]
translation: 潜入[FromFrom.GetSocietyRank][FromFrom.GetFirstName]的实验室

original: The greedy and paranoid [FromFrom.GetSocietyRank] [FromFrom.GetFirstName] guards [FromFrom.GetHerHis] secrets jealously. A most shameful behavior, indeed! Unlike [FromFrom.GetHerHim], you know how to share. In the spirit of collaboration, you and a colleague has agreed to infiltrate [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s laboratory and either steal or destroy anything of value. Perhaps you will do both!
translation: 贪婪多疑的[FromFrom.GetSocietyRank][FromFrom.GetFirstName]小心翼翼地守着[FromFrom.GetHerHis]秘密。这真是一种最可耻的行为！与[FromFrom.GetHerHim]不同，你懂得如何分享。本着合作精神，你和一个同僚商定潜入[FromFrom.GetFirstName]的实验室，并窃取或摧毁任何有价值的东西。也许鱼和熊掌可以兼得！

original: Your colleague will bring you to the laboratory of §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!. If you manage to steal or destroy anything and get away unnoticed, the mission is completed.
translation: 你的同事会带你到§Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!的实验室。如果你能设法偷窃或者摧毁任何东西而不被注意到，任务就完成了。

original:
Most esteemed [Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Yet my spies have not found the exact location of [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]'s laboratory. You need not worry, friend, for they have some promising leads. We will just have to be patient.

As above, so below.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
最尊敬的[Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

虽然我的密探没有找到[infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank][infiltration_target.GetFirstName]的实验室的准确位置。但你无需担心，朋友，他们掌握着一些有希望的线索。我们只需要保持耐心。

上如同下，下如同上。
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: I shall prepare for a swift departure.
translation: 我要准备迅速动身了。

original: As soon as the spies of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has located the laboratory, you will depart.
translation: 一旦§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!的间谍找到实验室，你就得动身。

original: [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] must be paranoid, for [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] laboratory is a fortress hidden away on a remote island. As we cross the dark waters under the cover of night, [From.GetFirstName] tells me about the guard rotation. We will only have one chance to breach the defenses.
translation: [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank][infiltration_target.GetFirstName]一定是太过多疑了，[infiltration_target.GetHerHis]研究室是一座隐藏在遥远岛屿上的要塞。当我们穿过夜幕掩盖下的暗色河流时[From.GetFirstName]告诉我关于卫兵轮换的事。我们只有一次突破这道防线的机会。

original: [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] has hidden [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] laboratory deep in the dungeons of [infiltration_target.Capital.GetName]. [From.GetFirstName] and I have passed unnoticed so far thanks to the intelligence [From.GetHerHis] spies provided, but the last door is heavily guarded.
translation: [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank][infiltration_target.GetFirstName]已经将[infiltration_target.GetHerHis]实验室隐藏在[infiltration_target.Capital.GetName]地牢的深处。多亏了[From.GetHerHis]间谍提供的情报，[From.GetFirstName]和我未被发现便通过了，但是最后一道门守卫森严。

original: It was not hard to locate [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]'s laboratory, [From.GetFirstName] tells me as we enter the [infiltration_target.Capital.GetHolding]. 'While old [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] has no talent for keeping secrets, [infiltration_target.GetSheHe] does know how to hire proper guards,' [From.GetSheHe] continues, telling me about the obstacle ahead.
translation: 找到[infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank][infiltration_target.GetFirstName]的实验室并不困难，当我们进入[infiltration_target.Capital.GetHolding]时，[From.GetFirstName]对我说：「虽然[infiltration_target.GetFirstName]在保密这方面没什么本事，但[infiltration_target.GetSheHe]在雇卫兵这方面真有两把刷子，」然后[From.GetSheHe]接着给我讲述前方的障碍。

original: I have a way with people and a heavy purse.
translation: 我懂得与人相处之道，还带了不少钱。

original: Attempt to bribe the guards.\n
translation: 尝试贿赂卫兵。\n

original: I prepared a potion of dreamless sleep for this very eventuality.
translation: 我为这种可能性准备了一剂无梦的睡眠药水。

original: Attempt to drug the guards with a potion of your own making.\n
translation: 试着用你自己调制的药水麻醉卫兵。\n

original: a successful scheme.
translation: 一次成功的密谋。

original: a failed scheme and detection.
translation: 一次失败的密谋和侦查。

original: You distract them, and I will enter the laboratory.
translation: 你拖住他们，我去实验室。

original: §Y[infiltration_companion.GetTitledFirstName]§! attempts to distract the guards. You will have to perform any theft or sabotage yourself once inside, which limits the amount of damage you may accomplish.\n
translation: §Y[infiltration_companion.GetTitledFirstName]§!试图分散卫兵的注意力。你只能单独在内部进行盗窃或破坏，这就限制了你所能造成的伤害。\n

original: Actually, I have changed my mind...
translation: 实际上，我已经改变主意了……

original: This is a bad idea. You retreat to the safety of your [Root.Capital.GetHolding].\n
translation: 这个是糟糕的主意。你退回了你[Root.Capital.GetHolding]处的安全之地。\n

original: As we step out of the shadows, the guards draw their blades. Their posture and faces change as I pull the heavy purse from my pocket. After a short exchange of words and coins, [infiltration_companion.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName] and I enter through the heavy door. 'What now, [Root.GetSisterBrother]? What course of action would you recommend?'
translation: 当我们走出阴影，卫兵们拔出了剑。不过当我从口袋里掏出沉重的钱包时，他们的姿势和脸色都变了。在短暂的交涉、送上金钱之后，[infiltration_companion.GetSocietyRank][infiltration_companion.GetFirstName]和我穿过了沉重的大门。「现在，[Root.GetSisterBrother]，你建议我们下一步采取什么行动？」

original: By some miracle, [infiltration_companion.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName] manages to empty the little vial of potion in a jug before it is brought to the guards. Within a quarter of an hour, they are snoring softly. 'We must hurry – the sedating effect won't last forever,' I whisper as we sneak past. 'What now, [Root.GetSisterBrother]?' [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName] asks once we are inside.
translation: 有如神助一般，[infiltration_companion.GetSocietyRank][infiltration_companion.GetFirstName]设法在送给卫兵的水壶里倒了一小瓶药水。不到一刻钟，他们就开始打鼾。「我们必须尽快——药效不会永远持续下去。」在我们偷溜进去时我小声说道。「现在我们要干什么，[Root.GetSisterBrother]？」我们刚进去[infiltration_companion.GetFirstName]就问道。

original: If you focus on destruction, I will search for items of value.
translation: 如果你致力于搞破坏，我将会去寻找有价值的东西。

original: You split up to cover more ground. Effective, but riskier.\n
translation: 你们分头行动以覆盖更大的范围。这更有效，但更加冒险。

original: Let me take care of sabotage. Collect anything useful you come across.
translation: 我来搞破坏。你去收集见到的有用的东西。

original: Help me find where [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] keeps [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] valuables.
translation: 帮我找到[infiltration_target.GetFirstName]的贵重物品都放在哪。

original: You stay together. Safer, but not as effective.\n
translation: 你们一起行动。这更安全，但效率并不高。\n

original: Our goal is maximum damage. Let's get started!
translation: 我们的目标是造成最大程度的破坏。让我们开始吧！

original: First, everything went so well. By some miracle, [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName] managed to empty the little vial of potion in a jug before it was brought to the guards. That was half an hour ago! The guards are showing no signs of drowsiness and our time is running out. I whisper apologies as we leave, but [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName] does not answer.
translation: 起初，一切都很顺利。有如神助一般，[infiltration_companion.GetFirstName]设法在送给卫兵的水壶里倒了一小瓶药水。那可是半个小时前的事了！卫兵们还是一点睡意都没有，我们快没时间了。我们离开时我低声道歉，但是[infiltration_companion.GetFirstName]没有回答。

original: That recipe never failed me before, I swear...
translation: 那个配方从来没有失败过，我发誓……

original: I had my doubts, but color me impressed! [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName] managed to lure the guards away by setting off an alchemical reaction producing the foulest of odors! While the trick was effective, to say the least, I do not know how much time I have. I need to focus. What should I do next?
translation: 我有怀疑，但我印象深刻！[infiltration_companion.GetFirstName]设法通过产生恶臭气味的炼金术反应来驱散卫兵！虽然这个把戏是有效的，至少可以说，我不知道我有多少时间。我需要集中精力。下一步我该怎么办？

original: I shall steal [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]'s rarest ingredients and most secret tomes!
translation: 我将要偷取[infiltration_target.GetFirstName]最稀有的原料以及最不为人所知的巨著！

original: My focus will be maximum destruction. Where is the fire steel...?
translation: 我的重点将是最大程度的毁灭。火钢在哪？

original: I have seen many foolish things in my days, but [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName]'s poor attempt at a distraction might just take the prize. I am dumbstruck as [infiltration_companion.GetSheHe] rattles [infiltration_companion.GetHerHis] blade against the wall and begins to wail loudly! When the guard's footsteps draw near, I grab [infiltration_companion.GetHerHim] and run. 'Really, a ghost? No one in their right mind would fall for that!'
translation: 我这几天见到过许多蠢事，但[infiltration_companion.GetFirstName]拖住敌人的手段说不定是最蠢的一个。[infiltration_companion.GetSheHe]用[infiltration_companion.GetHerHis]刀吱吱呀呀地怼墙并发出哀嚎，我被吓得目瞪口呆！当卫兵的脚步声临近时，我拽着[infiltration_companion.GetHerHim]开始逃跑。「你认真的吗，装成幽灵？正常人哪个会被你这把戏骗到？」

original: There will be no second attempt tonight. Not in a long, long time.
translation: 今晚不要再做第二次，永远不要。

original: Just as I am about to pour acid over [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]'s notes, the door opens behind me. I whirl around and find myself facing none other but the guards. Our eyes lock for a moment before I drop the acid and run, but it is pointless. Despite the lingering effects of the sleeping potion, they are still faster than me.
translation: 当我正要将酸液倒在[infiltration_target.GetFirstName]的笔记上时，我背后的门打开了。我转过身来，发现自己面对的正是守卫。我们的目光愣了一会儿，我扔下酸液拔腿就跑，但毫无意义。尽管有睡眠药水的影响，他们仍然比我快。

original: Just as I am about to pour acid over [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]'s notes, the door opens behind me. I whirl around and find myself staring into the panicked eyes of [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName]. A split second later, I notice the guards holding [infiltration_companion.GetHerHim]. 'Run!' [infiltration_companion.GetSheHe] shouts, but it is too late.
translation: 当我正要把酸液倒在[infiltration_target.GetFirstName]的笔记上时，我背后的门打开了。我转过身去，看见[infiltration_companion.GetFirstName]惊恐的眼神。电光火石之间，我注意到卫兵抓住了[infiltration_companion.GetHerHim]。「跑！」[infiltration_companion.GetSheHe]大喊道，但已经太晚了。

original: My hands are deep in one of [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]'s big ingredient chests when the door opens behind me. I whirl around and find myself facing none other but the guards. Our eyes lock for a moment before I drop the acid and run, but it is pointless. Despite the lingering effects of the potion, they are still faster than me.
translation: 我在[infiltration_target.GetFirstName]的一个大配料箱中深挖，突然我背后的门打开了。我转过身来，发现自己面对的正是守卫。我们的目光愣了一会儿，我扔下酸液拔腿就跑，但毫无意义。尽管有睡眠药水的影响，他们仍然比我快。

original: My hands are deep in one of [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]'s big ingredient chests when the door opens behind me. I whirl around and find myself staring into the panicked eyes of [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName]. A split second later, I notice the guards holding [infiltration_companion.GetHerHim]. 'Run!' [infiltration_companion.GetSheHe] shouts, but it is too late.
translation: 我在[infiltration_target.GetFirstName]的一个大配料箱中深挖，突然我背后的门打开了。我转过身去，看见[infiltration_companion.GetFirstName]惊恐的眼神。电光火石之间，我注意到卫兵抓住了[infiltration_companion.GetHerHim]。「跑！」[infiltration_companion.GetSheHe]大喊道，但已经太晚了。

original: Release me! I'm a colleague of your [infiltration_target.GetMasterMistress]!
translation: 放了我！我是你们[infiltration_target.GetMasterMistress]的同事！

original: It seems like my guards have caught a couple of ugly fishes! Apparently [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName], along with [From.GetHerHis] accomplice [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName], made an attempt to enter my laboratory and steal my secrets. This insult cannot go unanswered...
translation: 看来我的卫兵抓到了几只老鼠！显然[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]和[From.GetHerHis]帮凶[infiltration_companion.GetFirstName]一起，试图闯入我的实验室并窃取我的机密。我绝不会放过这种侮辱……

original: Perhaps [From.GetFirstName] is willing to trade a few secrets for [From.GetHerHis] freedom.
translation: 或许[From.GetFirstName]愿意用一些秘密换取[From.GetHerHis]自由。

original: Leave them in the dungeon. I will deal with them later...
translation: 把他们扔在地牢里。我稍后会处理他们……

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! refuses to share [From.GetHerHis] secrets and stays imprisoned.
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!拒绝交代[From.GetHerHis]秘密并继续被囚禁着。

original: I have reached the point where I am willing to shamelessly beg for water when the guards drag me from my cell. I must have fainted, for the next thing I see is [From.GetFirstName]'s scornful face! 'Well, well, well... My guards have caught one laughable crook, indeed!' After some further insults, [From.GetSheHe] offers me my freedom in exchange for some of my deepest secret knowledge.
translation: 当卫兵把我从牢房拖出来的时候，我已经到了不得不低声下气乞求饮水的地步了。我以为自己一定要晕过去了，接下来看到的却是[From.GetFirstName]轻蔑的脸。「哎呦喂……我的卫兵确实是抓到了一个可笑的骗子！」在我遭受了进一步的羞辱之后，[From.GetSheHe]为我提供了自由，以我的秘密知识为代价……

original: Give me some water and then I will tell you whatever you wish to know.
translation: 给我一些水，然后我将告诉你一切你想知道的。

original: You will never be worthy of my secrets!
translation: 你永远也配不上知道我的秘密！

original: You stay imprisoned.
translation: 你留在监狱里。

original: I barely recognized [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] as they dragged [From.GetHerHim] towards me. A few days in the dungeons does that to people, I hear. I am sure I could have asked for [From.GetHerHis] firstborn, so eager was [From.GetSheHe] to have [From.GetHerHis] freedom. [From.GetFirstName] filled notebook after notebook under my stern gaze.
translation: 当[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]被拖到我面前时，我几乎认不出[From.GetHerHim]来了。我曾听说人只要在地牢里待上那么几天，就会摧残至此。如今[From.GetSheHe]如此渴望自由，怕是连[From.GetHerHis]长子都愿意乖乖献祭。[From.GetFirstName]在我的严厉注视下，将[From.GetHerHis]所知道的东西全部交代了。

original: This will be an interesting read, indeed.
translation: 这将是一场有趣的阅读。

original: I barely recognized [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] as they dragged [From.GetHerHim] towards me. A few days in the dungeons does that to people, I hear. It seems like [From.GetSheHe] enjoyed [From.GetHerHis] cell, however, for when I told [From.GetHerHim] of my generous offer, I got nothing but insults and curses in return.
translation: 当[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]被拖到我面前时，我几乎认不出[From.GetHerHim]来了。我曾听说人只要在地牢里待上那么几天，就会摧残至此。看起来[From.GetSheHe]很享受[From.GetHerHis]牢房。但是，当我向[From.GetHerHim]提出慷慨的提议时，却只得到了侮辱和诅咒。

original: Enjoy your beloved cell, [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 享受你心爱的隔间吧，[From.GetFirstName]。

original: I have reached the point where I am willing to shamelessly beg for water when the guards drag me from my cell. I must have fainted, for the next thing I see is [From.GetFirstName]'s scornful face! 'Well, well, well... My guards have caught one laughable crook, indeed! I just wanted to have a look at you before they throw away the key...'
translation: 当卫兵把我从牢房拖走时，我已经到了不得不低声下气乞求饮水的地步了。我一定昏过去了，因为我看到的下一件事是[From.GetFirstName]轻蔑的脸！「哎呦喂……看看我的卫兵抓住了谁——一个可笑的骗子！我只是想在他们把牢房钥匙扔掉之前看看你……」

original: Mercy, mercy! I can't return to that place!
translation: 饶命，饶命！我不能回到那个地方！

original: Who knew the laboratory of [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] would be such a treasure trove? In addition to some rare ingredients and a few items which will fetch good coin in the shadier parts of [Root.Capital.GetName], I came across a most interesting text!
translation: 谁曾想到[infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank][infiltration_target.GetFirstName]的实验室会是这样一个宝库？除了一些稀有的原料和几件物品，可以在[Root.Capital.GetName]的黑市上卖得不少金币，我还发现一段十分有趣的文件！

original: My search has been most rewarding. [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]'s ingredient cabinet has a fine assortment of substances and I have found several nuggets of precious metal. My share of the spoils will be a fine addition to my own laboratory!
translation: 我的搜索是最有价值的。[infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank][infiltration_target.GetFirstName]的配料柜里有各种各样的物质，我发现了几块贵重金属。我的分得的战利品将成为对我自己的实验室一个很好的补充！

original: For all [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] talk and boasting, I expected more than this. Or, perhaps, [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] is more paranoid than I thought. In any case, I cannot find anything of great value. At least these nuggets of metal will sell for a few coins.
translation: 由于[infiltration_target.GetHerHis]自卖自夸，使得我先前的预期远远高于这些。不过，也许，[infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank][infiltration_target.GetFirstName]比我想象的更加多疑。无论如何，我找不到任何有价值的东西。至少这些金属块能卖几枚金币。

original: An excellent find! Praise Hermes!
translation: 一个优秀的发现！赞美赫耳墨斯！

original: It is better than nothing, I guess.
translation: 聊胜于无。

original: If I ever find out who broke into my laboratory, I will kill that vile crook! Not only have my ingredient cabinet and metal collection been pilfered, but my most valued text is gone! My most divine knowledge, my deepest secrets! May the thief rot in hell!
translation: 如果我发现是谁闯进了我的实验室，我会杀了那个卑鄙的坏蛋！不仅配料柜和金属藏品被偷了，而且我最珍贵的文本也不见了！我最神圣的知识，我最深的秘密！愿小偷在地狱里腐烂！

original: If I ever find out who broke into my laboratory, I will kill that vile crook! Not only has the thief laid its dirty hands on my precious metals, but my ingredient cabinet has been ransacked also. The culprit must be another follower of the Hermetic arts!
translation: 如果我发现是谁闯进了我的实验室，我会杀了那个卑鄙的坏蛋！这个小偷不仅把脏手放在我的贵重金属上，还把我的配料柜洗劫一空。罪魁祸首一定是一个赫耳墨斯成员！

original: I should really look over the security of my lab. Last night, some vile person snuck past the guards, but luckily nothing of major value was stolen. Either the thief had no idea of how valuable my ingredients and tomes are, or they were too dumb to find them. The precious metals will cost a fair bit to replace, though.
translation: 我真该仔细检查我实验室的安保。昨晚，一些卑鄙的人溜过守卫，但幸运的是，没有什么重要的东西被偷。要么小偷不知道我的原料和书有多值钱，要么他们太笨了，找不到它们。不过，这些贵金属的替代成本倒是相当高。

original: [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] should really hide [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] gunpowder better! Within half an hour I have compiled enough materials to craft a decent bomb. Considering the many barrels of volatile substances, this should be enough to ruin the laboratory. I light the fuse and run.
translation: [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank][infiltration_target.GetFirstName]真应该把[infiltration_target.GetHerHis]火药藏好点！不到半个小时，我就收集足够的材料制作了一枚像样的炸弹。考虑到还有许多桶挥发性物质，这就应该足以毁坏实验室了。我点燃了引线并逃离了爆炸地点。

original: Thankfully, a laboratory is not particularly hard to sabotage. The place is full of acids, volatile substances and old tomes dry as bones. While I do not feel confident enough to risk a great fire, I heave the texts into the furnace and set the ablaze!
translation: 谢天谢地，实验室并不是特别难以破坏。这个地方充满酸、挥发性物质和干得像骨头似的旧书。虽然我没有足够的信心能放一场大火，我还是把文本丢到火炉里，点燃了火焰！

original: [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank] [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] should really hide [infiltration_target.GetHerHis] gunpowder better! Within half an hour I have compiled enough materials to craft a decent bomb. I assemble the parts ever so slowly because my hands will not stop shaking. Just as I am about to perform the last step, I drop a vial. I freeze.
translation: [infiltration_target.GetSocietyRank][infiltration_target.GetFirstName]真应该把[infiltration_target.GetHerHis]火药藏好点！不到半个小时，我就收集足够的材料制作了一枚像样的炸弹。我组装零件的速度很慢，因为我的手在不停地颤抖。就在即将完成最后一步时，我不小心把瓶子摔在了地上，我呆立当场。

original: BOOM!
translation: 嘭！

original: Excellent! It will take [infiltration_target.GetFirstName] months, if not years, to recover!
translation: 太棒了！[infiltration_target.GetFirstName]要花好几个月甚至好几年的时间来恢复！

original: If I ever find out who broke into my laboratory, I will kill that vile crook! I woke last night as the whole keep shook violently. It seems like someone entered my laboratory and set off an explosion! Luckily, no lives were harmed, but my laboratory is in ruins. There is nothing to save.
translation: 如果我发现是谁闯进了我的实验室，我会杀了那个卑鄙的混蛋！昨晚我醒来时，整个房子都剧烈地摇晃着。好像有人闯进了我的实验室，引发了一场爆炸！幸运的是，没有生命受到伤害，但我的实验室已成废墟。没什么可挽救的。

original: If I ever find out who broke into my laboratory, I will kill that vile crook! It seems as if I have made an enemy, for the intruder focused on destruction rather than theft. Acid has been poured on floors and across work surfaces, pots and glass have been shattered and, worst of all, my furnace is filled with the blackened pages of burnt books!
translation: 如果我发现是谁闯入我的实验室，我会杀了那个卑鄙的骗子！看起来我好像有了一个敌人，因为入侵者的重点是破坏而非盗窃。酸被倒在地板上，工作台上，盆和玻璃已经被打碎，更糟糕的是，我的炉子里充满了烧黑的书页！

original: I am not sure whether I should be disturbed or amused! This morning, a charred corpse was discovered in my laboratory. Apparently the crook broke in to sabotage my work but managed to kill [From.GetHerselfHimself] in a botched attempt to craft a bomb. I examined the body and the culprit was none other than [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.Society.GetName]!
translation: 我都不确定我现在是该感到不安还是该觉得好笑了！今天早晨，我的实验室中发现了一具烧焦的尸体。很显然这个骗子想要插手破坏我的工作，但他试图制造炸弹的拙劣手法却害死了[From.GetHerselfHimself]。我仔细检查了尸体，事情的罪魁祸首正是[From.GetSocietyRank][From.Society.GetName]！

original: [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] punishes the sinful.
translation: [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]会惩罚罪孽深重的人。

original: I find [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] with [From.GetHerHis] hands deep in a big ingredients chest. Our eyes meet and I nod. It is time to go. [From.GetFirstName] stuff a few more vials and nuggets of metal into [From.GetHerHis] satchel before running after me.
translation: 我发现[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]正把手伸进大原料柜里。我们四目相对，我点点头。是时候离开了。[From.GetFirstName]在[From.GetHerHis]包里塞进更多的瓶子和金属块，然后追上了我。

original: I follow the trail of overturned chests and broken vials until I find [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]. I gesture for [From.GetHerHim] to come with me – it is time to go. [From.GetSheHeCap] stuffs [From.GetHerHis] pockets with a few nearby tools before running after me.
translation: 我沿着翻倒的箱子和打碎的小瓶一路摸索着，直到我找到了[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]。我向[From.GetHerHim]招手示意一起离开——该走了！[From.GetSheHeCap]连忙把附近的一些工具装进[From.GetHerHis]口袋里，然后追上我的步伐。

original: As I close my satchel, I hear a loud crash from the other room. As I peek through the doorway, the scene before me is impressive. The warm light of [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]'s torch illuminates the destruction. Overturned tables, torn books and smashed instruments. I nod appreciatively. 'It is time to leave.'
translation: 当我合上我的挎包时，我听到另一个房间传来一声巨响。当我在门口窥视时，我眼前的景象令人印象深刻。[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]的火炬照亮了被炸毁的房间，房间里面是翻倒的桌子、破旧的书本和砸碎的乐器。我赞赏地点头说道：「该离开了。」

original: I wish I could see [infiltration_target.GetFirstName]'s face when [infiltration_target.GetSheHe] realizes what we've done!
translation: 当[infiltration_target.GetFirstName]知道我们所做的事情时，真希望我能看到[infiltration_target.GetSheHe]的脸！

original: As I reach for a nearby tome, a terrifying roar sweeps through the laboratory and the floor shudders underneath my feet. Images of dragons and chimeras flash through my mind before the truth hits me. [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] must have set of an explosion. There is no time look for [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 当我去附近找书时，一道可怕的咆哮扫过了实验室，脚下的地板传来阵阵颤抖。我的脑海中闪现过龙和奇美拉的图像，直到我发觉了真相。肯定是[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]搞出了爆炸。没时间找[From.GetHerHim]了。

original: No one could have slept through that. I have to run!
translation: 肯定所有人都被吵醒了。我必须逃跑了！

original: Once we have left the laboratory far behind us, [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName] and I collapse, two bundles of sweaty and shivering limbs. We did it. We really did it, and we got away with it, too! As the laugh erupts from my lips, my body finally relaxes.
