Next to me, [infiltration_companion.GetFirstName] heavy breathing turns into a merry chuckle.
translation: 实验室离我们的距离越来越远了，我和[infiltration_companion.GetFirstName]忽然瘫软在地上，四肢颤抖，汗流浃背。我们做到了，我们真的做到了，我们也侥幸逃离了！当笑声从我的唇边溢出时，我的身体总算放松了下来。紧接着，[infiltration_companion.GetFirstName]沉重的呼吸声也变成了愉悦的笑声。

original: We really showed [infiltration_target.GetHerHim], didn't we?
translation: 我们确实给[infiltration_target.GetHerHim]颜色看了，不是吗？

original: Accomplice
translation: 同谋

original: NOT already carrying a premonition of things to come\n
translation: 未预知过未来的事情\n

original: Perform Scrying
translation: 水晶球占卜

original: As a member of [From.Society.GetName], §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! may choose to turn to the mystical art of divination in an attempt to foretell the future.
translation: 作为[From.Society.GetName]的成员，§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!可能会选择转向神秘的占卜艺术，试图预测未来。

original: As I place my hands on the sides of the bowl, the surface of the water is perfectly still. Yet it only takes a few moments before patterns begin to appear in the reflection... Mirror images of the world, the past and the future. I take a deep breath, to attune myself to what I am looking for...
translation: 当我把手放在碗的两侧时，水面完全静止了。然而，仅仅过了几分钟，图案就开始出现在倒影中……镜像的世界，过去和未来。我深吸一口气，让自己寻找自己想要的……

original: I want to know about battles to come.
translation: 我想知道关于即将来临的战争。

original: I want to know where my relationships will lead.
translation: 我想知道我的人际关系会怎么样。

original: I want to know what will happen to me as [Root.GetTitle].
translation: 我想知道我这个[Root.GetTitle]会发生什么。

original: You gaze into the mysterious shrouds in the depths of the bowl...\n
translation: 你凝视着碗深处神秘的阴霾……\n

original: The water is dark. I stare at it, unblinking, until my eyes begin to strain. It takes time, maybe hours, as time becomes fleeting.\nThen I see it. A fierce battle! I can almost hear the clanking of swords.
translation: 水是暗的。我一直盯着它且毫不眨眼，直到我的眼睛开始绷紧。随着时间的流逝，也许几个小时。\n我看见了！一场激烈的战斗！我几乎能听到刀剑的叮当声。

original: It takes a minute, but after a while I am certain of it: I see a lion! Or... No, it's a woman. With the head of a lion!
translation: 看清需要一段时间，但过了一会儿，我确信：我看到了一头狮子！或者……不，那是一个女人。和一个狮子的头！

original: I concentrate for a long time, staring into the water. I almost have time to doubt myself, but then I see it: faint ripples, a shadow, then two. It looks like a fire, and a sword.
translation: 我聚精会神了许久，死死地盯着水面。就当我快要怀疑起自己，我看到了：微弱的涟漪，一个阴影，然后是两个，如火，似剑。

original: I see... A still pond of water. It is... quiet.
translation: 我看到……一潭水。好……平静。

original: At first, all I the water shows me is the reflection of the ceiling. I shake my head. I have to look beyond the material world! I close my eyes, and when I open them again, I see it clearly.\nA bed of flowers, and an urn.
translation: 起初，水面上只有天花板的倒影。我摇摇头。我必须超越物质世界！我闭上眼睛，当我再次睁开眼睛时，我清楚地看到了它。\n满床的花朵还有一盒骨灰。

original: I am at first not sure what to make of the strange shape. Maybe I am imagining it, or maybe it is a shadow. Does it matter? I see it clearly: a familiar silhouette, standing under a moon.
translation: 我一开始不知道如何辨认这奇怪的形状。或许只是我的想象，又或许它可能是一个影子。有关系吗？我清楚地看到它：一个熟悉的轮廓，站在月亮下。

original: I see strange patterns... No, wait, a bunch of triangles!
translation: 我看到奇怪的图案……不，等等，一连串的三角形！

original: There are just lines... Or are they...? Yes, I see a forest. A vast forest!
translation: 那些是线条……或者是……？是的，我看到了森林。一片宽广的森林！

original: I see a storm. I can almost hear it! Oh, it is actually raining.\n\n... But I still see a thunderstorm.
translation: 我看见一场风暴。我几乎可以听见它！噢好吧，外面真的在下雨。\n\n……但我仍旧能看见雷雨。

original: Marvelous! This is clearly a good omen!
translation: 不可思议！这显然是一个好预兆！

original: Damnation! This is clearly a bad omen.
translation: 该死！这显然是一个不好的预兆。

original: Encouraging Vision
translation: 鼓舞人心的幻象

original: This character is convinced that they have seen the future and that something great awaits them on the battlefield.
translation: 这个角色确信他们已经看到了未来，在战场上一些伟大的事情在等着他们。

original: Fearful Vision
translation: 可怕的幻象

original: This character is convinced that they have seen the future and that something terrible awaits them on the battlefield.
translation: 这个角色确信他们已经看到了未来，在战场上一些可怕的事情在等着他们。

original: Pleasing Vision
translation: 令人愉悦的幻象

original: This character is under the belief that the future holds something wonderful for them and someone they care about.
translation: 这个角色相信美好的未来在等待他和他所关心的人。

original: Distressing Vision
translation: 令人痛心的幻象

original: This character is under the belief that something unfortunate awaits them and someone they care about.
translation: 这个角色相信不幸的事情在等待他和他所关心的人。

original: Reassuring Vision
translation: 令人安心的幻象

original: This character is under the belief that something wonderful awaits them and their realm.
translation: 这个角色相信一些美好的事情在等待他和他的领地。

original: Upsetting Vision
translation: 烦躁的幻象

original: This character is under the belief that something disastrous awaits them and their realm.
translation: 这个角色相信灾难性的事情在等待他和他的领地。

original: The battle is fierce and I have gained new skills! The vision I have been carrying in my heart certainly holds true! My personal guard are being left behind as I charge into battle. I am amazing!
translation: 战斗很激烈，我学到了新的技能！我心中一直带着的幻象肯定是真的！当我冲入战场时，我的私人护卫被抛在后面。我真是太！棒！了！

original: The battle rages on and I am surprised by every arrow that I deflect and by every blow that misses me. I have been waiting for something terrible to happen, yet [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] does not seem finished with me. I suppose there is a chance that I have misinterpreted the vision I had? I feel pretty great.
translation: 战斗正酣，我惊讶于每一个我躲过的箭矢，以及没能劈中我的挥砍。我一直在等待可怕的事情发生，但[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]似乎并不想让我完蛋。我想有可能是我误解了预言？我感觉很棒。

original: My enemies will learn to fear me!
translation: 我的敌人将学会畏惧我！

original: They will never see me surrender.
translation: 他们将永远不会看到我屈服。

original: Not all is lost!
translation: 并没有失去全部！

original: As the battle rages on, I am not surprised by the heavy losses we are taking. Every arrow that sears over my head makes my pulse quicken. Just as I am becoming convinced that this is the battle I saw in my vision, I stumble from a sharp pain in my leg. An arrows sticks out from my knee.
translation: 随着战斗的进行，我对我们所遭受的巨大损失并不感到惊讶。我头顶上飞过的每一支箭都会使我的脉搏加快。就在我确信这是我在预言中看到的战斗时，我因为腿上的剧痛中摔倒了。一支箭从我的膝盖穿出。

original: We have been fighting this war for what feels like an eternity and I fail to see how anything good can come of all this bloodshed. Just as I am beginning to think that I misinterpreted the vision I had, I am hit by something, hard. An arrow sticks out from my knee.
translation: 我们一直在为这场战争而战斗，这是一场永无止境的战争，我看不出这场流血事件会带来什么好处。正当我开始认为我误解了我的预言时，我被某种东西重重地击中了。一支箭从我的膝盖穿出。

original: At least I was right.
translation: 至少我是正确的。

original: Curses! Where is the glory in this?
translation: 该死！这哪有什么荣耀？

original: I meet the stare of my newborn [From.GetSonDaughter] for the first time and it is clear that my vision has come true! Rarely have I seen such clear signs of intelligence and ambition in one so young. [From.GetFirstName] is the child that was promised!
translation: 第一次看到我的新生儿[From.GetSonDaughter]的目光，我就知道显然我的幻象成真了！我很少在如此年轻的人身上看到聪明和雄心壮志。[From.GetFirstName]正是那个应许的孩子！

original: I am not sure what I was expecting, but this child blinks at me with the most curious eyes. I suddenly feel all my worries wash away. I must have misunderstood the vision I had scrying in the water.
translation: 我不知道我在期待什么，但是这个孩子用最好奇的眼睛向我眨眼。我突然感到所有的烦恼都被冲走了。我一定误解了我在水里看到的景象。

original: I knew it!
translation: 我早就知道！

original: I will be the first to admit I was wrong.
translation: 我将第一个承认我错了。

original: My worst fears have come true. Behind the dull stare of my newborn baby [From.GetSonDaughter] there can be little in the way of brilliance or even ability. In time I will know for sure but I am already convinced that this is the child my vision warned me about.
translation: 我最担心的事情已经发生。看到我刚出生的宝宝呆滞的目光，我恐怕[From.GetSonDaughter]可能没有任何才华甚至没有能力。慢慢地我会知道，但我已经确信，这就是我的幻象警告的那个孩子。

original: I am not sure what I was expecting, but this newborn child blinks at me with the dullest of eyes. I feel my confidence wain as I hold [From.GetHerHim] and I soon give [From.GetHerHim] back to the nurse. I must have misunderstood the vision I had in the water.
translation: 我不确定我在期待什么，但是这个新生儿用最迟钝的眼睛眨着眼睛看着我。当我抱着[From.GetHerHim]时，我的自信很快不见，我很快把[From.GetHerHim]交给护士。我一定误解了我在水中的幻象。

original: There is scarce consolation in this accomplishment.
translation: 在这项成就里，这是仅存的安慰。

original: Even a [Root.GetTitle] can be wrong.
translation: 即使[Root.GetTitle]也可能会犯错。

original: A soldier has distinguished himself on the battlefield. Such an asset! This must be what the vision was about!
translation: 一名士兵从战场上脱颖而出。多么出色！这一定就是幻象所指的！

original: A skillful soldier almost singlehandedly took down the enemy army in a battle today. It makes me doubt the troublesome vision I had.
translation: 今天，一个干练的士兵几乎单枪匹马地消灭了敌人的军队。这让我不敢相信我的所见。

original: I knew something good was going to happen!
translation: 我知道会有好事发生！

original: I suppose I could have misunderstood the vision...
translation: 我想我可能误解了这个幻象……

original: Confident Seer
translation: 自信的先知

original: There is a tenacity to this character, as they believe they can definitely predict the future.
translation: 这个角色有一种坚韧不拔的精神，因为他相信自己一定能预测未来。

original: Aspiring Seer
translation: 有抱负的先知

original: There is an open-mindedness to this character, as they believe it should be possible to predict the future.
translation: 这个角色性格是开明的，因为他们相信有可能预测未来。

original: Hesitant Seer
translation: 犹豫的先知

original: This character has a willingness to learn, as they have failed to predict the future at least once.
translation: 这个角色有学习的意愿，因为他们至少有一次没能预测未来。

original: Distraught Seer
translation: 忧心忡忡的先知

original: This character is doubting their own abilities, as they have repeatedly failed to predict the future.
translation: 这个角色怀疑自己的能力，因为他们一再未能预测未来。

original: My lover has passed away. I knew it would happen.
translation: 我的情人去世了，我就知道会这样。

original: My lover has passed away. Was this what my vision in the water was about? How was I to know? Oh, woe is me.
translation: 我的情人去世了。这是我在水中看到的幻象吗？我怎么知道的？哦，真倒霉！

original: Even knowing the future, I could not prevent it.
translation: 即使已经洞悉了未来，但我亦无能力我去阻止它。

original: I must have misunderstood the vision I had. I will do better next time.
translation: 我一定是误解了我得到的幻象。下次我会做的更好。

original: My dear friend has passed. I knew it would happen.
translation: 我亲爱的朋友去世了。我就知道会这样。

original: My dear friend has passed. Was this what my vision in the water was about? How was I to know? Oh, woe is me.
translation: 我亲爱的朋友去世了。这就是我在水里的幻象吗？我怎么知道？哦，真倒霉！

original: Even knowing the future, I could not prevent it.
translation: 即使已经洞悉了未来，但我亦无能力去阻止它。

original: A heavy price, but I must have misunderstood the vision I had.
translation: 沉重的代价，但我一定是误解了我得到的幻象。

original: Hah! My rival has passed. I knew it would happen.
translation: 哈！我的死对头已见鬼去了。我就知道这会发生。

original: My rival has passed. And here I thought something bad would happen!
translation: 我的对手已经死了。这就是为什么我认为会有不好的事情发生！

original: Even knowing the future, I could not predict this overwhelming joy.
translation: 即使我能预见未来，我也无法预测这种压倒性的喜悦。

original: I am glad I was wrong!
translation: 我很庆幸自己错了！

original: My [mnm_scrying_dead.GetFatherMother] has passed. I knew it would happen.
translation: 我的[mnm_scrying_dead.GetFatherMother]死了。我就知道会这样。

original: My [mnm_scrying_dead.GetFatherMother] has passed. Was this what my vision in the water was about? How was I to know? Oh, woe is me.
translation: 我的[mnm_scrying_dead.GetFatherMother]去世了。这是我在水中的看到幻象吗？我怎么知道的？哦，真倒霉！

original: Even knowing the future, I could not prevent it.
translation: 即使已经洞悉了未来，但我亦无能力我去阻止它。

original: A heavy price, but I must have misunderstood the vision I had.
translation: 沉重的代价，但我一定是误解了我得到的幻象。

original: My [mnm_scrying_dead.GetSonDaughter] has passed. I knew it would happen.
translation: 我的[mnm_scrying_dead.GetSonDaughter]去世了。我就知道会这样。

original: My [mnm_scrying_dead.GetSonDaughter] has passed. Was this what my vision in the water was about? How was I to know? Oh, woe is me.
translation: 我的[mnm_scrying_dead.GetSonDaughter]去世了。这是我在水中的看到幻象吗？我怎么知道的？哦，真倒霉。

original: Even knowing the future, I could not prevent it.
translation: 即使已经洞悉了未来，但我亦无能力我去阻止它。

original: A heavy price, but I must have misunderstood the vision I had.
translation: 代价很沉重，但我一定误解了我的幻象。

original: Some time has passed since... my beloved pet passed. Having thought about it, I realize that this must be what my vision was about...
translation: 自从……我心爱的宠物去世后已经过去了一段时间。经过思考，我意识到这一定是我的幻象所指示的……

original: Some time has passed since my pet died. Was this what my vision in the water was about? How was I to know? Oh, woe is me.
translation: 我的宠物已经死去一段时间了。这是我在水里看到的幻象吗？我怎么知道的？哦，真倒霉！

original: Some time has passed since... my pet passed. Having thought about it, I have become certain that this is what my vision was about. Perhaps there was a curse, and my vision was the only warning. Oh, that poor little ball of fluff.
translation: 自从……我的宠物过去了有一段时间了。经过思考，我确信这就是我的幻象指示的。也许这就是一个诅咒，而我的幻象是唯一的警告。哦，那个可怜的小毛茸茸的家伙。

original: It has been some time since my pet left this world. I'm beginning to think it was no curse, but perhaps it was I? WHAT IF I FORETOLD ITS DEMISE?
translation: 自从我的宠物离开这个世界已经有一段时间了。我开始觉得这不是诅咒，但也许是我？如果我能预言它会死呢？

original: Oh, my dear cat. Even knowing the future, I could not prevent it.
translation: 哦，我亲爱的猫。即使已经洞悉了未来，我也无法阻止它。

original: Oh, my dear dog. Even knowing the future, I could not prevent it.
translation: 哦，我亲爱的狗。即使已经洞悉了未来，我也无法阻止它。

original: Oh, my dear cat. I must strive to understand the visions better.
translation: 哦，我亲爱的猫。我必须更好地努力理解这些幻象。

original: Oh, my dear dog. I must strive to understand the visions better.
translation: 哦，我亲爱的狗。我必须更好地努力理解这些幻象。

original: I have gained the [From.GetFullName]! I knew something good would happen!
translation: 我获得了[From.GetFullName]！我就知道会有一些好事发生。

original: I have gained the [From.GetFullName]! This is... not what I expected.
translation: 我获得了[From.GetFullName]！这……不是我所期望的。

original: About time!
translation: 早该如此！

original: I guess I was wrong about the vision.
translation: 我猜我可能理解错了幻象。

original: I have lost the [FromFromFrom.GetFullName]! I knew something bad would happen!
translation: 我失去了[FromFromFrom.GetFullName]！我知道会发生不好的事情！

original: I have lost the [FromFromFrom.GetFullName]! This is... not what I expected.
translation: 我失去了[FromFromFrom.GetFullName]！这是……不是我所期望的。

original: At least I don't have to worry about the omen anymore.
translation: 至少我不必再担心预兆。

original: I guess I was wrong about the vision.
translation: 我猜我可能理解错了幻象。

original: So I suppose the vision was about me having [Root.GetDisease]. I knew something bad would happen!
translation: 所以我想这个幻象是关于我获得[Root.GetDisease]。我就知道会发生不好的事情！

original: So I suppose the vision was about me having [Root.GetDisease]. That could have been clearer, I think!
translation: 所以我想这个幻象是关于我会得[Root.GetDisease]。为什么不显现得更清楚些！

original: At least I don't have to worry about the omen anymore.
translation: 至少我不必再担心预兆。

original: I guess I was wrong about it being something positive.
translation: 我猜我错误地以为这是正面的。

original: So I suppose the vision was about my [From.GetRootRelation] having [From.GetDisease]. I knew something bad would happen!
translation: 所以我想这个幻象是我的[From.GetRootRelation]会有[From.GetDisease]。我知道会有不好的事情发生！

original: So I suppose the vision was about my [From.GetRootRelation] having [From.GetDisease]... That could have been clearer, I think!
translation: 所以我想这个幻象是关于我的[From.GetRootRelation]会获得[From.GetDisease]……为什么不显现得更清楚些！

original: At least I don't have to worry about the omen anymore.
translation: 至少我不必再担心预兆。

original: I guess I was wrong about it being something positive.
translation: 我猜我错误地以为这是正面的。

original: So I suppose the vision was about me being cured of my disease! I knew something good would happen!
translation: 所以我想我的幻象是关于我的疾病被治愈了！我就知道会有好事发生！

original: So I suppose the vision was about me having rid myself of disease? That could have been clearer, I think!
translation: 所以我想这个幻象是关于我摆脱了疾病？为什么不显现得更清楚些！

original: I was never worried.
translation: 我从没有着急。

original: I guess I was wrong about it being something negative.
translation: 我猜我错误地以为这是负面的。

original: So I suppose the vision was about my [From.GetRootRelation] combating [From.GetHerHis] disease. I knew something good would happen!
translation: 所以我想这个幻象是关于我的[From.GetRootRelation]克服[From.GetHerHis]疾病。我就知道会有好事发生！

original: So I am starting to think that the vision I had was about my [From.GetRootRelation] combating [From.GetHerHis] disease...
translation: 所以我想这个幻象是关于我的[From.GetRootRelation]克服[From.GetHerHis]疾病……

original: I was never worried.
translation: 我从没有着急。

original: I guess I was wrong about it being something negative?
translation: 我猜我错误地以为这是负面的？

original: I am not sure whether it is a new-found interest in [envisioned_friend.GetEducationSubject] that we have been connecting over, or simply the infectious laughter of [envisioned_friend.GetTitledFirstName], but we are spending more and more time together. I feel like we are bonding, like true friends!
translation: 我不确定究竟是因为我们在[envisioned_friend.GetEducationSubject]中发现了新的兴趣，或者仅仅是[envisioned_friend.GetTitledFirstName]的笑声太有传染性，总之我们在一起度过的时间越来越多。我觉得我们之间正在建立真挚的朋友关系！

original: I am told a peculiar tale of an owl, which has taken up residence under the roofing of one of our barracks. The guards have tried chasing it off, but it keeps returning. "Perhaps it is also a seeker?" I offer to one of my advisors, who responds: "My distinguished [Root.GetLordLady], it would make for a very distinguished pet..."
translation: 一只猫头鹰栖息在我们一个营房的屋顶下面。卫兵们试着把它赶走，但它总是回来。听说了这则奇闻后，我向我的一位顾问提议：「也许它也能做我打猎时的伙伴？」他回答说：「我尊贵的[Root.GetLordLady]，它将成为一个非常杰出的宠物……」

original: I knew it!
translation: 我早就知道！

original: My vision... How could it be so wrong?
translation: 我的幻象……怎么会这么错的这么离谱呢？

original: My vision has hinted at this, all along, I think.
translation: 我想，我的幻象一直暗示着这一点。

original: My vision was clearly wrong, but I don't even mind!
translation: 我的幻象显然是错误的，但我不介意！

original: The symbol of wisdom, by my side. This must be the boon I foresaw!
translation: 智慧的象征，在我身边。这一定是我预见到的恩惠！

original: During a hunt with my kinsmen, I am struck by the beauty of a white stag. However, the joy is short-lived as the magnificent beast charges at me. I am suddenly reminded of the terrible vision I had, and I yank the reigns of my horse tight in retreat. "Protect the [Root.GetTitle]!" I hear, just before the sound of a flying arrow is cut short. I groan.
translation: 在和我的亲戚打猎时，我被一只白牡鹿的美丽所打动。然而，欢乐是短暂的，因为华丽的野兽向我冲来。我突然想起了我那可怕的幻象，我在撤退时紧紧地牵着我的马。「保护 [Root.GetTitle]！」我听到这句话，紧接着飞箭的声音戛然而止。我呻吟着。

original: During a hunt with my kinsmen, I am struck by the beauty of a white stag. However, the joy is short-lived as the magnificent beast charges at me. Suddenly reminded of the wonderful vision I had, I attempt to stare the beast down. To my surprise, it has no effect. "Protect the [Root.GetTitle]!" I hear, just before the sound of a flying arrow is cut short. I groan.
translation: 在和我的亲戚打猎时，我被一只白牡鹿的美丽所打动。然而，欢乐是短暂的，因为华丽的野兽向我冲来。我突然想起了我的美好幻象，试着凝视野兽。令我惊讶的是这没有任何效果。「保护 [Root.GetTitle]！」我听到这句话，紧接着飞箭的声音戛然而止。我呻吟着。

original: [envisioned_rival.GetTitledFirstName] has been overheard spreading foul gossip about me. I am not certain what I did to deserve this treatment, but remembering my vision of agony, I have decided not to fight it. Perhaps [envisioned_rival.GetHerHis] vile feelings towards me are simply a result of the stars traversing the sky?
translation: 我偶然听说[envisioned_rival.GetTitledFirstName]在散布我的传言，我不知道我作了什么孽要遭此报应，但是回想起我的痛苦幻象，我决定不去抗争。也许[envisioned_rival.GetHerHis]对我的厌恶感只是恒星穿越天空的结果？

original: [envisioned_rival.GetTitledFirstName] has been overheard spreading foul gossip about me. I am not certain what I did to deserve this treatment, but remembering my vision, I am beginning to doubt my interpretation of it. Perhaps [envisioned_rival.GetHerHis] hostility is simply a result of the stars traversing the sky?
translation: 我偶然听说[envisioned_rival.GetTitledFirstName]在恶意散布我的谣言，我不知道我作了什么孽要遭此报应，但是回想起我看到的幻象，我开始怀疑自己对它的释读。也许[envisioned_rival.GetHerHis]对我的厌恶感只是恒星穿越天空的结果？

original: There has been a merchant visiting [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName] recently. At first it seemed that their odd trinkets and potions were simply the works of a wandering herbalist. However, it appears that the man has swindled several of my subjects for money, using fearful tales of necessary wards and rituals to be performed, 'lest demons will beset us all.
translation: 最近有一位商人拜访[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]。起初，他们的奇怪小饰品和药水似乎只是流浪的草药师的简陋作品。然而，这个男人似乎通过一些可怕的传闻骗了我的几个下属的钱，声称必须施法必要的咒语和仪式，否则恶魔会困扰我们所有人。

original: There has been a merchant visiting [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName] recently. Recalling my vision, I initially reacted well to this wandering herbalist, as he seemed to be providing comfort to my subjects, with his trinkets and curious concoctions. However, it appears that the man has swindled several of my subjects for money, threatening that demons will beset us all unless his goods are bought.
translation: 最近有一位商人拜访[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]。回想起我的幻象，我最初对这位流浪的草药师反应良好，因为他似乎正在用他的小饰物和奇妙的混合物为我的下属提供安慰。然而，这名男子似乎骗了我的几个下属的钱，威胁说除非购买他的商品，否则恶魔会困扰我们所有人。

original: The incompetence! I knew something terrible was going to happen!
translation: 没有用的！我知道会发生一件可怕的事情！

original: It hurts! And my vision, how could it be so wrong?!
translation: 令人心痛！我的幻象怎么会错的这么离谱？！

original: Some things cannot be interfered with.
translation: 有些事情是不能去干涉的。

original: I will have to deal with [envisioned_rival.GetHerHim] at some point.
translation: 我必须在某个时候处理掉[envisioned_rival.GetHerHim]。

original: Superstitious fools! This is just what I warned them about!
translation: 迷信的傻瓜！这正是我所警告他们的！

original: Superstitious fools! Yet my vision should have warned me...
translation: 迷信的傻瓜！但我的幻象应该提醒我……

original: Nothing has happened that I can attribute to my vision in the water. I'm starting to think I didn't see anything at all.
translation: 我把目光投向水中，什么都没有发生。我开始觉得我什么都没看到。

original: It was so long ago.
translation: 已经过去很久了。

original: You let go of your premonition.\n
translation: 你放弃了你的预感。\n

original: Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your character's portrait in order to turn to the mystical art of divination in an attempt to foretell the future.
translation: 允许在你角色的头像上§G右键点击§!以求助于神秘的占卜技艺，尝试预知未来。

original: Make Horoscope
translation: 进行星占

original: As a member of [From.Society.GetName], you may search the heavens for insight into the future of your child §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§!.
translation: 作为[From.Society.GetName]的成员，你可以探索天空，洞察你的孩子§Y[Root.GetTitledName]§!的未来。

original: Enables §Gright-clicking§! on portraits of your children in order to make them a horoscope.
translation: 允许在你孩子的头像上§G点击右键§!以对他们使用占星术。

original: Has NOT already had their horoscope examined\n
translation: 未做过占星术占卜\n

original: The stars hold many secrets, but they are not indecipherable. Using the right instruments, and frame of mind, I will uncover the destiny of [horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 星辰隐藏着许多不为人知的秘密，但它们并不是不可破译的。使用合适的工具和心境，我将揭示[horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName]的命运。

original: Come what may.
translation: 不管怎样。

original: You prepare your tools and instruments for the long nights ahead.\n
translation: 你准备好工具和仪器来渡过这个漫漫长夜。\n

original: After spending many nights analyzing the movements of the stars, I have noticed [Root.GetRandomPlanetName] moving into a sign influencing that of my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName]... I am fairly certain that this indicates that [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] is destined for administrative tasks and a practical mind.
translation: 花了很多晚分析恒星运动之后，我注意到[Root.GetRandomPlanetName]移动到了一个对我[horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon][horoscope_child.GetFirstName]有影响的星座里……我确信这表明[horoscope_child.GetSheHe]命中注定将会有个实用的头脑且精于行政事务。

original: After spending many nights analyzing the movements of the stars, I have noticed [Root.GetRandomPlanetName] moving into a sign influencing that of my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName]... I am fairly certain that this indicates that [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] is destined for the battlefield and a combat prowess uncommon amongst most of our members at court.
translation: 花了很多晚分析恒星运动之后，我注意到[Root.GetRandomPlanetName]移动到了一个对我[horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon][horoscope_child.GetFirstName]有影响的星座里……我确信这表明[horoscope_child.GetSheHe]命中注定为战场而生，而且将拥有超过宫廷绝大多数人的实战技能。

original: After spending many nights analyzing the movements of the stars, I have noticed [Root.GetRandomPlanetName] moving into a sign influencing that of my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName]... I am fairly certain that this indicates that [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] is destined for a position of diplomacy, with wits and charm uncommon amongst most of our members at court.
translation: 花了很多晚分析恒星运动之后，我注意到[Root.GetRandomPlanetName]移动到了一个对我[horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon][horoscope_child.GetFirstName]有影响的星座里……我确信这表明[horoscope_child.GetSheHe]命中注定为外交职位而生，将拥有超过我宫廷绝大多数人的智慧和魅力。

original: After spending many nights analyzing the movements of the stars, I have noticed [Root.GetRandomPlanetName] moving into a sign influencing that of my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName]... I am fairly certain that this indicates that [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] is destined for intrigue and cleverness.
translation: 花了很多晚分析恒星运动之后，我注意到[Root.GetRandomPlanetName]移动到了一个对我[horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon][horoscope_child.GetFirstName]有影响的星座里……我确信这表明[horoscope_child.GetSheHe]命中注定聪慧且精于谋略。

original: After spending many nights analyzing the movements of the stars, I have noticed the moon moving into a sign influencing that of my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName]... I am fairly certain that this indicates that [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] is destined for studying, and an intellect uncommon amongst most of our members at court.
translation: 花了很多晚分析恒星运动之后，我注意到月亮移动到了一个对我[horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon][horoscope_child.GetFirstName]有影响的星座里……我确信这表明[horoscope_child.GetSheHe]命中注定为学习而生，将会有超过我宫廷绝大多数人的超常智力。

original: I could not have made up a destiny more fitting for [horoscope_child.GetHerHim].
translation: 我无法编制一个更适合[horoscope_child.GetHerHim]的命运了。

original: You are thankful for your findings and will encourage any interest of this kind.\n
translation: 你对你的发现心存感激，并且会鼓励这种兴趣。\n

original: This is not what I have in mind for [horoscope_child.GetHerHim]!
translation: 这不是我对[horoscope_child.GetHerHim]的想法！

original: You will seek to discourage these tendencies.\n
translation: 你会试图阻止这些倾向。\n

original: My [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] has been spending many nights staring at the sky and telling me of the grand things that the stars have in store for me. "You'll make a fine [Root.GetHermeticsDestinedRole] one day", [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] says. While I am not sure what [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] means, I have noticed that [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] looks at me differently lately... Perhaps with pride?
translation: 我的[horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother]已经花了许多晚上凝视天空，并告知了我星辰为我贮存的宏伟之事物。「终有一天你将成为一个优秀的[Root.GetHermeticsDestinedRole]」，[horoscope_maker.GetSheHe]说道。虽然我不确定[horoscope_maker.GetSheHe]是什么意思，但我注意到[horoscope_maker.GetSheHe]最近对我的看法有所不同……也许是某种自豪感？

original: My [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] has been spending many nights staring at the sky. A servant told me that it is for my own good. I am not sure what [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] gets from it, but I have noticed that [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] looks at me differently lately... "What good is another [Root.GetHermeticsDestinedRole]?" [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] sighs, and walks away.
translation: 我的[horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother]已经花了许多夜晚盯着天空。一个仆人告诉我，这是为了我的好。我不确定[horoscope_maker.GetSheHe]从它那里明白了什么，但我注意到[horoscope_maker.GetSheHe]最近对我的态度变了……「另一个[Root.GetHermeticsDestinedRole]有什么好的？」[horoscope_maker.GetSheHe]叹了口气，走开了。

original: Before [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] passed away, I'm told that [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] spent many nights staring at the sky and telling me of the grand things that the stars have in store for me. I am not sure what [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] meant, but I I have heard servants whispering about it. They say [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] thought I was destined for greatness.
translation: 在[horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother]去世之前，我得知[horoscope_maker.GetSheHe]花了很多晚上盯着天空，告诉我星星中蕴藏的伟大秘密。我不确定[horoscope_maker.GetSheHe]是什么意思，但我听到仆人正在窃窃私语。他们说[horoscope_maker.GetSheHe]认为我命中注定要成就一番伟业。

original: Before [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] passed away, I'm told that [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] spent many nights staring at the sky, talking to [horoscope_maker.GetHerselfHimself]. Servants tell me it was about my destiny, and that my [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] did not think the stars were in my favor.
translation: 在[horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother]去世之前，我得知[horoscope_maker.GetSheHe]花了很多晚上盯着天空和[horoscope_maker.GetHerselfHimself]交谈。仆人告诉我这是关于我的命运，而且我的[horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother]不认为这些星星对我有利。

original: I wouldn't mind being great at something.
translation: 我不介意在某些方面表现得出色。

original: What is a [Root.GetHermeticsDestinedRole] anyway?
translation: [Root.GetHermeticsDestinedRole]到底是什么？

original: I wonder what [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] saw.
translation: 我很想知道[horoscope_maker.GetSheHe]看见了什么。

original: That certainly takes the pressure off!
translation: 那一定会减轻压力！

original: You try to put it out of your mind.\n
translation: 你尽力将它抛诸脑后。\n

original: As [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] has been growing older, [horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName] has been seen expressing [horoscope_child.GetHerHis] sense for organization whenever the opportunity has arisen. I am not even sure where [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] got [horoscope_child.GetHerHis] hands on an abacus, but [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] carries it around wherever [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] goes.
translation: 随着[horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName]年龄的增长，每当机会出现时[horoscope_child.GetSheHe]总能表现出对组织筹备工作的理解。我甚至不知道[horoscope_child.GetSheHe]从哪里学来的算盘，但是[horoscope_child.GetSheHe]不管去哪儿都带着它。

original: Often found near the sparring grounds, [horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName] is proving surprisingly apt with a spear. Of course the wooden thing is merely a toy, but the faces of my commanders during their practice with [horoscope_child.GetHerHim] hints of a surprising talent in the [horoscope_child.GetBoyGirl].
translation: [horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName]经常出现在训练场附近，而事实证明他非常善于使用长枪。木制兵器自然仅仅是一种玩具，但我的指挥官们在[horoscope_child.GetHerHim]练习过程中流露出的惊讶神情无不暗示着这个[horoscope_child.GetBoyGirl]着实展露出惊人的天赋。

original: It does not take anybody long to notice that [horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName] is a thoughtful [horoscope_child.GetBoyGirl], well attuned to the feelings of others. [horoscope_child.GetSheHeCap] is increasingly curious about foreign customs, and is often found engaging in conversation with servants and visitors alike. "[Root.GetFatherMotherCap]? What is it like to grow up outside of the [Root.GetCapitalHolding]?", [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] asked me today.
translation: 显而易见，[horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName]是一个深思熟虑的[horoscope_child.GetBoyGirl]，善于照顾别人的感受。[horoscope_child.GetSheHeCap]对外国习俗越来越好奇，经常有人发现[horoscope_child.GetSheHe]与仆人和游客进行对话。「[Root.GetFatherMotherCap]？在[Root.GetCapitalHolding]之外长大的感觉是什么？」[horoscope_child.GetSheHe]今天问我。

original: [horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName] has always had a keen eye for intrigue. Reading my letters, eavesdropping on council meetings – the [horoscope_child.GetBoyGirl] has little respect for privacy. Yet it is hard to say what motivates [horoscope_child.GetHerHis] mischief. Meanwhile, the court seems to think that [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] is growing up to be the brightest member of house [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName].
translation: [horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName]一直对阴谋有敏锐的眼光。比如偷读我的信件，或是窃听内阁会议——这[horoscope_child.GetBoyGirl]几乎没有尊重过我的隐私。然而，很难说[horoscope_child.GetHerHis]恶作剧是为了什么目的。因此，宫廷似乎认为[horoscope_child.GetSheHe]正在成长为[Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]家族最亮眼的成员。

original: I know that [horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName] is well-read for [horoscope_child.GetHerHis] age, but I did not realize the extent of it – the [Root.GetCapitalHolding] archivist recently complained to me: "The young [horoscope_child.GetLordLady] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName] made notations in the margin of one the works, [Root.GetMasterMistress]..." Flustered, he continues: "I'd consider it blasphemy, but [horoscope_child.GetHerHis] calculations were also right."
translation: 我知道就[horoscope_child.GetHerHis]年龄而言，[horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName]的阅读很好，但是我没有意识到好到何种程度——[Root.GetCapitalHolding]档案管理员最近向我抱怨说：「年轻的[horoscope_child.GetLordLady][horoscope_child.GetFirstName]在书页边缘做了记号，[Root.GetMasterMistress]……」他继续地慌乱说道：「我认为这是亵渎，但[horoscope_child.GetHerHis]计算也是正确的。」

original: The stars favor [horoscope_child.GetHerHim].
translation: 诸星辰青睐于[horoscope_child.GetHerHim]。

original: In line with [horoscope_child.GetHerHis] destiny, you believe §Y[horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName]§! will make great use of this talent.\n
translation: 合乎[horoscope_child.GetHerHis]命运，你相信§Y[horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName]§!将很好地利用这个天赋。\n

original: No! There are many other things I wish [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] would focus on.
translation: 不！有大把的其他的事物，我希望[horoscope_child.GetSheHe]去关注。

original: You will put efforts into steering §Y[horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName]§! into another direction in life.\n
translation: 你会努力引导§Y[horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName]§!进入人生的另一个方向。\n

original: The stars will always have their way.
translation: 星星总会有自己的路。

original: In spite of your initial doubts, you allow §Y[horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName]§! [horoscope_child.GetHerHis] presumed destiny.\n
translation: 尽管你最初怀疑，但你还是允许§Y[horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName]§!继续[horoscope_child.GetHerHis]命运。\n

original: This is not the path I chose for [horoscope_child.GetHerHim]!
translation: 这不是我为[horoscope_child.GetHerHim]选择的道路！

original: You will increase your efforts to steer §Y[horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName]§! into another direction in life.\n
translation: 你会更加努力地引导 §Y[horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName]§!进入人生的另一个方向。\n

original: As [inspiring_adult.GetTitledFirstName] leans over the [inspiring_adult.GetEducationTool], I find myself steering the conversation back to the architecture of our [Root.GetCapitalHolding]. [inspiring_adult.GetSheHeCap] knows of my interests, and I admit it's relaxing to have somebody to talk to about these things. I sometimes wonder whether my [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] was right... Am I destined for these matters?
translation: 当[inspiring_adult.GetTitledFirstName]俯下身子看[inspiring_adult.GetEducationTool]时，我发现自己将对话转回到[Root.GetCapitalHolding]的建筑。[inspiring_adult.GetSheHeCap]知道我的兴趣，并且我承认和人谈论这些事情可以让我放松。我有时想知道我的[horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother]是否正确……我注定要处理这些事情吗？

original: I wipe the sweat from my brow as [inspiring_adult.GetTitledFirstName] points out the flaws in my parrying technique. I'm glad that a [inspiring_adult.GetEducationRole] like [inspiring_adult.GetHerHim] takes time out of [inspiring_adult.GetHerHis] schedule to spar with me, and fighting has in some ways become part of who I am. I sometimes wonder whether my [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] was right... Are my battles already written in the stars?
translation: 正当我抹去额头上的汗时，[browptive_adult.GetTitledFirstName]指出了我格挡技术里的缺陷。我很高兴像[inspiring_adult.GetHerHim]这样的[inspiring_adult.GetEducationRole]能从[inspiring_adult.GetHerHis]百忙之中抽身与我练习。我感到战斗已然成为我的一部分。我有时好奇我的[horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother]是否正确……那些等待着我的战役是否早已刻入星辰里啦？

original: As I am walking around the [Root.GetCapitalHolding], [inspiring_adult.GetTitledFirstName] catches up with me. "My [Root.GetLordLady], the council is most pleased with your assessment of their proposal", [inspiring_adult.GetSheHe] says, a wide smile on [inspiring_adult.GetHerHis] face. [inspiring_adult.GetSheHeCap] has increasingly been encouraging me to partake in diplomatic meetings. "Do you not believe, as your [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother], that it is your destiny, to help people?"
translation: 当我在[Root.GetCapitalHolding]周围漫步时，[inspiring_adult.GetTitledFirstName]赶上了我。「我的[Root.GetLordLady]，内阁对你评估他们的建议非常满意」，[inspiring_adult.GetSheHe]面带微笑地说。[inspiring_adult.GetSheHeCap]愈发鼓励我参加外交会议。「您难道不觉得像您的[horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother]那样扶助人民，这是你的使命吗？」

original: [inspiring_adult.GetTitledFirstName] has often inspired me to keep my eyes and ears sharp... So when I find [inspiring_adult.GetHerHis] notes carelessly strewn around [inspiring_adult.GetHerHis] quarters, I cannot help but wonder if [inspiring_adult.GetSheHe] intended for me to find them. "From every [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName], [Root.GetSheHe] could be the one we will remember... Will the young [Root.GetLordLady] refuse what the heavens have so clearly laid out for [Root.GetHerHim]?"
translation: [inspiring_adult.GetTitledFirstName]经常激励我保持警觉……因而当我发现[inspiring_adult.GetHerHis]笔记散落在[inspiring_adult.GetHerHis]房间，我不禁怀疑起[inspiring_adult.GetSheHe]其实是故意让我发现这些笔记的。「在所有的[Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]族人之中，[Root.GetSheHe]可能是最令人印象深刻的……这位年轻的[Root.GetLordLady]会拒绝诸天为[Root.GetHerHim]精心安排的一切吗？」

original: "Reading has always come naturally to you, child", [inspiring_adult.GetTitledFirstName] tells me, leaning in over my notes. "Your writing is improving as well", [inspiring_adult.GetSheHe] adds, walking back to [inspiring_adult.GetHerHis] seat by the window. The [Root.GetCapitalHolding] is unusually quiet today and outside the sun is shining. Lost in thought, my mind drifts to my [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother]'s horoscope.
translation: 「你的阅读总是那么自然，孩子」，[inspiring_adult.GetTitledFirstName]告诉我，俯下身浏览我的笔记。「你的写作水平也在改善，」[inspiring_adult.GetSheHe]补充道，又走回到[inspiring_adult.GetHerHis]靠窗座位。[Root.GetCapitalHolding]今天非常安静，屋外阳光明媚。我陷入沉思，思绪飘回到[horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother]的那次星占。

original: Perhaps a [Root.GetHermeticsDestinedRole] is what I am meant to be.
translation: 也许[Root.GetHermeticsDestinedRole]就是我的命运。

original: Surely [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] would want me to make my own destiny.
translation: 当然[horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother]会让我决定我自己的命运。

original: I am told by the educators that my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName] remains interested in [horoscope_child.GetHermeticsDestinedExpertise]. Turning my eyes upwards, I give a silent nod to the heavens, thanking the stars for their guidance.
translation: 教育者告诉我，我的[horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon][horoscope_child.GetFirstName]对[horoscope_child.GetHermeticsDestinedExpertise]保持兴趣。我抬头看向天空默默点头，感谢群星的指引。

original: I am told by the educators that my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName] remains interested in [horoscope_child.GetHermeticsDestinedExpertise]. Turning my eyes upwards, I take a deep breath. Perhaps the influence of the stars are unavoidable. May be that [horoscope_child.GetFirstName]'s destiny is out of my control.
translation: 教育者告诉我，我的[horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon][horoscope_child.GetFirstName]对[horoscope_child.GetHermeticsDestinedExpertise]保持兴趣。我向上转动双眼并深吸了一口气。也许群星的影响是不可避免的。或许[horoscope_child.GetFirstName]的命运超出了我的掌控。

original: I am told by the educators that my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName] is growing reluctant to the idea of becoming a [horoscope_child.GetHermeticsDestinedRole]. Sighing, I rub my temples. Perhaps knowing about [horoscope_child.GetHerHis] destiny makes [horoscope_child.GetHerHim] anxious?
translation: 教育者告诉我，我的[horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon][horoscope_child.GetFirstName]越来越不愿意成为一名[horoscope_child.GetHermeticsDestinedRole]。我边擦着太阳穴边叹息。也许了解[horoscope_child.GetHerHis]命运会让[horoscope_child.GetHerHim]感到焦急？

original: I am told by the educators that my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName] is growing increasingly reluctant to the idea of becoming a [horoscope_child.GetHermeticsDestinedRole]. I take a deep breath while I contemplate the stars and their influence over us all.
translation: 教育者告诉我，我的[horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon][horoscope_child.GetFirstName]越来越不愿意成为一名[horoscope_child.GetHermeticsDestinedRole]。我深深吸了一口气，并思考着群星和他们对我们所有人的影像。

original: I believe the heavens have a plan for [horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 我相信老天为[horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName]做好了计划。

original: You wonder what the future will bring.\n
translation: 你想知道未来会带来什么。\n

original: Actually, I think the stars have something else in store for my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon].
translation: 事实上，我认为群星为我的[horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon]另有打算。

original: You doubt the importance of the horoscope you made for §Y[horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 你有点怀疑你为§Y[horoscope_child.GetTitledFirstName]§!做的星象占卜的重要性。\n

original: Destined Steward
translation: 天赋总管

original: Destined Fighter
translation: 天生战士

original: Destined Diplomat
translation: 天生外交官

original: Destined Schemer
translation: 天生阴谋家

original: Destined Scholar
translation: 天生学者

original: This child pays attention to details, and likes to draw and study maps.
translation: 这个孩子注重细节，喜欢画画和研究地图。

original: This child is often found nearby the military practice grounds.
translation: 这个孩子经常被人看到在军事训练场。

original: This child is very courteous.
translation: 这个孩子十分有礼貌。

original: This child is often found listening in on your conversations.
translation: 这个孩子经常被人看到在偷听你的谈话。

original: This child is usually seen carrying a book under their arm.
translation: 这个孩子经常被人看到手上拿着本书。

original: Destined Steward
translation: 天赋总管

original: Destined Fighter
translation: 天生战士

original: Destined Diplomat
translation: 天生外交官

original: Destined Schemer
translation: 天生阴谋家

original: Destined Scholar
translation: 天生学者

original: This character pays attention to details, and keeps a library of maps.
translation: 这个角色注重细节，并拥有一个地图库。

original: This character is often found by the sparring grounds.
translation: 这个角色经常出现在训练场。

original: This character is very courteous.
translation: 这个角色非常有礼貌。

original: This character is often found listening in on your conversations.
translation: 这个角色经常被人看到在偷听你的谈话。

original: This character is usually seen carrying a book under their arm.
translation: 这个角色经常被人看到手上拿着本书。

original: Tortured Artist
translation: 痛苦艺术家

original: Scatterbrain
translation: 丢三落四

original: Brutish Manners
translation: 举止粗野

original: Know-It-All
translation: 不懂装懂

original: Anxious To Please
translation: 极尽谄媚

original: An inner conflict of personality has created an eternal suffering within this character.
translation: 人格的内在冲突在这个角色心中造成了永恒的痛苦。

original: An inner conflict of personality has landed this character with some concentration issues.
translation: 人格的内在冲突使这个角色出现了一些专注度上的问题。

original: When it comes to interacting with others, this character is often forceful, but tactless.
translation: 当和他人互动时，这个角色通常是有说服力但粗鲁的。

original: Some unresolved personal issues has left this character with a need to prove themselves.
translation: 一些未被解决的个人问题使得此人需要证明自己。

original: This character is eager to please, but does not seem to trust their ability to do so.
translation: 这个角色渴望取悦，但似乎不相信他们有能力这么做。

original: Over the years, I've always felt motivated to study the art of [Root.GetHermeticsDestinedExpertise]. Even once I officially finished my education, I did not feel satisfied. "There must be more to this", I urged my educators, and they have indulged me. I am not sure if I have been guided by the stars, as my [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] might have put it, but I do feel like I can finally be more than what everyone has assumed.
translation: 多年来，我一直积极研究[Root.GetHermeticsDestinedExpertise]的技艺。即使我正式完成了教育，我仍然无法满足。「我还想学更多内容」，我敦促教育者，于是他们迁就了我的想法。我不确定自己是否像我的[horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother]说的那样受过星星的引导，但我确实觉得我终于可以超越所有人的设想了。

original: Over the years, I've always felt motivated to study the art of [Root.GetHermeticsDestinedExpertise]. Even once I officially finished my education, I did not feel satisfied. "There must be more to this", I urged my educators, and they have indulged me. My [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] might have had other plans for me, but I feel confident that this is the path the stars laid out before me.
translation: 多年来，我一直积极研究[Root.GetHermeticsDestinedExpertise]的技艺。即使我正式完成了教育，我仍然无法满足。「我还想学更多内容」，我敦促教育者，于是他们迁就了我的想法。我的[horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother]可能对我有其他计划，但我确信这是星星为我制定的道路。

original: Over the years, I haven't always felt motivated to study the art of [Root.GetHermeticsDestinedExpertise]. Yet I did not feel satisfied at all, once I officially finished my education. "I think I made a mistake in neglecting these studies", I urged my educators, and they have indulged me. I am not sure if I have been guided by the stars, as my [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] might have put it, but I do feel like I can finally be more than what everyone has assumed.
translation: 多年来，我并不一直积极研究[Root.GetHermeticsDestinedExpertise]的技艺。然而当我正式完成了教育，我仍然无法满足。「过去我忽视这种学习是我的错」，我恳求教育者，于是他们迁就了我的想法。我不确定自己是否像我的[horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother]说的那样受过星星的引导，但我确实觉得我终于可以超越所有人的设想了。

original: Over the years, I haven't always felt motivated to study the art of [Root.GetHermeticsDestinedExpertise]. Yet I did not feel satisfied once I finished my education. "I think I made a mistake in neglecting these studies", I urged my educators, and they have indulged me. My [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] might have had other plans for me, but perhaps [horoscope_maker.GetHerHis] horoscope was right all along?
translation: 多年来，我并不一直积极研究[Root.GetHermeticsDestinedExpertise]的技艺。然而当我正式完成了教育，我仍然无法满足。「过去我忽视这种学习是我的错」，我恳求教育者，于是他们迁就了我的想法。我的[horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother]可能对我有其他计划，但[horoscope_maker.GetHerHis]星座占卜也许真的是正确的？

original: I did not even realize that I had it in me.
translation: 我甚至没有意识到这就在我身上。

original: I will keep honing my skills.
translation: 我会继续磨练我的技能。

original: I always had mixed feelings about all of this.
translation: 对于这一切，我总是感慨万分。
