original: A noble in [Root.Location.GetName] caught me while I was spying there!
translation: [Root.Location.GetName]中的一位贵族在我进行间谍行为时抓住了我！

original: [From.Liege.GetTitledName]'s spymaster [From.GetTitledName] was found spying in [From.Location.GetName]!
translation: [From.Liege.GetTitledName]的间谍总管[From.GetTitledName]被发现在[From.Location.GetName]进行间谍活动！

original:
I received word that your spymaster [FromFrom.GetTitledName] has been spying in one of my counties. This is intolerable and as to stop further interference I have arrested [FromFrom.GetHerHim]!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我收到消息你的间谍总管[FromFrom.GetTitledName]一直在我的一个领地进行谍报活动。这是不能容忍的，为了阻止进一步的干扰，我已经逮捕了[FromFrom.GetHerHim]！

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
I received word that you have been spying in one of my counties. I will let it pass. This time.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我收到消息称你正在我的领地上进行间谍活动。我不会追究，下不为例。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: The §YProsperity§! of the county decreases slightly\n
translation: 稍微降低这个省份的§Y繁荣度§!\n

original: Sabotaged Buildings
translation: 破坏建筑

original: Sabotaged Defenses
translation: 破坏城防

original: Incited Unrest
translation: 煽动骚乱

original: A spy has sabotaged building sites in this county.
translation: 一个间谍破坏了这个省份的建筑工地。

original: A spy has sabotaged defenses in this county.
translation: 一个间谍破坏了这个省份的防御设施。

original: A spy has incited unrest in this county.
translation: 一个间谍煽动了这个省份的骚乱。

original: I have successfully managed to sabotage the province of [Root.Location.GetName]. I should inform my liege!
translation: 我已经成功破坏了[Root.Location.GetName]的省份。我应该告诉我的领主！

original: Sabotaged Province
translation: 破坏省份

original: Have your [GetSpymasterName] focus his attention on the local nobles in a county, increasing the likelihood of intrigue events against them. This will also discourage vassals from associating with Factions, or give you the opportunity to recruit new members for your own.
translation: 让你的[GetSpymasterName]把注意力集中在省份里的当地贵族身上，增加对他们发生阴谋事件的可能性。这也会阻止封臣加入派系，或者让你有机会为自己的派系增加新成员。

original: Order your [GetSpymasterName] to uncover plots and discourage vassals from associating with Factions.
translation: 命令你的[GetSpymasterName]去揭露阴谋并且劝阻那些与派系相勾结的封臣。

original: I have found proof that there is a plot brewing in the realm.
translation: 我发现有证据证明在这个王国有一个酝酿中的阴谋。

original: My investigation into the rumor of a plot must have alerted someone. Armed thugs are breaking into my room!
translation: 我对一个阴谋的谣言的调查一定惊动了某人。武装暴徒破门而入！

original: You have spent some time investigating one of your liege's vassals, and you feel that you have gathered enough information to gain a leverage that would discourage the vassal from supporting conspiratorial factions in the future.
translation: 你花了一些时间调查你的领主的一个封臣，你觉得你已通过收集了足够多的信息获得一种手段，可以阻止这个封臣在未来支持阴谋派系。

original: During my stay at the court of a noble in the realm, I have done my utmost to present my liege in a more favorable light. But sinister forces around me seem to conspire to twist and turn my every action into something dubious and every word spoken into an insult.
translation: 当我在王国贵族的宫廷逗留期间，我尽了最大的努力，以更好的眼光来介绍我的领主。但我周围的邪恶势力似乎密谋扭曲，把我的每一个行动说成了行迹可疑，每一句话都变成了侮辱。

original: During my stay at the court of a noble, I have done my utmost to present my liege in a more favorable light and have him recognized as the benevolent and peaceful ruler [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] is.
translation: 在我留在贵族宫廷的过程中，我尽我最大的努力，用更光鲜的方式展现我的领主[Root.Liege.GetSheHe]，使他被认为是一名仁慈而和平的统治者。

original: I have worked improving the demesne of my liege, and have recently been met with success in my efforts. [Root.Liege.GetSheHe] will surely be pleased!
translation: 我一直在努力改善我领主的直辖领地，并且最近在我的努力下取得了成功。[Root.Liege.GetSheHe]一定会很高兴！

original: Smugglers Enter Demesne
translation: 走私者进入领地

original: While managing your liege's demesne you let in a group of what you thought was merchants looking for new business ventures. But as it turns out they were smugglers!
translation: 在管理你领主直辖省份时，你放进来一群人，你以为他们是商人，为寻找商机而来。但事实证明他们是走私犯！

original: Your incompetent [From.GetJobTitle] has let a group of smugglers into the county of [smuggler_province.GetName]! Apparently [From.GetSheHe] thought they were merchants, what a fool!
translation: 你无能的[From.GetJobTitle]让一群走私者进入了[smuggler_province.GetName]的伯爵领。显然[From.GetSheHe]以为他们是商人，真是愚不可及！

original: Commander Brawl
translation: 指挥官争吵

original: While drilling the commanders, [commander_character.GetFirstName] starts mocking your technique. Before you know it, the situation escalates into a full-fledged brawl!
translation: 在训练指挥官们的时候，[commander_character.GetFirstName]开始嘲笑你的技术。在你知道之前，情况升级成一场全面的争吵！

original: Instead of drilling the commanders, [From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetFirstName] has been fighting them! There is truly a lack of discipline in your ranks...
translation: 相比于操练，[From.GetJobTitle][From.GetFirstName]更倾向于选择在用实战来训练他的军队！反观你的部队，确实是纪律涣散了一些……

original: §BMonks and Mystics:§! Devil Worshipers
translation: §B「修道士与密契者」：§!恶魔崇拜者

original: Devil Worshipers will practice their foul magic across the world.
translation: 恶魔崇拜者们将在世界各地修习他们的邪恶魔法。

original: There will be no Devil Worshipers.
translation: 不会出现恶魔崇拜者。

original: I have found a man of great talent that would be willing to serve my liege as a commander, I should send word at once.
translation: 我找到了一个很有才能的人，愿意作为指挥官为我的领主服务，我应该马上写一封信。

original: Commander Improved
translation: 将领属性提升

original: After weeks of drilling I believe that one of the commanders my liege ordered me to train, [commander_improved.GetFirstName], has improved significantly!
translation: 经过几个星期的操练，我相信我的领主命令我训练的其中一位指挥官，[commander_improved.GetFirstName]，有了显著的提升！

original: My [From.GetJobTitle] tells me that one of my commanders, [commander_improved.GetFirstName], has improved significantly!
translation: 我的[From.GetJobTitle]告诉我，我的指挥官[commander_improved.GetFirstName]已经大大进步了！

original: The [GetMarshalName] will strive to organize your armies and drill your commanders. Reduces retinue monthly cost.
translation: [GetMarshalName]将努力组织你的军队并操练你的指挥官。减少每月的近卫军花费。

original: I think I know who to replace...
translation: 我想我知道他可以替换谁……

original: Apostate Found!
translation: 发现叛教者！

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! has not been cursed in the last 10 years
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!在过去 10 年内没有受过诅咒

original: the truth of Universal Theology
translation: 普世神学的真理

original: the origins of the Trinity in the era before the Messiah
translation: 前默西亚时代三位一体的起源

original: the Qabalah's relationship to Hermes Trismegistus
translation: 赫耳墨斯·特利斯墨吉斯忒斯与卡巴拉的关系

original: how unity with the One is achieved
translation: 如何实现与主的同一

original: the nature of the Prima materia
translation: 原初物质的性质

original: the nature of the Inner and the Outer cosmos
translation: 内外宇宙的性质

original: unity through the lens of Prisca theologia
translation: 通过古代神学之镜达成同一

original: the esoteric meaning of the Caduceus
translation: 双蛇杖的深意

original: the truth inherent in Divine Consciousness
translation: 神性意识的内在真理

original: the interaction between the soul and alchemy
translation: 灵魂与炼金术的互动

original: the definition of a true magnum opus
translation: 真正巨著的定义

original: the nature of the Judgements and the Bazaar
translation: 审判与集市的性质

original: the movement of celestial bodies
translation: 天体运动

original: the laws of the stars
translation: 恒星运行规律

original: whether snails, due to their spiral shells, are the most Divine creatures
translation: 蜗牛是否因螺旋壳成为最神圣的生物

original: whether snakes and staves are symbolically the exact same thing
translation: 蛇和权杖是否象征着完全相同的东西

original: how it's always lead that must be transmuted into gold, when beer is just as noble
translation: 为何炼金术总是点铅成金而不是点麦酒成金

original: the highly medicinal applications of alcohol "when applied internally"
translation: 酒水「内服」时的高度药物价值

original: whether it's true that I have an emerald tablet at home or not
translation: 我家里是否有翠玉录

original: the crazy things that happened at the last Great Debate
translation: 在上次大辩论中发生的疯狂事情

original: how it would be incredible if the soul could leave the body temporarily, then return
translation: 如果灵魂能暂时离体，之后又回去，会是多么惊人

original: who is more important in the Divine hierarchy, kings or angels
translation: 国王和天使在天阶等级中谁更重要

original: that perhaps eternal torment is not as bad as the laity has been led to believe
translation: 也许地狱的永恒折磨并不像信众所相信的那么糟

original: the pains and troubles that come with eternal life
translation: 永生带来的痛苦和麻烦

original: the top ten alchemists of all time
translation: 历代十大炼金术师

original: that feeling of Divine presence you get from smelling certain liquids at the moment of synthesis
translation: 在合成过程中闻到某种液体的神性存在的感觉

original: whether gardening is best left for servants, or secretly the most noble work one can do
translation: 园艺是人类最高贵的工作，还是仆人干的粗活

original: the obvious reasons for why alchemists make better lovers
translation: 炼金术士会成为佳偶的原因

original: a Quaternity as the answer instead of Trismegistus Trinity
translation: 以四位一体代替三位一体

original: You will inhale the drugs provided by the Order, and soon see their effects.
translation: 你将吸入教团所提供的药剂，然后很快就能看到它的效果。

original: You will inhale the drugs provided by the Order, and soon see their effects.\nThis will help with your withdrawal, but use comes at a risk.
translation: 你将吸入教团所提供的药剂，然后很快就能看到它的效果。\n这将会帮助你摆脱瘾症，不过通常会有一些风险。

original: [Custom.GetAssassinsDrugsTooltip]\n
translation: [Custom.GetAssassinsDrugsTooltip]\n

original: As if from a haze, I emerge, once more standing in the light of the sun. I did not even fully understand what was weighing so heavily on my mind, but its dark grasp has finally loosened.
translation: 仿佛从薄雾中，我出现了，又一次站在阳光下。我甚至还没有完全明白压在我脑子里的是什么，但它的黑暗力量终于松开了。

original: I feel calmer than I have for a long time.
translation: 我感受到了从未有过的平静。

original: Demons of the mind, I say to thee, be gone.
translation: 我对你说，我思绪中的恶魔已经消失了。

original: The very sight of the world no longer drains me, it emboldens!
translation: 看到这个世界不再让我感到疲惫，这会让我鼓起勇气！

original: The scales of madness have fallen from before my eyes.
translation: 疯狂的程度在我眼前降低。

original: As my mind perceives the world in new and unexpected ways, the shapes in the smoke filling my chamber crystallize, and I begin to understand.
translation: 当我的大脑以新的和意想不到的方式感知世界时，我房间里充满的烟雾逐渐成型，我开始理解。

original: I see friends past, and friends I have yet to meet...
translation: 我看到过去的朋友，还有我还没有见过的朋友……

original: Great battles play out before me.
translation: 伟大的战斗在我面前展开。

original: Shadows dissipate, revealing all they once hid.
translation: 阴影消散，暴露了曾经隐藏的一切。

original: The wisdom of the past, written in ashen clouds.
translation: 过去的智慧，写在灰蒙蒙的云彩里。

original: The flow of gold is as malleable as steam.
translation: 黄金的流动与蒸汽一样具有延展性。

original: As my body is purged by the intoxicating smoke, my very being changes, and what once ailed me can no longer touch what I have become.
translation: 随着我的身体被这些令人陶醉的烟雾所净化，我的一切都在改变，那些曾经令我痛苦不堪的东西将因为我的变化而永远离我远去。

original: My affliction has been driven away.
translation: 我的痛苦已被驱逐。

original: It is time to open my mind to visions of paradise. They will ensure the steadiness of my hand as I act on behalf of the order, but how much do I dare reveal to myself?
translation: 是时候向天堂的幻象敞开心扉了。当我代表教团行事时，他们将确保我的手的稳定性，但我敢向自己透露多少呢？

original: Clarity! I can see the world as if I am soaring above it, with eyes as sharp as an eagle. Never before have I felt so aware.
translation: 清晰！我能看到这个世界，仿佛我在它的上空翱翔，眼睛像鹰一样锐利。我以前从来没有这么清晰的看到过。

original: The visions have revealed much to me. I understand so much more now, even a hint of my own place in the great mosaic of God's plan.
translation: 这些幻象向我透露了很多天机。我现在懂得更多了，它们甚至暗示了我在上帝伟业的宏大拼图中的位置。

original: I woke in a haystack outside my tower window. My memories from the day before are hazy, but I remember the sensation of falling through darkness, surrounded by souls twisting and moaning in pain.
translation: 我在塔楼外的草垛里醒来。我前一天的记忆是朦胧的，但我记得在黑暗中被在痛苦中扭曲和呻吟的灵魂包围着坠落的感觉。

original: The veil has been lifted!
translation: 面纱已被揭开！

original: I might have to be more careful.
translation: 我也许应该更小心的。

original: It has been weeks since I last used the hashish, and I find my thoughts returning to that day time and time again. My mind refuses to let go of the visions I had of Paradise, and I'm longing for more.
translation: 自从我上次使用大麻后已经过了几个星期了，我发现我的思绪一次又一次地回到那一天。我的意志拒绝忘掉我所见到的天堂美景，并渴望更多。

original: It has been months since the last time I used the hashish, and as the memory of my visions fade, so does my desperate desire to experience it again.
translation: 自从我上次使用大麻后已经过了几个月了，我慢慢淡忘了对那美景的记忆，因此我极度渴望再次体验它。

original: How could I not feel this hunger inside me before? No wonder the world is as it is when a hunger as demonic as this can reside silently for so long in my stomach!
translation: 我怎么能不感受到我内心的饥渴呢？难怪这个世界会是这样，这个恶魔一样的饥渴感能在我的肚子里静静地停留这么久！

original: Yes, this chicken might banish my demons.
translation: 是的，这只鸡也许能驱逐我内在的恶魔。

original: Through the smoke filling my room I see clearly. Traitors to the left of me and false believers to the right. All of them clamoring for my head. What a fool I have been!
translation: 透过我房间里的烟，我看得很清楚。我左边的叛徒，右边的是错误的信徒。他们都吵着要我的头。我真是个傻瓜！

original: In the darkness of my smoke-filled room, I wonder what the point of it all is. I was supposed to see Paradise. Instead I see the truth, and it has left me empty.
translation: 在我烟雾缭绕房间的阴影里，我想知道这一切的意义何在。我本想看到天堂，却不料看到了真相，它让我空虚。

original: Every day the same, and the world will never change.
translation: 每一天都一样，世界永远不会改变。

original: The demons are upon us!
translation: 恶魔在我们身边！

original: Glance of Understanding
translation: 理解的一瞥

original: This character has achieved a deeper insight into the meaning of friendship and animosity.
translation: 这个角色对友谊和敌意的含义有了更深入的了解。

original: Stare of Blood and Blade
translation: 血与剑的凝视

original: This character has achieved a deeper insight into the art of war.
translation: 此角色对战争艺术有了更深的见解。

original: Squint of Smoke and Shadow
translation: 一缕烟雾和阴影

original: This character has achieved a deeper insight into the true intentions of those claiming to be their friend.
translation: 这个角色对那些自称为朋友的人的真实意图有了更加深入的了解。

original: Truth-seeking Gaze
translation: 寻求真理的目光

original: This character has achieved a deeper insight into the hidden knowledge of the world.
translation: 此人对这世界的秘密有了更深的了解。

original: Gold-shimmer Eyes
translation: 金光闪闪的眼睛

original: This character has achieved a deeper insight into the exchange of desires.
translation: 此人对欲望交换有着很深入的了解。

original: While debating [Custom.GetHermeticDebateSubject], I have the sudden impulse that a comedic story, once told to me by a stable-hand, would underline my point perfectly. Even if it doesn't, laughter might win me just as many allies.
translation: 在辩论[Custom.GetHermeticDebateSubject]时，我突然想起曾经一个马夫告诉我的故事，这个故事可以完美的表达我的观点。即使它不能完美表达我的观点，笑声也可能赢得同样多的盟友。

original: "Once upon a time, a servant of mine was shoveling horse dung..."
translation: 「曾几何时，我的一个仆人正在铲马粪……」

original: There is a chance the joke doesn't land, but if you do well you might charm everyone's beards off!
translation: 这个可能是个冷笑话，但如果你讲得好，可能会让每个人都大笑！

original: This is not the time for foolish tales.
translation: 现在不是耗在这些愚蠢的故事上的时候。

original: You sit back down.
translation: 你坐了下来。

original: '...and if those words, even uttered by a simpleton, does not illustrate my point, nothing ever will.'\nI am unsure if anyone heard my decisive conclusion over the roars of laughter, but it mattered little. The crowd was completely won over by my story.
translation: 「……如果这些话——即使这些话是由傻瓜说出的——还不能说明我的观点，还有什么可以？」\n我不确定是否有人听到我在全场大笑中的决定性结论，但这不重要。我的故事完全打动了观众。

original: Just as funny as I am thoughtful!
translation: 就和我想象的一样，相当有趣！

original: I stand before the room in complete silence for a minute before asking again. 'Get it?'\nSomeone accidentally drops the pin they used to illustrate the Theory of Dancing Angels to the floor. The light ding is as loud as a bell in my ears.
translation: 我站在房间里，沉默了一会儿，然后再问。「明白了吗？」\n有人无意中把用来说明舞蹈天使理论的针掉在了地板上。淡淡的叮当声在我耳边响起。

original: I can't ever show my face to those people again!
translation: 我没脸在这些人面前出现了！

original: [Root.GetTitledName] is born under the sign of [Root.GetWesternZodiacSign].
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]出生在[Root.GetWesternZodiacSign]的星座下。

original: You will gain a trait appropriate for your zodiac sign!\n
translation: 你将获得适合你的星座的特质！\n

original: I have abandoned my attempt to better myself in seclusion, and have rejoined the world around me.
translation: 我打消了在隐居中精进自我的企图，决定重归于俗世。

original: I am good enough as it is.
translation: 我已经做的足够好了。

original: To build the strength of our faith, you must spread the word of [Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] as far as it can reach. There is fertile ground within the realm where people seem open to new ideas. Found a community there, and see it blossom.
translation: 为了建立我们信仰的力量，你必须尽可能地传播[Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]的话语。这篇国度有肥沃的土壤，人们看起来对新想法持开放态度的。在那里建立一个团体，并让他开花。

original: Use the Prepare Ground power in the province by right-clicking the county shield. This will start your attempt to found a community of believers there. Successfully building a community will complete the mission.
translation: 通过右击伯爵领的盾徽，在这个省份中使用准备好的力量。你将开始尝试去在那里建立一个信徒们的团体。成功地建立一个团体将完成任务。

original: It is a challenge to maintain a falsely professed faith at the best of time, but those who would not understand you are more suspicious than ever. You must show them beyond any shadow of a doubt that you believe what you have told them.
translation: 在最好的时候保持虚假的信念是一种挑战，但是那些不理解你的人比以往任何时候都更加怀疑你。你必须表现出，对于你告诉他们的教义，坚定不移的信奉。

original: Take the decision to Blend In to start your attempt. Successfully convincing those around you that you are a believer of their faith will complete the mission.
translation: 选择决议「融入」开始你的尝试。成功地说服你周围的人，让他们相信你是他们信仰的追随者，就能完成这一使命。

original: During a late conversation with a fellow member of [This.Society.GetName], I find myself discussing the power of one's phrasing. When I jokingly suggest that I should attempt to deliver my arguments in verse, [fellow_debater_target.GetTitledFirstName], to my surprise, nods appreciatively. "Do not underestimate the power of a good rhyme", [fellow_debater_target.GetSheHe] says.
translation: 在与[This.Society.GetName]的同伴进行的最后一次谈话中，我发现自己正在讨论一个人的措辞的力量。当我开玩笑地建议我应该尝试用诗句来表达我的观点时，[fellow_debater_target.GetTitledFirstName]让我惊讶地赞赏地点头。「不要低估一首好韵的力量，」[fellow_debater_target.GetSheHe]说。

original: Perhaps it is exactly what my theme needs!
translation: 也许这正是我的主题所需要的！

original: The rest of your evening is spent discussing the finer points of poetry.\n
translation: 你晚上的剩余时间都在谈论诗歌的闪光点。\n

original: Nonsense! I will focus on facts, not embellishments.
translation: 废话！我将专注于事实，而不是点缀。

original: You spend the rest of your evening preparing for your next debate, increasing your chances of winning.\n
translation: 你花费晚上的剩余时间准备下一次辩论，以增加获胜的机会。\n

original: During today's debate, I'm unsettled to find my rival [rival_debater_target.GetTitledFirstName] observing me. Turning back to the rest of the audience, I take a deep breath, before continuing my reasoning. Once I'm finished, I am startled to see that [rival_debater_target.GetFirstName] has stood up, smiling – with a quirked eyebrow [rival_debater_target.GetSheHe] offers me a nod of respect.
translation: 在今天的辩论中，我很不安地发现我的对手[rival_debater_target.GetTitledFirstName]在观察我。在继续推理之前，我深呼吸了一下，然后转向其他观众。当我完成了的时候，我吃惊地看到[rival_debater_target.GetFirstName]微笑着站了起来——[rival_debater_target.GetSheHe]扬起了眉毛，向我点头表示敬意。

original: I am glad we can see beyond our differences during occasions like these.
translation: 我很高兴在这样的场合看到我们超越分歧。

original: Scholarly Appreciation
translation: 学术鉴赏

original: After some time spent listening to the debates between scholars of varying intellect, I admit to occasionally drifting off into my own thoughts... Yet there is one person that keeps bringing my attention back to the present – [striking_debater_target.GetTitledName] has wits and a way with words, unlike any I have seen.
translation: 聆听过一段时间不同水平的学者之间的辩论之后，我承认我会时不时开小差……然而，有一个人一直把我的注意力带回现实——与我见过的其他人不同，[striking_debater_target.GetTitledName]有着独特的智慧和说话方式。

original: After some time spent listening to the debates between scholars of varying intellect, I admit to occasionally drifting off into my own thoughts... I suppose I shouldn't be surprised that there is one person that keeps bringing my attention back to the present – [striking_debater_target.GetTitledFirstName] has always had a way with words, as well as an alluring presence.
translation: 聆听过一段时间不同水平的学者之间的辩论之后，我承认我会时不时开小差……我想我不应该感到惊讶的是，有一个人一直把我的注意力拉回现实——[striking_debater_target.GetTitledFirstName]十分健谈，而且仪表堂堂。

original: I... I am not sure what these feelings are!
translation: 我……我不确定我是什么感觉！

original: I hear the voice of [fellow_member_1.GetTitledFirstName] before I even enter the room. "[fellow_member_2.GetTitledFirstName], you clearly know nothing of [fellow_member_1.GetHermeticDebateSubject]! Why are we even having this conversation?!"
translation: 在我走进房间之前，我听到了[fellow_member_1.GetTitledFirstName]的声音。「[fellow_member_2.GetTitledFirstName]，你对[fellow_member_1.GetHermeticDebateSubject]真是一无所知！为什么我们要进行这次对话？！」

original: [fellow_member_1.GetFirstName], there you are! Keep your voice down, would you?
translation: [fellow_member_1.GetFirstName]，你在这啊！说话声音小点，好吗？

original: [fellow_member_2.GetFirstName], what is [fellow_member_1.GetSheHe] on about?
translation: [fellow_member_2.GetFirstName]，[fellow_member_1.GetSheHe]在做啥？

original: I am sure this is just a misunderstanding.
translation: 我确信这只是误会。

original: I should just pretend I wasn't here...
translation: 我应该装作我不在这里的……

original: Mediator
translation: 和事佬

original: Meddler
translation: 好事者

original: It would be worth it.
translation: 这将是值得的。

original: You sabotage the chances of §Y[fellow_member_target.GetTitledName]§! making a good impression during the Grand Debate.\n
translation: 你破坏了§Y[fellow_member_target.GetTitledName]§!在大辩论中留下好印象的机会。\n

original: This is foolish, I respect my fellow scholars.
translation: 这很愚蠢，我敬重我的同僚学者们。

original: No matter how pompous.\n
translation: 无论多么华而不实。\n

original: Childish Prankster
translation: 幼稚的捣蛋鬼

original: This character has acted very unprofessionally during an important scholarly gathering, and is a little embarrassed from the way people shy away from them now.
translation: 这个角色在一次重要的学术会议上表现得非常不专业，而且现在人们回避的方式有些尴尬。

original: Tarnished Reputation
translation: 败坏名誉

original: This character has been the victim of a messy prank involving ink and ruined clothes – it has made them a little skittish around other scholars.
translation: 这个角色是一场混乱的恶作剧的受害者。脏乱的墨渍和破烂的衣服使其在其他学者面前显得有些轻浮。

original: These past few days, I've felt an energy rising within me, urging to be used for creativity. "I could build a new laboratory! Wait, no... I should prepare my notes for tomorrow", I mumble. Glancing at a stack of parchments, it occurs to me that I could compose a letter to my dear [inspired_letter_target.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 在过去的几天里，我感受到一股能量在体内涌起，催促我去创造。「我可以建立一个新的实验室！等等，不……我应该为明天准备笔记」，我咕哝着。看着一叠羊皮纸，我发现我可以给我亲爱的[inspired_letter_target.GetTitledFirstName]写一封信。

original: Words cannot truly express my love for [inspired_letter_target.GetHerHim], but I'll try.
translation: 言语不能真正表达我对[inspired_letter_target.GetHerHim]的爱，但我会尝试。

original: Inspired words, to show my appreciation for [inspired_letter_target.GetHerHim].
translation: 激励的话语，来表达我对[inspired_letter_target.GetHerHim]的欣赏。

original: I'll make it difficult for [inspired_letter_target.GetHerHim] not to like me.
translation: 我会让[inspired_letter_target.GetHerHim]很难不喜欢上我。

original: "My dear [inspired_letter_target.GetRootRelation]... I would not be who I am without you in my life."\nIn the end you toss papers around you, and spend all night perfecting the letter.\n
translation: 「我亲爱的[inspired_letter_target.GetRootRelation]……我的生命中不能没有你。」\n你整晚都在完善这封信，最后你把信纸扔得到处都是。

original: I've been meaning to put my feelings into words for a long time.
translation: 我已经刻意将我的情感浸入文字中很久了。

original: A small poem, to illustrate my appreciation for [inspired_letter_target.GetHerHim].
translation: 一首小诗，来表达我对[inspired_letter_target.GetHerHim]的欣赏。

original: Even [inspired_letter_target.GetSheHe] cannot resist a good poem.
translation: 即使是[inspired_letter_target.GetSheHe]也不能抵御一首好诗。

original: "I would not be who I am today, were it not for you. You are my sun and moon, my Alpha and Omega".\nIn the end you toss papers around you, and spend all night perfecting the letter.\n
translation: 「如果不是因为你，我不会成为今天的我。你是我的太阳和月亮，我的阿尔法和欧米茄。」\n你整晚都在完善这封信，最后你把信纸扔得到处都是。\n

original: Focus! This is an opportune time for my work on the Prima materia.
translation: 注意力集中！现在是我对原初物质进行研究的有利时刻。

original: You spend the rest of your evening researching, increasing your chances of winning the debate.\n
translation: 你消耗晚上的剩余时间进行研究，以提高赢得辩论的几率。\n

original: I have received a long and heartfelt letter from [From.GetTitledFirstName]. It contains beautiful metaphors about how important I am to [From.GetHerHim], expressed with an eager earnestness I have seldom seen in my [From.GetRootRelation] before. I wonder what prompted this...
translation: 我收到了一封来自[From.GetTitledFirstName]的信笺，他写的很长，而且真情实意。信里面用各种美妙的隐喻暗示了我对[From.GetHerHim]是多么的重要，我以前很少见我的[From.GetRootRelation]这么做过。我想知道是什么促使[From.GetHerHim]写了这封信……

original: [From.GetFirstName] must really care about me.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]肯定非常在意我。

original: Pen Pal
translation: 笔友

original: Love Letters
translation: 情书

original: Delighted Parent
translation: 愉悦的父母

original: Poetic Pen Pal
translation: 诗友

original: Poetic Love Letters
translation: 诗歌情书

original: Poetry Delighted Parent
translation: 诗乐父母

original: Many of my fellow debaters often stay up late, honing their arguments well into the night. I'm starting to feel the lack of sleep getting to me... My mind often drifts, leaving me staring into thin air, and while I sift through my notes, looking for points not yet brought up by my peers, my hands show signs of tremors.
translation: 我的许多辩论者经常熬夜，把他们的论点磨练到深夜。我开始感觉睡眠不足了。我的脑海里常常浮现，让我凝视着稀薄的空气，当我仔细检查我的笔记，寻找我的同龄人还没有出现的时候，我的手展现出震颤的迹象。

original: This is too important to stop now.
translation: 这太重要了，现在不能停下来。

original: You increase your chances of winning the debate.\n
translation: 你增加了赢得辩论的几率。\n

original: I just want to get some rest, I don't care who wins the debate.
translation: 我只是想休息一下，我才不在乎谁赢了辩论。

original: You decrease your chances of winning the debate.\n
translation: 你减少了赢得辩论的几率。\n

original: Enables §Gright-clicking§! the portrait of any §RDepressed§! or §RStressed§! character in your court, in order to make them a potion that raises their spirits, in exchange for §Y[From.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
translation: 允许在任何具有§R沮丧消沉§!或§R紧张不安§!特质的角色头像上§G右键点击§!来给他们一剂可以重振精神的药剂，需要消耗§Y[From.Society.GetCurrency]§!。

original: This option is available due to you having the §Y[Root.GetOmenModifierName]§! modifier.\n[Root.GetOmenResultReaction].\n
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你有§Y[Root.GetOmenModifierName]§!的修正。\n[Root.GetOmenResultReaction]。\n

original: Encouraging Vision
translation: 鼓舞人心的幻象

original: Fearful Vision
translation: 可怕的幻象

original: Pleasing Vision
translation: 令人愉悦的幻象

original: Distressing Vision
translation: 令人痛心的幻象

original: Reassuring Vision
translation: 令人欣慰的幻象

original: Upsetting Vision
translation: 令人沮丧的幻象

original: You are left confused, your self-esteem wounded by the inaccuracy of your vision
translation: 幻象失准让你自尊受伤，你怅然若失

original: You shake your head, your self-esteem wounded by the inaccuracy of your vision
translation: 幻象失准让你自尊受伤，你不住摇头

original: You lock yourself in your quarters, your self-esteem wounded by the inaccuracy of your vision
translation: 幻象失准让你自尊受伤，你把自己关在房间里

original: You feel defeated, yet strengthened by the accuracy of your vision
translation: 看到幻象实现，你感到伤心欲绝

original: You feel heart-broken, yet strengthened by the accuracy of your vision
translation: 看到幻象实现，你感到伤心欲绝

original: You feel defeated, yet strengthened by the accuracy of your vision
translation: 看到幻象实现，你感到灰心丧气

original: You smile triumphantly, encouraged by the accuracy of your vision
translation: 你微笑着迎接胜利，幻象的准确性大大地所鼓舞着你

original: You smile blissfully, pleased by the accuracy of your vision
translation: 看到幻象实现，你满心欢喜地笑了

original: You smile cheerfully, reassured by the accuracy of your vision
translation: 看到幻象实现，你高兴地笑了

original: You are pleased, yet confused by the inaccuracy of your vision
translation: 尽管困扰于幻象失准，你还是很高兴

original: You are pleased, but also confused by the inaccuracy of your vision
translation: 尽管困扰于幻象失准，你还是很高兴

original: You are pleased, but also confused by the inaccuracy of your vision
translation: 尽管困扰于幻象失准，你还是很高兴

original: I am not sure what my [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName] has been up to lately, but [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] certainly isn't proving to become the great [horoscope_child.GetHermeticsDestinedRole] I once predicted in [horoscope_child.GetHerHis] horoscope.
translation: 我不知道我的[horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon][horoscope_child.GetFirstName]最近发生了什么，不过[horoscope_child.GetSheHe]肯定没有慢慢成为我给[horoscope_child.GetHerHis]星占中所预言的[horoscope_child.GetHermeticsDestinedRole]。

original: My [horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon] [horoscope_child.GetFirstName] has truly found [horoscope_child.GetHerselfHimself] in the destiny my horoscope predicted, so long ago. [horoscope_child.GetSheHeCap] will makes a fine [horoscope_child.GetHermeticsDestinedRole].
translation: 我的[horoscope_child.GetDaughterSon][horoscope_child.GetFirstName]很久以前就已经在我的星占中认识到了[horoscope_child.GetHerselfHimself]。[horoscope_child.GetSheHeCap]会成为一个好的[horoscope_child.GetHermeticsDestinedRole]。

original: Maybe it's because [horoscope_child.GetSheHe] is born under the [horoscope_child.GetWesternZodiacSign]?
translation: 也许这是因为[horoscope_child.GetSheHe]出生在[horoscope_child.GetWesternZodiacSign]的缘故？

original: Perhaps it is a blessing that [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] is no longer with us. [horoscope_maker.GetSheHeCap] would have been distraught to see me not living up to my potential, as the great [Root.GetHermeticsDestinedRole] [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] anticipated of me. May [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], forgive me. It's just not who I am.
translation: 或许[horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother]不再与我们在一起是一件幸事。[horoscope_maker.GetSheHeCap]本来会忧心如焚，因为我无法像[horoscope_maker.GetSheHe]所期望的那样发挥潜力，成为伟大的[Root.GetHermeticsDestinedRole]。愿[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]宽恕我。这不是我应该有的样子。

original: I admit that I have perhaps been avoiding my [horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother] lately. [horoscope_maker.GetSheHeCap] is likely disgruntled, or perhaps even disappointed in me, for not living up to my potential as the great [Root.GetHermeticsDestinedRole] [horoscope_maker.GetSheHe] long ago predicted that I would become. May [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], forgive me. It's just not who I am.
translation: 我承认我最近一直在逃避我的[horoscope_maker.GetFatherMother]。[horoscope_maker.GetSheHeCap]对我可能心怀不满，或者甚至感到失望，因为我没能发挥出我的潜力，如[horoscope_maker.GetSheHe]在很久之前所预言的那样成为伟大的[Root.GetHermeticsDestinedRole]。愿[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]宽恕我。这不是我应该有的样子。

original: Ask [From.GetHerHis] star sign
translation: 询问[From.GetHerHis]星座

original: Bet that [This.GetFirstName] will respond to you having pegged [This.GetHerHim] as a [This.GetWesternZodiacSign]...
translation: 打赌你把[This.GetFirstName]当作[This.GetWesternZodiacSign][This.GetHerHim]会回应你……

original: "Our signs are very compatible..."
translation: 「我们的星座很合呀……」

original: I know, I have thought about it too!
translation: 我知道，我也考虑过！

original: The [Root.GetWesternZodiacSign] do go well with [From.GetWesternZodiacSign].\n
translation: [Root.GetWesternZodiacSign]与[From.GetWesternZodiacSign]确实很合。\n

original: That's sweet, but I think you've read your charts wrong. No, I don't mind!
translation: 太好了，但我想你看错了你的图表。不，我不介意！

original: You let the inaccuracy of the comment slide, as there are no TRULY incompatible signs...\n
translation: 你无视评论的不确切之处，因为并不存在真的不合的星座……\n

original: By [Root.GetRandomPlanetName], we shouldn't!
translation: 以[Root.GetRandomPlanetName]之名，我们不应如此！

original: You are ruled by more than stars.\n
translation: 你不是仅仅被星星所决定。\n

original: Er, I am a [Root.GetWesternZodiacSign].
translation: 额，我是[Root.GetWesternZodiacSign]。

original: You could never fall for a [From.GetWesternZodiacSign].\n
translation: 你永远无法爱上[From.GetWesternZodiacSign]。\n

original: This option is available due to you being a member of §Y[This.Society.GetName]§!.\n
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你是§Y[This.Society.GetName]§!的成员。\n

original: To complete this mission, §Gright-click§! on a female follower of [Root.GetDWDevil] of child-bearing age in your court and select §Y'Unholy Impregnation'§!
translation: 要完成这项任务，§G右键点击§!你宫廷里的[Root.GetDWDevil]的育龄女性成员并选择§Y邪恶妊娠§!

original: I whispered the words of the summoning spell even though I wanted to shout them at the night sky! The greatest honor was about to be mine. As the final syllables passed through my lips, I shut my eyes and waited in silence, my heart pounding hard with excitement. A warm hand gently squeezed my shoulder.
translation: 我抑制住在夜空下吼出咒语的想法，低声念出召唤咒语。伟大的荣耀即将属于我。当我的嘴唇吐出最后的音节，我闭上眼睛静静地等待，心脏怦怦直跳。一只温暖的手轻轻地捏了捏我的肩膀。

original: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] gladly accepted my proposal. 'I could never imagine a greater honor, [Root.GetSisterBrother],' [From.GetSheHe] she told me as we were about to begin the summoning. Kneeling on the floor and holding each other's hands, we began to chant the magic words. As the stranger entered, I squeezed [From.GetHerHis] fingers and departed.
translation: [From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]高兴地接受了我的建议。「我不胜荣幸，[Root.GetSisterBrother]，」在我们即将开始召唤时，[From.GetSheHe]这样告诉我。我们跪在地上，握着彼此的双手，开始吟诵着咒语。当陌生人进来时，我捏了捏[From.GetHerHis]手指并离开了。

original:
To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

It has come to our attention that you do not live up to the standards expected of our members. While we encourage you to continue your search for knowledge and truth wherever you go, we can no longer include you in our community.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
致[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，

我们注意到，你并未达到我们所期望的入会要求。尽管我们依旧鼓励你探求真相，寻求知识，但是无论如何，我们都不会让你加入社团。

此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: Hermetic scholars may chose an apprentice. In exchange for tutoring, the apprentice will take care of one's laboratory and assist during experiments.
translation: 赫耳墨斯学者可以挑选一名学徒。为了换取指导，学徒需要照看实验室并协助实验。

original: Grateful for Invitation
translation: 感谢邀请

original: Offended
translation: 冒犯

original: Unreasonable
translation: 荒唐

original: Argued
translation: 辩论

original: Reasonable
translation: 合理

original: Great Minds Think Alike
translation: 英雄所见略同

original: Brilliant Insight
translation: 出色洞察力

original: This character had a brilliant insight while working on a new invention.
translation: 此人在发明创造时拥有绝妙的洞察力。

original: Handgun
translation: 手铳

original: This thin metal barrel is not an impressive sight, but the destruction it can cause inspires awe and fear in equal measure. Due to a highly explosive black powder it can fire metal balls at deadly speeds.
translation: 这个薄金属管看起来不并让人印象深刻，但它可能造成的破坏在同等程度上激发了敬畏和恐惧。由于高度爆炸性的黑色粉末，它可以以致命的速度发射金属球。

original: Magnetic Compass
translation: 磁罗盘

original: As one spins this beautifully engraved little device, a tiny metal needle will always point towards the northern lodestar. It can be used to navigate even when the stars are obscured.
translation: 当旋转这个雕刻精美的小器件时，一个细小的金属针总是指向北极星。即使星星被遮挡了，它也可以用来导航。

original: Radius Astronomicus
translation: 直角照准仪

original: This staff, with its sliding cross-piece and length markings, is used to determine angles for celestial measurements as well as navigating the seas.
translation: 这个木杆上附有滑动横梁和长度标记，可以用来确定天体测量角度以及海上导航。

original: Cipher Disc
translation: 密码盘

original: There is more to this round little metal object than what meets the eye. The symbols running along its edge, the inner row being movable through a rotating disc, allows its owner to encipher and decipher with ease.
translation: 这个圆形的小金属物体的作用比眼睛能看到的更多。沿其边缘运行的符号，内部行通过旋转盘移动，允许其所有者容易地加密和解密。

original: Plate Armor
translation: 板甲

original: This impressive set of armor is clearly ahead of its time. Consisting of whole plates of metal held together by cleverly designed joints, it provides its wearer with significant defense as well as mobility.
translation: 这套令人印象深刻的盔甲显然领先于时代。它由整个金属板通过巧妙设计的接缝组合而成，为穿戴者提供了显著的防御和机动性。

original: Spectacles
translation: 眼镜

original: These 'spectacles' consist of two glass lenses set in a metal frame. They allow the elderly, whose eyesight is blurring, to read and distinguish visual details.
translation: 这些「眼镜」由两片玻璃透镜合组而成，镶嵌在金属镜框之中。它们使那些眼花的老人可以阅读和辨物

original: Gigantic Crossbow
translation: 巨型十字弩

original: Atop the walls of the county capital, a gigantic crossbow has been mounted. This intimidating weapon provides a ruthlessly efficient means of defense.
translation: 在省份首府的城墙上，竖起了一个巨型十字弩。这种可怕的武器提供了一种无情而有效的防御手段。

original: Advanced Blast Furnace
translation: 先进鼓风机

original: A great blast furnace has been built in this county. It provides vast quantities of iron at an excellent level of quality.
translation: 该省份建有一座高炉，它可以提供大量品质上成的铁。

original: Advanced Wind Mill
translation: 先进风力机

original: A great wind mill stands in this county. Its construction is ahead of the times, allowing great amounts of grain to be milled at an excellent quality.
translation: 这个省份有一个很棒的风车。它的构造超前于时代，可以以优异的品质研磨大量的谷物。

original: While I am certainly a great scholar with several fine discoveries to my name, I am not too proud to collaborate with like-minded colleagues. I have contemplated hosting some of my colleagues from [Root.Society.GetName] for an intellectual gathering.
translation: 虽然我当然是一位出色的学者，并且以我的名字发表了许多优秀的发现，但与志趣相投的同行合作时我并不能太过骄傲。我已经打算邀请一些来自[Root.Society.GetName]的同行参加一个知识聚会。

original: It is time. I shall invite some of my favored colleagues.
translation: 时候到了。我会邀请一些我认可的同僚。

original: You begin to prepare for the intellectual gathering in §Y[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]§!.
translation: 你开始准备在§Y[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]§!的知识集会。

original: I do not have the time nor the coin to host them right now.
translation: 我现在既没时间也没金钱招待他们。

original: The preparations have been completed and the invitations have been sent and accepted. My honored guests are already packing their coffers. Soon our gatherings begins – I can hardly wait!
translation: 筹备工作已经完成，邀请函已经发送并被接受。我的宾客已经准备好了。不久我们的聚会就要开始了——我等不及了！

original: Our work shall be a great tribute to Hermes!
translation: 我们的工作将是对赫耳墨斯的一项很好奉献！

original:
To the esteemed [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
Yet again I must thank you for your generous invitation. A gathering of the great minds, such a fine idea! However, I have one small suggestion. I would be delighted if you invited [great_minds_guest_4.GetSocietyRank] [great_minds_guest_4.GetFirstName]. [great_minds_guest_4.GetHerHisCap] indisputable brilliance would be a fine addition to our gathering!

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
尊敬的[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，
再次感谢您的慷慨邀请。让伟大的思想相聚真是一个好主意！不过，我有一个小建议。如果您能够邀请[great_minds_guest_4.GetSocietyRank][great_minds_guest_4.GetFirstName]，我会很高兴的。[great_minds_guest_4.GetHerHisCap]无可争辩的出色将为我们的聚会锦上添花！

此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: I did have [great_minds_guest_4.GetFirstName] in mind, but you see...
translation: 我的确有考虑到[great_minds_guest_4.GetFirstName]，但是你也知道……

original: Due your diplomatic skills, you can come up with an acceptable reason for not inviting §Y[great_minds_guest_4.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 由于你的外交技巧，你可以拿出一个可以令人接受的理由从而不邀请§Y[great_minds_guest_4.GetTitledFirstName]§!。\n

original: If you insist, [From.GetSisterBrother]. [great_minds_guest_4.GetSheHeCap] may come along.
translation: 如果你坚持，[From.GetSisterBrother]。[great_minds_guest_4.GetSheHeCap]可以来。

original: §Y[great_minds_guest_4.GetTitledFirstName]§! is also invited to the gathering.\n
translation: §Y[great_minds_guest_4.GetTitledFirstName]§!也被邀请到聚会。\n

original: To be honest, I'd rather not have [great_minds_guest_4.GetFirstName] there.
translation: 老实说，我不想在那里看到[great_minds_guest_4.GetFirstName]。

original: Refuse to invite §Y[great_minds_guest_4.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 拒绝邀请§Y[great_minds_guest_4.GetTitledFirstName]§!。\n

original: Never! You know what, [From.GetFirstName], you are no longer welcome!
translation: 不行！你晓得吗，[From.GetFirstName]，我不再欢迎你了！

original: Refuse to invite §Y[great_minds_guest_4.GetTitledFirstName]§! and disinvite §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!. This is sure to cause some raised eyebrows among the other guests...\n
translation: 拒绝邀请§Y[great_minds_guest_4.GetTitledFirstName]§!，并取消对§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!的邀请。这显然会让客人中的一些人大跌眼镜……\n

original: Finally, my guests are here! After a pleasant dinner we have retired to my study. During the coming weeks, my guests and I have agreed to work on a common project. Our joined ingenuity shall bring about a brilliant new invention! The time has come for me to reveal the direction for our enterprise.
translation: 我的客人终于来了！愉快的晚餐后，我们回到了我的书房。在接下来的几周里，我和我的客人都同意共同做一个项目。我们的聪明才智将带来一个辉煌的新发明！现在是我为我们的事业指明方向的时候了。

original: Nothing is deadlier than a sharp mind. Let us invent a machine of war!
translation: 没有什么比一个进取的心更加致命了。让我们制造一台战争机器吧！

original: Suggest a project with a warfare focus.\n
translation: 建议一项聚焦战争的工程。\n

original: The aim should be to improve the prosperity of our lands!
translation: 目标必须设定为增进我们土地的繁荣！

original: Suggest a project with a prosperity focus.\n
translation: 建议一项聚焦繁荣的工程\n

original: The noblest purpose is to further our understanding of the universe.
translation: 最高尚的动机就是扩展我们对宇宙的认识

original: Suggest a project with a scholarly focus.\n
translation: 建议一项聚焦学术的工程。\n

original: As I look around the table, I notice the displeased expression of [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]. Our eyes lock for a few seconds and then, defiantly, [From.GetSheHe] stands up. 'Really, [Root.GetHermeticInvention]? I am sorry to say, but your suggestion seems... stale. Unoriginal. I suggest we should give our project a [From.GetHermeticInvention] focus.'
translation: 在我环顾桌子时，我注意到了[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]面带不悦。我们对视了几秒，然后，[From.GetSheHe]挑衅地站了起来。「认真的吗，[Root.GetHermeticInvention]？很抱歉这么说，但你的建议似乎……毫无新意。我建议我们应该把项目的焦点放在[From.GetHermeticInvention]上。」

original: You have overlooked an essential point, [From.GetSocietyRank]...
translation: 你忽视了重要的一点，[From.GetSocietyRank]……

original: Engage §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! in a debate.\n
translation: 向§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!挑起辩论。\n

original: you winning the debate.\n
translation: 你赢得了辩论。\n

original: you losing the debate.\n
translation: 你输掉了辩论。\n

original: If you think that would be best, [From.GetSisterBrother]
translation: 如果你认为那样最好，[From.GetSisterBrother]

original: Let §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! have [From.GetHerHis] way. Everyone starts working on the project, which will have a [From.GetHermeticInvention] focus.\n
translation: 让§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!用[From.GetHerHis]方式进行吧。每个人开始进行这个有着[From.GetHermeticInvention]焦点的项目。\n

original: I am the host and the decision is mine!
translation: 我是主持人，决定权在我的手中！

original: You force your own idea. Everyone starts working on the project, which will have a [Root.GetHermeticInvention] focus.\n
translation: 你强加了自己的想法。每个人开始进行这个有着[Root.GetHermeticInvention]焦点的项目。\n

original: As I look around the table, everyone nods in agreement. 'A fine suggestion, dear [Root.GetSisterBrother],' [great_minds_guest_1.GetSocietyRank] [great_minds_guest_1.GetFirstName] exclaims, a wide smile on [great_minds_guest_1.GetHerHis] [great_minds_guest_1.GetFaceDescription] face. 'Tomorrow, we shall begin to work on the project the first thing after sunrise.'
translation: 当我环顾桌旁时，每个人都同意点头。「一个很好的建议，亲爱的[Root.GetSisterBrother]，」[great_minds_guest_1.GetSocietyRank][great_minds_guest_1.GetFirstName]欢呼，在[great_minds_guest_1.GetHerHis][great_minds_guest_1.GetFaceDescription]脸上露出宽广的笑容。「明天，我们将在日出之后开始首先处理这个事项。」

original: Everyone starts working on the project, which will have a [Root.GetHermeticInvention] focus.\n
translation: 每个人开始进行这个有着[Root.GetHermeticInvention]焦点的项目。\n

original: As I suspected, [FromFrom.GetFirstName]'s arguments are thin and flimsy. As we debate, it becomes clear to one and all that [FromFrom.GetHerHis] suggestion was born out of spite and an unfounded sense of self-importance. In the end, [FromFrom.GetSheHe] is forced to concede.
translation: 正如我所怀疑的，[FromFrom.GetFirstName]的论点很薄弱。在我们辩论的时候，人们很清楚，[FromFrom.GetHerHis]所有观点都是出于恶意和没来由的自我意识。最终，[FromFrom.GetSheHe]被迫承认了我的观点。

original: Now that this minor interruption has been dealt with...
translation: 现在这个小小的打断已经解决了……

original: While my idea is clearly better, my arguments seem to fail me. The others do not seem convinced by them, at least. [FromFrom.GetFirstName], on the other hand, proves [FromFrom.GetHerselfHimself] as a true master of manipulation! Within a quarter of an hour, I must admit myself defeated.
translation: 虽然我的想法更好，但是我的论点似乎让我失望了。至少其他人似乎并不相信他们。另一方面，[FromFrom.GetFirstName]证明[FromFrom.GetHerselfHimself]是一个真正的操纵大师！在一刻钟之内，我就知道自己被击败了。

original: We will do it your way, then...
translation: 好吧，我们会按照你的方式去做……

original: Everyone starts working on the project, which will have a [FromFrom.GetHermeticInvention] focus.\n
translation: 每个人开始进行这个有着[FromFrom.GetHermeticInvention]焦点的项目。\n

original: As I enter the laboratory one morning, I am met by agitated voices. [great_minds_guest_1.GetSocietyRank] [great_minds_guest_1.GetFirstName] and [great_minds_guest_2.GetSocietyRank] [great_minds_guest_2.GetFirstName] are gesturing wildly over a set of sketches. They are disagreeing on the direction of the project. [great_minds_guest_1.GetFirstName] argues for a riskier, but potentially more rewarding route, while [great_minds_guest_2.GetFirstName] wants to play it safe.
translation: 一天早晨，当我走进实验室的时候，我听到了激烈的争论声。[great_minds_guest_1.GetSocietyRank][great_minds_guest_1.GetFirstName]和[great_minds_guest_2.GetSocietyRank][great_minds_guest_2.GetFirstName]在一组草图上疯狂地比划。他们对这个项目的方向意见不一致。[great_minds_guest_1.GetFirstName]倾向于风险更高，但可能更有收获的路线，而[great_minds_guest_2.GetFirstName]则希望保证安全。

original: I agree with [great_minds_guest_2.GetFirstName]. Better to be safe than sorry.
translation: 我同意[great_minds_guest_2.GetFirstName]的观点。安全胜过遗憾。

original: You go with the safe option.\n
translation: 你将采取安全的选项。\n

original: [great_minds_guest_1.GetFirstName] is right. We must explore our limits!
translation: [great_minds_guest_1.GetFirstName]是对的。我们应该探寻我们的极限！

original: You go with the riskier, but more innovative option.\n
translation: 你选择了更加冒险，但更有创造力的选项。\n

original: I am trying to focus on my working, but it is becoming increasingly difficult! [arguer_1.GetSocietyRank] [arguer_1.GetFirstName] and [arguer_2.GetSocietyRank] [arguer_2.GetFirstName] will never agree on anything. If one says one thing, the other must immediately disagree. Sometimes I cannot help but wonder if they are both possessed!
translation: 我正在努力专注于我的工作，但这变得越来越困难！[arguer_1.GetSocietyRank][arguer_1.GetFirstName]和[arguer_2.GetSocietyRank][arguer_2.GetFirstName]永远不会就任何事情达成一致。如果有人说一件事，另一件肯定立即表示不同意。有时我不禁想知道他们是不是都被恶魔附身了！

original: Listen to me, friends. Surely, this thing between you is simply a misunderstanding...
translation: 听我说，朋友们，你们之间的龃龉显然是一个误会……

original: You try to help §Y[arguer_1.GetTitledFirstName]§! and §Y[arguer_2.GetTitledFirstName]§! to make up.\n
translation: 你尝试去帮助§Y[arguer_1.GetTitledFirstName]§!和§Y[arguer_2.GetTitledFirstName]§!达成和解。\n

original: your efforts being successful.\n
translation: 你的努力获得成功。\n

original: your efforts making the problem worse.\n
translation: 你的努力使得问题更糟了。\n

original: Enough! [arguer_1.GetFirstName], pack your coffers and leave!
translation: 够了！[arguer_1.GetFirstName]，装好你的东西给我滚！

original: Decide that §Y[arguer_1.GetTitledFirstName]§! must leave. While the disruptive arguments will be a thing of the past, everyone will remember this failure.\n
translation: 决定§Y[arguer_1.GetTitledFirstName]§!必须离开。虽然破坏性的争论将成为过去，但每个人都会牢记这一失败。\n

original: This cannot continue! Your presence is no longer desired, [arguer_2.GetFirstName]!
translation: 消失吧！你已然无有理由存在，[arguer_2.GetFirstName]！

original: Decide that §Y[arguer_2.GetTitledFirstName]§! must leave. While the disruptive arguments will be a thing of the past, everyone will remember this failure.\n
translation: 决定§Y[arguer_2.GetTitledFirstName]§!必须离开。虽然破坏性的争论将成为过去，但每个人都会牢记这一失败。\n

original: While my first calm attempts did not make much of a difference, my angry outburst suddenly did. The violent reaction finally brought [arguer_1.GetSocietyRank] [arguer_1.GetFirstName] and [arguer_2.GetSocietyRank] [arguer_2.GetFirstName] to their senses. Now, a few hours later, they approach me to apologize for their petty and lowbrow bickering.
translation: 当我第一次冷静的尝试没能奏效时，我的怒火瞬间爆发了。暴力反应最终使[arguer_1.GetSocietyRank][arguer_1.GetFirstName]和[arguer_2.GetSocietyRank][arguer_2.GetFirstName]恢复了理智。几个小时后的现在，他们为自己卑鄙粗俗的争吵向我表示歉意。

original: What a relief!
translation: 如释重负！

original: The arguments are over and everyone can continue their work without interruptions.\n
translation: 争论结束了，每个人都可以不受干扰地继续工作。\n

original: Calmly, I try to explain the unreasonable nature of their bickering, and how their constant negativity is disruptive to our project. Regrettably, my words seem to have no impact. Actually, I might just have made it worse. 'Do you hear that, [arguer_1.GetFirstName]? You are being disruptive,' [arguer_2.GetFirstName] sneers. And there they go again...
translation: 我努力去冷静地解释他们争论的荒唐性，以及他们持续不断的消极行为是如何扰乱我计划的。令人遗憾的是，我的话语似乎没有任何卵用。实际上，我可能让情势恶化了。「[arguer_1.GetFirstName]，你听到了吧？你就是在添乱，」[arguer_2.GetFirstName]冷嘲热讽。然后他们又开始争吵……

original: This can never go well...
translation: 这事顺利不了了……

original: The arguments between §Y[arguer_1.GetTitledFirstName]§! and §Y[arguer_2.GetTitledFirstName]§! are now worse than ever.\n
translation: §Y[arguer_1.GetTitledFirstName]§!和§Y[arguer_2.GetTitledFirstName]§!之间的争论变得更激烈了。\n

original: [From.GetFirstName] taps the detail on the sketches in front of us and I nod enthusiastically. 'I agree, [From.GetFirstName]! Surely moving the axis over here would make the mechanism much less prone to error.' During the last few days, [From.GetFirstName] and I have worked so well together. I am so glad [From.GetSheHe] came!
translation: [From.GetFirstName]轻轻敲击着我们面前的草图的细节部分，之后我热情地点点头。「我同意你的说法，[From.GetFirstName]！将轴线移动到这里一定能使机械结构更不容易出错。」在过去的几天里，[From.GetFirstName]和我一起工作得很好。我真高兴[From.GetSheHe]来了！

original: Your input is truly appreciated, [From.GetSisterBrother].
translation: 真的感激您的奉献，[From.GetSisterBrother]。

original: The sun set hours ago and I can barely distinguish the details of the sketches in front of me. Everyone else has gone to bed, but I am wide awake. The thoughts are spinning in my head, faster and faster. There is something there, just outside of the boundaries of consciousness. I almost have it!
translation: 几小时前太阳落山了，我几乎无法分辨出我面前的草图的细节。其他人都上床睡觉了，但我完全清醒了。思想在我脑海中旋转，越来越快。在意识的边界之外，存在着某种东西。我几乎快找到答案了！

original: Eureka!
translation: 尤里卡！

original: You have an epiphany which will greatly contribute to the project.\n
translation: 你忽然顿悟了，这将对这个项目有极大的贡献。\n

original: The invention, the culmination of our great collaboration, is finally finished! Our accomplishment is twofold – not only have we perfected the recipe for an explosive powder, we have also designed and produced a device which can launch small metal balls at lethal speeds. This 'handgun' is sure to revolutionize warfare!
translation: 这项发明，我们伟大合作的顶峰，终于完成了！我们的成就是双重的，我们不仅完善了爆炸粉末的配方，我们还设计并生产了一种能够以致命速度发射小金属球的装置。这把「手铳」一定会彻底改变战争！

original: The enemy will fear to meet me on the battlefield!
translation: 敌人会因在战场上遇到我而畏惧！

original: The invention, the culmination of our great collaboration, is finally finished! We have invented a device which always points towards the lodestar of the north, making it possible to navigate even when the celestial bodies are obscured by clouds. It will surely give an advantage to our traders.
translation: 这项发明，我们伟大合作的顶点，终于完成了！我们发明了一种装置，总是指向北方的磁石，即使当天体被云遮蔽时也能导航。这肯定会给我们的商人带来好处。

original: The sun and stars hold many truths, but so does our compass!
translation: 太阳和星星能告知我们很多，但是我们的罗盘也可以！

original: The invention, the culmination of our great collaboration, is finally finished! We have designed and constructed an ingenious device to measure angles in the sky. We call it the 'radius astronomicus'. My charts of the stars will become infinitely better and easier to maintain thanks to our invention.
translation: 这项发明，我们伟大合作的顶峰，终于完成了！我们设计并建造了一个测量天空角度的巧妙装置。我们称之为「直角照准仪」。多亏了我们的发明，我的星图会变得越来越好，更容易维护。

original: The secrets of the heavens shall be unveiled!
translation: 天空的秘密必须被揭开！

original: The hour has finally arrived. Today we test our invention! Together we have devised a huge crossbow which launches large stones. While the weapon is certainly deadly, it is also incredibly intimidating. I will have one mounted on the walls of [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]!
translation: 时间终于到了。今天我们测试我们的发明！我们一起设计了一个发射巨石的巨弩。这武器当然是致命的，但它看起来也难以置信的恐怖。我要在[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]的墙上安装一个！

original: Only the bravest and the most foolish soldiers would dare crossing its trajectory.
translation: 只有最勇敢和最愚蠢的战士才敢穿越它的轨迹。

original: Together my colleagues and I have constructed a huge furnace of a truly ingenious design! It can produce metals in streams so steady and vast that no other method can even hope to rival it. This efficient new invention will make sure we have trading goods and building materials of the highest quality available.
translation: 我和我的同事们一起建造了一个真正巧妙设计的巨大熔炉！它可以在如此稳定和广阔的溪流中生产金属，甚至没有任何其他方法能够与之媲美。这一高效的新发明将确保我们有最高品质的商品和建筑材料可供交易。

original: We are masters of metal, my friends!
translation: 我们是金属大师，我的朋友！

original: The invention is finished! Together we have created our own secret code as well as an instrument to aid in enciphering and deciphering. The idea behind the device might seem simple, but the best one always do. Our cipher disc is quite ingenious, really. Now our secrets will be safe – at least if all of us can be trusted...
translation: 这项发明完成了！我们共同创造了我们自己的密码，以及一种帮助加密和解密的工具。设备背后的想法似乎简单，但最好的总是这样做。我们的密码盘非常巧妙，真的。现在，我们的秘密将是安全的——至少如果我们所有人都可以信任的话……

original: Now we may safely share our ideas and discoveries with each other.
translation: 现在我们可以安全地相互分享我们的想法和发现。

original: Our invention has been completed. While it is not a weapon, it will offer protection from them. It is a set of armor consisting of several big plates of metal instead of the common mail. The design we have arrived at also allows for impressive mobility.
translation: 我们的发明已经完成。虽然它不是一种武器，但它将提供防护，使其免受攻击。这是一套盔甲，由几个大的金属板组成，而不是普通的铠甲。这个设计拥有令人惊叹的机动性。

original: Fear will never seep into my heart in battle again!
translation: 在战斗中我的心里将不再有畏惧！

original: Many mills dot the landscape around [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName] and are vital for the production of food. It is always a good idea to improve on essential constructions, so during the last we weeks we have made several ingenious improvements to old designs. Our new mill is safer as well as more efficient than ever before!
translation: 许多磨坊点缀着[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]周围的风景，这对食物的生产至关重要。改进基本结构总是一个好主意，所以在过去的几个星期里，我们对旧的设计做出了一些巧妙的改进。我们的新工厂比以前更安全，效率更高！

original: Our mill is a true contribution to society.
translation: 我们的作坊是对社会真正的贡献。

original: For weeks we struggled to create a lens with new and revolutionary properties, and while we failed to achieve this goal, we came to another realization. What if we took a lens we already had, but changed how we used it, instead? Based on my reading stone, we came up with a new device, the 'spectacles'!
translation: 几个星期以来，我们一直在努力创造一个新的、革命性的透镜，虽然我们没能实现这个目标，但我们又实现了另一个目标。如果我们已经有了一个透镜，但却改变了它的使用方式，那该怎么样呢？基于我的阅历，我们发明了一个新的设备，「眼镜」！

original: Now I can bring good eyesight with me wherever I go!
translation: 无论我走到哪里都会有好视力伴随自己！

original: We have had several ideas which were clever but impractical, and a heap more which were just ludicrous. The lack of progress has made everyone tired and irritable. Tonight, at dinner, I finally ended it. We all knew it was the right thing to do. Rest was something none of us had known in weeks, and our other obligations had gone unattended for too long.
translation: 我们有过一些聪明但不实际的想法，而且其中更多是荒谬可笑的。没有进展让每个人都感到疲倦和烦躁。在今晚吃饭的时候，我终于结束了这一切。我们都知道这是正确的做法。我们已经几个星期都不知眠休，而且我们已经搁置其他事务太久了。

original: Maybe we will have better luck next time.
translation: 或许下一次我们会有好运。

original: You and your guest fail to invent something useful.
translation: 你和你的客人没有发明出有用的东西。

original: We were making such good progress, but now, all is lost! We can never be sure who set of the explosion. Does it really matter? Even if we knew, the disaster could never be undone.
translation: 我们取得了如此好的进展，但现在，一切都没了！我们永远无法确定是谁造成的爆炸。这真的很重要吗？即使我们知道，灾难也无法挽回。

original: This a dark day.
translation: 这是黑暗的一天。

original: The gathering is over and all progress towards an invention has been lost.\n
translation: 聚会结束了，失去了所有的发明进展。\n

original: My colleagues have approached me – apparently they have been talking behind my back. They are dissatisfied by the gathering and how it has been managed, and has decided that they will be leaving. 'This venture has no potential, [Root.GetFirstName],' one of them says, in a tone probably meant to be kind. To me, it sounds condescending.
translation: 我的同事们向我走来——显然他们一直在背后议论我。他们对聚会和管理方式感到不满，并决定离开。「这项冒险没有前途，[Root.GetFirstName]，」他们中的一个人以尽可能仁慈的语气说。对我来说，这听起来像是展现优越感。

original: You're not my prisoners. Leave, if that is your wish.
translation: 你们不再是我的囚犯了。如果你们想的话，马上离开。

original: The gathering is over. It ended unsuccessfully.\n
translation: 聚会结束了，结果并不成功。\n

original: Skull Trophy
translation: 颅骨战利品

original: As one stares into the empty sockets of this decidedly human skull, it is not uncommon to experience both fascination and revulsion. It is a reminder of our impending death, and for some, a satisfying deed...
translation: 当一个人凝视着这个显眼的人类头骨的空窝时，既能感受到魅力，也能感受到厌恶，这并不少见。它提醒我们即将死去，对某些人来说，这是一种令人满意的行为……

original: Adds §YSkull of [rip_dead.GetTitledFirstName]§! to the treasury of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!\n
translation: 添加§Y[rip_dead.GetTitledFirstName]的头骨§!至§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!的宝库\n

original: While carrying out my duties for [Root.Society.GetName], I have met [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] on several occasions. These encounters have never ended well. One would be hard-pressed to find a more unsympathetic character! I suspect [From.GetSheHe] is spreading lies behind my back to damage my reputation...
translation: 在行使我个人在[Root.Society.GetName]的职责时，我多次会见了[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]。但是这几次接触从来没有那一次有善终。你几乎找不到任何一个比他更加冷漠无情的人了！而现在，此时此刻，我怀疑[From.GetSheHe]一定正在某个我不知道的阴暗角落用邪恶肮脏的谎言诋毁我……

original: I will confront [From.GetFirstName] and reveal [From.GetHerHis] dishonest ways to the world!
translation: 我会对抗[From.GetFirstName]，并将[From.GetHerHis]不诚实的行为公之于众！

original: I must be patient, it will surely pay off in the long run.
translation: 我必须有耐心，长远看这样一定会有报应。

original: I have encountered [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] many times while carrying out my duties for [Root.Society.GetName], and it is always a pleasant occasion. We can talk for hours, if the time allows, because [From.GetSheHe] never bores me. While our discussions are often lengthy, we always seem to agree on the matters which are most important.
translation: 我在履行对[Root.Society.GetName]的职责时多次遇到过[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]，这一直是令人愉快的时光。如果时间允许，我们可以谈几个小时，因为[From.GetSheHe]从来不会让我厌烦。虽然我们的讨论通常很漫长，但我们似乎总是在最重要的问题上达成一致。

original: I think this is friendship!
translation: 我认为这就是友谊！

original: Or it might be more...
translation: 或者我们能更进一步……

original: I am probably reading too much into this.
translation: 我或许在这方面读得太多了。

original: Unholy Impregnation
translation: 邪恶妊娠

original: Report opinion_plot_weaken_fellow_vassal
translation: 报告opinion_plot_weaken_fellow_vassal

original: Report opinion_claimant_adventure_target
translation: 报告opinion_claimant_adventure_target

original: Report opinion_duchy_adventure_target
translation: 报告opinion_duchy_adventure_target

translation: 报告 forbidden_raid_target

translation: 报告 opinion_demanded_succ_law_change

original: Report opinion_abducting
translation: 报告 opinion_abducting

original: Report opinion_interfered_in_war
translation: 报告 opinion_interfered_in_war

original: Report opinion_leave
translation: 报告 opinion_leave

original: Report opinion_holding_contests
translation: 报告 opinion_holding_contests

original: Report opinion_mutual_enemy
translation: 报告 opinion_mutual_enemy

original: Report opinion_fellow_guardian_realm
translation: 报告 opinion_fellow_guardian_realm

original: Report opinion_shared_lifestyle
translation: 报告 opinion_shared_lifestyle

original: Report opinion_declined_duel
translation: 报告 opinion_declined_duel

original: Report opinion_lost_duel
translation: 报告 opinion_lost_duel

translation: 创建：\n$DATE$

original: Acquired:\n$DATE$
translation: 获得：\n$DATE$

original: Sets the date of creation to $DATE|Y$
translation: 将创建日期设置为$DATE|Y$

original: All priests and zealous characters in your realm will have their opinion of you changed by §R-25§! for §Y5§! years §Y(Heretic)§!
translation: §Y5§! 年内所有在你领地内的神职人员或狂热的角色对你的好感度改变 §R-25§!§Y（异端）§!

translation: 原料：姜根

original: Ginger Root is a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
translation: 姜根是炼金配方中的有效成分。

translation: 动物肝脏是炼金配方中的有效成分。

translation: 动物肠是炼金配方中的有效成分。

original: Silver is a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.

original: Mercury is a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
translation: 水银是炼金配方中的有效成分。

original: Ingredient: Aqua Regia

original: Aqua Regia is a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.

translation: 硫磺是炼金配方中的有效成分。

translation: 黄金是炼金配方中的有效成分。

translation: 原料：铜

original: Copper is a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
translation: 铜是炼金配方中的有效成分。

original: Ingredient: Iron
translation: 原料：铁

original: Iron is a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
