original: Gather Ingredients
translation: 收集原料

original: To perform alchemical experiments a member of the Hermetic society has a demand for rare ingredients with specific attributes.
translation: 为了进行炼金术实验，赫耳墨斯学会的成员往往会对那些具有特殊属性的稀有原料有所需求。

original: To complete this quest you have to successfully harvest ingredients that can be used in your alchemical experiments.
translation: 为了完成这项任务，你必须成功地获取那些能够用于你炼金实验的原料。

original: This character is proficient at calming down threatening social situations.
translation: 此人很擅长在社交场合平息争端。

original: Your apprentice will accompany you on a trip to gather rare ingredients for your alchemical inventory.
translation: 你的学徒会陪你一起前去收集稀有的炼金术原料。

original: You and [gathering_companion.GetFirstName] prepare to head out on a trip.
translation: 你和[gathering_companion.GetFirstName]准备外出旅行。

original: You will start to gather a small hunting party to join you in the forest.
translation: 你会开始召集一个小型狩猎队伍和你一起进森林。

original: You head down to the busy market streets of [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName].
translation: 你来到[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]的繁华街市。

original: Head In The Clouds
translation: 想入非非

original: This character is spending a lot of their time looking at the skies.
translation: 这个角色花费了大量的时间来看天空。

original: Night-owl
translation: 夜猫子

original: This character is spending a lot of their nights looking at the skies, odd instruments occasionally falling from their pockets.
translation: 这个角色花费了他绝大多数的夜晚来观测天空，偶尔会有一些奇怪的仪器从他的口袋掉下来。

original: Starry Eyed
translation: 星星眼

original: This character is spending the majority of their time secluded in their study, observing the skies – they are often heard reciting strange calculations to themselves.
translation: 这个角色把大部分时间都花在研究中，观察天空，总是背诵着奇怪的算式。

original: Stellar Navigator
translation: 星象仪

original: This character has become an expert on celestial phenomena, their knowledge being held in high regard by their peers.
translation: 这个角色已经成为一位天体现象的专家，他们的知识受到了同伴的高度重视。

original: Your knowledge of stellar phenomena increases.\n
translation: 你的星象知识增加了。\n

original: Observe Sky
translation: 观星

original: One cannot fully understand our place in the cosmos if one does not see to the stars. It is said that the stars contain the truth of all things past and all things to come – by solving their riddles, one could predict anything.
translation: 如果你不观察星星，你就不能完全理解我们在宇宙中的位置。据说，星星包含了所有过去的事物和未来事物的真相——通过解开它们的谜语，我们可以预测任何事情。

original: To complete this mission you have to carefully study the sky and solve the puzzles that connect the physical world with the astral one.
translation: 为了完成这项任务，你不得不仔细研究天空，解决连接物质世界与星体世界的难题。

original: Neglected Accounting
translation: 被忽视的账务

original: This character rather spends time in the clouds than bothering with fiscal matters.
translation: 这个角色宁可混迹于人群中以消磨时间，也不愿纠缠于财政事务。

original: Out of Touch
translation: 冷落

original: Out of Touch
translation: 冷落

original: Bad Parent
translation: 不良父母

original: Forgotten Occasion
translation: 遗忘活动

original: Forgotten Occasion
translation: 遗忘活动

original: Failed Prediction
translation: 预测失败

original: This character is suffering from low self-esteem after publicly failing to predict a star-fall.
translation: 这个角色的自尊心在一次失败的公开预言星坠的活动中遭到了严重打击。

original:
To [Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank] [Root.GetFirstName],
Dear colleague, I have found the most fascinating phenomena from observing the sky. I am of the firmest belief that the foundation of the cosmos is hiding somewhere out there. In order to reach higher knowledge, you should take my advice and study the skies thoroughly.

As above, so below.
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank]
translation:
致[Root.GetFromThisHermeticsRank][Root.GetFirstName]，
亲爱的同事，我通过观星，发现了最迷人的现象。我坚信宇宙的基本规律隐藏在其中某个地方。为了达到更高层次的认知，您应该听取我的建议并仔细研究星辰。

上如同下，下如同上。
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank]

original: After many a night observing the skies I have become certain that there is a lot going on up there, behind the clouds. However, I am considering putting this endeavor to rest, for the sake of my other duties.
translation: 在经过许多天的观星后，我确信云层后面正在发生许多事情。但为了我的其他职责，我可能要放弃这方面的努力了。

original: After many a night observing the skies I have become certain that there is a pattern to the movement of celestial bodies that I have yet to uncover. However, I am considering putting this endeavor to rest, for the sake of my other duties.
translation: 在经过许多天的观星后，我已经确定，天体在依照一种我还没有发现的模式运动。但为了我的其他职责，我可能要放弃这方面的努力了。

original: After many a night observing the skies I have started charting the patterns of stars, as well as the movement of certain planets. There is so much to learn! However, my council won't stop complaining about my absence from the court. Perhaps it is time I conclude my research.
translation: 在经过许多天的观星后，我开始绘制星图以及某些行星的运动轨迹。有那么多东西要学！然而，我的内阁不停地抱怨我的缺席。也许是时候结束我的研究了。

original: After many a night observing the skies I have started charting the patterns of stars, as well as the movement of certain planets. There is so much to learn! However, my council won't stop complaining about my absence from the court. Perhaps it is time I conclude my research.
translation: 在经过许多天的观星后，我开始绘制星图以及某些行星的运动轨迹。有那么多东西要学！然而，我的内阁不停地抱怨我的缺席。也许是时候结束我的研究了。

original: No, I have to keep going.
translation: 不，我要继续。

original: Yes, enough is enough.
translation: 好吧，适可而止吧

original: I understand so much.
translation: 我已经充分明白了。

original: This has certainly been a very productive evening. I have been able to dedicate all of my thinking to calculate the patterns of the different objects in the sky uninterrupted.
translation: 这是一个卓有成效的夜晚，我将我的所有智慧都用来计算无尽苍穹上的不同图案。

original: Everything is so clear now.
translation: 一切都已经很清楚了。

original: I should always strive to be this productive.
translation: 我应该一直这样努力输出成果。

original: Studying the vast sky gives me new perspectives.
translation: 研究浩瀚天空给了我新的观点看法。

original: I've found a new meaning in my life.
translation: 我给我的生活中找到了一个新的意义。

original: My [target_spouse.GetHusbandWife] expressed a curious notion, over supper this evening. "I miss your conversation, my [Root.GetLordLady]", [target_spouse.GetFirstName] said, taking another sip of [target_spouse.GetHerHis] drink. "It's all astronomical phenomenon with you these days...! Surely, you could take some nights off from your research?"
translation: 我的[target_spouse.GetHusbandWife]在今晚晚餐时表达了一个想法。「我想念与你的谈话，我的[Root.GetLordLady]」，[target_spouse.GetFirstName]说，又抿了一口[target_spouse.GetHerHis]杯子里的酒。「这些天你总在研究你的天文学……！你当然可以从你的研究中抽出几晚陪我吧？」

original: Dining with my [target_spouse.GetHusbandWife], the topic of my research came up again. I told [target_spouse.GetHerHim] that I of course regret any ill feelings [target_spouse.GetSheHe] might be experiencing from it, but that I am doing important work. "Honestly, I grow weary of defending myself!", I snapped in the end.
translation: 当我和[target_spouse.GetHusbandWife]共进晚餐的时候，我的研究课题又一次涌上心头。对此，我告诉[target_spouse.GetHerHim]我当然对[target_spouse.GetSheHe]的不快感到抱歉，但我确实是在做很重要的工作。「亲爱的，我已经不想再为自己的行为进行辩护了！」我在最后猛然说道。

original: One does not simply take a break from this task.
translation: 我们不能简单地从这项任务中休息一下。

original: Of course, I will spend more time with you, [target_spouse.GetFirstName].
translation: 当然，我会花更多的时间和你在一起，[target_spouse.GetFirstName]。

original: Why must we argue about this...?!
translation: 为什么我们要争论这些……？！

original: You are right, [target_spouse.GetFirstName], I will change my priorities.
translation: 你是对的，[target_spouse.GetFirstName]，我将改变我的优先级。

original: I am in the middle of adjusting my new sextant, having just spotted what looked like a shooting star, when there is a faint knock on my door. Opening it, I find my [target_child.GetSonDaughter] [target_child.GetFirstName] fidgeting nervously. Hesitantly, [target_child.GetSheHe] speaks: "[Root.GetFatherMother]? I... I can't sleep."
translation: 我调试着我的新六分仪，刚发现了一个看起来像流星的东西，这时门外响起轻轻的敲门声。我打开门，发现我的[target_child.GetSonDaughter][target_child.GetFirstName]有些不安。[target_child.GetSheHe]踌躇地说道：「[Root.GetFatherMother]？我……我睡不着。」

original: You are too old to be afraid of the dark, [target_child.GetFirstName].
translation: 你已经长大了，不应再害怕黑暗了。[target_child.GetFirstName]。

original: Making sure that land owners and traders are paying their taxes in a timely fashion is a time-consuming task. Lately, my mind has been more occupied with the task of making sure that the stars are in their correct place, rather than that the taxes are in my coffers.
translation: 确保土地所有者和贸易商及时缴纳税款是一项耗时的任务。最近，我的脑子里更多的任务是确保星星在正确的位置，而不是把税金放在我的库房里。

original: What is wealth compared to knowledge?
translation: 金钱怎么能和知识相提并论？

original: Some duties can't be neglected.
translation: 有些责任不能被忽视。

original: [target_friend.GetTitledFirstName] has been very cold to me lately. When I approach [target_friend.GetHerHim] about it today, [target_friend.GetSheHe] asks me point blank where I was. "Was when?", I respond. "We had plans to visit my uncle? The one who likes fishing? I knew you weren't all that excited, but I didn't expect you to simply not show up", [target_friend.GetSheHe] mutters.
translation: 最近[target_friend.GetTitledFirstName]对我态度的很冷淡。当我今天接近[target_friend.GetHerHim]的时候，[target_friend.GetSheHe]直截了当地问我那时候在哪里。「什么时候？」我答道。「你还记得我们计划去拜访我的叔叔？那个喜欢钓鱼的人？我知道你并不是那么兴奋，但我没想到你居然连面都不露」，[target_friend.GetSheHe]抱怨道。

original: I.. I have had many important things on my mind, lately.
translation: 我……最近我有很多重要的事情要做。

original: I understand why you are upset, and I am so sorry, [target_friend.GetFirstName].
translation: 我理解你为什么这么烦恼了，我非常抱歉，[target_friend.GetFirstName]。

original: While in a meeting with my council, I feel a headache rising inside my skull, making it hard to pick up the different conversations in the room. Lack of sleep is clearly taking its toll on me. Shouting erupts in the room – suddenly [councillor1.GetTitledFirstName] shouts my name, bringing my consciousness back to the room. In a threatening tone, [councillor1.GetSheHe] asks if I agree.
translation: 在与我的内阁会面时，我感到头痛在头骨内上升，难以跟上错综复杂的对话讨论。显然缺乏睡眠对我有害。突然[councillor1.GetTitledFirstName]大喊我的名字，把我的意识带回房间。[councillor1.GetSheHe]以一种威胁的口吻问我是否同意。

original: "Sure, sure...?"
translation: 「当然，当然……？」

original: "I'm sorry, would you care to explain the matter to me again?"
translation: 「非常抱歉，你能给我再解释一下这件事吗？」

original: My careful observations of [This.GetRandomPlanetName] has finally allowed me to conclude that the old projections of the planets path across the sky have been flawed. With some precise adjustments I can present a corrected projection.
translation: 我对[This.GetRandomPlanetName]的仔细观察终于让我得出结论，行星在天空中路径的旧预测结果是有缺陷的。通过一些精确的调整，我可以提供一个更正后的预测结果。

original: This will lead me closer to the truth behind the mysteries of the world.
translation: 这会让我更接近世界背后的奥秘。

original: It is an early morning when I, with shaking hand, put my quill down... Is it possible? Have I predicted the traveling of a star-fall? Wiping my brow, I go over my calculations once more – I get the same results, again. It does seem to add up! I lean back in my chair – judging from all the signs, I am fairly certain I know when this marvel will take place.
translation: 在一个清晨，当我用颤抖的手，把我的羽毛笔放下……有可能吗？我预言出了星星的陨落吗？我擦拭我的眉毛，再一次计算——我又得到了同样的结果——这似乎是合乎情理的！我向后靠在椅子上，从所有的迹象来看，我明确知道这个奇迹何时会发生。

original: Come the night, I will gather a crowd to witness it with me!
translation: 夜晚来临时，我会和我召集来的人们共同见证！

original: I should keep this to myself. Just in case I am wrong.
translation: 我应该保密。以防万一我错了。

original: The air is crisp and the sky clear, as people huddle around each other to observe the nightly phenomena I have predicted. Not all are convinced of my promise. As the hour begins to slip away, I hear their skeptical mumbling. Then, suddenly, several "Oooh!" and "Aaah!" take place around me, as people excitedly start pointing upwards. Across the dark heavens, a tiny speck of light is moving, a white trail marking its journey.
translation: 当人们挤在一起观察我预测的夜间天象时，空气清爽，天空清晰。但是并非所有人都相信我的预言。随着时间消逝，我听到他们怀疑的嘟囔声。突然，我身边的人们开始惊呼「哦！」和「啊！，人们兴奋的望向天空。在黑暗的夜幕中，一小束光线在移动，一条白色的轨迹点亮了它的旅程。

original: The air is crisp, as people gather together at top of the hill, to observe the nightly phenomena I have predicted. Not all are convinced of my promise, and I am beginning to worry. Even if I am right, chances are the star-fall won't be visible tonight, as the weather is particularly cloudy. As the moments pass, one person leaves, and I hear people mumbling. The night grows colder. Eventually, I am left alone on the hill.
translation: 当人们聚集在山顶上观察我预言的夜间现象时，空气很清新。并不是所有的人都相信我的承诺，我开始担心。即使我是对的，今晚的星辰坠落也很可能是看不见的，因为今天天气特别阴暗。随着时间的流逝，一个人离开了，我听到人们咕哝着。夜色越来越冷。最后，只剩我一个人留在山上。

original: This is a night we shall all remember.
translation: 这是一个我们将铭记的夜晚。

original: I am humiliated!
translation: 我被羞辱了！

original: The sky is pitch black and clear as I make my way up the hill. Carrying my instruments, I have a good feeling about my calculations – tonight is the night. I begin to unpack, and I am in the middle of adjusting my lenses, when I realize that the star-fall is visible even without my tools. I gasp, my chest filling with jubilant glee. Across the dark heavens, a tiny speck of light is moving, a white trail marking its journey.
translation: 我爬上山的时候，夜色正浓，天上无云。携带我的仪器，我对我的计算有很好的感觉——就是今夜。我拿出仪器，正在调整透镜当中，我意识到即使没有工具，星星坠落也是可见的。我气喘嘘嘘，胸膛里充满喜悦。穿过黑暗的天空，一小片光在移动，一条白色的痕迹标志着它的旅程。

original: I have been camped out on the hill for hours, hoping against hope. Maybe I missed it? Maybe my instruments are too weak? I wait even longer, but eventually it dawns on me – I was wrong. I am not sure how, but there is no star-fall.
translation: 我在山上露营了好几个小时，抱着一线希望。也许我错过了？也许我的仪器太不中用了？我等待更长的时间，但没有星星坠落。最终我明白了——我错了。我不明白为什么，但没有陨星。

original: This is what it's all about.
translation: 就是这么回事。

original: How could I have been so wrong?
translation: 我怎么会犯这种错误？

original: I find myself almost buried under an enormous heap of documents occupying my work desk which I have carefully studied. Yet there is still an absence of any observation about the specific light in the sky between two well-known star formations.
translation: 我发现自己几乎被埋在占据着我的整个办公桌的一堆文件之中，我仔细地研究了这些文件。然而，对于这两颗著名的星星之间的特殊光亮，我仍然没有任何的发现。

original: On a dark sheet there lies bright dots scattered around, dancing in a random fashion. No matter how long time I spend staring into the sky, no pattern reveals itself for me.
translation: 在暗色的天幕上，散落着明亮的圆点，随意地跳着舞。无论我花多长时间凝视天空，也没有任何图像为我显现。

original: There must be something wrong with my instruments.
translation: 一定是我的仪器出了问题。

original: [From.GetBestName] has not only discovered a new bright star in the sky, [From.GetSheHe] has decided to give me the honor of having the sparkling star named after myself!
translation: [From.GetBestName]不仅在天空中发现了一颗新的明星，[From.GetSheHe]还决定让我荣幸地以自己的名字命名这颗闪亮明星！

original: Do I really deserve this honor?
translation: 我真的应该接受这份荣誉吗？

original: The instruments and tomes that I had to gather for my studies of the secrets behind the stars have finally arrived. Lenses of different shapes and sizes, together with dusty old tomes written by learned people – these will prove invaluable for uncovering the truth.
translation: 我收集来研究星星背后秘密的仪器和巨著终于到了。不同形状和大小的透镜，以及学者们的著作——这一切都将被证明是发现真理的无价之宝。

original: Now I can carefully observe the sky.
translation: 现在我可以仔细地观星了。

original: It is rare to have a completely clear night-sky to observe, yet tonight the weather conditions are perfect. I smile, as I begin to carefully note down the pattern of the celestial bodies. I feel a surge of energy – never have I had such a spectacular view of my own constellation, [Root.GetWesternZodiacSign] – I can sense my connection to the elements stronger than ever before.
translation: 很难得有一个完全晴朗的夜空来观察，但今晚的天气条件是完美的。我微笑着，开始仔细地记录下天体的模式。我感到一股能量汹涌澎湃——我从来没有感受到如此壮观的景象，那是我自己的星座[Root.GetWesternZodiacSign]的景象——我可以感觉到，我与自然要素的联系比以往任何时候都要强烈。

original: How exhilarating!
translation: 多么令人振奋！

original: Being at the debate is a draining process. I have not had a good night's sleep since I got here. Either I cannot fall asleep due to a searing pain in the back or I get woken up by loud arguments outside about yesterday's debate topics. Days like these I just long for a warm and cozy bed.
translation: 参加辩论是一个耗费精力的过程。自从我来到这里以后，我从没能好好睡一觉。要么我因为背部的灼痛无法入睡，要么像昨天我被辩论的大声喧哗吵醒。这样的日子里，我只渴望一个温暖舒适的床。

original: These accommodations are the worst...
translation: 这里住宿条件真差……

original: I can't take this anymore. I want to go home!
translation: 我受不了了。我要回家！

original: I should use this time for something productive.
translation: 我应该利用这时间做些有益的事情。

original: Nocturnal Studies
translation: 夜间研究

original: While everyone else is still in a deep slumber, this character is already preparing for the coming day.
translation: 当其他人还在沉睡中时，这个角色已经为即将到来的一天做好了准备。

original: Bad Nights
translation: 糟糕的夜晚

original: This character is suffering from back pain and headaches due to not having had a proper night's sleep in weeks.
translation: 这个角色因为数周内缺乏适当的睡眠，正忍受着背痛和头痛。

original: Mischievous Deeds
translation: 恶作剧

original: This character has recently sabotaged the research of a fellow society member.
translation: 此人最近破坏了一个社团成员的研究。

original: An opportunity has presented itself for me to level the playing field of the debate. [sabotage_target.GetSocietyRank] [sabotage_target.GetFirstName] a great debater under normal circumstances, [sabotage_target.GetSheHe] is very dependent on [sabotage_target.GetHerHis] meticulous notes.
translation: 一个机会在我面前出现了，令我可以平衡辩论的竞争环境。[sabotage_target.GetSocietyRank][sabotage_target.GetFirstName]在一般情况下是一位很棒的辩手，而[sabotage_target.GetSheHe]非常依赖[sabotage_target.GetHerHis]精细的笔记。

original: Perhaps [sabotage_target.GetSheHe] could find some of mine...
translation: 也许[sabotage_target.GetSheHe]可以找到我的一些……

original: It would be a shame if anything happened to those notes.
translation: 如果这些笔记发生任何事，那将是一件耻辱。

original: I will not resort to cheap tricks.
translation: 我不会采用黔驴之技。

original: Plant some forged notes about a ground-breaking discovery in a convenient place.\n
translation: 在合适的地方布置一些有关突破性发现的假信息。\n

original: Attempt to make the notes unusable.\n
translation: 尝试令那些笔记无法被辨识。\n

original: After a tough day full of debates I find myself alone in the corridor. Curiously, I spot some notes forgotten on the floor. The notes speak of [Root.GetHermeticDebateSubject]! This is great, I could use these notes to prepare for my next debate.
translation: 经过一天艰难地辩论，我独自一人呆在走廊里。奇怪的是，我发现一些笔记被遗忘在了地板上。这些笔记提到了[Root.GetHermeticDebateSubject]！这太棒了，我能用这些笔记准备我的下一次辩论。

original: After a tough day full of debates I find myself alone in the corridor. Curiously, I spot some notes forgotten on the floor. The notes speak of [Root.GetSillyDebateSubject]! This is great, I could use these notes to prepare for my next debate.
translation: 经过一天艰难地辩论，我独自一人呆在走廊里。奇怪的是，我发现一些笔记被遗忘在了地板上。这些笔记提到了[Root.GetSillyDebateSubject]！这太棒了，我能用这些笔记准备我的下一次辩论。

original: Even someone else's knowledge is the path to success.
translation: 别人的知识也是成功的捷径。

original: I have more confidence in my own work.
translation: 我对我自己的工作更有自信了。

original: This is clearly some made-up nonsense!
translation: 这显然是胡说八道！

original: You will recite your new-found knowledge in an upcoming debate, as if it were your own.\n
translation: 你会在即将到来的辩论中背诵你新发现的知识，就好像它是你自己想出的一样。\n

original: While I am sitting and preparing for the debate, studying my notes carefully, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] stumbles and drops everything in [From.GetHerHis] hands. Parchments and quills are strewn everywhere and my notes are now soaked in ink!
translation: 当我坐在那里准备辩论，仔细研究我的笔记时，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]绊倒并摔掉了[From.GetHerHis]手中的所有东西。羊皮纸和羽毛笔到处散落，我的笔记现在浸泡在墨水中！

original: An unfortunate accident.
translation: 一次不幸的事故。

original: [From.GetFirstName] clearly did that on purpose!
translation: [From.GetFirstName]故意这么干的！

original: Your preparation notes for today are ruined, decreasing your chances of winning the debate.\n
translation: 你为今天准备的笔记被毁掉了，这降低了你赢得辩论的机会。\n

original: I was successful in "accidentally" dropping ink on the notes of [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName], ruining them beyond readability. [From.GetFirstName] was however less than happy with my clumsy behavior...
translation: 我成功地「意外」把墨水泼在了[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]的笔记上，它被毁得再也不能阅读了。但是，[From.GetFirstName]对我笨拙的行为并不满意。

original: You can't make an omelete without breaking a few eggs.
translation: 不打碎几个蛋，你是没法制作蛋饼的。

original: I performed splendidly in today's debate, much thanks to the brilliant research I found in the hallway. My competitors were left without any good arguments to counter my impeccable logic.
translation: 我在今天的辩论中表现得出色，多亏了我在长廊里发现的精彩研究。我的竞争对手没有任何有力的论据，来反驳我无可挑剔的逻辑。

original: Reciting the notes I found the other day proved to be an unfortunate mistake... The crowd was loud and vigorous, not because they were struck by my burgeoning intellect, but because they were laughing. Someone must have crafted those notes as a joke!
translation: 背诵我在前几天发现的笔记是一个不幸的错误……人群的声音响亮而有力，不是因为他们被我的聪明才智所打动，而是因为他们在嘲笑。一定有人把这些笔记编成了笑柄！

original: During today's debate I recited the notes I found the other day far too literally... After a short while someone in the audience started shouting and called me out on being a fraud for stealing their work.
translation: 在今天的辩论中，我背诵了几天前我发现的笔记。过了一会儿，观众席中有人开始大喊大叫，指控我窃取了他们的工作。

original: With a little bit of fortune anything is possible.
translation: 只要有一点点幸运，任何事情都是可能的。

original: Your performance greatly impressed everyone present, increasing your chances of winning the debate.\n
translation: 你的表现给在场的每个人留下了深刻的印象，这增加了赢得这场辩论的机会。\n

original: I was a fool to believe in those notes!
translation: 我真傻，竟然去相信那些笔记！

original: This embarrassing situation will not soon be forgotten, and decreases your chances of winning the debate.\n
translation: 这种尴尬的局面不会很快被遗忘，并且会减少你赢得辩论的机会。\n

original: This is embarrassing...
translation: 这很尴尬……

original: "Clearly this must be a mistake, let's calm down for a moment!"
translation: 「显然这肯定是一个错误，让我们冷静一下！」

original: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] made a fool of [From.GetHerselfHimself] today at the debate, by citing parts of the forged notes I planted some days ago for [From.GetHerHim] to find. At certain moments [From.GetSheHe] had the whole room veritably bursting to tears laughing!
translation: [From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]在今天的辩论里，引用了几天前我故意让[From.GetHerHim]找到的伪造的手稿，让[From.GetHerselfHimself]看起来像个傻子。当时整个房间里充满了快活的气息，[From.GetSheHe]让人眼泪都笑出来了！

original: Despite my best effort [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetBestName] has ignored the notes that I deliberately left in plain sight of [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 尽管我尽了最大的努力，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetBestName]忽略了我刻意留在[From.GetHerHim]一目了然的的地方的笔记。

original: [From.GetSheHeCap] sure is gullible...
translation: [From.GetSheHeCap]肯定轻信他人……

original: I'll fool [From.GetHerHim] next time!
translation: 下次我会愚弄到[From.GetHerHim]！

original: You will conclude your research.
translation: 你将总结你的研究。

original: While [From.GetTitledFirstName] has always been a little strange, I never could have known that [From.GetSheHe] was secretly a [From.GetTrueReligionAdherent]!
translation: 虽然[From.GetTitledFirstName]一直表现的有点奇怪，但我从来不会知道[From.GetSheHe]暗中是一个[From.GetTrueReligionAdherent]追随者！

original: That was certainly a daring revelation of [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 这对[From.GetHerHim]而言肯定是一个大胆的揭露。

original: Publicly you will act in the faith of your liege while you keep your old faith in private.\n
translation: 公开场合下，你将按照你领主的信仰行动，而在私下，你保持你的旧信仰。\n

original: You fully embrace the faith of your liege.\n
translation: 你完全接受你领主的信仰。\n

original: Shares the same true faith as §Y[From.GetFirstName]§!\n
translation: 与§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!有着相同的真实信仰\n

original: I am not sure what has happened, but it has been a while since I've had any contact with [satanists_recruiter.GetBestName]. It's disappointing, as I was sort of curious to see where our meetings were going... As I retire tonight, I feel convinced that our time together has somehow ended prematurely.
translation: 我不确定发生了什么，但是我与[satanists_recruiter.GetBestName]失去联系已经有一段时间了。我有些失望，因为我对我们的会谈会走向何方有些好奇……当我今晚就寝时，我确信我们会见的时间不知何故过早地结束了。

original: Something must have gone wrong.
translation: 一定是出了什么差错。

original: You will have to await a new recruiter from the clandestine society.
translation: 你不得不等待一个来自秘密结社的新招募者。

original: I am not sure what has happened, but it has been a while since I've had any contact with [satanists_inductor.GetBestName]. It's disappointing, as I was sort of curious to see where our meetings were going... As I retire tonight, I feel convinced that our time together has somehow ended prematurely.
translation: 我不确定发生了什么，但是我与[satanists_inductor.GetBestName]失去联系已经有一段时间了。我有些失望，因为我对我们的会谈会走向何方有些好奇……当我今晚就寝时，我确信我们会见的时间不知何故过早地结束了。

original: Something must have gone wrong.
translation: 一定是出了什么差错。

original: You will have to await a new recruiter from the clandestine society.
translation: 你不得不等待一个来自秘密结社的新招募者。

original: As a pious man, after having read the texts of the Vendidad, you are more aware of the Daevas' presence all around you and the danger they put your family and realm in. So, you have decided that your house shall adopt one of the Good Spirit's Dogs.
translation: 作为一个虔诚的人，读完祛邪典的文本后，你会更加清楚魔鬼们的存在，以及他们会给你的家庭和领地带来的危险。所以，你决定你的房子里应该养一只拥有善灵的狗。

original: Vohunazga, the dog without a master.
translation: 沃胡马纳，流浪犬。

original: Vanghapara, the dog with a prickly back.
translation: 旺哈帕拉，刺猬。

original: Sag-e Aabi, the dog of the water.
translation: 萨格阿比，水獭。

original: We need no damned dog!
translation: 我们不需要狗！

original: A Vohunazga of [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName] is known to the people as a kind creature of Ahura Mazda, protecting your capital from the Daevas which roam in the darkness.
translation: [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]的沃胡马纳是众所周知的阿胡拉·马兹达身边代表着善良的生物，它能够保护你的首都不被黑暗中漫游的魔鬼所侵扰。

original: He shall roam free but protected by the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName].
translation: 他可以随意走动，但会受[Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]保护。

original: Take him in! He is one of the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName].
translation: 把他带进来！他是[Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]的一员。

original: The dog called Vanghapara is known as a vigilant creature of the Spenta Mainyu. As darkness beckons this dog wakes to keep us safe from its evil creatures. This is why it is such a popular pet among [Root.Religion.GetName] families.
translation: 这只狗叫旺哈帕拉，是众所周知的斯潘塔·迈纽身边代表着机警的生物。它因为黑暗的召唤而苏醒，使我们能远离邪恶的生物。这就是为什么它会成为[Root.Religion.GetName]家庭最受欢迎的宠物。

original: The Vanghapara shall protect my home well.
translation: 旺哈帕拉应该好好地保卫我的家。

original: The dog of the water is the most revered of all the dogs. They are what keeps our fields watered and healthy, our bellies full and worries gone.
translation: 水獭是所有犬类中最受人尊敬的。他们使我们的田地保持着湿润和健康，我们的肚子饱了，烦恼便消逝了。

original: It is our honor to house the Sag-e Aabi
translation: 能收留萨格阿比是我们的荣耀

original: Vohunazga Guardian
translation: 沃胡纳加监护者

original: This character is the guardian of a masterless dog who defends his home from evil spirits.
translation: 这个角色是只流浪狗的守护者，它能保护他的家远离邪灵。

original: House Dog
translation: 家犬

original: This character has taken in a dog into his house which defends him from evil spirits.
translation: 这个角色把一只狗带进了他的房子，以受恶灵的折磨。

original: Vanghapara Pet
translation: 宠物旺哈帕拉

original: This character has taken in a hedgehog into his house which happily in return hunts down vermin.
translation: 这个角色收养了一只刺猬，这只刺猬乐于消灭害虫作为报答。

original: Sag-e Aabi Guardian
translation: 萨格阿比守护者

original: This character is the guardian of an otter which ensures the wellbeing of the realm.
translation: 这个角色是水獭守护者，它确保了王国的幸福。

original: I've changed my mind...
translation: 我改主意了……

original: Choose Hermetic Art
translation: 选择一个赫耳墨斯学会技艺

original: Choose to focus on one of the three arts within §Y[Root.Society.GetName]§!. Doing so will allow you to choose a lifestyle trait.
translation: 选择关注于§Y[Root.Society.GetName]§!中的三种技艺之一。这样做可以让你选择一种生活方式特质。

original: Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your character's portrait in order choose one of the three different arts within the Hermetics, allowing you to decide on your lifestyle.
translation: 允许在你角色的头像上§G右键点击§!以选择赫耳墨斯学会的三门技艺的其中之一，即你可以决定你的生活方式特质（神学家、学者、神秘主义者）。

original: Is allowed to choose a Hermetic Art at this time\n
translation: 现在可以选择一个赫耳墨斯学会技艺\n

original: I have been with the Hermetics for some time and yet, I have not been able to contemplate enough on all of the three arts. If I were to focus on one of the arts I might further increase my understanding of it. But which art should I choose?
translation: 我和赫耳墨斯学者们相处已经有段时间了，但是，我还是没能对三种技艺进行足够的思考。如果我把重点放在其中一门技艺上，我可能会进一步加深对它的理解。但我应该选择哪门技艺呢？

original: Astrology and the study of the stars.
translation: 占星术和对星星的研究。

original: Alchemy and spiritual transformation.
translation: 炼金术和灵性转换。

original: Theurgy and the divine.
translation: 神通术和神灵。

original: I changed my mind. Perhaps another time.
translation: 我改变主意了。也许下一次吧。

original: This art will lead to the §YScholar§! trait.
translation: 这种技艺会引向§Y学者§!特质。

original: This art will lead to the §YMystic§! trait
translation: 这种技艺会引向§Y神秘主义者§!特质。

original: This art will lead to the §YTheologian§! trait
translation: 这种技艺会引向§Y神学家§!特质。

original: As a scholar, I have dedicated much time to the art of studying the stars and celestial bodies. I learned a great deal in doing so. But I should spend more time with the other arts as well. Which one should I focus on more closely?
translation: 作为一名学者，我专心研究星体和天体的艺术。我在这方面学到了很多东西。但我应该花时间在其他艺术上。我应该更密切集中哪一个？

original: To study alchemy and how to reach spiritual transformation is indeed a learning experience. Albeit more difficult than one might imagine. But time has come to also master the other arts. Which one should be my focus?
translation: 学习炼金术以及如何达到灵性转换确实是好的一种学习体验。虽然比人们想象的更困难。但是时候掌握其他技巧了。我应该专注哪一项？

original: I have attained great knowledge in the art of Theurgy. Learning about [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] and divine spirits. Yet, to master the truth and understand it, I will need to learn more about the other arts. Which one should I study next?
translation: 我从神通术获得了渊博的知识。学习了[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]和神灵。然而，为了掌握真理和理解它，我将需要更多地了解其他艺术。接下来我该学习什么？

original: I shall learn more about astrology.
translation: 我将更多地了解占星术。

original: Alchemy will be my priority.
translation: 炼金术将是我的首要任务。

original: The art of Theurgy is important.
translation: 神通术很重要。

original: I will keep my current art for now.
translation: 我会暂时保留我目前的技艺。

original: There are many ways in how one may reveal the secrets behind the movement of stars and celestial bodies. I could set up the needed equipment to study them myself. Alternatively, I could look at the existing research of known authors and researchers.
translation: 有许多可以揭示恒星和天体运动背后秘密的方法。我可以自己动手安装所需要的设备来研究它们。或者，我可以看看已知作者和研究人员的现有研究。

original: I have to see it for myself.
translation: 我必须亲眼看到它。

original: Looking at the work of others is a good start.
translation: 观察他人的工作是一个好的开始。

original: Use your existing equipment.\n
translation: 使用你已经有的设备。\n

original: Purchase the necessary equipment.\n
translation: 购买必要的设备。\n

original: Standing outside and gazing upon the night sky is invigorating! I have yet to fully grasp the secrets hidden from me. Knowing that I can find the meaning behind the stars, I refuse to give up.
translation: 站在室外，凝视夜空令人振奋！我还没有完全掌握隐藏的奥秘。我能找到星星背后的意义，所以我拒绝放弃。

original: Time will tell if I am worthy.
translation: 时间会证明我是否值得的

original: To master the art of alchemy is not an easy task. It may take years before I can make any notable progress. I must decide how best to pursue this knowledge.
translation: 掌握炼金术并不是一件容易的事。这可能需要几年时间才能取得显著进展。我必须决定如何最好地来追求这些知识。

original: Learning by doing will lead the way.
translation: 通过上手实践来学习会事半功倍。

original: Careful studies and observation is key.
translation: 仔细的研究和观察是关键。

original: Alchemy is the key component of uncovering the truth, that much I know. But I still have much to learn and discover. Dedication and resolve will be my allies.
translation: 炼金术是揭示真相的关键，尽管我已经知道的很多。但我依然还有很多东西要学习和发现。奉献和决心将成为我的盟友。

original: So much to learn. So little time.
translation: 要学的东西太多了。时间却太少了。

original: One way to better understand [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] is the use of white magic, in which you pray to divine spirits in order to use their guidance. This is known as Theurgy. Another path is that of Goetia. To use black magic by seeking out foul demons and heeding their advice.
translation: 一种更好地理解[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的方法是使用白魔法，在这种魔法中，你向神灵祈祷以便能够使用他们的指引。这就是所谓的神通术。另一条路是Goetia。通过寻找恶魔并听取他们的建议来使用黑魔法。

original: Only the divine can teach me.
translation: 只有神能教我。

original: There is nothing wrong with demons, is there?
translation: 恶魔没有错，是吗？

original: Divine enlightenment is not something you easily achieve. Even if I have made some progress already, it has been slow and I have merely scratched the surface. How will I ever learn the truth at this pace?
translation: 神的启示不是你能轻易实现的。我已经取得了一些进展，但进展缓慢，我才刚刚触及表面。以这样的速度学习下去，我怎么才能获得真理？

original: I suppose only [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] can deem me worthy.
translation: 我想只有[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]会认为我值得。

original: Stargazer
translation: 占星师

original: Theoretical Alchemist
translation: 理论炼金术师

original: An alchemist who prefers the theoretical approach of careful studies.
translation: 一位更喜欢理论性研究方法的炼金术师。

original: Experimenting Alchemist
translation: 实验炼金术师

original: An alchemist who prefers the practical approach of performing experiments.
translation: 一位更喜欢实验性研究方法的炼金术师。

original: Divine Alliance
translation: 神圣盟友

original: This character prays to divine spirits to better understand [Religion.GetHighGodName].
translation: 这个角色通过向圣灵祈祷来更深入理解[Religion.GetHighGodName]。

original: Demon Alliance
translation: 恶魔盟友

original: This character prays to demons to better understand [Religion.GetHighGodName].
translation: 这个角色通过向恶魔祈祷来更深入理解[Religion.GetHighGodName]。

original: Completely controls the §Y$TITLE$§!
translation: 完全控制§Y$TITLE$§!

original: Does NOT completely control the §Y$TITLE$§!
translation: 没有完全控制§Y$TITLE$§!

original: Has NOT invited to stargazing in the past three years\n
translation: 在过去的三年里没有被邀请去观星\n

original: Stargazing
translation: 观星

original: This option is available due to you owning an observatory\n
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有一座天文台\n

original: This option is available due to you owning observatory equipment\n
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有一套天文观测设备\n

original: Make the needed preparations for the coming night.
translation: 为即将到来的夜晚做必要的准备。

original: Invite to Stargazing
translation: 邀请去观星

original: Invite §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! to a night of stargazing and studies in an attempt to better understand how it works. This is also a good opportunity to get to know each other.
translation: 邀请§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!来共度一个观星和学习的夜晚，从而试图更好地理解它是如何工作的。这同样也是一个来让我们彼此认识的好机会。

original:
To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

I write to you with a proposition. We are both esteemed members of [Root.Society.GetName] and I think we could learn much from one another. I hereby invite you to a night of discoveries and to study the sky.

Your fellow [FromFrom.GetSocietyRank], [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootCompliment][Root.GetTitledFirstName]，

我写信给你是为了发出邀请。我们都是[Root.Society.GetName]的尊贵成员，我认为我们可以互相学习。在此我邀请你在一个充满发现的夜晚去研究天空。

你的[FromFrom.GetSocietyRank]伙伴，[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]

original: I would be delighted to come!
translation: 我非常乐意前来！

original: Perhaps another time.
translation: 或许另找时间为好。

original:
To the [GetFromFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

Your invitation arrived as a very pleasant surprise. I would be honored to study with you and will prepare my journey shortly.

Your fellow [From.GetSocietyRank], [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致[GetFromFromRootCompliment][Root.GetTitledFirstName]，

你邀请函的到来令人非常惊喜。我很荣幸能和你一起研习，我将尽快准备我的旅程。

你的[From.GetSocietyRank]伙伴，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original:
To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

I received your invitation, but I fear that I will have to decline. It is currently impossible for me to make any travel arrangement on such a short notice. I hope you understand.

Your fellow [From.GetSocietyRank], [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootCompliment][Root.GetTitledFirstName]，

我收到了你的邀请，但我恐怕不得不拒绝。目前我不可能在如此短的时间内做出任何旅行安排。希望你能理解。

你的同事，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: It seems that more important matters have been brought to me. I will have to cancel the invitation I sent to [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName]. The night of studies and stargazing will have to wait.
translation: 看来有更重要的事情提交给我了。我不得不取消发送给[stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName]的邀请。学习与观星之夜将不得不延后。

original: Another time perhaps.
translation: 或许下次吧。

original: Cancel the planned night of stargazing and notify [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName]
translation: 告知[stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName]取消了夜晚观星的计划。

original:
To the [GetFromRootCompliment] [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

I fear that urgent matters require my attention for now. We will have to perform our planned studies of the night sky at another time. I pray that you will not be too disappointed.

[From.GetSocietyRank], [From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致[GetFromRootCompliment][Root.GetTitledFirstName]，

我担心现在的事迫切需要我去关注。我们只能另外找时间来进行我们计划中对夜空的研究。我祈求你不会太失望。

[From.GetSocietyRank]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: My guest [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] has finally arrived. I have been looking forward to the two of us getting together and review the work of each other. There is still some time before nightfall, however. I have a few suggestion of how we could spend the time.
translation: 我的客人[stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName]终于来了。我一直盼望我们俩聚在一起回顾彼此的工作。然而，在黄昏到来前仍有一段时间，对于如何度过这段时光我有一些建议。

original: Have you seen my observatory?
translation: 你看到我的天文台没？

original: I will show you my instruments.
translation: 我会让你看看我的仪器。

original: I have the perfect location in mind.
translation: 我已经想到了一个完美的位置。

original: How about a small feast in your honor?
translation: 为了您的荣誉，一个小型的宴会如何？

original: Time not spent studying is time lost.
translation: 没有花在学习上的时间就是浪费。

original: Show your guest to your observatory.
translation: 向客人展示你的天文台。

original: Show your guest the tools you possess to use for stargazing.
translation: 向您的客人展示您用于观星的工具。

original: Show your guest to the nearby location to use for the coming night.
translation: 向您的客人展示晚上要去的地方。

original: Spend the time with a small feast.
translation: 用这些时间享受一场小型宴会。

original: Spend the time by studying in preparation of the coming night.
translation: 用这些时间为即将到来的夜晚学习一番。

original: When arriving in [stargazing_host.Capital.GetName] I was greeted with a smile from [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName]. I quickly unpacked but I could tell that [stargazing_host.GetFirstName] was eagerly waiting for me. 'I would like to show you my observatory', [stargazing_host.GetFirstName] said as [stargazing_host.GetSheHe] was turning to lead the way. Once inside, carefully crafted tools and lenses could be seen everywhere.
translation: 到达[stargazing_host.Capital.GetName]时，[stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName]带着微笑迎接了我。我很快卸下行李，但还是可以看出[stargazing_host.GetFirstName]正急切地等着我。「我想向你展示我的观象台」，[stargazing_host.GetFirstName]说，然后[stargazing_host.GetSheHe]转身带路。一进入其间，精制的工具和镜片随处可见。

original: This is truly impressive!
translation: 这确实令人印象深刻！

original: I fail to see the magnificence really.
translation: 我真的看不出有什么好看的。

original: I showed [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] the way to the observatory. When we stepped inside, [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] gazed in wonder at the various tools. [stargazing_guest.GetSheHeCap] went on to ask about the different instruments and how to use them. At which times you are more likely to see the stars more clearly. The questions kept coming for quite a while.
translation: 我向[stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName]展示了去天文台的道路。当我们走进内部时，[stargazing_guest.GetSheHe]惊奇地望着各种工具。[stargazing_guest.GetSheHeCap]继续询问着不同的仪器以及如何使用它们。在哪些时候，你更有可能更清楚地看到星星——这些问题持续了好一阵子。

original: I am glad [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] liked it!
translation: 我很高兴[stargazing_guest.GetSheHe]能喜欢！

original: I lead [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] to the observatory and waited for [stargazing_guest.GetHerHis] reaction when we stepped inside. At first [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] only looked around. After a while [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] asked a few simple question but I got the feeling that it was not very impressive.
translation: 我带着[stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName]走进天文台，等着看[stargazing_guest.GetHerHis]在我们进去时的反应。起初[stargazing_guest.GetSheHe]只是环顾四周。过了一会儿，[stargazing_guest.GetSheHe]问了一些简单的问题，但我觉得这并不是很令人印象深刻。

original: Oh well. We are here to study after all.
translation: 哦，好吧。我们毕竟来这里学习的。

original: [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName] greeted me when I arrived in [stargazing_host.Capital.GetName]. After a short conversation [stargazing_host.GetFirstName] lead the way to [stargazing_host.GetHerHis] study. When we stepped inside I immediately noticed all the tools and lenses. It would seem that [stargazing_host.GetSheHe] owns quite a collection of stargazing equipment.
translation: [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName]在我抵达[stargazing_host.Capital.GetName]时迎接了我。短暂的交谈过后，[stargazing_host.GetFirstName]带我到[stargazing_host.GetHerHis]书房。当我们走进内部时，我立即注意到所有的工具和望远镜。看起来[stargazing_host.GetSheHe]拥有相当多的观星设备。

original: Magnificent tools I must say.
translation: 华丽的工具，我得说。

original: Anyone can acquire such common items, no?
translation: 任何人都能得到这样普通的物品，不是吗？

original: I guided [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] to the study to showcase my stargazing tools. I could see that [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] was delighted as [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] spent quite some time inspecting them. We talked about the tools for quite a while. We even had a long conversation just about lenses. Small lenses and larger lenses, and knowing when to use which ones.
translation: 我带着[stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName]来到观测室，展示了我的观星工具。我看得出[stargazing_guest.GetSheHe]很高兴，因为他花了不少时间来检视它们。我们花了一段时间谈论那些工具，甚至谈了很久关于镜片的话题。小镜片和大镜片，知道了什么时候用哪个。

original: You may use them later tonight.
translation: 今晚晚些的时候你可以用它们。

original: I arrived at the study with [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] closely behind me. 'This is the equipment I have obtained', I explained and gestured towards the neatly ordered collection of tools. [stargazing_guest.GetFirstName] inspected the collection for a moment, but did not look very impressed. Or at least as something [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] has seen before.
translation: 我到了书房，[stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName]紧跟在后面。「这些是我拿到的仪器」，我解释说，并且展示着整齐摆放的整套工具。[stargazing_guest.GetFirstName]检视了一下我的收藏，但看起来印象并没有太深刻。要么就是[stargazing_guest.GetSheHe]之前见过这些东西。

original: At least I like them.
translation: 至少我喜欢它们。

original: Upon my arrival in [stargazing_host.Capital.GetName], I was received with great splendor. [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName] explained that [stargazing_host.GetSheHe] had chosen a perfect location to use during the night. 'This way and I will show it to you.' [stargazing_host.GetSheHeCap] lead the way to a hill not too far away. The hill had a decent height for its small size and no trees obscuring the view.
translation: 我一到[stargazing_host.Capital.GetName]，就受到了隆重欢迎。[stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName]解释说，[stargazing_host.GetSheHe]已经找到了一个在夜间使用的绝佳地点。「走这边，我带你过去看。」[stargazing_host.GetSheHeCap]带路来到不远的一座山丘。小山丘的高度适中，没有树木遮挡视线。

original: This will suit our needs perfectly!
translation: 这将完美符合我们的需求！

original: A lonely hill in the middle of nowhere...
translation: 在偏远的地方有一座荒凉的山……

original: We walked to the hill of my choice not far away. Once there, [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] took a moment to look at the hill and the sky above. 'This hill should suit our needs perfectly I think.' [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] said while nodding approvingly. We quickly decided on where to set up in order to be able to see as much as possible.
translation: 我们走到不远处我选的那座山上。一到那里，[stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName]就花了一点时间看看这座山和头顶的天空。「我认为这座山完全适合我们的需求。」[stargazing_guest.GetSheHe]点头赞许道。我们很快开始决定露宿地点，以便看到尽可能多的天象。

original: It is all about location, location, location.
translation: 最重要的永远是位置，位置，位置。

original: I walked with [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] to the nearby hill I had chosen for us. While pointing to a few places that I think would work well for us, I hear [stargazing_guest.GetFirstName] complaining behind me. Clearly disapproved of my choice. 'I suppose it will do. But it seems to be very far away if you ask me.'
translation: 我和[stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName]走到我选的山头上。当我指出几处适合观星之地时，我听到[stargazing_guest.GetFirstName]在我的身后埋怨。明显不赞同我的选择：「我觉得还可以。但如果你问我，我认为还是离的太远。」

original: Trust me. It offers a better view.
translation: 相信我，这让我有了更好的看法。

original: When I arrived in [stargazing_host.Capital.GetName] I was not only met with a warm smile from [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName], but a grand feast as well! A wide range of courses had been prepared for our pleasure and indulgence. [stargazing_host.GetFirstName] raised a cup in my honor. 'Let us toast for a night of new discoveries!'
translation: 当我到达[stargazing_host.Capital.GetName]时，我不仅受到了来自[stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName]的友善欢迎，而且还有丰盛的宴席！主人为我们的纵情娱乐准备了各种各样的活动。[stargazing_host.GetFirstName]为我举起了酒杯。「让我们为今晚新的发现干杯！」

original: A spectacular feast I must say!
translation: 我必须要说这是一个壮观的盛宴！

original: Is it not a bit excessive?
translation: 是不是有点过了？

original: When [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] entered the dining hall, I think the feast came as a surprise. And a very pleasant one at that. We dined and enjoyed ourselves and had a good time just speaking with each other for the next few hours. 'You have outdone yourself, [stargazing_host.GetFirstName]. This was spectacular!'
translation: 当[stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName]进入餐厅时，我认为这场盛宴令人惊喜，是好的意义上的惊喜。我们在这里度过了愉快的时光，并且在接下来的几个小时里彼此愉快交谈。「你已经超越了自己，[stargazing_host.GetFirstName]。这太壮观了！」

original: The wonders of good food.
translation: 美食的奇迹。

original: I showed [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] to the dining hall and the awaiting feast. The look on [stargazing_guest.GetHerHis] face made it abundantly clear that [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] was not expecting a proper feast. Perhaps [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] was expecting a small dinner? Did I overdo it?
translation: 我引导[stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName]前往餐厅参加等候宴。[stargazing_guest.GetHerHis]脸上的表情清楚地表明[stargazing_guest.GetSheHe]并不期待一场正式的盛宴。或许[stargazing_guest.GetSheHe]期待着一场小型的晚餐？我是不是做过头了？

original: It tasted good at least.
translation: 至少味道还算不错。

original: [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName] was there to welcome me on my arrival in [stargazing_host.Capital.GetName]. Shortly thereafter we made the way to [stargazing_host.GetFirstName]'s private study, where [stargazing_host.GetSheHe] began to show me his current work and most recent discoveries. 'How better to pass the time before nightfall than to spend it on studies and learning?'
translation: 在我到达[stargazing_host.Capital.GetName]时，[stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName]在那里欢迎了我。不久之后，我们来到了[stargazing_host.GetFirstName]的私人书房，在那里[stargazing_host.GetSheHe]开始向我展示他目前的工作和最新的发现。「把时间花在研究和学习上，难道不是好于在天黑之前消磨光阴？」

original: That is why I am here.
translation: 这就是我在这里的原因。

original: Even learning is best in moderation.
translation: 即使是学习也要适度为好。

original: Knowing that [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] is a learned man I showed him to my study. After discussing my most recently acquired writings I suggested that we sit down and try to learn something from them. [stargazing_guest.GetSheHeCap] responded with approval. 'I would never say no to an opportunity of gathering newfound knowledge. That is after all, the reason I am here.'
translation: 我知道[stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName]是一位饱学之士，于是请他参观了我的书房。在讨论了我最近收购的作品后，我提议一起坐下来读一读这些作品。[stargazing_guest.GetSheHeCap]欣然同意。「我绝不会拒绝学习新知识的机会。毕竟，这就是我在这里的原因。」

original: Knowledge is power.
translation: 知识就是力量。

original: Thinking that [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] would jump at the chance of examining my most recently acquired writings, I showed [stargazing_guest.GetHerHim] my collection. After a moment of glancing through the pages, [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] casually put the writings back in their place. [stargazing_guest.GetSheHeCap] then suggested that we rest before the night.
translation: 我觉得[stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName]一有机会就想好好看看我最近收购的作品，于是我向[stargazing_guest.GetHerHim]展示了我的收藏。扫了几眼之后，[stargazing_guest.GetSheHe]心不在焉地把文章放回原处。然后[stargazing_guest.GetSheHeCap]建议我们在夜晚来临前休息会儿。

original: I presume the journey was long?
translation: 我猜是因为舟车劳顿？

original: Night is almost upon us and the first stars are finally making themselves visible on the sky outside. I should tell [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] that it is time. Time to see if we can uncover new secrets.
translation: 时近夜晚，暮星在外面的天空中隐约可见。我应该告诉[stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName]现在是时候了。现在看看我们能否发现新的秘密。

original: We should get ready.
translation: 我们应该做好准备。

original: [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] and me have been looking at the stars for a few hours already. Suddenly, it occurred to me. Stars are aligned in different patterns, taking on the shapes of different figures. But they are not really moving, are they? They always seem to have the same location in relation to one another.
translation: 我和[stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName]已经看了几个小时的星星了。突然，我想到了。星星按照不同的图案排列，呈现出不同的形状。但它们并没有真正的移动，不是吗？相对于彼此而言，它们看起来处在不变的位置上。

original: [stargazing_guest.GetFirstName]! Take notes!
translation: [stargazing_guest.GetFirstName]！记笔记！

original: I was reading through our notes when [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName] suddenly shouted at me. '[stargazing_guest.GetFirstName]! It just occurred to me!' [stargazing_host.GetSheHeCap] then went on explaining [stargazing_host.GetHerHis] theory about how the stars never move and how they are related to one another.
translation: 当[stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName]突然对我大声喊叫时，我正在通读我们的笔记。「[stargazing_guest.GetFirstName]！我想到了！」然后[stargazing_host.GetSheHeCap]继续解释[stargazing_host.GetHerHis]关于恒星如何不动以及它们如何相互关联的理论。

original: [stargazing_host.GetSheHeCap] could be on to something!
translation: [stargazing_host.GetSheHeCap]可能意识到了什么！

original: I was writing down some notes when I heard [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] speak behind me and turned to face [stargazing_guest.GetHerHim]. [stargazing_guest.GetSheHeCap] then went on to explain a theory of how the zodiacs are connected with each other how they are aligned in a certain way.
translation: 当[stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName]在我身后和我说话时，我正在写下一些笔记，我转过身面对[stargazing_guest.GetHerHim]。接着，[stargazing_guest.GetSheHeCap]开始解释他的理论，黄道十二宫是怎么相互联系的，它们又是怎样通过某种方式排列整齐的。

original: Yes. Interesting thoughts.
translation: 是的。有趣的想法。

original: When looking at the stars and the patterns they create on the sky, I started thinking on the zodiacs. I quickly explained my newfound theory to [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName] who nodded in agreement. The zodiacs are sure to be hiding secrets waiting to be unveiled.
translation: 当看着星星和它们在天空中勾画出的图案时，我开始思考星座。我很快将我发现的新理论说给[stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName]听，得到了对方的点头赞许。星座的背后肯定隐藏着秘密等待我们去发现。

original: I am certain of it!
translation: 我敢肯定！

original: After several hours of studying the stars, I saw it. A sphere moving slowly across the sky with a long tail behind it. I called for [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] to get [stargazing_guest.GetHerHis] attention. We both marveled at the beauty of it for a while. 'It is clearly something divine about it.' [stargazing_guest.GetFirstName] said after a moment of silence. I could only nod my head in agreement.
translation: 经过几个小时对星星的研究，我看见了它，一个球体拖着长长的尾巴慢慢地划过天际。我喊[stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName]过来以引起[stargazing_guest.GetHerHis]注意。我们都为它的美惊叹了好一会儿。「这显然是神圣的事物。」在一段沉默后，[stargazing_guest.GetFirstName]开口说道。我只能点头表示赞同。

original: It makes us seem so small.
translation: 它让我们看起来很卑微。

original: After several hours of studying the stars, we noticed a sphere moving slowly across the sky with a long tail behind it. Both me and [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName] marveled at the beauty of it. 'It is clearly something divine about it.' [stargazing_host.GetFirstName] nodded slowly in response. 'It is. But it is hardly an omen of the end times like the peasants would make you believe.'
translation: 花费几个小时研究星星后，我们注意到一个有一条长长尾巴的球体在天空中缓慢地移动。我和[stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName]都惊叹于它的魅力。「这显然是神圣的事物。」[stargazing_host.GetFirstName]缓缓点头回应。「是的，这并不是农民们认为的毁灭预兆。」

original: No it is not. But it is beautiful.
translation: 并不是。但是确实很美

original: [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] and I have been taking turns in making observations and recording everything. I cannot say that we have made any significant discoveries so far. We have made some progress, however, and learned a few things we did not know before.
translation: [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName]和我一直轮流观察和记录着一切。我不敢说我们做出了什么重大发现。但我们仍然取得了一些进展，并学习了一些我们以前不知道的事情。

original: The night is not over yet.
translation: 夜晚仍未结束。

original: We have spent hours observing the stars and trying to look for anything out of the ordinary. Neither [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] nor I has made any noticeable progress so far. With most of the night gone already, it is unlikely that we will accomplish much more.
translation: 我们花了数个小时观测星象，并试图寻找任何不寻常的事物。迄今为止，[stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName]和我都没有取得任何明显的进展。大多数夜晚已经过去了，看起来我们不太可能完成更多的事了。

original: What a disappointing night.
translation: 令人失望的一夜。

original: We have spent hours observing the stars and trying to look for anything out of the ordinary. But neither of us has been able to make any significant progress. Which is disappointing, to say the least. But I can see that my host, [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName], is more disappointed than I am. [stargazing_host.GetSheHeCap] probably had very high hopes for the night.
translation: 我们花了数个小时观测星象，并试图寻找任何不寻常的事物。但我们都没有取得任何重大进展。至少可以说，这是令人失望的。但我可以看出，作为东道主的[stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName]，比我更失望。[stargazing_host.GetSheHeCap]可能对这个夜晚抱有很高的期望。

original: So did I.
translation: 我也是。

original: The sky was filled with ominously dark clouds already when we started our observations. As the hours drags on, it is only getting worse. You cannot see anything by now! Not a single star in sight! I suppose we might as well call it a night right here...
translation: 当我们开始观察时，天上布满了不祥的乌云。随着时间的推移，情况只会越来越糟。你现在什么也看不见！一颗星星都看不到！我想我们不妨称之为「夜」……

original: Curse this weather!
translation: 该死的鬼天气！

original: After spending to night together with [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName], I feel like we have become quite close. We seem to complement each other perfectly and the both of us are having a really good time!
translation: 在和[stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName]一起度过这一晚后，我感觉我们变得十分亲密。我们两个人相处处的很愉快并且玩的很开心！

original: I have gained a new friend!
translation: 我有了一个新朋友！

original: Accepting the invitation to come here and spend the night studying with [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName] was the correct decision. I have not had this much fun talking to someone in quite a while. We seem to understand each other perfectly!
translation: 能接受邀请来到这里与[stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName]一起学习真是太好了。之前我还从来没能和其他人聊上这么久。我们似乎已经理解了彼此！

original: Thank you my friend.
translation: 谢谢你，我的朋友

original: This night seem to never end. I am wondering why I even invited [stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName] in the first place. Nothing I have done so far seem to please [stargazing_guest.GetHerHim]. Whenever I try to start a conversation to lighten the mood, [stargazing_guest.GetSheHe] only answer with an obnoxious remark.
translation: 漫漫长夜无尽期。为什么我先邀请了[stargazing_guest.GetTitledFirstName]？迄今，我所做的一切都令[stargazing_guest.GetHerHim]欢心吗？每当我试图讲话缓和气氛时，[stargazing_guest.GetSheHe]只会用一句令人讨厌的话来回复。

original: I cannot wait for you to leave...
translation: 我等不及让你离开了……

original: I should just have thrown away [stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName] invitation the moment it arrived. This night has been nothing short of horrible. Listening to [stargazing_host.GetHerHim] hurling one insult after the other. One might be thinking if that is the reason why [stargazing_host.GetSheHe] invited me here!
translation: 我本应该在[stargazing_host.GetTitledFirstName]的邀请送达的时候置之不理的。这个夜晚简直太可怕了。我听着[stargazing_host.GetHerHim]一句接一句地喷粗口。别人说不定会觉得这才是[stargazing_host.GetSheHe]邀请我来这里的真正原因！

original: I have never been so offended!
translation: 我从未被如此的冒犯过！

original: Dawn is upon us as the first light appears on the horizon. I think we can agree that the night was an immense success. We took plenty of notes and learned a thing or two. Maybe we will have an opportunity to continue our combined research in the future?
translation: 第一道曙光出现在地平线上的时候，黎明降临在我们身上。我想我们都同意夜晚的发现是一个巨大的成功。我们做了很多笔记，从中学到一二。也许将来我们有机会继续我们的联合研究？

original: An exhausting night finally ends. We worked throughout the entire night without any sort of noticeable progress at all. While it feels disappointing, I am confident that continued observations will yield superior results.
translation: 筋疲力尽的夜晚终于结束了。我们整晚都在工作，却没有任何明显进步。我虽然感到失望，但我相信持续的观察会取得更好的结果。

original: Time really do fly when you are having fun. We did not make any sort of noticeable progress in our attempted research. But the night was spent in good company, making it feel much less of a disappointment.
translation: 当你玩得开心的时候，时间飞逝而过。在实验性研究中，我们没能取得明显的进步。但是夜晚陪伴着彼此消磨时间，让人感觉没那么失望了。

original: Let us do this again sometime.
translation: 让我们改日再做一次吧。

original: Progress takes time.
translation: 进步需要时间。

original: Progress or not. I had a great time!
translation: 不论是否有进展，我都很开心！

original: Time to go home.
translation: 是时候回家了。

original: Hold a Grand Debate
translation: 举办大辩论

original: Hold a grand debate for all members of §Y[Root.Society.GetName]§! to join. Spending several days discussing and arguing in the name of knowledge and learning.
translation: 为全体§Y[Root.Society.GetName]§!成员举行一场盛大的辩论会。以知识和学问的名义花费数天时间进行探讨和辩论。

original: Send an invitation to all members of [Root.Society.GetName].
translation: 发邀请函给[Root.Society.GetName]的所有成员。

original: A Grand Debate is NOT currently in progress\n
translation: 大辩论不在进行中\n

original: A Grand Debate has NOT been held in the past 10 years\n
translation: 过去十年间没有进行过大辩论\n

original: The Grand Debate
translation: 大辩论

original: As a distinguished leader of [From.Society.GetName], [From.GetTitledFirstName] invited all members to partake in a Grand Debate.
translation: 作为[From.Society.GetName]的杰出领导人，[From.GetTitledFirstName]邀请所有成员参加大辩论。

original: Participating members will gain an increased opinion of §G5§! towards you for five years\n
translation: 参与的成员将在五年内对你增加 §G5§! 的好感\n

original: Debater
translation: 辩论者

original: This character is known to be performing very well in debates and discussions.
translation: 这个角色被公认在辩论及讨论中有着十分夺目的表现。

original: Held a Grand Debate
translation: 举办大辩论

original: Winner of a Grand Debate
translation: 大辩论的胜者

original: Held a Grand Debate
translation: 举办大辩论

original: Held Grand Debates
translation: 举行大辩论

original: As I expect many members of [Root.Society.GetName] to appear for the Grand Debate, it is of the utmost importance that everything is to be as flawless as possible. In this spirit the preparations are well underway – my staff has seen to the lodgings and the chef has stocked up the larders. All that is left now is to send out the invitations.
translation: 正如我期望[Root.Society.GetName]的许多成员出现在大辩论中一样，最重要的是，一切都要尽可能完美无瑕。本着这种精神，筹备工作正在有序进行——我的工作人员已经看过了住所，厨师将食品囤积于食品柜。现在剩下的就是发出邀请了。

original: Bring me my most trusted courier!
translation: 展示我知识最好的机会！

original: A courier just arrived carrying a letter from [FromFrom.GetSocietyRank] [FromFrom.GetFirstName]. Reading the letter, I see that it is an invitation bidding all members of [FromFrom.Society.GetName] to attend the Grand Debate.
translation: 一位信使刚刚到达并带来[FromFrom.GetSocietyRank][FromFrom.GetFirstName]的一封信。读完后我发现，这是一封邀请[FromFrom.Society.GetName]所有成员出席大辩论的邀请信。

original: A most excellent opportunity to display my knowledge!
translation: 展示我学识的绝好机会！

original: A foolish endeavor.
translation: 一个愚蠢的尝试。

original: The guest are arriving in this very moment. It is time for the grand debate to begin and spend the next few days to have each and every one display their knowledge to decide who the best of us is.
translation: 客人即将到来。是时候开始大辩论了，接下来的几天，是让每个人都展示他们的知识，以此来决定我们中的最优秀者。

original: Let the debate commence!
translation: 让辩论开始吧！

original: I have been declared the winner of the grand debate! Showing all that no one is as knowledgeable as me, or has the ability to put forth arguments quite like me.
translation: 我被宣布成为大辩论的赢家！没人能像我一样学富五车，也没人能像我一样有能力提出掷地有声的论点。

original: The sweetest of all sounds is praise.
translation: 一切声音中最甜美的声音是赞扬声。

original: Many distinguished themselves during the debates. None however, performed as well as [From.GetTitledFirstName], who has been declared the winner of the grand debate!
translation: 在辩论中许多人都表现出色。然而，没有任何一位参加者表现得像[From.GetTitledFirstName]般优秀，他已被宣布为大辩论的获胜者！

original: Well done!
translation: 做得好！

original: Congratulations are in order.
translation: 祝贺你。

original: After several days of long discussions and much debating, the grand debate is over for now. There might have been a few heated arguments, but I think most attenders would agree that it was a learning experience.
translation: 经过几天的长时间讨论和辩论，现在的大辩论结束了。虽然可能有过几次过于激烈的争论，但我认为大多数与会者都认为，这是一次难得的学习经历。

original: A most successful event!
translation: 非常成功的活动！

original: I may not have won the grand debate itself, but I have had plenty of success nonetheless. The debates allowed me to learn new ways of putting my education to good use and even how to improve upon it!
translation: 也许我没能赢得大辩论赛，但我在过程中取得了很多成绩。辩论让我学会了新方式来充分利用我之所学，甚至还有在此基础上改进它的办法！

original: The final guests just left, leaving peace and quiet behind. As I sit here and reflect upon my own contribution to the debate, I realize that I have learned new ways of putting my education to good use.
translation: 最后的客人刚刚离开，留下一室的平和静寂。当我坐着，反思我自己对辩论的贡献时，我意识到我已经学会了新方式来充分利用我的学识。

original: A triumph in my eyes.
translation: 我眼中的胜利。

original: The grand debate ends and I was not able to win. I did however, show some skillful debating during a few arguments that got applauded by the others.
translation: 大辩论结束了，而我没能赢。然而，我展示了一些技巧性的辩论，还获得了其他人们的掌声。

original: The final guests just left, leaving peace and quiet behind. As I sit here and reflect upon my own contribution to the debate, I think that I was able to show some skillful debating during a few arguments that got applauded by the others.
translation: 最后一位客人刚刚离开，留下一室平和静寂。当我坐着反思自己对辩论的贡献时，我认为我在其中一些辩论中，展现了足够获得人们掌声的技巧性辩论。

original: A noteworthy success.
translation: 一次重要的成果。

original: The grand debate ends and although I was unable to win, I learned a few things by observing the other participants.
translation: 大辩论结束了，虽然我没能赢得优胜，但我通过观察其他参与者学会了一些东西。

original: The final guests just left, leaving peace and quiet behind. As I sit here and reflect upon my own contribution to the debate, I did learn a few things by observing the other participants.
translation: 最后一位客人刚刚离开，留下了一室的平和寂静。当我坐着反思自己对辩论的贡献时，我通过观察其他参赛者学到了一些东西。

original: A worthwhile effort.
translation: 一次有价值的尝试。

original: The grand debate ends and I was unable to win. I cannot say that I learned anything during the discussions either. Study and preparation will be key for the next debate.
translation: 大辩论结束了，我没能赢得优胜。我不敢说我从讨论过程中学会了什么，只能说研究和准备是下一次辩论会的关键。

original: The final guests just left, leaving peace and quiet behind. As I sit here and reflect upon my own contribution to the debate, I realize that I have much to learn. I will have to prepare myself better for the next debate.
translation: 最后一位客人刚刚离开，留下一室平和静寂。当我坐着反思自己对辩论的贡献时，我意识到我还有很多需要学习的。我必须为下一场辩论做好充分的准备。

original: It was still time well spent.
translation: 这还是要花费时间。

original: The grand debate ends and I did not achieve anything at all. I got ridiculed for my meager efforts as I was easily outsmarted by my opponents.
translation: 大辩论赛结束了，我没能如愿以偿。我因我的不够努力而被嘲笑，因为我轻易就被对手打败了。

original: The final guests just left, leaving peace and quiet behind. As I sit here and reflect upon my own contribution to the debate, I realize that I did not achieve anything. I got ridiculed for my meager efforts as I was easily outsmarted by my opponents.
translation: 最后一位客人刚刚离开，留下一室平和静寂。当我坐着反思自己对辩论的贡献时，我认为自己没能如愿以偿。我因我的不够努力而被嘲笑，因为我轻易就被对手打败了。

original: A shameful display...
translation: 可耻的炫耀……

original: You have $VALUE|Y0$ §Y[Player.Society.GetCurrency]§!.\nThis is the currency which you can spend on the various §YPowers§! unlocked by being a member of §Y[Player.Society.GetNameCap]§!.\nYou gain §Y[Player.Society.GetCurrency]§! by completing missions, as well as on a monthly basis. The monthly gain depends on your stats and traits that are associated with the §Y[Player.Society.GetNameCap]§!.
translation: 你拥有 $VALUE|Y0$ §Y[Player.Society.GetCurrency]§!。\n这代表了你对社团的贡献，你可以消耗它从而使用各种各样的§Y力量§!，它会在你成为§Y[Player.Society.GetNameCap]§!的成员时解锁。\n你获取§Y[Player.Society.GetCurrency]§!的途径除了完成任务之外，还有每月的基础增长。月度收益取决于你与§Y[Player.Society.GetNameCap]§!相关的属性和特质。

original: Does NOT already own Magnum Opuses on all topics.\n
translation: 未拥有任意主题的巨著。\n

original: Divine Advice
translation: 上神的建言

original: This character has received advice on alchemy from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out very well!
translation: 这个角色已经从上神处得到了炼金术方面的建议。目前看来，似乎效果很好！

original: Divine Advice
translation: 上神的建言

original: This character has received advice on alchemy from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out rather well.
translation: 这个角色已经从上神处得到了炼金术方面的建议。目前看来，似乎效果不错。

original: Divine Advice
translation: 上神的建言

original: This character has received advice on alchemy from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out rather poorly.
translation: 这个角色已经从上神处得到了炼金术方面的建议。目前看来，似乎效果较差。

translation: 上神的建言

original: This character has received advice on alchemy from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out very poorly!
translation: 这个角色已经从上神处得到了炼金术方面的建议。目前看来，似乎效果很差！

translation: 上神的建言

original: This character has received advice on astrology from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out very well!

translation: 上神的建言

original: This character has received advice on astrology from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out rather well.

translation: 上神的建言

original: This character has received advice on astrology from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out rather poorly.

translation: 上神的建言

original: This character has received advice on astrology from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out very poorly!
translation: 这个角色已经从上神处得到了占星学方面的建议。目前看来，似乎效果很差！
