translation: 上神的建言

original: This character has received advice on Theurgy from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out very well!
translation: 这个角色已经从上神处得到了神通术方面的建议。目前看来，似乎效果很好！

original: Divine Advice
translation: 上神的建言

original: This character has received advice on Theurgy from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out rather well.
translation: 这个角色已经从上神处得到了神通术方面的建议。目前看来，似乎效果不错。

original: Divine Advice
translation: 上神的建言

original: This character has received advice on Theurgy from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out rather poorly.
translation: 这个角色已经从上神处得到了神通术方面的建议。目前看来，似乎效果较差。

original: Divine Advice
translation: 上神的建言

original: This character has received advice on Theurgy from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out very poorly!
translation: 这个角色已经从上神处得到了神通术方面的建议。目前看来，似乎效果很差！

original: Divine Advice
translation: 上神的建言

original: This character has received advice on decrypting hidden truths from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out very well!
translation: 这个角色已经从上神处得到了解密隐藏真相的建议。到目前为止，事情似乎进行得非常顺利！

original: Divine Advice
translation: 上神的建言

original: This character has received advice on decrypting hidden truths from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out rather well.
translation: 这个角色已经从上神处得到了解密隐藏真相的建议。到目前为止，事情似乎进行得很顺利！

original: Divine Advice
translation: 上神的建言

original: This character has received advice on decrypting hidden truths from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out rather poorly.
translation: 这个角色已经从上神处得到了解密隐藏真相的建议。到目前为止，事情似乎进行得很糟糕！

original: Divine Advice
translation: 上神的建言

original: This character has received advice on decrypting hidden truths from a divine source. So far, it seems to be working out very poorly!
translation: 这个角色已经从上神处得到了解密隐藏真相的建议。到目前为止，事情似乎进行得非常糟糕！

original: Divine Epiphany
translation: 神圣顿悟

original: This character has had an epiphany as a result of a divine ritual. Integral parts of the world, and the Truths hidden within it, suddenly seem clearer.
translation: 这个角色通过神圣仪式而获得顿悟。世界的组成部分和隐藏其中的真相，突然变得清晰起来。

original: Unworthy Hermetic
translation: 无能的赫耳墨斯会员

original: This character was unable to understand the cryptic advice given by a summoned divine being, and is therefore deemed to be an unworthy Hermetic.
translation: 这个角色无法理解上神所提供的神秘建议，被视作不称职的赫耳墨斯会员。

original: My [From.GetSisterBrother] in the Hermetic Order, [From.GetFirstName], has stepped forth with an idea for a ritual that might invoke the presence of a Divine Being. The prospect of petitioning the Divine itself for knowledge is tantalizing, and the idea was therefore received with excitement in the Order. The ritual will take place in a few weeks' time.
translation: 我在赫耳墨斯学会的[From.GetSisterBrother]，[From.GetFirstName]，提出了一个想法，一个可能唤起神性存在的仪式。向神性本身请求智慧的愿景实在是太诱人了，学会兴奋地接受了这个想法。仪式将在数周后进行。

original: My dear [GetFromRelation] and [From.GetSisterBrother] in the Hermetic Order, [From.GetFirstName], has stepped forth with an idea for a ritual that might invoke the presence of a Divine Being. The prospect of petitioning the Divine itself for knowledge is tantalizing, and the idea was therefore received with excitement by the Order. The ritual will take place in a few weeks' time.
translation: 我在赫耳墨斯学会中的亲爱的[GetFromRelation]和[From.GetSisterBrother]，[From.GetFirstName]，提出了一个想法，一个可能唤起神性存在的仪式。向神性本身请求智慧的愿景实在是太诱人了，学会兴奋地接受了这个想法。仪式将在数周后进行。

original: The secrets of the world shall be laid bare to us!
translation: 世界的奥秘将毫无保留地显露在我们面前！

original: Though, what if I am not worthy enough to understand it?
translation: 不过，要是我的能力不足以理解它会怎样？

original: What if we anger the being? We should not meddle in the divine...
translation: 要是惹怒了神会怎样？神的事情我们不该插手……

original: Summoning the Divine
translation: 召唤神灵

original: The time for the ritual has come, and your Order has congregated in a spacious room. Symbols scatter the floor as you chant your hymns. [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] has provided you all with a new, special type of incense that [From.GetSheHe] claims is necessary to make the eventual connection with the Divine Being. Before long it has permeated the air, and as you inhale more and more of it, hearing the drone of your fellows' chants, you feel your soul disconnect from your body and begin to ascend...\n\n...until it seems to connect with something. An... entity touches your soul, though you cannot perceive it with any senses other than your mind's eye. It must be the Divine Being! You have succeeded! You struggle to control your emotions, and to coalesce all your thoughts into one burning question that you pose to this being...
translation: 仪式的时间到了，人们在你的命令下聚集在一个宽敞的房间里。当你吟唱赞美诗时，符文散落在地面上。[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]为您提供了一种新的特殊类型的香，[From.GetSheHe]声称这是与神性存在进行最终联系所必要的东西。不久之后，香就渗透到空气中，当你吸入越来越多时侯，同伴们的歌声渐渐远去，你感到你的灵魂脱离了你的身体并开始上升……\n\n……直到它联系上了什么。一个……实体正在触动你的灵魂，虽然你无法通过意识的眼睛以外的东西来感知到它。这一定就是神性存在！你成功了！你努力控制自己的情绪，将你所有的念头合并成一个灼热的问题抛给这个存在……

original: Oh Divine, pray tell me of the operation of the Sun!
translation: 神啊，求你告诉我太阳的运行规律！

original: Oh Divine, pray tell me of the operation of the stars!
translation: 神啊，求你告诉我恒星的运行规律！

original: Oh Divine, pray tell me of the operation of the gods!
translation: 神啊，求你告诉我诸神的运行规律！

original: Oh Divine, pray tell me of the secrets hidden throughout the world!
translation: 神啊，求你告诉我世界各地隐藏的奥秘吧！

original: In my trance, the Divine Being tells me of great Truths that have been hidden from Man – of alchemy and astrology, of the will of the gods, of the cyphers to ancient texts, and even of things that have not yet come to pass. Once my soul returns to my body, I see the world with new eyes!
translation: 恍惚中，神性存在启示我一直对于人类隐藏的伟大真理——炼金术和占星术，诸神的旨意，密码乃至远古文本，甚至未曾发生过的事情中的伟大真理。一旦我的灵魂回到身体，我将用全新的眼光看待这个世界！

original: The Divine Being gave me a cryptic reply to my question, and for many days since the ritual I have tried to make sense of it... Yet, no matter how much time I spend on it, I cannot. Whatever the Being intended for me to know is beyond my capacity to understand – I can only conclude I simply am not worthy of its knowledge...
translation: 神性存在赐予了我对问题的神秘回应，自从仪式以来的许多天，我一直试着去理解它……然而，无论我花多少时间在上面，我都没法做到。无论这存在对我有什么启示，都超出了我的理解范围——我只能得出结论，那就是我根本不配得到这份知识……

original: The Divine Being has given me cryptic advice on the pursuit of alchemy in its many forms, but with ample time spent mulling it over afterwards, I believe I have deciphered what it meant. I look forward to putting it to good use!
translation: 神性存在给了我许多关于追求炼金术的神秘建议，花了足够多的时间仔细琢磨后，我相信我已经破译了其意义。我期待能好好利用它！

original: The Divine Being has given me cryptic advice on the pursuit of astrology in its many forms, but with ample time spent mulling it over afterwards, I believe I have deciphered what it meant. I look forward to putting it to good use!
translation: 神性存在给了我许多关于追求占星术的神秘建议，花了足够多的时间仔细琢磨后，我相信我已经破译了其意义。我期待能好好利用它！

original: The Divine Being has given me cryptic advice on the pursuit of Theurgy in its many forms, but with ample time spent mulling it over afterwards, I believe I have deciphered what it meant. I look forward to putting it to good use!
translation: 神性存在给了我许多关于追求神通术的神秘建议，花了足够多的时间仔细琢磨后，我相信我已经破译了其意义。我期待能好好利用它！

original: The Divine Being has given me cryptic advice on the decryption of hidden secrets throughout the world, but with ample time spent mulling it over afterwards, I believe I have deciphered what it meant. I look forward to putting it to good use!
translation: 神性存在给了我许多关于追求世界上隐藏奥秘的神秘建议，花了足够多的时间仔细琢磨后，我相信我已经破译了其意义。我期待能好好利用它！

original: The Divine Being has my total confidence!
translation: 神性存在信赖我！

original: It's an epiphany!
translation: 这是神显灵了！

original: Oh, the shame!
translation: 哦，多么可耻！

original: Enables §Gright-clicking§! on your own portrait in order to write an enciphered book of your knowledge. This is an artifact with potentially powerful bonuses, which only characters with high learning can decipher.
translation: 允许在你角色的头像上§G点击右键§!以写一本用密语书写的承载着你所有知识的书。这是一个具有潜在强大奖励的艺术品，只有学习高的角色才能破译。

original: a rather simplistic
translation: 相当简单的

original: an entirely average
translation: 十分平凡的

original: an excellent
translation: 杰出的

original: a truly revolutionary
translation: 颠覆性的

original: Write a Theorem Paper
translation: 撰写论文

original: Do research and write a theorem paper on a topic, before sending it out for peer review. Should it become accepted by at least 3 out of 5 peers, you will gain a reward.
translation: 研究并撰写一篇某方面主题的论文，然后交给同行评议。如果它被五位同行中的三位所认可，你就能获得奖励。

original: Has NOT recently written a theorem paper\n
translation: 最近没有写过论文\n

original: I face the daunting task of researching and writing an entire theorem paper, to be reviewed by my peers... To have it be accepted by the Order would be a great boon to me, but if the quality is found to be lacking it might be a big blow to my prestige.
translation: 我面对着一项艰巨的任务：研究并撰写一篇完整的理论论文，并交给我的同行们审阅……让它被人们赞许对我来说是一件好事，但如果被人发现品质有所欠缺，对于我的威望来说或许是一次巨大的打击。

original: I will make a decent effort.
translation: 我会适当地努力。

original: The risks and rewards may be what they are, you have neither the time nor the resources to make an extraordinaire effort, and will rely on your intelligence rather than on hard work.
translation: 风险与机遇并存，你既没有时间也没有资源供你做出非凡的努力，因此你应该更加依靠自己的智慧而不是繁重的工作。

original: I will ask help from those around me.
translation: 我会请求身边的人帮助。

original: With the help from some other bright minds you might well stand a better chance at success!
translation: 在其他聪明人的帮助下，你可能会有更高的成功几率！

original: Surely nobody would notice if I copied from some other works?
translation: 要是我抄了其他著作，一定没有人会发现吧？

original: The findings of other, brighter minds than yourself might well help the quality of your own paper.
translation: 其他更聪慧的头脑得出的研究结果也许有助于提高你的论文品质。

original: I will make an extraordinary effort! No expense shall be spared.
translation: 我将付出空前的努力！不惜任何代价。

original: You will spend extra time and resources on writing the theorem paper, even if this comes to the detriment of managing your realm. Surely this will produce a paper of high quality!
translation: 你将花费额外的时间和资源来撰写这篇论文，即使这会损害你领地的治理。当然，这将会产生高品质的论文！

original: Focusing on Theorem Paper
translation: 专注于论文

original: This character is focusing on writing a theorem paper, and is therefore unable to spend enough time actually governing.
translation: 这个角色专注于撰写论文，因此没有足够的时间来进行实际治理。

original: It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on theurgic rituals! It explores potentially new and rewarding ways of summoning divine beings, which might provide a new approach to Theurgy. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.
translation: 我写完了！我写出了关于法术仪式的[Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality]论文！文章探讨了召唤神灵的新型高回报的方法，这种方法会带来新的神通术尝试。接下来的工作就是把它交给其他赫耳墨斯学会的同僚评审了。

original: It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on ascension! It explores the concept of ascension, and new ways by which this state might be achieved, which in turn might provide a new approach to Theurgy. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.
translation: 我写完了！我写出了关于飞升的[Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality]论文！文章探讨了飞升的概念，以及实现这个状态的新方法，这反过来可能为神通术提供一种新的尝试。接下来的工作就是把它交给其他赫耳墨斯学会的同僚评审了。

original: It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the Mind of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]! It explores the Divine Truth that permeates this world, and might provide a new insight into Theurgy. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.
translation: 我写完了！我写出了关于[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]意志的[Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality]论文！文章探讨渗透到这个世界的神圣真理，并可能为神通术提供新的见解。接下来的工作就是把它交给其他赫耳墨斯学会的同僚评审了。

original: It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on hieroglyphic translation! It explores the hidden meaning in these ancient texts, which might in turn provide a new insight into Theurgy. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.
translation: 我写完了！我写出了关于象形文字破译的[Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality]论文！文章探讨了这些古文字背后的意义，可以反过来给神通术研究提供新的领悟。接下来的工作就是把它交给其他赫耳墨斯学会的同僚评审了。

original: It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on distillation! It explores new methods of the process, which might enable the creation of a variety of exciting new alchemical elixirs. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.
translation: 我写完了！我写出了关于蒸馏的[Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality]论文！文章探讨了新的操作方法，这种方法可能能够创造出各种激动人心的新炼金药剂。接下来的工作就是把它交给其他赫耳墨斯学会的同僚评审了。

original: It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on fermentation! It explores new approaches to the process, which might enable the creation of a variety of exciting new alchemical elixirs. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.
translation: 我写完了！我写出了关于发酵的[Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality]论文！文章探讨了新的操作方法，这种方法可能能够创造出各种激动人心的新炼金药剂。接下来的工作就是把它交给其他赫耳墨斯学会的同僚评审了。

original: It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the mysterious Elixir of Life! It explores the concept, both as a source for life eternal as well as a cure for all diseases, and it delves into potential methods of creating it. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.
translation: 我写完了！我写出了关于神秘仙丹的[Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality]论文！文章探讨了仙丹的概念，它既能实现长生又能祛病除灾，并且探讨了炼制它的可能方法。接下来的工作就是把它交给其他赫耳墨斯学会的同僚评审了。

original: It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the Philosopher's Stone! It explores the object, and its powers of transmuting cheap metal into gold, as well as how to create it. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.
translation: 我写完了！我写出了关于贤者之石的[Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality]论文！文章探讨了贤者之石将廉价金属转化为黄金的能力，以及人们如何制造它。接下来的工作就是把它交给其他赫耳墨斯学会的同僚评审了。

original: It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the planets! It explores astrology, in particular the movement of the planets, and what this could be interpreted as. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.
translation: 我写完了！我写出了关于行星的[Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality]论文！文章探讨了占星学，尤其是行星的运动及对此的理解。接下来的工作就是把它交给其他赫耳墨斯学会的同僚评审了。

original: It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the stars! It explores astrology, in particular the constellations, and what truths they contain. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.
translation: 我写完了！我写出了关于恒星的[Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality]论文！文章探讨了占星学，尤其是星座及其背后的真相。接下来的工作就是把它交给其他赫耳墨斯学会的同僚评审了。

original: It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the Moon! It explores astrology, and in particular the movement and importance of this heavenly body. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.
translation: 我写完了！我写出了关于月亮的[Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality]论文！文章探讨了是占星学，尤其是月亮的运动及其重要性。接下来的工作就是把它交给其他赫耳墨斯学会的同僚评审了。

original: It is finished! I have produced [Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality] paper on the Sun! It explores astrology, and in particular the movement and importance of this heavenly body. Now all that is left is to submit it to my hermetic peers, for review.
translation: 我写完了！我写出了关于太阳的[Root.GetTheoryPaperQuality]论文！文章探讨了是占星学，尤其是太阳的运动及其重要性。接下来的工作就是把它交给其他赫耳墨斯学会的同僚评审了。

original: I will send it out, at once!
translation: 我马上就把它寄出去！

original: You send out the paper and await your peers' replies. Hopefully they will be objective when they evaluate it...
translation: 你发表论文并等待同侪们的回复。希望他们能客观的评估……

original: No... It's not good enough to be published.
translation: 不……不够好，还不能发表。

original: You destroy the paper. This failure shall never see the light of day!
translation: 你销毁了论文。这样的败笔不能公之于众！

original: it is rather simplistic and not terribly impressive.
translation: 太简单了，不能够给人留下深刻印象。

original: it was a solidly average effort, but nothing more.
translation: 很平凡，并不出众。

original: it makes some very excellent and intriguing points!
translation: 提出了一些很优秀的、引人注目的观点！

original: it could well revolutionize our understanding on this topic!
translation: 将颠覆我们对这个问题的理解！

original: A few days ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] told me that [From.GetSheHe] had written a paper on theurgic rituals, and handed me a copy to review. Reading through it, it is apparent that [Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded] Do I see fit to endorse it, however?
translation: 几天前，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]告诉我[From.GetSheHe]写了一篇关于神通术仪式的论文，并递交了一份副本供审查。读过之后，很明显这篇文章[Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded]不过，我应该通过这篇文章吗？

original: A few days ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] told me that [From.GetSheHe] had written a paper on the pursuit of ascension, and handed me a copy to review. Reading through it, it is apparent that [Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded] Do I see fit to endorse it, however?
translation: 几天前，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]告诉我[From.GetSheHe]写了一篇关于飞升的论文，并递交了一份副本供审查。读过之后，很明显这篇文章[Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded]不过，我应该通过这篇文章吗？

Reading through it, it is apparent that [Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded] Do I see fit to endorse it, however?
translation: 几天前，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]告诉我[From.GetSheHe]写了一篇关于[From.Religion.GetHighGodName]意志的论文，并递交了一份副本供审查。读过之后，很明显这篇文章[Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded]不过，我应该通过这篇文章吗？

translation: 几天前，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]告诉我[From.GetSheHe]写了一篇关于象形文字翻译的论文，并递交了一份副本供审查。读过之后，很明显这篇文章[Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded]不过，我应该通过这篇文章吗？

translation: 几天前，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]告诉我[From.GetSheHe]写了一篇关于发酵的论文，并递交了一份副本供审查。读过之后，很明显这篇文章[Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded]不过，我应该通过这篇文章吗？

original: A few days ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] told me that [From.GetSheHe] had written a paper on the Elixir of Life, and handed me a copy to review. Reading through it, it is apparent that [Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded] Do I see fit to endorse it, however?
translation: 几天前，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]告诉我[From.GetSheHe]写了一篇关于仙丹的论文，并递交了一份副本供审查。读过之后，很明显这篇文章[Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded]不过，我应该通过这篇文章吗？

original: A few days ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] told me that [From.GetSheHe] had written a paper on the Philosopher's Stone, and handed me a copy to review. Reading through it, it is apparent that [Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded] Do I see fit to endorse it, however?
translation: 几天前，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]告诉我[From.GetSheHe]写了一篇关于贤者之石的论文，并递交了一份副本供审查。读过之后，很明显这篇文章[Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded]不过，我应该通过这篇文章吗？

original: A few days ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] told me that [From.GetSheHe] had written a paper on the importance of the planets, and handed me a copy to review. Reading through it, it is apparent that [Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded] Do I see fit to endorse it, however?
translation: 几天前，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]告诉我[From.GetSheHe]写了一篇关于行星重要性的论文，并递交了一份副本供审查。读过之后，很明显这篇文章[Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded]不过，我应该通过这篇文章吗？

original: A few days ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] told me that [From.GetSheHe] had written a paper on the meaning hidden in the stars, and handed me a copy to review. Reading through it, it is apparent that [Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded] Do I see fit to endorse it, however?
translation: 几天前，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]告诉我[From.GetSheHe]写了一篇关于恒星隐秘意义的论文，并递交了一份副本供审查。读过之后，很明显这篇文章[Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded]不过，我应该通过这篇文章吗？

original: A few days ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] told me that [From.GetSheHe] had written a paper on the astrological importance of the Moon, and handed me a copy to review. Reading through it, it is apparent that [Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded] Do I see fit to endorse it, however?
translation: 几天前，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]告诉我[From.GetSheHe]写了一篇关于月亮在占星学中重要性的论文，并递交了一份副本供审查。读过之后，很明显这篇文章[Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded]不过，我应该通过这篇文章吗？

original: A few days ago, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] told me that [From.GetSheHe] had written a paper on the astrological importance of the Sun, and handed me a copy to review. Reading through it, it is apparent that [Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded] Do I see fit to endorse it, however?
translation: 几天前，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]告诉我[From.GetSheHe]写了一篇关于太阳在占星术中的重要性的论文，并交给我一份副本以供评论。读过之后，很明显这篇文章[Root.GetTheoryPaperQualityExpanded]不过，我应该通过这篇文章吗？

original: Yes, I endorse it!
translation: 是，我赞同！

original: Send word to §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! that you endorse [From.GetHerHis] paper.
translation: 告诉§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!你认可[From.GetHerHis]论文。

original: No, it shall not have my endorsement.
translation: 不，它不会得到我的认可。

original: Send word to §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! that you refute [From.GetHerHis] paper.
translation: 告诉§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!你反驳[From.GetHerHis]论文。

original: This paper has been blatantly plagiarized!
translation: 这篇论文被无耻地抄袭了！

original: You spread the word of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!'s plagiarism throughout the Order, shaming [From.GetHerHim]. [From.GetSheHeCap] will not be pleased!
translation: 你在教团中公布了§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!的抄袭行为，羞辱了[From.GetHerHim]。[From.GetSheHeCap]不会高兴的！

original:
Esteemed [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Having spent ample time considering your paper's worth, I have decided to endorse your work before the Order. I hope that it shall speedily be added to our library. Well done!

Respectful greetings,
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
尊敬的[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

我花了足够的时间考量您论文的价值，决定在教团中认可您的工作。我希望它能够很快被收入我们的图书馆。干得好！

尊敬的问候，
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original:
Esteemed [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

Having spent ample time considering your paper's worth, I have decided NOT to endorse your work before the Order. In my view, the quality of the work was unfortunately not in keeping with the standards of our library.

Respectful greetings,
Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]
translation:
尊敬的[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

我花了充足的时间考察你的论文的价值，决定依照规定不通过你的作品。在我看来，你的作品品质不符合我们图书馆的标准。

诚挚的问候，
此致，[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]

original: How dare [From.GetSheHe]! "Not good enough"?!
translation: [From.GetSheHe]竟敢说「不够好」？！

original: Success! Enough peers have endorsed my paper, and so the Order has accepted it into its library. As a result, my standing with the Order has increased measurably.
translation: 成功！已经有足够的同行都认可我的论文，教团已将其收入图书馆。因此，我在教团中的地位有了显著提高。

original: Failure... The majority of the peers refuted my paper, and so it shall not be added to the Order's library. This is a humiliating blow, and it will take some time to recover my previous standing with the Order.
translation: 失败……大多数同行反对我的论文，所以教团不会将它收入图书馆中。这是一个令人羞辱的打击，需要一些时间才能恢复我以前在教团的地位。

original: I possess a great mind...
translation: 我拥有了伟大的智慧……

original: Published a Theorem Paper
translation: 已发表论文

original: This character has successfully published a theorem paper.
translation: 此人已经成功发表论文。

original: But... It was good!
translation: 可是……这明明很不错！

original: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]'s paper that I endorsed recently has now been approved for publishing.
translation: 我最近支持的[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]的论文现在已被批准出版。

original: [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName]'s paper that I endorsed recently has unfortunately not been approved for publishing...
translation: 我最近支持的[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]的论文很可惜没有被批准出版……

original: Wonderful news!
translation: 好消息！

original: How did the others not recognize [From.GetHerHis] brilliance?
translation: 怎么会有人不认可[From.GetHerHis]才华？

original: Drat! That nosy [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetFirstName] has somehow discovered that I borrowed elements from other authors... [From.GetSheHeCap] has already spread the word, slandering me before the Order and ensuring my paper will never be accepted.
translation: 讨厌鬼！那个长嘴的[From.GetSocietyRank][From.GetFirstName]不知怎么发现了我从其他作者那里「借来」的内容……[From.GetSheHeCap]已经散播了这个消息，在我的教团中诽谤我，并确保了我的论文永远不会被接受。

original: Known Plagiarizer
translation: 已知的抄袭者

original: Refuted my Paper
translation: 驳斥我的论文

original: Wrote Unsatisfactory Paper
translation: 发表过不令人满意的论文

original: Begin writing a theorem paper.
translation: 开始写论文。

original: receives a copy of your theorem paper.
translation: 收到你的论文的一份抄本。

original: Endorsed Successful Paper
translation: 赞同成功论文

original: This character endorsed a theorem paper that was later published.
translation: 此人赞同了一篇论文，该论文后来被发表。

original: Cursed Diamond
translation: 被诅咒的钻石

original: A beautiful and glorious diamond of legendary proportions, its owner seems to be continuously plagued by a ceaseless series of unfortunate events.
translation: 一个美丽璀璨的拥有传说般分割比例的钻石。它的主人似乎不断地被一系列不幸的事所困扰。

original: Cursed Diamond Crown
translation: 被诅咒的钻石王冠

original: A beautiful crown encrusted with a huge and glorious diamond. Its owner seems to be continuously plagued by a ceaseless series of unfortunate events.
translation: 美丽的冠冕上镶嵌着一颗巨大而光彩夺目的钻石。它的主人似乎不断地被一系列不幸的事所困扰。

original: Many years of my life have been spent dedicated to [This.Society.GetName] – performing missions and tasks in the interests of the Order and its [Root.GetSocietyRank]. Today all that effort has been rewarded, as I have become the new [Root.GetSocietyRank]. My fellows now look to me for leadership and guidance!
translation: 我一生中许多年的时间都奉献给[This.Society.GetName]——为修会的利益及其[Root.GetSocietyRank]执行任务和工作。今天，所有这些努力都得到了回报，因为我已经成为新的[Root.GetSocietyRank]。我的兄弟们现在期待我的领导和指导！

original: And leadership and guidance I shall provide...
translation: 我应该提供领导和指引……

original: Does NOT have an active higher quality Magnum Opus on the same topic.\n
translation: 未拥有同一主题下品质更高的激活的巨著。\n

original: Silver Staff
translation: 银杖

original: This silver staff is covered in the most intricate engravings.
translation: 这把银杖上有着十分精细的雕刻。

original: The gem-encrusted and richly-decorated leather banner of Persia. Legend has that it was made from the spear and apron of the heroic blacksmith Kaveh.
translation: 波斯的宝石镶嵌、装饰华丽的皮革旗帜。传说它是由英雄铁匠卡瓦的矛和围裙组成的。

original: This diamond, of unseen proportions, has an origin shrouded in mystery. It has been part of many royal treasuries, and it is claimed to be the cause of both the rise and sudden fall of entire dynasties.
translation: 这颗钻石，有着世人从未见过的切工，其起源笼罩在神秘的面纱之中。它曾是许多皇室国库里的珍宝，据称它是许多朝代崛起和突然崩溃的原因。

original: The Danda is the scepter by which Krishna steers his herd of cows – it is the handle of the Chatri, or royal umbrella, and it is the foremost symbol of kingship. This particular Danda is unusually ancient and elaborate.
translation: 檀陀是奎师那用来掌管他牛群的权杖。它是华盖之柄，是王家之幢，是王权最为重要的象征。这个檀陀罕见而古老且制作精良。

original: Said to have been written by Hermes Trismegistus himself, the Emerald Tablet supposedly holds the secret to the prima materia and its transmutation. Succeeding in deciphering its divine glyphs brings one a step closer to enlightenment and life eternal.
translation: 翠玉录，据称是由赫耳墨斯·特里斯墨吉斯忒斯本人所撰写，据说其中包含了原初物质及其质变的秘密。成功破译这神圣的符号使人向启示和永生更进一步。

original: As my troops ransacked the [target_title.GetHolding] of [target_title.GetName], they uncovered an interesting relic that [original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName] had hidden away there!
translation: 当我的部队洗劫了[target_title.GetName]的[target_title.GetHolding]时，他们发现了一个[original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName]隐藏在那里的有趣遗物！

original: As my troops ransacked the [target_title.GetHolding] of [target_title.GetName], they uncovered a strange item that [original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName] had hidden away there. It seems to have been of some value to the [original_item_owner.GetManWoman].
translation: 当我的部队洗劫了[target_title.GetName]的[target_title.GetHolding]时，他们发现了一个[original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName]隐藏在那里的奇怪物件。似乎这对他有些价值。

original: As my troops ransacked the [target_title.GetHolding] of [target_title.GetName], they uncovered a relic of great importance that [original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName] had hidden away there!
translation: 当我的部队洗劫了[target_title.GetName]的[target_title.GetHolding]时，他们发现了一个[original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName]隐藏在那里的重要遗物！

original: As my troops ransacked the [target_title.GetHolding] of [target_title.GetName], they uncovered an imitation relic that [original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName] had hidden away there! As an obvious and shoddy forgery, I promptly had it destroyed.
translation: 当我的部队洗劫了[target_title.GetName]的[target_title.GetHolding]时，他们发现了一个[original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName]隐藏在那里的赝品遗物！这么明显的伪劣伪造品，我马上就把它摧毁了。

original: As my troops ransacked the [target_title.GetHolding] of [target_title.GetName], they uncovered a venerated object of some sort that [original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName] had hidden away there. It seems to have been of great importance to the defenders.
translation: 当我的部队洗劫了[target_title.GetName]的[target_title.GetHolding]时，他们发现了一个[original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName]隐藏在那里的某种供品。这似乎对防御方非常重要。

original: As my troops ransacked the [target_title.GetHolding] of [target_title.GetName], they uncovered and destroyed a venerated object of some sort that [original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName] had hidden away there. It seems to have been of great importance to the defenders.
translation: 当我的部队洗劫了[target_title.GetName]的[target_title.GetHolding]时，他们发现并毁坏一个[original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName]隐藏在那里的某种供品。这似乎对防御方非常重要。

original: As my troops ransacked the [target_title.GetHolding] of [target_title.GetName], they uncovered an artifact of enormous importance that [original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName] had hidden away there!
translation: 当我的部队洗劫了[target_title.GetName]的[target_title.GetHolding]时，他们发现了一个[original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName]隐藏在那里的非常重要的宝物！

original: As my troops ransacked the [target_title.GetHolding] of [target_title.GetName], they uncovered that [original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName] had hidden away an imitation of one of my artifacts there! As an obvious and shoddy forgery, I promptly had it destroyed.
translation: 当我的部队洗劫了[target_title.GetName]的[target_title.GetHolding]时，他们发现了一个[original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName]隐藏在那里的我自己宝物的赝品！这么明显的伪劣伪造品，我马上就把它摧毁了。

original: As my troops ransacked the [target_title.GetHolding] of [target_title.GetName], they uncovered a holy relic of some sort that [original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName] had hidden away there. It seems to have been of enormous importance to the defenders, for scores of them died defending it...
translation: 当我的部队洗劫了[target_title.GetName]的[target_title.GetHolding]时，他们发现了一个[original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName]隐藏在那里的圣物。这对防御方来说似乎非常重要，因为他们中的数十人守卫它至死……

original: As my troops ransacked the [target_title.GetHolding] of [target_title.GetName], they uncovered and destroyed a holy relic of some sort that [original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName] had hidden away there. It seems to have been of enormous importance to the defenders, for scores of them died defending it...
translation: 当我的部队洗劫了[target_title.GetName]的[target_title.GetHolding]时，他们发现并毁坏了一个[original_item_owner.GetTitledFirstName]隐藏在那里的圣物。这对防御方来说似乎非常重要，因为他们中的数十人守卫它至死……

original: warfare
translation: 战争

original: prosperity
translation: 繁荣

original: I have discovered proof that [suspected_society_member.GetBestName] is a member of [suspected_society_member.Society.GetName]. [Root.Liege.GetName] must be told right away!
translation: 我发现了[suspected_society_member.GetBestName]是[suspected_society_member.Society.GetName]其中一员的证据。必须马上禀报[Root.Liege.GetName]！

original: Inform the [Root.Liege.GetTitle]!
translation: 禀报[Root.Liege.GetTitle]！

original: My [Root.GetChancellorName], [Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal], has improved relations with §Y[statecraft_target.GetBestName]§W.
translation: 我的[Root.GetChancellorName]，[Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledFirstNameNoRegnal]，已经提升了我们与§Y[statecraft_target.GetBestName]§W的关系。

original: Faith
translation: 信仰

original: Zeal
translation: 狂热

original: Known to worship evil
translation: 恶魔崇拜者身份暴露

original: This character is known to worship evil forces.
translation: 此人是已知的邪恶力量崇拜者。

original: [Root.Liege.GetName] has ordered [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] [Root.Liege.GetMyLordSpiritualName], [Root.Liege.job_spiritual.GetTitledName], to hunt down the secret societies in [Root.Liege.GetHerHis] realm.
translation: [Root.Liege.GetName]命令[Root.Liege.GetHerHis][Root.Liege.GetMyLordSpiritualName]，[Root.Liege.job_spiritual.GetTitledName]去搜捕[Root.Liege.GetHerHis]领地内的秘密社团。

original: Give a devilish grin
translation: 魔鬼般地抿嘴一笑

original: Who could resist?
translation: 谁能抵挡？

original: Known Assassin
translation: 已暴露身份的刺客

original: This character is known to be a member of the Assassins.
translation: 这个角色是阿萨辛的一员。

original: Under Suspicion
translation: 可疑

original: This character is suspected to be part of a secret society.
translation: 这个角色被认为加入了秘密社团

original: Highly Suspicious
translation: 相当可疑

original: This character is almost certainly a member of a secret society!
translation: 此人几乎可以确定是个秘密社团的成员！

original: It could be that I am using the powers of [Root.Society.GetName] too freely, people are becoming suspicious.
translation: 可能是由于我太过频繁地使用[Root.Society.GetName]的力量，人民已经开始猜疑起来了。

original: But I enjoy them so.
translation: 但是我就喜欢他们这样。

original: The Angas Sutras
translation: 安伽经

original: Has the quest §YEvoke the Sympathy of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!\n
translation: 有任务§Y唤起[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的同情§!\n

original: Induct Child Into the [From.TrueReligion.GetName] Faith
translation: 引导儿童信仰[From.TrueReligion.GetName]

original: One of my [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] fellows, [society_character.GetTitledFirstName], has expressed worry that the stress of keeping my true faith hidden is getting to me. [society_character.GetSheHeCap] is suggesting that an incognito evening at a local tavern would do me good, away from the prying eyes of the court.
translation: 我的一位[Root.TrueReligion.GetName]同道，[society_character.GetTitledFirstName]，担心我隐藏真实信仰会让我感到紧张不安。[society_character.GetSheHeCap]提议，在当地小酒馆的隐匿夜晚会让我感觉很好，远离宫廷的窥视。

original: [society_character.GetSocietyRank] [society_character.GetFirstName] was entirely right that I needed to get away from court, but there is no denying that we got carried away at the tavern. When our [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] leanings became a bit too clear, a local rough suddenly rose from his seat and staggered with raised fists towards [society_character.GetFirstName]. "You'll pay for your heretical words!"
translation: [society_character.GetSocietyRank][society_character.GetFirstName]是对的，我必须离开宫廷，然而我们在酒馆无疑是太过得意忘形了。当我们对[Root.TrueReligion.GetName]的信仰太过明显时，一个当地暴徒突然从座位上站了起来，惊惧地冲[society_character.GetFirstName]举起拳头。「异端！你将为你的言行付出代价！」

original: The smith I hired has unfortunately died before finishing my order. It won't be easy to find another smith of similar skill... Luckily it seems not all the money I paid had yet been spent, and so I was able to recover a sizeable portion of my investment.
translation: 我雇佣的铁匠在完成我的订单前不幸死了。想要找到有相近水平的铁匠不太容易……不过好在付给铁匠的钱没被全部花掉，所以我收回了相当一部分投资。

original: But the amount I lost is also sizeable.
translation: 不过我的损失也相当大。

original: At least it was not a total loss.
translation: 至少这并不是彻底的失败。

original: Thankfully I didn't lose too much.
translation: 幸亏没对我造成多大损失。

original: Threatened Me
translation: 威胁过我

original: Must not be the leader of §Y[Root.Society.GetNameCap]§!\n
translation: 不得成为§Y[Root.Society.GetNameCap]§!的领导者\n

original: §Y[Root.Society.GetNameCap]§! must allow multiple characters to hold the next rank\n
translation: §Y[Root.Society.GetNameCap]§!必须允许多个角色持有下一位阶\n

original: Enables §Gright-clicking§! the portrait of a female follower of [Root.GetDWDevil], in order to summon a [Root.GetDWDemon] who can father an unholy child. This can be used on yourself, or on others if they are a mission target.
translation: 允许§G右键点击§!女性[Root.GetDWDevil]成员的头像，召唤[Root.GetDWDemon]使她受孕。这个选项可以由女性领主对自己使用，男性领主只能对特定任务对象使用。

original: Orthodox Christian
translation: 东正教徒

original: Jew
translation: 犹太教

original: Norse follower
translation: 诺斯多神教信徒

original: Suomenusko follower
translation: 索米多神教信徒

original: Zunist
translation: 尊日神教信徒

original: Enables the decision to take hashish from §YThe Assassins§! in exchange for §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!, in order to receive helpful visions. This may negatively impact your health.
translation: 允许通过决议花费§Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!从§Y阿萨辛§!处吸食大麻来接收一些有助益的幻象。这可能对你的健康有害。

original: [GetSocietyLeaderDesc]
translation: [GetSocietyLeaderDesc]

original: [steward.GetBestName] is only acting in accordance to [steward.GetHerHis] religion.
translation: [steward.GetBestName]只是根据[steward.GetHerHis]宗教信仰采取行动。

original: Has waited three months since previous recruitment\n
translation: 上次招募以来已经等待三个月\n

original: Enables the decision to write a theorem paper and have it be reviewed by fellow members of the Hermetics. If it is accepted, you gain §Y[From.Society.GetCurrency]§!.\n
translation: 允许通过决议撰写一篇论文并交给赫耳墨斯学会的成员们评议。如果被认可，你可得到§Y[From.Society.GetCurrency]§!。\n

original: Rome, for centuries the center of Christendom, is in Fraticelli hands. This has given me an opportunity to create a Fraticelli Papacy, which shall do away with the scandalous display of wealth that the Catholic Papacy has long been guilty of.
translation: 罗马，数世纪以来基督教世界的中心，已经在小兄弟会手中。因此我有机会创建小兄弟会教座头衔，从而终结天主教廷长期的罪恶的炫富行为。

original: Rome, for centuries the center of Christendom, is in Fraticelli hands. [From.GetTitledFirstName] has therefore seen fit to create a Fraticelly Papacy, claiming it shall do away with the scandalous display of wealth that the Catholic Papacy has long been guilty of.
translation: 罗马，数世纪以来基督教世界的中心，已经在小兄弟会手中。因此[From.GetTitledFirstName]认为应该创建小兄弟会教座头衔，作为终结天主教廷长期的罪恶的炫富行为的见证。

original: As the great city of Constantinople is in Iconoclast hands, I have taken this chance to create the Iconoclast Patriarchate so that it may do away with the heretical idolatry the Ecumenical Patriarchate has long been guilty of. The new Iconoclast Patriarch shall soon take up his abode in the offices historically occupied by his Ecumenical predecessors.
translation: 由于伟大的君士坦丁堡在圣像破坏派手中，我利用这个机会创建圣像破坏派牧首头衔，宣称他将终结普世牧首长期的罪恶的异端偶像崇拜。新的圣像破坏派牧首即将在历史上普世牧首办公的处所宣誓就任。

original: As the great city of Constantinople is in Iconoclast hands, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has taken this chance to create the Iconoclast Patriarchate, claiming it shall do away with the heretical idolatry the Ecumenical Patriarchate has long been guilty of. The new Iconoclast Patriarch shall soon take up his abode in the offices historically occupied by his Ecumenical predecessors.
translation: 由于伟大的君士坦丁堡在圣像破坏派手中，[From.GetTitledFirstName]可以利用这个机会创建圣像破坏派牧首头衔，宣称他将终结普世牧首长期的罪恶的异端偶像崇拜。新的圣像破坏派牧首即将在历史上普世牧首办公的处所宣誓就任。

original: I have granted Rome to its rightful ruler, so that the Fraticelli Pope may lead his Church from accommodations befitting his stature. The Pope shall soon take up his abode in the offices historically occupied by his Catholic predecessors.
translation: 我已将罗马授予其合法的统治者，以便小兄弟会教宗可以在符合他身份的场所领导他的教会。教宗即将在历史上天主教教宗办公的处所宣誓就任。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has granted Rome to its rightful ruler, so that the Fraticelli Pope may lead his Church from accommodations befitting his stature. The Pope shall soon take up his abode in the offices historically occupied by his Catholic predecessors.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]已将罗马授予其合法统治者，使得小兄弟会教宗能在与其声望相符的住所领导教会。教宗即将在历史上天主教教宗办公的处所宣誓就任。

original: The Hagia Sofia, for centuries the center of Orthodox Christendom, is now back in Orthodox hands. I have granted the cathedral back to its rightful ruler, so that the Ecumenical Patriarch may once again lead the Patriarchate from accommodations befitting his stature. The Ecumenical Patriarch shall soon take up his abode in the offices historically occupied by his predecessors.
translation: 圣索菲亚大教堂，数世纪以来东正教的中心，现已回到正教徒手中。我将教堂授予其合法统治者，使得普世牧首能够重新回到与其声望相符的住所领导全世界教徒。他即将正式入驻历任牧首办公的处所。

original: The Hagia Sofia, for centuries the center of Orthodox Christendom, is now back in Orthodox hands. [From.GetTitledFirstName] has granted the cathedral back to its rightful ruler, so that the Ecumenical Patriarch may once again lead the Patriarchate from accommodations befitting his stature. The Ecumenical Patriarch shall soon take up his abode in the offices historically occupied by his predecessors.
translation: 圣索菲亚大教堂，数世纪以来东正教的中心，现已回到正教徒手中。[From.GetTitledFirstName]已经将教堂授予其合法统治者，使得普世牧首能够重新回到与其声望相符的住所领导全世界教徒。他即将正式入驻历任牧首办公的处所。

original: Ingredient: Hibiscus
translation: 原料：木槿花

original: Hibiscus is a potent ingredient for alchemical recipes.
translation: 木槿花是炼金配方中的有效成分。

original: Devout Leader
translation: 虔诚的领袖

original: This character has valiantly led a following of faithful through hardship and oppression.
translation: 这个角色曾英勇地领导他忠诚的追随者穿越苦难与压迫。

original: The Hermetic Society
translation: 赫耳墨斯学会

original: Has [Root.Society.GetCurrencyName] greater or equal to §Y300§!
translation: 拥有不少于 §Y300§! [Root.Society.GetCurrencyName]

original: NOT currently developing a community in this province
translation: 目前不在该省份发展信徒团体

original: §Y$WHERE$§! gets '§Y$WHAT$§!'.
translation: §Y$WHERE$§!得到「§Y$WHAT$§!」。

original: §Y$WHERE$§! gets '§Y$WHAT$§!' until §Y$DATE$§!.
translation: §Y$WHERE$§!获得「§Y$WHAT$§!」直到 §Y$DATE$§!。

original: Society Member
translation: 社团成员

original: Society Member
translation: 社团成员

original: In order to make sure that the oppression of [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] followers comes to an end, I have decided to take action. I will focus my efforts on organizing my fellow believers, so that we in time, when we are too many to be ignored, can express our faith without any fear of repercussions!
translation: 为了确保对[Root.TrueReligion.GetName]追随者的压迫终结，我决定采取行动。我会集中力量组织我的信徒以壮大声势，形成不容忽视的力量，当我们表达我们的信仰时不用担心后果！

original: When the time is right we will proclaim our faith!
translation: 时机成熟时我们将公开自己的信仰！

original: Even though I am now publicly proclaiming the greatness of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], I will still hold my [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] ideals in my heart.
translation: 虽然我现在公开表示我对[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的虔诚，但是我依旧将秘密坚持我对[Root.TrueReligion.GetName]的信仰。

original: Praise [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]!
translation: 赞美[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]！

original: [From.GetName] has fallen out of favor and no longer has any members. I have therefore decided to become the new founder and leader of this Society.
translation: [From.GetName]已经失宠，不再拥有任何成员。因此，我决定成为这个社团的新创始人和领导者。

original: It will be glorious!
translation: 太好了！

original: No, this is not what I had in mind.
translation: 不，这不是我的初衷。

original: You call upon your apprentice to accompany you in a venture to gather ingredients with alchemical properties.\n
translation: 你召集了你的学徒，陪同你踏上搜集炼金相关原料的冒险道路。\n

original: Angas Sutras
translation: 安伽经

original: Councilor: Hunt Apostates
translation: 内阁成员：搜捕叛教者

original: Councilor: Statecraft
translation: 内阁成员：治理封地

original: Councilor: Organize Army
translation: 内阁成员：组织军队

original: No building under construction in $HOLDING|Y$
translation: 在$HOLDING|Y$没有在建的建筑

original: Has a building under construction in $HOLDING|Y$
translation: 在$HOLDING|Y$有在建的建筑

original: Does not have $BUILDING|Y$ under construction in $HOLDING|Y$
translation: 在$HOLDING|Y$没有在建的$BUILDING|Y$

original: Has $BUILDING|Y$ under construction in $HOLDING|Y$
translation: 在$HOLDING|Y$有在建的$BUILDING|Y$

original: The spies I ordered to watch over [secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName] have brought me some disappointing news. As far as they have been able to determine, [secret_religion_inductee.GetFirstName] has not read the [Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName] I left [secret_religion_inductee.GetHerHim]. They suspect [secret_religion_inductee.GetSheHe] has gotten rid of the holy text.
translation: 那些我命令去监视[secret_religion_inductee.GetTitledFirstName]的眼线，带给了我一些令人失望的消息。就目前他们所能确定的，[secret_religion_inductee.GetFirstName]并没有阅读我留给[secret_religion_inductee.GetHerHim]的[Root.SecretReligion.GetScriptureName]。他们怀疑[secret_religion_inductee.GetSheHe]已经抛弃了这些神圣的文字。

original:
As-salaam alaykum, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [Root.GetFirstName],

I have decided to grant your request for a loan. I trust that you pay the sum back within a reasonable time and as soon as you are able.

Praise be to Allah!
Signed, Grand Master [grand_master.GetFirstName]
translation:
愿平安常伴你，[Root.GetSocietyRank][Root.GetFirstName]，

我决定批准你的贷款请求。我相信你会在合理的时间内尽快支付这笔款项。

赞美安拉！
此致，大长老[grand_master.GetFirstName]

original: You steal a great hermetic text. It will be added to your treasury.\n
translation: 你偷到了一份重要的赫耳墨斯文献。将添加到你的宝库。\n

original: You steal a hermetic ingredient. It will be added to your treasury.\n
translation: 你偷到了一种炼金原料。将添加到你的宝库。\n

original: While carrying out [From.GetHerHis] tasks for the Assassins, §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has become proficient in the skills of blackmail and intimidation. [From.GetSheHeCap] can attempt to use [From.GetHerHis] experience to scare §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! in order to get a favor on [From.GetHerHim].
translation: 在为阿萨辛执行[From.GetHerHis]任务时，§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!已经熟练掌握了勒索和恐吓的技巧。[From.GetSheHeCap]可以利用[From.GetHerHis]经验恐吓§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!以便对方欠[From.GetHerHim]人情。

original: When I met [From.GetTitledFirstName] the other day, I inquired about [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetMatterOfImportance]. [From.GetSheHeCap] certainly seemed to notice my veiled threat, but [From.GetHerHis] reaction was not what I expected. [From.GetFirstName] laughed right into my face!
translation: 前几天遇到[From.GetTitledFirstName]时，我询问了[From.GetHerHis][From.GetMatterOfImportance]。当然[From.GetSheHeCap]似乎注意到了我含蓄的威胁，但[From.GetHerHis]反应并非是我所期望的。[From.GetFirstName]当着我的面大笑出来！

original: failing to scare §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!\n
translation: 未能恐吓§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!\n

original: §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! becomes Zunist.\n
translation: §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§!成为尊日神教信徒。\n

original: My target, the despicable [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], has died at my hands. [FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] got the end that [FromFrom.GetSheHe] deserved. The Grand Master will be pleased.
translation: 我的目标，卑鄙的[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]已经死在了我的手中。[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]得到了[FromFrom.GetSheHe]应得的结果。大团长会很高兴的。

original: dealing with vice by practicing it moderately without getting noticed.\n
translation: 通过适度地践行恶习而不引人注意，以应对你的恶习。\n

original: attempting to practice the vice moderately, but it is not quite enough to restore focus.
translation: 尝试去适度地实践恶习，但这不足以恢复注意力。

original: overcoming the vice for good.\n
translation: 永久克服恶习。\n

original: There are others in the realm sympathetic to the struggles of [Root.Society.GetName]
translation: 国内还有其他赞成[Root.Society.GetName]的斗争活动的人。

original: All sympathizers of the true faith will be encouraged to openly express their beliefs\nAfter this [Root.Society.GetName] will be no more, and you will no longer be able to recruit secret sympathizers
translation: 鼓励所有拥有真正信仰的追随者公开表达他们的信仰，\n在[Root.Society.GetName]不复存在之后，你将无法再继续招募秘密追随者。

original: You will keep studying the stars, increasing your chances of successfully finishing your mission.\n
translation: 你继续研究星象，增加了成功完成任务的概率。\n

original: You are satisfied with your progress and will conclude your research, letting your mission come to an end.\n
translation: 你对现状很满意，打算结束研究，任务告终。\n

original: At long last, we reap the rewards of our hard work. Any fellow [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] willing shall join me in this victory, as I find peace and prosperity in revealing the struggle which has been going on in our lands.
translation: 最后，我们收割了那浇灌我们汗水的果实。所有追随[Root.TrueReligion.GetName]的同伴都应当与我一同见证这场胜利，这场战争将会为我们的土地带来和平与繁荣。

original: A new era begins.
translation: 一个新时代开始了。

original: All your fellow followers of [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName], within your realm, will convert to your true religion, while others will be offered the choice to follow suit!\n
translation: 你领域内的所有[Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName]追随者伙伴都将转化为你的真正宗教信仰，而其他人则可以选择是否追随！\n

original: §Ysignificantly increasing§! the progress of your mission, by you remembering the perfect line\n
translation: 你§Y显著增加§!了任务进度，由于你能背出一句绝妙的文段\n

original: §Ydecreasing§! the progress of your mission, by you failing to remember a good line\n
translation: 你§Y减少§!了任务进度，由于你背不出一句好文段\n

original: §Yincreasing§! the progress of your mission, by you successfully intimidating §Y[stubborn_courtier.GetTitledName]§!\n
translation: 你§Y增加§!了任务进度，由于你成功恐吓了§Y[stubborn_courtier.GetTitledName]§!\n

original: §Ysignificantly decreasing§! the progress of your mission, by you failing to intimidate §Y[stubborn_courtier.GetTitledName]§!\n
translation: 由于你未能恐吓§Y[stubborn_courtier.GetTitledName]§!，任务进度§Y显著减少§!了\n

original: You slip a pouch of money into [stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis] hand, not affecting the progress of your mission.\n
translation: 你把一袋钱塞到[stubborn_courtier.GetHerHis]手里，不影响任务进度。\n

original: You §Ysignificantly increase§! the progress of your mission, as §Y[stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName]§! is humbled and impressed by your words.\n
translation: 你§Y显著增加§!了任务进度，因为§Y[stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName]§!很谦卑而被你的话打动。\n

original: You §Ydecrease§! the progress of your mission, as §Y[stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName]§! is unimpressed by you.\n
translation: 你§Y减少§!了任务进度，由于§Y[stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName]§!并没有被你说服。\n

original: You §Yincrease§! the progress of your mission, as §Y[stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName]§! will stop spreading rumors.\n
translation: 你§Y增加§!了任务进度，由于§Y[stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName]§!不再散布谣言。\n

original: You §Ysignificantly decrease§! the progress of your mission, as §Y[stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName]§! refuses to be intimidated.\n
translation: 你§Y显著减少§!了任务进度，由于§Y[stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName]§!没有受到恐吓。\n

original: §Ysignificantly increasing§! the progress of your mission\n
translation: §Y显著增加§!你的任务进度\n

original: §Ydecreasing§! the progress of your mission\n
translation: §Y减少§!你的任务进度\n

original: §Yincreasing§! the progress of your mission\n
translation: §Y增加§!你的任务进度\n

original: §Ysignificantly decreasing§! the progress of your mission\n
translation: §Y显著减少§!你的任务进度\n

original: You distract §Y[concerned_friend.GetTitledFirstName]§! by changing the subject completely, not affecting the progress of your mission.\n
translation: 你完全岔开话题，转移了§Y[concerned_friend.GetTitledFirstName]§!的注意，不影响任务进度。\n

original: You §Ysignificantly increase§! the progress of your mission, as §Y[concerned_friend.GetTitledName]§! is moved by your words.\n
translation: 你§Y显著增加§!了任务进度，由于你的话感动了§Y[concerned_friend.GetTitledName]§!。\n

original: You §Ydecrease§! the progress of your mission, as §Y[concerned_friend.GetTitledName]§! is unsettled by your words.\n
translation: 你§Y减少§!了任务进度，由于§Y[concerned_friend.GetTitledName]§!听到你的话后犹豫不决。\n

original: You §Yincrease§! the progress of your mission, as §Y[concerned_friend.GetTitledName]§! is calmed by your words.\n
translation: 你§Y增加§!了任务进度，由于§Y[concerned_friend.GetTitledName]§!听了你的话，变得冷静了。\n

original: You §Ysignificantly decrease§! the progress of your mission, as §Y[stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName]§! is unsettled by your behavior.\n
translation: 你§Y显著减少§!了任务进度，由于你的行动使得§Y[stubborn_courtier.GetFirstName]§!犹豫不决。\n

original: You §Yincrease§! the progress of your mission.\n
translation: 你§Y增加§!了任务进度。\n

original: You §Ydecrease§! the progress of your mission.\n
translation: 你§Y减少§!了任务进度。\n

original: You §Ysignificantly increase§! the progress of your mission.\n
translation: 你§Y显著增加§!了任务进度。\n

original: You §Ysignificantly decrease§! the progress of your mission.\n
translation: 你§Y显著减少§!了任务进度。\n

translation: 礼貌

translation: 已知为一个秘密社团的成员

original: This character is known to associate with criminal secret societies.
translation: 此人与罪恶的秘密社团勾结的消息，已经被披露。

original: The power of the Council increases!
translation: 内阁权利增加！

original: The Succession Law is changed!
translation: 继承法已修改！

original: Members seek to remove §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§! from power and significantly increase the Council's power. Once this faction is sufficiently powerful, §Y[From.GetBestName]§! may present an ultimatum to §Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!.
translation: 该派系的成员致力于寻找将内阁权力置于领主权利之上的机会。当该派系足够强大时，§Y[From.GetBestName]§!可能会向§Y[From.Liege.GetBestName]§!提出最后通牒。

original:
Rather than letting civil war tear the realm apart, [From.GetTitledName] has agreed to give up [From.GetHerHis] title for the good of the realm. We have chosen [new_title_holder.GetFullName] as our new ruler. Your valuable support in this matter will not be forgotten.

Sincerely,
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]
translation:
为了避免国家因内战而分裂，[From.GetTitledName]已经同意为了国家的利益而放弃[From.GetHerHis]头衔。我们选择了[new_title_holder.GetFullName]作为我们新的统治者。你在此事中的宝贵支持我们将谨记于心。

真诚的，
[FromFrom.GetTitledName]

original: Under pressure from a powerful Faction, §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! has agreed to abdicate the throne. Hail the new ruler, §Y[new_title_holder.GetFullName]§!!
translation: 在强大派系的压力下，§Y[From.GetTitledName]§!已同意退位。新统治者§Y[new_title_holder.GetFullName]§!万岁！

original: Lower ranking members are very likely to agree to your diplomatic requests.
translation: 位阶较低的成员很有可能同意你的外交请求。

original: So, what is my share of the spoils?
translation: 所以，我分到的战利品是什么？

original: I am glad we are of one mind, honored colleagues.
translation: 我很高兴，我们是团结一心的光荣的合作伙伴。

original: Are you sure you wish to leave your Society? Your rank and power within the Society will be forfeit, even if you rejoin, and any society-related event chains or missions will end. You will also be unable to join another society for a period of $COOLDOWN|Y$ days.
translation: 你是否确定离开社团？即使你重新加入，你在社团内的位阶和力量将永远失去，任何社团相关的事件组或任务将结束。你在 $COOLDOWN|Y$ 天内将无法再加入任何社团。
